Hobaho Musa na Eliya wakawalawila, wakawa wakulongana na Yesu.

Baho Petelo yakamutya Yesu, “Alu Muwaha, ane nghuwona yowa viswanu muno muno vyono cili baha, Holeka hono wende, ane nozenga vibanda vidatu bahano, cimonga cako, na cimonga ca Musa, na cimonga ca Eliya.”

Nayo lono yali yakali kulonga nha vivyo du, livunde yizelu likawa kuwagubika, ne lizi likahulikwa likulawilila mwi'vunde lilyo, likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu, u mwendece wangu, mono nyendezwe nayo, holeka mumuhulikaje.”
Nawo i wejizwa wali weza kuzihulika zizo, wakagwa gubama, akuno wakogopa muno muno.
Nayo Yesu yakawabitila, yakawapamiza yakawatya, “Mwinukaje le, mulece kogopa!”
Nawo waza kwinula i meso gawo, si wawona yunji, langa wakamuwona Yesu yali wene du.
Nawo lono watimaga wakulawa mwitunda, Yesu yakawakong'onheza muno, yakutya, “Alu, mulece kumulonjela yunji muli zono muziwene, sunga kolo u Mwana wo Munhu yakuzuka kulawa muli wafu.”
Baho i wejizwa wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu i wejizi wo Wulajilize nha wakutya, ati yinojeye Eliya yo yamule kuza?”
Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Heya mbeka, Eliya kokuza kuziwikaniza zose.
“Ninga nghumutyenyi, vyono Eliya yakondya kuza, ninga iwene hamba si wamutanga yaye, langa wene wakamunoza nha vyono wasakaga iweneco. U Mwana wo Munhu nayo, kogazwa nha vivyo mu miwoko yawo.”
Baho nhondo i wejizwa ho wakatanga vyono yawalonjelaga za Yohana u Mubaputizi.
Nawo wali weza kwitang'anila kanyhi ne lipuga lililya lye wanhu, munhu yunji yakamubitila Yesu, yakamufugamila,
yakatya, “Gwe Muwaha, wumuwonelaje lusungu mwanangu, hambi nha yena cinzilisa, kanyhi yakugazika muno, na kali kenji mwene kagwizaga mu moto na mu malenga.
Nane nghamuleta kuli wejizwa wako, ninga hamba si wasuma kumuponya.”

Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Anye mo lulelo lono lusina u wihuwilo, lulelo lono lwajiliye! Alu nokwikalana nanye sunga nili? Hamba nojendelela kumukangalililenyi sunga nili? Ale mundetele ta umwana yuyo ahano.”
Waza kumuleta, Yesu yakalitacila lilyo licisi, nalyo likawa kuwuka, no mwana yuyo, yakapona mwidaha lilyo du.
Hanyuma iwejizwa wakwe, wakawa kumubitila Yesu cinyele wakamuwuza wakatya, “Alu nhawule ase si casuma kulilavya i licisi lilyo?”

Yesu yakawatya, “Ku soko yo wihuwilo wenyu wucefu. Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, hono muwe mwina u wihuwilo wudodo du nha vyono yinha yi mbeyu ya haladali, mosuma kulilonjela i litunda lili, mukutya, ‘Wuwuce ahano, wubite ahalya,’ nalyo mbeka lyobita. Hasina nghani yo yose yono yali yiwe si yisumice kuli'nye. [
Ne licisi lye liwala lilino, si lyosumika kuwingwa, langa hono si ko wulombe no wuleka kulya.]”
Na lono wajendaga wakubita ku Galilaya, Yesu yawalonjela yakatya, “U Mwana wo Munhu kotajilwa mu miwoko ye wanhu.
Womuwulaga, ninga mwi'zuwa lye kadatu, kozuka.” Nawo wejizwa wakakalala muno muno.
Nawo waza kufika ku Kapelanawumi, iwanhu wono wakongholaga izipesa ze kodi ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, wakamubitila Petelo wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu u Mwijizi wenyu nayo kalipaga izipesa ze kodi?”

Nayo Petelo yakatya. “Heya kalipaga.” Nayo Petelo yaza kwinjila mu nyumba, na lono yali yakali hamba si yanalonga nghani yinji, Yesu yakamuwuza, yakatya, “Alu, 'gwe Petelo, agwe wukuwona nhawule? Iwatemi wa mono yinze, wakongholaga kodi ku wulawa kuli wa hayi? Ku wulawa kuli iwana wawo, hamba ku wulawa kuli iwajenzi?”
Nayo Petelo yakapitula yakatya, “Kuwulawa kuli wajenzi.” Yesu yakamutya, “Holeka kumbe iwana si walavyaga.

Ninga alu ho cilece kuwakobaza, ale wubite kwi'lamba, wukayitajile ndowano, nagwe nhondo wusole somba yinongozi yono koyibata, hanyuma wuyahamulaje mulomo wayo, na mugati koziwona zipesa zono zikwiliye so kodi. Ale wuzisolaje wubite wukawapele, ku soko yangu na gwegwe!”
Ale, mucipango cico i wejizwa wakamubitila Yesu wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Alu nani mono muwaha mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga?”
Nayo Yesu yakamucema u mwana mudodo yumonga, yakamuwika haciligati yawo,
hanyuma yakawatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono hono mulece kupituka no kuwa nha vyono wenha i wana wadodo, si mosumila lukulu kwinjila mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga.
Na muli wose mono yakwinenenyheza nho mwana yuyu, ale yuyo yo muwaha mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga.
Na muli wose mono yakumubocela u mwana yumonga nha vyono yenha yuyu mwi'tagwa lyangu, yuyo yakumbocela nene.
“U munhu wo wose mono komwiwajiza yumonga wa muli wana wadodo wawa wono wanyihuwiye, yowa ciba kuli munhu yuyo yawopelezwe musingo ilizala liwaha lyo kusajila, no kugumilwa mu cisolo ce lilenga.
Woyi he, kuli wenze ku soko ye mewajizo gono gakuwagwisa wanji. Imewajizo gago, heya ganojeye gawe gali baho, ninga woyi he kuli munhu yuyo mono yakugaleta.

“Holeka hono u muwoko wako, hamba u mugulu wako wukwiwajize, ale ciba wuwudumulaje no kuwutaga kutali nagwe. Ku soko yili ciba kuli'gwe winjile mu wumi akuno wina muwoko hamba mugulu monga, si nho kutagwa mu moto we cibitilila, akuno ho wina ne miwoko myejete hamonga ne migulu yako myejete.

Na hono iliso lyako likwiwajize, ale, wuliwusaje, wulitaje kutali nagwe. Habi nha yili ciba kuli'gwe, kwinjila mu wumi, akuno wina liso limonga, sinho kutagwa mu moto wa ku Gehena, akuno ho wina ne meso gako gose vyono mejete.”

“Ale mwilanjililaje! Mulece kumubedegala yunji muyagwe ne wadodo wawa. Nghumulonjelenyi imbeka, vyono i wamalayika wawo kuko ku wulanga, wekalaga nhondo zose ha mwande yo Sogo yangu mono yali ku wulanga. [
Hambi u Mwana wo Munhu nha yaza ho yawaponye wono wajiliye.]

Alu mukuwona wule? U munhu hono yawe yena ngholo igana limonga, na hono ngholo monga yajilile, kanozaga nhawule? Kozileka azilya ze makumi cenda ne cenda mwi'tunda, nayo yakubita kuyilondola yiyo yono yajiliye.

Na kolo yakondya kuyiwona nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono kotuga wusangalale muno ku soko ya yiyo ingholo monga, si nha vyono yakuzisangalalila azilya izingholo ze makumi cenda ne cenda zono si zajiliye.
Yo nhavivyo, sunga no Sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga, si yendile yumonga wa muli iwadodo wawa yajilile.”
“U nduguyo hono yakusutizye, ale, wubite wukamulajile imasutya gakwe, gwegwe na mweneco muli wene. Na hono yakuhulice, ale, kowa wamutuga nduguyo.
Ninga hono yekale si yakuhulice ale, wumusolaje yunji yumonga, hamba wejete, muwe muli hamonga nagwe, na muwulanjize we wahomelezi wejete, hamba wadatu, zose ho zisume kunozelezwa.
Nayo hono yekale si yawahulice wawo ale, wulilonjelaje likanisa. Na hono yekale si yalihulice likanisa, ale hodu, kuli'gwe yawe nhe wanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, ne watoweza kodi.”
“Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono co cose cono mocidindila mono'nze, cowa cadindilwa nha vivyo na ku wulanga, na co cose cono mocidigulila mono'nze, ale nha vivyo na ku wulanga cowa cadigulilwa.
Kanyhi nghumulonjelenyi vyono wanhu wejete wa muli nyenye, hono welumbanize baha mono'nze, so nghani yono wolomba, u Sogo yangu wa ku wulanga, mbeka kowapela inghani yiyi.
Hambi nha ho hose hono wakwihanguliza wejete hamba wadatu, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu, nane nili baho muciligati yawo.”
Hanyuma Petelo yakamubitila Yesu, yakamuwuza yakutya, “Alu mwene, hono u ndugu yangu yasutizye, ane yinojeye nimunenele nghanghulo yilinga? Kali mupunghati?”
Nayo Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Ane si nghutya, yeze kali mupunghati du, aa, ng'o, langa yiweze makumi mupunghati kali mupunghati.
Holeka u Wutemi wa ku wulanga, wukwihwana no mutemi yunji, mono yakahila kuwona iliwalo lye sawo yakwe kuli wetumami wakwe.”
Nayo yaza kwinjila mu wuwale, baho yakaletelwa munhu yunji mono yazijilwaga mapesa, talanta elufu yikumi.

Nayo u munhu yuyo yakawa yasina cinhu co cose cono kosuma kulipa, holeka u muwaha wakwe, yakalajiliza vyono u munhu yuyo yaguzwe, u mwene no mugolece wakwe, ne wanagwe, sunga ne vinhu vyose vyono yali yena navyo, ho mugawa wuwo wulipwe.
Ninga u mwitumami yuyo, yakafugama ha mwande yo muwaha wakwe, yakatya, “Wayiko wungolelaje nane nokulipa du u mugawa wose.
Ayulya u muwaha wakwe nayo yakamuwonela lusungu, sunga yakawa kumunenela u mugawa wuwulya wose, hodu yakawa kumuleka yabite.

“He, ninga u mwitumami yuyo, yali yeza kuwuka bahalya, yakamwagana yunji muyagwe ne wetumami wayagwe, mono u mwene yuyu yamudayaga yuyo muyagwe mapesa, dinali igana limonga. Hodu yakawa kumwibata, yakawa kumukoma mu mumelo, akuno yakutya, ‘Wundipaje umugawa wangu wono nghukudaya.’
Nayo yuyo u mwitumami muyagwe, yakafugama, yakamunena yakutya, Gwe, muyangu, wungolelaje, nane nokulipa du umugawa wako wose.
Ninga mwene hamba si yasaka, langa yakamutajila mu jela, sunga kono kowulipila wuwulya u mugawa wose.
Baho i wetumami wayagwe nawo waza kuyiwona inghani yiyo, mbeka wakakalala muno muno, hodu wakabita wakamulonjela u muwaha wawo muli zizo zono ziweye.
Hobaho u muwaha yu yulya yakawa kumucema u mwitumami yuyulya, yakamutya, ‘Agwe, mbeka wuli mwitumami mubi. Agwe walomba kuli'ne, nane nghakunenela u mugawa awulya wose.
Alu, si yali yikunojeye wumuwonele lusungu u mwitumami muyago nha vyono nane nakuwonela lusungu?’
Holeka u muwaha yuyo yakakolwa muno muno ne likuwo, yakamulavya yuyo u mwitumami ho yalipicizwe, sunga kono komalila kuwulipa u mugawa wuwulya wose.
Ale, no Sogo yangu wa ku wulanga nayo, komutendelenyi nha vivyo nanye, hono mulece kwiyinenela munhu na nduguye kwe mitima yenyu yose.”
Yesu yaza kukondya kuzilonga i zinghani zizo, hodu, yakawuka ku Galilaya, yakabita ku yisi ye Wayahudi, ku nhumbi nzagwe ye likolongo lya Yoludani.
Ne wanhu wenji wakamutyatya kuko, nayo yakawaponya.
Ne Wafalisayo wanji wakaza, wakamuwuza, ho wamugwize, wakatya, “Ati, yo ling'ani, u munhu yamulece u mugolece wakwe no kumupela talaka ku soko ye lisutya lyolyose?”
Yesu nayo yakawapitula yakatya, “Alu, nye, ho simwasoma mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, nha vyono u Mulungu mono yamuwumba u munhu ku wulawa ha mwamulizo, yawumba, u mulume no mucekulu,
nayo yakatya, ku soko yiyo holeka u mulume kowaleka u sogwe no nyina, nayo vyokwilunza no mugolece wakwe, nawo vyono wejete wowa muwili wumonga?
Holeka iwene si wowa wejete kanyhi, langa waweza wali muwili wumonga. Holeka cono yacilunzize u Mulungu, u munhu wo wose yalece kucitemanulila lukulu.”
Ninga iwene nawo wakamuwuza, wakatya, “Alu mbi nhawule, Musa yacilajiliza vyono u mugolece yapegwe talaka, no kulekwa?”
Yesu yakawatya, “Musa yamukombolenyi ho muwalece iwagolece zenyu, ku soko yo wukamu we zinhumbula zenyu.

Ninga ku wulawa mwamulizo, si yali nha vivyo. Holeka nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u mulume wo wose mono komuleka u mugolece wakwe no kutola yunji, hono si kusoko yo wusenyha du, yuyo langa yakusenyha.”
I wejizwa wakwe wakamulonjela wakamutya, “Alu kumbe hono izinghani zo mulume no mugolece wakwe, ziwe vyo zinha nha vivi, yili ciba kuleka kutolela lukulu.”
Yesu yakawatya, “Ninga si wose wono wosuma kulibocela i lifundo lilyo, langa yowa kuli wawalya du, wono wapejigwe no Mulungu.

Hambi nha kozili soko nyinji zono zikuleka wanji walece kutola, iwanji ku soko vyono walelwa nhavivyo, na wanji, ku soko vyono wanozigwe nha vivyo ne wanhu, na wanji nawo, walamuye weneco du, vyono si wotola, ku soko yo wutemi wa ku wulanga. Holeka mono yakusuma kulibocela i lifundo lilino, ale yalibocelaje.”
Hanyuma iwanhu wakamuletela Yesu iwana wadodo, ho yawawicile imiwoko yakwe no kuwalombela. Ninga iwejizwa wakawatacila.
Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Muwalekaje iwana wawo wadodo waze kwangu, mulece kuwemila, hambi u wutemi wa ku wulanga nha wa wanhu wono wenha iwana wawa, nha wo wanojeye ku wutemi wa ku wulanga.”
Hodu, yakawawicila miwoko, hanyuma yakawuka ihanhu baho.
U munhu yunji yakamuziza Yesu, yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, alu yinojeye noze cinhuci ciswanu, ho niwutuje u wumi we cibitilila?”
Yesu yakamutya, “Alu nhawule wukumbuza kuli za ya hayi nghani swanu? Hambi nha koyuli yumonga du u muswanu. Na hono wusace kwinjila mu wumi, ale wugebataje i malajilizo.”
Nayo u munhu yuyo yakamuwuza yakatya, “Alu, malajilizo go ga hayi?” Yesu yakatya, “Wulece kuwulaga munhu, wulece kusenyha, wulece kuhiza, wulece kulavya wuhomelezi wo wulambi,
wuwogopaje u sogo no nyina yako, kanyhi, wumwendaje u muyago nha vyono wiyendile gwegwe go mweneco.”
Nayo yuyo u muzelelo, yakamutya, “Gago gose nigebate kuwulawa wudodo wangu, aluno ma, nitumaje ci cici komuno?”
Yesu yakamulonjela yakatya, “Ale, hono wukusaka wuwe munhu mono wukwilaniciye, ale wubite wukaviguze ivinhu vyose, wuwapele iwaciwa, nagwe ho kowa na ciwutwa ku wulanga, hanyuma ho wuze wunhyatye.”
Nayo u muzelelo yuyo yali yeza kuhulika zizo, hodu yakawa kutuluka akuno yena no wukalale muno, hambi nha yali yena sawo nyinji.
Baho nayo Yesu, yakawa kuwalonjela i wejizwa wakwe yakutya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, vyono yowa kukamu muno muno kuli munhu mugoli, ku winjile mu wutemi wa ku wulanga.
Kanyhi nghumulonjelenyi nghutya nhavi, kupelu kuli ngamiya yikole mu cilanga co lusing'ani, si nha u munhu mugoli, kuwinjila mu Wutemi wa ku wulanga.”
Nawo i wejizwa waza kuzihulika zizo, wakezina muno muno, wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Alu yo nani mbi, mono kosuma kupona?”
Yesu nayo, yakawalanga, yakawatya, “Ku wuwe wo munhu inghani yiyi, si yisumice, ninga kuli Mulungu zose nha zisumice.”
Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Alu ase nase ma? Hambi nha cavileka vyose, nase cikakutyatya, alu ho cotuga cinhuci?”

Yesu yakawalonjela, yakatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yalaza kwikala mwi'goda lye nhojo, lyo lukumyo lwakwe, mu yinze yimhya, nanye mono mukunhyatya, molokwikala mu magoda yikumi na mejete, akuno mukuwaling'aniza we milango yikumi na myejete ya Isilayeli.

Na muli wose mono yalecile nyumba yakwe, hamba wawahaze, hamba walumbuze, hamba u sogwe, hamba u nyina, hamba wanagwe, hamba migunda ku soko yangu, nayo kobocela kali yigana na kuciza, na hanyuma kowutuga u wumi we cibitilila.
Ninga i wenji wono aluno wali mu nyuma, wawo wo wolowa wo walongozi. Ne walongozi wolowa wa mu nyuma.”
“U Wutemi wa ku wulanga wihwanile no munhu mono yali yena u mugunda we mizabibu, mono yelawa hakali mitondo muno, yakawika iwetumami mu mugunda wakwe.
Vikelumbaniza nawo, vyono kowalipa u musahala we zuwa limonga, yakawa kuwategula ku mugunda wakwe we mizabibu.
Yakalawila kanyhi mu saa tatu hakali mitondo, yakawawona wanhu wanji wemile du mu sokoni, wasina hamba mulimo
Nawo yakawalonjela yakatya, ‘Ale, mubite nanye muketume mulimo mu mugunda we mizabibu, nane nomupelenyi yiling'ani yenyu, nha vyono mwitumile.’
Ale, nawo wakabita. Yuyo u munya mugunda, kanyhi yakatuluka mu saa tisa ne misi, yakanoza nha vivilya kanyhi.

Nayo yali yeza kufika mu saa kumi na monga, cinyamihe, yakalawila kanyhi, nayo yakawagana wanhu wanji kanyhi wemile bahalya ha sokoni. Yakawawuza, yakatya, ‘Alu nhawulenyi muswa mwimile bahano du misi yose, hamba kwituma mulimo wo wose?’
Nawo wakapitula wakatya, ‘Alu nha si cimutujile u munhu wo kucipela u mulimo.’ Nayo yakawatya, ‘Ale nanye mubite muketume mu mugunda we mizabibu.’

“Ilizuwa lyali lyeza kuswa, u munya mugunda yakamulonjela u mukamisi wakwe, we zipesa, yakatya, ‘Ale wuwacemaje iwetumami wose, ho wuwalipe u musahala wawo wulawilile kuli walya wono watumigwe ku mulimo ha ndumilizo wujendelele sunga wumalilizize kuli walya i walongozi.’
Hodu, wakawa kuza iwetumami wawalya wono wategulwa ku mulimo mu saa kumi na monga cinyamihe, wawo wakabocela, munhu yakapegwa u musahala we zuwa limonga.
Awalya i walongozi waza kufika, wehwesaga vyono iwene wopegwa kuciza, ninga na wene nawo wakapegwa, munhu musahala we zuwa limonga.
Hodu du wakazibocela izipesa zizo, ninga akuno wakumung'ung'ulicila yu yulya muwaha.
Wakatya, ‘Wanhu awano wetuma mulimo mu cipango ca saa monga du, alu nhawule kucipela sawa sawa na wene, na kumbe ase ho cikangalila mu mulimo mukamu mwi'zuwa likali misi yose?’
Baho nayo munya mugunda yakamupitula muyawo yumonga yakamutya, ‘Gwe muyangu, ane si nghukonyile cinji yaye. Wule, sikotya cilagana nagwe vyono nokupela u musahala we zuwa?
Ale wusole yako, wubite. Ane nyendile no mweneco, nimupele ayu mono yazize ku mulimo ha ndumilizo, yono yili sawa sawa na gwegwe.
Alo wukwihwesa ane sina ling'ani yo kwitumila i sawo yangu nha vyono nendile no mweneco? Hamba wukuwona wivu vyono ane nili muswanu?’ ”
Yesu yakamaliliza u wulonje wakwe ko wutya nhavi, “Holeka wo mudumo, wo wolowa walongozi, nawo i walongozi, wo wolowa wo mudumo.”
Nayo Yesu lono yabitaga ku Yelusalemi, yakawasoleleza na walya iwejizwa yikumi na wejete, yakawategula hanhu ha cilejeho, na lono wali wali mu nzila, yakawalonjela yakutya,
“Ta muhulicize, aluno ceza kubita ku Yelusalemi, na kuko, u Mwana wo Munhu kotajilwa mu miwoko ye wakohani wawaha na muli wejizi wo Wulajilize, nawo womuling'aniza yawulagwe.
Womukombola kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi ho wamuzwajize no kumukuna viboko, no kutumbikwa, ninga mwi'zuwa lye kadatu kozuka.”
Baho u nyina ye wana wa Zebedayo, yakamuziza Yesu, hamonga ne wanagwe yakafugama ha mwande ya Yesu, akuno yakumulomba cinji.

Yesu yakamuwuza yakamutya, Alu yaya, wukusaka cici? Nayo yuyo mudala, yakamulonjela yakatya, “Wihuwizaje vyono i wanangu wawa iwejete, wokwikala yumonga ku lubavu lwako lo kulume, no muyagwe nayo kulubavu lwako lo kucekulu, mu Wutemi wako.”
Yesu yakapitula, yakatya, “Anye si mucimanyile cono mukulomba yaye. Alu mosuma kucing'wela icikombe ce magazo cono nocing'wela nene?” Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Heya cosuma.”

Yesu yakawalonjela yakatya, “Mbeka mosuma kucing'wela cikombe cangu, ninga ku wikala ku muwoko wangu wo kulume hamba ku muwoko wangu wo kucekulu, wo si mulimo wangu kulamula inghani yiyo, wopegwa du wawalya wono wawikanizizwa na Baba.”
Awalya i wejizwa wanji we likumi, waza kuzihulika zizo, wakawa kuwasimbila wawo iwejete wa Yakobo na Yohana.
Holeka Yesu yakawacema, yakawalonjela yakutya, “Mumanyile nha vyono iwatemi we makungugo wawabanile i wanhu wawo kwe vilungo, ne wawaha wawo wakuwa kuwatema I wanhu wawo.
Ninga yilece kuwa nha vivyo kuli'nye, langa wo wose wa muli nyenye, mono yakusaka yawe muwaha muli nyenye, yimunojeye yo yawe mwitumami wa wose,
na mono yakusaka kuwa mulongola muli nyenye, ale yimunojeye yo yawe mwitumami wenyu.
Na vyo nha vivyo, u Mwana wo Munhu nayo, si yaza ho yetumamilwe, langa ho yetumame, no kuwulavya u wumi wakwe ho wuwe wukombozwe wa wanhu wenji.”
Nayo Yesu lono yalawaga ku Yeliko, i lipuga iwaha lye wanhu likamutyatya.

Na kwali na wanhu wejete wono wali wali cibofu, nawo wali wekaye hamhelo ye nzila, nawo waza kuhulika du vyono Yesu yazaga yakukolela baho, hodu wakawa kwanza kuzoza wakutya, “Gwe Muwaha go Mwana wa Dawudi, wuciwonele lusungu!”
Nalyo ilipuga lililya lye wanhu, likawatacila, no kuwalonjela wanyamale twii. Ninga i wabofu ho wakacila kuzoza muno, wakutya, “Gwe Muwaha go Mwana wa Dawudi, wuciwonele lusungu!”
Nayo Yesu yakawa kwima, yakawacema no kuwawuza, yakutya, “Alo mukusaka nimutendelenyi wule?”
Nawo wakatya, “Gwe Muwaha, ase cikukulomba wucidigule meso getu.”
Nayo Yesu yakawawonela lusungu, yakawapamiza meso gawo, na ho baho baho du, wakawa kuwona kanyhi, wakamutyatya.
Nayo Yesu lono yali yasejelela ku Yelusalemi, no kufika ku Betifage mwitunda lye Mizeyituni, yakawatuma wejete wa muli wejizwa wakwe,
yakawatya, “Mubite sunga kucitumbi acilya cono cili ha mwande yenyu, na kuko, moyagana ndogowe, mbope, yili hamonga ne nyana yayo. Ale muziwopolelaje mundetele.
Na hono munhu yunji yamuwuzenyi soko yono yikuleka mukuziwopolela, mutye vyono, ‘U Muwaha yakuzisaka,’ nayo komulecelenyi lwa kamonga du.”
Ne nghani yiyi yikanozwa nhavivyo, ho zifisilizwe azilya zono zalongwa no muwizi lono yatya,
“Mulilonjele ilikaya lya Sayuni, Wulanje u Mutemi wako yakukuziza! Mupolo, kanyhi yali mucanyha ye ndogowe.”
Nawo iwejizwa wakawa kubita no kunoza nha vyono walajilizwa na Yesu.
Wakawa kuyileta yiyilya i ndogowe hamonga ne nyana yayo, wakawa kuyijeleka i myenda yawo mucanyha yazo, nayo Yesu yakawa kwikala mucanyha yayo.
Ne lipuga liwaha lye wanhu, wakayitandika i myenda yawo mu balabala, ne wanhu wanji, wakatema i manhambi ge mibici, nawo wakagatandalika nha vivyo mu balabala.

Ne mapuga ge wanhu wono wali wamulongoleye, sunga na walya wono wamutyatyaga, wakazoza ne mazi mawaha wakutya, “Yalumbwe u Mwana wa Dawudi! Yalugutwe yuyo mono yakuziza mwitagwa lyo Muwaha! Yalumbwe u Mulungu kucanyha!”
Nayo Yesu lono yenjilaga mu Yelusalemi, i likaya lyose likamema sasamo. Sunga ne wanhu wakawa kuwuza wakutya, “Alu, nye, Yuyu yo nani?”
Iwanhu wanji wa mwipuga lililya lye wanhu wakatya, “Ayu yo muwizi Yesu, mono yakulawilila ku Nazaleti mu yisi ya Galilaya.”

Hodu, Yesu yakawa kwinjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yakawa kuwawinjila kunze, iwanhu wono waguzaga no kugula ivinhu mugati ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakazigwisa zimeza za wono wakawaga zipesa, sunga ne magoda ga wono waguzaga zinziwa.
Akuno yakuwatya, “Yandikwe mu Mandiko Gono Gelile nha vyono, ‘I Nyumba yangu yocemwa, nyumba yo kulombela.’ Ninga alu anye, mwayinoza kuwa mhango ye wahizi.”
Nawo iwabofu, na we vilema, wose wakamubitila kuko ku Nyumba yo Mulungu, nayo Yesu yakawaponya.

Ale baho, nawo wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wejizi wo Wulajilize wali weza kugawona i mapoto gono Yesu yanozize, hamonga ne wadodo wono wazozaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu wehindile, wakutya “U lukumyo lweze kuli'gwe, go Mwana wa Dawudi,” wene wakasimba.

Hobaho wakamutya Yesu, “Alu ho siwukuhulika vyono wakutya?” Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Heya nghuhulika! Alu anye, mukali si nagasoma lo Mandiko gaga Gono Gelile? Gono gakutya, ‘Kuwejiza iwana wadodo, sunga ne wagalika wose, ho wakulavizye lilumbo lyono likwilaniciye!’ ”
Hodu baho, yakawa kuwaleka, u mwene yakalawila kunze ye likaya, yakabita ku Betaniya, yakagona kuko.
Nayo Yesu lono yawuyaga mwitumbi, hakali mitondo muno yakadabuka.

Yakawuwona mukuyu wunji ha mhelo ye nzila, yakawubitila, ho yahepe imikalo yayo, ninga yakawagana wusina mikalo hamba hadodo, langa go mahamha du gali wene. Hodu yakawa kuwulonjela yakawutya, “Wulecele lukulu kulela kanyhi mikalo cibitilila!” Hobaho baho du, no mukuyu wuwo wukawa kunyala.
Nawo iwejizwa waza kuwuwona, wakezina muno muno, wakatya, “Alu nhawule u mukuyu wuwu wunyala lwa kamonga du?”

Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono hono muwe no wihuwilo wono wusina mahwele, si mosuma kunoza nha vivi du, langa mosuma sunga na hono mulilonjele ilitunda lili mutye, ‘Wukulice wukegumile mwi'lenga,’ nayo vyo yowa nha vivyo.
Na hono muwe no wihuwilo du, co cose cono mocilomba mu wulombe wenyu, cico mocituga.”

Yesu yakenjila kanyhi mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yakawa yakwijiza mumo, na lono yejizaga, i wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wanyamhala we wanhu wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Alu mwene, wukwitumila zizi zose mu wulajilize wa hayi? Hamba yo nani mwene mono yakupelile u wulajilize wuwuno?”
Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Alu nane nomuwuzenyi yiwuzo limonga na hono mumhitule, ale, nane ho nomulonjelenyi vyono nghwitumila zizi mu wulajilize wa hayi.

Wulenyi ta, u wulajilize wa Yohana wo kubaputiza walawa kuli nani? Wule, walawa ku wulanga hamba kuli wanhu?” Ninga iwene wakalongana weneco wose wakutya, “Hono citye, ‘Walawa ku wulanga,’ nayo kociwuza yatye, ‘Alu nhawule si mwamwihuwila?’
Na hono citye, ‘Walawa kuli wanhu,’ baho naho cikogopa i lipuga lye wanhu, hambi wose nha wamuvumiye Yohana nha vyono u mwene yali muwizi.”
Hodu wakawa kutya, “Ase si cimanyile!” Nayo Yesu, yakawalonjela yakutya, “Ale hodu, hamba na nene sinomulonjelenyi vyono nghuzinozeza zizi mu wulajilize wa nani.”
“Nanye mukuwona nhawule? U munhu yumonga yali yena wana wejete. Yakamulonjela mulongozi yakamutya, ‘Mwanangu izuwali wubite wuketume mulimo ku mugunda we mizabibu.’
Nayo muzelelo yulya yakatya, ‘Nema ne!’ Ninga hanyuma yayo, yakapitula lihweso lyakwe, yakabita kuwitumo mulimo.
Nayo u sogo yawo yakamulonjela na yulya u mwanagwe we kejete, nha vivyo, nayo yakamulonjela sogwe yakatya, ‘Heya baba, nobita!’ Ninga hamba si yabita ku mulimo.

Alu wa hayi wa muli wawa i wejete mono yetuma u wuhile wo sogwe?” Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Yuyulya u mwana mulongozi.” Yesu yakawatya, “Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono i watoweza kodi, sunga ne wasenyha, womulongolelenyi kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.

Hambi Yohana nha yamuzizenyi yakamulajililenyi i nzila swanu ye mikalile, anye hamba si mwamwihuwila, ninga i watoweza kodi, sunga ne wasenyha wakamwihuwila. Nanye hamba muwe mwaziwona zizo zose, si mukasaka kuzikawaniza i zinhumbula zenyu no kumwihuwila.”

Yesu yakatya, “Hulicizenyi ta, cihwanicizo cinji, Munhu yunji munya kaya, yakalima mugunda we mizabibu, yakawusitila no mululu, yakahimba ne likombo mumo lyo kuminyila zizabibu, yakazenga ne cilingo. Hanyuma yakawawika walimi, u mwene yakawa kubita ku yisi yinji ya kutali.
Na mwi'pango lyo wupilo we zizabibu waza kusejelela, yakawatuma i wetumami wakwe wabite kuli wawalya iwalimi, ho wakasole mikalo yakwe.
I walimi wawo, wakawebata wawo wetumami, yunji wakamutowa na yunji wakamuwulaga, na yunji kanyhi wakamutowanga ne mabwe.
U munhu yuyo, nayo yakawatuma kanyhi i wetumami wanji, wenji kuciza walongozi, nawo i walimi, wakawatendela nha vivilya du.
Nhondo ndumilizo, yakamutuma u mwanagwe, akuno yakwihwesa, ‘Magu, hamba womogopa u mwanangu.’
Ninga i walimi wawalya, waza muwona u muzelelo yuyulya yakuza, wakalongana weneco wose wakatya, ‘Ayu mwene yo muhazi, holeka ciba cimuwulaje, ase ho cisole u wuhazi wakwe!’
Hodu wakawa kumwibata, wakamulavyaniza kunze yo mugunda we mizabibu, wakamuwulaga.
Alu yuyu munya mugunda we mizabibu kolo yakuza, ho yawanoze nhawule i walimi wawo?”
Iwene wakamupitula wakatya, “Kowapela walimi wanji, wono wosuma kumupela mikalo mu cipango co wupilo wayo.”

Baho nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alo mukali si nayisoma inghani yiyi mu Mandiko Gono Gelile? Yono yikutya, ‘Ilibwe lyono walilema i wazenji alu lyo lyaweza lyo libwe liwaha lyo musinji. No Muwaha yo yayinozize inghani yiyi. Nayo yo nghani yo wizine muno muno kuli'se!’
“Holeka nghumulonjelenyi, vyono, u Wutemi wo Mulungu wowuswa kuli'nye no kupegwa i wanhu we makungugo ganji wono wakulavya mikalo yayo. [
Ninga mono kogwa mucanyha ye libwe lilyo, yuyo kobenanjika-benanjika, na hono limugwile munhu wo wose, langa lyomupondanjiza tici-tici.]”
Iwakohani wawaha ne Wafalisayo, wali weza kuzihulika zizo ze vihwanicizo vyakwe Yesu, wakatanga lwa kamonga du nha vyono yawalongaga weneco.
Holeka wakawa kwanza kulondola londola inzila yo kumwibatila, ninga lu wakogopa wanhu, hambi i wanhu nha wamumanya Yesu vyono u Mwene yo Muwizi.
Yesu yakalonga nawo kanyhi mu vihwanicizo, yakatya,
“Uwutemi wa ku wulanga wihwanile no mutemi mono yamunozeza u mwanagwe, zindigwa ze halusi.
Hanyuma yakawa kuwatuma i wetumami wakwe ho wabite wakawaceme wono walalikwe, waze ku halusi, ninga iwalalikwa hamba si wasaka kuza.

Yakawatuma kanyhi wetumami wanji, yakatya, ‘Ale, muwalonjelaje i walalikwa vyono, i zindigwa zangu zawikanizwa zakondya, zinghongolo zangu hamonga ne zing'ombe zono zijinile, zose zakondya kucinjwa na vyose vyawikanizwa vyakondya, holeka anye muze du kono halusi.’
Ninga iwene wanyo kulalikwa, hamba kutununhika bwete, wakabita du munhu na zakwe, yunji yakabita ku mugunda wakwe, na yunji nayo ku zakwe du,
ne wanji nawo, wakawebata wawalya wetumami, wakawaliganga, wakawawulaga.
Nayo u Mutemi yakasimba muno muno, yakawatuma i wasilikale wakwe, ho wabite wakawongomeze i wawulaji wawalya, hamonga no kuliticimiza i likaya lyawo.
Hanyuma yakawalonjela iwetumami wakwe yakatya, ‘Izindigwa ze halusi mbeka zawikanizwa zakondya, ninga iwalalikwa si wanojeye yaye.
Holeka alu mubite mu zinzila malekano, na wo wose wono mowagana mumo, ale muwacemaje waze ku halusi.’
Nawo iwetumami wakalawila, wakabita mu zinzila, wakawaleta iwanhu wose, iwabi ne waswanu. Sunga ne nyumba yikamema wajenzi.
Nayo u mutemi yali yeza kwinjila ho yawawone iwajenzi, baho yakamuwona munhu yunji mono si yali yavwalile ivivwalo vye halusi.
U mutemi yakamuwuza yakutya, ‘Alu 'gwe muyangu, ho kuvinjila-vinjila nhawule baha, akuno ho wusina ne civwalo ce halusi?’ Ninga mwene munhu yuyo yakanyamala twii.
Hodu, u mutemi yakawalonjela iwetumami yakatya, ‘Ale mumusolaje yuyu, mumuwope migulu ne miwoko yakwe, hanyuma mukamutaje ku citi, kunze, nayo kuko kowa kulila no kugwezula meno.’ ”
Nayo Yesu yakamaliliziza u wulonje wakwe, ko wutya, “Wenji wono walalikwe, ninga wono wahaguywe wo wacefu.”
Hanyuma i Wafalisayo wakawa kubita, wakalongana weneco wose i nzila yono wosuma kumugwiziza Yesu mu wulonje wakwe.

Holeka wakawatuma i wayawo wanji, hamonga ne watyatyi we cipuga ca Helode. Wakabita kuli Yesu, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Gwe Mwijizi, ase cimanyile vyono kulongaga mbeka, na kanyhi vyono kwijizaga i mbeka yo wuhile wo Mulungu kuli wanhu, hamba sikogopaga munhu wo wose, hambi ililumbo lyo munhu nha si cinji kuli'gwe.
Ale cilonjelaje ta vyono wukwihwesa. Wule ta, yili viswanu kumulipa kodi Kayisali hamba ng'o?”
Ninga mwene Yesu yakagamanya i mahweso gawo mabi, yakawa kuwatya, “Nyo wakoci'nye, nhawule lo mukunjela?
Ndajilenyi ta pesa yo kulipila kodi.” Nawo wakamulajila i pesa yiyo.
Nayo Yesu yakawawuza yakutya, “Wulenyi, hwani yiyi ne litagwa lili, vya nani?”
Nawo wakamupitula wakutya, “Vya Kayisali.” Baho nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Ale mupelenyi Kayisali vyakwe Kayisali, nayo Mulungu, ivyakwe Mulungu.”
Nawo wali weza kuzihulika zizo, wakezina muno muno, hodu wakawa kumuleka no kwibitila munhu na lwakwe.
Mwizuwa lilyo wanji wa muli Wasadukayo wakamuziza Yesu. Wawo wo wanhu wono watezaga vyono i wanhu si wolozuka yaye.

Wakamulonjela wakutya, “Go Mwijizi, ase Musa yacilonjela vyono u munhu mono yatolile hono yafwe si yalecile wana, ale yimunojeye u nduguye, yamutole yuyo u mucekulu mufwile, ho yamutujile wana u nduguye.
Alu, bahano hono hetu, hali howali wanhu mupunghati, walume, wana wa munhu monga. U mulongozi yakatola mucekulu, hanyuma yakafwa si yalecile wana, yakamulecela nduguye yuyo mucekulu wakwe, mufwile.
Ale yikawa nha vivyo kuli we kejete, na we kadatu, sunga wo mupunghati.
Na lono wawo wose wali wafwa, hanyuma yayo u mucekulu yuyo nayo yakafwa.
Alu mwizuwa lyono i wafu wala weza kuzuka, u mucekulu yuyu, ho kolowa mugolece wa wahayi, muli wawa wose vyono wali mupunghati? Vyono wose mupunghati wali wamutolile.”
Nayo Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Anye he mbeka mukusutya ku soko vyono si mugamanyile i Mandiko Gono Gelile, hamba ne vilungo vyo Mulungu!”
Ku soko vyono i wafu kolo wakuzukulwa, si wolotola, hamba si wolotolwa, hambi nha wokwihwana ne wamalayika ku wulanga.
Ninga kuli zo wuzuce we wafu, ho simwasoma azilya zono u Mulungu yamulonjelenyi?
Yakutya nhavi, “Ane yo nene u Mulungu wa Abulahamu, na Isaka na Yakobo!” Holeka u Mwene yo si Mulungu wa wono wafwiye, langa yo Mulungu we womi.
Nalyo ilipuga lye wanhu lyaza kuzihulika zizo, likagezina muno imejizo gakwe.
Nawo i Wafalisayo, waza kuhulika vyono Yesu yawanyamaza i Wasadukayo, hodu waketang'anila hamonga.
No muyawo yunji, u mwijizi wo Wulajilize, yakamuwuza Yesu, yakumujela, yakatya,
“Ati Mwijizi, lilajilizo lya hayi liwaha kuciza, muli gono gali mu Wulajilize wa Musa?”
Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Wumwendaje u Muwaha Mulungu wako kwe nhumbula yako yose, na ko mutima wako wose, na kwe mahala gako gose.
Na ali lyo lilajilizo liwaha ililongozi.
Nalyo lye kejete lihwanile na lilyo, ‘Wumwendaje u muyago nha vyono wiyendile go mweneco!’
U Wulajilize wose wa Musa, sunga ne mejizo gose ge wawizi, gatoweleywe mu malajilizo gaga imejete.”
Nawo i Wafalisayo wali weza kwitang'anila hamonga, Yesu yakawawuza,
“Alu anye mukuwona nhawule kuli za Kilisito? Wulenyi, mukwihwesa vyono kowa mwana wa nani?” Nawo wakamupitula wakatya, “Mwana wa Dawudi.”
Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu ho yosumika nhawule, vyono Dawudi, mu vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, yakumucema yakumutya, mwene ‘Muwaha?’ Nha vyono yatya. [
‘U Muwaha yamulonjela u Muwaha wangu wikalaje ku muwoko wangu wo kulume, sunga kolo nghuwawika i walugu wako hasi ye migulu yako.’]
Holeka hono Dawudi yakumutya Kilisito, ‘Muwaha,’ ho kowa mwanagwe nhawule kanyhi?”
Hamba hasina wo wose mono yasuma kumupitula cinji. No wulawilila mwizuwa lilyo, hasina mono yejelela kanyhi kumuwuza cinji co cose.
Hanyuma yakawa kuwulonjela u winji we wanhu, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, yakatya,
“Iwejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, wo wapejigwe u wulajilize wo kuwulolosa u Wulajilize wa Musa.
Holeka munojeye anye mwibataje, no kwituma zose zono womulonjelenyi. Ninga mulece kwiga imetumo gawo, hambi na weneco nha si wakuzituma zizilya zono wakuziganula.
Wene wawopaga imitegulo mizito, no kuwapiciza iwanhu mu mawega, ninga iweneco si wakusaka kugolola hamba cidole du bwete, ho wayidinghule imitegulo yiyo.
Iwene izawo zose, wetumaga du ho wanhu wawawone. Hambi nha wendile kuvwala ha wusu wawo na mu miwoko yawo icitambala cono cihonele malajilizo, kanyhi wendile konjeleza ne masune mu majoho gawo.
Kanyhi, wendile hanhu he lilumbo mu zindigwa ze zisikukuu, no kwikala mu magoda matambule mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo.
Wendile muno muno ho walamuswe ne wanhu kwe cogopo mu zisokoni, no kucemwa kanyhi ne wanhu, ‘Mwijizi.’
Ninga anye, mulecele lukulu kucemwa ‘Mwijizi,’ vyono anye mwina mwijizi wenyu yumonga du, ninga anye wose muli ndugu.
Hamba mulece kumucema munhu wo wose mukumutya, ‘Baba,’ bahano mono yinze, hambi u sogo yenyu, nha yumonga du mono yali ku wulanga.
Hamba mulece kucemwa, ‘Walongola.’ hambi u mulongola wenyu nha yumonga du, nayo yo Kilisito.
Nayo u muwaha muli nyenye, yimumojeye yo yawe mwitumami wenyu.
Nayo mono yakwikumya mweneco, nha konyetywa, na mono yakwinyetya, yuyo langa yo kokumywa.”

“Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, mo wakoci! Mono mukuwadindila iwanhu u mulango wo Wutemi wa ku wulanga. Nanye mo weneco si mukwinjila mugati, kanyhi hamba si mukusaka kuwakombola wono wakusaka kwinjila ho wenjile. [

“Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Mono mukuwewonela iwacekulu wafwile, no kuwasolela ivinhu vyawo, akuno mukwinoza nha muli wanhu waswanu, so wulomba wulombe wutali muno muno. Na ku soko yiyi, holeka mopegwa wulipicizwe wuwaha.]

“Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Mono mukujenda mwi'lenga na mu yisi nghavu ho mutuje munhu monga yatyatye dini yenyu. Na kolo mwamutuga, mukumunoza kanyhi yawe yawunojeye u moto we Gehena kali kejete si nha nyenye mo weneco.
“Woyi he kuli'nye, mo watonji wabofu! Anye mutezaga ati hono munhu yelahize kuli Nyumba yo Mulungu, si nghani yaye, langa hono yelahize kuli zahabu ye Nyumba yo Mulungu, baho langa yepela nghani.
Anye mo wabofu, na mo walele! Alu ya hayi yono yine nhunizo mbaha, zahabu, hamba Nyumba yo Mulungu yono yikuyinoza zahabu yiyo ho yiwe yelile?
Kanyhi mutezaga ati hono munhu yelahize ku cipegwa cono ciwicigwe mucanyha ye cikumbicilo, yuyo langa kepela nghani.
Anye nyo wabofu, alu co ca hayi cono cina nhunizo mbaha, i cipegwa cico hambe cikumbicilo cono cikucinoza i cipegwa cico ciwe celile?
Holeka mono yakwilahiza kuli cikumbicilo, yakwilahiza kuli cikumbicilo, na kuli vyose vyono viwicigwe mucanyha yayo.
Na mono yakwilahiza kuli Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakwilahiza kuli Nyumba yo Mulungu nha vivyo sunga kuli mono yekaye mugati yayo.
Na mono yakwilahiza kuli wulanga, yakwilahiza kuli ligoda lye nhojo lyo Mulungu, na kuli yuyo mono yekaye mwigoda lilyo.

Woyi he kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Mono muwalifyaga iwanhu, zaka sunga na mu mahamha ge mhunjile swanu, ne binzali, ne zi nyanya, na akuno mukuzileka izinghani zimbaha zono zili mu Wulajilize, nha vyono iling'ani, lusungu no wihuwilo. Azi zo zali zinojeye anye muzikamise muno muno, hamba kuzisemwa azilya zinongozi.
Lanjenyi ta, anye mo walongola wabofu! Mono muwusaga lihazi mu malenga, ninga kuno ho mukumela ngamiya!

“Woyi he kuli'nye nyo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, mo wakoci! Anye mono mukwemaga kunze i cikombe ne bakuli, ninga mukuleka mugati mono mumemile ivinhu vyono mwavitujila mu nzila yo wuhizi no wubuguci.
Agwe go Mufalisayo mubofu! Wamule wukweme mugati ye cikombe, holeka na kunze yayo nako kowa kwelile.

“Woyi he, kuli'nye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo mo wakoci! Anye, mono mwihwanile vitenjelo vibakwe swakala, vyono kunze vijelaga viswanu muno muno, ninga mugati, mbeka vimemile mafupa ga wono wafwa, ne takataka yose.
Alu sunga na nyenye nanye iwanhu wakumuwonenyi mudeha nha muli wanhu waswanu, kumbe mugati yenyu, mumemile wukoci no wavu wose.”
“Woyi he, anye mo wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, mo wakoci! Hambi nha muzengaga ivitenjelo vye wawizi, no kuvihamba ivitenjelo vye wanhu waswanu.
Akuno mukutya, ‘Ase mhali cali ciwe cili womi mu vilo vye wakuku zetu, si cali cilumbanize nawo no kuwawulaga iwawizi.’
Na ku soko yiyo, holeka mukuhomelela vyono anye nanye mo weneco kumbe, muli wana wa wawo wono wawawulagaga i wawizi,
holeka alu muwufisilizaje mulimo wono wakondya kuwanza i wasogo zenyu!
Anye mo wana we zinzoka, zono zina sumu! Alo mosuma nhawule kuwilega u wuling'anizwe wo moto we Gehena?

Ku soko yiyo holeka ane nghumuletelenyi wawizi, ne wanhu we mahala, kanyhi ne wejizi, nanye mowawulaga no kuwatumbika wanji wa muli wene, na wanji mowakuna ne viboko mu matang'anilo genyu go wuhembelo, no kuwalondola londola mu matumbi gose.

Na mu nzila yiyo, u wuhoswe wose ho womuzizenyi, ku soko ye sakami yose ye wanhu waswanu, yono yamwajika mu muhangha. Heya ku wulawa ha wuwulagwe wa Zekaliya, u mwana wa Balakiya mono mwamuwulajila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu haciligati ya Hono Helile ne cikumbicilo.
Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u lulelo lulu lotuga wulipicizwe ku soko ye zinghani zizi.”

“Gwe Yelusalemi, Yelusalemi, mono wukuwa kuwawulaga iwawizi, sunga no kuwatowanga ne mabwe awalya wono watumwagwa u kwako. Kalinga kono nasakaga kuwakongholela iwanago kono kwangu, nha vyono nghuku yivikunyanjililaga viziyoziyo vyayo hasi ye mabawa gayo, ninga hamba si wenda yaye.
Ale, holeka i Nyumba yo Mulungu wako nagwe yokwikala 'tongo.
Heya, mbeka, nane nghumutyenyi vyono, si mosuma kumbona kanyhi, sunga mwi'daha lyono molotela, ‘Yo mumoti mono yakuziza Mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha.’ ”
Yesu yakalawila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, na lono yabitaga, iwejizwa wakwe wakamuziza, wakamulajila imizenjele ye Nyumba yo Mulungu.

Yesu nayo yakawatya, “Heya ho baho, mosuma kugawona gaga gose! Ninga mbeka nghumutyenyi, hasina yibwe hamba limonga lyono lilasigala baha, mucanyha ye libwe liyagwe, langa i vinhu vyose vyologwiswa hasi.”

Nayo Yesu lono yali yekaye mwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni, i wejizwa wakwe wakamuziza cinyele, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ale ta, wucilonjelaje, i zinghani zizi mwene zolowa za nili uwuze wako nawo, wololajilwa na citanjilo cono cinha wule baho ha ndumilizo ye yinze.”
Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Mwilanjililaje muno muno, ho mulece kukongwa na munhu wo wose.
Hambi nha wanhu wenji wono wolokuza, nawo walalitumamila litagwa lyangu wakutya, ‘Ane yo nene Kilisito, nawo wolowajiliza wanhu wenji.’
Kanyhi molohulika muli zo wulugu, ne zinonga nonga zo wulugu, ninga anye mulece kwihwelela, hambi zizo, nha zinojeye zize, ninga ndumo yeneco yowa yikali si nawa.
Likungugo lyokwihoma ne likungugo liyagwe, no wutemi nawo wokwihoma no wutemi wuyagwe. Ne mazala nago gokuza ako na ako, sunga ne matulo ge yisi nago gokuza.
Na gaga gose gokwihwana nho wusungu du, wo kusawa mwana.
“Kanyhi nawo wolomulavyenyi ho mutamiswe no kuwulagwa. Ne makungugo gose kono galila, golomusulenyi anye, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.
Na mu vilo vivyo, wanhu wenji wolowuleka u wihuwilo wawo, wolokwigalucila weneco wose no kwisula.
Kanyhi mu vilo vivyo, wololawila iwawizi wenji wo wulambi, nawo wolowa kuwajiliza wanhu wenji.
Na vyono u wubi wowa kucila konjelezeka, ale nhavivyo no wendo we wanhu wenji wolopola.
Ninga u munhu wo wose mono kolokangalila sunga ko ku ndumo, yuyo langa yo kolopona.
Ninga i yinze yose, yoganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Wutemi wo Mulungu mu makungugo gose, lono i ndumo yikali si naza, ho wuwe wuhomelezi kuli wene.”
“Kanyhi moliwona, ‘lyono likucemwa.’ Iwifyo lyo wuhodanje, lililya lyono lyalongwa no muwizi Danyeli, lyolowa limile i hanhu hono helile.” (Ale baho, mono yakusoma, yezuce i nhunizo yayo.)
“Ale, mu vilo vivyo wono wali mu Yudiya, watizize mu matunda.
Nayo mono yali mucanyha ye litembe lye nyumba yakwe, yalece kutimila lukulu, ho yasole ivinhu vyakwe, vyono vili mu nyumba yakwe.
Na yulya mono yali ku mugunda yalece kuwuya ne nyuma, ho yasole icivwalo cakwe.
Woyi he, kuli we cidala wono wali magulu mazito, na wono wena iwana wagalika wono wakali kongha mu vilo vivyo.
Holeka mulombe ho wutize wenyu wulece kuwa mu vilo vye mbeho ye cinyuli, hamba mwizuwa lye Sabato!
Hambi mu vilo vivyo nha vyolowa vyo wugaye wuwaha muno muno, wono wukali si nejela hamba hadodo kuwulawa ku mwamulizo we yinze sunga nalu, hamba si wulejelela lukulu kanyhi.
Ne vilo vivyo hono vyali vilece kucepulwa, hali hawe hasina munhu wo wose mono yali yapone, ninga alu, ivilo vivyo vyocepulwa, ku soko ya awalya iwahagulwa.
“Holeka mu vilo vivyo, hono munhu yaze yamulonjelenyi yawe kutya, ‘Kilisito yali ahano,’ hamba lunji yatye, ‘Kilisito yali ahalya,’ mbeka mulece kumwihuwila.

Hambi nha wololawila walambi wenji, wono wokwicema weneco yo Kilisito, kanyhi ne wawizi wo wulambi. Nawo wawo wonoza mapoto mawaha, ne mezino gono gosuma kumwajilizenyi, na hono yisumice sunga ne wahagulwa wo Mulungu.
Ta hulicizenyi, ane nimulonjelenyi zinghani zizi lono zikali si nawa.
Holeka hono wamulonjelenyi wawe kutya, ‘Lanjenyi ta yali ku nyika,’ anye mulecele lukulu kubita kuko, na lunji womutyenyi, ‘Lanjenyi ta, yehundice kugati,’ anye mulecele lukulu kwihuwila,
hambi u wuze wo Mwana wo Munhu, nha wokwihwana nha vyono i limuli likuwa kumulika ku lubavu lwa kucilima sunga ko ku lubavu lwa kumwezi.
Na kanyhi kuko kono kowuli u muvimba, kuko ne zindi ko zokwikongholela.”
“Ninga u wugaye kolo wapuluta, lulo baho du ilizuwa lyolotukuwazwa, no mwezi nawo si wolosana ng'o, ne zinyelezi nazo zologwa ku wulawa kucanyha, ne vilungo vyo wulanga, vyolosinjiswa.

Ale baho langa, icitanjilo co Mwana wo Munhu, ho cilejelela ku wulanga, we makungugo gose ga kono'nze baho ho wololilila, nawo wolomuwona u Mwana wo Munhu, yakuziza mu mavunde mucanyha, akuno yena ne vilungo vinji hamonga no lukumyo luwaha.

Ne lizi yiwaha lye ndulele, lyolohulikwa, nayo kolowatuma i wamalayika wakwe, nawo wolowakonghola i wahagulwa wakwe ku wulawa ku zimbavu zose vyono yine ze yinze, kuwulawilila ku mudumo awu wo wulanga, sunga ko ku mudumo muyagwe.”
“Ale ta, mwiyijizizaje mu cihwanicizo co mukuyu, vyono, lono mukugawona manhambi gayo geza kutula no kulavya i mahamha gayo, ho baho ho mumanyilaga vyono i lifuku lyeza lili behi.
Ale, holeka na nyenye nanye, kolo mukuziwona zizi zikwitumwa, mumanye vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yeza yali behi muno muno.
Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u lulelo lulu si lopuluta yaye, lono zizi zose zikali nejela.
U wulanga ne yinze, heya vyopuluta, ninga i zinghani zangu, si zolopulutila lukulu.”

“Ninga muli ze lizuwa hambe cipango, zizo langa, hasina u munhu wo wose mono yamanyile vyono yowa nili, hamba ne wamalayika wa ku wulanga, hamba no Mwana wo Munhu, siyamanyile, langa yo Baba yali wene du mono yamanyile.
Langa yene, yolowa nha mu vilo vya Noha.
Ku soko mu vilo vivyo, lono lihwazi lye malenga lyali likali si naza iwanhu nha walizaga, kanyhi wang'wezaga, watolaga no kutolwa, sunga lono Noha yenjilila mu safina.
Nawo hamba si wamanya cono cokwijela ci cici, sunga mwizuwa lyono lyaziza ilihwazi lye malenga, likawasola wose. Ale, nhavivyo vyo yolowa, mwizuwa lyono yalaziza u Mwana wo Munhu.
Mwidaha lilyo, wanhu wejete wolowa ku mugunda, monga kolosolwa, na yunji kololekwa.
We ciyaya wejete wolowa wakusaga wuhemba he sajilo limonga, monga kolosolwa, na we kejete, kololekwa.
Holeka munojeye mwikalaje meso, hambi nha simumanyile ilizuwa lyono kokuziza u Muwaha wenyu.
Ninga mweze kuyikumbucila ne nghani yiyi, vyono hono munya kaya, yali yawe yamanyile ilipango lyono u muhizi kokuziza, mbeka yali yekale meso, hamba si yali yayileceleze kaya yakwe yibenwe.
Holeka nanye nhavivyo, mweze mwiwikanizize lukulu, hambi Mwana wo Munhu nha kokuziza mwi'pango lyono anye si mwihwesize yaye.”
Nayo Yesu, yakajendelela kulonga yakutya, “Alu nani 'mbi u mwitumami mwihuwilwa, kanyhi we mahala, mono muwaha wakwe komuwika, ho yawapele zindigwa iwanhu wakwe mucipango cono cinojeye?
Mbeka u mwitumami yuyo kowa mumoti, hono u muwaha wakwe kolo yakuza, yamwagane yakunoza nhavivyo.
Mbeka nghumutyenyi, vyono komuwika u mwitumami yuyo, yawe mulanjilizi we sawo yakwe yose.
Ninga hono yawe mwitumami mubi, nayo ho yatye mu nhumbula yakwe nhavi, ‘U Muwaha wangu nha yacela ku wuwuye,’
hanyuma ho yanze kuwatowanga i wetumami wayagwe kanyhi akuno yawe kulya no kung'wezana ne wagala wujimbi,
ninga u muwaha wakwe, kokuziza mwizuwa lyono siyalanjiliye yaye, hamba mu cipango cono si yamanyile.
Nayo kolo yakuza, kolomukunanga muno, hanyuma komuwika mwi'puga limonga ne wakoci. Na kuko kolowa cililo no wugwezula meno.”
“Lulo baho, u Wutemi wa ku wulanga wolokwihwananizwa ne wahinza yikumi, wono wasola zitala zawo, wakawa kubita kumuhinjiliza bwana halusi.
Muli wahinza wawo yikumi, mwali mowali wahinza wahano wono wali walele, na wahano wanji, wali we mahala.
Wawalya i wahinza wahano iwalele, wasola izitala zawo du, hamba kuteguliza ne ciwutwa ce mafuta ge tala.
Ninga awalya wahano we mahala, wasola ne ciwutwa ce mafuta ge tala, hamonga ne zitala zawo.
Alu, vyono bwana halusi yacela kuwuze, hodu iwahinza wawalya wose wakawa kusinzila, wakawa kugona nhongo.
Ale, mucilo mugati kukawa ne zozo yiwaha, Ale, ale! Bwana halusi kalawila, ale mubite mukamuhinjilize.
Ale du baho, wawalya i wahinza wose wakenuka, wakawa kwanza kuzinozeleza i zitala zawo.
Awalya iwalele, wakawatya awalya we mahala, ‘Nye wayetu, ta mucigawilaje nase mafuta genyu madodo, hambi izitala zetu nha zikuzima.’
Ninga awalya we mahala, wakawatya, ‘Sigocikwila ase na nyenye! Ciba hono mubite kwi duka mukegulile nyo weneco!’
Ale, baho kunyuma bwana halusi yakawa kuza, awalya i wahinza wono wali wewikanizize lukulu, wakawa kwinjila hamonga na bwana halusi mu nyumba ye halusi, no mulango wukawa kudindwa.
Hanyuma awalya i wahinza wanji nawo, ho wakawa kuza, wakamula kucema wakutya, ‘Muwaha, Muwaha, wucidigulile.’
Ninga u mwene yakawapitula yakatya, ‘Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono ane si nghumumanyenyi.’ ”
Baho Yesu yakawatya, “Holeka munojeye mwikalaje meso, hambi nha si mumanyile ilizuwa hamba cipango.”
“Yowa nha vyono u munhu yunji, mono yasaka kubita muhinzo wa kutali, mono yawacema iwetumami wakwe, yakawapela i zisawo zakwe wazikamise.

Nayo yakawapela munhu mu nghango ye mahala gakwe, u mulongozi yakamupela silinje elufu makumi mejete ne'hano, na we kejete yakamupela silinje elufu yikumi, nayo we kadatu, yakamupela silinje elufu yihano, hodu u mwene yakawa kutuluka.
Ale, yuyulya mono yapegwa silinje ze elufu makumi mejete ne'hano yakazinozeza wusuluza, sunga yakatuga cambuzi ca silinje zinji elufu makumi mejete ne'hano.
Ayulya nayo nha vivilya mono yapegwa silinje elufu yikumi, nayo yakatuga cambuzi ca silinje elufu yikumi.
Ninga ayulya mono yapegwa silinje elufu yihano, mwene yabita yakahimba yikombo mu muhangha, yakayifuciza i sawo yo muwaha wakwe.
“Vyaza kupuluta vilo vicefu, u muwaha yuyulya yakawuya, yakawa kwanza kulanga liwalo lye zipesa zakwe u witumamilwe wayo sunga no wutuje wayo.

Ale yuyulya u mwitumami mono yapegwa silinje ze elufu makumi mejete ne'hano, yakaza akuno yaleteleze hamonga na azilya ze elufu makumi mejete ne'hano zono yazituga ze cambuzi, yakamutya, ‘Muwaha, wamhela silinje makumi mejete ne'hano du, ninga wulanje, ahano nina zinji kanyhi elufu makumi mejete ne'hano ze cambuzi cono natuga.’

U Muwaha wakwe nayo yakamutya, ‘Ale viswanu, wuli mwitumami muswanu, kanyhi wuli mwihuwilwa. Wali mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo, ninga alu nokupela zimbaha kuciza. Ale wuze wusangalalane hamonga no muwaha wako.’

Ayulya nayo mwitumami mono yapegwa silinje elufu yikumi, yakaza, nayo yakalavyaniza silinje zinji elufu yikumi ze cambuzi cono yatuga nayo, yakatya, ‘Muwaha, ane wamhela silinje elufu yikumi, lanje azino zinji elufu yikumi ze cambuzi cono natuga.’

U Muwaha wakwe yakamutya, ‘Ale viswanu, wuli mwitumami muswanu kanyhi mwihuwilwa. Wali mwihuwilwa muli nghani ndodo du, alu nokupela i zimbaha zono zicizize zizi. Ale wuze wusangalalane hamonga no muwaha wako.’
Ninga ayulya mono yapegwa silinje elufu yihano, nayo yakaza yakatya, ‘Muwaha, ane manyile vyono agwe wuli munhu mukamu, agwe kududulaga hono si wuhadice, kanyhi, kukunyanjilaga hono si wamiza.
Holeka ane nghawa kogopa, nghawa kuzihundika i zipesa zako mu muhangha. Holeka alu wusole sawo yako.’
Nayo u Muwaha wakwe yakamupitula yakamutya, ‘Lanje ta 'gwe waco go mwitumami mubi kanyhi mudoba! Wali wumanyile vyono ane ndudulaga hono si hadice, kanyhi na vyono nghongholaga hono si namiza mbeyu.
Holeka lu, yali yikunojeye wuyiwice sawo yangu ku benki, nane nali sole sawo yangu hamonga ne cambuzi cayo.
Holeka mumubokaje pesa zizo, mumupele ayulya mono yena silinje elufu makumi mejete ne'hano.
Hambi mono yena cinji nha kopegwa no konjelezwa kuciza. Ninga ayulya mono yasina cinji, nha kosolelwa sunga na cico cono yena naco.
No mwitumami yuyu mono yasina cambuzi, mumutagaje ku citi ca kunze! Kuko kolwa kocili cililo no wugwezula meno.’ ”
“Mu cipango cono kolokuziza u Mwana wo Munhu mu lukumyo lwakwe, yena hamonga ne wamalayika wakwe, baho ho yalekala mwi'goda lyakwe lye nhojo, lyo lukumyo.
Ne makungugo gose golokwikongholela hali mwene, nayo kolowatemanula wanhu, nha vyono u mudimi kazitemanulaga zingholo lwayo, ne zimhene lwayo.
Nayo koziwika zingholo ku lubavu lo muwoko wakwe wo kulume, ne zimhene ku lubavu lwakwe lo kucekulu.
Hanyuma u mutemi ho kowalonjela awalya wono wali ku lubavu lo muwoko wakwe wo kulume yakutya, ‘Muze anye mono mwalugutizwa na Baba, mubocele u Wutemi wono mwawikanizizwa ku wulawa wuwumbwe we yinze.
Hambi nha nali ndabuce, nanye mukamhela ndigwa, nali nghaluce, nanye mukamhela malenga, nali mujenzi, ninga anye mukambocela,
nali sawuce, anye mukamvwika, kanyhi nali nhamigwe, mukaza kunanga, nali nili mu jela, nanye mukaza kunamusa.’

Baho, nawo wawo iwanhu waswanu, womupitula u mutemi, wawe kutya, ‘Alu Muwaha, ho ha nili, lono cakuwona agwe wudabuce, nase cikakulisa ndigwa, hamba nili lono wali wukaluce nase cikakung'wesa malenga?
Na nili lono cakuwona agwe wuli mujenzi, nase cikakubocela, hamba wusina myenda, nase cikakuvwika?
Hamba nili lono cakuwona wutamigwe, hamba lunji wuli mu jela, nase cikaza kukulanga?’
Nayo u Mutemi kowapitula yawe kutya, ‘Mbeka nghumutyenyi, vyono co cose cono mwamutendela yumonga wa muli wawa i wandugu zangu wadodo, ale, mwanhendela nene.’
“Ale, baho ho kowalonjela na awalya wono wali ku lubavu lwakwe lo kucekulu yawe kutya, ‘Ale, mbucilenyi anye mono mwalijitwa! Bitenyi mu moto we cibitilila wono wawicilwa Setani ne wamalayika wakwe.
Hambi nha nali ndabuce hamba si mwamhela ndigwa, nali nghaluce, hamba si mwamhela malenga.
Nali mujenzi, hamba si mwambocela, nali nhamigwe, kanyhi nali mu jela, ninga hamba si mwaza kunanga.’

“Baho nawo womupitula wawe kutya, ‘Muwaha, alu lo lwa nili lono cikakuwona wudabuce, kanyhi wina nyhilu, kanyhi nili lono wali mujenzi hamba wusawuce, na lono wali wutamigwe, hamba wuli mu jela, nase si caza kukwitumamila?’
Nayo kowapitula yawe kutya, ‘Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono bahalya du lono mwalemela kumutendela nghani zizi yunji wo wose wa muli wawa i wadodo wangu, ale, mwalema kunhendela nene.’
Holeka iwanhu wawa, wolotegulwa ku wulipicizwe we cibitilila, ninga awalya waswanu, awo wopegwa u wumi we cibitilila.”
Nayo Yesu yaza kukondya kuzilonga zizo zose, yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe, yakawatya,
“Mumanyile vyono, vilawa vyeza kupuluta vilo vyejete cowa mwizuwa lye sikukuu ya Pasaka, no Mwana wo Munhu kolavywa ho yatumbikwe mu musalaba.”
Na mwi'pango lilyo i Wakohani wawaha hamonga ne wanyamhala we wanhu, waketang'anila hamonga mwi'kumbo lya Kayafa, Mukohani Muwaha.
Wakalongana weneco wose, wakulondola nzila yo kumwibatila Yesu ko wusugu, ho wamuwulaje.
Ninga hamba nha vivyo, si wakasaka inghani yiyo ho yitumwe mwi'pango lye Sikukuu, ho halece kuwa wuma muli wanhu.
Nayo Yesu lono yali yali kuko ku Betaniya, mu nyumba ya Simoni mono kacemwaga Mukoma,

hakawa na mucekulu yunji mono yali yena supa ye mafuta ge mhunjile swanu muno go wuguzi wukamu, yakamuziza Yesu lono yali yekaye ha meza ha wulye we zindigwa, yakamujidila mu mutwe gago i mafuta maswanu.
Nawo i wejizwa wakwe waza kuziwona zizo, wakasimba muno wakatya, “Alu wambuce wose wuwu wa cici?”
Imafuta gaga, gali gasume kuguzwa ko wuguzi wuwaha, ne waciwa wapegwe izipesa zizo.
Yesu yakagamanya i mahweso gawo, holeka yakawatya, “Alu nhawule mukumugaza u mucekulu yuyu? Mwene kanyitumamila mulimo muswanu muno muno.
Iwaciwa mwina nawo nhondo zose, ninga ane si nowa hamonga nanye nhondo zose.
U mucekulu ayu, kanjidila mafuta, so wuwikanizwe we maziko gangu.
Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono ho hose mono yinze yiyino, hono lowa kuganulwa u Luganuzi Luswanu, ilitumo lilino lyono yetumile u mucekulu yuyuno, lyowa kulongwa so kumukumbucila mwene.”
Hanyuma ayulya Yuda Isikaliyota muyagwe na awalya we likumi na wejete, yakabita kuli Wakohani wawaha,
yakawawuza yakutya, “Alu momhela cinhuci ho nimukombolelenyi Yesu?” Nawo wakamuwalila pesa makumi madatu,
hodu mwene Yuda kulawa lulo baho, yakawa yakulondola icilejeho co kumugaluka Yesu.
Na mwizuwa lilongozi, lono lyali likali lizuwa lye sikukuu ye mikate yono siyisasize, iwejizwa wakwe, wakamubitila Yesu, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alo wukusaka cikutenjele hanhuci i sikukuu ye Pasaka?”

Nayo yakawapitula yakawatya, “Mubite mwinjile mwi'kaya, ku kaya ya nhendu, mukamutye, Mwijizi yakutya, icipango cangu cafika, holeka ane hamonga ne wejizwa wangu, coyinozeza sikukuu ye Pasaka mu kaya yako.”
Nawo i wejizwa wakwe, wakanoza nha vyono Yesu yawalajiliza, wakayitenga i ndigwa ye Pasaka.
Na lono yali yeza kuwa cinyamihe, Yesu yakekala ha meza, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe yikumi na wejete.
Na lono walizaga, Yesu yakawatya, “Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono u muyenyu yunji muli nyenye, kongaluka.”
Iwejizwa wakakalala muno muno, wakawa kwanza kuwuza yumonga yumonga wakutya “Ati, Muwaha, wukwihwesa yowa nene?”
Ninga Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Yuyo mono cililizane nhonje hamonga na nene mu ciya ce mboga, ale yo yuyo mono kongaluka.
Heya u Mwana wo Munhu yakubita, nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulonga, ninga woyi he, kuli munhu yuyo, yali yiwe yili ciba hono yali yalece kulelwa.”
Ale, nayo Yuda yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, alo wukwihwesa kowa nene?” Nayo Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Agwe langa kulonga.”
Na lono walizaga, Yesu yakawusola mukate, yakalumba, yakawubegula, yakawapela iwejizwa wakwe akuno yakutya, “Ale solenyi mulye, awu wo muwili wangu.”
Hanyuma kanyhi, yakasola cikombe, yakamulumba u Mulungu, yakawapela, akuno yakutya, “Ale, mung'we wose,
hambi ayi nha yo sakami yangu yono yikukangaza i cilagane co Mulungu, isakami yono yikwitika ku soko yo kuwanenela i wanhu wubi wawo.
Ane nghumulonjelenyi nha vyono si nong'wela lukulu divayi ya zabibu, sunga mwi'zuwa alilya lyono nilang'wela divayi 'mhya hamonga nanye mu Wutemi wa Baba.”
Wali weza kukondya kwimba lwimbo, wakawa kutuluka wakawa kubita ku kwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni.
Hanyuma Yesu yakawatya, “Icilo cici ce zuwalili, anye wose motiza mondeka nili wene, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, ‘Nomutowa u mudimi, Nazo izingholo zokwiyagala.’
Ninga kolo nakondya kuzuka, nomulongolelenyi ku Galilaya.”
Petelo yakamutya Yesu, “Hamba wose wawe na mahwele ku soko yako, no kutiza, no kukuleka, ninga ane hamba si nokulecela lukulu.”
Yesu yakamutya “Petelo, ane nghukulonjela mbeka, vyono i cilo ce zuwalili du, lono i nzogolo yikali nalila, agwe kowa wanghana kali kadatu.”
Nayo Petelo yakamutya, “Hamba hono yiwe yinojeye nifwe hamonga nagwe, ane langa, hamba si nokulecela lukulu.” Ne wejizwa awalya wanji wose, nawo wakalonga nhavivyo.
Hanyuma Yesu yakawa kubita nawo sunga ku busitani ya Getisemane, yakawalonjela iwejizwa wakwe yakatya, “Ale mwikalaje bahano, nane mbite hamwande hadodo nghalombe.”
Yakamusola Petelo hamonga ne wana wejete wa Zebedayo, yakawa kwanza kuwona wuzinguce hamonga no wugazice mu nhumbula yakwe.
Yakawalonjela yakawatya, “Ane nina wukalale wuwaha mu nhumbula yangu, behi no kufwa. Holeka mwikalaje baha meso hamonga nane.”

Hanyuma yakatela tela hamwande hadodo, yakagwa funama, yakalomba, yakutya, “Gwe Baba, hono yiwe yisumice, icikombe cicino co wusungu cimhulutaje, ninga yilece kuwa nha vyono nyendile nene, ng'o, langa yiwe nha vyono wendile du gwegwe.”
Yakawabitila i wejizwa wakwe, kumbe, yakawagana wagona. Yesu yakawa kumutya Petelo, “Alu hongo si musumile kwikala meso hamonga nane hamba saa monga du bwete?
Ale mwikalaje meso akuno mukulomba ho mulece kwinjila mu wujelwe. Mbeka nhumbula yendile ninga muwili wusoceye.”
Yakabita kanyhi lwe kejete, yakalomba yakutya, “Baba, hono yiwe si yisumice icikombe cicino co wusungu cimhulute ndece kucig'wa, ale, hodu, u wuhile wako witumwe.”
Yakawabitila iwejizwa wakwe, yakawagana kanyhi wagona, hambi i meso gawo nha gali gebatwe na nhongo.
Hodu, yakawa kuwaleka, yakabita kanyhi, kulomba lwe kadatu, yakulonga izinghani zizilya du.
Hanyuma yakawabitila wawalya wejizwa yakawatya, “Wulenyi, alu mukali mugonile du no kuceha? Lanjenyi ta! Alu icipango ceneco langa ho cafika, no Mwana wo Munhu kolavywa kuli i wanhu wanyo wubi.
Holeka alu mwinukaje cibite. Lanjenyi ta, ayulya mono kongaluka yalawila.”

Nayo Yesu lono yali yakali kulonga nawo, hobaho nayo Yuda yakawa kuza u muyagwe na awalya we likumi na wejete. Wakaza wanhu wenji wali hamonga nayo, nawo wali wena, ne mimaje ne zinhumbi, wono watumwa kulawa kuli wakohani wawaha ne wanyamhala we wanhu.
Nayo yuyo mono yasakaga kumugaluka Yesu, yali yakondya kuwapela icitanjilo yakutya, “Yuyo mono nomunonela, ale, yo yuyo, yo mumwibataje.”
Hobaho Yuda yakamusejelela Yesu, yakamutya, “Lamucenyi, Mwijizi!” Hanyuma yakawa kumunonela.
Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Gwe muyangu, witumaje du cono wuzize kwituma.” Baho i wanhu wawalya nawo, wakawa kuza wakawa kumwibata Yesu.
Yumonga na'walya wono wali wali hamonga na Yesu, yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakawusomola mumaje wakwe, yakamutowa u mwitumami wo Mukohani Muwaha, yakamubuha likutu.
Baho Yesu yakamulonjela yakutya, “Leka ta, wugomolaje u mumaje hanhu hayo, hambi muli wose mono yakwitumamila mumaje nha kolofwa nayo na mumaje.
Wulenyi, si mumanyile vyono ndahile kumulomba Baba, nayo kosuma kundetela lwa kamonga, mapuga yikumi na mejete ge wamalayika?
Ninga alu, ho goficilicila nhawule i Mandiko Gono Gelile, gono gakutya, nhavivyo vyo yinojeye yiwe?”

Lo lulo lulo, Yesu yakawa kulilonjela ilipuga lye wanhu wono wazaga ho wamwibate, yakawatya, “Alu mwene ho muza kunyibata akuno mwina ne mimaje ne zinhumbi, kotya ane nha nili muhizi? Alu ane, nha nhondo zose nali kuwezaga hamonga nanye mu Nyumba yo Mulungu nghwijiza, nanye kumbe hamba si mwanyibata!
Ninga azi zose ziwa nhavivi, ho i Mandiko ge wawizi gaficilicile.” Hanyuma iwejizwa wakwe wose wakamuleka wakatiza.
Hobaho, iwanhu wawalya wono wamwibata Yesu, wakamutegula sunga ku kaya ya Kayafa, Mukohani Muwaha, kuko kono wali wekongholeye i wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wanyamhala.
Nayo Petelo yakawa yakumutyatya Yesu yakujendela kutali, sunga vikenjilana mwi'kumbo lyo Mukohani Muwaha, nayo yakenjilana hamonga ne walindilizi, ho yasume kuziwona zose vyono zowa zinha.
Hodu, i Wakohani wawaha ne libalaza lyose, wakalondola wuhomelezi wo wulambi kuli Yesu, ho wamuwulaje,
ninga hamba nha vivyo, si wasuma kuwutuga wuhomelezi wo wose, hamba yiwe wakaza wahomelezi wenji wo wulambi. Ha ndumilizo wakawa kuza wahomelezi wejete,
wono watya, “U munhu ayu, yalonga yakatya, ati, ‘Ane nosuma kuyimwagula i Nyumba yo Mulungu, no kuyizenga kanyhi mu vilo vidatu du.’ ”
Hobaho u Mukohani Muwaha yakema yakamuwuza Yesu yakutya, “Ati 'gwe, si wukupitula hamba nghani hongo? Alu i wanhu wawa wakuhomelela nghanici kuli'gwe?”
Ninga Yesu yakanyamala twii du. Nayo u Mukohani Muwaha yakamutya, “Nghukwilahiza kuli u Mulungu mumi, wucilonjelaje hono yo gwegwe Kilisito u Mwana wo Mulungu!”
Yesu yakamutya, “Nha kulonga gwegwe! Ninga nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono kulawa lulu momuwona u Mwana wo Munhu yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu u Mudaha vyose, yakuziza mu mavunde go wulanga.”
Baho nayo Mukohani Muwaha yakavidemulanga i vivwalo vyakwe akuno yakutya, “Katovula! Alu cina sokoci kanyhi yo kusaka wahomelezi? Nha muhulika nyo weneco i zinhovu zakwe.
Alu anye, mukuwona nhawule?”
Iwene wakapitula wakatya, “Yimunojeye yafwe!”

Hanyuma wakawa kumufunyila mate mu wusu wakwe, kanyhi wakamutowa ne makofi. Na wanji wamutowaga makofi, akuno wakulonga wakutya, “Ale ta wucitambulilaje, agwe nha wuli muwizi, agwe Kilisito, mono yakutowile lu nani?”
Nayo Petelo yali yekaye hadeha mwi'kumbo. Hobaho u mwitumami yunji we cicekulu, yakamubitila, yakamutya, “Agwe nagwe wali wuli hamonga na Yesu wa ku Galilaya.”
Nayo Petelo yakakana ha mwande ya wose yakutya, “Ane si niyimanyile hamba hadodo yono wukuyilonga.”

Nayo Petelo lono yalawilaga ha mulango, u mwitumami yunji kanyhi we cicekulu yakamuwona, nayo yakawalonjela awalya wono wali wali baho, yakawatya, “U munhu ayu nye, yali yali hamonga na Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.”
Nayo Petelo yakakana kanyhi, akuno yakwilahiza, yakutya, “Ane si nimumanyile u munhu yuyu ye!”
Hanyuma kanyhi hadodo iwanhu wono wali wali baho, wakamubitila Petelo, wakamutya, “Ninga mbeka nagwe wuli muyagwe na wawo, ku soko imilonjele yako yikukulajila.”
Ale baho nhondo, Petelo yakanza kwilijita no kwilahiza, yakutya, “Ane si nimumanyile u munhu yuyo ye.” Hobaho nayo inzogolo nhondo yikawa kulila.

Nayo Petelo, hobaho yakazikumbucila izinghani zono yalonjelwa na Yesu yakumutya, “Lono inzogolo yikali nalila, agwe Petelo kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu.” Hobaho yakalawila kunze yakalila muno muno.
Wali weza kwela, hakali mitondo muno muno, i wakohani wawaha wose, hamonga ne wanyamhala we wanhu, wakawumba mahala kuli Yesu ho wamuwulaje.
Wakamuwopa ne manyolo wakamusola, wakamutegula kuli Pilato u muwaha we yisi.
Ale, baho Yuda mono yamugaluka Yesu, yaza kuwona vyono Yesu yakondya kuling'anizwa, hodu, yakanena, yakawagomolela i Wakohani wawaha, zizilya zipesa makumi madatu.
Yakawa kuwalonjela yakutya, “Nye, ane sutya, vyono nimulavizye u munhu mono yasina yisutya, ho yawulagwe.” Ninga iwene wakamutya, “Ale ko kwako, alu ase cina nghanici?”
Nayo Yuda hodu, yakawa kuzigumila zizilya zipesa hasi mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawa kulawila kunze, yakawa kubita kwinyonga.
Nawo i wakohani wawaha, wakazisola zipesa zizilya, wakatya, “Si viswanu yaye ziwikwe mu ciwutwa ce zisawo ze Nyumba yo Mulungu, ku soko vyono pesa za cifo ca Sakami.”
Holeka wakelumbaniza, wakagula mugunda wo muwumbi, ho hawe hanhu ha wuziko we wajenzi.
Holeka ku soko yiyo u mugunda wuwo, wukucemwa, mugunda we sakami.
Izinghani zo muwizi Yelemiya, vyo zaficilicila nhavivyo, zono yatya, “Wakasola i zipesa makumi madatu, i cifo ca ayulya mono i wanji wa mu wana wa Isilayeli wamuwajila.
Nazo wakazigula mugunda wo muwumbi, nha vyono yalajiliza u Muwaha.”
Yesu yakategulwa hali muwaha we yisi. Hodu, u muwaha we yisi nayo, yakawa kumuwuza yakutya, “Alo yo gwegwe go Mutemi we Wayahudi?” Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Nha kulonga gwegwe.”
Ninga i wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne wanyamhala, lono wamusitakaga, u mwene Yesu, hamba si yapitula cinji co cose.
Holeka Pilato yakamuwuza, yakutya, “Alo ho si wukuhulika i masitaka gago gose, gono wakukusitaka?”
Ninga u mwene Yesu si yapitula nghani hamba monga bwete, sunga yuyo u muwaha we yisi yakezina muno muno.
U muwaha we yisi yali yazoweye mwipango lye sikukuu ye Pasaka, kuwawopolela i Wayahudi mufungwa monga mono wamusakaga.
Na mwidaha lilyo, kwali koyuli mufungwa yumonga litagwa lyakwe yali Balaba.
Holeka iwanhu wali weza kwikongholela hamonga, Pilato yakawawuza, yakatya, “Alu mukusaka nimuwopolelenyi wa hayi, muli wawa iwejete, Balaba, hamba Yesu mono kacemwaga Kilisito?”
Nayo yalongaga nhavivyo ku soko na mweneco yali yamanyile vyono wamuleta Yesu kuli mwene ku soko yo wivu wawo du.

Nayo Pilato lono yali yekala mwigoda lyakwe lyo wuling'anizi u mugolece wakwe yakamutegulila nghani, yakutya, “Wayiko, wulecele lukulu kwiyinjiza mu zinghani zo munhu yuyu muswanu, ku soko no muyago, izuwali ngazika muno muno mu ndoto, ku soko yakwe.”
Ninga i wakohani wawaha hamonga ne wanyamhala, wakawalonjela iwanhu, wamusace Balaba yo yawopolelwe, ninga Yesu yawulagwe.
Nayo u muwaha we yisi, yakawawuza yakatya, “Alu wa hayi, muli wawa i wejete, mono mukusaka nimuwopolele?” Nawo wakatya “Balaba.”
Nayo Pilato yakawatya, “Alu ho nimunoze nhawule Yesu mono kacemwaga Kilisito?” Wose wakatya, “Yatumbikwe mu musalaba!”
Pilato yakawawuza yakutya, “Ku sokoci?” Alo cono yasutizye ci cici? Ninga iwene ho wakacila kuzoza muno muno, wakutya, “Yatumbikwe mu Musalaba!”

Hodu nayo Pilato yaza kumanya vyono si kosuma cinji, na vyono mazozo gali geza kwanza, hodu u mwene yakasola malenga, yakezuguza miwoko yakwe hali wanhu wose akuno yakutya, “Ane ta, sina nghani yo yose kuli ze lifwa lyo munhu yuyu, yo nghani yenyu nyenye nyo weneco.”
Nawo iwanhu wose wakatya, “Isakami yakwe yiweze muli sese, hamonga ne wana wetu!”
Hodu, Pilato yakawa kuwawopolela Balaba, kulawa mu jela, ninga yakawa kumulavya Yesu ho yatumbikwe mu musalaba.
Hanyuma iwasilikale wo muwaha we yisi, wakamwinjiza Yesu mwi'kulu, wakamwikongholela ciwumbi cose.
Baho wakamuwopola i vivwalo vyakwe, wakamuvwika musweko we liwala lyo lugandu,
wakatawa cipombelo ce mamivya, wakamuvwika mu mutwe, wakamwibatiza ne lidete mu muwoko wakwe wo kulume. Wakafugama ha mwande yakwe, akuno wakumuzwajiza wakutya, “Lamucenyi go Mutemi we Wayahudi!”
Wakamufunyila mate, wakalisola lidete lililya, wakamutowela mu mutwe wakwe.
Wali weza kukondya kumuzwajiza, hodu wakawa kumuwopola wuwulya musweko, wakamuvwika kanyhi myenda yakwe, wakawa kumutegula wakamutumbice mu musalaba.
Nawo lono wabitaga wakamwagana munhu yunji mono yakucemwa Simoni munya ku Kilene, wakamudindimiza yuyo ho yawudinghule u musalaba wa Yesu.
Nawo wali weza kufika i hanhu hono hakucemwa Goligota, nhunizo yayo, “Ihanhu he cipala co mutwe.”
Wakamupela Yesu divayi yono yihangahanjile ne hungwi ho yang'we. Ninga mwene Yesu yaza yijeza du, yakalema kuying'wa.
Wakamutumbika mu musalaba, hanyuma wakagawana myenda yakwe, mu nzila yo kuyitowela kula.
Wakekala baho akuno wakumudima.
Na hacanyha yo mutwe wakwe, wakawika u wusitakwe wakwe wono wali wandicigwe nhavi, “Ayu yo Yesu u Mutemi we Wayahudi.”
Ne wahizi wejete, nawo wakatumbikanwa hamonga nayo, yumonga ku lubavu lwakwe lo kulume, no muyagwe kulubavu lwakwe lo kucekulu.
Ne wanhu wono wapulutaga baho, wakawa wakuzugunza i mitwe yawo, akuno wakutya,

“Alu 'gwe! Si watezaga vyono kosuma kuyimwagula i Nyumba yo Mulungu, no kuyizenga kanyhi mu vilo vidatu du? Ale ta, luno wiponyaje go mweneco. Hono agwe wuli Mwana wo Mulungu, ale wutime mu musalaba!”
Nha vivilya sunga i Wakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, ne wanyamhala, wose wakamuzwajiza wakutya.
“He! Yawaponyaga wanji ninga alu kuwiponya mweneco, hamba si yakusuma yaye! Ati u mwene yo mutemi we Wayahudi! Heya, yatime le, mu musalaba, nase ho cimwihuwile.
Yali yamwitumbiye u Mulungu, akuno yakutya, ati u mwene yo Mwana wo Mulungu, ale ta, u Mulungu yamuponyaje, hono yawe yendezwe nayo.”
Sunga na awalya wono wali watumbikanwe hamonga nayo, wakamuliganga.
Na mu wulawa mu saa sita mu misi, sunga mu saa tisa, yisi yose yikawa mu wutitu.
Na mu saa tisa, Yesu yakalila ne lizi yiwaha, yakatya, “Eli, Eli, lamasabakatani?” Inhunizo yayo, wo wutya, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, so cici wukundeka?”
Ninga wawalya wono wali wemile behi na baho, waza kuzihulika zizo, wakatya, “Nye, yakumucema Eliya.”
Yunji muyawo yakamangha, yakasola sifongo, yakalizabika mu siki, yakalisomeceza mwidete, yakamupela ho yang'we.
Iwanji wakatya, “Ta mulece ciwone hono Eliya kokuza yamuponye.”
Baho, Yesu yakalila kanyhi kwe lizi yiwaha muno muno, na hobaho hodu yakawa kufwa.
Hobaho du nalyo i libupa lyo mwenda lya mu Nyumba yo Mulungu likawa kudemuka hejete, kuwulawilila kucanyha sunga ko kusika yayo, ne yisi yikacicima, ne mabwe gakatulika,
ne vitenjelo vikagubuka, sunga ne wanhu wenji wo Mulungu wono wali wafwiza, wakazukulwa,
nawo lono wali wazuka, wakalawila mu vitenjelo, wakenjila mwi'kaya lyono lyelile, wakejela kuli wanhu wenji.

Hodu, yuyulya u muwaha we wasilikale igana, sunga na wawalya wono wamudimaga Yesu, wali weza kuwona u wucicime we yisi, sunga na zose zono zejela, Oo! Wakogopa muno muno, wakatya, “Mbeka u munhu ayu, yali Mwana wo Mulungu.”
Na baho hali howali wacekulu wenji wono walanjililaga, akuno wemile kutali. Wawo wo wawalya wono wamutyatya Yesu ku wulawilila ku Galilaya, akuno wakumwitumamila.
Na muli wawo, mwali moyuli na Malyamu Magadalena, na Malyamu u nyina wa Yakobo na Yusufu hamonga no nyina we wana wa Zebedayo.
Yaza kuwa cinyamihe, yakaza munhu yunji mugoli, munya Alimataya, ilitagwa lyakwe, Yusufu. Nayo yali nhavivilya mwijizwa wa Yesu.
Yuyo, yakamubitila Pilato, yakalomba yapegwe u muwili wa Yesu. Nayo Pilato yakalajiliza, wamupele.
Nayo Yusufu, yakawusola u muwili wuwulya, yakawupalinjiza mu sanda swanu ye bafuta,
yakawuwika mu citenjelo cakwe i cipya, cono yali yacitulile mwi'talawe. Hanyuma, yakabidusiza libwe yiwaha, ha mulango we citenjelo, hodu yakawa kubita.
Malyamu Magadalena na ayulya Malyamu yunji, wali wekaye baho vidomile ne citenjelo.
Imitondo yaco, nha cinji ilizuwa lyono lyali vityatyizye ne lizuwa lyo Wiwikanize, i wakohani wawaha, hamonga ne Wafalisayo, wamubitila Pilato,
wakamutya, “Gwe muwaha, cikumbuciye vyono ayulya u mukonji yalonga lono yakali mumi vyono ati, ‘Vilaza kupuluta vilo vidatu, nozuka kanyhi.’

Holeka wulajilize i citenjelo cidimwe muno, sunga mwizuwa lye kadatu, iwejizwa wakwe walece kumuhiza, na hanyuma wawe kuwalonjela wanhu, nha vyono kazuka. No wulambi wuwuno we ndumilizo, nhondo wowa wubi muno muno si nha awulya u wulongozi.”
Nayo Pilato yakawatya, “Ale, nha mwina nawo i walindilizi, holeka mubite mukacilindilize, munghango nha vyono mumanyile.”
Nawo wakabita, wakacilindiliza citenjelo, wakaliwicila ilibwe lya ha mulango citanjilo, wakamuwika no musilikale u mulindilizi.
Ilizuwa lye Sabato lyaza kupuluta, na lono lizuwa lyali behi no kusosomoka mwizuwa lye Jumapili, Malyamu Magadalena hamonga na Malyamu ayulya yunji, wakabita ku cilanga citenjelo.
No wucicime we yisi wukaza kwa nhinicizo muno, na Malayika wo Muwaha yakatima ku wulawa ku wulanga, yakaliwusa i libwe lililya, nayo yakalikalila mucanyha yayo.
No wulangwe wakwe, yejelaga yenha limuli, ne vivwalo vyakwe, vyali vizelu swee, kotya seluji.
Ne walindilizi we citenjelo wakacicima muno so woga wuwaha, wakawa kotya nha wafwiye.
Ninga Malayika yuyulya yakawatya i wacekulu wawalya, “Anye, mulece kogopa! Ane manyile vyono anye mukumulondola Yesu, mono yatumbikwa mu musalaba.
Ninga alu, yali hasina ahano, hambi nha kazuka nha vyono yalonga mweneco. Ale, muze muhawone ihanhu hono wali wamuwicile.
Holeka alu, mubite mbela mbela, mukawalonjele iwejizwa wakwe, vyono yazuka muli wafu, sunga na lulu, komulongolelenyi ku Galilaya, na kuko ko momuwonela. Ale, ane nakondya kumulonjelenyi.”
I wacekulu wawo, nawo akuno wena no woga, hamonga ne nyemo mbaha, wakawuka mbela mbela ha citenjelo, wakamangha, wakabita wakawalonjela i wejizwa wakwe.
Lulo du baho Yesu yakawa kwitang'anila nawo. Nayo yakawalamusa, yakawatya, “Lamucenyi.” Nawo i wacekulu wawo, wakamubitila, wakafugama hali mwene, wakayibata imigulu yakwe.
Nayo Yesu yakawalonjela yakawatya, “Ale, mulece kogopa! Ninga aluno mubite mukawalonjele wandugu zangu, vyono wabite ku Galilaya, nawo ko wombonela kuko.”
Iwacekulu wawalya nawo lono wabitaga, i walindilizi we citenjelo wanji nawo, wakabita kwi'kaya, wakawaloloseza i wakohani wawaha, muli zose zono zijeye.
Wakawa kwikonghola hamonga ne wanyamhala, wakelumbaniza wakawa kuwapela wawalya wasilikale mapesa menji muno muno,
akuno wakuwatya, “Anye nhondo mutye nhavi, ‘Iwejizwa wakwe waza ne cilo ase lono cali cigonile, wawa kumuhiza.’
Na hono u muwaha we yisi yayimanye inghani yiyi, ase colongana nayo du, sunga cimanye vyono anye si motuga wugazwe.”
Nawo i walindilizi wawo wakazibocela i zipesa zizilya, wakanoza nha vyono wafundwa. Ne nghani yiyo, yikatandala kuli Wayahudi sunga nalu.
Nawo wa walya iwejizwa we likumi na monga, wakabita ku Galilaya sunga ko kwi'tunda lililya lyono Yesu yawalajiliza.
Nawo waza kumuwona, wakamuhemba, hamba yiwe wanji muli wene, wali wena mahwele.
Nayo Yesu yakaza sunga behi nawo, yakawatya, “Ane mhegwa u wulajilize wose, wa ku wulanga, sunga na wa kono'nze.
Holeka, alu, mubite, mukawanoze i wanhu we makungugo gose, wawe watyatyi wangu, muwabaputizizaje mwitagwa lyo Sogo yo Munhu na lyo Mwana, na lyo Muhe Mono Yelile.
Kanyhi, muwejizaje, webate i malajilizo gose gono namupelenyi. Nane nili hamonga nanye vilo vyose, heya, sunga ko ku ndumilizo ye vilo.”
Alu lo Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Yesu Kilisito u mwana wo Mulungu.
Lukanzwa nha vyono lwandikwa mu citabu co muwizi Isaya: “Langa ta, nghumutuma mutumwa wangu yakulongolele; Mono kokunozelezeza i nzila yako.
I lizi lyo munhu lihulikwa ku nyika: Nozelezenyi i nzila yo Muwaha. Gololenyi wukolo wakwe.”
Yohana u Mubaputizi yejela ku nyika, yakuganula vyono yinojeye wanhu wanene no kubaputizwa, u Mulungu ho yawanenele u wubi wawo.
I wanhu kulawa mbavu zose za Yudiya, na wanya Yelusalemi wose wakamuziza Yohana, wakavumila wubi wawo, nayo yakawabaputiziza mwi'kolongo lya Yoludani.
Yohana, yali yavwalile civwalo cono cali cihonwe ko wusinga we ngamiya, no musipi we nyhingo mu ciwino cakwe. Ne ndigwa yakwe, yali nzije no wuci wa mu mbago.
Nayo yakaganula yakutya, “U Munhu yunji mono yena vilungo yanyhizize nene, yakuza mu nyuma yangu; nane si nghwiliye hamba kwinama, no kuwopola i mikowa ye malatu gakwe.
Ane nghumubaputizenyi ne malenga, ninga mwene kolomubaputizenyi mu Muhe Mono Yelile.”
Mu vilo vivyo, Yesu yakaza yakulawa ku Nazaleti, kwi 'kaya lya Galilaya, nayo yakabaputizwa na Yohana mwi'kolongo lya Yoludani.
Lo lulolulo Yesu yaza kulawila mu malenga, yakawona wulanga wudiguce, no Muhe yakumutimila mucanyha yakwe yenha nziwa.
Ne lizi likahulikwa kulawa ku wulanga likutya, “Agwe yo gwegwe mwanangu mwendece; mono nyendezwe nagwe.”
Lo lulolulo yakategulwa no Muhe ku nyika,
yakekala kuko vilo makumi mane yakujelwa na Setani. Yakawa kuko hamonga ne malimu ga mu mbago, nawo Wamalayika wakawa wakumwitumamila.
Nayo Yohana yaza kuwa yadindilwa mu jela, Yesu yakabita ku Galilaya, yakaganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, yakutya,
“Icidaha cakwila, no wutemi wo Mulungu wasejelela. Nenenyi no kulwihuwila u Luganuzi Luswanu!”
Na lono yakolaga ha nhumbi ye lilamba lya Galilaya, yakawawona wanimula zisomba wejete, Simoni no muwahawe Andeleya, wakunimula zisomba no lwavu.
Yesu yakawatya, “Munhyatyaje, nane nomunozenyi muwe wanimula wanhu.”
Lo lulolulo wakazileka zinyavu zawo, wakamutyatya.
Nayo yali yeza kutela hamwande hadodo, yakawawona wa Yakobo no mwanakwawe Yohana iwana wa Zebedayo. Nawo nha vivyo wali wali mu ngalawa yawo wakuzinozeleza zinyavu zawo.
Lo lulolulo Yesu yakawacema, nawo wakamuleka u Sogo yawo Zebedayo mu ngalawa, hamonga ne wetumami, wakamutyatya.
Wakafika mwikaya lya Kapelanawumi, na mwizuwa lye Sabato, Yesu yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, yakanza kwijiza.
Ne wanhu wose wono wamuhulika, wakezina i mejizo gakwe, hambi nha siyejizaga nha vyono wejizaga iwejizi wawo wo Wulajilize, langa yejizaga nha munhu mono yena wulajilize.
Lo lulolulo munhu yunji we licisi lyavu, yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo,
yakazoza, yakutya, “Alu wina nghanici nase, agwe Yesu wa Nazaleti? Alo kuza ho wucongomeze? Nghumanyile vyono wuli nani, yo gwegwe mono welile wo Mulungu!”
Yesu yakalitacila ilicisi lyavu yakutya, “Nyamala! Wulawile muli munhu yuyu.”
Ale, lilyo licisi lyavu, likamuzuganga munhu yuyo, likazoza muno, likawa kulawila.
I wanhu wose wakezina, wakewuza wakutya, “Alo cici co cici? Ma, go mejizo mapya lo? U Munhu ayu, yena wulajilize wo kugalajiliza i macisi mavu, sunga nago gakumuhulika!”
I zinghani za Yesu zikatandala mbela mbela hanhu hose, mu yisi ya Galilaya.
Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe, hamonga na Yakobo na Yohana, wakawuka mu nghang'anilo yo wuhembelo, wakabita ku kaya ya Simoni na Andeleya.
Ale, u mukwewe we cicekulu wa Simoni, yali yagonile mu citanda yena mhungo. Nayo Yesu yali yeza kufika, wakamulonjela kamonga muli zo wutamwa wo mudala yuyo.
Yesu yakamubitila mudala yuyo, yakamwibata muwoko, yakamwinula. Ne mhungo yiyo yikamuleka, nayo yakanza kuwetumamila.
Icinyamihe, lono lizuwa lyali lyagwililicila, i wanhu wakamuletela Yesu iwatamwa wose, ne wanhu wono wali wena macisi mavu.
I wanhu wose we likaya lilyo wakekongholela ha mwande yo mulango.
Nayo Yesu yakawaponya wanhu wenji wono wali wena wutamwa we hayo hayo, yakagalavya macisi menji, ninga siyagakombola galonje cinji, hambi nha gali gamumanyile vyono mwene yo nani.
I mitondo yaco lono kwali kukali nadandawuka, Yesu yakenuka yakabita kulomba i hanhu ha cilejeho hono hasina wanhu.
Nawo wa Simoni ne wayagwe wakabita kumulondola.
Nawo waza kumuwona wakamutya, “I wanhu wose wakukulondola gwegwe.”
Yesu yakawatya, “Alenyi cibite ku vikaya vinji vye behi behi, ho nghaganule nako kuko, hambi nha ku soko yiyo, holeka naza.”
Ale, yakapilima hanhu hose mu Galilaya, yakuganula mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo no kulavya macisi.
U munhu yunji wo wukoma yakamubitila Yesu, yakamufugamila, yakamulomba yakutya, “Hono wende, kosuma kunghwema!”
Yesu yakamuwonela lusungu, yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakamupamiza yakamutya, “Nyendile, wukwemwe!”
Lo lulolulo wukoma wukamuleka munhu yuyo, yakawa mutelevu.
Yesu yakamutya yabite mbela mbela akuno yakumukong'onheza yakutya,

“Wulece kumulonjela munhu wo wose ze nghani yiyi, langa wubite wukelajile kuli mukohani, na kolo wakondya kuhomelela vyono wapona, ale, wulavye i cilavywa nha vyono yalajiliza Musa, ho yiwe wuhomelezi kuli mwene so wupone wako.”

Ninga munhu yuyo yakabita yakanza kuyitandaza inghani yiyo hanhu hose, no kulonga nghani nyinji, sunga na Yesu si yasuma kwinjila mwikaya lyo lyose ciwonelela. Ne nghani yiyo yikamunoza yekale kunze ihanhu ha cilejeho hono hasina wanhu. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wakamubitila iwanhu wakulawa mbavu zose.
Vyaza kupuluta vilo vicefu, Yesu yakawuya ku Kapelanawumi, iwanhu wakahulika vyono yali ha kaya.
Ale, wakaza wanhu wenji muno, wakamema, sunga na ha mulango hakawa hasina hamba cilejeho. Nayo Yesu yakawaganulila inghani yakwe,
no munhu yunji mono yali yadejepe, yakaletwa kuli mwene yadinghuywe na wanhu wane.

Ku soko yo winji we wanhu, siwasuma kumutegula behi na Yesu. Holeka wakapula mwi'tembe hono hali hoyali Yesu. Wali waza kondya kutuga hanhu ho kumukozeza, wakamutimya munhu yuyo mono yali yagonile mu citanda.
Yesu yaza kuwuwona uwihuwilo wawo, yakamutya munhu yuyo mono yadejepe, “Go mwanangu kunenelwa wubi wako.”
Iwejizwa wanji wo Wulajilize wono wali wekaye baho, wakehwesa mu zinhumbula zawo wakutya,
“Yadahile nhawule kulonga nha vivyo? Ayu yakumutovula Mulungu! Vyono hasina munhu mono kosuma kunenela wubi, langa u Mulungu mweneco du, yo yasumile kunenela wubi.”
Ninga Yesu yakagamanya kamonga i mahweso gawo, yakawatya, “Alu socici mukwihwesa nhavivyo mu zinhumbula zenyu?
Alu yahayi imhelu muno, yo kumutya u munhu yuyu mono yadejepe, kunenelwa wubi wako, hamba yo kumutya, ‘Winuce, witwice citanda cako wubite?’
Ale, nghusaka mumanye vyono, u Mwana wo Munhu, yena wulajilize wo kunenela wubi we wanhu kono'nze.” Baho yakamutya u munhu yuyo mono yadejepe,
“Nghukulonjela, winuce, witwice citanda cako, wubite ku kaya!”
Ne wanhu wose lono wali wakali wamulanjile, u munhu yuyo yakenuka lwa kamonga yaketwika i citanda cakwe, yakawa kubita.
Yesu yakabita kanyhi ku nhumbi ye lilamba. Lipuga lye wanhu likamuziza, nayo yakanza kuwejiza.
Nayo Yesu lono yapulutaga, yakamuwona Lawi mwana wa Alifayo, yekaye ha hofisi yo kutowezeza kodi. Yesu yakamutya, “Wunhyatyaje!” Lawi yakenuka, yakamutyatya.

Hanyuma, lono Yesu yali yekaye ha meza yakulya zindigwa mu kaya ya Lawi. I watoweza kodi wenji hamonga ne wanyo wubi wali wamutyatizye Yesu, sunga na wenji wa muli wene, wali wekalane hamonga nayo, hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe ha meza ye zindigwa.

Ale, iwejizi wacefu wo Wulajilize wono wali Wafalisayo, waza kumuwona Yesu yakulya zindigwa hamonga ne wanhu wabi ne watoweza kodi, wakawawuza iwejizwa wakwe, wakutya, “Alu socici yakulya zindigwa hamonga ne watoweza kodi ne wanhu wabi?”
Yesu yaza kuwahulika, yakawatya, “Wono si watamigwe, siwasakaga muganga, langa wawalya du wono watamigwe. Sinizize niwaceme wono wali ling'ani, langa i wanyo wubi.”
