Nayo Yesu yaza kuzuka mwizuwa lye Jumapili hakali mitondo muno, yakamula kwilajila kuli Malyamu Magadalena, mono Yesu yamulavya macisi mupunghati.
Nayo Malyamu Magadalena yakabita, yakawalonjela wawalya wono wali wali hamonga na Yesu, na mwipango lilyo, wene walilaga no kukalala.
Ninga waza kuhulika vyono Yesu nha mumi, na vyono Malyamu Magadalena kamuwona, hamba siwehuwila yaye.
Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakejela kuli wejizwa wejete yena futa yinji. Iwejizwa wawo wabitaga ku mugunda.
Nawo wakabita wakawalonjela iwayawo. Nawo nhavivyo hamba siwehuwila yaye.

Na ku ndumilizo, Yesu yakejela kuli wejizwa we likumi na monga, lono walizanaga ha meza. Nayo yakawatacila muno so wuleka kwihuwila kwawo, no wukamu we zinhumbula zawo, hambi nha siwawehuwila wawalya wono wamuwona lono yali yazuka.
Yesu yakawatya, “Bitenyi ku yinze yose, mukaluganule u Luganuzi Luswanu kuli wanhu wose.
Na yuyo mono kokwihuwila no kubaputizwa yo koponywa. Na yuyo mono si kokwihuwila yo kololing'anizwa.
Ne vitanjilo vivi, vyowezana hamonga na wawo wono wehuwiye: mwi'tagwa lyangu mo wolavizya macisi, wolonga milonjele mipya.
Na hono webate nzoka, hamba kung'wa cinji co cose cono cina sumu, sicowatamisa yaye.” Kanyhi wowawicila miwoko yawo i watamwa, nawo watamwa wopona.
U Muwaha Yesu yaza kondya kulongana nawo, yakabocelwa ku wulanga, yakekala ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu.
Nawo iwejizwa wakabita wakawa wakuganula hanhu hose. Nayo u Muwaha yaketuma mulimo hamonga nawo, no kuyifisiliza inghani yiyo, kwe vitanjilo vyono vyawezanaga hamonga nawo.]
Go we Lilumbo Teyofilo: Vyono wenji wakasaka muno kwandika, zinghani azilya zono zetumwa muli'se!
Wakandika nha vyono calonjelwa na awalya wono wewonelela weneco kulawa mwamulizo, no kulwanza Luganuzi lulo.
Nane lono nakondya kuzilangalanga kulawa mwamulizo, mbona viswanu nghwandicile nha vyono zinha go we Lilumbo Teyofilo,
ho wusume kumanya imbeka ye zinghani zono wejizwa.
Mu vilo vyono Helode yali mutemi wa Yudiya, kwali na mukohani mono yacemwaga Zekaliya, mono wali wali hamonga mu witumami na Abiya, Mugolece wakwe yacemwaga Elizabeti, muyagwe ne wana wa Haluni.
Wose vyono wejete, wali wali ling'ani hali Mulungu, wali webate myoto ne malajilizo gose go Mulungu.
Ninga wali wasina mwana, vyono Elizabeti yali mugumba, nawo wene Zekaliya na Elizabeti, wose wali wakombipa muno.
Mwizuwa linji, lono Zekaliya yetumaga mulimo wakwe wo Wukohani mu Nyumba yo Mulungu,
mu wilecele wo witumami, vyono wo moto wo Wukohani, lwali lwakwe kwinjila hanhu hono helile no kufusa wuvumba.
Lipuga lye wanhu walombaga hadeha mwi'pango lyo kufusiza.
Malayika wo Muwaha Mulungu yakamulawila, yemile ku lubavu lo kulume lwe cikumbicilo co kufusiza.
Zekaliya yali yeza kumuwona, yakagazika mu nhumbula, no woga wukamwibata.
Ninga malayika yakamutya, “Zekaliya, wulece kogopa, hambi wulombe wako nha wuhulikwa, no mugolece wako Elizabeti kokulelela mwana wa cilume, nagwe komucemela litagwa lyakwe Yohana.
Nagwe kowa na nyemo no wusangalale, na wenji wolowusangalalila wulelwe wakwe.
Kowa muwaha hali Muwaha Mulungu, si kolowa kung'wa divayi hamba cing'wegwa co wugale,
nayo komemywa Muhe Mono Yelile ku wulawa mu'nda yo nyina.

Kolowapitula wenji wa muli wana wa Isilayeli wamupitucile Muwaha Mulungu wawo. Nayo komulongolela Muwaha yakutongwa mu vilungo na mu Muhe kotya Eliya, no kuwalamula wasogo zo munhu ne wana wawo. Kowanoza we cibede, wawe mu mahala ge we ling'ani, kumuwikaniziza u Muwaha wanhu wakwe.”
Zekaliya yakamutya yuyo Malayika, “Noyimanya nhawule nghani yiyo? Hambi ne nha neza mukombi, no mugolece wangu nayo yawa mukombi.”
Malayika yakamupitula yakatya, “Ane nili Gabuliyeli, mono nyimaga hali Mulungu, nane nhumwa ho nongane nagwe, nghuletele Luganuzi lulu Luswanu.
Alu hulicize, vyono si wihuwiye zinghani zangu, alu kowa cibwibwi, nagwe si kosuma kulonga, sunga zizi zono nghulonjeye kolo zakondya kufisilizwa.”
Na mwi'pango lilyo wanhu wali wamulindiye Zekaliya, akuno wakwizina so wucele wakwe mu Nyumba yo Mulungu.
Nayo yaza kulawila, si yasuma kulongana nawo, ninga yakawa kuwanozeza vitanjilo ne mawoko gakwe, yakekala cibwibwi.
Lidaha lyo witumami wakwe lyaza malika, yakawuya ku kaya yakwe.
Ne vilo vyaza puluta, Elizabeti u mugolece wakwe yakawa yatuga 'nda.
Yakehundiciza myezi mihano, yakutya, “Alu Muwaha Mulungu kanhendela nhavivi, kambusiza lilema lyangu hali wanhu.”
Mu mwezi wo mutandatu, malayika Gabuliyeli yatumwa no Mulungu, yabite kwi'tumbi lyono likucemwa Nazaleti ya ku Galilaya.
Ko muhinza mono yacemwaga Malyamu, mono yali mubanywe na Yusufu we mhuga ya Dawudi.
Malayika yakenjila mu nyumba yakwe, yakamutya, “Lamucenyi Malyamu mono wuli mulugutwe! U Muwaha nha yali hamonga nagwe.”
Malyamu yaza kuzihulika zinghani zizo, yakehwelela muno, yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe, alu izinghani zizi zina nhunizoci?
Malayika yakamutya, “Wulece kogopa Malyamu; hambi Mulungu nha kakupela lihewa.
Lanje, kotuga 'nda, kolela mwana wa cilume, na komupela litagwa Yesu.
Mwene kowa Muwaha, nayo kocemwa mwana wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye, no Muwaha Mulungu, komupela ligoda lyo sogwe Dawudi;
nayo kotema mhuga ya Yakobo cibitilila, no wutemi wakwe si wulawa na ndumo.”
Malyamu yakamutya Malayika, “Yosumika wule nghani yiyi, ane nha si manyile mulume?”
Malayika yakapitula yakamutya, “U Muhe mono yelile kokuziza, ne vilungo vyo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye vyokusiciliza. Holeka mwana mono kolela, kocemwa Yelile, Mwana wo Mulungu.
Na langa ta, nduguyo Elizabeti nayo mu wukombi wakwe, yena 'nda na mwezi awu wo wo mutandatu, munhu mono wanhu watezaga mugumba.
Hambi nha hasina yono si yisumikaga hali Mulungu.”
Malyamu yakatya, “Langa ta, ane nili mwitumami wo Muwaha ziwe muli'ne nha vyono wulonjile.” Nayo Malayika yakawa kutuluka.
Vyaza kupuluta vilo vicefu, Malyamu yakenuka musunho, yakabita ku kaya yinji yono yili mu matunda ga Yudiya.
Yakenjila mu kaya ya Zekaliya, yakamulamusa Elizabeti.
Kukawa Elizabeti yali yeza kuhulika du wulamuse wa Malyamu, mwana yakedawala na nyemo mu'nda yakwe. Nayo Elizabeti yakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile,
yakenula lizi lyakwe, yakatya, “Wuli Mulugutwe muli wacekulu wose, na yuyo mono kolelwa nagwe, nayo Mulugutwe.
Alu ne nili nani sunga nyina yo Muwaha wangu yanyizize?
Nghukulonjela vyono, neza hulika du lizi lyo wulamuse wako, u mwana kawa kwidawala na nyemo mu'nda yangu.
Wuli mumoti 'gwe mono wihuwiye, vyono zofisilizwa zono Muwaha yakulonjeye.”
Nayo Malyamu yakatya, “Inhumbula yangu yikumukumya Muwaha,
No muhe wangu wumusangalaliye Mulungu Muponyi wangu.
Hambi nha kawulanga wuciwa wo mwitumami wakwe! Hambi langa ta, vyono kulawa zuwali, iwanhu wose nha wonyitya nili mumoti.
Hambi Mulungu mono yali vilungo nha kanhendela mawaha Ne litagwa lyakwe lyelile.
No lusungu lwakwe luli kuli wanhu wose wono wamogopaga.
Kawugolola u muwoko wakwe we vilungo Kaweyagaza wasisi mu mahweso ge zinhumbula zawo.
Kawagwisa watemi mu magoda gawo Yakawenula waciwa.
Wono wena nzala, kawegutya ne vinhu viswanu, Ne wagoli, kawawinga wali bwete.
Kamutaza Isilayeli mwitumami wakwe Ho yakumbucile lusungu lwakwe.
Vyono yawalonjela walezi wetu, Kuli Abulahamu no lulelo lwakwe sunga ku cibitilila.”
Malyamu yakekalana na Elizabeti myezi midatu, hanyuma yakawa kuwuya kwawo.
Vilo vya Elizabeti vyo kusawila vikafika, yakasawa mwana wa cilume.
I wayagwe ne wanduguze waza kuhulika vyono Muwaha kamupela kwa winji lihewa lyakwe, wakasangalalana nayo.
Kukawa mwi'zuwa lyo munana, ho wakaza wakamutegula mwana, ku calamo, wahilaga kumupela litagwa lyo sogwe Zekaliya.
Ninga u nyina yakatya, “Ng'o, langa kocemwa Yohana.”
Wakamutya, “Mu wanduguzo nha musina yunji mono kacemwaga litagwa lilyo?”
Wakamusonhelela sogwe, ho yalonje i litagwa lyono yakusaka u mwanagwe yacemelwe.
Nayo yakasaka cibawo, yakandika, yakutya, “Itagwa lyakwe Yohana.” Wose wakezina.
Ho baho no mulomo wakwe wukadiguka, no lulimi lwakwe lukahogoha, yakalonga yakumulumba Mulungu.
Woga wukawebata wose wono wali wekaye behi nawo, na zizo zose zikahulikwa kose mu matunda ga Yudiya.
Na wose wono wazihulika, wakaziwika mu zi nhumbula zawo wakutya, “Alo kowa yenha wule mwana yuyu.” Hambi i vilungo vyo Muwaha nha vili hamonga nayo.
No sogwe Zekaliya yakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile, yakalonga nghani yo Mulungu yakutya,
“Yalumbwe Muwaha Mulungu wa Isilayeli. Hambi nha kawaziza, kawanozeza wukombozwe wanhu wakwe.
Kacipela Mukombozi we vilungo mu mhuga ya Dawudi u mwitumami wakwe.
Nha vyono yehuwiza katali, mu milomo ye wawizi wakwe wono welile,
nha vyono kocikomboza wulawa mu walugu wetu, na mu miwoko ya wose wono wacisulile.
Yakatya, kowawonela lusungu walezi wetu. No kukumbucila cilagane cakwe cono celile.
Wilahe wono yamwilahila Abulahamu u kuku yetu nha vyono kocipela sese,
ho cikombozwe ku wulawa mu miwoko ye walugu wetu, ho cimwitumamile cisina woga.
Celile na cili ling'ani hali mwene, vilo vyetu vyose vyo wikale wetu.
Nagwe, mwanangu, kocemwa muwizi wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye muli vyose, hambi nha kolongola ha mwande yo Muwaha wumunozelezeze nzila yakwe.
Ho wuwamanyize wanhu wakwe vyono woponywa so wunenelwe wo wubi wawo.
U Mulungu wetu mupolo, kanyhi yali lusungu. Koleta wuzelu wo wukombozwe, wucizize ku wulawa ku wulanga,
no kuwamulicila wono wekaye mu citi ce lifwa. No kuyitonga migulu yetu mu nzila yo mulamu.”
U mwana yakawiluka, yakonjelezeka vilungo mu nhumbula, yakekala mu nyika, sunga mwizuwa lyo wilajile wakwe kuli wanhu wa Isilayeli.
Mu vilo vivyo lono Yohana yali yalelwa, Kayisali Awugusito, yakalajiliza vyono wanhu wose wono wali hasi yo wutemi wakwe wandikwe.
Lulo lo lwandiko lulongozi lono lwandikwa lono Kuleniyo yali yatemile Suliya.
Wose wakabita kwandikwa, munhu na kaya yakwe.
Yusufu nayo yakatuluka kulawa Nazaleti ya Galilaya, yakabita ku Betelehemu mu yisi ya Yudiya kono yalelelwa u mutemi Dawudi. Vyono mwene nayo yali we mhuga ya Dawudi,
ho yandikwe hamonga na Malyamu, mono yali mubanywe nayo, lono yali yakataye ne'nda.
Kukawa lono wali wali kuko, likawa kufika lizuwa lyakwe lyo kulelela.
Yakasawa u mwanagwe we cilume mwana mulongozi, yakamuvwika myenda yo wugalika, yakamuwika mu ciya co wulilo we mitugo, vyono siwatuga cilejeho mu nyumba ye wajenzi.
Ku lubavu lulo, kwali kowali wadimi wono walindilizaga mitugo yawo ne cilo.
Hobaho Malayika wo Muwaha yakawalawila, u lukumyo lo Muwaha lukawang'alalila, wakenjilwa na woga.
Malayika yakawatya, “Mulece kogopa, ane nghumuletelenyi Luganuzi Luswanu lwe nyemo mbaha kuli wanhu wose,
hambi izuwalili nha mulelelwa Muponyi ku soko yenyu, mu kaya ya Dawudi, yo Kilisito u Muwaha.
Aci co citanjilo kuli'nye, Momwagana mugalika yavwicigwe myenda yo wugalika, yagonile mu ciya co wulilo we mitugo.”
Lo lulo baho kukawa na Wamalayika wenji kulawa ku wulanga, wakelunza na yuyo Malayika, wakamukumya Mulungu wakutya,
“Lukumyo kuli Mulungu kucanyha, na kono'nze mulamu kuli wanhu wono wakumunojeza.”
Kukawa Wamalayika waza kuwuya ku wulanga, wadimi wawo wakeyitya, cibite le sunga ko ku Betelehemu, cikalanje nghani yiyi yono yiweye, vyono yacimanyize Muwaha.
Wakabita lumangho, wakawagana wa Malyamu na Yusufu, no mugalika yagonile mu ciya co wulilo we mitugo.
Nawo waza kumuwona u mwana yuyo, wakayanzalika nghani yono walonjelwa yo mwana yuyo.
Na wose wono wahulika wakezina zizo zono walonjelwa ne wadimi.
Ninga Malyamu yakazikamisa zinghani zizi zose, yakazihwesa mu nhumbula yakwe.
Wadimi wawo wakawuya, wakawa kumukumya no kumulumbo Mulungu, so zose zono wazihulika na zono waziwona, nha vyono walonjelwa.
Vyaza kupuluta vilo munana vyo kumutegula mwana ku calamo, yakacemwa litagwa lyakwe, YESU, lililya lyono yacemelwa na Malayika lono yali yakali nategulwa 'nda.
Vyaza kuficila vilo vyo wezwe wawo, ko wulajilize wa Musa, wa Yusufu na Malyamu wakamusola mwana, wakabita nayo ku Yelusalemi, wamuwice hali Muwaha.
Mu Wulajilize wa Musa yandikwe “Mwana wo wose we cilume u mulongozi kulelwa, kosiwanulwa yawe wo Muwaha.”
Wakalavya cilavywa, Nziwa nyejete, lunji nyana za nghunda nyejete, nha vyono yasakwaga mwilajilizo lyo Muwaha.

Baho hali na munhu ku Yelusalemi litagwa lyakwe Simiyoni, no munhu yuyo, yali yali ling'ani na mwihuwilwa kuli Mulungu, yalanjililaga muno wukombozwe we Waisilayeli. No Muhe Mono Yelile yali yali muli mwene.
Nayo yagubulilwa no Muhe Mono Yelile nha vyono si kolofwa, lono yakali namuwona Kilisito wo Muwaha.
Na ko wutonji wo Muhe Mono Yelile, Simiyoni yakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, ne walezi wa Yesu waza muleta mwana Yesu, mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, ho wamutendele nha vyono Wulajilize wukutya.
Simiyoni yamubocela mwana Yesu mu miwoko yakwe, akuno yakumulumbo Mulungu, yakutya,
“Alu Muwaha wafisiliza wihuwizo wako, wumukombole mwitumami wako yabite yapolile.
Hambi meso gangu nha gayiwona mhonelo yako.
Yono wayikondeleza hali wanhu wose.
Wuzelu wo kuwagubulila wono si Wayahudi. No lukumyo lwe wanhu wako Waisilayeli.”
U sogwe wa Yesu no nyina, wakawa kwizina zizo zo mwana zono Simiyoni yazilonga.
Simiyoni yakawalugutiza, yakamulonjela nyina Malyamu, “Muli mwana yuyu, wenji wa muli Waisilayeli wokwajilila, na wenji wopona.
Nayo kowa citanjilo cono wanhu siwocisaka, ho gagubulwe mahweso ga wenji, sunga na gwegwe, wusungu wono winha mumaje mukali, wocinya nhumbula yako.”
Kwali koyuli muwizi yumonga wa cicekulu, mukombi muno, mwana wa Fanuweli, wo mulango wa Asheli, nayo yali yekalana no mulume wakwe myaka mupunghati du kulawa vyono wetola.

Nayo yakekala mufwile sunga mu cipango cico, nayo yali yafika myaka makumi munana na mine ku wulawa u wulelwe wakwe. Na mu cipango cico cose, si yawukaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, na mu wuleko kulya, no kumuhemba Mulungu cilo na misi.
Na mu cipango cico Ana yakalawila, nayo yakanza kumulumba Mulungu, nayo yakalonga zo mwana yuyo kuli wose wono walanjililaga wukombozi wa Yelusalemi.
Nawo walezi waza kondya kufisiliza zose za mu wulajilize wo Muwaha, wakawuya kwawo ku Nazaleti mu yisi ya Galilaya.
No mwana yakawiluka, no kutuga vilungo, yakamemywa mahala, ne lihewa lyo Mulungu likawa muli mwene.
Ne walezi wa Yesu wabitaga myaka yose ku Yelusalemi, mu cidaha ce Pasaka.
U mwana yaza ficila myaka yikumi na myejete, wabitana nayo ku Pasaka nha vyono wali wazoweye.
Vilo vyali kondya, wakatuluka kuwuya kwawo. Ninga Yesu yasigala ku Yelusalemi, hamba walezi wakwe si wali wamanyile.
Ninga wehwesa vyono yali mwipuga lye wanhu, wakajenda muhinzo we zuwa limonga, hanyuma wakamula kumulondola mu wandugu zawo na mu wayawo,
waza kuwa si wamuwene, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakumulondola.
Kukawa vyaza kupuluta vilo vidatu, wakamwagana yali mu Nyumba yo Mulungu yekaye haciligati ye wejizi, yakuwahuliciza, akuno yakuwawuza:
na wose wono wamuhulicizaga, wakezina mahala gakwe ne mapitulo gakwe.
Nawo i walezi wakwe waza kumwagana, wakezina. Malyamu u nyina, yakamutya, “Mwanangu, alo so cici kucitendela nhavi? Langa ta, ane no sogo, cali kukulondola cikalaye.”
U mwene yakawatya, “So cici lo mwali kunondola? Alo si mwali mumanyile vyono yinojeye niwe mu Nyumba ya Baba?”
Ninga walezi wakwe hamba si wezuka nghani yiyo yono yawalonjela.
Hodu, yakawuya nawo sunga ku Nazaleti. Yakawa ne cihuliko kuli wene. U nyina yakazikamisa zinghani zizi zose mu nhumbula yakwe.
Nayo Yesu yakajendelela mu mahala no wuwiluce, nayo yakacila kwendwa no Mulungu ne wanhu.

Mu mwaka we likumi na mihano wo wutemi wa Kayisali Tibeliya, Pontiyo Pilato yali mutemi wa Yudiya, na Helode yali mutemi wa Galilaya, no mwanakwawe Filipo yali mutemi wa zi'si za Ituleya na Telakoniti, nayo Lusaniya, yali mutemi wa Abilene,
na Anasi na Kayafa wali wo wukohani wuwaha. Mu cipango cico, i nghani yo Mulungu yikamuziza Yohana u mwana wa Zekaliya ku nyika.
Yohana yakabita mu yisi yose yono yipilime Yoludani, yakawa kuganula vyono yiwanojeye wanhu wanene no kubaputizwa, ho Mulungu yawawusize wubi wawo.
Nha vyono yandikwe mu citabu co muwizi Isaya, “Lizi lya munhu likuhulikwa ku nyika, Nozelezenyi nzila yo Muwaha, Gololenyi wukolo wakwe,
Malolo gose gafucilizwe, Ne matunda ne vigongo vyose vitenjelemulwe, Ne vipeto vigololwe, Ne zinzila zono zina makombo zitelemezwe.
Ne wanhu wose wowona u wukombozwe wo Mulungu.”
Holeka yakawalonjela wanhu wenji wono wamubitilaga ho yawabaputize, “Anye nyo zindelo ze zinzoka, mono yamusugulenyi mutize likuwo lyo Mulungu lyono likuza nani?

Holeka mulajile mu metumo genyu nha vyono mwakondya kunena.” Hamba mulece kwamula kutya mu wiganicize wenyu, “Ase Abulahamu yo sogo yetu.” Ane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono Mulungu yadahile kugapitula i mabwe gaga gawe wana wa Abulahamu.
Sunga nalu nhemo mbikwe ha masina ge mabici, no mubici wo wose wono siwukulela mikalo miswanu, wotemangwa no kutajilwa mu moto.
Wanhu wenji wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu citende wule?”
Yakapitula yakawatya, “Mono yena misweko myejete, yamugawile muyagwe mono yasina, na mono yena ndigwa, yatende nhavivyo.”
Watoweza kodi nawo wakaza ho wabaputizwe, wakamuwuza, “Gwe mwijizi, na'se ma citende wule?”
Yakawatya, “Mulece kutoweza kodi kuciza nha vyono mwalajilizwa.”

Ne wasilikale nawo wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ase ma, nase citende wule?” Yakawatya, “Mulece kogofya munhu, hamba kuwasolela wanhu vinhu vyawo kwe vilungo, hamba kumusonjeza munhu wo wose ko wulambi, mukwizwe ne misahala yenyu.”
Vyono wanhu walanjililaga cinji, wakawa kwiwuza mu zinhumbula zawo za Yohana, “Alu yidahice lunji yo mwene Kilisito?”

Yohana yapitula yakawatya wose, “Ane nghumubaputizenyi mu malenga, ninga yakuza mono yali vilungo kuciza ane, hamba si nghwiliye kukowolola mikowa ye malatu gakwe, mwene komubaputizenyi mu Muhe Mono Yelile na mu Moto.
U mwene yenha munhu mono yebate luheneko mu mawoko gakwe, ho yezeze lukulu cuga cakwe, no kututicila wuhemba mu nyumba yakwe; ninga mawaje yagaticimize no moto wono si wuzimaga.”
Hamonga ne zinghani zinji nyinji, Yohana yakawakong'onheza i wanhu akuno yakuwaganulila Luganuzi Luswanu.
Ninga Yohana yamutacila Helode u muwaha we yisi ku soko vyono yali yamusolile Helodiya u mugolece wo mwanakwawe, no kumutola, na ku so mabi gose gono yatendaga Helode.
Na Helode yakonjeleza wubi wakwe so kumudindila Yohana mu jela.
Kukawa waza kubaputizwa wanhu wose, Yesu nayo yakabaputizwa, na lono yalombaga, wulanga wukagubuka,
no Muhe Mono Yelile yakamutimila, futa yakwe, yehwanile nziwa, lizi likalawa ku wulanga likutya, “Agwe yo gwegwe Mwanangu mwendece, mono nyendezwe nagwe.”
Yesu mweneco lono yamulila u witumami wakwe calinze, yali yaficile nha myaka makumi madatu, ne wanhu waganicizaga vyono mwene yo mwana wa Yusufu mwana wa Heli.
Heli yali mwana wa Matati, mono yali mwana wa Lawi, mwana wa Meliki, mwana wa Yanayi, mwana wa Yusufu,
mono yali mwana wa Matatiya, mwana wa Amosi, mwana wa Nahumu, mwana wa Hesili mwana wa Nagayi,
mono yali mwana wa Maati, mwana wa Matatiya, mwana wa Semeyini, mwana wa Yoseki, mwana wa Yuda,
mono yali mwana wa Yowanani, mwana wa Lesa, mwana wa Zelubabeli, mwana wa Salatiyeli, mwana wa Neli,
mwana wa Meleci, mwana wa Adi, mwana wa Kosamu, mono yali mwana wa Elimodomu, mwana wa Eli,
mono yali mwana wa Yoshuwa, mwana wa Eliyezeli, mwana wa Yolimu, mwana wa Matati, mwana wa Lawi,
mono yali mwana wa Simiyoni, mwana wa Yuda, mwana wa Yusufu mwana wa Yonamu, mwana wa Eliyakimu,
mono yali mwana wa Meleya, mwana wa Mena, mwana wa Matata, mwana wa Natani, mwana wa Dawudi,
mono yali mwana wa Yese, mwana wa Obedi, mwana wa Bowazi, mwana wa Salimoni, mwana wa Nasoni,
mono yali mwana wa Aminadabu, mwana wa Adimini, mwana wa Alini, mwana wa Hezeloni, mwana wa Pelezi, mwana wa Yuda,
mono yali mwana wa Yakobo, mwana wa Isaka, mwana wa Abulahamu, mwana wa Tela, mwana wa Naholi,
mono yali mwana wa Selugu, mwana wa Leyu, mwana wa Pelegu, mwana wa Ebeli mwana wa Sela,
mono yali mwana wa Kayinani, mwana wa Alipakishadi, mwana wa Semu, mwana wa Noha, mwana wa Lameci,
mono yali mwana wa Metusela, mwana wa Enoci, mwana wa Yaledi, mwana wa Mahalaleli, mwana wa Kayinani,
mono yali mwana wa Enosi, mwana wa Seti, mwana wa Adamu, mono yali wo Mulungu.
Ale Yesu yawuyaga yakulawa kwi'kolongo lya Yoludani, yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakatongwa no Muhe yabite ku nyika.
Yekala kuko ku nyika vilo makumi mane yakujelwa na Setani. Nayo si yalizaga cinji mu vilo vivyo vyose, navyo vyaza puluta, yakadabuka.
Holeka Setani yakamutya, “Hono yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu, wulonje libwe lili liwe mukate.”
Yesu yakamupitula, yandikwa “Munhu si ko kwikala mumi so ndigwa du.”
Hanyuma Setani yakamutegula hacanyha, hanhu hono hali henucile, yakamulajila matemi gose ga kononze lwa kamonga. Setani yakamutya,
“Nokupela gwegwe vilungo vivi vyose, ne zinhojo zayo; hambi nha nakombolelwa nene, na muli wose mono nyendile, nghumupela.
Ale hono wufugame hali nene, vivi vyose vyowa vyako.”
Nayo Yesu yakapitula yakamutya, “I Mandiko gakutya, ‘Komuhemba Mulungu wako, no komwitumamila mweneco yali wene du.’ ”
Setani yakamutegula ku Yelusalemi, yakamuwika mucanyha ye litembe lye Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakamutya, “Hono yo gwegwe mwana wo Mulungu, wilugaje baha sunga ho hasi,
hambi nha yandikwa: ‘Kokulajiliziza Wamalayika wakwe wakukamise,’
kanyhi, ‘Wokwambilila mu mawoko gawo. Ho wulece kwikobala mugulu wako mwibwe.’ ”
Yesu yakapitula yakamutya, “Yandikwa, ‘Wulece kumujelo Muwaha Mulungu wako.’ ”
Nayo Setani yaza kukondya majelo gose, yakawa kumuleka hadodo.
Baho Yesu yakawuya ku Galilaya kuno yamemile vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile. Ne zinghani zakwe zikatandala mu yisi yose yono yipilime.
Nayo yejizaga wanhu mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo akuno yakulumbwa na wose.
Yesu yakabita ku Nazaleti kono yawilucila, yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo mwizuwa lye sabato nha vyono yali yazoweye, yakema yasome Mandiko Gono Gelile.
Yakapegwa citabu co muwizi Isaya, yakacigubula hanhu hono hali handicigwe nhavi,
“U Muhe wo Muwaha yali muli nene Kasiwanula, ho niwaganulile waciwa Luganuzi Luswanu, Kanhuma niwalonjele wono wafunjigwe, nha vyono wowopolelwa, Ne wabofu, vyono wowona kanyhi,
Kanhuma ho niwakomboze wono wakwiwonelwa, no kuwalonjela i cipango cono u Mulungu kowakomboza wanhu wakwe.”
Yaza kukondya kusoma, yakacigubika icitabu, yakamupela u mwitumami, yakekala, ne meso ga wose wono wali wali mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo gakawa gamulanjile.
Nayo yakamula kuwatya, “Izuwa lili nha vyono muhulice lwandiko lulu lukusomwa, lwakondya kufisilizwa.”
Wose wakendezwa nayo, wakezina so zinghani ziswanu zono yalonga, wakatya, “Yuyu si yo mwana wa Yusufu?”
Yakawatya, na lunji mononjela nghani yiyi, “Go muganga, wilagule go mweneco, na kanyhi motya, ‘Muli zose zono cahulika wukwituma ku Kapelanawumi, wuzitumaje na baha kanyhi mwitumbi lyako.’ ”
Yakawatya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, hasina muwizi mono kavumilwaga mu yisi yakwe mweneco.
Ninga mbeka nghumutyenyi, kwali kowali wafwile wenji mu Isilayeli mu vilo vya Eliya, lono wulanga wukadindwa myaka midatu na myezi mutandatu, kukawa na nzala mbaha mu yisi yose.
Hamba nhavivyo, Eliya si yatumwa kuli yunji wowose, langa yatumwa kuli mucekulu mufwile du wa ku Saleputa mu yisi ya Sidoni.
Kanyhi mu yisi ya Isilayeli, mu cipango ca Eliya muwizi, kwali kowali watamwa wenji wo wukoma, hamba nhavivyo hasina wowose mono yakwemwa, langa hono si Namani du munhu wa Suliya.”
Na wose wono wali wali mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, waza kuzihulika zizo, wakakolwa nelikuwo,
wakenuka, wakamulavyaniza Yesu kunze ye likaya lyawo, lyono lyali lizenjigwe mucanyha ye cigongo, wakamutegula sunga ku nhenenhuko ye cigongo cico, ho wamugumile hasi.
Ninga Yesu yakakolela haciligati yawo yakawa kubita.
Hanyuma Yesu yakabita kwitumbi lya Kapelanawumi, mu yisi ya Galilaya yakawa kuwejiza mwizuwa lye Sabato.
Wakezina so wulajilize wono yali yena nawo mu wijize wakwe.
Mumo mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo mwali moyuli munhu mono yali yena muhe we licisi lyavu, yakabalaluka ne lizi iwaha, yakutya.
“Gwe Yesu wa Nazaleti, cina nghanici nagwe? Alo kuza wucongomeze? Nghumanyile gwegwe yo nani, yo Gwegwe Mono welile wo Mulungu.”
Ninga Yesu yakalitacila yakutya, “Nyamale, wuwuce muli munhu yuyo.” Ne licisi lyaza kumubamiliza hasi, haciligati yawo, likawa kuwuka muli munhu yuyo, hamba kumutamisa yaye.
Wose wakezina, wakawa kulongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Ayi yo nghani yo wizine, hambi nha ko wusume no wulajilize, yakugalajiliza i macisi gawuce, nago gakuwuka.”
Ne zinghani za Yesu zikatandala hanhu hose mu yisi yiyo.
Yesu yakawuka mu nhang'anilo yiyo yo wuhembelo, yakenjila mu nyumba ya Simoni, u mukwewe we cicekulu wa Simoni, yali yebatwe na mhungo mbaha, wakamulomba yamuponye,
Yesu yakema behi nayo, yakayitacila mhungo, nayo yikamuleka. Ho baho yakawa kwinuka no kuwetumamila.
Lono lizuwa lyali lyeza behi no kugwila, wose wono wali wena watamwa we matamwa ge hayo hayo, wakawaleta kuli mwene, nayo yakawawicila miwoko yakwe wose, yakawaponya.
Ne macisi gakalawa muli wenji, gakubalaluka, gakutya, “Yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu.” Ninga Yesu yakagatacila, hamba si yagaleka galonje, hambi nha gali gamumanyile vyono yo Kilisito.
Ale waza kwela, Yesu yakabita hanhu hono hasina wanhu, ne wanhu wakawa kumulondola, na waza muwona, wakahila kumugoma yalece kuwuka kwawo.
Ninga mwene yakawatya, “Yinojeye nganule Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu na mu matumbi ganji, hambi nha co caleka nghatumwa.”
Yakawa kuganula mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo ga ku Yudiya.
Izuwa linji Yesu yali yemile ha nhumbi ye lilamba lya Genesaleti, ne wanhu wenji wali wamupilime, wakuyihuliciza Nghani yo Mulungu,
yakawona ngalawa nyejete zili ha mwejelele we lilamba; ninga wanimula zisomba wali walawaniza wakuzikwema zinyavu zawo,

Yesu yaza kwinjila mu ngalawa yimonga yono yali ya Simoni, yakamusaka Simoni yayitezeze mu malenga kutali hadodo no mwejelele we lilamba, yakekala mu ngalawa yakagejiza mapuga ge wanhu yekaye mu ngalawa.
Yaza kondya kulonga, yakamutya Simoni, “Wuyitezaje i ngalawa sunga ha cisolo, mukazitajile zinyavu zenyu ko wunimule we zisomba.”
Simoni yakapitula yakatya, “Muwaha, cititilika cilo cose sunga wela cikunimula somba, hamba kutuga cinji, ninga ku so wulonje wako, nozitajila zinyavu.”
Nawo waza noza nhavivyo, wakatuga somba nyinji muno, sunga ne zinyavu zawo zikanza kudemuka,
wakawacema wayawo wono wali mu ngalawa yinzagwe, waze wawataze, nawo wakaza, wakazimemya zisomba mu zi ngalawa zose vyono nyejete, sunga zikawa behi no kudodomela.
Simoni Petelo yaza kuziwona zizo, yakafugama hamwande ya Yesu, yakutya “Wuwuce hono hangu, Gwe Muwaha, hambi ane nha nili munhu mubi.”
Simoni hamonga ne wayagwe wose, wezina ku soko yo wunimule we zisomba nyinji nhavivilya.
Yakobo na Yohana nawo nhavivyo, wana wa Zebedayo, wono wali wahanjile na Simoni. Yesu yakamutya Simoni, “Wulece kogopa, vyono wukulawa lulu kowa kuwanimula wanhu.”
Nawo waza kuzileta zingalawa zawo kwi'sangha, wakaleka vyose, wakamutyatya.
Kukawa Yesu lono yali mu kaya yinji, mwali na munhu mutamwa wa wukoma muwili wose, nayo yaza kumuwona Yesu, yakafugama yakamunena Yesu yakutya, “Gwe go Muwaha, hono wende, kosuma kunghwema.”
Yesu yakagolola muwoko wakwe, yakamupamiza, yakutya, “Nyendile wukwemwe.” Lo lulolulo wukoma wukamuleka.

Nayo Yesu yakamutya “Wulece kumulonjela yunji: langa wubite, wukelajile kuli mukohani, wukalavye cilavywa so wezwe wako, nha vyono Wulajilize wa Musa wukutya, ho wuwe wuhomelezi kuli wene vyono wapona.”
Ninga zinghani za Yesu zikacila kumanyika hanhu hose. Ne wanhu wenji wakekonghola ho wamuhulicize, no kuponywa wutamwa wawo.
Ninga mwene yakabita hanhu hono hasina wanhu no kulomba.

Kukawa mwizuwa linji lono Yesu yejizaga: Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wono walawa ku vitumbi vyose vya Galilaya na Yudiya na Yelusalemi wali wekaye baho; ne vilungo vyo Mulungu vyo kuponyezya watamwa vikawa muli mwene.
Hobaho wakaza wanhu wamudinghuye mu citanda munhu mono yali yadejepe muwili wose; wakajela kumwinjiza kugati, wamuwice hali Yesu.
Ninga so winji we wanhu, si watuga nzila yo kwinjilila, holeka wakapula mwi'tembe, wakamutimizya mutamwa mwi'langa, hamonga ne citanda cakwe sunga ho hali Yesu.
Yesu yaza kuwona wihuwilo wawo vyono wuwaha, yakamutya yuyo munhu. “Mwendece, kunenelwa wubi wako.”
Wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo wakanza kwihwesa, wakutya, “Yuyu yo munhu ci, mono yakumutovula Mulungu? Hasina munhu mono kosuma kunenela wubi, langa hono si Mulungu yali wene.”
Ninga Yesu yakawatanga mahweso gawo, yakapitula yakawatya, “Alo mukwihwesa cici mu zinhumbula zenyu?”
Ya hayi yono mhelu, kutya Kunenelwa wubi wako, hamba kutya winuce wujende?
Ninga nyendile mumanye vyono u Mwana wo Munhu yena Wulajilize kono'nze kunenela wubi. Baho yakamutya munhu mono yali yadejepe, “Winuce, wudinghule citanda cako wubite ku kaya.”
Hobaho munhu yuyo mono yali yadejepe, yakenuka ha mwande ya wose, yakadinghula citanda cakwe, yakabita ku kaya, akuno yakumukumyo u Mulungu.
Wose wakezina no kwibatwa no woga, wakamukumya Mulungu, wakutya, “Nye, ciwona mezino zuwali!”
Hanyuma yayo Yesu yakalawila, yakamuwona mutoweza kodi yunji litagwa lyakwe Lawi yekaye mu hofisi, Yesu yakamutya “Wunhyatye.”
Nayo yakavileka vyose, yakamutyatya.
Yuyo Lawi, yakamunozeza Yesu zindigwa mu nyumba yakwe. Hakawa yipuga yiwaha lye watoweza kodi, na wanji wono wali vikalane nawo ha zindigwa.
Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize wakawang'ung'ulicila wejizwa wakwe; wakutya, “Alo so cici mukulizana kanyhi mukung'wezana ne watoweza kodi ne wanyo wubi?”
Yesu yakapitula yakawatya, “Iwanhu waswanu si wakusaka muganga; langa walya wono watamigwe.
Hambi nha si naza kuwacema i wanhu waswanu, langa i wanyo wubi, ho wanene.”
Nawo wakamutya Yesu, “Kenji wejizwa wa Yohana walekaga kulya, kanyhi walombaga; ne wejizwa we Wafalisayo nawo wanozaga nhavivyo; ninga wejizwa wako, walizaga kanyhi wang'wezaga.”
Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Mosuma 'mbi kuwasaka i walalikwa ha halusi, walece kulya lono wakali wena na bwana halusi?
Ninga vilo vyolokuza; kolo wasolelwa bwana halusi, ho wololecela kulya mu vilo vivyo.”

Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo; “Hasina munhu mono kademulaga cilaka mu civwalo cipya, yaciwicile mu civwalo cihuma, na hono yanoze nhavivyo, kowa yademula civwalo cipya, ne cilaka cico ce civwalo cipya hamba si vyosuma kwiling'anila ne civwalo cihuma.
Hamba hasina munhu mono katajilaga divayi mhya, mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zihuma, hambi divayi mhya nha yoyibahula i mifuko, nayo divayi yokwitika, ne mifuko yohodanjika.
Langa divayi mhya, yinojeye kutajilwa mu mifuko ye zinyhingo zimhya.
Hamba hasina munhu mono kosulumila kanyhi kung'wa divayi mhya, lono yakondya kung'wa divayi huma, hambi nha yakutya, ‘Divayi huma yo swanu muno.’ ”
Mwi'zuwa linji lye Sabato, Yesu yakakola mu migunda yo wuhemba; Wejizwa wakwe wakabena maso go wuhemba, wakagafijiha ne miwoko, wakasola zimhece wakalya.
Ninga Wafalisayo wanji wakawawuza, “Nhawulenyi mukwituma yono yili mwiko mwizuwa lye Sabato?”
Yesu yakapitula yakawatya, “Alo nghani yiyi si mwasoma, vyono yetuma Dawudi, mwene hamonga na wono yali yena nawo, mwipango linji lono wali wadabuka?
Vyono yenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakalya i mikate yono yali cilavywa kuli Mulungu, yakawapela ne wayagwe wono yali yena nawo; mikate yono yali miwikwe hali, langa wakohani du wali wene?”
Yesu yakawatya, “U Mwana wo Munhu yo Muwaha we Sabato.”
Kukawa mu Sabato yinji, Yesu yakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, yakejiza, na mumo mwali na munhu mono muwoko wakwe wo kulume wali wudejepe.
Wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, wasakaga watuje nghani yo kumusonjezeza Yesu, holeka wakawa walindiye wawone hono komuponya munhu yuyo mwizuwa lye Sabato.
Ninga Yesu yakawamanya i mahweso gawo, yakamutya u munhu wo muwoko wono wudejepe “Winuce, wime haciligati.”
Yakenuka yakema haciligati. Yesu yakawatya, Nghumuwuzenyi, “Wulenyi, mwiko lu kwituma viswanu mu Sabato, hamba kwituma vibi? Kuponya wumi, hamba kwajiliza?”
Yaza kuwalanga wawalya wose wono wali wali baho, yakamutya yuyulya munhu, “Golola muwoko wako.” Nayo yakawugolola; no muwoko wakwe wukawa kunoga.
Ninga wene wakakolwa muno ne likuwo, wakalongana weneco wose vyono wosuma kumutendela vibi Yesu.
Lizuwa linji Yesu yakabita kwi'tunda, kulomba; yakekala kuko cilo cose sunga wukela, yakumulomba Mulungu.
Waza kwela, yakawacema wejizwa wakwe, yakahagula muli wene, wanhu yikumi na wejete, wawo yakawacemela litagwa lye “Watumwa.”
Simoni mono Yesu yamupela litagwa lya Petelo na Andeleya mwanakwawe, na Yakobo na Yohana, na Filipo na Batolomayo,
na Matayo na Tomaso, na Yakobo na Alifayo,
na Simoni mono yacemwaga Zelote, na Yuda na Yakobo, na Yuda Musikaliyota, mono hanyuma yakamugaluka Yesu.

Yaza kutima kwi'tunda hamonga nawo, Yesu yakema hanhu hono hali hali wuhihi, hatendemaye, na baho hali howali Wejizwa wakwe wenji, no winji we wanhu wono walawa mbavu zose za Yudiya, na Yelusalemi, na ku mhwani yose ya Tulo na Sidoni, wose wakaza wamuhulicize Yesu, no kuponywa zinhamwa zawo.
Na wono wagazagwa ne macisi, wakaponywa.
Ne wanhu wose wasakaga wamupamize, hambi vilungo nha vyalawaga muli mwene, vikawaponya wose.
Yesu yakawapitucila wejizwa wakwe yakatya, “Muli wamoti nyo waciwa: hambi wutemi wo Mulungu nha wenyu.
Muli wamoti 'nye mono muli nzala alu, hambi nha molokwigutywa. Muli wamoti 'nye mono mukulila alu, hambi nha moloseka.
“Muli wamoti 'nye, kolo wanhu wakumusulenyi, na kolo wakumusiwanulenyi, no kumulijenyi, no kuliviza litagwa lyenyu nha wetuma vibi, ku soko yo Mwana wo Munhu.
Mu cidaha cico zilakwijela zizo, nhondo muze musecelele mwizuwa lilyo so nyemo. Hambi wuhumbilizwe wenyu nha wuwaha ku wulanga. Hambi walezi zawo nha vyo wawatendela i wawizi.
Ninga woyi he 'nye mono muli wagoli! Hambi nha mwapegwa mwakondya wusindamice wenyu.
Woyi he 'nye mono mwigute aluno, hambi nha molodabuka. Woyi he 'nye mono mukuseka aluno, hambi nha molokalala no kulila.
Woyi he nye kolo wakumulumbizenyi wanhu wose, hambi walezi wawo nha vyo wawatendela i wawizi wo wulambi.”
“Ninga ane nghumutyenyi anye mono mukuhuliciza, Muwendaje i walugu wenyu, muwatendelaje viswanu wono wakumusulenyi.
Muwalugutize wono wakumulijitenyi, muwalombele wono wakumutendelenyi vibi.
Munhu hono yakutowe mu luzagasa lumonga, wumupitusize no luzagasa luyagwe; munhu hono yakuboce likoti lyako, wumulecelaje ne shati yako.
Muli wose mono yakukulomba cinji, wumupelaje, na mono yakukusolela sawo yako, wulece kuyisaka yakugomolele.
Muwatendelaje wanhu wose, nha vyono anye mukusaka wene wamutendelenyi nyenye.
“Hambi hono muwe kuwenda du wono wakumwendenyi, mowa mwina lilumboci? Hasina. Ku soko hamba ne wanyo wubi nawo, nha wetumaga nhavivyo.
Na hono muwe kuwatendela viswanu wono wakumutendelenyi viswanu du, mowa mwina lilumboci? Hambi nha sunga ne wanyo wubi nawo nha watendaga nhavivyo.

Na hono muwe kuwakopesa wono mwitumbiye vyono womugomolelenyi kanyhi, mowa mwina lilumboci? Ku soko sunga ne wanyo wubi nawo nha wawakopesaga i wanyo wubi wayawo, ho wagomolelwe kanyhi vyono viling'aniye.

Vyo si yinha, ninga muwendaje walugu wenyu, muwatendelaje viswanu, mweze kuwakopesa, kuno si mukulanjilila kugomolelwa. No wuhumbilizwe wenyu wowa wuwaha, nanye mowa wana wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli Vyose: hambi mwene nha muswanu kuli wono wasina lilumbo na kuli wabi.
Mweze no lusungu nha vyono u Sogo yenyu yali lusungu.”
“Mulece kuwaling'aniza wanji, nanye ho si moling'anizwa no Mulungu, mulece kuwahosa wanji, nanye si molohoswa: muwanenelaje wanji, nanye molonenelwa.

Wapelenyi wanji vyono wakusaka, nanye molopegwa, Heya molobocela mu miwoko yenyu cipimo ciswanu cisindilwe, cisinjisizwe, cono cimemeleceye, no kumwajika. Hambi nha mu cipimo cicilya du cono mwitumamilaga kuli wanji, co cico du cono Mulungu nayo kolomujelelenyi na nyenye.”
Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici “Wulenyi, u mubofu kosuma 'mbi kumutonga mubofu muyagwe? Hamba hadodo, wose wogwila mwikombo.
U mwijizwa kowa nho mwijizi wakwe.
Kosuma nhawule kuciwona cilagala cono cili mu liso lyo nduguyo, hamba si kukumbucilaga libici lyono lili mu liso lyako go mweneco?

Hamba kosuma nhawule kumutya nduguyo, ‘Ndugu yangu, leka ta nghuwuse i cilagala cono cili mu liso lyako, na akuno si wukulanga libici lyono lili mu liso lyako go mweneco?’ Go mukoci 'gwe, wamule kuwusa libici lyono lili mu liso lyako, ho kosuma kuwona viswanu no kusuma kuwusa icilagala cono cili mu liso lyo nduguyo.”
“Hasina libici liswanu lyono lilelaga mikalo mibi, hamba libici libi lyono lilelaga mikalo miswanu.
Wanhu wawutanjilaga mubici mu mikalo yayo. Kanyhi yili calinze, vyono, wanhu si wahepaga mikuyu mu mamivya, hamba si wahepaga zabibu mu mabijili.

Munhu muswanu, kalavyaga ziswanu kulawa mu viwutwa vyakwe vya mu nhumbula yakwe. No munhu mubi nayo kalavyaga izimbi kulawa mu viwutwa vyakwe vya mu nhumbula yakwe, hambi munhu nha kalongaga kulawa muli zono zimemile mu nhumbula yakwe.”
“Nghuwona mukunyitya, ‘Muwaha, Muwaha,’ akuno si mukwituma zono nghulonga?
Nomulonjelenyi cihwanicizo cono cokwila, kulajila vyono yenha mono yakunyiziza, no kuzihulika zinghani zangu no kuzituma.

Yuyo yehwanile munhu mono yakuzenga kaya, mono yahimba hasi muno, no kuwika musinji wa mabwe, gakaza malenga menji, gakayikundujiza kaya yiyo, hamba kuyisinjisa ng'o, vyono yali yizenjigwe mu musinji wono wukamile.

Ninga mono yakuzihulika zinghani zangu, hamba kwituma cinji, yuyo yehwanile munhu mono yazenga kaya yakwe mu muhangha caka du, hamba kuwicila musinji, malenga gakayikundujiza kaya yiyo, nayo yikagwa no kuhodanjicila lukulu.”
Yaza kukondya kulonga zinghani zakwe zose hali wanhu, Yesu yakabita ku Kapelanawumi.
Kuko kwali na muwaha we wasilikale yigana, Mulumi, mono yali yena mwitumami wakwe mono yali yamwendile muno. Mwitumami yuyu yali yatamigwe yeza yali behi no kufwa.
Nayo yaza hulika za Yesu, yakamutumila i walongola wanji we Wayahudi, wabite wakamulombe Yesu ho yaze yamuponye mwitumami wakwe.
Nawo wazafika kuli Yesu, wakamunena muno, wakutya “Ayu yanojeye wumutendele nghani yiyi,
hambi nha yawendile wanhu wetu, nayo yo mwene mono yacizenjela ne nhang'anilo yetu yo Wuhembelo.”

Yesu yakabitana nawo. Na lono yali yasejelela behi ne kaya, yuyo muwaha we Wasilikale yigana, yakamutumila wendece wakwe wamulonjele Yesu. “Muwaha wulece kwigaza, hambi ne nha si nghwiliye agwe winjile mu kaya yangu.
Kanyhi nane nghwiwona vyono si nghwiliye kuza kuli gwegwe; ninga wulonje du, no mwitumami wangu kopona.

Hambi nane nha nili hasi yo wulajilize we wawaha, nina wasilikale wangu. Nane nghumutya ayu, ‘Bita’ nayo yakubita, nghumutya yunji, ‘Wuze’ nayo yakuza, na hono nimutye mwitumami wangu, ‘Wunoze nhavi,’ nayo yakunoza.”

Yesu yaza kuhulika zizi, yakamwizina no kumukumya yuyulya u muwaha we wasilikale. Hanyuma yakawapitucila we lipuga lye wanhu wono wamutyatyaga, yakawatya. “Nghali nawona wihuwilo wuwaha nha wuwu, hamba mu Isilayeli.”
Nawo wono watumwa waza kuwuya ku kaya, wakamwagana yuyulya mwitumami yanoga.
Hanyuma hadodo, Yesu yakabita kwitumbi lyono litezagwa Nayini, Wejizwa wakwe hamonga na wanhu wenji, wakabitana nayo.

Ale, yaza sejelela he 'lango liwaha lyo kwinjilila mwi'kaya, yakawona wanhu wadinghuye muzelelo mono yafwiye, mwana we ciwene wo mucekulu mufwile. Wanhu wenji wa mwi'kaya lilyo, wali wali hamonga no mucekulu yuyo.
Nayo Muwaha yali yeza kumuwona mucekulu yuyo, yakamuwonela lusungu, yakamutya, “Wulece kulila.”
Yakasejelela behi, yakacipamiza citanda cono wali wamudinghuliye mono yali yafwiye, nawo wono wali wamudinghuye wakema. Nayo Yesu yakatya, “Muzelelo, nghukulonjela, Winuce.”
Yuyo mono yali yafwiye, yakenuka, yakekala, no kwamula kulonga. Na Yesu yakamupelo nyina.
Wanhu wose wakebatwa no woga, wakamulumba u Mulungu, wakutya, “Muwizi muwaha kalawila mwetu; no Mulungu kaza kuwakomboza wanhu wakwe.”
Ne nghani yakwe yiyi yikamanyika mu Wuyahudi mose, na mu yisi yose yono yipilime.
I wejizwa wa Yohana, wakamuganulila Yohana zizo zose, Yohana yakawacema wejete, wayagwe ne wejizwa wakwe,
yakawatuma wabite kuli Muwaha wakamuwuze “Alu agwe! Yo yulya mono yakuza, hamba cimulanjilile yunji?”
Wejizwa wawo wejete waza kumubitila Yesu, wakatya, “Yohana u Mubaputizi kacituma kwako cikuwuze: ‘Ati! Yo gwegwe mono yakuza, hamba cimulanjilile yunji?’ ”
Mu cipango cico, Yesu yakawaponya wenji mu zinhamwa, no wugazwe, ne macisi, ne wabofu wenji yakawapela wuwone.

Yesu yakawapitula yakawatya, “Mubite mukamulonjele Yohana zono muwene na zono muhulice; i wabofu wakuwona, wono wali citewe wakujenda viswanu, wono watamigwe wukoma wakukwemwa, ne waciwa wakuganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu.
Yo mumoti mono si yakuwona cikobazo muli nene.”
Waza kutuluka wono watumwa na Yohana, Yesu yakanza kuwalonjela mapuga ge wanhu, za Yohana. “Mwene mwabitaga kunyika kulanga cici?” Mwasakaga kuwona lihanze lyono lyayumvywagwa ne mbeho?

Ninga mwabitaga kulanga cici? Mwabitaga kumuwona munhu mono yavwalile vivwalo vye cimalidadi? Lanjenyi, wono wena vivwalo vyo lukumyo, no kwikala mu mikalile yo wumote wa za mononze, wekalaga mu zinyumba ze watemi!
Ta munonjelaje, mwalawa kulanga cici, Mwabitaga kumuwona muwizi lo? Heya, mbeka mono yamucizize no muwizi.
Yuyu Yohana yo yakulongwa mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Langa ta, nghumutuma mutumwa wangu, yakutyo Muwaha, nghumutuma yakulongolele no kukunozelezeza nzila.”
Yesu yakatya, “Mu wana wose we wanhu, hasina mono yamucizize Yohana u Mubaputizi. Hamba nhavivyo, u mudodo muno mu wutemi wo Mulungu yo muwaha si nho mwene.”
Wanhu wose ne watoweza kodi, wali weza hulika, wakawukumya u wuswanu wo Mulungu, wawo wo wawo, wono wali wakondya kubaputizwa mu wubaputizo wa Yohana.
Ninga Wafalisayo ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakawulema wuhile wo Mulungu wono wali wuwanojeye, wakalema sunga no kubaputizwa na Yohana.
Yesu yakajendelela kutya: “Holeka nowehwananiza wanhu we ndelo yiyi na cinhuci? Wo wanhu wono wenha wule?
Wenha wana wadodo wono wekaye mu Sokoni, wono welonjelaga awa na walya; wakutya, Cimutowelenyi zifilimbi, nanye hamba kuvina ng'o, calila nanye hamba kulila ng'o.
Hambi Yohana u Mubaputizi nha yaza si yalizaga ndigwa, hamba si yang'wezaga divayi, nanye mukatya, Yena lukwale.
U Mwana wo Munhu nha yaza, yakulya no kung'wa, nanye mukatya, Langa ta munhu 'yu mubuguci, na mung'wa divayi, mwendece we watoweza kodi ne wanyo wubi!
Hamba nhavivyo, I mahala go Mulungu gejela vyono maswanu kuli wose wono wakugavumila.”
Mufalisayo yunji yakamusaka Yesu yalye ndigwa kwakwe. Nayo yakenjila mu nyumba ya yuyo Mufalisayo yakekala yalye ndigwa.
Na mwitumbi lilyo, mwali moyuli mucekulu yunji mono yali yena mikalile mibi. Nayo yaza kumanya vyono Yesu yali yekaye yakulya mu kaya yo Mufalisayo, yakaleta supa ya mafuta ge mhunjile swanu,
yakema behi na Yesu, yakulila, ne mahozi gakwe gakamusululila Yesu mu magulu. U Mucekulu yuyo yakayipata migulu ya. Yesu kwe zimvili zakwe. Yakamunonela muno migulu, yakawabaka ne mafuta gagalya.
U Mufalisayo yuyo mono yamucema Yesu, yaza kuziwona zizo, yakatya mu nhumbula yakwe, “Munhu ayu yali yawe muwizi, yali yamutanje mucekulu yuyu vyono yenha na vyono mubi.”
Yesu yakamutya yuyo Mufalisayo “Simoni nina nghani yo kukulonjela.” Nayo Simoni yakatya, “Lonje Mwijizi.”
Yesu yakatya “Kwali na wanhu wejete wono wali wamukopile munhu yumonga mapesa. Yunji yali yakopile silinje magana mahano, no muyagwe, silinje makumi mahano.
Waza kuwa wasina co kulipa, yuyo munhu yakawanenela wose vyono wejete. Ale, wa hayi muli wawa wejete, mono kocila kumwenda yuyo munhu mono yawakopesa zipesa?”
Simoni yakapitula yakatya, na lunji, yuyo mono yaneneywe nayo mugawa muwaha, yo komwenda muno munhu yuyo. Yesu yakamutya “Kulonga mbeka.”

Hanyuma yakamupitucila mucekulu, no kumutya Simoni, “Kumuwona ta mucekulu yuyu? Ane ninjila mu nyumba yako, malenga go kuzuguza magulu gangu, si wumheye ng'o. Ninga mucekulu ayu, kasuluziza mahozi gakwe mu magulu gangu no kugapata kwe zimvili zakwe.
Agwe si wunoneye; ninga ayu neza kwinjila, si yalecile kunonela muno magulu gangu.
Agwe si wumbacile mafuta mu mutwe: ninga ayu kambaka mafuta mu magulu gangu.
Holeka nghukutya, wendo wakwe wukulajila vyono, hamba yawe yali yena wubi winji, kanenelwa. Ninga wowose mono kanenelwaga nghani ndodo, yo kendaga hadodo.”
Yesu yakamutya u mucekulu, “Kunenelwa wubi wako.”
Na walya wono wali wekaye nayo ha ndigwa, wakanza kutya mu zinhumbula zawo “Yuyu yo nani mwene, mono yakusuma kunenela wubi?”
Nayo Yesu yakamutya u mucekulu, “Wihuwilo wako wukuponya; wubite wupolile.”
Hanyuma ya zizo, Yesu yakakola mu makaya na mu vitumbi, yakulonga no kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu. Na awalya we likumi na wejete wali wali hamonga nayo.
Hamonga ne wacekulu wanji wono Yesu yawaponya macisi ne zinhamwa zinji, nawo wali wali hamonga nayo. Wawo wo wa Malyamu mono (yacemwaga Magadalena,) muli yuyo galawa macisi mupunghati.
Na Yowana u mugolece wa Cuza u mwitumami mulongola wa Helode, na Susana, na wanji wenji. Wacekulu wawo wawetumamilaga Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe mu sawo yawo weneco.
Lipuga liwaha lye wanhu, wekongholaga, na wanhu wenji wakawa kumuziza Yesu wakulawa mu matumbi gose. Nayo yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici,
“U mumiza mbeyu yalawila kumiza mbeyu yakwe, na lono yamizaga, zinji zikalagala mu nzila; wakola nzila wakazikanyanjila, zindeje zikazilya.
Zinji zikalagala hono hogali mabwe, zikota ninga zikanyala, vyono zali zisina malenga.
Zinji zikalagala mu mabici ge mamivya, zikawilukana hamonga ne mamivya, gakazititiliza.
Zimbeyu zinji zikalagala mu muhangha muswanu, zikawiluka, zikalela mhece yigana.” Yaza kukondya kulonga zizo, yakalonga ne yizi yiwaha, yakatya “Holeka muhulice, hono mwina makutu.”
Ne wejizwa wakwe wakamuwuza Yesu nhunizo ye cihwanicizo cico.

Yakawatya, “Anye mupegwa kumanya zono zihundicigwe zo wutemi wo Mulungu, ninga kuli wanji, vyo si yinha. Langa wene walonjelwaga mu vihwanicizo, hono wakuwona, ho walece kuwona, na hono wakuhulika, ho walece kwizuka.”
Ale, ne nhunizo ye cihwanicizo cici nha yoyi. I mbeyu yo nghani yo Mulungu.
Zono zalagala mu nzila, zikulajila iwanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani, hanyuma Setani yakuza yakuyiwusa yiyo nghani mu zinhumbula zawo, ho walece kwihuwila no kupona.

Azilya zono zalagala hono hogali mabwe, zikulajila iwanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani no kuyibocela na nyemo. Ninga nha vyono zinha zimbeyu zizo, iwanhu wawo wakuwa wasina milela, wono wehuwilaga kwa cidaha du, na kolo wakujelwa, wakuwuya ne nyuma.

Na zono zalagala mu mabici ge mamivya, co cihwanicizo ce wanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani, ninga mu wujendelele wawo, wakuzinjilizwa ne mahwele ne zisawo, no wiyendeze we mikalile yiyi, nawo siwakulela mikalo yono yikangaye.
Nazo zono zalagala mu muhangha muswanu wo wanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani, no kuyikamisa kwa nhumbula swanu na ye cihuliko. Nawo wakulela mikalo mu wukangalile.
“Wanhu si wakolelezaga tala no kuyigubiciza, hamba kuyiwika mwi'vungu lye citanda; langa wayiwikaga ha wuwiko wayo, wanhu wono wakwinjila mugati, wawone wuzelu wayo.
Nghani yo yose yono hundikwe yolokwanzalikwa, na ze cinyele zolomanyika, no kulawila kuzelu.
Holeka mwiyihenje vyono mukuhulika. Hambi mono yena, nha kopegwa; na mono yasina, kosolelwa sunga na cono yakutya yena naco.”
Baho, u nyina ne wanduguze wa Yesu wakamuziza, ninga si wasuma kwiwona nayo so winji we wanhu.
Yesu yakalonjelwa, vyono u nyina ne wanduguze wali kunze, wakusaka kumuwona.
Ninga Yesu yakawalonjela wanhu wose, “Yaya ne wandugu zangu, wo walya wono wakuyihulika nghani yo Mulungu no kuyitumama.”
Kukawa mwizuwa linji, Yesu yakenjila mu ngalawa mwene ne Wejizwa wakwe; yakawatya, “Cilowoce ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba.” Wakatuluka.
Ninga lono wajendelelaga mu ngalawa, mwene Yesu yakebatwa na nhongo, yakagona. Likatima likukunzo yiwaha lye mbeho mwilamba: malenga gakawa kwanza kwinjila mu ngalawa, wakawa wali mu mbali mbaha.
Wejizwa wawalya wakamubitila Yesu, wakamusinhusa wakutya “Muwaha, Muwaha, ceza kufwa!” Yesu yakasinhuka, yakavitacila imbeho ne mawingo mawaha ge malenga, gakatula, hakanyamala twii.
Yakawatya i wejizwa wakwe “Wihuwilo wenyu wuli hayi 'mbi? Ninga wene wakezina no kogopa, wakeyitya, Alo munhuci yuyu, sunga i mbeho ne malenga yakuvilonjela, vinyamale, navyo vikumuhulika!”
Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wakajendelela no muhinzo wakafika mu yisi ya Wagelasene, yono vidomile na Galilaya ku nhumbi ye lilamba.

Nayo Yesu yaza kutima mu'si viketang'anila na munhu monga mono yali yena macisi, yakulawa mwi'kaya, u munhu yuyo mu vilo vinji si yavwalaga myenda, hamba si yekalaga mu kaya, langa yekalaga mu vitenjelo.
Yaza kumuwona Yesu, yakazoza, yakagwa hali mwene, yakabalaluka na lizi yiwaha yakatya, “Alo wina nghanici nase, Yesu go Mwana wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli Vyose? Nghukunena wulece kungaza.”

Hambi nha yalilajiliza licisi lilawanize muli munhu. Hambi nha lyamwibataga kenji. Hamba yiwe wanhu wamuwikaga mugati no kumuwopa ne vyuma; ninga yavidumulaga viwopelo kali kenji, ne licisi lilyo lyamuwinjilaga ku nyika.
Yesu yakamuwuza, litagwa lyako gwegwe nani? Yakatya litagwa lyangu nene “Mhuga,” vyono macisi menji gali gamwinjiye munhu yuyo.
Gago macisi gakamunena Yesu yalece kugalajiliza gawuce no kwajilila mwikombo lyono lisina mudumo.
Kwali ne 'tewa lya ngubi nyinji, likudima ha mwejelele we litunda. Ale gago macisi gakamunena Yesu yagakombole genjile muli zene. Nayo Yesu yakagakombola.
Imacisi gakalawa muli munhu, gakenjila mu zingubi, nazo zingubi zikavulumucila mwilamba, zikafwila mumo mu malenga.
I wadimi waza kuziwona zono ziweye, wakatiza, wakabita kuwalonjela wanhu wa mwi'kaya na mu'si.
Wanhu wakaza wazilanje zono ziweye; wakafika kuli Yesu, wakamuwona munhu mono yali yalavywa macisi, yavwalile myenda, yena ne mahala gakwe; yekaye ha magulu ga Yesu, wakogopa muno.
Nawo wono waziwona zizo, wakawaloloseza wanhu wawo vyono munhu yuyo yaponyigwe.
Ne wanhu wose we yisi ya Wagelasene wakebatwa no woga wuwaha, holeka wakamunena Yesu yawuce, yabite. Nayo Yesu yakenjila mu ngalawa, yakawuka.
Ninga u munhu mono yalavywa macisi, yakamunena viwezane nayo, ninga Yesu si yamulumba, langa yakamutya.
“Wuwuye kwenyu, wukalolose zimbaha zono Mulungu yakutendeye.” Yakabita, yakaganula hanhu hose mwi'kaya lilyo, zimbaha zono yatendelwa na Yesu.
Nayo Yesu yaza kuwuya ku nhumbi nzagwe ye lilamba, wanhu wenji wakamubocela na nyemo, hambi nha wamulindilaga wose.
Baho yakaza munhu, litagwa lyakwe Yayilo, nayo yali muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, yakagwa ha magulu ga Yesu, yakamunena yaze kwakwe;
hambi nha yali yena mwana wa cicekulu we ciwene, kotya wa myaka yikumi na myejete, nayo yali yeza behi no kufwa. Ninga Yesu lono yabitaga wanhu wenji wakamumemela.

Na mumo mwi'puga lye wanhu, mwali na mucekulu yunji mono yali yena wutamwa wo wuzaze we sakami myaka yikumi na myejete, [nayo hamba yawe yali yetumamila sawo yakwe yose mu waganga,] ninga hasina hamba yumonga mono yasuma kumuponya.
U mucekulu yuyo, yakaziza ku mugongo wa Yesu, yakapamiza limhembo lye civwalo cakwe, na hobaho du, u wuzaze wakwe we sakami wukaduma kamonga.
Yesu yakawuza, “Alo nani mono yamhamize?” Wakakana wose. Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Muwaha, wanhu wenji wakupilime no kukonyeceza.”
Ninga Yesu yakatya, “Ho yuli munhu mono yamhamize, hambi nha manyile vilungo vilawa muli nene.”

No mucekulu yaza wona vyono si kosuma kwihundika, yakelajila akuno yakucicima so woga, yakagwa hali Yesu, yakalolosa hali wanhu wose cono cilecile yakumupamiza Yesu, na vyono yakondya kuponywa kamonga.
Yesu yakamutya, “Go muhinza, wihuwilo wako wukuponya, wubite wupolile.”
Na lono Yesu yali yakali kulonga, Yayilo yakaletelwa nghani kulawa ku kaya kwakwe, vyono, “U mwanago yakondya kufwa, wulece kumugaza Mwijizi.”
Ninga Yesu yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakamulonjela Yayilo yakatya, “Wulece kogopa. Wihuwile du, nayo mwanago kopona.”
Yaza kufika kukaya ya Yayilo si yamukombola yunji wenjilane nayo, langa Petelo, na Yohana, na Yakobo, ne walezi wo muhinza yuyo du.
Wanhu wose, walilaga, ku soko yo mwana yuyo. Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Mulece kulila, hambi mwana nha siyafwiye, langa yagonile nhongo du.”
Nawo wakamuseka, hambi nha wali wamanyile vyono yafwiye.
Ninga Yesu yakamwibata muwoko, yakacema yakutya “Go muhinza winuce.”
Muhe wo muhinza wukamuwuyila, yakenuka kamonga, Yesu yakalajiliza wamupele ndigwa.
Walezi wakwe wakezina, ninga Yesu yakawalajiliza, walece kumulonjela munhu kuli zizo zono zijeye
Yesu yakawacemela hamonga we likumi na wejete, yakawapela vilungo no wulajilize muli macisi gose, no kuponya zinhamwa.
Yakawatuma kuganula zo wutemi wo Mulungu, no kuponya watamwa.
Yakawatya, “Lono mukubita, mulece kusola cocose, hamba nghome, hamba mufuko, hamba ndigwa, hamba mapesa, hamba mulece kuwa na kanzo nyejete nyejete.
Ne nyumba yo yose yono mokwinjila no kubocelwa, ale mwikalaje mumo du, sunga kolo mukuwuka mu citumbi cico.
Wanhu hono walece kumubocelenyi, muwuce mwi'kaya lilyo, na lono mukuwuka, mugakung'unhaje manghundi gono gali mu magulu genyu, gawe wuhomelezi kuli wene.”
Wakatuluka, wakakola mu vitumbi, wakaganula Luganuzi Luswanu, no kuponya watamwa hanhu hose.
Ale, Mutemi Helode, yazihulika zose zono zinozigwe; yakawa na mahwele, vyono wanji watezaga, Yohana kazuka mu wafu,
na wanji watezaga, Eliya kalawila, na wanji watezaga, vyono muyagwe ne wawizi we katali kazuka.
Ninga Helode yakatya, “Yuyu Yohana namudumula mutwe; alu kowa nani yuyo, mono nghuhulika zizi?” Yahilaga yamuwone Yesu.
Ne watumwa waza kuwuya, wakamuganulila Yesu zono wetuma zose. Nayo Yesu yakawasola wali wene, wakabita kwi'kaya lyono litezagwa Betesayida.
Ninga i wanhu waza kumanya kono yabitile, wakamutyatya: Yesu yakawabocela, yakawaganulila zo wutemi wo Mulungu, nawo wono wasakaga kuponywa, yakawaponya.

Ne lizuwa lono lyali lyeza lili behi no kugwila, wakaza we likumi na wejete, wakamutya, “Wuwelagaje wanhu wabite ku vitumbi na mu'si yono yipilime, wakalondole wugono ne zindigwa; hambi kuno nha cili mu nyika.”
Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Muwapele nyenye ndigwa walye.” Wakatya, “Ase cisina cinji, langa mikate mihano du na somba nyejete, lunji cibite co weneco cikawagulile ndigwa wanhu wawa wose!”
(Hambi nha wali walume kotya elufu yihano). Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe, “Muwalonjele wanhu wekale vipuga vipuga vya wanhu makumi mahano mahano.”
Wejizwa wakanoza nha vyono wakalonjelwa, wakawekaza wose.
Baho Yesu yakayisole mikate yiyilya mihano, ne zisomba zinyejete, yakagalamila ku wulanga, yakamulumbo Mulungu, yakavibegula, yakawapela wejizwa wakwe wawagawile wanhu.
Wakalya wose wakeguta; wakatondoleza i vibegulwa vyono vyasigala, wakamevya nhoto yikumi na nyejete.
Mwizuwa linji Yesu yalombaga yali wene, i Wejizwa wakwe wali wena nayo. Yakawawuza, “Alu wanhu wanhezaga nene nani?”
Wakapitula “Wakutya, Yohana u Mubaputizi, ninga wanji wakutya, yo gwegwe Eliya, na wanji wakutya, yumonga muyagwe ne wawizi we katali kazuka.”
Baho yakawawuza, “Ninga anye ma, munhezaga nene nani?” Petelo yapitula yakatya, “Kilisito wo Mulungu.”
Ninga Yesu yakawalajiliza walece kumulonjela yunji nghani yiyi, yakutya,
“U Mwana wo Munhu, si koleka kugazwa muno no kulemwa ne wanyamhala ne wakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, no kuwulagwa, ne lizuwa lye kadatu kozuka.”
Hanyuma yakawalonjela wanhu wose, “Yunji wowose hono yahile kuza munyuma yangu, yimunojeye yekapise mweneco, yadinghule musalaba wakwe vilo vyose, yanhyatye.
Hambi muli wose mono yakuhila kuyiponya nhumbula yakwe, yuyo yo koyajiliza; ninga muli wose mono koyajiliza nhumbula yakwe kusoko yangu, yuyo yo koyiponya.
Hambi munhu kotuga cambuzici, hono yatuje u wugoli wose wa mono yinze, ko kwiyajiliza hamba kwiyambuza mweneco?
Hambi muli wose mono kombonela soni nene ne zinghani zangu, nayo u Mwana wo Munhu kolomuwonela soni, yalaza kuziza mu nhojo yakwe, na yo Sogwe, na ye Wamalayika wono welile.
Ninga mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, howali wamonga wono wemile baha, wono si wofwa lono wakali si nawuwona wutemi wo Mulungu.”
Kukawa nha vilo munana vyapuluta, lono zali zakondya kulongwa zinghani zizi, Yesu yakawasola Petelo na Yohana na Yakobo, yakabitana nawo kwi'tunda, kulomba.
Na lono yalombaga, futa yo wusu wakwe yikapitula, ne vivwalo vyakwe vikawa vizelu, vikung'alala.
Na kumbe, wanhu walume wejete wakejela, wakalongana nayo, nawo wali wa Musa na Eliya,
wono wejela mu nhojo, wakawa kulongana nayo zo wufwe wakwe wono wofisilizizwa ku Yelusalemi.
Ale, Petelo, na wono wali hamonga nayo wali watimbile na nhongo, ninga wakenuka, wakayiwona nhojo yakwe, wakawawona na wawalya iwalume wejete wono wali wemile nayo.

Kukawa lono wawo walume wejete wawukaga, Petelo yakamutya Yesu, “Muwaha, viswanu vyono cili baha, cizenje vibanda vidatu; cimonga cako, cimonga ca Musa, cimonga ca Eliya.” I mbeka, Petelo yalongaga zizi, akuno hamba siyakumanya na cono yakulonga.
Na Petelo lono yalongaga zizi, ho baho baho likaza yivunde, likawagubika no mubeho: na waza kugubikwa ne livunde, i wejizwa wakogopa muno muno.
Lizi likalawa mwivunde, likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu muhagulwa wangu: mweze kumuhulika.”
Lizi lyaza nyamala, yakejela Yesu yali wene. Nawo i wejizwa wakanyamala, hamba kumulonjela yunji cinji vilo vivyo muli zono wawona.
Kukawa mitondo yaco, lono Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wadatu, watenenhukaga kulawa ku kulya kwi'tunda, yipuga yiwaha lye wanhu liketang'anila na Yesu.
Na munhu yunji wa mwipuga lilyo, yakabalaluka yakutya, “Gwe Mwijizi, nghukunena wumulanje mwanangu, mwanangu we ciwene.
Licisi limwibataga liwa munoza kawa kuzoza muno, kanyhi limupelaga cinzilisa, ne cifulo ciwa kumulawa mu mulomo. Nalyo lijendelelaga kumugaza muno, hamba kumulecela mbela.
Nane nghawanena wejizwa wako walilavye; hamba siwasuma kulilavya.”
Yesu yakapitula yakatya, “Anye waco mo lulelo lono lusina wihuwilo mono mwajiliye, alo cowa kwikalana nanye, no kumukangalilenyi sunga nili?” Hanyuma yakamulonjela yuyo munhu, “Mulete kuno mwanago.”
Ale, lono yuyo mwana yazaga kuli Yesu, licisi likamugwisa hasi. Ninga Yesu yakalitacila licisi lyavu, yakamuponya mwana, yakamupela sogwe.
Ne wanhu wose wakezina muno so vilungo viwaha vyo Mulungu. Ale, wawalya wanhu lono wezinaga so zose zono yetuma, Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe,
Muteje makutu genyu, muzikamise zinghani zizi: “U Mwana wo Munhu nha kolavywa mu mawoko ge wanhu.”
Ninga wene si wezuka nhunizo ye nghani yiyi, hambi nghani yiyi nha yali hundikwe kuli wene, ho walece kuyitanga; nawo wakogopa kumuwuza ze nghani yiyi.
I wejizwa wakawa kwiwanganila weneco wose, mono kowa muwaha kuciza wayagwe yo wa hayi.
Ninga Yesu yakagamanya mahweso gono gali mu zinhumbula zawo, holeka yakasola mwana mudodo, yakamuwika behi nayo,

Yakawatya. “Muli wose, mono komubocela mwana yuyu mudodo mwi'tagwa lyangu, yakumbocela nene: na muli wose mono yakumbocela nene, yakumubocela mono yanhuma, hambi u mudodo muno muli nyenye, nha yo muwaha wa wose.”
Yohana yakawacilila yakatya, “Muwaha, camuwona yunji yakulavizya macisi mwi'tagwa lyako; cikamulemeza, hambi nha si yakujendana na'se.”
Ninga Yesu yakamutya, “Mulece kumulemeza: hambi mono si yali cinyume nanye, ayo muyenyu.”
Kukawa, vilo vyo wunyasulilwe wakwe Yesu wo kubitila ku wulanga vyeza kusejelela, mwene Yesu yakawa yena yo wubita ku Yelusalemi.
Yakatuma watumwa walongole; wakabita, wakenjila mu citumbi cinji ce Wasamaliya, ho wamuwikanizize lukulu hanhu.
Ninga wanyawusi wa baho siwavumila kumubocela, vyono yali yadomile ku Yelusalemi.
Holeka i wejizwa wakwe, Yakobo na Yohana waza kuziwona zizo, wakatya. “Ati Muwaha, alu wendile cilonje moto wutime kulawa ku wulanga, wuwatakamize, [nha vyono yatenda Eliya]?”
Yesu yakapituka yakawatacila. [Yakatya, “Si mumanyile vyono winha muhe wenyu.”]
Yesu hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe wakawuka wakabita ku citumbi cinji.
Nawo lono wajendaga mu nzila, yunji yakamutya Yesu, “Nokutyatya kono wukubita kose.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Zinyhewe zina mamwina, ne zindeje za mucanyha zina manhuli, ninga Mwana wo Munhu yasina ho kuceha.”
Hanyuma, yakamutya yunji, “Wunhyatye.” Ninga yuyo yakatya, “Muwaha, wunghombole namule mbite nghamuzice sogo yangu.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Wuwalekaje wafu wazice wafu wawo; langa agwe wubite wukanze kuganula zo wutemi wo Mulungu.”
Na yunji nayo yakatya, “Nokutyatya Muwaha; ninga wamule wunghombole nghelaje wa mu nyumba yangu.”
Yesu yakamutya, hasina munhu mono yebate lisili lyo kulimila, kanyhi yalanje kunyuma, yuyo si yakwiliye mu wutemi wo Mulungu!
Hanyuma yayo Muwaha yakawahagula wanji makumi mupunghati na wejete, yakawatuma wejete wejete, walongole wabite mu vitumbi vyose na hanhu hose hono kobita mwene.
Yakawatya, “Ndudula yo mbaha, ninga wetumami wacefu. Holeka, mumulombaje munya mugunda, yawatume waduduzi mu mugunda wakwe.
Alu mubite, ninga mulanjilile, nghumutumenyi nyenye nhe zingholo zono zikubita haciligati ye maminzi.
Mulece kusola mufuko wa mapesa, hamba mufuko wo kulombela, hamba malatu: mulece kutaga cilejeho so kumulamusa wowose mu nzila.
Na mu kaya yo yose yono mokwinjila muwalamusaje nhavi, ‘Nyumba yiyi yeze yipolile.’
Na hono muwe moyali mwana wo mulamu, mulamu wenyu womwikalila; ninga hono hawe hasina, womuwuyilenyi nyenye kanyhi.
Mukekalaje mu nyumba yiyo, muwe kulya no kung'wa vyono womupelenyi; hambi mwitumami nha yanojeye yapegwe musahala wakwe. Mulece kubita kaya ayi na ayi.
Ne likaya lyo lyose lyono mokwinjila, hono wamubocelenyi, mulye vyono motenjelwa.
Mukawaponye watamwa wono wali mumo, mukawatye, ‘U wutemi wo Mulungu wumusejelelenyi.’
Ninga likaya lyo lyose lyono mokwinjila, hono si wakumubocelenyi, lawilenyi, mubite mu zinzila zayo mutye,
‘Sunga ne manghundi ga mwi'kaya lyenyu gono gacinamatiye mu magulu getu, cikumukung'unhilenyi nyenye, ho yiwe suguzi kuli'nye. Ninga mumanye vyono wutemi wo Mulungu wakondya kumusejelelenyi.’
Mbeka nghumutyenyi, mwizuwa lilya, likaya lilyo lyolotuga wulipicizwe wuwaha si nha Sodoma.”

“Woyi he nye kuli'gwe Kolazini! Woyi he nye kuli'gwe Betesayida! Hambi imapoto gono ganozwa mwenyu hono gali ganozwe mu Tulo na Sidoni, mhali wanhu wa kuko wavwale magunila, no kwikala mu mavu, wakulajila vyono wanena.
Hamba nhavivyo, mwi'zuwa lyo wuling'anizwe, anye molobocela wulipicizwe wuwaha muno, sinha we wanhu wa Tulo na Sidoni.
Nagwe Kapelanawumi wukuhila kwiyinula sunga ko ku wulanga? Ng'o ye, kovulumuswa sunga kono kowali wafu.”

Hanyuma yakatya, “Mono yakumuhulicizenyi nyenye, yakuhulika na nene. Na mono yakulema kumubocelenyi nyenye, yakulema kumbocela nene. Munhu wowose mono yakulema kumbocela nene, yakulema kumubocela mono yanhuma.”
Ale wawalya we makumi mupunghati ne wejete wakawuya wasangalaye, wakutya, “Muwaha, sunga ne macisi gali kucihulika lono cali kulitambula litagwa lyako.”
Mwene Yesu yakawatya, “Namuwona Setani yakugwa yakulawa ku wulanga kotya limuli.
Alenyi, nimupelenyi nyenye u wulajilize wo kukanyaga zinzoka ne zinje, no wulajilize wa muli vilungo vyose vya ayulya mulugu, hamba hasina cinji co cose cono comutamisenyi.
Hamba nhavivyo, mulece kusecelela vyono macisi gakumuhulicenyi; langa musecelele vyono matagwa genyu gandikwa ku wulanga.”

Mu cipango cico Yesu yakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile yakatya; “Nghukulumba, Gwe Baba, Mukala wulanga ne yinze, vyono kuzihundika zizi kuli we mahala no wizuce, wukawagubulila i wadodo, heya Baba, vyo yakwendeza gwegwe.”

Hanyuma yakatya, “Baba yaviwika vyose mu miwoko yangu, hamba hasina mono yamumanyile Mwana yo wa hayi, langa Baba, hamba mono yamumanyile Baba yo wa hayi; langa Mwana, na muli wose mono Mwana yakuhila kumugubulila zizo.”
Yakawapitucila wejizwa wakwe, yakawalonjela cinyele, “Wamoti wono wakuzilanga zono mukuzilanga nyenye.
‘Mbi mbeka wawizi wenji ne watemi, nha wasulumilaga kuziwona zono mukuziwona, ninga hamba si waziwona, kanyhi wazihulice zono mukuzihulika, ninga hamba si wazihulika.’ ”
Na yunji mwijizi wo Wulajilize yakema yakamujela Yesu, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, notenda wule ho niwutuje u wumi we cibitilila?”
Yesu yakamuwuza, “Ma, i Mandiko gakutya nhawule?” Kusomaga wule?

Nayo yakapitula yakatya, “Komwendo Muwaha Mulungu wako kwe nhumbula yako yose, na ko mutima wako wose, na kwe vilungo vyako vyose, na kwe mahala gako gose. Na kanyhi wumwende muyago nha vyono wiyendile go mweneco.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Kupitula viswanu. Ale, wuketume nhavivi, nagwe kowumipa.”
Ninga u mwijizi wo Wulajilize vyono yahilaga kwinoza muswanu, yakamuwuza Yesu, “U muyangu yo nani kanyhi.”

Yesu yakapitula yakatya, “Kwali na munhu yatenenhukaga yakulawa Yelusalemi yakubita ku Yeliko, yakamanyhilwa ne wahizi, wono wamuboka vinhu vyakwe, wakamutowanga, wakamuleka yagonile baho yali behi no kufwa.
Kukawa baho Mukohani yunji, nayo yakatenenhucila mu nzila yiyo; yaza kumuwona, yakamupuluta.
No Mulawi nayo nhavivilya, yaza kufika bahalya, yakamuwona, nayo yakamupuluta.
Ninga Musamaliya yunji, lono yajendaga, yakafika hono hoyali yuyo munhu. Nayo yaza kumuwona du, yakamuwonela lusungu.
Yakamusejelela behi, yakazibaka mafuta ne divayi zinghomele zakwe, no kuziwopa ne bandeji, yakamupandiza mu ndogowe yakwe, yakamuleta ku nyumba yo wuficilo we wajenzi, yakawa kumutamya.
Mitondo yaco yakalavya pesa dinali nyejete, yakamupela munya nyumba, yakatya, ‘Wumutamye yuyu, na muli vyose, cono kociziliza mu witumamile, ale, kolo nghuwuya nokugomolela.’ ”
Yesu yakamuwuza, “Muli wawa wadatu wa hayi mono yakulajila vyono yali muyagwe na ayulya mono yatowa ne wahizi?”
Mwijizi wo Wulajilize yakatya, “Yuyulya mono yamuwonela lusungu.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale, nagwe wubite wuketume nhavivyo.”
Ale, lono wajendaga, wakenjila mu citumbi cinji, na mucekulu yunji litagwa lyakwe Malita, yakawabocela ku nyumba yakwe.
Malita yali yena mwanakwawe mono yacemwaga Malyamu, yuyu yakekala behi na Yesu, yakuhuliciza zinghani zakwe.
Ninga Malita yepiganzaga na milimo minji. Malita yakamubitila Yesu, yakamutya, “Ati Muwaha, si wukuwona vyono vibi, hono mwanakwetu yakundeceleza nitumame nili wene? Ale wumutye yanhaze.”
Ninga Muwaha yamupitula yakatya, “Gwe Malita, Malita, nhawule wukwigaza no kwihwelela ku soko ya vinhu vinji,
ninga cono cikusakwa cinhu cimonga du; hambi Malyamu nha kehaga ligawo liswanu lyono si kosolelwa na munhu.”

Mwi'zuwa linji, lono Yesu yalombaga hanji, yaza kondya kulomba, yunji muyagwe ne wejizwa wakwe, yakamutya, “Muwaha cikukunena wucijize na sese kulomba nha vyono Yohana u Mubaputizi yawejiza iwejizwa wakwe.”
Yesu yakawatya, “Kolo mukulomba mweze kutya, ‘Baba, Itagwa lyako lyezwe, Wutemi wako wuze.
Wucipele vilo vyose ndigwa zetu, zono zikwiliye izuwa ne zuwa.
Wucinenele wubi wetu hambi na sese, nha ciwanenelaga wose wono wacisutizyaga. Kanyhi wulece kucitegula mu wujelwe.’ ”
Yakawatya, “Hambi nani wa muli nyenye mono kowa na mwendece wakwe, mono komubitila mu cilo mugati, yakumutya, ‘Mwendece, nghukulomba wunyazime mikate midatu;
hambi mwendece wangu nha kanyiziza kalawa muhinzo, nane sina ndigwa yo yose yo kumupela.’
Alu wihwesaje, hono mwendece wako yakupitule akuno yali kugati yawe kutya, ‘Wulece kungaza: mulango wakondya kudindwa, cigonile ne wanangu, sinosuma kwinuka nghupele!’ Yowa wule?
I mbeka, si kokwinuka yamupele vyono mwendece wakwe, langa ku soko yo wulombelombe wono si wukuduma wo munhu yuyo, kokwinuka yamupele vyono yakusaka.
“Nane nghumutyenyi: Lombenyi mopegwa; londolenyi nanye motuga; mukong'onhe nanye modigulilwa.
Hambi mono yakulomba nha yakupegwa; na mono yakulondola, yakutuga; na mono yakukong'onha, yakudigulilwa.
Mwana hono yamulombe sogwe somba, wulenyi, sogwe komupela nzoka hanhu ha somba?
Hamba hono yamulombe ligangha, komupela 'nje?
Hono anye mono muli wabi, mumanyile kuwapela wana wenyu vinhu viswanu, u sogo yenyu wa ku wulanga yo yacilile, kowapela Muhe Mono Yelile wono wakumulomba.”
Mwi'zuwa linji Yesu yalavyaga licisi lyono lyali limunozize munhu yumonga kuwa yali cibwibwi. Kukawa licisi lyaza kulawa, munhu yuyo yakawa kulonga; ne mapuga ge wanhu wakezina.
Ninga wayawo wakatya, “Kalavizyaga macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli u muwaha we macisi.”
Wanji wakamujela, wakasaka yawalajile citanjilo co wukombolwe kulawa ku wulanga.
Ninga mwene yaza kugamanya mahweso gawo, yakawatya, “Wutemi wowose wono witemanuye weneco mapuga mapuga gono gatemanuce, si wosuma kujendelela, nhavivilya ne zinyumba nazo, zimalikaga monga monga.
Nhavivyo na Setani nayo, hono yetemanuye mweneco, wutemi wakwe ho wokwima wule? Nhawule alu mukutya ti, ane ndavizyaga macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli?
Alu ane hono niwe nghulavizya macisi mu vilungo vya Belizebuli, i wana wenyu ma, wakuwa kulavizya mu vilungo vya nani? Holeka wawa wo waling'anizi.
Ninga hono niwe nghulavizya macisi mu vilungo vyo Mulungu, ale mumanye vyono wutemi wo Mulungu, wakondya kumuzizenyi.”
Munhu we vilungo, mono yewikanizize lukulu ne vitwalo vyakwe, kolo yakuyidima nyumba yakwe, zisawo zakwe zikwikala zili mutulano;
ninga hono yaze yunji mono yamucizize vilungo, yamutowe no kumusumiza, yakumuboka vitwalo vyakwe vyono yetumbiye, no kuvigawa vyose vyono yena navyo.
Mono si cili hamonga na nene ayo yali cinyume nane; nayo mono si cikongholanaga na nene, keyagazaga.
“Licisi lyavu kolo likuwingwa kulawa muli munhu, lijendajendaga mu nyika likulondola hanhu ho kuceha: kolo si likuhawona, likutya, ‘Nowuya ku nyumba yangu kono nalawilila.’
Na kolo likuwuya, likuyagana nyumba yiyo fwagulwe, kanyhi nozelezwe viswanu muno muno.
Hobaho likubita likusola macisi ganji mupunghati gono mabi muno kuciza lyeneco, gose gakubita kwinjila muli munhu yuyo, ne mikalile yo munhu yuyo, yikuwa mibi muno si nhe milongozi.”
Kukawa lono yalongaga zizi, u mucekulu yunji wa mwipuga lye wanhu, yakabalaluka ne lizi iwaha, yakamutya, “Yamotile, mucekulu mono yakulela, no kukosa.”
Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Heya, ninga wamoti muno wanhu wono wakuyihulika nghani yo Mulungu no kuyikamisa.”
Ne lipuga lye wanhu lyaza kucila kumuziza, Yesu yakawalonjela yakatya, “Lulelo lulu lubi; lulondolaga citanjilo; ninga si lopegwa citanjilo cocose, langa citanjilo ca Yona.
Nha vyono Yona yali citanjilo kuli wanhu wa Ninawi, ale nhavivyo no Mwana wo Munhu nayo kowa citanjilo kuli lulelo lulu.

U mutemi we cicekulu wa kutakama, kolokwima ha wuling'anizwe we wanhu wo lulelo lulu, nayo kololuwona vyono lwina masutya. Hambi mwene nha yaza kulawa kutali, yakaza yahulicize mahala ga Solomona; kumbe mono yamucizize Solomona, yali baha.
I wanhu wa Ninawi wolokwima ha wuling'anizwe wo lulelo lulu, nawo wololuwona vyono lwina masutya. Hambi wene nha wanena so wuganule wa Yona; na langa ta, mono yamucizize Yona yali baha.”
“Hasina munhu, lono yakoleleza tala, yakuyiwika kanyhi ha wuhundiko, hamba kuyigubiciza ne bakuli, langa wayiwikaga ha wuwiko wayo, wanhu wono wakwinjila mugati wawone wuzelu wayo.
Iliso lyako yo tala yo muwili wako, liso lyako hono liwe yitelevu, muwili wako wose wumemile wuzelu. Ninga liso lyako hono liwe yibi, no muwili wako wowa wumemile wutitu.
Ale wulanjilile wuzelu wono wuli muli gwegwe wulece kuwa wutitu.

Holeka hono u muwili wako wose wuwe wumemile wuzelu, na hawe hasina hanji hohose kanyhi hono hena wutitu, u muwili wuwo wowa wina u wumemelecele wo wung'alale, nha vyono tala yikukumulicila wuzelu wayo.”
Yesu yaza malila kulonga, Mufalisayo yunji yakamusaka yalye ndigwa kwakwe; nayo yakabita yakekala ha ndigwa.
Yuyo Mufalisayo yakezina kuwona vyono Yesu yakulya zindigwa si yamuye kwizuguza.
U Muwaha yakamutya, “Alu nye nyo Wafalisayo, mukwemaga cikombe ne sahani kunze yayo, ninga muli'nye mugati, mumemile wuhizi no wubi.
Nye nyo walele, u munoza ya kunze yo si munoza ya mugati kanyhi?
Muwapelaje waciwa vinhu vyono vili mugati; na vinji vyose, vyowa vili ling'ani kuli'nye.”

“Ninga woyi he nyo Wafalisayo! Hambi nha mulifyaga wanhu zaka, sunga na mu hati yose yo kutajila mu zindigwa, sunga na mu fwene, ne zimboga zinji, kuno mukuleka ling'ani no wendo wo Mulungu. Ninga zizi cinojele mwali muzitume hamba kuleka zinji.
Woyi he nyo Wafalisayo! Ku soko mwendile kwikala kumwande mu magoda matambule mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, ne milamu ye cogopo mu minadi.
Woyi he nye! Hambi nha mwinha vitenjelo vyono si vijelaga, ne wanhu wono wakuvikanyaga si wamanyile.”
Na yunji wa mu wejizi wo Wulajilize yakapitula yakamutya, “Mwijizi, hono wukulonga zizi, wukucitovula na sese.”

Yesu yakatya, “Woyi he nye, kanyhi na nyenye nyo wejizi wo Wulajilize! Hambi nha mukuwatwika wanhu mitegulo, yono si yikusumika kuwudinghule, na nyenye mo weneco, si mukusuma hamba kuyipamiza ne cidole cenyu, ho muwataze mitegulo yiyo.”
Woyi he nye, nha muzengaga vitenjelo vye wawizi, ne wasenyu wo wawawulaga.
Vyo mukuhomelela, kanyhi mukwilumvya ne metumo ge wasenyu, hambi wene nha wo wawawulaga wawo wawizi, nanye mukuzenga vitenjelo vyawo.
Ku soko yiyo kanyhi, mahala go Mulungu gakutya, “Nolowatumila wawizi ne watumwa; ninga wolowawulaga wayawo wanji, na wanji wolowagaza.”
Ho zisakwe muli lulelo lulu, zisakami ze wawizi wose zono zetika, vyono kwalawa mwamulizo we yinze;
ndawililo sakami ya Habeli sunga sakami ya Zekaliya, mono yawulajilwa haciligati ye cikumbicilo ne hanhu hono helile; heya nghumutyenyi 'nye, vyono u lulelo lulu lololipicizwa ku soko ye metumo mabi.
“Woyi he mo wejizi wo Wulajilize! Hambi nha mwawuhundika wufunguwo wo mulango we mahala, nyenye mo weneco si mwenjila, na wono wenjilaga mwawemila walece kwinjila.”
Yaza kuwuka kuko, wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo, wakanza kumutimvya muno, no kumusolasola yalonje nghani nyinji;
ho wamugwizize mu wulonje.
Baho lono wanhu maelufu menji wali wetang'anila, sunga wakawa kwikanyanjila, Yesu yakamula kuwalonjela wejizwa wakwe, “Musuje kuli cisase ce wafalisayo wo wukoci.
Ninga cocose cono cigubicizwe, cologubulwa, na cocose cono cihundikwe, c ololawila kuzelu.
Holeka muli zose zono mwalonjela kutitu, i wanhu wolozihulicila mu wuzelu, na zono mwepwepwelaga cinyele ne milango midinde, zolokwanzalicilwa mu matembe mucanyha.”
Nane nghumutyenyi anye mo wendece wangu, “Mulece kuwogopa wono wawulagaga muwili, na hanyuma yayo si wosuma kwituma cinji.
Ninga nghumulajilenyi mono yinojeye mumogope: Mogopenyi mwene, mono yena wulajilize wo kumutajilila munhu mu moto we gehena, kolo yakondya kuwulaga, heya ye, nghumutyenyi, Mumogopaje yuyo.
Yimanyice vyono vikobobole vihano, vigulwaga kwa sendi kumi, si nha vivyo? Ninga hamba cimonga Mulungu si kacisemwaga.
Ninga sunga ne zimwvili za mu mitwe yenyu mbalwe zose. Alenyi mulece kogopa, anye muvicizize vikobobole vinji.”
Nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, muli wose mono yakumvumilila hali wanhu, vyono wangu, Mwana wo Munhu nayo kolomuvumilila hali Wamalayika wo Mulungu, vyono munhu yuyo wakwe.
Ninga mono yakunghanila hali wanhu, nayo kolokanilwa hali Wamalayika wo Mulungu.
Na muli wose mono kolonga nghani yono kuli Mwana wo Munhu, konenelwa; ninga mono yakumutovula u Muhe Mono Yelile si konenelwa.
Na kolo wakumutegulenyi mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, na kuli wawaha, ne watemi, muze mulece kwihwelela molopitula nhawule, hamba mololonga ci.
Hambi u Muhe Mono Yelile nha kolomwijizenyi mu cipango cico zono mololonga.
Munhu yunji wa mwipuga lye wanhu, yakamutya, “Mwijizi, wumulonjele muwaha wangu cigawane zisawo zono yacilecela sogo yetu.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Gwe mwendece wangu, mwene mono yanheye niwe mulamuzi lunji mugawi muli nyenye, nani?”
Yakawatya wose, “Lanjenyi ta, mwiyikamisaje mu wusulumizi wose, hambi u wumi wo munhu nha si wutugaga mulamu ku soko yo winji we vinhu vyono yena navyo.”
Yakawalonjela cihwanicizo yakutya, “Kwali na mugoli yunji, mugunda wakwe wukafisa muno.
Yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe yakatya, ‘Alu 'mba notenda wule, hambi nha sina ho kuwika ndigwa zangu?’
Yakatya, Notenda nhavi, nogamwagula i madongha gangu, nzenje ganji mawaha, mo nowika wuhemba wangu wose, ne zisawo zangu.
Ho nowutya wumi wangu, ‘Go wumi, alu wina sawo nyinji yono yokukwila kwa myaka minji, alu wucehe, wulye, wung'we, wusangalale.’
Ningo Mulungu yakamutya, ‘Go mulele gwe, mu cilo cici du wumi wako nha wosolwa na zono wiwikanizize zowa za nani?’ ”
Yesu yakamalila ko wutya, “Ale, vyo yinha kuli munhu mono yakwiwicila sawo ku soko yakwe mweneco, nayo si mugoli kuli Mulungu.”
Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe, “Ku soko yiyo holeka nghumutyenyi anye. Mulece kwihwelela so ndigwa yono molya ho mwikale womi, hamba so myenda yono mosaka so miwili yenyu.
Hambi wumi nha wucizize zindigwa, no muwili wucizize vivwalo.
Nha vyono mahowe, si gahadikaga, hamba kududula, gasina madongha hamba nyumba, nayo u Mulungu kagalisaga: ko muno anye muzicizize zindeje!
Nani 'mbi muyenyu, hono yawe kwihwelela, mono kosuma konjeleza vilo vyo wumi wakwe?
Ale hono anye si mukusuma kuyinoza nghani ndodo nha yiyo, so cici mukwihwelela zinji?
Mulanje maluwa vyono gotaga, si getumaga cinji, hamba kubota; ninga nghumutyenyi, sunga na Solomona mu nhojo yakwe yose, si yali yavwalile vyono linha liluwa limonga liyagwe na gaga.
Ninga u Mulungu hono yagavwice nhavivyo mahanze ga mu mugunda, gono gali baha izuwali, ne mitondo gowa kutagwa mu moto; si kocila 'mbi kumuvwicenyi nyenye? Anye wo wihuwilo wucefu!
Holeka mulece kugazika mu mahala genyu, akuno mukuhangawicila cono molya, hamba cono mong'wa.
Hambi zizi zose nha zo wakuzigazicila i wanhu wono si wamumanyile Mulungu, ninga Sogo yenyu nha yamanyile vyono mukuvisaka i vinhu vivi.
Langa, mwamule muwulondole wutemi wo Mulungu, na zizo zose mokonjelezwa.
“Mulece kogopa anye mo cipuga cidodo, hambi Sogo yenyu nha yendile kumupelenyi wutemi.

Muguze zisawo zenyu zose zono mwina nazo, muwapele i zipesa waciwa, mwinozeze mifuko yono si yisakalaga, mwiwicile sawo ya ku wulanga kono si yilacepuka. Kono si kasejelelaga muhizi, hamba makuni si gahodangaga.
Hambi hono hoyili sawo yako, nhavivyo no mutima wako nawo wowa wuli baho.
“Mweze mwiwikanize muli yoyose yono yokwijela, ne misipi yenyu yeze miwope mu viwino, ne zitala zenyu ziwe kwaka;
nanye muwe nhe wanhu wono wakumulindila mutwa wawo, kolo yakuwuya kulawa mu zindigwa ze halusi; kolo yakuza yakukong'onha, ho wamudigulile lwa kamonga.
Wowa wamoti wetumami wawo wono mutwa wawo kolo yakuza, yakuwagana wekaye meso, mbeka nghumutyenyi, yuyo mutwa wawo, kokwiwopa musipi mu ciwino, kowekaza wene ha zindigwa, no kuwetumamila.
Hambe nha mu cilo mugati, hamba yiwe hakali mitondo muno behi no wusiku kwela, hono yawagane wali nhavivilya, wo wamoti wetumami wawo.
Ninga yiyi mumanye vyono, hono munya kaya yali yamanye mazizo go muhizi, yali yekale meso, hamba si yali yayilece kaya yakwe yibenwe.
Holeka na nyenye mwiwikanizaje, hambi Mwana wo Munhu nha kokuziza mwipango lyono si muganicize.”
Petelo yakamutya, “Muwaha, cihwanicizo cici wukucilonjela sese du, hamba wanhu wose?”
U Muwaha yakatya, “Nani 'mbi u mwitumami mwihuwilwa kanyhi we mahala? Yo yulya mono mutwawe komuwika yawe mwitumami mu nyumba yakwe, ho yawagawile ndigwa mu cidaha cono cikwiliye?”
Mumoti mwitumami yuyo, u mutwawe kolo yakuza hono yamwagane yakunoza nhavivi.
Mbeka komulecela yayilanjilile i sawo yakwe yose.
Ninga mwitumami yuyo hono yatye mu nhumbula yakwe, “U mutwa wangu yakutinya kuwuya.” Nayo yakwamula kuwatowa wetumami we cilume na we cicekulu, no kulya no kung'wa no kugala wujimbi,
u mutwawe kokuza mwi'zuwa lyono si yakulanjilila, na mwi'pango lyono si yamanyile, nayo mutwawe kumukunanga muno, no kumuwika mwi'gawo limonga na wono si wehuwiye.
Ninga mwitumami yuyo mono yali yamanyile wuhile wo mutwawe, nayo si yewikanize kwituma zo wuhile wo mutwawe, yuyo kotowa muno muno,

ninga mono si yali yamanyile yono yimonojeye yetume, nayo ketuma zono zinojeye wulipicizwe, yuyo kotowa hadodo. Mono yapejigwe vinji, vyosakwa vinji, nayo mono wamukoza vinji muno, wolosaka vinji kuciza kuli mwene.
“Naza kwasa moto kono'nze, nane nghusaka wuwe wakondya kukolela.
Nina wubaputizo wono yinojeye niwubocele; alu mwene vyono nghugazika sunga niwufisilize!”
Mulece kwihwesa 'mba naza kuleta mulamu kononze? Hamba hadodo, si mulamu, langa witemanuce.
Ku wulawa lulu, wowa mu nyumba monga wanhu wahano, wokwitemanuka, wadatu kuli wejete, wejete kuli wadatu.

Wolokwitemanuka, sogo yo munhu no mwanagwe we cilume, no mwana we cilume no sogwe; nyina yo munhu no mwanagwe we cicekulu, no mwana we cicekulu no nyina; mukwewe we cicekulu no mugolece wo mwanagwe, no mugolece wo mwana no mukwewe we cicekulu.
Yesu yakagatya mapuga ge wanhu, “Kolo mukuwona livunde likulawa kumwezi, lwa kamonga mukutya, mvula yikuza.” Na mbeka yikutonya.
Na lono mukuwona mbeho ya kutakama yikuputa, mukutya, “Lizuwa lyo walika muno.” Na vyo yikuwa.
Nye mo wakoci, mumanyile kutanga ivitanjilo vye yisi no wulanga, ninga so cici lo si mukusuma kumanya nhunizo ye vidaha vivi?
“So cici si mukusuma kumanya nyenye mo weneco, ya hayi yono yinojeye?

Ku soko mono yakukusitaka, lono yakukutegula kuli mahakama, yowa yili ciba kuli'gwe, hono mwilumbanize nayo lono mukali mu nzila; ho yalece kukutegula ha mwande ya hakimu, nayo hakimu yakutegule kuli musilikale, no musilikale yakutajile mu jela.
Nghukulonjela, sikolawaniziza lukulu kuko, sunga kolo kukondya kulipa sendi ye ndumilizo ye fayini yako.”
Madaha gago, kwali kowali wanhu wanji wono wamulonjela Yesu ze wanhu wa ku Galilaya, wono Pilato yawawulaga mu cipango cono wawulagaga mitugo yawo ye makumbiko.
Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Alu mukuwona Wagalilaya wawo wali wabi muno kuciza Wagalilaya wose, vyono watamiswa nhavivyo?
