Nghumutyenyi, ng'o, ye; ninga na nyenye hono mulece kunena, molofwa wose nhavivyo.
Hamba wanhu walya we likumi na munana wono wagwilwa no munala ku Silowami, wakawulagwa, mukuwona wawo wali wabi, wacizize wose wono wekaye ku Yelusalemi?
Nghumutyenyi, ng'o, ye, ninga nanye hono mulece kunena, molofwa wose nhavivyo.”

Hanyuma Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici. “Munhu yunji yali yena mukuyu muhadikwe mu mugunda wakwe; u munhu yuyo yakabita yakusaka kuhepa mikalo mu mukuyu wuwo, ninga yakawagana wukali si nalela hamba hadodo.
Yakamutya u mulindiliza mugunda, langa ta, myaka yiyi midatu, nizaga ho hepe mikalo mu mukuyu wuwu, hamba kuyiwona ng'o, ale wutemangaje; so cici lo wukwidawalila muhangha bwete?”
Nayo yakapitula yakamutya, “Muwaha, wuwulekaje kanyhi mwaka 'wu, niwuzuwile, niwukupile ne suji;
nawo hono wulele mikalo hanyuma, viswanu; ninga hono wulece kulela, langa ho kowutemanga.”
Yesu yakawa yakwijiza mu nhang'anilo yinji yo wuhembelo, mwizuwa lye Sabato.
Baho hali na mucekulu mono yali mutamwa myaka yikumi na munana, yali yena licisi lyavu lyono lyali limwinjiye, na ku soko yiyo, u muwili wakwe yali yekunyile, hamba siyasumaga kugoloka hamba nhavi.
Yesu yaza kumuwona yakamucema, yakamutya, “Yaya, waponywa wutamwa wako.”
Yakamuwicila miwoko yakwe; lo lulo lulo muwili wakwe wukagoloka, yakamulumbo Mulungu.

Ninga u muwaha we nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo yakasimba, vyono Yesu yamuponya u mucekulu yuyo mwi'zuwa lye Sabato, na ho baho yakawa kuwalonjela wanhu wono wali wekonghoye baho, yakutya, “Ko vili vilo mutandatu vyo kwitumila mulimo, holeka mu vilo vivyo, mweze kuza kulagulwa, langa mwizuwa lye sabato ng'o.”
Ninga Muwaha yakamupitula, yakatya, “Nye mo wakoci, ma, muli nyenye, moyuli yunji mono si katulusaga ng'ombe yakwe hamba ndogowe yakwe, no kuzing'wesa mwizuwa lye sabato?
Alu yuyu, nayo mwana wa Abulahamu, mono Setani yali yamulemaze mu myaka yiyi yikumi na munana, wulenyi, si vyali viswanu kumuponya mu wutamwa wakwe wuwo mwizuwa lye Sabato?”
Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, walugu wakwe wakapuwa wose; ne wanhu wose wakasecelela, ku so zinghani ze lilumbo zose, zono zetumwa no mwene.
Yesu yakawuza; Uwutemi wo Mulungu winha wule? Nowihwananiza na cici?
Wihwanile ne mhece ya Haladali, yono munhu yunji yakayisola, yakayihadika mu mugunda wakwe, yikacindika, yikawiluka, wukawa mubici, ne zindeje za mucanyha zikazenga i manhuli gazo mu manhambi gayo.
Kanyhi yakawawuza, “Nowuling'aniza na cici U wutemi wo Mulungu?
Wihwanile ne cisase cono yasola mucekulu yunji, yakacihanza hanza mu wusaje we 'debe limonga, sunga wose wukatumba.”
Yesu yakajendelela no muhinzo wakwe yakubita ku Yelusalemi kuno yakukolela mu makaya na mu vitumbi, yakuganula.
Munhu yunji yakamuwuza; “Ati Mwijizi, alu wono wakupona wacefu?”
Yesu yakawatya, Muhidimbale kwinjila mu mulango mufinyu, hambi nha nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono wenji wojela kwinjila, ninga si wosuma.

Cipango cokuza, cono munya kaya kokwinuka, no kudinda mulango, nanye molokwanza kwima kunze, no kukong'onha ha mulango, mukutya, “Muwaha, wucidigulile mulango.” Nayo kolopitula yawe kumutyenyi, “Si nghumumanyenyi kono mulawile!”
Nanye mokwanza kumulonjela, mukutya, “Ase yo sese mono calizaga no kung'wa hamonga nagwe, nagwe wejizaga mu vitumbi vyetu.”
Nayo kolotya, “Nghumutyenyi, simanyile kono mulawile; muwuce hono mwande yangu, anye wose mono mwitumaga zo wubi.”
Kuko kolowa cililo no kugwezula meno, baho mulaza wawona Abulahamu, Isaka na Yakobo ne wawizi wose, wali mu wutemi wo Mulungu, ninga anye mukutagwa kunze!
Wanhu wolokuza wakulawa kucilima na kumwezi, kusumuka na kutakama, wokuza no kwikala ha zindigwa mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
Na lanjenyi ta, kowali wa munyuma wono wolowa walongozi, na kowali walongozi wono wolowa wa munyuma.
Mu cipango cico Wafalisayo na wanhu wanji wakamuziza Yesu, wakumutya, “Wuwuce baha wubite hanhu hanji: hambi Helode nha yakuhila kukuwulaga.”
Yesu yakawatya “Bitenyi nye mukalilonjele licewe lilyo. Langa ta, izuwali ne mitondo, nghulavya macisi no kuponya watamwa, ne lizuwa lye kadatu nowa nayikondeleza i milimo yangu.”
Hamba nhavivyo izuwali, ne mitondo ne cilawu, yinojeye njendelele no muhinzo; hambi nha si yinojeye muwizi yawulajilwe kunze ya Yelusalemi.

“Yelusalemi! Gwe Yelusalemi! Kuwawulagaga wawizi, no kuwatowa na mabwe wono wakutumwa kuli'gwe! Kalinga nali kuhila kuwakongholela wanago hamonga, nha vyono nghuku yikunyanjilaga viziyoziyo vyayo mu mabawa gayo, ninga walemaga?
Lanje ta i Nyumba yo Mulungu wako yolekwa. Heya, mbeka, nghumutyenyi, Si molombona ng'o sunga kolo mukutya, ‘Yo mumoti mono yakuziza mwitagwa lyo Muwaha.’ ”
Mwizuwa linji lye Sabato, Yesu yakenjila kulya ndigwa, mu nyumba ya yumonga muyagwe ne wawaha we Wafalisayo, wanhu wono wali wali baho wakawa wakumulanjilila.
Ale, hali Yesu, hali hoyuli yunji mono yali yena wutamwa wo kuvimba muwili.
Nayo Yesu, yakawawuza wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wafalisayo yakutya, “Wulenyi, yili mwiko kumuponya munhu mwizuwa lye Sabato hamba ng'o?”
Ninga wene hamba siwapitula cinji. Yesu yakamwibata mutamwa, yakamuponya, yakamukombola yabite.
Hanyuma yakawatya, “Nani lu wa muli nyenye mono yena mwanagwe lunji ng'ombe, hono yigwile mwi'sima, mono si koyinimula kamonga mwizuwa lye Sabato?”
Nawo hamba siwasuma kumupitula kanyhi kuli zizi.
Yesu yakawawona wawalya wono walalikwa, vyono wakwihaga magoda matambule, yakawalonjela cihwanicizo, yakuwatya.
“Hono wucemwe na munhu ku ndigwa ze halusi, wulece kwikala mwigoda litambule; lunji kowa mono yena lilumbo yakucizize agwe, mucemwe nayo,
na kolo munya kaya yakuza yakutye, ‘Wumutelele ayu.’ Ale ho kokwanza kuwona soni kwikala mwigoda lya kunyuma.
Ninga hono wucemwe, wubite wukekale mwigoda lya kunyuma, kolo yakuza munya kaya, yakutye, ‘Wayiko, sejelele kono mwande,’ baho ho kowa ne lilumbo ha meso ga wose wono mwikalane.
Hambi muli wose mono yakwikumya mweneco, nha konyetywa, nayo mono yakwinyetya, yo kokumywa.”

Hanyuma Yesu yakamulonjela na yuyo mono yali yamucemile, “Kolo wukwitumama ndigwa ze misi lunji ze mihe, wulece kuwacemela wendece wako, hamba wanduguzo, hamba we cimanyi, hamba wagoli wayago; ku soko nawo wokucemela kanyhi, nagwe kowa wahalizwa.
Ninga hono witumame ndigwa nyinji, wuwacemelaje waciwa, na we vilema, na wono wakusenzegula, ne wabofu;
nagwe kolugutizwa, hambi nha wasina vyo kukuhaliza; nagwe kolohalizwa no Mulungu ha wuzuce wa we ling'ani.”
Na yunji muyagwe na wono wali wekalane na Yesu ha ndigwa, yaza kuhulika zizi, yakatya, “Yo mumoti mono kololya ndigwa mu wutemi wo Mulungu.”
Yesu yakamupitula, “Munhu yunji yanoza ndigwa nyinji za cinyamihe; yakawalalika wanhu wenji.
I cipango co kulila zindigwa caza kufika, yakatuma mwitumami wakwe yawalonjele wono walalikwe waze, hambi nha vyakondya vyose.”
Wakanza wose yumonga yumonga kulavya vikojelo. Umulongozi yakamulonjela u mwitumami yakatya, “Ngula mugunda, na yinojeye mbite nghawulanje; nghukunena wundece.”
Yunji yakatya, “Ngula ng'ombe yikumi za kulima, alu nghubita kuzijela, nghukunena wundece.”
Na yunji yakatya, “Nhola mucekulu, holeka sinokuza.”

U mwitumami yulya yakawuya yakamulonjela zizi munya kaya. Baho munya kaya yakebatwa ne likuwo, yakamutya mwitumami wakwe, “Wulawanize mbela wubite mu zinzila zimbaha ne zindodo za mwi'tumbi, wukawalete kuno waciwa, na we vilema, ne wabofu, na wono wakusenzegula.”
Hanyuma u mwitumami yakatya, “Muwaha zose zono wulonjile, zanozwa zakondya, ninga hakali hocili cilejeho.”
U muwaha yuyo yakamutya mwitumami, “Wulawanize wubite mu mapalilo na mu mawimbi wukawadindimize wenjile, nyumba yangu ho yimeme.
Hambi nha nghumutyenyi, hasina hamba yumonga wa muli wawo wono walalikwe, mono kolojeza ndigwa yangu.”
Ale, baho mapuga mawaha ge wanhu, wakabitana na Yesu. Nayo yakawapitucila yakawatya.
Munhu wo wose mono yakuza kuli nene, si kowa mwijizwa wangu, langa sunga yawe yanyendile nene si nha vyono yawendile u sogwe, no nyina, ne walumbuze, heya, sunga no wumi wakwe mweneco.
Munhu mono siyakudinghula musalaba wakwe mweneco, no kunhyatya nene, si kosuma kuwa mwijizwa wangu.
Hambi nani muli nyenye, mono yakuhila kuzenga Munala, mono si kokwamula kwikala yawale cifo cayo, ho yamanye hono yena nazo zo kuwukondelezeza?
Ho yilece kuwa lunji kolo yawusimya musinji, hamba kuwukondeleza. Wanhu womuseka,
wakutya; “Munhu ayu yanza kuzenga, ninga si yasuma kukondeleza.

“Hambi mutemici, mono kosaka kubita kwihoma no Mutemi muyagwe, mono si kokwamula kwikala yehwese. Mwene yena wasilikale elufu yikumi, hono kosuma kwihoma na yulya mono yena wasilikale elufu makumi mejete?
Hono yawone si kosuma, kotuma wetumami wakwe yakalondole mulamu, lono mutemi yuyo yunji yakali kutali.”
Yesu ho yakawa malila yakutya, “Ale nhavivyo na muli nyenye, mono si yakuleka vyose vyono yena navyo, sikosuma kuwa mwijizwa wangu.”
“Mwino muswanu; ninga mwino weneco hono wuwe wususulice, wogomolezezwa nhawule ndaso yayo?
Si wukwiliye kanyhi hamba mu mugunda, hamba kuwa mboleya bwete langa wawutagaga du kunze caka. Holeka muhulice, hono mwina makutu!”
Izuwa linji watoweza kodi ne wahodanji wenji, wakabita kumuhuliciza Yesu.
Wafalisayo na wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakanza kung'ung'ulika wakutya, “Lanjenyi ta munhu ayu! Yakuwabocela wanyo wubi no kuhanga nawo mu zindigwa.”
Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici yakutya:
“Mwene, munhu hono yawe yena ngholo yigana, na hono yajilize monga, kanozaga wule? Kozileka azilya makumi cenda ne cenda kwidimo, yabite yakayilondole yono yajiliye, sunga yayiwone.
“Na kolo yayiwona, yakuyiwegala mu mawega gakwe yasangalaye.
Nayo kolo yakuwuya kwakwe, yakuwacema wendece wakwe ne wayagwe, yakuwatya, ‘Cisangalalane nane, hambi nha niyiwona ngholo yangu yono yali yajiliye.’
Ale, nghumutyenyi, kowa nyemo nhavivyo ku wulanga so munhu mubi monga mono yakunena, si nha awalya wanhu makumi cenda ne cenda wono wakiwona wali ling'ani wono si wakusaka kunena.
“Hamba mukuwona wule! Lunji mucekulu mono yena silinje yikumi, na hono yajilize monga, konoza wule? Kokoleleza tala, no kufwagula nyumba, no kusakula sakula sunga yayiwone.
Nayo kolo yakuyiwona, yakuwacema wendece wakwe ne wayagwe, yakutya, ‘Cisangalalane nane, hambi nha nayiwona silinje yangu yono nali nyajilize.’
Ale, nghumutyenyi, vyo wosangalala wamalayika wo Mulungu, ku soko yo munhu monga munyo wubi mono yakunena.”
Yesu yakajendelela kulonga yakutya, “Kwali na munhu yunji, yali na wana walume wejete.
U mudodo yakamutya sogwe, ‘Baba wungawile ligawo lye sawo lyono nohalila.’ Nayo sogo yawo yakawagawila sawo yakwe.
Hanyuma ya vilo vicefu, u mwana mudodo yakawa kuguza u wuhazi wakwe, yakatuluka ne zipesa zakwe zono yazituga, yakabita yisi yinji ya kutali, kono yeyagaziza sawo yakwe mu mikalile mibi.
Nayo yaza malila lukulu vyose, kukawa nzala mbaha ku yisi yiyo, yakanza kugaya.
Yakalomba mulimo kuli munhu yunji wa mu yisi yiyo, nayo yakamutegula ku migunda yakwe yakadime magubi.
Nayo yasulumilaga yegutye yinda yakwe ne salagunga yono galizaga magubi; hamba yunji si yamupela cinji co kulya.
Ninga yaza kukumbucila, yakatya, ‘Mwene, wetumami wa baba nha wenji, wono wakwiguta zindigwa wakusigaza, nane nghufwa kuno ne nzala!
Nobita kuli baba, nimulonjele, nitye, Baba, nimusutizyo Mulungu, nghusutizya na gwegwe nhavivyo.
Si nojeye kanyhi kucemwa mwanago. Wunozaje niwe nha yunji muyagwe ne wetumami wako.’
Ale, yakawa kwanza u muhinzo wo kuwuya kuli sogwe. Nayo lono yali yakali kutali, u sogwe yakamuwona, yakamuwonela lusungu, yakamumanyhilila, yakamulamusa ko kumukumbatila, no kumunonela muno.
Nayo mwana yakamutya sogwe, ‘Baba, nimusutizyo Mulungu, nghusutizya na gwegwe nhavivyo. Sinojeye kanyhi kucemwa mwanago.’
Ninga usogwe yakawatya wetumami wakwe. ‘Letenyi mbela mwenda muswanu mumuvwice; muvwicenyi nyamwidole ne malatu.
Muwulaje ne ng'ombe yono yijinile cinoze sikukuu, cilye, cisangalale.
Hambi yuyu mwanangu nha yali nha yafwiye, kumbe mumi, yali yajiliye, ninga alu kejela.’ Hobaho wakawa kwanza kuyinoza sikukuu.
“Mwipango lilyo, u muwahawe yali yakali ku mugunda. Lono yawuyaga, yaza kusejelela behi ne kaya, yakahulika ng'oma no wuvina.
Yakamucema yunji muyagwe ne wetumami, yakamuwuza yakutya, ‘Alo ko cilici?’
Mwitumami yuyo yakamutya, ‘Mwanakwenyu kawuya, no sogo kamuwulajila ng'ombe yono yijinile, vyono yamuboceye yapolile, kanyhi mutelevu.’
“Yuyo muwahawe yakakolwa ne likuwo, hamba si yenda kwinjila na mu kaya. Nayo sogwe yakalawila kunze, yakamuneneleza yenjile.

Ninga mwene yapitula yakamutya sogwe, ‘Kumbucile baba, vyono myaka yiyi yose nghwitumamilaga, hamba nghali si nabeza malajilizo gako, ninga wumhelile cici? Wukali namhela hamba cipene cidodo vivi, ho noze nane sikukuu ne wendece wangu.
Ninga yeza kuza du mwanago ayu, mono yalya sawo yako hamonga ne wasenyha, kuwa kumuwulajila ng'ombe yono yijinile.’
U sogwe yakamutya, ‘Mwanangu, agwe nha cikalanaga nane nhondo zose, na vyose vyono nina navyo nha vyako.
Ninga yali yicinojeye cinoze sikukuu no kusangalala; hambi ayu mwanakwenyu, nha yali kotya yafwiye, kumbe mumi; yali yajiliye ninga alu yejela.’ ”
Yesu yakawalonjela wejizwa wakwe, “Kwali na munhu yunji mugoli, mono yali yena mwitumami wakwe; yuyo mwitumami yakasonjezwa vyono yakwitumamila caka sawo yo mugoli.
Nayo mugoli yakamucema, yakamutya, nghanici yiyi yono hulice muli gwegwe?” Ale wulavye liwalo lya vyono kubocelaga, na vyono kwitumamilaga mu sawo yangu, hambi nha si kosuma kuwa kalani kanyhi.
Mwitumami yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe, alu muwaha wangu yeza kumbusa mu mulimo wo wukalani, alu nonoza cici? Vilungo vyo kulimila sina; ku wilombelezi nako kotya nili muciwa, yo nghani ya cevu.
Aa! Alu namanya vyono notenda, kolo nawuswa mu mulimo, wanhu ho wanyhemele mu zinyumba zawo.
Ale, yakawacema we migawa yo mutwawe wose, yakamutya mulongozi, “Wukuzijilwaci no mutwa wangu?”
Nayo yakatya, “Mapipa yigana limonga ga mafuta ga alizeti.” Kalani yakamutya, “Sola ceti cako co mugawa, wikale mbela wandice makumi mahano.”
Yaza kondya, yakamutya yunji, “Agwe ma nagwe, wukuzijilwaci?” Nayo yakatya, “Magunila yigana limonga ga wuhemba.” Kalani yakamutya, “Sola ceti cako co mugawa, wandice makumi munana.”
Yuyo muwaha, yakamukumya yuyo mwitumami mono si mwihuwilwa, vyono yanoza ko wusugu. Hambi wanhu wa kononze yiyi, nha wasugu muno kuli zawo si nhe wanhu wo wuzelu.
Nayo Yesu yakajendelela kutya. “Nane nghumutyenyi, Mwinozeze wayendi wayenyu mu wulawa mu zisawo zimbi za mononze, kolo yikumalika, ho wamubocelenyi ku wikalo we cibitilila.”
Wo wose mono kowa mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo muno, yo kowa mwihuwilwa na mu nghani mbaha, na wo wose mono si mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo, si kowa mwihuwilwa mu nghani mbaha.
Ale, hono si muli wehuwilwa mu zisawo zimbi za mononze, nani 'mbi mono komukozenyi zisawo ze mbeka?
Na hono mukali nawa wehuwilwa mu sawo yono si yenyu, yo nani mono komukozenyi i zisawo ze mbeka?

“Hasina mwitumami mono kosuma kuwetumamila watwa wejete, ku soko, lunji komusula yumonga na kumwenda muyagwe, hamba komuhulika yuyo yumonga no kumubedegala u muyagwe. Holeka si mosuma kumwitumila u Mulungu ne sawo.”
Ninga Wafalisayo wali weza kuzihulika zizo zose, vyono wene wali wendile muno sawo, wakamubedegala Yesu.
Nayo yakawatya, “Anye mwinozaga muli waswanu ha meso ge wanhu, ninga Mulungu yo yazimanyile zinhumbula zenyu, hambi cono cijelaga cina lukumyo hali wanhu, Mulungu yakuciwona nha takataka du.”

U Wulajilize ne mandiko ge wawizi, vyali vili baho, sunga mwidaha lya Yohana u Mubaputizi, vyono wulawa lululya u Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu lukuganulwa, no munhu wo wose yakuwinjila kwe vilungo.
Ninga kupelu wulanga ne yinze kuwumalice, si nha lwandiko lumonga lwa mu Wulajilize kupatwa.
Muli wose mono yakumuleka mugolece wakwe, no kutola yunji, yakusenyha, nayo mono yakumutola mono yapejigwe talaka no mulume wakwe, nayo yakusenyha.
Ale, kwali na munhu yunji mugoli, yavwalaga myenda yo wuguzi wukamu muno, myenda ye liwala lyo lugandu na bafuta swanu. Yekalaga yakumota vilo vyose.
Hali ho yuli muciwa yunji, litagwa lyakwe Lazalo, mono yali yena vilonda mu muwili wose, nayo yali yawicigwe ha mulango wa yuyo mugoli.
Yasulumilaga yapegwe vifukufuku vyono vyagwizaga ha wulilo wo mugoli, sunga ne mabwa, gazaga gakumunamha malonda gakwe.
“Baho u muciwa yakafwa, wamalayika wakamusola, yakekala behi na Abulahamu, u mugoli nayo yakafwa, yakawikwa mu citenjelo.
Yuyo mugoli, lono yali yali mu wusungu wukali kuko ku hanhu ha myuhe ye wabi, yakenula meso gakwe, yakamuwona Abulahamu, na Lazalo yali behi nayo,
Yakacema yakatya, ‘Baba Abulahamu, wumbonele lusungu ye, wumutume Lazalo, yazabice hambe cisonje ce cidole cakwe mu malenga, yamhoze lulimi lwangu; hambi nha nghuwona wusungu mu moto wuwu.’
Ninga Abulahamu yakatya, ‘Mwanangu, wukumbucile vyono, lono agwe wali wukali mumi, wamotaga vyako viswanu, na Lazalo yakabocela i vibi, ninga lu baha mwene mutuzwe, nagwe wuli mu wusungu.
Na muli zizi zose, hagati yetu na nyenye, lyawikwa likombo yitali muno, ho walece kusuma kulowoka, wakulawa akuno no kuza kuko kwenyu, hamba wa kuko kulowoka kuza kono kwetu.’
Yuyo mono yali mugoli, yakatya, ‘Heya baba, ale nghukulomba, wumutume Lazalo yabite ku kaya ya Baba,
hambi nha nina wanakwetu wahano; yakawasugule, walece kuza nawo hanhu hano ha wusungu.’
Ninga Abulahamu yakatya, ‘Wanduguzo, wena nawo wa Musa ne Wawizi, wawahulice wawo.’
Ninga mwene yakatya, ‘Ng'o ye baba Abulahamu; langa hono yabite yunji kuli wene mono yazucile mu wafu, wonena.’
Nayo Abulahamu yakatya, ‘Hono walece kuwahulika Musa ne Wawizi, hamba yunji yenuce mu wafu, si wokwihuwila yaye.’ ”
Yesu yakawatya wejizwa wakwe; “I mewajizo gono gakuwakwega wanhu ho wetume wubi; si goleka kuza, ninga woyi he kuli munhu yuyo mono yakugaleta!
Ciba yali yawopelezwe lizala yiwaha mu singo, yatagwe mwi'lenga, si nha kumwiwajiza mudodo monga muyagwe na wawa.
Mulanjilile! Hono nduguyo yakusutizye, wumukaje; na hono yanene wumunenelaje.
Hamba yakusutizye kali mupunghati, mwizuwa limonga, na hono yakusutya yakukuziza no kukutya ‘Nghunena,’ wumunenelaje.”
Iwatumwa wakamutya, “Muwaha, Wuconjeleze wihuwilo.”
Nayo Muwaha yakawatya, Hono mwali muwe no wihuwilo wudodo kotya nhe mhece ya haladali, mwali muwulonjele mubici wuwu wo mukuyu mukutya, kulice wukehadice mwi'lenga, nawo wali wumuhulicenyi.

“Lunji, citye muli nyenye, yunji yena mwitumami mono yali kwi'lima, hamba yali ku wudimi we zingholo; wulenyi kolo yawuya, kulawa ku mugunda, komulonjela yuyo mwitumami, ‘Wuze lulu baha wulye zindigwa?’
Ng'o, langa komutya, ‘Wunhenjele nilye; witunje, wunyitumamile, sunga nghondye kulya no kung'wa, hanyuma nagwe ho kolya no kung'wa?’
Si komulumba mwitumami vyono ketuma zono yalajilizwe?
Ale na nyenye nhavivyo, kolo mukukondya kwituma zose zono mulajilizwe, mutye, ‘Ase cili wetumami mono cisina cambuzi, cifisiliza du zono zali zicinojeye kwituma.’ ”
Kukawa Yesu lono yabitaga ku Yelusalemi, yakakolela mu mipaka ya Samaliya na Galilaya.
Nayo lono yenjilaga mu citumbi cinji, waketang'anila nayo wanhu yikumi wo wukoma, wali wemile kutali.
Wakenula mazi gawo, wakutya, “Yesu Muwaha, Wuciwonele lusungu.”
Yaza kuwawona, yakawatya, “Bitenyi mukelajile kuli wakohani.” Kukawa lono wabitaga, wakawa kwezwa.
No muyawo monga, yaza wona vyono yapona, yakawuya yakumulumbo Mulungu ne lizi yiwaha;
yakegwisa hasi ha mwande ye magulu ga Yesu, akuno yakumulumba. Nayo yali Musamaliya.
Baho Yesu yakatya, “Alu, si wali wanhu yikumi wono wezigwe? Awalya we licenda wali hayi lu?
Si yejeye yunji mono yazize kumupela Mulungu lilumbo, langa mujenzi ayu du?”
Hanyuma yakamutya yuyo munhu, “Winuce wubite, wihuwilo wako wukuponya.”
Mwipango linji, Wafalisayo wamuwuza Yesu wakutya, “U wutemi wo Mulungu wolokuza nili?” Nayo yakawapitula, yakatya, “U wutemi wo Mulungu si wuzizaga mu nzila yono yikwijela ne meso.
Hamba hasina mono kolosuma kutya, ‘Awu aha.’ Hamba lunji, ‘Awulya ahalya.’ Hambi wutemi wo Mulungu nha wuli muli nyenye.”
Hanyuma yakawatya wejizwa wakwe, vyolokuza vilo, lono molohila kuwona lizuwa limonga, lya mu vilo vyo Mwana wo Munhu, hamba si mololiwona.
Ne wanhu wolomulonjelenyi wakutya, “Lanjenyi ta yali ahalya.” Mulece kubita, hamba kuwatyatya.
Hambi nha vyono linha limuli, lono likumulika likulawa ku lubavu lumonga lo wulanga, sunga ku lubavu luyagwe lo wulanga; vyo kolowa no Mwana wo Munhu mwizuwa lyakwe.
Ninga lono zikali si nawa zizo, sikoleka kwamula kutamiswa vibi, no kulemwa no lulelo alu.
Nha vyono zali mu vilo vya Noha, vyo zolowa vilo vyo Mwana wo Munhu.
Wanhu wajendelelaga kulya no kung'wa, kutola no kutolwa, sunga mwi'zuwa lililya lyono Noha yenjilila mu safina. Lihwazi likaza, likawawulaga wose.
Ale, yolowa nha vyono zali mu vilo vya Loti; wanhu wajendelelaga kulya no kung'wa, kugula no kuguza, kuhadika zimbeyu no kuzenga.
Ninga mwizuwa lililya lyono yawucila Loti mu Sodoma, moto we cibiliti wukatonya nha mvula kulawa ku wulanga, no kuwawulaga wose.
Nhavivyo vyo yolowa yinha mwizuwa lilyo lyono kologubulilwa u Mwana wo Munhu.
“Mwizuwa lilyo, munhu wo wose mono kolowa mwi'tembe lye nyumba yakwe, yalece kutima ho yasole vinhu vyakwe vyono vili mu nyumba. Na mono kolowa ku mugunda nhavivyo yalece kuwuya.
Kumbucilenyi zono zamwagana u mugolece wa Loti.
Muli wose mono kolondola kuponya nhumbula yakwe, koyajiliza, ninga muli wose mono koyajiliza, yo koyiponya.
Nghumutyenyi, mwizuwa lilyo ne cilo, wolowa wagonile wanhu wejete hamonga, yumonga kolosolwa, no muyagwe kololekwa.
Wacekulu wejete wolowa wakusajila hamonga; yumonga kolosolwa, no muyagwe kololekwa. [
“Wanhu wejete wolowa mu mugunda; yumonga kolosolwa, no muyagwe kololekwa.]”
Baho wakamuwuza, “Hayi lo Muwaha?” Nayo yakawatya, “Kono ko wuli muvimba, kuko ne zindi ko zolokwikongholela.”
Hanyuma Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo Wejizwa wakwe, yakuwalajila vyono yiwanojeye kulomba nhondo zose, walece kukatala.
Yakatya, “Kwali na hakimu mwitumbi linji, mono si yamogopago Mulungu hamba kumucelelela munhu wo wose.
Mwitumbi lilyo, mwali na mucekulu mufwile; mono yazaga kali kenji kuli hakimu yuyo, yakumulomba yawalamule no mulugu wakwe.
Hakimu yuyo yakamula kulemalema kali kenji, ninga hanyuma yakehwesa mu nhumbula yakwe, yakatya, ‘Hamba niwe sinimogopaga Mulungu, hamba kumucelelela munhu wo wose,
ninga vyono mucekulu ayu mufwile yakungaza, nomulamulila, ho yalece kujendelela kunghataza so wuze wakwe wa kenji na kenji.’ ”
U Muwaha yakajendelela kutya, “Hulicenyi ta, zono yalonga yuyo hakimu mubi.
Alu ma, Mulungu nayo, si kowalamulila wahagulwa wakwe wono wamulililaga misi ne cilo? Hambi kocela kuwataza?
Nghumutyenyi, mbeka kowalamulila mbela mbela. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wulenyi, kolo yakuza kono'nze Mwana wo Munhu, kolowagana 'mbi wihuwilo mono'nze?”
Hanyuma Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo cici, awalya wono wewonaga nha waswanu, no kuwabedegala wayawo wose.
“Wanhu wejete wabita ku Nyumba yo Mulungu kulomba, yumonga yali Mufalisayo, no muyagwe yali mutoweza kodi.”

Yuyo Mufalisayo yakema, yakawa kulomba cinyele mu nhumbula yakwe yakutya, “Gwe Mulungu, nghukulumba vyono ane si ninha wanhu wanji, wabugu, wakonyi, wasenyha, nghukulumba vyono ane si ninha ayu mutoweza kodi.
Mu vilo mupunghati ndekaga kulya kejete, ndavyaga zaka, muli vyono sawaga vyose.”
Ninga ayulya mutoweza kodi yakema kutali, hamba si yenda no kwinula meso gakwe ku wulanga, ninga yaketowa mu mhambaga ko wukalale, yakatya, “Gwe Mulungu wumbonele lusungu ane no mubi.”

Nghumutyenyi, yuyo mutoweza kodi, yawuya kwakwe kuno yakondizye kwilamula no Mulungu. Ninga ayulya u Mufalisayo, si nhavivyo. Hambi muli wose mono yakwikumya mweneco, nha konyetywa na mono yakwinyetya yo kokumywa.
Wanhu wakamuletela Yesu i wana wadodo, ho yawawicile miwoko yakwe. Ninga iwejizwa waza kuwawona, wakawatacila no kuwemila.
Ninga Yesu yakawacemela kuli mwene, yakutya, “Walecenyi wana wadodo wanyizize, mulece kuwalemeza; hambi wutemi wo Mulungu, nha we wanhu wono wenha wawa.
Mbeka nghumutyenyi, muli wose mono si kowubocela wutemi wo Mulungu nho mwana mudodo, si kokwinjila mumo ng'o.”
Na mulongola yunji, Muyahudi, yakamuwuza Yesu, yakutya, “Ati Mwijizi muswanu, nhende wule, ho niwutuje wumi we cibitilila?”
Yesu yakamutya, “Alo so cici wukunyhema muswanu? Hasina yunji muswanu, langa yumonga, yo Mulungu du.
Wugamanyile malajilizo, ‘Wulece kusenyha; Wulece kuwulaga; Wulece kuhiza; Wulece kulavya wuhomelezi wa wulambi. Wuwogopaje usogo no nyina yako.’ ”
Mwene yakatya, “Gaga gose nigakamisaga, vyono nalawa wudodo wangu.”
Nayo Yesu yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakamutya, “Wukali wanjiye nghani monga du; wuguze vyose vyono wina navyo, wukawagawile waciwa, nagwe kowa na sawo ku wulanga; hanyuma ho wuze wunhyatye.”
Ninga yuyo munhu yaza kuzihulika zizi, yakakalala muno; hambi nha yali mugoli muno.
Nayo Yesu yaza kumuwona vyono yakalaye, yakatya, “Kukamu kuli wono wena sawo ku winjile mu wutemi wo Mulungu!
Kupelu kuli ngamiya yikole mu cilanga co lusing'ani, si nho mugoli kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.”
Wanhu nawo waza kuhulika, wakatya, “Nani 'mbi mono kosuma kupona?”
Ninga Yesu yakatya, “Zono si zisumice kuli wanhu, nha zisumice kuli Mulungu.”
Nayo Petelo yakamuwuza, “Ase nase ma? Caleka zikaya zetu cikakutyatya.”
Yesu yakawatya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, Munhu wo wose mono yalecile kaya, hamba mugolece, hamba wawahaze, lunji wanakwawe, hamba walezi, hamba wana, so wutemi wo Mulungu,
kopegwa zono zicizize kenji mu myaka yiyi ya lulu, no kubocela wumi we cibitilila mu yinze yono yikuza.”
Yesu yakawasola wali wene, wawalya we likumi na wejete, yakawatya, “Lanjenyi, alu cikubita ku Yelusalemi, na kuko zose zono yandicilwa Mwana wo Munhu ne wawizi, si zoleka kufisilizwa.
Hambi nha kolavywa kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, nawo womutendela vibi, no kumufunyila mate.
Nawo womutowanga ne mijeledi; womuwulaga, ninga mwizuwa lye kadatu kozuka kanyhi.”
Ninga wene si wezuka nghani hamba monga, nghani yiyi yikawa hundikwe kuli wene, hamba si watanga yono yalongwaga.
Kukawa Yesu yaza sejelela ku Yeliko, hali na mubofu yunji yekaye ha nzila, yakwilombeleza,
nayo yaza kuhulika lipuga lye wanhu likupuluta, yakawuza, “Alo ko cilici?”
Wakamutya, “Yesu wa Nazaleti yakupuluta.”
Nayo yakabalaluka yakutya, “Yesu go mwana wa Dawudi wumbonele lusungu.”
Wanhu wono wali walongoleye, wakamutacila wakutya yanyamale, ninga mwene ho yakacila kucemeleza muno, “Go mwana wa Dawudi wumbonele lusungu.”
Yesu yakema, yakawatya wamulete kuli mwene. Nayo mubofu yaza kusejelela, Yesu yakamuwuza,
“Wukusaka nghutendele wule?” Nayo yakapitula, “Muwaha, nghulomba wumhele kuwona kanyhi.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wuwone, Wihuwilo wako wukuponya.”
Lo lulolulo mono yali yali cibofu yakawa kuwona, yakamutyatya Yesu, akuno yakumukumya Mulungu. Ne wanhu wose, waza wona zizo, wakamukumya Mulungu.
Yesu yakenjila mwi'kaya lya Yeliko, na lono yakolaga mu zinzila za mwi'kaya lilyo,
hali na munhu, litagwa lyakwe Zakayo. Munhu yuyo yali muwaha we Wakalani watoweza kodi, kanyhi yali munhu mugoli.
Yahilaga kumuwona Yesu yamumanye; ninga ku soko yo winji we wanhu, kanyhi vyono mwene yali mufupi; hamba siyasuma.
Hobaho yakalongolela lumangho, yakananuka mu mukuyu, ho yasume kumuwona Yesu, hambi nha yakolaga nzila yiyo.
Nayo Yesu yaza fika bahalya, yakagalamila, yakamutya, “Zakayo wutime mbela, hambi zuwali nha yinojeye niswe mu kaya yako.”
Zakayo yakatima mbela mbela, yakamubocela na nyemo.
Wanhu wose waza kuwona zizo, wakawa kwanza kung'ung'ulika wose, wakutya, “Kenjila kuduwa kuli munhu mubi.”
Ninga Zakayo yakema, yakamulonjela Yesu, yakamutya, “Lanje ta, Muwaha, Nusu ye sawo yangu nowagawila waciwa; na hono niwe namusolela yunji cinji ko wusugu, nomugomolela mwi'walo lilyo kali kane.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Zuwali mhonelo yinjila mono kaya yiyi, vyono mwene nayo, mwana wa Abulahamu.
Hambi Mwana wo Munhu nha yaza kulondola no kuponya i wanhu wono wajiliye.”

Mu cipango lono wanhu wali wakali wahulicize zizo, Yesu yakawalonjela cihwanicizo. (Baho yali yasejelela ku Yelusalemi, ne wanhu wawo wehwesaga vyono mwipango yidodo du, u wutemi wo Mulungu wowa wafika.)
Holeka yakawatya, “Kwali na munhu yunji mutambule, mono yatuluka, yakabita ku yisi ya kutali, yakabocele wutemi ho yawuye.
Na lono yali yakali si natuluka, yakawacema wetumami wakwe yikumi, yakawagawila pesa munhu ne liwalo lyakwe, yakawatya. ‘Muzinozezaje wusuluza zipesa zizi, sunga nize mbuye.’
Ninga wanya wusi wayagwe wakamusula, holeka wakatuma watumwa, wabite wakatye. ‘Si cikusaka yuyu yateme muli sese.’
“Yuyo munhu yakawuya ku kaya akuno yakondya kupegwa wutemi. Ho baho yakatuma wacemelwe kwakwe wetumami wawalya wono yawapela zipesa zizilya, ho yamanye cambuzi cono watujile mu wusuluza.
U mwitumami mulongozi yakaza, yakatya, ‘Muwaha, zipesa zako zono wamhela, zonjelezeka kali kumi.’
Nayo yakamutya, ‘Ale, kunoza viswanu, wuli mwitumami muswanu. Vyono wali mwihuwilwa mu nghani ndodo muno, ale weze muwaha mu makaya kumi.’
U mwitumami we kejete yakaza, yakatya, ‘Muwaha, cijela cambuzi kali kahano muli zizilya zipesa zono wukamhela.’
Yakamutya nayo, ‘Nagwe weze muwaha mu makaya mahano.’ ”
U mwitumami yunji nayo yakaza yakatya, “Muwaha sole pesa zako, nazikamisa mbope mu citambala,
hambi nha nakogopa vyono agwe wuli munhu mukali. Agwe wuli munhu mono kusolaga cono si wawika, no kududula cono si wahadika.”
Nayo yakamutya, “Nokusumila mu wulonje wako, wuli mwitumami mubi 'gwe. Wali wumanyile vyono ane nili munhu mukali, mono solaga cono sinawika, no kududula cono si hadice,
alo so cici si wayiwika sawo yangu mu benki, nane nali niyisole yina ne cambuzi ha wuwuye wangu?”
Yakawatya wono wali wemile baho, “Mumubokaje zizo zipesa, mumupele ayulya mono yatujile cambuzi kali kumi.”
Nawo wakamutya, “Muwaha, ayu yena cambuzi cico kali 'kumi.”
Nayo yakawatya, “Muli wose mono yena nha kopegwa; no konjelezwa. Ninga mono yasina, kosolelwa sunga na cono yena naco.
Ninga wawo walugu wangu, wono si wali wendile niwe mutemi wawo, waletenyi kuno, muwawulajile hamwande yangu.”
Yesu yaza kondya kulonga zizi, yakalongola kubita ku Yelusalemi.
Kukawa yaza sejelela ku Betifage na Betaniya, he 'tunda lye Mizeyituni, yakawatuma wejizwa wakwe wejete,
yakawatya, “Bitenyi ku citumbi cono cili ha mwande yenyu, na kolo mukwinjila mu citumbi, mowona nyana ye ndogowe yiwopigwe, yono yikali hamba si netumamilwa na munhu. Muyiwopole, muyilete baha.”
Hono munhu yamuwuzenyi, so cici lo mukuyiwopola, mumulonjelaje mutye, “U Muwaha yakuyisaka.”
Nawo wono watumwa wakabita, wakawona nha vyono yawalonjela.
Nawo lono wayiwopolelaga nyana ye ndogowe, wanye ndogowe wakawawuza, “Nhawule mukuyiwopolela i ndogowe yiyi?”
Nawo wakawapitula, wakatya, “U Muwaha yakuyisaka.”
Wakayileta kuli Yesu, wakatandika myenda yawo mu nyana ye ndogowe, wakamupandiza Yesu.
Nayo Yesu yakajendelela no muhinzo, akuno yapandile mu ndogowe, ne wanhu wakatandika myenda yawo mu nzila.
Nayo yaza sejelela behi na Yelusalemi, ha nhenenhuko ye litunda lye Mizeyituni, i wejizwa wakwe mu winji wawo, wakanza kusangalala no kumulumbo Mulungu kwe 'zi yiwaha, so metumo mawaha gono wagawona,
wakutya, “Mumoti u Mutemi mono yakuziza mwitagwa lyo Muwaha, Mulamu ku wulanga, no lukumyo lweze kuli Mulungu.”
Wafalisayo wanji wono wali wali mwi'puga lye wanhu, wakamutya Yesu, “Mwijizi wanyamazaje wejizwa wako wanyamale.”
U mwene yakawapitula, yakatya, “Nghumulonjelenyi anye vyono, hono wawa wanyamale, mabwe gago gozoza.”
Nayo yaza sejelela, yakaliwona likaya yakalililila,
yakutya, “Yali yiwe yili ciba hono nagwe wali wumanye mwizuwa lili, inghani yo mulamu! Ninga alu yihundicizwe ha meso gako.
Hambi vilo nha vyolokuziza, lono Walugu wako wolokupilima no kukutejela kose kose.
Wolokongomeza gwegwe, hamonga ne wanago wono wali mumo. Nawo si wolokusigaziza hamba libwe limonga mucanyha mwibwe liyagwe, vyono si watanga ilipango lyono Mulungu yaziza kukuponya.”
Hanyuma Yesu yakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakanza kuwawinjila kunze wono wambazaga,
yakuwatya, “Yandikwa, Nyumba yangu yowa nyumba yo kulombela; ninga anye mwayinoza kuwa mhango ya Wahizi.”
Yesu yakawa kwijiza vilo vyose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu. Ninga Wakohani wawaha, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize ne walongola we wanhu, wasakaga kumuwulaga,
ninga si wayiwona nzila yo kunozeza zizo. Hambi wanhu wose nha wali wamumemeleye, wakumuhuliciza muno.
Kukawa mwi'zuwa linji, lono yawejizaga wanhu mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, no kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu, Wakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize ne wanyamhala wakamuziza,
wakatya, “Wucilonjele ta! Wukuzinoza zizi ko wulajilizeci?”
Yesu yakawatya, “Nane nomuwuzenyi nghani monga,
u wulajilize wa Yohana wo kubaputiza, walawa kuli Mulungu hamba kuli wanhu?”
Wakanza kulongana weneco wose wakatya: “Hono citye walawa ku wulanga, mwene kotya, ‘Alo so cici si mwamwihuwila?’
Na hono citye, walawa kuli wanhu, wanhu wose wocitowanga ne mabwe, hambi wose nha wehuwiye vyono Yohana yali muwizi.”
Hodu, wakamutya, “Sicimanyile wulajilize wuwo kono walawa.”
Nayo Yesu yakawatya, “Hamba na nene si nomulonjelenyi, ko wulajilizeci wono wukuleka nghunoza zizi.”
Yesu yakajendelela kuwalonjela wanhu cihwanicizo cici. “Munhu yunji yalima mugunda wa mizabibu, yakawika walimi, mwene yakabita ku yisi yinji ya kutali, yakekala kuko vilo vinji.
Mwipango lyo wupilo we mizabibu, yuyo munhu yakatuma mwitumami wakwe kuli wawalya walimi, wamupele mikalo ya mu mugunda we mizabibu, ninga walimi wakamutowa, wakamuwinga yali bwete.
Yuyo munhu yakatuma mwitumami yunji kanyhi; nayo wakamutowa nhavivilya no kumutendela vibi, wakamuwinga yali bwete.
Yakatuma sunga na we kadatu; nayo wakamutamisa no kumutaga kunze.”
Ayulya munya mugunda yakehwesa; “Alu notenda wule? Nomutuma mwanangu mwendece, lunji yuyo womogopa.”
Ninga walimi waza muwona, wakalongana weneco wose, wakutya, “Ayu yo muhazi, alenyi 'nye cimuwulaje, wuhazi wuwe wetu.”
Wakamulavyaniza mu mugunda we mizabibu, wakamuwulaga. Yesu yakawawuza, “Alu u munya mugunda konoza nhawule kuli wawo walimi?
Kolokuza yawawulaje walimi wawo, no mugunda we mizabibu, kopela walimi wanji.” I wanhu waza kuzihulika i zinghani zizo, wakabeza wakatya, “Siyosumika hamba hadodo.”
Ninga Yesu yakawalanga, yakawatya, “Mandiko gaga gono Gelile, alu gena nhunizo ci? ‘Ilibwe lyono walilema Wazenji, Alu lyonozwa kuwa yiwaha lyo musinji!’
Munhu wo wose mono kogwila mucanyha ye libwe lilyo, kobenanjika-benanjika, na hono limugwile munhu wo wose, lyomutijinha tici-tici.”
I wejizi wo Wulajilize ne Wakohani wawaha, wakatanga vyono cihwanicizo cici, cali ciwadomile weneco, na ku soko yiyo, wahilaga wamwibate baho baho, ninga wakogopa wanhu.

Holeka wakawa wakulondola-londola cilejeho cono cikwiliye. Wakawafupa wanhu wanji, wenoze nha wanhu waswanu, wakawa kuwatuma wabite wamugwizize Yesu mu wulonje wakwe, ho wasume kumwibata no kumutegula ku wawaha we Selekali.

Wawo watandizi, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, cimanyile vyono wukulonga kanyhi wukwijiza nghani ze mbeka; cimanyile vyono si kulangaga lilumbo lya munhu, langa kwijizaga mu mbeka nzila yo Mulungu.
Ale cilonjelaje ta, hono viswanu kuli ase kumulipa kodi Kayisali, hamba ng'o?”
Ninga Yesu yakatanga wusugu wawo, yakawatya,
“Ndajilenyi pesa, wulenyi, yina hwani ya nani no lwandiko lwa nani?”
Nawo wakatya, “Vya Kayisali.” Yesu yakawatya, “Ale mumulavizye Kayisali vyakwe Kayisali, no Mulungu vyakwe Mulungu.”
Hamba si wasuma kumugwiziza nghani yiyi baho hali wanhu, holeka wakanyamala twii, wakwizina lipitulo lyakwe.
Hanyuma, Wasadukayo, wawo wono watezaga, wafu si wazukaga; wakamuziza Yesu wakamuwuza wakutya.

“Ati Mwijizi, Musa yacandicila, vyono munhu hono yafwilwe no muwahawe mono yali yatolile mugolece, no kumuleka mugolece yuyo yasina wana, u mwanakwawe yamutole yuyo mugolece ho yamutujile muwahawe wana.
Ale, kwali na wanhu mupunghati walume, wana wa munhu yumonga, u mulongozi yakatola mucekulu, hanyuma yakafwa si yaleka mwana.
Nayo wekejete [yakamutola mucekulu yuyo, nayo yakafwa,]
na we kadatu nhavivilya. Zikawa nha vivyo sunga kuli wose vyono wali mupunghati, na wose wakafwa hamba kuleka wana.
Hanyuma u mucekulu yuyo nayo yakafwa.
Alu mwizuwa lyono wafu wolozuka, mucekulu yuyu kolowa mugolece wa wahayi muli wawa? Hambi wose mupunghati nha wali wamutolile.”
Yesu yakawatya, “I wanhu wa kononze yiyi, watolaga, watolwaga,
ninga awalya wono Mulungu kowapela kulificila lizuwa lyo wuzuce we wafu, si wolotola hamba kutolwa.
Na mbeka hamba si wolofwa kanyhi yaye, hambi nha wokwihwana ne wamalayika; nawo wo wana wo Mulungu, vyono wazukulwa kulawa mu wafu.
Ninga wafu vyono wazukaga, sunga na Musa yayilajila nghani yiyo mu Mandiko gono Gelile, za ha cititika cono cakaga moto, lono yakumucema Muwaha, yakumutya, u Mulungu wa Abulahamu, Isaka na Yakobo.
Holeka mwene si Mulungu we wafu, langa Mulungu wa awalya iwomi. Hambi wose nha wakuwumipila muli mweneco.”
Wanji wa muli Wejizi wo Wulajilize wakatya, “Mwijizi, kulonga viswanu muno muno.”
Hamba si wejelela kumuwuza nghani yinji kanyhi.
Yesu yakawawuza, “Nhawule yikutegwa vyono Kilisito yo mwana wa Dawudi?
Hambi Dawudi mweneco nha yakulonga mu citabu ce Zabuli, ‘U Muwaha yamutya Muwaha wangu Wikale ha muwoko wangu wo kulume,
Sunga kolo nghuwanoza iwalugu wako wawe nha yigoda lyo kuwicila migulu yako.’
Dawudi vyo yakumucema mwene, ‘Muwaha,’ alu ho kawa mwanagwe nhawule kanyhi?”
Ne wanhu wose lono wali wamuhulicize, Yesu yakawalonjela wejizwa wakwe, ha mwande ye wanhu wose,

“Musuguce kuli wejizi wo Wulajilize wono wendile kujenda ako na ako wavwalile kanzo. Na kanyhi wendile kulamuswa kwa cogopo ne wanhu mu zisokoni, kanyhi wendile kwikala hanhu hatambule, mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, no kwikala hanhu hatambule ha zindigwa ze zisikukuu.

Wene wakuwewonela iwacekulu wafwile, no kuwasolela ivinhu vyawo, akuno wakwinoza nha waswanu, so wulomba wulombe wutali muno ko wukoci. Wawo wotuga wulipicizwe wuwaha muno muno mwizuwa lye ning'aniza.”
Yesu yakalanga, yakawona wagoli wono watajilaga vilavywa vyawo mu wuwiko we zisawo ze Nyumba yo Mulungu.
Yakamuwona no mucekulu yunji mufwile muciwa muno, yakutajila mumo vifweza vidodo vyejete vifwiye sendi ikumi.
Yakatya, “Mbeka nghumutyenyi, u mufwile ayu muciwa nha katajila nyinji si nha wanji wose.
Hambi wawa wose nha watajila mu vilavywa kulawa muli vyono vicizilize mu wugoli wawo, ninga mucekulu ayu, hambe muciwa, kalavya vyose vyono yali yena navyo, vyono yali yetumbiye so wuwumipe wakwe.”
Wayagwe ne wejizwa wakwe, waduwilaga ze Nyumba yo Mulungu, vyono yihambigwe ne mabwe go wuguzi wukamu, hamonga ne vilavywa vyono vyalavywa kuli Mulungu. Yesu yakatya,
“Gaga gose gono mukugawona, vilo vyolokuza, lono si lyololekwa baha libwe limonga mucanyha mwi'bwe liyagwe, lyono si lyologwiswa hasi.”
Wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Ati Mwijizi, zizi zolowa za nili? Ne citanjilo cayo cici, cono colajila vyono zeza zili behi kwijela?”
Yesu yakawatya, “Musuje ho mulece kukongwa, hambi nha wenji wokuza wono wokwitumamila ilitagwa lyangu, wakutya, ‘Yo nene.’ na kanyhi, ‘Cidaha casejelela.’ Ninga anye mulece kuwatyatya!
Na kolo mukuhulika zinghani zo wulugu ne mawuma, muze mulece kogopa; hambi zizi nha si zoleka kwamula kwijela; ninga ndumilizo yikali.”
Hanyuma yakawalonjela, yakutya, likungugo vyokwitowa ne likungugo liyagwe, no wutemi vyokwitowa no wutemi wuyagwe,
golowa matulo mawaha hanhu hose, kanyhi kolowa na nzala mbaha, ne matamwa go kwileceza. Kolowa ne vinhu vijenzi vya kogofya, ne vitanjilo viwaha vya ku wulanga.
Ninga lono zikali si nawa zizi zose, womwibatenyi, no kumutegulenyi mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo, no kumudindilenyi mu zijela, motegulwa hali watemi ne walongola, ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.
Na yiyi yomupelenyi cilejeho co kulonga zo Luganuzi Luswanu.
Holeka mwikamise mu zinhumbula zenyu, mulece kwiyandila kwihwelela vyono mokwitetela,
hambi nha nomupelenyi mahala no wizuce wo kulonga, vyono walugu wenyu wose si wosuma kuvimila hamba kupinga.
Iwalezi wenyu, ne wandugu zenyu, na we cimanyi, ne wendece wenyu, womugalucenyi, na wanji wa muli nyenye mowulagwa.
Ne wanhu wose womusulenyi ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.
Ninga hamba luvwili lumonga lwa mu mitwe yenyu, silokwajilila.
Mu wukangalizi wenyu, moponya wumi wenyu.
“Ninga kolo mukuwona Yelusalemi yipilimwe ne walugu, ale, mumanye vyono wongomezwe wayo wasejelela.
Hobaho wono wali mu Yudiya, watizize mu matunda; na wono wali mugati yayo wawuce, nawo wono wali mu migunda, walece kwinjila mwikaya lilyo.
Hambi ivilo vivyo nha vyo vilo vyo wulipicizwe, ho zose zono zandikwa zifisilizwe.
Woyi he kuli wono wena mida, na wono wakosa mu vilo vivyo! Hambi nha golowa magayo mawaha mu yisi, ne likuwo lyo Mulungu lyowaziza wanhu wawa.
Wanji wowulagwa no mumaje, wanji wolosolwa mateka, wategulwe ku nghungugo zose, ne likaya lya Yelusalemi, lyolokanyagwa ne wanhu we makungugo ganji, sunga vipango vyawo vilawa fisilizwa.”
“Na kolowa na vitanjilo mwi'zuwa na mu mwezi na mu zinyelezi; ne makungugo kono'nze golowa na magayo, wena mahwele so mukukunzo we lilenga ne mawingo gayo.
Wanhu wozilika ku soko yo woga, lono wakulanjilila gono gakuza kono'nze, hambi i vilungo vyo wulanga nha vyolosinjisika.
Hobaho ho wolomuwonela Mwana wo Munhu, yakuziza mwivunde ne vilungo ne nhojo mbaha.
Ninga gaga kolo gakwamula kwijela, mwinule mitwe yenyu mugalamile kucanyha, vyono wukombozi wenyu wasejelela.”
Yakawalonjela cihwanicizo: “Lanjenyi ta, u mukuyu ne mabici ganji,
lono mukuwona gamula kutula mahamha, mukuwona na mumanyile mo weneco vyono lifuku lyeza lili behi.
Nanye nha vivyo, kolo mukuwona gaga gakwijela, mumanye vyono wutemi wo Mulungu waza wuli behi.
Mbeka nghumutyenyi, lulelo lulu lolowa lukali napuluta, sunga zize zifisilizwe zose.
Wulanga ne yinze zolopuluta, ninga zinghani zangu si zilapuluta yaye.”
“Ninga musuje, zinhumbula zenyu zize zilece kuvuhigwa ko wubuguci, no wugale, ne mahwele go wikale wuwu, lizuwa lilyo ho lilece kumutinicizenyi nha mutego.
Hambi nha vyo lyolowaziza nha mutego, wose wono wekaye mono'nze yose.
Ninga mwikalaje meso mu mapango gose, mweze kulomba, ho mutuje vilungo vyo kusumila kugatiza gaga gose gono golowa, no kwima hali Mwana wo Munhu.”
Na mu vilo vyose ku misi, Yesu yejizaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, na ku cilo, yabitaga kugona mwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni.
Ne wanhu wose welawilaga ku Nyumba yo Mulungu wamuhulicize.
Ale vikasejelela vilo vyo kulila mikate yono siyisasize, vyono vitezagwa vye Pasaka.
Ne Wakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize walondolaga nzila ho wamuwulaje Yesu: ninga wogopaga wanhu.
Setani yakamwinjila Yuda mono yacemwaga Musikaliyota, mono yali muyagwe na walya i watumwa we likumi na wejete.
Yuda yakabita, vikalongana ne wakohani wawaha ne walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu, inzila yono wokwitumamila yo kumugaluka Yesu no kumulavya kuli wene.
Nawo wakasecelela, no kulagana nayo vyono womupela mapesa.
Nayo Yuda yakavumila, yakalondola cilejeho ciswanu co kumukombolela Yesu kuli wene, ne lipuga lye wanhu walece kumanya.
Lizuwa lye mikate yono siyisasize likafika. Nalyo lye zuwa lyono nyana ye ngholo so Pasaka si yoleka kuwulagwa.
Holeka Yesu yakawatuma Petelo na Yohana, yakutya “Bitenyi mukaciwikanizize Pasaka, cilye.”
Nawo wakamuwuza, “Wukusaka cikakuwikanizize hayi?”
Yakawatya, “Hulicizenyi ta, kolo mukufika ku mujini, mokwitang'anila na munhu wa cilume, yadinghuye njilo ye malenga, mumutyatyaje yuyo sunga ko ku nyumba yono kokwinjila.
Nanye mumulonjele munya nyumba mutye, ‘U Mwijizi yakuwuza, yakutya, Ati nyumba ya hayi, mono nolila Pasaka ne Wejizwa wangu?’
Nayo komulajilenyi cumba ciwaha ca ku golofa ciwikanizize lukulu, kuko ko mukatenje.”
Wakabita, wakawona nha vyono Yesu yawalonjeye, wakayitenga i ndigwa ye Pasaka.
I cipango caza fika, Yesu yakekala kulya zindigwa hamonga ne watumwa wakwe.
Yakawatya, “Nali kuhila muno cihanje nanye Pasaka yiyi, lono nghali natamiswa,
hambi nha nghumulonjelenyi, si nololya kanyhi, sunga yifisilizwe mu wutemi wo Mulungu.”
Yakasola cikombe, yakalumba, yakatya, “Mubocele aci, mung'we wose,
hambi nha nghumutyenyi, si nolong'wa kanyhi divayi ya Zabibu sunga wutemi wo Mulungu wuze.”
Hanyuma, yakasola mukate yakalumba yakawubegula, yakawapela, yakutya, [“Awu wo muwili wangu wono weza kulavywa ku soko yenyu, Mweze noza nha vivi so wukumbucila nene.”
Yakanoza nha vivyo ne cikombe, waza kondya kulya, yakatya, “I cikombe cici, co cilagane cipya co Mulungu, cono cikukangazizwa mu sakami yangu, yono yeza kwitika ku soko yenyu.]
“Ninga mulanje, yuyo mono kongaluka yali hamonga nane baha ha zindigwa hono meza.
Heya mbeka, u Mwana wo Munhu yakubita kuwulagwa nha vyono yatemezezwa, ninga woyi he kuli munhu yuyo mono komugaluka.”
Baho wakanza kwiwuza weneco wose, wakutya, “Alo kowa wa hayi muli wene mono koyinoza nghani yiyi.”
Kwali na wiwanganile muli wawo watumwa, muli za wahayi mono yakwihweswa vyono yo kowa muwaha muli wene.
Yesu yakawatya, “Iwatemi we Makungugo wawatemile wanhu wawo kwe vilungo. Ne watemi wawa, watezwaga watazi wa wanhu.
Ninga yilece kuwa nhavivyo muli nyenye, langa u muwaha muli nyenye yaweze nha mudodo, nayo mono kowa mulongozi, yaweze nha mono yakwituma.
Hambi wa hayi muwaha, mono yekaye ha ndigwa, hamba mono yakwitumama? Ane nghuwona, yuyu mono yekaye ha ndigwa yo muwaha. Ninga hamba yiwe nhavivyo, ane hali nyenye ninha mono yakwitumama.
“Ninga anye yo nyenye mono mwali muli hamonga nane mu mapango gose mu majelo gangu,
nane nomupelenyi wutemi, nha vyono Baba yamhela.
Musume kulya no kung'wa ha wulilo wangu mu wutemi wangu. Nanye molokwikala mu magoda go wutemi mukuwaling'aniza i milango yikumi na myejete ya Isilayeli.”
“Simoni, Simoni wuhulicize, Setani yakomboywe ho yamupetenyi anye nha vyono munhu kapetaga wuhemba,
ninga ane nghukulombela agwe Simoni, wihuwilo wako ho wulece kucepuka; nagwe kolo wukumbuyila kanyhi, ho wuwasikamye wanduguzo.”
Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Muwaha, ane niwikanize cibitane nagwe sunga ko ku jela, hamba no kufwa du hamonga nagwe.”
Yesu yakamupitula yakatya, “Nghukulonjela Petelo, zuwali lono nzogolo yowa yikali sinalila, kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu wukutya, si wumanyile ane.”
Yesu yakawawuza wejizwa wakwe yakutya “Lululya lono nghamutumenyi mwali musina mufuko wa mapesa, hamba mukoba, hamba malatu, wulenyi, mwanjila cinji?” Wakatya, “Ng'o.”
Nayo yakawatya, “Ninga alu, mono yena mufuko wa pesa, yawusolaje, na mono yena mukoba nhavivyo. Nayo mono yasina mumaje yaguze musweko wakwe, yagule mumaje.
Hambi nha nghumutyenyi, vyono yiyi yono yandikwa mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, ‘Yawalilizanwa hamonga ne wahodanji.’ Siyoleka kufisilizwa. Hambi yono yatemezezwa, nha yeza kuficila ku mudumo wayo.”
Nawo wakatya, “Muwaha, wulanje, ayi mimaje myejete,” nayo yakawatya, “Hodu yakwila.”
Yesu yakalawila, yakabita kwi'tunda lye Mizeyituni nha vyono yali yazoweye, ne wejizwa wakwe wakamutyatya.
Nayo yaza fika hanhu baho, yakawatya, “Lombenyi ho mulece kwinjila mu wujelwe.”
Yakatemanuka kuli wene yakabita wutali wa nghanzo ye'bwe lyono ligumiywe, yakafugama yakalomba, yakutya,
“Baba, hono wende, wumbusize cikombe cici co Wusungu, ninga si wuhile wangu, langa wuhile wako witumwe.” [
Malayika kulawa ku wulanga, yakamulawila, yakamupela vilungo.
Nayo vyono yali mu wusungu wuwaha, yakehinda kulomba, ne lituguti lyakwe, likawa nha mabanhi ga Sakami gakasulula ho hasi.]
Nayo yaza kondya kulomba, yakawaziza wejizwa wakwe, yakawagana wagonile so wuzinguce,
yakawatya, “Alo nye, nhawule mugonile? Inucenyi ta mulombe, ho mulece kwinjila mu wujelwe.”

Lono yali yakali kulonga, walanje nhavi, lipuga lye wanhu likaza, lina na mono yacemwaga Yuda, muyagwe na walya, iwatumwa we likumi na wejete, yawalongoleye. Nayo Yuda yakamusejelela Yesu ho yamunonele.
Ninga Yesu yakamutya, “Yuda, alo wukumugaluka Mwana wo Munhu ko wunonele hongo?”
Nawo wejizwa wakwe waza kuwona zono zikwitumwa baho, wakatya, “Muwaha citumamile mimaje yetu?”
Muyawo yunji yakamutowa no mumaje u mwitumami wo Mukohani muwaha, yakamubuha likutu lyo kulume.
Baho Yesu yakatya, “Lecenyi ta hadodo.” Yakamupamiza likutu munhu yuyo, yakamuponya.
Yesu yakawatya wakohani wawaha, ne wawaha we walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu ne wanyamhala wono waza kumwibata. “Alu muza kunyibata mwina ne mimaje ne zinhumbi, kotya nha nili muhizi?
Lono caswezanaga nanye nhondo zose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, nha si mwasuma kunyibata, ninga aci co cipango cenyu, co cipango co wutemi we citi.”
Wakamwibata Yesu, wakamulongoza, wakamutegula ku kaya yo Mukohani muwaha. Na Petelo yakamutyatya yakujendela kutali.
No moto wali mupembwe haciligati ye likumbo lya kunze, nawo wakekala hamonga, na Petelo yakekala mu ciligati yawo.
Mwitumami yumonga we cihinza, yaza kumuwona Petelo yekaye behi no moto, yakamulanga muno, yakatya, “Munhu ayu nayo yali hamonga na Yesu.”
Ninga Petelo yakakana yakutya, “Gwe go muhinza! Ane sinimumanyile.”
Na hanyuma hadodo munhu yunji yakamuwona Petelo, yakatya, “Na gwegwe wuli muyawo.” Ninga Petelo yakatya, “Go munhu 'gwe, ane yo si nene.”
Hanyuma kanyhi yaza kupuluta kotya saa monga, yunji nayo yakajendelela kulonga yakutya, “Mbeka yuyu nayo yali hamonga nayo, hambi nayo nha kalawa ku Galilaya.”
Ninga Petelo yakatya, “Go munhu 'gwe, si manyile zono wukulonga.” Na lulo baho du lono yali yakali kulonga zizo, nzogolo yikalila.

U Muwaha Yesu yakapituka yakamulanga Petelo. Nayo Petelo yakayikumbucila nghani yono yalonjelwa no Muwaha yono yamutya, “Zuwali lono nzogolo yowa yikali si nalila, kowa wakondya kunghana kali kadatu.”
Baho Petelo yakalawila kunze, yakalila muno muno.
I wanhu wawalya wono wamwibata Yesu, wakamutowa no kumuzwajiza.
Wakamuwopa na citambala ku meso, wakamuwuza, wakutya, “Ta wucitambulilaje, mono yakutowile nani?
Wakamutovulanga no kumulonganga makani menji ga maligo.”
Waza kwela, mukung'ano we walongola we wanhu, wakekongholela hamonga ne Wakohani wawaha hamonga ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakamutegula Yesu hamwande ye libalaza lyawo.
Nawo wakamutya, “Cilonjelaje ta, hono yo gwegwe Kilisito.” Ninga mwene yakawatya, “Hamba nimulonjelenyi, si mokwihuwila ng'o,
na hamba hono nimuwuzenyi, si momhitula.
Ninga ku wulawa lulu, momuwona u Mwana wo Munhu yekaye ku muwoko wo kulume wo Mulungu.”
Baho wose wakatya, “Alu wo wutya agwe wuli Mwana wo Mulungu hongo?” Nayo yakawatya, “Nyenye mukulonga vyono, he yo nene.”
Nawo wakatya, “Alu kanyhi cosaka wuhomelezi wa cici? Hambi sese weneco nha cimuhulika yakulonga ko mulomo wakwe mweneco.”
Yikenuka mhuga yose, wakamuleta kuli Pilato.
Wakanza kumusonjeza, wakutya, “Cimuwona yuyu yakuwafunda vibi i wanhu wetu, yakulemeza walece kulipa kodi kwa Kayisali, yakwiyitya ati mwene yo Kilisito Mutemi.”
Pilato yakamuwuza Yesu yakutya, “Ati, yo gwegwe Mutemi we Wayahudi?” Yesu yakamupitula, yakatya, “Kulonga he gwegwe.”
Pilato yakawalonjela Wakohani wawaha ne lipuga lye wanhu yakutya, “Ane singhuwona lisutya lyo lyose muli munhu yuyu.”
Ninga wene wakacila kutya, “Yakusagahaza wanhu so mafundo gakwe, mu yisi yose ya Yudiya, yamuliziza ku Galilaya sunga naluno alu, yali baha.”
Pilato yaza hulika zizo yakawuza yakutya, “Alu munhu yuyu munya Galilaya?”
Nayo yaza manya vyono Yesu yali mu wutemi wa Helode, yakamutegula kuli Helode, hambi mwene Helode nha yali yali mu Yelusalemi vilo vivyo.

Nayo Helode yakasecelela muno yali yeza kumuwona Yesu, hambi nha yali yahulika za Yesu, holeka yalanjililaga vilo vinji, yasume kumuwona kwe meso gakwe mweneco. Hamonga na zizo, yali yetumbiye kumuwona Yesu yakunoza citanjilo.
Helode yakamuwuzawuza Yesu nghani nyinji, ninga Yesu siyamupitula cinji.
Wakohani wawaha ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakema, wakehinda muno muno kumusonjeza.
Helode hamonga ne Wasilikale wakwe, wakamukoza cevu Yesu, no kumuzwajiza; hanyuma wakamuvwika mwenda we citemitemi, wakamugomola kuli Pilato.
Lizuwa lilyo ho welamulila wa Helode na Pilato, hambi nha wali wesulile.
Pilato yakawacemela hamonga Wakohani wawaha ne walongola ne wanhu,
yakawatya, “Mundetela munhu ayu, mukutya, yakufunda wanhu vibi, ale hulicizenyi, lono nimuwuzize hali nyenye, si mbwene hamba wusutye wo wose muli mwene, muli zizo zono mukumusonjeza,

hamba si nene du, langa sunga na Helode siyawene yisutya lyo lyose, na yo yilecile kamugomola kanyhi kono kwangu. Holeka yikwijela vyono munhu yuyu, si yanozize nghani yo yose yimbi, yono yoleka yawulagwe.
Holeka notya yakunwe viboko, hanyuma nomukombola.” [
Na mu zi sikukuu za Pasaka, Pilato yali yimunojeye yawawopolele mufungwa monga.]
Ninga wose wakazozeza hamonga, wakutya “Wumuwusaje ayu, langa wuciwopolele Balaba.”
(Balaba yo munhu mono yatajilwa mu jela, so wuma wono yawuleta mweneco mwi'kaya, kanyhi na ku soko yo wuwulaji.)
Pilato yahilaga kumuwopolela Yesu, holeka yakawalonjela kanyhi,
ninga wene wakazoza, wakutya, “Wumutumbice mu musalaba, Wumutumbice mu musalaba!”
Pilato yakawatya lwe kadatu, “Alu kahodanga nghanici munhu ayu? Ane si mbwene lisutya lyo lyose muli mwene lyono lyoleka yafwe, holeka nomukuna viboko, hanyuma nimuwopolele.”
Ninga wene wakacila kuzoza muno muno, wakutya, yimunojeye Yesu yatumbikwe mu musalaba. Ne ndumilizo, nhondo mazi gawo gakasuma.
Holeka Pilato yakadumula nghani vyono wuhile wawo wufisilizwe.
Yakamuwopolela Balaba mono wamusakaga, mono yali mudindile mu jela, ku so wuma no wuwulaji, ninga yakamukombola Yesu kuli wene, wamutendele vyono wasakaga.
Na lono wamutegulaga, waketang'anila na munhu monga mono yacemwaga Simoni, munya Kilene, yalawaga mu matumbi. Wakamwibata, wakamupiciza musalaba, wetembase na Yesu.
Wakamutyatya wanhu wenji muno; na mumo mwali mowali wacekulu wono wamulililaga muno.
Ninga Yesu yakawapitucila, yakatya, “Nye wacekulu wa Yelusalemi! Mulece kundilila ane, langa mwiyililile nyenye nyo weneco ne wana wenyu.
Hambi lanjenyi, vilo nha vyolokuza vyono wanhu wolotya. ‘Wamoti iwagumba, na we zinda zono si zilelaga, ne matombo gono si gosaga.’
Mwipango lilyo i wanhu ho wolokwanza kugalonjela matunda, ‘Mucigwilaje.’ ne vigongo, ‘Mucigubice.’
Hono wanhu wakutenda zizi mwibici lidece, ma mwibici likavu ho zowa wule?”
Wakawasola kanyhi na wanhu wanji wejete, wahodanji, wawulagwe hamonga na Yesu.
Nawo waza fika hanhu hono hatezagwa, “Cipala,” ho wamutumbika Yesu mu musalaba hamonga na wawalya wahodanji wejete, yunji ku muwoko wo kulume u muyagwe ku muwoko wo kucekulu.
Yesu yakatya, “Baba, wuwanenele, hambi nha si wamanyile yono wakwituma. Hanyuma wakagawana vivwalo vyakwe mu nzila yo kutowa kula.”
Wanhu wakawa wemile baho wakulanga. Ne walongola wakamuzwaga, wakutya, “Yaponyaga wanji, alu yeponye mweneco hono yo mweneco Kilisito wo Mulungu, u muhagulwa wakwe.”
Ne wasilikale nawo wakamuzwaga, wakaza, wakamupela siki,
wakutya, hono yo gwegwe Mutemi we Wayahudi, ale wiponye go mweneco.
Hacanyha yakwe wakawika Mandiko gono gakutya “Ayu yo Mutemi we Wayahudi.”
Yu monga muli wawalya wahodanji, wono watumbikwa mu misalaba hamonga nayo, yakamutovula yakutya, “Alo si yo gwegwe Kilisito? Ale wiponye go mweneco, wuciponye na sese.”
Ninga muhodanji muyagwe yakamutacila, yakatya, “Alu 'gwe, si wukumogopa Mulungu hamba hadodo? Nagwe wuli mu wulipicizwe wuwo.
Nase mbeka yo ling'ani yetu, hambi nha cikulipicizwa nha vyono yicinojeye ku so metumo getu. Ninga Munhu ayu, siyetuma cinji cibi.”
Hanyuma yakatya, “Yesu wunghumbucile kolo wukuza mu wutemi wako.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Mbeka nghukulonjela, izuwalili du, cowezana nane ku Wulanga.”
Yikawa nha saa sita ye misi, lizuwa likatukuwala, citi cikadinda mu yisi yose, sunga saa tisa,
ne libupa lyo mwenda lyono lyali litumbikwe mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, likademuka haciligati.
Yesu yakalila ne lizi yiwaha yakatya, “Baba, nghuwika muhe wangu mu Miwoko yako.” Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, hodu yakawa kufwa.
U muwaha we wasilikale yigana, yaza kuwona zono ziweye, yakamukumya Mulungu, yakutya, “Mbeka munhu ayu, yali yali ling'ani.”
Ne wanhu wose wono wali wekongholeye baho kuzilanga zizo, waza wona zono ziweye, wakawuya kwawo wakwibinha mu zimhambaga so wukalale.
We cimanyi wakwe wose, ne wacekulu wono wamutyatyaga Yesu wakulawa Galilaya, wakema kutali wakuzilanjilila zizi.
Kukawa na munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Yusufu, mono yali munya citumbi cinji, ce Wayahudi, cono cicemwaga Alimataya. Yali munhu muswanu na wa cogopo.
Mono yalanjililaga u wuze wo wutemi wo Mulungu. Yali muyagwe na walya we libalaza liwaha lye Wayahudi. Ninga hamba nhavivyo siyelumbaniza mwi'tumo lyawo lilyo.
Mwene yakabita kuli Pilato yakawulomba u muwili wa Yesu.
Yakawutungula mu musalaba, yakawuwopa na mwenda wa bafuta, yakawuzika mu citenjelo cono catulwa mwibwe, cono cali cikali sinawikwa munhu.
Ilizuwa lilyo, lyali lizuwa lye Ijumaa, no wuwikanize we lizuwa lye Sabato wali weza kwanza.
Ne wacekulu wawalya wono wamutyatyaga Yesu ku wulawa ku Galilaya, wakamutyatya Yusufu, wakacilanga citenjelo, na vyono u muwili wa Yesu wazikwa.
Wakawuya kwawo, wakanozeleza mafuta ge mhunjile swanu. Na mu Sabato wakaceha nha vyono yalajilizwa.
Mwizuwa lye Jumapili, hakali mitondo muno muno, wacekulu wawalya wakabita ku citenjelo, wategulize ne manukato gono wali wawikaniza.
Wakawona vyono libwe lyabidusizwa hamhelo ye citenjelo.
Wali weza kwinjila mugati ye citenjelo, hamba siwawuwona u muwili wo Muwaha Yesu.
Na lono wali wakali kwizina so nghani yiyi, hobaho wakawona wanhu wejete, wono wali wavwalile myenda yono yikung'alala, wemile behi nawo.
Wacekulu wawo wakenjilwa no woga, wakenamya wusu wawo hasi. Hobaho i wanhu wawalya wejete wakawatya, “Alo so cici mukumulondola u mumi muli wono wafwiye?
Si yali baha ye, kazuka, kumbucilenyi vyono yakamulonjelenyi lono yali yakali ku Galilaya;
lono yatya, u Mwana wo Munhu si koleka kukombolwa kuli wanhu wabi, nawo womutumbika mu musalaba ne lizuwa lye kadatu kozuka kanyhi.”
Baho wacekulu wawalya wakazikumbucila zinghani zakwe.
Wakawuya kulawa ku citenjelo, wakawaganulila walya i watumwa we likumi na monga, ne wayawo wose, zinghani zizi zose.
Na wono wawaganulila iwatumwa zinghani zizi, wali wa Malyamu Magadalena, na Yowana, na Malyamu u nyina wa Yakobo: hamonga ne wacekulu wanji, wono wali wali hamonga nawo.
Nawo i watumwa wakaziwona nghani zizi kotya nha nzwaji du, holeka si wehuwila.
Ninga Petelo yakenuka, yakabita lumangho sunga ku citenjelo. Nayo yaza kusunjilila mugati mu citenjelo, yakawona myenda ye bafuta du yili wene. Yakawuya kwakwe, akuno yakwizina muli zizo zono ziweye.
Na mwizuwa lililya, wanhu wejete wayagwe ne wejizwa wa Yesu, wabitaga ku citumbi cono catezagwa Emawu, cihinzo ca kilometa yikumi na monga kulawa ku Yelusalemi.
Nawo wasimulilaga zizo zose zono zali zijeye.
Kukawa lono wasimulilaga no kwiwuza, Yesu mweneco yakejela yakajendana nawo.
Wakamuwona kwe meso, ninga si wasuma kumumanya.
Yakawatya, “Nghanici zono mukujenda mukwiganulila?” Wakema akuno wasininghaye.
Yumonga litagwa lyakwe Kileyopa, Yakapitula yakamutya, “Alo 'gwe wuli mujenzi wuli wene mu Yelusalemi, ho wulece kuzimanya zizi zono ziweye mumu mu vilo vivi vicefu?”
Nayo yakawatya, “Nghanici lo?” Nawo wakamutya, “Zinghani zono zamutuga Yesu wa Nazaleti. Mono yali muwizi we vilungo mu mulimo, na mu zinghani hali Mulungu, na hali wanhu wose.
Wakohani wawaha ne watemi wetu, wamulavya, yaling'anizwe yafwe, wakawa kumutumbika mu musalaba.
Nase cetumbilaga cikutya, yo mwene mono kokomboza Isilayeli. Na muli zizi zose, izuwali lye zuwa lye kadatu kulawa vyono zanozwa zizi.
Na kanyhi wacekulu wanji wa mu mhuga yetu wacitinusa, wono welawiye ku citenjelo.
Nawo hamba si wawuwene muwili wakwe, weza kuwuya, wawa kutya, wamalayika wawalawila, wono wateye vyono mumi.
Na wanji wayetu wabita ku citenjelo, nawo wawona vyono yo nha vivyo du, vyono walonjile wacekulu, ninga mwene Yesu si wamuwene.”
Nayo Yesu yakawatya “Nhawule muli walele nhavivi, kanyhi muli wakamu mu zinhumbula zenyu, kuzihuwila zose zono walonga wawizi?
Wulenyi, si yali yimunojeye Kilisito kugazwa nhavivyo, ho yenjile mu nhojo yakwe?”
Yesu yakawaloloseza zose za mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, zono zali zimunojeye mwene, ku wulawilila kuli Musa, sunga na mu wawizi wose.
Waza kusejelela ha citumbi cono wabitaga; nayo yakawa nha yakupulutiza,
ninga wene wakamunena wakutya, “Wikalaje nase, hambi lizuwa nha lyaswa, ne citi ceza kwinjila.” Yakenjila nawo mu citumbi, yakekala nawo.
Kukawa, lono yali vikalane nawo ha ndigwa, yakawusola mukate, yakawulugutiza, yakawubegula, yakawapela.
I meso gawo gakenzelulwa, wakamumanya. Ninga mwene yakawuka si wamuwene.
Wakeyitya, “Wule 'ti, zinhumbula zetu si zali nha zikwaka muli'se lono yali kulongana nase mu nzila, na lono yali kuciloloseza ze mandiko?”
Wakenuka lulo baho, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakawagana wawalya i watumwa we likumi na monga wekonghoye, hamonga na walya wanji wono wali nawo;
wakutya “U Muwaha kazuka mbeka, kelajila kuli Simoni.
Nawo wa walya i wanhu wejete, wakawalonjela zizilya zono waziwene mu nzila, na vyono wamutanga Yesu mu wubegule wo mukate.”
Na wawalya i wejete lono walongaga zizi, Yesu yakema haciligati yawo, yakawatya, “U mulamu weze muli'nye.”
wakatinuka, no woga wukawebata, wakutya lunji wawona mwenzenze.
Ninga mwene yakawatya, “So cici mwina woga, na so cici mwina mahwele mu zinhumbula zenyu?
Lanjenyi mawoko gangu ne magulu gangu, vyo yo nene mweneco, munyalabataje munanje; hambi mwenzeze nha wusina muwili ne mafupa, nha vyono mukumbona ane nina navyo.”
Yaza longa zizi, yakawalajila mawoko gakwe, ne magulu gakwe.
Na lono wali wakali si wakwihuwila so nyemo no wizine, Yakawatya “Mwina cinji co kulya baha?”
Wakamupela cibimha ca somba cinyanywe.
Yakasola yakalya ha meso gawo.
Yakawatya, “Azi zo nghani zono namulonjelenyi, lono nali nghali hamonga nanye, nha vyono yali yinojeye kuzifisiliza zose, zono nandicilwa mu wulajilize wa Musa, na mu wawizi, na mu Zabuli.”
Hanyuma yakawagubulila mahala gawo, ho wasume kugatanga Mandiko Gono Gelile.
Yakawatya, “Vyo yandikwa, vyono yimunojeye Kilisito yatamiswe, na mwizuwa lye kadatu yimunojeye yazuce muli wafu.
Na kanyhi yinojeye mwi'tagwa lyakwe, kuganula wunene, no wuwopolelwe wo wubi, kuli makungugo gose, kwamuliziza ku Yelusalemi.
Nanye yo nyenye mono muli wahomelezi wa zizi.
Nane nomuletelenyi yuyo mono Baba yehuwiza vyono komutuma, ninga mulindilize mumo mwi'kaya, sunga muvwikwe i vilungo avilya vya kucanyha.”
Yakawategula sunga ku Betaniya, yakenula miwoko yakwe, yakawalugutiza.
Kukawa lono yawalugutizaga, yakawaleka, yakasolwa, yakabita ku wulanga.
Nawo wakamuhemba, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi wena ne nyemo mbaha,
wakekala vilo vyose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu akuno wakumulumba Mulungu.
Ha mwamulizo i yinze lono yali yikali nawumbwa, I Nghani yali yali baho. Nayo I Nghani yali yali hamonga no Mulungu, i Nghani nayo yali Mulungu.
Yuyo yali yali hamonga no Mulungu ku wulawa mwamulizo.
Ivinhu vyose vyawumbilwa muli mwene, na hasina ciwumbwa cinji co cose cono cawumbwa, hono hasina mwene.
U Mwene yali yo mwamulizo wo wumi; no wumi wuwo wali wuzelu we wanhu wose.
No wuzelu wuwo wumulikaga mu wutitu, hamba wutitu si wuwusumaga yaye.
U Mulungu yakamutuma munhu litagwa lyakwe Yohana.
Yuyo yaza kuwalonjela wanhu zo wuzelu wuwo. Na so wuhomelezi wakwe, iwanhu wose ho wehuwile.
U mwene Yohana, yo si yali wuwo wuzelu weneco, langa yaza du, ho yawalonjele wanhu zo wuzelu wuwo.
Awu wo wuzelu we mbeka, u wuzelu wono wukuza mono yinze, no kuwamulicila wanhu wose.
Ale, i Nghani yali mono yinze, ne yinze yawumbilwa muli mwene, ninga i yinze si yamutanga yaye.
Yakaza mu yisi yakwe mweneco, ninga i wanhu wakwe si wamubocela yaye.
Ninga wose wono wamubocela no kumwihuwila, yawapela i vilungo vyo kunozwa kuwa wana wo Mulungu.
Wono si waleleywe mu vilungo vye cimunhu munhu, hamba mu vilungo vyo munhu, hamba mu wuhile wo munhu, langa u Mulungu mweneco yo Sogo yawo.
I Nghani nayo yakawa munhu, yakekala mwetu. Nase cikayiwona i nhojo yakwe, i nhojo yakwe mwene mono mwana we ciwene wa Baba; yamemile lihewa ne mbeka.

Yohana yakawalonjela wanhu zinghani zakwe, yakawalonjela kwe 'zi yiwaha yakutya, “Ayu yo mwene mono namulonga, lono natya, Yakuza munhu munyuma yangu, mono yo muwaha yanyhizize nene, ku soko mwene yali yali baho na lono ane nali nghali nalelwa.”
Hambi mu wukwilanicile wakwe, nase mo cikubocelela lihewa lyakwe cibitilila.
Hambi u Mulungu, nha yawulavya Wulajilize mu nzila ya Musa, ninga i lihewa ne mbeka, vyaziza mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito.
Hasina munhu mono yamuwona Mulungu hanji ho hose, u Mwana we ciwene mono wali sawa no Mulungu, mono vilunzize no Sogwe, yuyu yo yacimanyiza zo Mulungu.
Awu wo wuhomelezi wa Yohana wono yawulonga, lono wawaha we Wayahudi wa ku Yelusalemi, wamutumila wakohani ne Walawi wamuwuze vyono mwene yo nani.
Nayo Yohana si yalema kupitula i liwuzo lilyo, ninga yakalonga calinze, yakatya, “Ane yo si nene Kilisito.”
Nawo wakamuwuza wakatya, “Alu gwegwe nani? Yo gwegwe Eliya lo?” Yohana yakatya, “Ng'o yo si nene.” Wakamuwuza, “Yo gwegwe muwizi yulya?” Yohana yakawapitula yakatya, “Ng'o yo si nene.”
Nawo wakamuwuza “Alu gwegwe nani? Ukiyitya gwegwe nani? Ucilonjele ho ciwategulile lipitulo wono wacitumile.”
Yohana yakatya, “Ane yo nene, mono muwizi Isaya yalonga. ‘Ane nili yizi lyono likuhulikwa ku nyika, Gololenyi nzila yo Muwaha.’ ”
Ne wanhu wawo wali watumigwe ne Wafalisayo.
Nawo wakamuwuza Yohana wakamutya, “Alu agwe hono si wuli Kilisito, hamba Eliya, hamba muwizi yulya, nhawule wukubaputiza?”
Yohana yakawapitula yakawatya, “Ane nghubaputiza kwe malenga, ninga ho yuli yunji yemile muli nyenye mono mukali namumanya.
Yo yuyo mono yakuza munyuma yangu, mono ane sinojeye hamba kuyiwopola imikowa ye malatu gakwe.”
Zizi zetumwa kuko ku Betaniya, ku nhumbi nzagwe ye likolongo lya Yoludani, kono Yohana yabaputizaga.
I mitondo yaco, Yohana yakamuwona Yesu yakumuziza, yakatya, “Mulanje, ayu Mwana Ngholo wo Mulungu, mono yakuwusa, wubi we yinze!
Yo mwene mono namulonga, mono natya, ‘Munyuma yangu yakuza munhu yunji muwaha mono yanyhizize nene, hambi nha yali yali baho lono na ane nali nghali nalelwa!’
Na nene si namumanya, ninga niza mbaputize kwe malenga, wanhu wa Isilayeli ho wasume kumumanya.”
Awu wo wuhomelezi wono Yohana yawulavya, “Nawona Muhe yakutima nha nziwa, yakulawa ku wulanga, yakamwikalila mwene.

Nane sinamumanya: langa u Mulungu mono yanhuma nghawabaputize wanhu kwe malenga, yali yanonjela yakutya, ‘U munhu yuyo mono komuwona u Muhe yakumutimila, yakumwikalila, yuyo yo yakubaputiza mu Muhe Mono Yelile.’
Nane nghondya kuwona, nane nghumulonjelenyi vyono yuyu yo Mwana wo Mulungu.”
I mitondo yaco kanyhi, Yohana yali yemile baho, hamonga na wejete wayagwe ne wejizwa wakwe.
Yaza kumuwona Yesu yakukola, yakatya, “Mulanje ayu Mwana Ngholo wo Mulungu!”
I wejizwa walya vyono wejete, wakamuhulika Yohana yakulonga zizo, wakamutyatya Yesu.
Yesu yakapituka, yakawawona wawo wejizwa wakumutyatya, yakawatya, “Alo mukulondola cici?” Nawo wakamutya, “Labi (nhunizo yayo Mwijizi) kwikalaga hayi?”
Yesu yakawatya, “Muze nanye mowona.” Iwejizwa wawo wakamutyatya, wakahawona i hanhu hono yekalaga. Wakaswezana nayo lizuwa lilyo, nayo yali nha saa kumi cinyamihe.
Andeleya, u mwanakwawe wa Simoni Petelo, yo yali muyagwe na wawalya iwejizwa wejete, wono wamuhulika Yohana vyono yakulonga, wakamutyatya Yesu.
Andeleya yakamula kumulondola u muwahawe Simoni, yakamutya, “Cimuwona Mesiya” (nhunizo yayo Kilisito.)
Hanyuma yakamutegula Simoni kuli Yesu. Nayo Yesu yakamulanga Simoni, yakatya, “Yo gwegwe Simoni u mwana wa Yona, alu kocemwa Kefa.” (Cigiliki wo wutya Petelo, hamba, “Yibwe”.)
I mitondo yaco, Yesu yakasaka kubita ku Galilaya, na kuko yakamwagana Filipo, Yesu yakamutya, “Wunhyatye.”
Nayo Filipo yali munya Betesayida ku kaya ya wa Andeleya na Petelo.

Nayo Filipo yakamwagana Nataneli, yakamutya, “Cimuwona ayulya mono Musa yandika i zakwe, mu citabu co Wulajilize, na kanyhi mono wawizi nawo wandika i zakwe, Yesu u mwana wa Yusufu, mulawa ku Nazaleti.”
Nataneli yakamutya Filipo, “Hambi ku Nazaleti nako kosuma kulawa cinhu ciswanu?” Filipo yakamutya, “Wuze wulanje.”
Yesu yakamuwona Nataneli yakuza kuli mwene, yakalonga zo mwene, “Mulanje! Ayo yo Mwiisilayeli we mbeka, mono yawusina wukonji wo wose muli mwene.”
Nayo Nataneli yakamuwuza, yakatya, “Alo kumanya wule?” Yesu yakapitula yakamutya, “Lono wali wikaye he 'sina lyo mukuyu, na lono wali wukali nacemwa na Filipo, ane nali nakondya kukuwona.”
Hobaho Nataneli yakamutya, “Mwijizi, yo gwegwe Mwana wo Mulungu, yo gwegwe Mutemi wa Isilayeli.”
Yesu yapitula yakamutya, “Alo wukwihuwila vyono nghulonjeye, nakuwona he 'sina lyo mukuyu? Kowona mawaha gono gacizize gaga.”
Yesu yakajendelela kulonga, “Mbeka nghumulonjelenyi, molowona u wulanga wukudiguka, ne wamalayika wo Mulungu wakubita kucanyha no kutima, muli Mwana wo Munhu.”
Lizuwa lye kadatu, kwali na wutozi ku Kana ya ku Galilaya; u nyina wa Yesu nayo yali yali kuko,
nayo Yesu ne wejizwa wakwe wakalalikwa ku halusi.
Ne divayi yaza malika, u nyina yakamutya Yesu, “Wasina divayi.”
Nayo Yesu yakamupitula nyina yakamutya, “Yaya wulece kunonjeleza cono nitume. Cipango cangu cikali nafika.”
Hobaho u nyina, yakawalonjela wetumami yakawatya, “Vyono komulonjelenyi, vyo mutende.”
Ale, baho hali na manyungu mutandatu ga mabwe, gono gali gakwiliye kwinjila madebe mejete, hamba madatu mwi'nyungu limonga. Gali gawicigwe baho, so wityatye we myoto ye Wayahudi yo kwizuguza.
Yesu yakawatya wetumami, “Mugamemyaje malenga manyungu gago.” Nawo wakagamemya twaa.
Hanyuma Yesu yakawatya, “Alu muneje mumo mumutegulile u muwaha wa ha wulilo.”

Nayo u muwaha wa ha wulilo, yaza kugajeza i malenga gago, kumbe gali gagaluka kuwa divayi. Nayo hamba si yamanya kono yilawile, langa wetumami wono wanega malenga, wo wali wamanyile. Holeka u muwaha wa ha wulilo, yakamucema munya Halusi,
yakamutya, “Munhu wo wose kamulaga kulavya divayi swanu, hanyuma hono wanhu weguta, ho yakulavya yono si swanu. Ninga agwe kuyiwika i swanu sunga alu.”
Aci co citanjilo cilongozi, Yesu yacinozeza ku Kana ya ku Galilaya, yakalulajila u lukumyo lwakwe, nawo wejizwa wakwe wakamwihuwila.
Hanyuma ya zizi, Yesu hamonga no nyina, ne wanduguze, ne wejizwa wakwe, wakabita ku Kapelanawumi, wakekala kuko vilo vicefu.
Sikukuu ye Wayahudi yono yicemwaga Pasaka, yikawa yasejelela, holeka Yesu yakabita ku Yelusalemi.
Yakawagana mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, iwanhu wono waguzaga zi ng'ombe, ne zingholo, ne zi nziwa, hamonga na wono wakawaga zipesa, wekaye ha zimeza zawo.
Yakanoza mukotya wa mulejehe, yakawawinga wose mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, hamonga ne zingholo, ne zing'ombe zawo, yakazimwaga hasi zipesa ze wakawa zipesa, yakazibidusa zimeza zawo.
Yakawalonjela wono wagulaga zinziwa, “Viwusenyi vinhu avi bahano, mulece kuyinoza Nyumba ya Baba kuwa nha sokoni.”
Iwejizwa wakwe wakakumbucila vyono yandikwa, “Uwendo wangu so Nyumba yako, wukumbulaga.”
Baho iwawaha we Wayahudi wakamuwuza Yesu wakutya, “Alo konoza citanjiloci, cono colajila vyono agwe wina ling'ani yo kunoza zizi?”
Yesu yakawapitula yakatya, “Muyimwagulaje Nyumba yiyi yo Mulungu, nane noyizenga mu vilo vidatu.”
Nawo Wayahudi wakamutya, “Nyumba yiyi yazengwa mu myaka makumi mane na mutandatu, nagwe ho wuyizenje mu vilo vidatu?”
Ninga Yesu yalongaga ze Nyumba yo Mulungu u muwili wakwe mweneco.
Nayo Yesu yaza kuzuka muli wafu, ho wejizwa wakwe wakakumbucila vyono yalonga zizi, wakagehuwila Mandiko Gono Gelile, ne nghani yono Yesu yali yayilonga.
Nayo Yesu, lono yali ku Yelusalemi ku sikukuu ya Pasaka, wanhu wenji wamwihuwila, waza kuviwona ivitanjilo vyono yavinoza kuko.
Ninga Yesu si yawehuwila, hambi nha yali yawamanyile wose.
Holeka kwali kusina soko ya yunji yamulonjele zono zili muli wene, hambi nha yali yazimanyile mweneco zose zono zili mu zinhumbula zawo.
Kwali na munhu monga Muyahudi, mulongola we cipuga ce Wafalisayo, litagwa lyakwe Nikodemo.

Yuyo yamubitila Yesu mwizuwa linji ne cilo, yakamutya, “Labi, cimanyile vyono wuli mwijizi mono watumwa no Mulungu. Hambi nha hasina munhu, mono kosuma kunoza vitanjilo vinha vivi vyono wukunoza agwe, hono Mulungu yalece kuwa hamonga nayo.”
Yesu yapitula yakamutya, “Ane nghukulonjela mbeka, vyono hono munhu yalece kulelwa wupya, si kosuma kuwuwona wutemi wo Mulungu.”
Nikodemo yakamuwuza yakatya, “Alu munhu hono yaza munhu mututu, kosuma kulelwa kanyhi? Si kosuma kwinjila mu'nda yo nyina ho yalelwe lwe kejete kanyhi.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Mbeka nghukulonjela, munhu hono yalece kulelwa kwe malenga no Muhe, sikokwinjilila lukulu mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
U munhu mu muwili, kalelwaga no sogwe no nyina, ninga mu cimuhe kalelwaga no muhe.
Wulece kwizina, vyono nghulonjeye, yinojeye kulelwa wupya.
I mbeho yiputilaga no kubita kono yendile, ne lizi lyayo wukulihulika, ninga si wumanyile kwihi kono yikulawa, hamba kwihi kono yikubita. Ale, nhavivyo vyo yenha munhu mono yaleligwe ko Muhe.”
Nikodemo yakamuwuza, yakatya, “Alu zosuma kuwa wule zizo?”
Nayo Yesu yamupitula yakamutya, “Alu, nha yo gwegwe mwijizi wa Isilayeli, hamba si wuzimanyile zizo?”
Mbeka nghukulonjela, ase cilongaga zono cizimanyile, no kuhomelela zono caziwona, nanye si mukuwuvumila u wuhomelezi wetu.
Ane nimulonjelenyi za kononze, nanye si munyihuwiye, alu ho mokwihuwila nhawule, hono nimulonjelenyi za ku wulanga?
“Hasina munhu mono yabita ku wulanga, langa hono si u Mwana wo Munhu, yo yatima kulawa ku wulanga.”
“Nha vyono Musa yatumbika lizoka lye shaba ku nyika, ale nhavivyo no Mwana wo Munhu, si koleka kutumbikwa,
muli wose mono yakumwihuwila, ho yawe no wumi we cibitilila.
Ku soko u Mulungu yayenda yinze nha vivi, sunga yakamulavya Mwanagwe we ciwene, na muli wose mono yakumwihuwila, yalece kwajilila, langa yawe no wumi we cibitilila.
Hambi u Mulungu, nha si yamutuma Mwanagwe kononze, ho yayiling'anize iyinze, langa ho yayikomboze.
“Mono yamwihuwiye mwana si yakuling'anizwa, mono si yamwihuwiye, yakondya kuling'anizwa, vyono si yamwihuwiye u Mwana we ciwene wo Mulungu.
Ne ning'aniza yeneco nha yoyi, uwuzelu waza kononze, ninga wanhu wakenda wutitu si nho wuzelu, vyono metumo gawo mabi.
U munhu wo wose mono ketumaga i metumo mabi, yuyo kawusulaga wuzelu, hamba si kazaga kono wuzelu, hambi nha si yendile i metumo gakwe mabi gamanyice.
Ninga mono ketumaga ze mbeka, yo kazaga kono wuzelu, ho metumo gakwe gejele vyono getumilwa mu cihuliko co kumuhulika u Mulungu.”
Hanyuma ya zizi, Yesu hamonga ne wejizwa wakwe, wakabita ku yisi ya Yudiya, yakekala nawo kuko, yakawa kubaputiza i wanhu.
Yohana nayo yabaputizaga mu Ayinoni behi na Salimu, vyono kwali na malenga menji kuko, wanhu wakamubitila, nayo yakawabaputiza. (
Hambi Yohana nha yali yakali si natajilwa mu jela.)
Wukejela wiwanganile hagati ya wejizwa wanji wa Yohana, no Muyahudi yunji, kuli ze myoto yo kwizuguza.
I wejizwa wawo wakamubitila Yohana, wakamutya, “Mwijizi, yuyulya mono mwali nayo ku nhumbi nzagwe ya Yoludani, mono wamuhomelela zakwe, alu mwene nayo yakubaputiza, ne wanhu wose wakumuziza.”
Yohana yakapitula yakatya, “Munhu si kosuma kuwa na cinji, hono yalece kupegwa no Mulungu.
Nyenye nyo weneco muli wahomelezi wa vyono nalonga, ‘Ane yo si nene Kilisito, langa natumwa ho nimulongolele u mwene.’
Bibi halusi yo wa bwana halusi, ninga mwendece wa bwana halusi, mono yemile yakuhuliciza, yakuwa na nyemo mbaha muno muno, lono yakumuhulika bwana halusi yakulonga. Ne nyemo yangu vyo yifisilizwe.
Yinojeye Mwene yalawilicile, nane ndodomhe.”
Mono yakulawa ku wulanga, yalawiliciye muli wose, nayo mono yakulawa mono'nze, yo we yinze, nayo kalongaga zinghani ze ciyinze-yinze. Ninga mono yakuza kulawa ku wulanga, yo yalawiliciye muli wose.
Zono yaziwona na zono yazihulika zo yakuzihomelela, ninga hasina mono yakuwubocela wuhomelezi wakwe.
Ninga munhu wo wose mono yakuwubocela wuhomelezi wakwe, yakukangaza vyono, Mulungu yo we mbeka.
Hambi mono yatumwa no Mulungu, nha yo kalongaga zinghani zo Mulungu, hambi u Mulungu nha yakumupela munhu yuyo Muhe wakwe wusina cipimo.
U Sogo yo munhu yamwendile Mwana, Nayo yamupelile vinhu vyose.
Mono yamwihuwiye u Mwana wo Mulungu, yena wumi we cibitilila; ninga mono si yakumuhulika u Mwana wo Mulungu, si kowa no wumi, langa wulipicizwe wo Mulungu wo kwikala muli mwene.
Wafalisayo wahulika vyono Yesu yabaputizaga no kuwatuga wejizwa wenji si nha Yohana. (
Ninga i mbeka, Yesu mweneco si yabaputizaga, langa wejizwa wakwe wo wabaputizaga du.)
Hobaho Yesu yaza kuhulika zizi, yakawuka ku Yudiya, yakawuya ku Galilaya.
Na mu wuwuye wakwe, yakakolela mu Samaliya.
Yakafika mwitumbi linji lya Samaliya lyono litezagwa Sukali, behi no mugunda wono Yakobo yali yamupela mwanagwe Yusufu.
Hanhu baho, hali ne lisima lya Yakobo. Nayo Yesu vyono yali yakataye muno so muhinzo, yakekala he 'sima. Nayo yali saa sita ne misi.
Yakaza mucekulu Musamaliya kunega malenga, Yesu yakamutya, “Wumhele ta malenga ning'we.”
(Na mwipango lilyo i wejizwa wakwe wali wabita ku mujini kugula ndigwa.)
Ninga u mucekulu yuyo Musamaliya, yakamutya, “Alu kosuma nhawule kunomba malenga, nane nili Musamaliya, nagwe wuli Muyahudi?” (Ku soko Wayahudi wali wasina wumonga ne Wasamaliya, mu vitumamilwa.)
Yesu yakamupitula yakamutya, “Mhali wuwe wumanyile i cipegwa ca kuli Mulungu, nayo yo nani mono yakukutya, wumhele malenga ning'we, nagwe wali wumulombe, nayo yali yakupele malenga go wumi.”
U mucekulu yuyo, yakamutya, “Muwaha, agwe wusina ciya co kunejela, ne lisima nalyo yitali, alu kogasola hayi gago malenga go wumi?
Hamba alu agwe, wukwinoza wuli muwaha si nho Sogo yetu Yakobo? Mwene Yakobo yacipela ase lisima lili, nayo yakang'wa mweneco i malenga ge lisima lili, ne wanagwe, sunga ne zimitugo zakwe?”
Yesu yapitula yakamutya, “Muli wose mono yakung'wa malenga gaga, kokaluka kanyhi.
Ninga muli wose mono kong'wa malenga gono nomupela, si kokalucila lukulu. Malenga gono nomupela gowa muli mwene nha muvwilo wa malenga, gakuvwila sunga ku wumi we cibitilila.”
U mucekulu yuyo yakamutya, “Muwaha, ale wumhele malenga gago ho ndece kukaluka kanyhi, ho ndece kuza baha kanyhi kunega malenga.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Wubite wukamuceme u mulume wako wuze nayo bahano.”
U mucekulu yapitula yakamutya, “Ane sina mulume.” Nayo Yesu yakamutya, “Kulonga mbeka, vyono wuteye sina mulume.
Hambi nha wali na walume wahano, sunga na mono wikaye nayo lulu, si mulume wako, baho langa kulonga mbeka.”
Nayo mucekulu yakamutya, “Muwaha, nghuwona vyono agwe wuli muwizi.
I wasetu wahembelaga mwitunda lili, ninga anye mutezaga, ku Yelusalemi ho hanojeye kumuhembela Mulungu.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Gwe yaya wunyihuwile, icipango cikuza, cono si molomuhemba u Sogo yo munhu, hamba mwi'tunda lili, kuko ku Yelusalemi.
Anye Wasamaliya, mumuhembaga ayulya mono imbeka, si mumumanyile yaye. Ninga ase langa co Wayahudi, cimumanyile yuyo mono cimuhembaga. Hambi i mhonelo nha yikulawa kuli Wayahudi.

Ninga i cipango cikuza, na lulu caza, lono wahembi we mbeka, womuhemba u Sogo yo munhu mu mbeka, mu vilungo vyo Muhe wo Mulungu. Hambi Sogo yo Munhu nha wo kasakaga i wanhu wono wakumuhemba mu nzila yiyo.
U Mulungu wo Muhe, ne wanhu wosuma kumuhemba mu mbeka, kwe vilungo vyo Muhe wakwe.”
Nayo u mucekulu yakamutya, “Manyile vyono Kilisito yakuza, na kolo yakuza mwene, kocilonjela zose.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Ane mono cikulongana nagwe, yo Nene.”
Lulo baho i wejizwa wakwe wakaza, wakezina muno kuwona yakuduwana no mucekulu. Ninga hasina hamba munhu mono yamutya, “Wukusaka cici?” Hamba, “So cici mukuduwana no mucekulu.”
Yuyo mucekulu yakayileka njilo yakwe baho, yakabita ku mujini, yakawalonjela wanhu yakutya,
“Muze mukamuwone u munhu mono yanonjeye zinghani zose zono nitumaga, alo kowa yo mwene Kilisito?”
I wanhu wakalawila mu mujini, wakamubitila Yesu.
Na mu cipango cico, i wejizwa wakwe wamunenelezaga Yesu, wakutya, “Mwijizi wulye zindigwa.”
Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “Ane nina ndigwa yono si muyimanyile anye.”
I wejizwa wakwe wakawa kwiwuza weneco wose wakutya, “Alo munhu kamuletela ndigwa?”
Yesu yakawatya, “I ndigwa yangu yoyi, nitume wuhile wa mono yanhuma, no kuwukondeleza u mulimo wakwe.
Anye mutezaga, Yikali myezi du, i cipango cen hwanga cowa cafika. Ninga ane nghumulonjelenyi, muyilangaje migunda, vyono yapisa, yakondya ku wududule.
Mono yakutwanga, yakubocela u musahala wakwe, nayo yakukonghola i nhwanga, ku soko yo wumi we cibitilila, mono yakuhadika na mono yakutwanga, ho wasangalalane hamonga.
Holeka nghani yiyi ya mbeka, ‘Yunji yakuhadika, yunji nayo yakutwanga.’
Ane namutumenyi, mutwanje nhwanga yono si mwayilavizya nhuguti, wanji wetuma, ninga anye mukumota vya munhuguti yawo.”
Wasamaliya wenji wa mu citumbi cico, wakamwihuwila Yesu soko ye zinghani zono yalonga yuyo mucekulu, zono yatya, “Kanonjela zinghani zose zono nitumaga.”
Wasamaliya wakamubitila Yesu, wakamulomba yekale nawo. Nayo yakekala baho vilo vyejete.
Ne wanhu wenji muno wakamwihuwila ku soko ye zinghani zakwe.
Wakamutya, yuyulya mucekulu, “Ase si cikwihuwila du ku soko yo wulonje wako, sese co weneco cihulika, na camanya mbeka vyono ayu yo Mukombozi we yinze.”
Hanyuma ya vilo vyejete, Yesu yakawuka baho, yakabita ku Galilaya.
Hambi Yesu mweneco nha yalonga calinze, vyono, “Muwizi si katugaga lilumbo mu yisi yakwe.”
