Holeka Yesu yaza kumuwona u nyina, hamonga no mwijizwa mono yali yamwendile, yemile behi no nyina, baho yakamutya nyina, “Yaya, wulanje ta, yuyo yo Mwanago!”
Hanyuma yakamulonjela nayo yuyulya mwijizwa, “Wulanje ta, yuyo yo nyina yako!” Na vyono yalawa lululya, u mwijizwa yakamusola, vikawa kwikalana nayo mu kaya yakwe.
Hanyuma Yesu, vyono yali yamanyile vyono zose zamalika, imandiko ho gafisilizwe, yakatya, “Nakaluka.”
Baho hali hoyili bakuli yono yali yimemile siki. Wakazabika sifongo mugati ya yiyo siki, wakayidobeceza mu lusito lwa ezobu, wakamung'wesa.
Nayo Yesu yaza kukondya kuyibocela yiyo siki, yakatya, “Yimalika” hodu yakenamya mutwe wakwe, yakawa kufwa.

Nawo Wayahudi, vyono lyali izuwa lye Ijumaa, lizuwa lyo wuwikanize. Ho miwili yilece kwikala mu musalaba mwi'zuwa lye Sabato, vyono lizuwa lilyo lye Sabato lyali izuwa yiwaha, Iwayahudi wakamulomba Pilato, imigulu ya wawo wono watumbikwa, yibenwe, ne miwili yawo yiwuswe.
Iwasilikale wakaza, wakamubena magulu, u mulongozi, na we kejete, wono watumbikanwa na Yesu.
Ninga waza kuza hali Yesu, wakawona vyono yakondya kufwa, holeka si wamubena migulu.
Ninga musilikale yunji muyawo, yakamucinya Yesu no mugoha ha lubavu, hobaho isakami ne malenga vikalawila. (
Nayo mono yaziwona zizi, yazilonga, nanye ho mwihuwile. Na zizo zono yalonga, za mbeka, nayo yamanyile vyono yakulonga za mbeka.)
Ne nghani yiyo yetumwa ho gafisilizwe i Mandiko Gono Gelile. “Hasina yifupa lyakwe hamba limonga lyono lyolobenwa.”
Kanyhi na hanji mandiko gakutya, “Wolomulanga mono wamucinya.”

Zaza kukondya zizi, Yusufu wa Alimataya, yuyo yakamulomba Pilato, yawusole u muwili wa Yesu. (Nayo Yusufu yali mwijizwa wa Yesu, ninga kwa cinyele, hambi nha yawogopaga i walongola we Wayahudi.) Nayo Pilato yakalumba. Holeka Yusufu yakaza, yakawusola u muwili wa Yesu.
Nikodemo nayo yakaza, yo yuyulya mono ha mwamulizo yamuziza Yesu ne cilo. Nayo yakaleta vihanza hanzwe vye manemane na wudi, kotya nha kilo makumi madatu.
Wakawusola u muwili wa Yesu, wakawuvunjiliza mu myenda ya bafuta, hamonga na vye mhunjile, nha vyono Wayahudi wazoweye kunoza mu maziko gawo.
Baho hanhu hono Yesu yatumbicilwa, hali ho yili busitani, na mu busitani yiyo, mwali na citenjelo cipya, cono hamba munhu yali yakali si nazikwa mumo.
Alu, ku soko yo wipiganze we Wayahudi wo wiwikanize so Sabato, na vyono kanyhi icitenjelo cico cali cili behi, wakamuzika Yesu mumo.
Mwizuwa lye jumapili, hakali mitondo muno muno, lono kwali kukali kutitu titu, Malyamu Magadalena yakabita ku citenjelo, nayo yakawona libwe yiwuse mu mulango we citenjelo.
Nayo yakawa kubita lumangho sunga kwa Simoni Petelo, no mwijizwa muyagwe mono yali yendigwe na Yesu, yakawatya, “Wamuwusa Muwaha mu citenjelo, hamba si cimanyile hono wamuwicile.”
Petelo hamonga na yuyulya mwijizwa muyagwe, wakalawila, wakabita ku citenjelo.
Wabita lumangho wose vyono wejete, ninga u mwijizwa we kejete, yakamutiga Petelo, yakalongola kufika ku citenjelo.
Nayo yaza kwinama no kusunjilila mugati ye citenjelo, yakawona sanda du, ninga si yenjila mu citenjelo mugati.
Nayo Simoni Petelo yakaza, yakumutyatya mu nyuma, yakenjila mu citenjelo mugati, nayo yakayiwona sanda hamonga,
ne citambala cono cali ciwopwe mu mutwe wa Yesu. Ne citambala cico si cali ciwikwe hamonga ne sanda, langa cali cipetye, ciwicigwe hanji cili wene.
Nayo u mwijizwa muyagwe mono yalongola kufika, nayo ho yakawa kwinjila, yakawona, yakehuwila. (
Wali wakali si nagezuka i Mandiko Gono Gelile, gono galonga gakutya, “Yali yimunojeye yazuce muli wafu.”)
Iwejizwa wawo wakawa kuwuya kwawo kanyhi.
Ninga Malyamu yali yemile ha citenjelo hanze yakulila, na lono yalilaga, yakenama, yakasunjilila mu citenjelo,
yakawawona wamalayika wejete wavwalile vivwalo vizelu, wekaye bahalya hono muwili wa Yesu wali wuwicigwe, yumonga ku mitwe, no muyagwe ku magulu.
Wamalayika wawo, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Alu yaya wukulilila cici?” Mwene yakatya, “Wamuwusa Muwaha wangu, hamba simanyile hono wamuwicile!”
Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakelenga ku nyuma, yakamuwona Yesu yemile, hamba si yamanya vyono yo mwene Yesu.

Yesu yakamuwuza “Alu yaya wukulilila cici? Wukumulondola nani?” Nayo Malyamu, yatezaga lunji kowa yo mulindiliza busitani, yakamutya, “Muwaha, hono yo gwegwe wumusolile, wunonjele hono wumuwicile, nane nomusola.”
Yesu yakamutya, “Malyamu!” Nayo Malyamu yakapituka, yakamutya, “Laboni!” ku nonga ye Cihebelaniya, (nhunizo yayo “Mwijizi.”)

Yesu yakamutya, “Wulece kung'ang'anila, hambi nha nghali nabita kucanyha kwa Baba. Langa wubite wukawalonjele wandugu zangu, vyono ane nghubita kuli Baba, mono nanye yo Sogo yenyu, na kuli Mulungu wangu, mono nanye yo Mulungu wenyu.”
Nayo Malyamu Magadalena yakabita, yakawalonjela wa walya iwejizwa nha vyono kamuwona Muwaha, na vyono yamulonjeye zizo.

Mwizuwa lilyo lye jumapili cinyamihe, iwejizwa wali wehangulize hamonga mu nyumba mugati, ne milango yikawa midinde, ku soko vyono wawogopaga iwalongola we Wayahudi. Nayo Yesu yakaza, yakema haciligati yawo, yakawatya, “Mulamu wuweze muli nyenye.”
Nayo yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakawalajila imiwoko yakwe, no lubavu lwakwe. Nawo iwejizwa wakasangalala waza kumuwona u Muwaha.
Nayo Yesu yakawatya kanyhi, “Mulamu wuweze muli nyenye. Nha vyono ane Baba yanhuma, nane vyo nghumutumenyi nanye nhavivyo.”
Yaza kukondya kulonga zizi, yakawahulila, yakawatya, “Mubocele u Muhe Mono Yelile.
Hono muwanenele wanhu wubi wawo, wowa wanenelwa, na hono mulece kuwanenela, si wonenelwa.”
Ninga Tomaso, muyagwe na walya, yo we likumi na wejete, (mono yacemwaga we Matundu,) si yali yali baho hamonga ne wayagwe lono yaziza Yesu.

Holeka iwejizwa wayagwe wakamulonjela wakatya, “Cimuwona Muwaha.” Ninga Tomaso yakawatya, “Hono ndece kuziwona zinghomele ze misumali mu maganza ge miwoko yakwe, no kucitajila icidole cangu mu zinghomele zizo, no kuwutajila umuwoko wangu ha lubavu lwakwe, si nosuma kwihuwila.”

Vyaza kupuluta vilo munana, iwejizwa wawo wakawa kanyhi mumulya mugati, hamonga na Tomaso. Ne milango yali midindwe, ninga Yesu yakaza, yakema ha ciligati yawo, yakawatya, “Mulamu wuweze muli nyenye.”
Hanyuma yakamutya Tomaso “Lete kuno cidole cako, wulanje maganza ge miwoko yangu, wulete no muwoko wako, winjize mu lubavu lwangu. Ho wulece kuwa na mahwele, langa wihuwile!”
Tomaso yakapitula yakamutya, “Muwaha wangu no Mulungu wangu!”
Yesu yakamutya, “Alu ho wehuwila vyono wambona? Ninga wamoti wono wehuwiye, lono wakali si nawona.”
Yesu yavinoza vitanjilo vinji hali wejizwa wakwe, vyono si vyandikwa mu citabu cicino.
Ninga azino zandikwa, ho mwihuwile vyono Yesu yo Kilisito, u Mwana wo Mulungu, na mu wihuwilo wenyu wuwo, ho mutuje wumi muli mwene.
Hanyuma ya zizo, yakelajila kanyhi kuli wejizwa wakwe ha mwejelele we lilamba lya Tibeliya. Nayo yelajila nhavi kuli wene.

Wa Simoni Petelo na Tomaso mono yacemwaga we Matundu, na Nataneli wa ku Kana ya ku Galilaya, hamonga ne wana wejete wa Zebedayo, kanyhi na wanji wejete wa muli wejizwa wakwe, wose wawo wali wali hamonga.

Simoni Petelo yakawa kuwatya i wayagwe, “Nye wayangu, ane nahelela ta, ku wunimula zisomba.” Nawo wakamutya, “Nase cobitana nagwe.” Hodu, wakawa kubita, wakenjila mu ngalawa, ninga hamba siwasuma kwibata cinji mu cilo cico.
Na lono kwali kweza kuli behi no kwelelecela, Yesu yali yemile kwi'sangha, ninga i wejizwa hamba siwasuma kumumanya vyono yo mweneco Yesu.
Baho Yesu yakawawuza, yakutya, “Alu wazelelo, mukali nebata hamba cinji hongo?” Nawo wakatya, “Heya, cikali nebata hamba cinji.”
Yesu yakawatya, “Ale, mulutajilaje lwavu ku lubavu lo kulume lwe ngalawa, nanye mozituga zisomba.” Nawo wakalutajila lwavu, hamba si wasuma kanyhi kulukwega, so winji we zisomba.

U mwijizwa yuyo mono yali yendigwe na Yesu, yakamutya Petelo, “Yo mwene Muwaha.” Nayo Petelo yaza kuhulika vyono yo mwene Muwaha, yakawa kwitunga mwenda wakwe (hambi nha si yali yetunjile) yakelujila mu malenga.

Ninga awalya iwejizwa wanji wakaziza mu cigalawa sunga ko ku nhumbi, akuno wakulukwega lwavu lono lwali lumemile masomba, hambi nha si wali wali kutali ne yisi nghavu, langa yali nha meta yigana limonga du, ku wulawa ku nhumbi.
Waza kutima ku nhumbi, wakawona moto wa makala wukolelezwe, na mucanyha yayo, mwali na somba na mukate vikasikwe.
Yesu yakawatya, “Letenyi ta, imasomba ganji gono munimuye lulu.”

Nayo Simoni Petelo, yakenjila mu ngalawa, yakalukwega lwavu sunga ko kwi'sangha, nalo lwali lumemile somba zi mbaha yigana limonga na makumi mahano na yidatu, hamba ziwe zali nyinji nhavivyo, ninga u lwavu si lwademuka.
Yesu yakawatya, “Muze mulye.” Na hasina hamba yumonga mono yejelela kumuwuza yatye, “Gwegwe nani?” Hambi wose nha wakamanya vyono yo mwene Muwaha.
Yesu yakaza, yakasola mukate yakawapela, ne zisomba yakanoza nhavivyo.
Alu lwali lo lwe kadatu, lwa Yesu kwilajila kuli wejizwa wakwe, lono yali yakondya kuzuka muli wafu.

Waza kukondya kulya, Yesu yakamutya Simoni Petelo, “Ati Simoni go mwana wa Yohana, alu wunyendile ane muno muno wuwacizize wawa?” Nayo yakamutya, “Heya Muwaha, agwe wumanyile vyono ane nghwendile.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wudime vikolo vyangu.”

Lwe kejete kanyhi yakamutya, “Simoni go mwana wa Yohana, wule, wunyendile ane muno muno?” Nayo Petelo yakatya, “Heya Muwaha, wumanyile vyono ane nghwendile.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wudime zingholo zangu.”

Lwe kadatu kanyhi yakamutya, “Ati Simoni go mwana wa Yohana, wunyendile ane 'mbi?” Nayo Petelo yakakalala vyono Yesu yamuwuzize kadatu yakutya, “Wunyendile?” Yakamutya, “Muwaha, agwe wumanyile zose, wumanyile vyono ane nghwendile.” Yesu yakamutya, “Ale wudime zingholo zangu.”

Nghukulonjela mbeka, vyono “Lono wali wukali mudodo, wali wuzoweye kwiwopa musipi no kubita ko kose kono wasakaga. Ninga kolo weza kukombipa, kologolola mawoko gako, na yunji kolokuwopa, yakutegule kono si wendile.”
(Yesu yalongaga zizi, yakulajila vyono Petelo kofwa no kumukumya Mulungu). Hanyuma yakamutya, “Wunhyatye.”

Baho Petelo yakapituka, nayo yakamuwona yuyulya u mwijizwa mono Yesu yali yamwendile, yakuwatyatya. U mwijizwa yuyu, yo ayulya u mwijizwa mono yali yekaye behi muno na Yesu ha zindigwa ze cinyamihe, mono yamuwuza Yesu yakutya, “Muwaha nani mono kokugaluka.”
Holeka Petelo yaza kumuwona yuyo, yakamutya Yesu “Ati Muwaha, ayu nayo ma?”
Yesu yakamutya, “Hono nyende yuyu yekale sunga kolo nghuza, agwe wina nghani 'ci? Agwe wunhyatyaje nene.”

Ne nghani yiyo yikamanyika muli we zindugu, vyono u mwijizwa yuyo si kolofwa. Ninga Yesu si yamulonjela vyono u mwijizwa yuyo si kolofwa, langa yatya, “Hono nyende yuyu yekale sunga kolo nghuza, agwe wina nghani 'ci?”
Ayu yo mwijizwa mono yazihomelela zinghani zizi, no kuzandika. Nase cimanyile vyono wuhomelezi wakwe wa mbeka.
Kanyhi kozili zinji nyinji zono yanozaga Yesu, zono mhali zandikwe zose, monga monga, na lunji, sunga ne yinze yeneco si yali yikwile so winji we vitabu vyono vyali vyandikwe.
Ndugu yangu Teyofilo, Mu citabu cilongozi nandika zose zono Yesu yetuma no kwijiza, ku wulawo mwamulizo wo mulimo wakwe,
sunga mwi'zuwa alilya lyono yanyasulilwa no kuwuya ku wulanga. Na lono yali yakali nanyaswulwa no kuwuya ku wulanga, yawalajiliza mu Muhe Mono Yelile, wawalya iwatumwa wono yawahagula.

Na lono, yali yatamiswa yakondya, yakelajila kuli wene vyono mumi, mu vitanjilo vinji vye vilungo, lono yejelaga kuli wene yidaha lya vilo makumi ma'ne. Wamuwona, nayo yakaduwana nawo muli zo wutemi wo Mulungu.
Na lono wali wetang'anila hamonga, yakawalonjela yakutya “Mulece kuwuka ku Yelusalemi, langa mucilindilaje icipegwa cono yehuwiza Baba, icipegwa cono mwakondya kucihulika nghucilonga.
Hambi Yohana nha yabaputizaga mu malenga; ninga anye mu vilo vicefu, mobaputizizwa mu Muhe Mono Yelile.”
Baho wene, waza kwikonghola hamonga na Yesu, wakamuwuza wakutya, “Ati Muwaha, kwinha nhavivi ho kowakombolela Isilayeli Wutemi?”
Ninga Yesu yakawatya, “I madaha ne vilo, vili mu wulajilize wa Baba, holeka si zenyu kumanya zowa nili.
Ninga mopegwa vilungo, kolo yakumuzizenyi u Muhe Mono Yelile, nanye mowa wahomelezi wangu mu Yelusalemi, na mu yisi yose ya Yudiya, na Samaliya, sunga ko ku mhelo ye yinze.”
Nayo yaza kondya kulonga zizi; nawo lono wamulangaga, yakanyasulilwa ku wulanga, livunde likamugubiciza ha meso gawo, hamba kumuwona kanyhi.
Nawo lono wali wakali wagalamiye ku wulanga lono yabitaga, lanje, wanhu wejete wono wali wavwalile vivwalo vizelu, wakema behi nawo;

nawo wakatya, “Nye nyo wanhu wa Galilaya, alo so cici mwimile mugalamiye ku wulanga? Ayu Yesu mono yasoligwe kuli'nye no kuwuya ku wulanga, kolokuza kanyhi nhavivyo vyono mumuwene yakubita ku wulanga.”
Baho Iwatumwa wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakulawa ku cigongo cono citezagwa ca Mizeyituni, cono cali cihinzo ca kotya kilometa monga du ku wulawa ku Yelusalemi.

Nawo waza kufika, wakenjila mu nyumba ya ku golofa, mono wekalaga, nawo wali wa Petelo na Yohana na Yakobo na Andeleya, Filipo na Tomaso, Batolomayo na Matayo, Yakobo mwana wa Alifayo, na Simoni zelote, na Yuda mwana wa Yakobo.
Wawa wose, waswezanaga hamonga mu wulombe ko wuhile wumonga, hamonga ne wacekulu wanji, hamonga na Malyamu u nyina wa Yesu, ne wanduguze wa Yesu.
Hanyuma ya vilo vicefu, hakawa na mukung'ano wa wono wali wakondya kwihuwila, wali waficile nha wanhu yigana limonga na makumi mejete. Petelo yakema hamwande yawo,
yakatya, “Wandugu zangu, cinojele mandiko gafisilizwe, gono yamula kulonga u Muhe Mono Yelile ko mulomo wa Dawudi, za Yuda mono yali mutonji wa wono wamwibata Yesu.
Hambi Yuda nha yali yawalilizwe hamonga nase, hambi nha yahagulwa yahanje nase mu witumami wuwu.” (
Mumanyile vyono mwene yawugula mugunda, ne zipesa zizilya zono yazitujila mwi'tumo lyakwe ilibi. Yakagwa hasi, yakabahuka, no wutumbu wakwe wukalawila kudeha.
Ne wanhu wose wa mu Yelusalemi, wakazihulika zizi, holeka wakawucema mugunda wuwo mu nonga yawo, wakawutya, “Hakeli Dama nhunizo yayo Cigundu ce Sakami.”)
“Hambi nha yandikwa mu citabu ce Zabuli: ‘Wikalo wakwe liweze 'tongo, Hamba munhu wo wose yalece kwikala mumo,’ Kanyhi yandikwe, ‘Munhu yunji yahalile u witumami wuwo.’
“Holeka yinojeye munhu yunji, yawe muhomelezi hamonga nase zo wuzuce wakwe u Muwaha Yesu.

Yimunojeye yawe yumonga wa muli awalya wono cijendanaga nase mu vilo vyose, vyono u Muwaha Yesu yajendanaga nase, wulawa mwipango lyono Yohana yabaputizaga, sunga lizuwa lilya lyono Yesu yanyasulilwa kuwulawa kuli'se no kubita ku wulanga.”
Wakatambula matagwa ga wanhu wejete; u mulongozi Yusufu mono yacemwaga Balasaba (hamba liyagwe Yusito,) na we kejete Matiya.
Hanyuma wakalomba wakatya, “Gwe go Muwaha, mono wumanyile zinhumbula ze wanhu wose, alu wulajile muli wawa vyono wejete, mono wumuhaguye,
yahalile witumami no wutumwe wuwu, wono yawuleka Yuda, ho yabite kwakwe mweneco.”
Baho wakatowa kula, ne kula yikamwihaga Matiya, nayo yakawalilizwa ne watumwa we likumi na monga.
Lizuwa lye Pentekote lyaza fika, wono wali wehuwiye, wali wekongholeye wose hamonga.
Hobaho kukaza nhinicizo cihumbi cikulawa ku wulanga nha ca mbeho mbaha yikukukunza, cikamema mu nyumba yose mono wali wekaye.
Hobaho zikawalawila zinimi, zikegawa nha malambi go moto ako na ako, zikawatimila yumonga yumonga.
Wose wakamemywa Muhe Mono Yelile, wakanza kulonga milonjele hayo hayo, nha vyono Muhe yawapela vilungo mu wulonje.
Ale, ku Yelusalemi ko wali wekaye Wayahudi, wanhu wogopa Mulungu, wa mu zinghungugo zose ze wanhu wa kononze.
Cihumbi cico caza kuhulikwa, ne lipuga liwaha lye wanhu wakekonghola, likawa kwizina muno, vyono wanhu wose wawahulika wawo wakulonga mu milonjele yawo.
Wakatinuka wose, wakezina, wakutya, “Ati, wawa wose wono wakulonga si Wagalilaya?
Alu yiwa wule, ase cikuwahulika wose wakulonga, munhu ne milonjele ya cinyo kwetu kono calelelwa?
Muli'se, wanji Wapaliti na Wamedi na Welamiti, na wanji wanya ku Mesopotamiya, ku Wuyahudi, na Kapadokiya, Ponto, na Asiya,
ku Felugiya na Pamufuliya, ku Misili na ku mbavu za Libiya behi na Kilene; wanji muli 'se wajenzi wakulawa ku Lumi,

Wayahudi, ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi wono wapituciye mu dini ye Ciyahudi, wanji walawa ku Kilete na ku Alabiya. Ase wose cikuwahulika wawa, wakulonga mu nonga zetu co weneco, ze metumo mawaha go Mulungu.”
Wose wakezina no kugazika akuno wakwiwuza, “Alu nye, cici co cici?”
Ninga wanji wakazwajiza wakatya, “Nye, wanhu awa wagalile divayi mhya.”

Ninga Petelo, yakema hamonga ne wayagwe we likumi na monga, yakenula lizi lyakwe muno muno, yakawa kwanza kuwaganulila wanhu yakutya, “Nye wandugu zangu Wayahudi, nanye wose mono mwikaye mu Yelusalemi, muhulicize zono nghulonga.
Wanhu awa nha si wagalile vyono mukuganiciza nyenye, hambi alu nha yikali saa tatu du ya hakali mitondo?
I mbeka, wo wutya nghani ayi, yo nghani ayilya yono yalongwa no muwizi Yoweli yono yatya,

‘Ku vilo vye ndumilizo vyo yolowa, yakutya Mulungu, nolowetila iwanhu wose Muhe wangu. Ne wana wenyu, we cilume na we cicekulu woloziganula izinghani zangu, ne wazelelo wenyu, wolowona wugubulilwe, Ne wakombi wenyu, wololota zindoto.
Heya, sunga ne wetumami wangu we cilume na we cicekulu, nolowetila zo Muhe wangu mu vilo vivyo, nawo woloyiganula inghani yangu.
Kanyhi nololajila imezino ku wulanga kucanyha, ne vitanjilo kono'nze hono hasi, kolowa na sakami, no moto ne nghungulyosi yizito.
Lizuwa lyolopituswa liwe citi, no mwezi wolopituswa wuwe sakami, lono lyowa likali si naza ilizuwa lyo Muwaha, lizuwa liwaha litambule,
Baho, muli wose mono kololomba mwitagwa lyo Muwaha yo kolopona.’

“Nye mo wa Isilayeli, muhulicize zinghani zizi! Yesu wa Nazaleti, munhu mono yahomelelwa no Mulungu kwenyu, mu metumo mawaha ne mezino, ne vitanjilo, vyono Mulungu yavinozeza muli mwene hali nyenye, vyono mumanyile mo weneco,
na mu wutemezwe no wumanye we katali wo Mulungu, yali yakondya kudumula nghani, vyono Yesu kowikwa mu miwoko yenyu, nanye mukamuwulaga mu nzila yo kuwalecela iwanhu wabi, wamutumbice mu musalaba
Ninga u Mulungu yamuzukula, yakamuponya mu wusungu we lifwa, ku soko si yali yisumice hamba hadodo lifwa limwibate.
Hambi Dawudi nha yakulonga zo mwene nhavi, ‘Namuwonaga Muwaha ha mwande yangu nhondo zose, hambi nha yali hamonga nane ku lubavu lwangu lo kulume, holeka sinosinjisika.
Ku soko yiyo nhumbula yangu yikasecelela, nane nghatowa lucenze lo wusangalale. No muwili wangu wokwikala mu witumbilo,
Hambi nha si koyileka inhumbula yangu mu yisi ye wafu, hamba si komukombola Mono Yelile wako yawolele mu citenjelo.
Wangubulila zinzila zo wumi, wuwe wako, wo kuwa wuli baho, wukumhela nyemo!’
“Nye wandugu zangu, nyendile kumulonjelenyi cagalanze, zo kuku yetu Dawudi. U mwene yafwa, yakazikwa, ne citenjelo cakwe cili baha hono hetu sunga nalu.
Ninga Dawudi vyono yali muwizi, yali yamanyile vyono u Mulungu yamwilahila ko wilahe, vyono mu lulelo lwakwe, kolomwikaza yunji mwigoda lyakwe;
mwene Dawudi vyono yamula kumanya zizo, holeka yawulonga wuzuce wakwe Kilisito, lono yatya, ‘Inhumbula yakwe si yalekwa mu yisi ye wafu, hamba u muwili wakwe si wawolela mu citenjelo.’
Yuyo Yesu, Mulungu yamuzukula, nase wose cili wahomelezi we nghani yiyo.

Yesu yawuya kucanyha, sunga ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu, yakabocela kuli Sogwe cicilya cipegwa cono yehuwiza, co Muhe Mono Yelile; holeka azi zono mukuwona alu, no kuhulika, wo wumwajilwe wa yuyo Muhe.
Hambi Dawudi mweneco, nha si yabita sunga ku wulanga, ninga umwene yakutya: ‘U Muwaha yamutya Muwaha wangu, Wikale ku lubavu lwangu lo kulume,
Sunga niwawice walugu wako wawe nha cibawo co wukanyago we magulu gako.’
“Ne mhuga yose ya Isilayeli yiwanojeye wamanye manyi manyi, nha vyono, u Mulungu yamunoza yuyo, kuwa yo Muwaha kanyhi yo Kilisito, yuyo Yesu mono mwamutumbika nyenye.”
Iwanhu waza hulika zizi, wakahomeka mu nhumbula zawo, wakamutya Petelo ne watumwa wayagwe, wakatya, “Alo citende wule wandugu zetu.”
Petelo yakawatya, “Nenenyi no kubaputizwa wose, mwitagwa lya Yesu Kilisito, ho mutuje wunenelwe wo wubi wenyu; no kubocela acilya icipegwa co Muhe Mono Yelile.
Hambi wihuwizo wuwo nha wehuwizwa ku soko yenyu, na ku soko ye wana wenyu, na ku soko ya wose wono wali kutali, na kusoko ya wo wose walya wono Muwaha Mulungu kowacemela kwakwe.”
Petelo yakawahomelela kwa nghani zinji nyinji; yakawakangaziza no kuwakong'onheza iwanhu yakutya, “Mwiponye mu lulelo lulu ulubi.”
Wenji mwizuwa lilyo, wakayibocela nghani yakwe, no kubaputizwa. Wakonjelezeka wanhu nha elufu yidatu wono wehuwila.
Na wawa wose wakajendelela kwiyijiza kulawa kuli watumwa imikalile ye cindugu, mu wubegule wo mukate ne malombo.
Mapoto menji ne vitanjilo vinji vikanozwa ne watumwa, sunga wanhu wose wakenjilwa no woga.
Na wose wono wali wehuwila wakajendelela kuwa cinhu cimonga, wakawa wahanjiye vyose;
wakaguza sawo zawo, ne vitumbilwa vyawo, wakawa kugawana zipesa wose, munhu nha vyono yasakaga.

Nawo wakajendelela kwitang'anila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu no wuhile wumonga vilo vyose. Langa mwi'daha lyo wubegule wo mukate, wetang'anililaga mu zinyumba zawo, no kuhanga wose ndigwa yiyo ne nyemo na nhumbula nzelu,
wakumulumba Mulungu, wakendwa ne wanhu wose. U Muwaha yakawa kuwonjelezeza nhondo zose iwanhu wono yawaponyaga.
Izuwa linji Petelo na Yohana lono wenjilaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu saa tisa ye misi, mu cidaha co kulombela.

Na baho behi no mulango we Nyumba yo Mulungu, wono wucemwaga “Mulango muswanu,” hali hoyuli munhu yumonga, mono yali yali citewe kulawa vyono yalelwa. Wanhu wamudinghulaga nhondo zose, no kumuwika baho, ho yelombeleze vye lihewa kuli wanhu wono wenjilaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu.
Yaza kuwawona wa Petelo na Yohana wakwinjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawalomba ho wamupele co cose.
Petelo na Yohana wakamulanga muno, hanyuma Petelo yakamutya, “Ta wucilangaje!”
Nayo yakawapitucila, yaganicizaga nha kotuga cinji kuli wene.
Ninga Petelo yakamutya, “Ane sina mapesa, hamba zahabu, langa yono nina nayo, yo nghukupela. Mwi'tagwa lya Yesu Kilisito wa Nazaleti, wujende!”
Hanyuma yakamwibata u muwoko wo kulume, yakamwinula. Lo lulo lulo migulu ne mafugamilo gakwe gakakama.
Yakazumha, yakema, yakanza kujenda; vikenjilana hamonga nawo mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakujenda, yakuzumhazumha, akuno yakumulumbo Mulungu.
Iwanhu wose wono wali wali baho, wakamuwona yakujenda no kumulumbo Mulungu.
Waza mumanya vyono yo mwene mono kekalaga yakilombeleza ha Mulango muswanu we Nyumba yo Mulungu, wakezina muno, hamba kumanya zono zimwijeleye.

Iwanhu wose lono wali wakali no wizine wuwaha, hobaho wakanza kwikongholela lumangho i hanhu hono hatezagwa “Likumbo lya Solomona,” ihanhu hono yuyulya munhu, vyali vikali vityatyizye na Petelo na Yohana.
Na Petelo yaza wawona wanhu wawo, yakawapitucila yakawatya, “Nye mo wanhu wa Isilayeli, so cici mukucilanga sese, mukutya mba, mu vilungo vyetu, lunji mu wuswanu wetu, holeka cimunozize yuyu yajende?

U Mulungu wa Abulahamu, na wa Isaka, na wa Yakobo, u Mulungu we wakuku zetu, yo yamukumizye Mwitumami wakwe Yesu; mono mwamulavya anye, mwene yo yuyo mono mwamutajila mu miwoko ye wawaha, no kumulema hamwande ya Pilato, hambe Pilato yasakaga kumulecela.
Yali munhu muswanu na yali yelile. Ninga anye mwamulema, mukasaka munhu yunji mono yali muwulaji yo yawopolelwe.
Mukawa muwulaga ayulya mono yo mwamulizo wo wumi. Ninga Mulungu yamuzukula, nase yo sese mono cili wahomelezi we nghani yiyi.
Litagwa lya Yesu, no wihuwilo wa mwi'tagwa lilyo, vyo vimupelile vilungo munhu ayu mono mukumuwona, no kumumanya, wihuwilo wa muli Yesu, wo wumuponezye lukulu munhu yuyu nha vyono mukuwona wose.
“Alu wandugu zangu, mumanyile vyono anye, hamonga ne wawaha wenyu, mwetumila citu.
Ninga u Mulungu vyo yazifisiliza nha vivyo, azilya zono yazilajila katali mu milomo ye wawizi wose, vyono Kilisito wakwe kolotamiswa.
Alenyi muyikawanizaje mikalile yenyu imibi, mumuwuyile u Mulungu, nayo ho yawupate wubi wenyu,
Mwitumaje nhavivyo ho vize ividaha vyo wupozwe mu nhumbula, vikulawa kuli Muwaha; nayo ho yamutume Kilisito mono yamutemezya, nayo yo Yesu.
U Mwene si koleka kwikala ku wulanga sunga kolo lyafika lipango lyo kunozwa wupya vinhu vyose, nha vyono Mulungu yalonjile muli wawizi wakwe wono welile wo wulawa katali.
Hambi mbeka Musa nha yalonga yakatya, ‘U Muwaha Mulungu, komwinulilenyi muwizi nha nene, mono kolawa muli nyenye mo weneco.’
“Na yowa muli wose mono si komuhulika muwizi yuyo, kotengwa no kutagwa kutali ne wanhu wo Mulungu.
Iwawizi wose, ku wulawilila Samwili, na wose wono wamutyatya mu nyuma, wose walonga ze zinghani zizi zono zikwitumwa mu vilo vivi.

Wihuwizo wo Mulungu wono yehuwiziza mu wawizi, wali wihuwizo wenyu, kanyhi anye muli we cilagane cono Mulungu yalaganila ne wakuku zenyu, nha vyono yamulonjela Abulahamu, ‘Mu lulelo lwako izinghungugo zose za kono'nze mo zolomotela.’
Holeka Mulungu yamuzukula Mwitumami wakwe so cambuzi cenyu, yamutuma ho yamuletelenyi wumoteswe wo kumunozenyi mupituce no kugaleka imabi genyu munhu na lwakwe.”
Petelo na Yohana lono wali wakali wakuwaganulila wanhu, Wakohani no muwaha we walindiliza Nyumba yo Mulungu hamonga ne Wasadukayo, wakawaziza;
wakugazika muno mu zinhumbula, vyono wawo watumwa, wawaganulilaga wanhu vyono Yesu yazuka, inghani yono yikulajila cagalanze vyono iwafu wolozuka.
Wakawebata, na vyono cilo cali casejelela, wakawatajila mu jela, sunga imitondo yaco.
Ninga wenji wono wayihulika i nghani, wehuwila, na ku wuwale, wali waficile nha wanhu elufu yihano.
Kukawa waza kwela, iwawaha wawo ne Wanyamhala ne wejizi wo Wulajilize, wakekongholela ku Yelusalemi,
na Anasi u Mukohani Muwaha yali yali baho, na Kayafa, na Yohana, na Alekizanda, na wose wono wali we mhuga yo Mukohani Muwaha.
Waza kuwawika iwatumwa hamwande yawo, wakawawuza wakutya, “Alu 'nye, mukwitumila zizi mu vilungo vya hayi, na mwitagwa lya nani?”
Hobaho Petelo, yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakawatya, “Nye mo walongola we wanhu, na mo wanyamhala!
Hono yiwe mukuciwuza izuwali, zo witume wuswanu wono yatendeywe ayulya munhu mono yali yali citewe, na vyono yatujile yuyu wupone.

Ale, yimanyice kwenyu wose, na kuli wanhu wose wa Isilayeli, vyono, mwi'tagwa lya Yesu Kilisito wa Nazaleti, mono mwamutumbika nyenye, mono Mulungu yamuzukula muli wafu, mwi'tagwa lilyo, yuyu holeka yemile baha hali nyenye mutelevu.
Yo mwene mono Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, ‘Ilibwe lyono mwalilema anye nyo wazenji Lyanozwa kuwa yibwe yiwaha lyo musinji.’
“Hamba hasina mhonelo muli yunji wo wose, hamba yitagwa linji nha hasina hono hasi yo wulanga, lyono wapegwa wanhu, lyono linojeye ciliponele.”

Wawo wanyamhala wo mukung'ano, wali wawamanyile wa Petelo na Yohana vyono wali wanhu du wono si wasomile, ninga wakawezina kuwawona wakulonga kwe vilungo wasina hamba woga. Wakawezuka, vyono wawezanaga na Yesu.
Nawo waza kumuwona munhu mono yaponywa vimane nawo, wakawa wasina ya kulonga.
Holeka wakawatya walawile kunze yo mukung'ano, wene ho watuje cilejeho co kwiheha.
Wakawa kwiwuza, “Alo ciwatende wule wanhu wawa? Hambi i nghani ye lipoto lili nha yimanyice kuli wanhu wose wa mono Yelusalemi, nha vyono linozwa na wene, hamba ase sicosuma kulikana.
Ninga hono cisace nghani yiyi yilece kutandala muli wanhu, ale ciwogofyaje, ho walece kujendelela kulonga kanyhi na munhu wo wose mwi'tagwa lya Yesu.”
Holeka wakawacema wenjile, wakawalonjela vyono walecele lukulu kuganula calinze, hamba kwijiza mwi'tagwa lya Yesu.
Ninga Petelo na Yohana wapitula wakawatya, “Ale mulonje, hono yo ling'ani hali Mulungu cimuhulicenyi nyenye si nho kumuhulika Mwene.
Hambi nha si cosuma kuleka kuzilonga zono cawona no kuhulika.”
Nawo wawo iwanyamhala wo Mukung'ano waza cila kuwogofya, hanyuma wakawaleka. Hambi nha si wayiwona yo kuwatamisiza, hambi wanhu wose nha wamukumyaga Mulungu, so nghani yiyo yono yanozeka.
Nayo u munhu yuyo mono yaponywa nha yali yaficile myaka makumi mane no musapu.
Nawo wa Petelo na Yohana waza kukombolwa, wakabita kuli wayawo, wakawaganulila zose zono walonjelwa ne wakohani wawaha ne wanyamhala.
Na wawo, waza hulika, wakenulila hamonga i mazi gawo kuli Mulungu, wakatya, “Gwe Muwaha, mono wanoza wulanga ne yinze ne lilenga, na vyose vyono vili mugati!
Mono wamunoza sogo yetu Dawudi, mwitumami wako, yalonje kwe vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, yakutya: ‘So cici i wanhu wono si Wayahudi wakalipe? Ne wanhu wehwesa gono gali musina?
Iwatemi we yinze wakewikaniza, Ne wawaha wakekonghola hamonga, Ho wamuleme Muwaha na Kilisito wakwe.’

“Kwaco mbeka, Helode na Pontiyo Pilato, wena ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ne zimhuga za Isilayeli, nha wekongholela baha mu kaya yiyi ku soko yo mwitumami wako mono yelile, Yesu mono wamunoza yawe Kilisito.
Heya, wetang'anila ho wanoze zizilya, zono wetemezezya no kuziwikaniza kwe vilungo vyako, na ko wendo wako, ku wulawa mwamulizo.
Alu Muwaha wulanje wogofye wawo. Wucipelaje vilungo co wetumami wako ho ciyiganule nghani yako cisina woga.
Wugolole muwoko wako no kuwaponya wanhu. Mapoto ne mezino, ganozezwe mwi'tagwa lyo Mwitumami wako mono yelile, Yesu.”
Nawo waza kukondya kulomba, i hanhu baho hono wali wehangulizize, hakasinjisika, nawo wose wakamemywa u Muhe Mono Yelile. Nawo wose wakawa kwanza kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu wasina woga.
Ne mhuga yawo wose wono wehuwila, wali na nhumbula monga no mutima monga. Hasina hamba yunji mono yali yena cinji co cose, mono yatya, yo sawo yakwe mweneco, langa wali wahanjile vyose.
Na mu vilungo vinji, watumwa wakahomelela zo wuzuce wo Muwaha Yesu, nayo u Mulungu yakawapela ko winji lihewa lyakwe.
Hambi nha kwali kusina muyawo mono yali yanjiye cinji, hambi wose wono wali wena migunda, lunji nyumba, waviguzaga,
no kuziwika zipesa zayo mu miwoko ye watumwa, wakagawilwa wose, viling'aniye munhu ne visakwa vyakwe.
Hakawa na mulawi yumonga mulelelwa ku Kupulo, litagwa lyakwe Yusufu, mono watumwa wamucemaga Balanaba, (nhunizo yayo, “Mwana wo wutuzwe.”)
Nayo yali yena mugunda wakwe, yakawuguza, yakazileta zipesa, no kuziwika mu miwoko ye watumwa.
Ninga kukawa na munhu litagwa lyakwe Ananiya, no mugolece wakwe Safila, nawo wakawuguza u mugunda wawo nha vivyo.
Ninga yakacepula nusu ye zipesa, no kuleta kuli watumwa nusu yayo du, no mugolece wakwe nayo yali yayimanyile nghani yiyi.
Ninga Petelo yakamuwuza yakutya, “Ati, Ananiya, alo so cici Setani yakumemizye nhumbula yako, ho wumukoce u Muhe Mono Yelile, ho wukacepule nusu ye zipesa zono wawuguza mugunda?

Lono wali wukali sinawuguza, wali wako, na lono wali wakondya kuwuguza, izipesa zizo zali zako, ho wuzitumamile nha vyono wendile. Alu so cici kulamula nghani yiyi mu nhumbula yako no kwituma nghani yiyi? Ninga wumanye vyono si wumukonjile munhu, langa kumukonga Mulungu!”
Nayo Ananiya yaza hulika zinghani zizi, yakagwa hasi no kufwa baho baho. No woga wuwaha muno muno wukawebata wose wono wazihulika zizi.
Iwazelelo wakenuka, wakawuwopa umuwili wakwe ne sanda, wakamutegula kunze, wakamuzika mu citenjelo.
Caza kupuluta cidaha kotya ca saa yidatu nhavi, u mugolece wakwe yakenjila mu nyumba, akuno si yamanyile zono ziweye.
Petelo yakamutya, “Ati Safila wunonjele ta, ati, lili lyo liwalo lye zipesa zono mwawuguza mugunda?” Nayo Safila yakatya, “Heya, lyo liwalo lilyo.”
Nayo Petelo yakamutya, “Alo so cici mulagane no mulume wako kumujela u Muhe wo Muwaha?” Wulanje ta! Awalya iwanhu wono wamuzicile u mulume wako, wali ha mulango, nawo wokutegula na gwegwe kunze.
Lo lulo lulo Safila yakagwa ha magulu ga Petelo, nayo yakafwa baho baho. Iwazelelo wakenjila wakamwagana yafwiye, nawo wakamutegula kunze, wakamuzika behi no mulume wakwe.
Ne likanisa lyose hamonga na wose wono wazihulika zizo, wakebatwa na woga wuwaha muno muno.
I Watumwa wakanoza mapoto ne mezino menji muli wanhu. Wono wehuwila, wakawa wakwitang'anila kuko wose hamonga, kwi'kumbo lya Solomona.
Ninga, hasina muli wanhu wono si wali wehuwiye mono yejelela kwilunza nawo. Langa sunga ne wanhu wono si wali wehuwiye, wakawakumya.
Iliwalo lye wanhu wono wamwihuwila Muwaha lye walume ne wacekulu, likacila konjelezeka muno muno.
Na ku soko yiyo, wanhu wawawikaga watamwa mu nzila, wawawikaga mu vitanda na mu zinyhingo, Petelo kolo yakupuluta, hamba muzizi wakwe du wuwaficile wanji wayawo.
Wanhu wenji wakafika kulawa makaya ga mu mhelo mhelo ya Yelusalemi, wakuwaleta iwatamwa wawo, na wono wagazikaga ne macisi mavu, nawo wakaponywa wose.
Ninga u mukohani muwaha ne wayagwe wono wali we mhuga ye Wasadukayo we hanhu baho, wakawawonela wivu.
Wakawebata watumwa no kuwatajila mu jela ye wenji wose.
Ninga ne cilo, Malayika wo Muwaha yakadigula milango ye jela, yakawalavya kunze, yakatya,
“Bitenyi mukeme mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, mukawaganulile wanhu zinghani zose zo wumi wuwu.”

Nawo watumwa wakahulika, wakenjila mu Nyumba yo Mulungu hakali mitondo muno, wakawa kwanza kwijiza. Ninga u Mukohani Muwaha, hamonga na wono wali nayo, wali weza kuza, wakacema mukung'ano we libalaza lyose, hamonga ne wanyamhala wose we wanhu wa Isilayeli, hanyuma wakawatuma wanhu ku jela wakawalete watumwa.
Ninga wawo wetumami waza kufika ku jela, si wawagana yaye. Wakawuya, wakalonga,
wakutya, “Ciyagana jela ndindwe yikamile, ne walindilizi wemile ha milango, ninga ceza kudigula, si cagane munhu wo wose mugati.”
U Muwaha we walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu ne wakohani wawaha, waza hulika zizi, wakawa na mahwele, hamba kumanya zono ziwatujile.
Yakaza yunji yakawalonjela yakawatya, “Lanjenyi ta! Wanhu wono mwawatajila mu jela, wali mu Nyumba yo Mulungu wemile wakuwejiza wanhu.”

Hobaho yakabita muwaha we walindilizi we Nyumba yo Mulungu, hamonga ne wanhu wakwe, yakabita ku Nyumba yo Mulungu, yakawaleta. Ninga si wawebata kwe vilungo hambi nha wawogopa wanhu, lunji wali wawatowanje ne mabwe.
Waza kuwaleta, wakawawika ha mwande ye libalaza. U Mukohani muwaha yakawawuza, yakutya,

“Ase camulemezenyi cagalanze, vyono mulecele lukulu kwijiziza mwi'tagwa lyo munhu yuyu, alu kumbe anye mwagatandaza imafundo genyu hanhu hose mu Yelusalemi, sunga nalu mukuhila kuciletela lilema lyo wufwe wo munhu yuyo.”
Ninga Petelo lono yali hamonga ne watumwa wayagwe, yakapitula, yakatya, “Cinojele cimuhulice Mulungu, si nhe wanhu.
U Mulungu we wakuku zetu yamuzukula Yesu, mono anye mwamuwulaga ko kumutumbika mu musalaba.
Yuyo yo Mulungu yamwinula sunga ko ku muwoko wakwe wo kulume, yakawa Mulongola no Muponyi, yawapele wanhu Isilayeli u wunene, ho wanenelwe uwubi wawo.
Nase cili wahomelezi we zinghani zizi, nayo nhavivyo Muhe Mono Yelile, mono u Mulungu yawapela wono wakumuhulika, nayo yakuyihomelela nghani yiyo.”
Ninga wose wono wali wali baho mwi'balaza lilyo wali weza kuzihulika zizi, wakakolwa ne likuwo, sunga wahilaga kuwawulaga.

Ninga Mufalisayo yunji mono yacemwaga Gamaliyeli, mono yali mwijizi wo Wulajilize, na mono yali yena lilumbo yiwaha hali wanhu wose, yakema ha mwande ye libalaza, yakasaka wawalya watumwa walawile hadodo kunze.
Hanyuma yakawatya, “Nye wandugu zangu wa Isilayeli, mwitetelaje kuli wanhu wawa, muli yiyo yono mukusaka kuwatendela.

Hambi mu vilo vyono vipulute nha yenuka munhu yunji, litagwa lyakwe yacemwaga Teyuda, yakeyitya vyono mwene yo munhu mutambule, na wanhu kotya nha magana ma'ne wakelunza nayo. Ninga u mwene yawulagwa, ne watyatyi wakwe wose wakeyagala, ne cipuga cakwe cikawa kufwa.

Kanyhi hanyuma yayo, mu cipango cicilya co kuwala wanhu, yakenuka Yuda wa ku Galilaya. Yuyu nayo yakawakwega wanhu wanji, wakamutyatya, ninga nayo nha vivyo, yakawulagwa, ne watyatyi wakwe wose wakeyagala.
Alu, holeka nane nghumutyenyi nhavi, mwilegaje kuli wanhu wawa, muwalekaje ye! Hambi inghani yiyi hamba mulimo wuwu, hono wuwe wa wanhu, nha wohodanjika du weneco.
Ninga hono wuwe wo Mulungu, si mosuma kuwemila ye, yilece kuwa na lunji muwe nha mukwihoma no Mulungu.” Wakawa kwilumbaniza nayo.
Nawo waza kuwacema watumwa, wakawakuna viboko, no kuwalonjela vyono, walecele lukulu kwijiza mwi'tagwa lya Yesu, hanyuma wakawa kuwaleka wabite.
Watumwa wakalawila hanze ye libalaza wasangalaye, vyono wejela wanojeye kukozwa cevu ku soko ye litagwa lya Yesu.
Nawo wakajendelela nhondo zose kwijiza no kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Yesu, mu Nyumba yo Mulungu na mu zikaya ze wanhu, vyono mwene yo Kilisito.

Mu vilo vivyo, lono liwalo lya wono wehuwiye lyonjelezekaga, gakejela mang'ung'uliko hagati ya Wayahudi wono wali wehuwila, wono walongaga nonga ye cigiliki, na wono walongaga Cihebelaniya, awalya wono walongaga Cigiliki, wang'ung'ulikaga wakutya, iwafwile wawo siwakukumbucilwa mu wupegwa visakwa vyawo vye nhondo zose.
Nawo iwatumwa we likumi na wejete, wakayicema mhuga yose ya wono wehuwiye, wakawatya, “Si yinojeye ase cilece kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, no kwinjila mu mulimo wo wugawi we visakwa.
Holeka wandugu zetu, mwiyihagulaje muli nyenye, wanhu mupunghati, we lilumbo, wono wamemile Muhe ne mahala, ciwawice mu mulimo wuwu.
Ninga ase, cowa kuswa mu wulombe, na mu mulimo wo kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu.”

Inghani yiyi yikawendeza imhuga yose ya wono wali wehuwila, wakawa kuwahagula, Sitefano, munhu mono yamemile wihuwilo no Muhe Mono Yelile, na Filipo, na Polokolo, na Nikanoli, na Timona, na Palimena, na Nikolasi munya ku Antiyokiya, mono si Muyahudi, mono yali yayipitucila dini ye Ciyahudi.
Wakawawika ha mwande ye watumwa, nawo wakawalombela no kuwawicila miwoko.
Inghani yo Mulungu yikacila kutandala, ne liwalo lya wono wehuwila kuko ku Yelusalemi, likacila konjelezeka, ne mhuga mbaha ye Wakohani, wakawubocela u wihuwilo.
Mulungu yakamupela Sitefano lihewa ne vilungo vinji, sunga yakawa kwituma mapoto ne mezino muli wanhu.

Ninga wakenuka wanji, ho wawangane na Sitefano, wanji wa muli wanhu wawo, wali we nhang'anilo yono yitezagwa “Nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo ye Wanhu Welecele,” nawo walawilila ku Kilene, na ku Alekizandeliya, wanji wakalawa ku Kilikiya na Asiya.
Hamba si wamusuma ng'o, ku soko ye mahala gakwe, na ku soko ya yuyo Muhe mono yamutongaga mwipango lono yalongaga.
Hobaho wakawafupa wanhu wanji cinyele, ho watye, “Cimuhulika Sitefano yakulonga nghani za nhovu kuli Musa, na kuli Mulungu.”
Na so yiyo wakawasagahaza wanhu, iwanyamhala, ne wejizi wo Wulajilize. Wakamuziza Sitefano, wakamwibata, wakamuleta ha mwande ye libalaza liwaha.
Wakawika wahomelezi wo wulambi wono watya, “Munhu ayu si kalekaga kulonga nghani za nhovu muli hanhu aha hono helile, na muli u Wulajilize wa Musa.
Hambi nha camuhulika yakutya ati, ayu Yesu wa Nazaleti, kohahodanjila lukulu ihanhu baha, no kuyiwusiza lukulu imyoto yono yacilajiliza Musa.”
Na wose wono wali wali baho he balaza, wakamulanga Sitefano, wakawuwona wusu wakwe weza winha wusu wa Malayika.
Nayo Mukohani muwaha yakamuwuza Sitefano yakatya, “Ati wule, izinghani zizi za mbeka?”

Nayo Sitefano yakapitula yakatya, “Hulicizenyi, 'nye wandugu zangu, nanye mo wasogo zangu, u Mulungu wo lukumyo yamulawila u kuku yetu Abulahamu, lono yali ku Mesopotamiya, lono yali yakali si yanekala ku Halani.
Mulungu yakamutya, ‘Wuwuce mu yisi yako, wuwalekaje wanduguzo, wubite ku yisi yono nokulajila.’

Baho Abulahamu yakawa kuhama ku yisi ye Wakalidayo, yakawa kubita kwikala ku Halani. No sogwe yaza kuwa yatajika, u Mulungu yakamuhamya kanyhi kuko ku Halani, yakamuleta sunga mu yisi yiyi yono mwikaye nyenye alu.

Hamba u Mulungu si yamupela hanhu hanji ho hose mu yisi yiyi, hawe sawo yakwe ng'o. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, yamwihuwiza vyono komupela yisi yiyi yiwe yakwe, na yo lulelo lwakwe hanyuma yo mwene, hamba yiwe mu cipango cico, yali yakali yasina mwana.
Mulungu yamulonjela yakatya nhavi, ‘I wanago wolotegulwa ku yisi yono yitemigwe ne wanhu wanji, na kuko wonozwa wawanda no kutendelwa vibi myaka magana mane.
Ninga nane nololilipiciza likungugo lilyo lyono lyolowafuga. Hanyuma ninga, nolowahamya mu yisi yiyo, ho waze wanyitumamile hanhu bahano.’

Hanyuma u Mulungu yakawunoza u walame, ciwe co citanjilo ce cilagane. Holeka Abulahamu yamutegula ku calamo mwanagwe Isaka lono yali yafika vilo munana vyo wulelwe wakwe. Nayo Isaka nhavivyo, yamutegula ku calamo Yakobo, nayo Yakobo vyo yawatendela nhavivyo wawalya iwakuku zetu wawaha yikumi na wejete.
“Ne wa kuku zetu wawo, wakamuwonela Yusufu wivu, wakamuguza, yakategulwa ku Misili ku wuwanda. Ninga Mulungu yali yali hamonga nayo.
Yamuponya mu magayo gakwe gose. U Mulungu yakamupela lihewa ne mahala hali Falawo u mutemi wa Misili, sunga Falawo yakamuwika yawe muwaha mu yisi yiyilya, sunga na mu nyumba yakwe yo wutemi.
Yikagwa nzala mu yisi yose ya Misili na Kanani, nayo yikaleta wugaye wuwaha muno muno, ne wakuku zetu hamba si wasuma kutuga ndigwa yo yose.
Ninga Yakobo yaza kuhulika vyono ku Misili koyili ndigwa, yakawatuma wakuku zetu wabite kuko ku Misili lulongozi.
Mu muhinzo we kejete, wanduguze za Yusufu, wakamutanga, nayo Yusufu yakemanyiza kuli wanduguze, sunga na Falawo yakawamanya wanduguze za Yusufu.
Yusufu yakawalajiliza wamuceme sogwe Yakobo ne mhuga yakwe yose, wanhu makumi mupunghati na wahano.
Na Yakobo yakawa kubita ku Misili na kuko ko yafwila, hamonga ne wakuku zetu wanji.
Ne miwili yawo, yikategulwa sunga ku Shekemu, yikazikwa mu citenjelo cono Abulahamu yacigula kwa mapesa, kuli wana wa Hamoli ku Shekemu.
“Ninga lidaha lyaza fika, ho Mulungu yacifisilize icilagane cono yamupela Abulahamu, iliwalo lye wanhu lyali lyonjezeka muno ku Misili.
Hanyuma, yakatema mutemi yunji mu Misili mono si yali yamumanyile Yusufu.
Yuyo yakawagaza muno wakuku zetu, no kuwatendela vibi, ko kuwatya, wawataje kunze wana wawo wagalika walece kuwumipa.
Na mu mapango gago, ho yalelelwa Musa, nayo yakawa mwana muswanu hali Mulungu, yakadimwa myezi midatu mu nyumba yo sogwe.
Nayo yaza kuwikwa kunze, u mwana we cicekulu wa Falawo yakamusola, yakamudima nha mwanagwe yamulelile.
Musa yakafundwa zinghani zose ze mahala ge Wamisili, yakawa yali vilungo mu zinghani na mu milimo yakwe.
Ninga Musa yaza kuwa yaficila myaka makumi mane, cisukwa cikamwinjila mu nhumbula, yabite yakawalanje wanduguze Waisilayeli.
Na kuko, yakamuwona yunji muyawo yakugazwa vibi no Mumisili, yakabita yakamutaza, Musa yakamulipiciza yuyulya Mumisili, yakamuwulaga.
(Yehwesaga vyono wanduguze Waisilayeli, wotanga mba vyono u Mulungu komwitumamila mwene, kuwaponya, ninga hamba si wayitanga i nghani yiyi ng'o.)
Imitondo yaco yakawagana Waisilayeli wejete wakwitowa, yakasaka yawalamule, yakutya, ‘Nye walume anye, nha muli ndugu, alo so cici mukwinozeza vibi nyenye wose?’
Ayulya mono yamutowaga muyagwe, yakamukumhila Musa kutali, yakutya, ‘Alo nani mono yakuwicile gwegwe wuwe muwaha, na mulamuzi wetu?
Alo wukusaka wumbulaje nane nha vyono wamuwulaga ayulya Mumisili yigolo?’
Musa yaza kuzihulika zizo, yakatiza, yakabita kwikala mu yisi ya Midiyani, na kuko yakalela wana we cilume wejete.
“Yaza malika myaka makumi mane, Malayika wo Muwaha yakamulawila Musa mu cititika cono cakaga moto ku nyika, behi ne litunda lya Sinayi.
Musa yakezina muno, yaza kuyiwona nghani yiyo, yakasejelela behi ho yawone, ninga yakahulika lizi lyo Muwaha, likutya,
‘Ane yo nene u Mulungu we wasogo, u Mulungu wa Abulahamu, na wa Isaka, na wa Yakobo!’ Musa yakacicima so woga, hamba si yejelela kujendelela kulanga.
U Muwaha yakamutya, ‘Wugavulaje imalatu gako, hambi aha hono wimile nha hanhu helile.
Ane, nawuwona mbeka u wugaye we wanhu wangu wono wali ku Misili. Nicihulika ne cililo cawo, nane niza ho niwaponye. Holeka wuze hano, nghutume ku Misili.’

“Yuyu Musa, yo yuyo mono wanhu wa Isilayeli wamulema, wakutya, ‘Alo nani mono yakuwicile wuwe muwaha na mulamuzi wetu?’ Yo mwene Musa mono Mulungu yamutuma yawe muwaha, kanyhi na mukombozi, mu nzila ya Malayika mono yamulawila mu cititika cono cakaga moto.
Yo yuyo yo yawawusa ku yisi ya Misili, mu nzila yo kunoza mapoto, na mezino mu yisi ya Misili, na mwi'lenga lya Shamu na mu nyika, myaka makumi mane.
Yo mwene yuyo Musa mono yawatya wanhu wa Isilayeli, ‘U Mulungu kolomwinulilenyi Muwizi kulawa mu wandugu zenyu yenha nene.’

Mwi'pango lyono Waisilayeli wetang'anila ku nyika, yo Musa mono yali yali kuko, hamonga nawo. Yali yali kuko hamonga ne wakuku zetu, hamonga na ayulya malayika mono vyalongana nayo mwi'tunda lya Sinayi, yo yuyo mono yazibocela zinghani zo wumi, ho yacipele ase.
“Ninga, yo mwene mono wakuku zetu walema kumuhulika, wakamukumhila kutali, wakasulumila kuwuya ku Misili.
Wakamulonjela Haluni, ‘Wucinozeze milungu yono yocilongolela kumwande, hambi nha si cimanyile yono yimutujile Musa, mono yacitonjile ku wulawa ku Misili!’
Baho ho wenozeza cihwani ca ndama, wakacikumbika, wakacisecelela cinhu cono wacinoza kwe miwoko yawo weneco.

Ninga Mulungu yakawuka muli wene, yakawaleka wahembe zi nyelezi zo wulanga, nha vyono yandikwa mu citabu ce wawizi, ‘Anye mo wanhu wa Isilayeli! Yo si nene mono mwambulajila zimitugo no kunghumbika mu myaka makumi mane ku nyika!

Nanye mukalidinghula lihema lyo mulungu Moleki, ne cihwani ce nyelezi yo mulungu wenyu Lafani. Ivihwani vyono wavinoza, vyo vivyo vyono wavihemba. Ku soko yiyo nane, nokutegula kutali, ku wuwanda, kupuluta Babiloni.’
“Kuko ku nyika, i wakuku zetu wali wena lihema lyono lyahomelelaga vyono Mulungu yali baho. Nalyo lyanozwa nha vyono Mulungu yamulajiliza Musa yalinoze, liwe mu hwani yiyilya yono yawona.
Nawo wakuku zetu webocezaga, sunga mu cipango ca Yoshuwa, lono wenjilila kutema mu yisi yono wayiboka kuli makungugo gono yagawinga Mulungu hali wene. Baho likekala sunga mu vilo vya Dawudi.
Dawudi yakatuga lihewa hali Mulungu, yakamulomba Mulungu yamukombole, ho yamuzenjele wikalo, mwene mono yo Mulungu wa Yakobo.
Ninga Solomona yo yamuzenjela Mulungu Nyumba.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo u Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli vyose, nha si kekalaga mu zinyumba zono zizenjigwe ne wanhu, nha vyono yakutya muwizi,
‘U Muwaha yakutya, Wulanga lye 'goda lyangu, lyo lukumyo Ne yinze wo wukanyago we magulu gangu,
Alo nyumbaci yono mosuma kunzenjela? Vinhu vivi vyose, yo nene mono navinoza, hamba ng'o?’
“Anye mo wakamu ku wuhulice! Izinhumbula ne makutu genyu vinha vye wanhu we makungugo. Anye mwinha i wakuku zenyu. Nhondo zose mumwimilaga u Muhe Mono Yelile.
Wahayi muyagwe ne wawizi, mono si wamugaza iwakuku zenyu? Wakawawulaga awalya wono Mulungu yawatuma wawalonjele wanhu zo wuze wa Mono yali ling'ani, alu nanye mukamugaluka, no kumuwulaga.
Yo nyenye mono mwawubocela Wulajilize wono waletwa kuli'nye na Wamalayika, nanye hamba si mwawukamisa ng'o.”
Wawo wanyamhala we libalaza, waza kuzihulika zizi, wakahomeka muno muzi nhumbula, wakamwikang'anhilila kwe 'kuwo.
Ninga Sitefano vyono yali yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakagalamila ku wulanga, yakawona lukumyo lo Mulungu na Yesu yemile u kulume ko Mulungu.
Yakatya, “Lanjenyi ta! Nghuwona wulanga wugubuce, no Mwana wo Munhu yemile u kulume ko Mulungu.”
Ninga iwanhu wose wono wali wali baho he balaza wakazoza muno, no kudinda imakutu gawo ne miwoko yawo. Hanyuma wakawa kumuzumhilila wose hamonga,
wakamulavyaniza kunze ye kaya, wakamutowanga ne mabwe. Na awalya i wahomelezi, wakagawika makoti gawo hasi yo wulanjilizi wa muzelelo litagwa lyakwe Sawulo.
Wakajendelela kumutowanga Sitefano ne mabwe, akuno u mwene yakulomba yakutya, “Go Muwaha Yesu, wubocele Muhe wangu!”
Yakafugama yakabalaluka kwe yizi yiwaha, yakutya, “Gwe Muwaha wulece kuwahosa so wubi wuwu.” Yaza kondya kulonga zizi, hodu ho baho yakawa kufwa. Na Sawulo nayo yawona viswanu vyono wamuwulaje.
Izuwa lilyo wejela wugazwe wuwaha mwi'kanisa lyono lyali ku Yelusalemi. Wono wali wehuwila wose, wakeyagalila ku zisi za Yudiya na Samaliya, langa hono si watumwa du.
Wanhu wehuwilwa kuli Mulungu, wakamuzika Sitefano, wakamulilila cililo ciwaha.
Mu mapango gago, Sawulo yakaligaza likanisa, yenjilaga mu zinyumba monga monga, yakuwakwega walume ne wacekulu, yakuwategula ku jela.
Ale, wawo wono weyagazwa, wakakola ako na ako wakuyiganula nghani.
Nayo Filipo yakatima sunga ko kwi 'kaya lya Samaliya, yakawaganulila Iwasamaliya za Kilisito.
Wanhu wenji wakelunza hamonga, no kuhuliciza zono zalongwa na Filipo, wakagawona ne mapoto gono yanozaga.
Hambi nha wenji wono wali wena macisi mavu, gawukaga akuno wakuzoza ne mazi mawaha. Na wenji wono wali wadejepe imiwili yawo na we vilema, wakaponywa.
Kwali na nyemo mbaha mwi'kaya lilyo.
Ninga hali na munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Simoni, mono yanozaga u wuhawi wakwe mwi'kaya lilyo, mu vilo vyono vyapuluta, yakawapela wizine wanya Samaliya, yetezaga yo mweneco muwaha.
Iwanhu wose iwadodo ne wawaha, wamuhulicizaga muno, watezaga, “Simoni vyo vilungo vyo Mulungu, vyono vikucemwa Ivilungo viwaha.”
Wamuhulicila, vyono vilo vinji yawapelaga mezino no wuganga wakwe.
Ninga waza kumwihuwila Filipo yakuganula Luganuzi Luswanu lo wutemi wo Mulungu, ne litagwa lya Yesu Kilisito, wakabaputizwa iwalume ne wacekulu.
Na Simoni mweneco nayo yakehuwila, nayo yali yeza kubaputizwa, vyaswezanaga na Filipo, na lono yalangaga vitanjilo ne mapoto mawaha gono ganozwaga, yakezina muno.
Iwatumwa wono wali ku Yelusalemi, wali weza kuhulika vyono Samaliya nayo yayibocela inghani yo Mulungu, wakawatumila Petelo na Yohana.
Nawo waza fika, wakawalombela ho wabocele Muhe Mono Yelile.
Hambi nha yali yakali namutimila yunji muyawo, wali wabaputizwa du, Mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu.
Wakawawicila miwoko yawo, nawo wakabocela u Muhe Mono Yelile.
Baho Simoni yaza wona, vyono mu wuwicile we miwoko ye Watumwa kuli walya wono wehuwila, u Muhe Mono Yelile kalavywaga, yakawapela mapesa wa Petelo na Yohana, yakutya,
“Mumhele nane ivilungo vivi, ho yiwe muli wose mono nomuwicila miwoko yangu, yabocele u Muhe Mono Yelile.”
Ninga Petelo yakamutya, “Mwajililane kuko hamonga ne mapesa gako, vyono wukwihwesa kosuma kugula i cipegwa co Mulungu na sawo.
Nha wusina yigawo hamba lifungu mu nghani yiyi, hambi inhumbula yako nha si yiling'aniye hali Mulungu.
Ale wunene wubi wako wuwu, wumulombe Muwaha, na lunji konenelwa lihweso lya mu nhumbula yako.
Hambi nha nghukuwona vyono wuli mu wusungu wukali, na mu wuwopwe wo wubi.”
Simoni yapitula yakatya, “Nghumunenenyi, munombele kuli Muwaha, zono mulonjile zilece kunyagana hamba monga.”
Wene wa Petelo na Yohana waza kukondya kuhomelela no kuganula inghani yo Muwaha, wakawuya ku Yelusalemi, wakaganula Luganuzi Luswanu ku vitumbi vinji vye Wasamaliya.
Ninga Malayika wo Muwaha yakalonga na Filipo yakutya, “Winuce wubite kutakama sunga ko ku nzila yono yilawile ku Yelusalemi yitimiye ku Gaza.” (Ne nzila yiyo yikoleye mu nyika.)

Yakenuka, yakabita, na kumbe mwi'pango lilyo, kukawa na munhu Mwetopiya, mupaswe, mono nayo yali yali mu muhinzo yawuyaga ku kaya. Munhu yuyu yali munyamhala muwaha mu sawo ya Kandake, u Mutemi we cicekulu wa Wetopiya. Nayo yali yazize ku Yelusalemi ku wuhembi.
Na mwi'pango lilyo, yawuyaga yapandile mwi'gali lyakwe lyo kukwegwa, akuno yakusoma za mu citabu ca Isaya u Muwizi.
Muhe Mono Yelile yakamutya Filipo, “Sejelele, muhanje ne ligali lili.”
Filipo yakamumanyhilila, na baho, yakamuhulika yuyo munhu yakusoma mu citabu co muwizi Isaya, baho Filipo yakamuwuza, “Wule wukwizuka zizo zono wukuzisoma?”
Nayo yuyo munhu yakatya, “Nosuma kwizuka nhawule hono munhu si yananjize?” Yakamunena Filipo yananuce wekalane.

Ale, ihanhu hono yasomaga mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, hali aha, “Yategulwa nha ngholo ku wuwulagwe. Na kotya nyana ye ngholo hali wono wakuyicenyenha wukunzeje wayo, yene yinyamaye. Nha vivyo nayo siyenula mulomo wakwe.
Yakozwa cevu no kwimwa ze ling'ani. Hasina mono kosuma kulonga zo lulelo lwakwe, ku soko u wumi wakwe, nha wawuswa kono'nze.”
Yuyo Mwetopiya yakamutya Filipo, “Nghukunena, wunonjele, umuwizi yuyu yalongaga za nani?” Zo mweneco, hamba za yunji?
Nayo Filipo yakamulila ha Mandiko gago Gono Gelile, yakamuganulila za Yesu.
Na lono wali wakali wajendeleye no muhinzo, wakafika hanhu hono hogali malenga, na yuyo munhu yakatya, “Langa ta, aga malenga, wule ho cili cono cikunyimila ho ndece kubaputizwa?” [
Filipo yakatya, “Hono wuwe wihuwiye kwe nhumbula yako yose, kosuma kubaputizwa.” Nayo yakapitula yakatya, “Heya nihuwiye vyono Yesu Kilisito yo Mwana wo Mulungu.”]
Ale yuyo munhu yakatya ligali lime. Na wose vyono wejete, Filipo na yuyo munhu, wakatima mu malenga. Nayo Filipo yakamubaputiza.
Waza kuwuka mu malenga, u Muhe wo Muwaha yakamuwusa cinyele Filipo, na yuyo Mwetopiya si yamuwona kanyhi, ninga mwene yakajendelela no muhinzo wakwe du, akuno yamemile nyemo mbaha.
Ninga Filipo yakewona yali ku Azoto. Nayo yakajendelela kuganula Luganuzi Luswanu mu makaya gose, sunga yakafika na Kayisaliya.
Mu mapango gaga, Sawulo yali yaciziliza kuleta woga wuwaha so kuwawulaga wejizwa wo Muwaha. Yakabita kuli Mukohani muwaha,

yakalomba yapegwe baluwa, zono zosuma kumumanyiza kuli matang'anilo go wuhembelo ge Wayahudi ga ku Damesiki, kolo yakuwawona wanhu wono wakuyityatya i Nzila yo Muwaha i walume ne wacekulu, yawebate no kuwaleta ku Yelusalemi.
Ninga lono yali yali mu nzila, lono yali yaza behi no kufika ku Damesiki, lo lulo wuzelu kulawa ku wulanga, wukamumulika nhinicizo mbavu zose.
Yakagwa hasi, yakahulika lizi likumutya, “Sawulo, Sawulo, alo nhawule wukungaza?”
Nayo Sawulo yakawuza, yakatya “Gwegwe nani Muwaha?” Nalyo lizi lililya likapitula, “Yo nene Yesu mono wukungaza.
Ninga winukaje wukenjile mwi'kaya, na kuko kolonjelwa yono yikunojeye witume.”
Iwanhu wono wajendana na Sawulo, wakawa wemile wasina yo kulonga, walihulika ilizi lililya, ninga siwawona munhu.
Sawulo yakenuka hasi, nayo yaza kunugula meso gakwe, hamba si yasuma kuwona co cose. Iwanhu wawalya, wakamwibata muwoko, wakamutegula sunga ku Damesiki.
Sawulo yakekala vilo vidatu si yakuwona, na mu vilo vivyo si yalizaga hamba kung'wa co cose.
Ale, kuko ku Damesiki, kwali na mwijizwa yunji, litagwa lyakwe Ananiya. U Muwaha yakamulonjela mu ndoto, “Ananiya!” Nayo Ananiya yakedika, “Ane baha Muwaha.”
Nayo u Muwaha yakamutya, “Winuce wubite ku nzila yono yicemwaga nzila yono yigoloce, wukawuze mu kaya ya Yuda, munhu yunji mono kacemwaga Sawulo, munya Taliso, nayo yakulomba,
nayo kawona munhu litagwa lyakwe Ananiya yakwinjila, yakumuwicila imiwoko yakwe, ho yatuje kuwona.”
Ninga Ananiya yakapitula yakatya, “Muwaha, hulikaga kuli wenji zo munhu yuyo, mabi malinga mawaha gono yawatendeye i wanhu wako wono welile kuko ku Yelusalemi.
Sunga na bahano, kaza yena no wukombolwe wulawa kuli Wakohani wawaha, yawawope wose wono walicemelezaga litagwa lyako.”
Ninga u Muwaha yakamutya, “Wubite du, hambi ayo, nha nimuhagula yawe ciya cangu, ho yalitegule litagwa lyangu kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ne watemi wawo, sunga na kuli wanhu wa Isilayeli.
Nane no mweneco, nomulajila zi nyinji zono zimunojeye yagazwe ku soko ye litagwa lyangu.”

Ananiya yakabita, yakenjila mu nyumba yiyo. Nayo yakamuwicila Sawulo miwoko yakwe, yakatya “Ndugu yangu Sawulo, u Muwaha Yesu, mono yakulawiye mu nzila yono waziza, yo yanhumile wutuje kuwona kanyhi, wumemywe u Muhe Mono Yelile.”
Lo lulo lulo, vikalagala vinji kulawa mu meso gakwe vyono vihwanile kotya makaka ge zisomba, yakatuga kuwona kanyhi. Yakenuka yakabaputizwa.
Nayo yaza kukondya kulya zindigwa, yakatuga vilungo. Sawulo yakekala vilo vicefu hamonga ne wejizwa wono wali wali kuko ku Damesiki.
Lo lulo lulo Sawulo yakamula kulonga mu matang'anilo gawo go wuhembelo, vyono Yesu yo Mwana wo Mulungu.

Na wose wono wamuhulika, wakezina muno, wakatya, “Siyo yuyu mono yawawulagaga wono walicemelezaga litagwa lili ku Yelusalemi? Na bahano kaza so nghani yiyi, ho yawawope iwanhu wawo no kuwategula kuli Wakohani wawaha!”
Ninga Sawulo yakacila kuwa ne vilungo, no kukangaza cagalanze, vyono Yesu yo Kilisito, ne Wayahudi wa kuko ku Damesiki, wakawa wacelewaye du.
Na vyaza kupuluta vilo vinji, Wayahudi wakeheha ho wamuwulaje Sawulo.
Ninga Sawulo, yakawamanya ze maheho gawo. Wekalaga misi ne cilo, watejeye mu milango yo kwinjilila mwi'kaya ho wamuwulaje.
Ninga i wejizwa wakwe wakamusola ne cilo, wakamutajila mu nhoto, wakamukoza mwidilisha wakamusunja, wakamutimya hasi.
Sawulo yaza kufika ku Yelusalemi, yakajela kwilunza na walya wejizwa. Ninga wose wakamogopa, hamba siwehuwila vyono nayo yawa mwijizwa.

Ninga Balanaba yakaza yakamusola Sawulo, yakamutegula kuli watumwa, yakawasimuliziza vyono Sawulo yamuwona Muwaha mu nzila, na vyono Muwaha yalongana nayo, yakawalonjela kanyhi nha vyono, Sawulo yali kuganula ku Damesiki yasina woga.
Holeka Sawulo yakekala hamonga nawo. Yakapilima mu Yelusalemi yose yakuganula nghani yo Muwaha, akuno yasina woga.
Yakawa kulonga, no kwisumaniza ne Wayahudi wono wakulonga ci giliki, ninga wene wasakaga kumuwulaga.
Ninga we zindugu waza kuyimanya nghani yiyo, wakamusola Sawulo, wakamutegula sunga ko ku Kayisaliya, wakawa kumuleka yabite ku Taliso.

Nhondo ilikanisa lya mu Yudiya, na mu Galilaya, na mu Samaliya mose, likatuga mulamu mwidaha lilyo. Likasinyhimikwa no kuwilucila mu cogopo co Muwaha, likonjelezeka no kusindamikwa no Muhe Mono Yelile.
Kukawa lono Petelo yagajendelaga i makaya gose, yakabita sunga kuli wanhu wo Mulungu wono wekalaga ku Lida.
Na kuko yakagana munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Ayineya, mono yali yagona mu citanda myaka munana, hambi nha yali yadejepe.
Petelo yakamutya “Ayineya, Yesu Kilisito yakukuponya. Winuce witandicile citanda cako.” Ayineya yakenuka lo lulo baho.
Na wose wono wali wekaye baho ha Lida na Shaloni, wakamuwona Ayineya, nawo wose wakamupitucila Muwaha.

Kwali na mwijizwa yunji we cicekulu kuko ku Yopa, litagwa lyakwe yacemwaga Tabita, mu Cigiliki Dolika, nhunizo yayo “Nzimba.” Mucekulu yuyo yali yamemile metumo maswanu, nayo yawatazaga iwaciwa vilo vyose.
Kukawa mu vilo vivyo, yakatamwa, yakafwa. Nawo wakawuhovuga muwili wakwe, wakawuwika ku nyumba ya ku golofa kucanyha.
Na vyono Lida yali behi na Yopa, iwejizwa waza kuhulika vyono Petelo yali kuko ku Lida, wakatuma wanhu wejete kuli Petelo wamulonjele, “Wuze kono kwetu mbela.”

Hobaho baho Petelo yakenuka, vikabitana nawo. Nayo yaza kufika, wakamutegula ku nyumba ya ku golofa kucanyha. Ne wacekulu wafwile, wose wakamumemelela Petelo, wakulila, wakamulajila makoti ne myenda, vyono Dolika yanozaga lono yali yakali mumi.

Baho Petelo yakawalavyaniza kunze wose, yakafugama, yakalomba. Hanyuma yakawa kuwupitucila u muwili wa malehemu Dolika, yakatya, “Tabita winuce.” Nayo yakanugula imeso gakwe, na yaza muwona Petelo, yakenuka yakekala.
Nayo Petelo yakamwibata muwoko yakamwimya wima, hanyuma yakawa kuwacema wawalya iwanhu wo Mulungu, hamonga na walya iwacekulu wafwile, yakamuwika hali wene yeza mumi.
Ne nghani yiyi yikamanyika mu Yopa yose, ne wanhu wenji wakamwihuwila Muwaha.
Nayo Petelo yakekala vilo vinji kuko ku Yopa, mu nyumba ya munhu yunji Simoni, munoza zinyhingo.
Kwali na munhu ku Kayisaliya, litagwa lyakwe Kolineliyo, muwaha we mhuga ye wasilikale yigana, yono yacemwaga “Mhuga ye ci Italiya.”

yali munhu mwihuwilwa, u mwene hamonga na wa mu nyumba yakwe wose, wali wehuwilwa na kanyhi wali wogopo Mulungu, nayo yetuma zi nyinji, ko kuwataza iwaciwa we Ciyahudi, kanyhi yali yendile kumulomba u Mulungu nhondo zose.
Yali nha saa tisa ne misi, yakawona ciwonelela mu wugubulilwe, Malayika wo Mulungu yakwinjila mugati no kumutya, “Kolineliyo.”
Nayo Kolineliyo yakamunugulila meso yuyo Malayika kuno yakogopa, yakatya, “Alo ko cilici Muwaha?” Nayo Malayika yakamutya, “Mulungu kawubocela wulombe wako, hamonga no wulavye wako kuli waciwa.
Alu, wutume wanhu wabite ku Yopa, wakamusole yunji Simoni, litagwa linji kacemwaga Petelo.
Yekaye kwa yunji Simoni munoza zinyhingo, kaya yakwe yili ha mwejelele we lilenga.”
Yuyo Malayika mono vyalonganaga nayo, yaza wuka, Kolineliyo yakawacema iwetumami wakwe wejete, no musilikale mwihuwilwa, muyagwe na wono wamwitumamilaga nhondo zose,
yakawasimuliziza zizo zose, yakawatuma wabite ku Yopa.
Imitondo yaco, lono wanhu wawalya i wadatu wali wakali mu muhinzo, ninga wali wali behi no kufika ku Yopa, Petelo yakabita kucanyha ku golofa mu saa sita ye misi, kulomba.
Yakadabuka, yakasaka kulya zindigwa, na lono zali zikali kunozelezwa, yakebatwa na nhongo nzito, yakalota ndoto.
Yakawona wulanga wudiguce, na cinhu kotya yimwenda yiwaha, cikutimywa mu mamhembo gayo mane ho hasi.
Na mugati ye limwenda lilyo, mwali mogali mawala gose ge vilimu, ivilimu vye migulu mine, ne vilimu vyono vitambalaga hasi, ne zindeje za mucanyha.
Yakahulika lizi likumutya, “Petelo, winuce wuwulaje vilimu vivyo, wulye.”
Petelo yakatya, “Ng'o, Muwaha, hambi ane nha nghali sinalya co cose icisemunwa, hamba cavu.”
Ilizi lililya likahulikwa kanyhi likamutya “Wulece kutya visemunwa, ivinhu vyono Mulungu yakondizye kuvyeza.”
Inghani yiyi, yiketumwa nghanghulo yidatu, hanyuma limwenda lilya, likagomolwa ku wulanga.
Petelo lono yali yakali kwizina muli zono yagubuliywe, nhunizo yayo cici, wawalya wanhu wono wali watumwa na Kolineliyo waza kuyiwona nyumba ya Simoni, wakema ha mulango,
wakacema kwe lizi wakutya, “Ati ho yuli mujenzi baha mono yakucemwa Simoni Petelo?”
Na Petelo lono yali yakali kwihwesa zo wugubulilwe, ho baho u Muhe yakamutya, “Hulicize! Howali wanhu wadatu baha wono wakukulondola.
Ale winuce mbela mubitane nawo, hamba wulece kwihwelela, hambi nha nene niwatumile.”
Hobaho Petelo yakatima hasi, yakawatya wawo wanhu, “Ane baha mono mukunondola, nhawulenyi muza?”

Wanhu wawo wakamutya, “Kolineliyo u muwaha we wasilikale yigana, munhu mono yali ling'ani, kanyhi mwihuwilwa, mono kamogopago Mulungu, kanyhi mono yena lilumbo mu nghungugo yose ye Wayahudi, kacituma. Yalonjelwa na Malayika mono yelile, yakuceme wubite ku kaya yakwe, ho yahulice nghani yo yose yono kowa wina nayo yo kumulonjela.”
Petelo yakawacemela kugati, yakawapela hanhu ho kugona mu cilo cico. Imitondo yaco, Petelo yakenuka yakabitana nawo, na wenji we zindugu wa ku Yopa wakajendana nayo.
Na mwizuwa lye kejete, wakenjila ku Kayisaliya. Nayo Kolineliyo yawalindilizaga, yali yawakonghola ne wendece wakwe.
Baho Petelo lono yenjilaga, Kolineliyo yakamuhinjiliza, yakafugama ha mwande yakwe, yakenama ho hasi.
Ninga Petelo yakamwinula, yakamutya, “Winukaje, hambi nane nha nili munhu du.”
Na Petelo walonganaga na Kolineliyo, akuno wakwinjila mu nyumba, na mumo mu nyumba, wakawagana wanhu wenji wekonghoye.

Petelo yakawatya, “Nyenye nyo weneco mumanyile vyono Muyahudi wo wose, wulajilize wakwe we dini wukumulemeza yalece kwilunza ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi. Ninga u Mulungu kandajilila 'ne vyono ndece kumutya yunji musemunwa, lunji mwavu.”
Ku soko yiyo holeka mweza kunyhema si nemile kuza. Holeka alu nghusaka kumanya cono munyhemeye?

Kolineliyo yakatya, “Alu vyapuluta vilo vidatu vyono mwipango kotya lili, lye saa tisa ne misi, nalombaga mu nyumba yangu, kumbe kwa nhinicizo du, munhu mono yali yavwalile vivwalo vyono vikung'alala, yakema hali nene,
yakatya, Kolineliyo, Mulungu kawubocela wulombe wako, hamonga ne vilavywa vyako kuli waciwa.”
Alu, wutume munhu yabite ku Yopa, yakamuceme munhu yunji litagwa lyakwe Simoni, ne litagwa linji kacemwaga Petelo, yekaye mu nyumba ya Simoni munoza zinyhingo, ha mwejelele we lilenga.
Holeka nane nghawa kukutumila wanhu lwa kamonga, nagwe kunoza viswanu kuza. Alu ase wose cili baha hali Mulungu, cizihulicize zose zono Muwaha yakulajilize wulonje.
Hobaho Petelo yakatya, “Alu mbeka ho natanga vyono u Mulungu yasina wuwaguzi.
Ninga munhu we nghungugo yo yose, mono kamogopago Mulungu, no kwituma ze ling'ani yo yakubocelwa nayo.
Ayi yo nghani yo Mulungu yono yawategulila iwanhu wa Isilayeli, yakuganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lono lukuleta mulamu muli Yesu Kilisito, mono yo Muwaha wa wose.
Anye muyimanyile inghani yilya yono yejela mu yisi yose ye Wayahudi, ku wulawilila ku Galilaya, hanyuma yo wubaputizo wono waganulwa na Yohana.

Yo Yesu wa Nazaleti, mono mumumanyile vyono u Mulungu yamwitila Muhe Mono Yelile ne vilungo. U Mulungu yali yali hamonga nayo, umwene yakola ako na ako yakwituma viswanu, no kuwaponya wose wono wagazagwa na Setani.
Nase cili wahomelezi wa zose, zono yatendaga mu yisi ye Wayahudi, na mu Yelusalemi. Wamuwulaga, wakamutumbika mu musalaba,
ninga u Mulungu, yakamuzukula mwizuwa lye kadatu, yakamunoza yejele,
ninga si kuli wanhu wose, langa kuli wawo wono u Mulungu yali yakondya kuwahagula wawe wahomelezi wakwe, wo wutya, yo sese mono calizana no kung'wezana hamonga nayo, lono yali yazuka muli wafu.
Yakacilajiliza ciwaganulile wanhu wose u Luganuzi Luswanu, no kuhomelela vyono u mwene yo yahagulwa no Mulungu, yawe Muling'anizi we womi ne wafu.
Sunga ne wawizi wose walonga zo Mwene, vyono munhu wo wose mono komwihuwila, kopegwa wunenelwe wo wubi wakwe mwi'tagwa lyakwe.”
Na lono Petelo yali yakali yakulonga zinghani zizi, u Muhe Mono Yelile yakawatimila wose wono wayihulicizaga nghani yiyo.
Wawalya Iwayahudi wono wali wehuwila, wono wazana na Petelo kuwulawa ku Yopa, wakezina muno, waza wona vyono Mulungu yawetiye icipegwa co Muhe Mono Yelile iwanhu wono si Wayahudi nhavivilya,
hambi nha wawahulika wakulonga mu nonga hayo hayo, wakumukumya Mulungu. Hobaho Petelo yakatya,
“Wanhu wawa wamubocela u Muhe Mono Yelile nha vyono sese co weneco vyono camubocela. Wulenyi hoyuli yunji mono kosuma kuwemila wawa ho walece kubaputizwa?”
Hobaho yakawatya, wabaputizwe mwi'tagwa lya Yesu Kilisito. Wakamunena yekale nawo baho vilo vitela tele.
Iwatumwa na we zindugu wono wali ku Yudiya, wahulika vyono i wanhu wono si Wayahudi nawo wayibocela nghani yo Mulungu.
Baho Petelo yali yeza kuwuya ku Yelusalemi, wawalya Iwayahudi wono wali wehuwila, wono wasakaga i wanhu wono si Wayahudi nawo walame, wakamuhosa, wakutya,
“Agwe wabita kwikala ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, mukalizana nawo!”
Ninga Petelo, yakawasimuliziza monga monga, muli zono zanozwa kulawa mwamulizo, yakatya,

“Mwi'zuwa linji lono nali nili mu wulombe kuko ku Yopa, nghawona wugubulilwe, nghawona cinhu kotya yimwenda yiwaha lyono lyatimywaga hasi likulawa ku wulanga, likawa libatwe mamhembo gayo mane, nalyo likawikwa behi na nene.
Naza kusunjilila mugati, nghawona vilimu vye migulu mine, vilimu vya mu mbago, vilimu vyono vitambalaga ne zindeje za mucanyha.
Hanyuma nghahulika lizi likunonjela likutya, ‘Petelo, wuwulaje, wulye.’
Ninga ane nghatya, ‘Ng'o Muwaha, ku soko co cose cisemunwa, hamba cavu, cikali sinenjila mu mulomo wangu.’
Lizi lililya likahulikwa kanyhi kulawa ku wulanga, ‘Wulece kuvicema visemunwa ivinhu vyono Mulungu yavyezize.’
Ne nghani yiyi yikanozeka nghanghulo yidatu, na ndumilizo, vyose vikagomolwa kanyhi ku wulanga.
Ne wanhu wadatu, wono wali watumigwe kuli'ne, wono walawa ku Kayisaliya, wakaficila nhinicizo ku nyumba yono nekalaga.
Muhe yakanyitya cibitane nawo, ndece kwihwelela. Na awa wandugu mutandatu, wakabitana nane Kayisaliya, na kuko cikenjila mu nyumba ya Kolineliyo.
Nayo yakacisimuliziza vyono yawona Malayika yemile mu nyumba yakwe yakutya, ‘Wutume munhu yabite ku Yopa, yakamuceme Simoni, mono kacemwaga litagwa linji Petelo.
Mwene kokulonjela izinghani zono moponela, agwe na wa mu nyumba yako wose.’
Nali neza kwanza du kulonga, u Muhe Mono Yelile yakawatimila, nha vyono yacitimila ase bahalya ha lulongozi.
Baho nghayikumbucila nghani yo Muwaha vyono yatya, ‘Yohana yabaputizaga na malenga, ninga anye molobaputizwa mu Muhe Mono Yelile.’
Alu hono Mulungu yawapela nhavivyo i wanhu wono si Wayahudi icipegwa ci cilya cono yacipela nase, lono camwihuwilila u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito, alu ane waco nili nani 'mbi, ho sume kumwimila Mulungu?”
Waza kuzihulika zizi, wakanyamala, wakamukumya Mulungu wakutya, “U Mulungu kawapela i wanhu wono si Wayahudi cilejeho co kunena ho wawutuje wumi!”

Ku soko yo wugazwe, wono wejela mu cipango cono yawulajilwa Sitefano, wono wali wehuwila wakeyagala. Wanji wakabita sunga ko ku Foyinike, na Kupulo, na Antiyokiya, wakayiganula nghani kuli Wayahudi du.
Ninga hali ho wali na wanji wayawo, wono walawa ku Kupulo na Kilene, nawo wakabita ku Antiyokiya, wakayiganula nghani yiyo kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wakuwaganulila Luganuzi Luswanu lo Muwaha Yesu.
U Muwaha yakawataza, ne wanhu wenji wakehuwila, no kumupitucila u Muwaha.
Inghani yiyo yikamanyika ne likanisa lyono lyali ku Yelusalemi. Nawo wakamutuma Balanaba yabite sunga ko ku Antiyokiya.
Nayo yaza fika kuko, no kuwona vyono Mulungu yawamotizye wanhu, yakasecelela, yakawanena wose wajendelele kuwa wehuwilwa muli Muwaha.
Balanaba vyono yali munhu muswanu, yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, no wihuwilo. Wanhu wenji wakonjelezeka kuli Muwaha.
Hanyuma Balanaba yakabita ku Taliso kumulondola Sawulo.

Nayo yaza muwona, yakamuleta ku Antiyokiya. Nawo wose vyono wejete, wakekalana ne likanisa lilyo, mu mwaka wose mututu, wakawa wakwijiza yipuga yiwaha lye wanhu. Na kuko ku Antiyokiya, wejizwa ko wamulila kucemwa Wakilisito.
Mu vilo vivyo du, wawizi wanji wakaza ku Antiyokiya wakulawa ku Yelusalemi.
Yakema muyawo yumonga litagwa lyakwe Agabo, na kwe vilungo vyo Muhe, yakalajila vyono yolowa nzala mbaha kono'nze kose. (Ne nzala yiyo yikawa mu vilo vyo mutemi Kilawudiyo.)
Iwejizwa wose wakelumbila munhu na ha nghango yakwe, kuwategulila wutazi, we zindugu wono wekalaga mu Wuyahudi.
Na nhavivyo vyo wanoza, wakawategulila wanyamhala we likanisa u wutazi wuwo kwe miwoko ya Balanaba na Sawulo.
Behi ya mu vilo vivyo baho, u mutemi Helode yakamula kuwagaza wakilisito wanji.
Yakamuwulaga Yakobo u muwahawe wa Yohana, no mumaje.
Yaza wona vyono i litumo lilyo liwendeze Wayahudi, yakacila, sunga yakamwibata Petelo. Yiyo yiketumwa mu vilo vye mikate yono siyisasize.
Petelo yaza kwibatwa, yakawikwa mu jela, yakamuwika hasi ya vipuga vine vye wasilikale wane wane wamwikalize. Helode yahilaga yamulavye cagalanze kuli wanhu, i Pasaka kolo yeza kupuluta.
Na lono Petelo yali yali mu jela, ilikanisa si lyadilaga kumulombela hali Mulungu.

Mu cilo cono cali cileceye lizuwa lyono Helode yali yamulavye Petelo cagalanze kuli wanhu, Petelo yali yagonile hagati ye wasilikale wejete, yali muwopwe ne minyolo myejete, ne walindilizi wali walindilize ha mulango we jela.

Kumbe, Malayika wo Muwaha yakema nhinicizo hali mwene, no wuzelu wukabulila mu nyumba yiyilya ye jela. Malayika yakamusinhusa Petelo, yakamutya “Winuce mbela.” Ho baho imanyolo gakadumuka mu mawoko gakwe.
Malayika yakamutya, “Witunje, wuvwale malatu gako.” Nayo yakanoza nhavivyo. Hanyuma yuyo Malayika yakamutya, “Vwale likoti lyako, wunhyatye.”
Petelo yakamutyatya kunze, ninga si yamanya vyono zizo zono zinozigwe na Malayika zali za mbeka, langa yaganicizaga nha vyono yakulota ndoto.

Nawo waza kupuluta ha wugozezo wulongozi na we kejete, wakafika ku mulango wa cuma wo kwinjilila mwi'kaya, u mulango wuwo wukawadigucila wuli wene, nawo wakalawaniza kunze. Wakajendana mu nzila monga, hanyuma Malayika yakamuleka lwa kamonga Petelo yali wene.

Nayo Petelo ho yezucila baho zono zijeye, yakatya, “Alu he mbeka, ho namanya vyono u Muwaha katuma Malayika wakwe kamhonya kulawa mu muwoko wa Helode, na muli zose zono wanhu wa Isilayeli wali walanjiliye.”
Nayo yaza kukondya kumanya nhavivyo, yakabita sunga ko ku kaya ya Malyamu nyina ya Yohana, mono kacemwaga Maluko. Na mu kaya yiyo, wali wekonghoye wanhu wenji wakulomba.
Nayo Petelo yakakong'onha mulango, no mwitumami yumonga we cihinza litagwa lyakwe Loda, yakabita ku mulango kwidika.
Nayo yuyo muhinza yakalitanga lizi lya Petelo, yakasangalala muno, sunga yakaleka na zo wudigula mulango, umwene kanyhi yakawamanyhila kugati, yakawalonjela vyono Petelo yemile ha mulango hanze.
Wakamutya yuyo muhinza, “Alo wina lukwale!” Ninga mwene yakacila kulonga du, vyono yili mbeka. Nawo wakamutya, “Ayo yo Malayika wakwe.”
Na mu cipango cico, Petelo nayo yakasimbilila kukong'onha. Hanyuma nhondo wakawudigula mulango, wakamuwona, vyono yo mweneco, wakezina.

Nayo Petelo, yakawayunziza u muwoko, wanyamale, nayo yakawasimuliziza vyono Muwaha yamulavizye mu jela. Yakawatya wamulonjele zinghani zizi Yakobo, na we zindugu wanji, hodu u mwene yakawa kulawila, yakawa kubita hanhu hanji.
Wali weza kwela, hakawa na mahwele mawaha, muli wawalya iwasilikale muli yono yimuweye Petelo.

Helode yakalajiliza yalondolwe muno, ninga hamba nhavivyo si wasuma kumuwona. Holeka yakawa kulajiliza wawalya wasilikale wawuzwe, yakalajiliza wawulagwe. Hanyuma Petelo yakawuka kuko ku Yudiya yakabita ku Kayisaliya, yakekala kuko.

Nayo Helode yakakozwa likuwo muno na wanya Tulo na Sidoni. Ninga wene wakamutumila wanhu. Nawo wakasuma kumutuga Balasito yawe ku lubavu lwawo. Balasito yali mulanjilizi muwaha we likulu lyo mutemi. Wakamubitila Helode, wakamulomba hawe mulamu, vyono yisi yawo, yali yitumbiye kutuga zindigwa kulawa ku yisi yo mutemi.
Na mwizuwa linji lyono lyali yihagulwe, Helode lono yali yavwala myenda mitambule, yekala mwigoda lyo wutemi, yakawalonjela wanhu nghani.
Iwanhu wakazoza kwa nyemo wakutya, “Lizi ali lya Mulungu, hamba si lya munhu.”
Ho baho baho Malayika wo Muwaha yakamugwisa Helode hasi, vyono si yamupela Mulungu lilumbo lilyo. Yakaligwa ne mang'onyo, yakafwa.
Ninga inghani yo Mulungu yikacila kukangala no konjelezeka.
Balanaba na Sawulo waza kukondya kukwiza u witumami wawo, wakawuka kanyhi ku Yelusalemi, wakamusola na Yohana mono hanji kacemwaga Maluko.

Kwi Kanisa lya ku Antiyokiya, kwali kowali wanhu wanji wono wali wawizi ne wejizi, na muli wawo, yali Balanaba na Simoni mono kacemwaga Mutitu, na Lukiyo wa ku Kilene, na Manayeni mono yawiluswa hamonga no mutemi Helode, na Sawulo.
Nawo lono wamwitumamilaga Muwaha, no kuleka kulya, Muhe Mono Yelile yakatya, “Siwanulilenyi Balanaba na Sawulo so mulimo wono niwacemeye.”
Nawo waza kondya kulomba no kuleka kulya, wakawawicila miwoko wakawaleka wabite.
Nawo wa Balanaba na Sawulo, wali weza kutumwa no Muhe Mono Yelile, wakatenenhuka sunga ko ku Selukiya, no kulawa kuko wakajendelela mu ngalawa sunga ko ku cizingwa ca Kupulo.
Waza kufika ku Salami, wakaganula nghani yo Mulungu mu matang'anilo go wuhembelo ge Wayahudi. Na Yohana (Maluko) yali mutazi wawo.
Waza kondya kupuluta ilizingwa lyose, sunga ko ku Pafo, na kuko wakagana muhawi yunji, Muyahudi, litagwa lyakwe Baliyesu, mono yenozaga nha muwizi.
Yuyu yali yali hamonga na Seligiyo Pawulo, u muwaha we cizingwa cico, munhu we mahala. Seligiyo Pawulo, yakawacema wa Balanaba na Sawulo ho yayihulice nghani yo Mulungu.
Ninga yuyo u muhawi Elima, (nha vyono wamucemaga ku nonga ye Cigiliki) yakajela kuwabeza, ho yamwimile yuyo u muwaha we cizingwa, yalece kupitucila wihuwilo we Cikilisito.
Ninga Sawulo mono yacemwaga kanyhi Pawulo, yali yamemile Muhe Mono Yelile, yakamunugulila yuyo u muhawi,
yakatya, “Gwe go mwana wa Setani, go mulugu wo wiling'ano wose, mono wumemile wubala wose, no wubi wose, alo koleka nili kuzibidyanga zinzila zo Muwaha zono zigoloce?

Alu wulanje ta, u muwoko wo Muwaha wo kulipiciza, kowa mubofu, hamba si kosuma kuliwona lizuwa cidaha.” Lu lulo lulo siyasuma kuwona cinji, yakapilima pilima akuno na akuno yakulondola munhu wo kumwibata muwoko, yamutonje.
U Muwaha we cizingwa yaza kuziwona zizo, yakehuwila, yakezina mejizo gono yahulika ga kuli Muwaha.
Pawulo ne wayagwe wakatulucila mu ngalawa wakulawa ku Pafo, wakubita ku Peliga ya ku Pamufuliya, ninga Yohana (Maluko) yakawaleka yakawuya ku Yelusalemi.
Ninga wene wakajendelela no muhinzo wakulawa ku Peliga, sunga kwi kaya lya Antiyokiya ya ku Pisidiya. Na mwizuwa lye Sabato wakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo wakekala.

Imasomo gali geza kukondya kusomwa, mu wulawa mu citabu co Wulajilize wa Musa, mu mandiko ge wawizi, iwanhu we nhang'anilo yiyo yo wuhembelo, wakawatumila munhu, wakutya, “Nye wandugu, cikumulombenyi hono mwina nghani yo kuwejiza wanhu, ale lonjenyi.”
Hobaho Pawulo yakenuka yakema, yakawayunziza u muwoko wakwe, yakatya, “Nye mo wayangu mo wa Isilayeli, nanye wose mono muli baha mono mumogopile u Mulungu, ta muhulicizaje!
U Mulungu we wanhu wawa Waisilayeli, yawahagula wakuku zetu, yakawanoza kuwa nghungugo mbaha, lono wali mu yisi yo wujenzi kuko ku Misili. No Mulungu yakawawusa kuko, kwe vilungo vyakwe viwaha.
Yakawakangalila mwidaha lya myaka makumi mane mu nyika.
Yaza kukondya kugahodanga makungugo mupunghati, ga mu yisi ya Kanani, yakawapela wawo iwanhu wakwe yiwe yisi yawo.
Myaka magana mane na makumi mahano yaza kupuluta, hanyuma yayo, yakawapela walamuzi wawatonje, sunga mu vilo vyo muwizi Samwili.
Hanyuma wakasaka wawe na mutemi, u Mulungu yakawapela Sawuli mwana wa Kisi, wo mulango wa Benyamini, yawe mutemi wawo mu myaka makumi mane.

No Mulungu yaza kumuwusa Sawuli, yakamuwika Dawudi yawe mutemi wawo. Mulungu yahomelela, yakatya, ‘Nimuwona Dawudi u mwana wa Yese, munhu mono nimwendile muno, yo munhu mono kosuma kwituma zose zono nghusaka nizitume.’
Mu wulawa mu mhuga yo munhu yuyu, u Mulungu nha vyono yehuwiza, kawaletela wanhu wa Isilayeli Muponyi, yo Yesu.
Na lono Yesu yali yakali sinaza, Yohana yamulongolela, yakawa kuwaganulila wanhu wose wa Isilayeli, vyono yiwanojeye wanene no kubaputizwa.

Na Yohana lono yamalilizaga witumami wakwe, yawalonjela wanhu, ‘Alo mukwihwesa ane yo nene nani? Ane yo si yulya mono mumulanjiliye. Yuyo yakuza munyuma yangu, mono ane si nojeye hamba kuhogosa mikowa ye malatu gakwe.’
“Nye wandugu zangu mo wana we mhuga ya Abulahamu, na nyenye wose mono mumogopile u Mulungu! Yo sese mono cileteywe inghani ye mhonelo yiyi.

Hambi wono wekaye ku Yelusalemi, hamonga ne wawaha wawo, si wamumanya mwene vyono yo Muponyi. Hamba si wasuma kuzimanya zinghani ze wawizi zono zasomwaga vilo vyose mu Sabato. Hamba nhavivyo wakagafisiliza i mandiko so kumuwulaga Yesu.
Na hamba wawe si wawona muli mwene soko yo yose yo kumuwulajila, ninga wakasaka kuli Pilato, yawulagwe.
Sunga waza kukondeleza zose zono zandikwa muli mwene, wakamutungula mu musalaba, wakamuwika mu citenjelo.
Ninga Mulungu yakamuzukula muli wafu.
Nayo mu vilo vinji, yakejela kuli walya wono wakazana nayo kulawa ku Galilaya sunga ko ku Yelusalemi. Na wawo, aluno wo wahomelezi wakwe kuli wanhu wa Isilayeli.
Nase alu, ciza bahano, ho cimuletelenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu, inghani yiyilya yono u Mulungu yawehuwiza wa kuku zetu,
kayifisiliziza luno muli ase co wezukulu wawo, mu nzila yo kumuzukula Yesu, kulawa muli wafu. Nha vyono yandikwe mu Zabuli ye kejete, ‘Yo gwegwe mwanangu Izuwali nawa nili sogo.’
“Na zo kumuzukula muli wafu, na vyono sikowuya kanyhi kuko no kuwolela mu citenjelo, u Mulungu yakatya nhavi! ‘Nomupelenyi nyenye wumoti wono namwihuwiza Dawudi, wono welile na we mbeka.’
Nha vyono yalonjela kanyhi mu Zabuli yinji yakutya, ‘Sikomuleka mono welile wako yawolele mu citenjelo.’
Alu Dawudi mweneco, yawufisiliza wuhile wo Mulungu mu cipango cakwe, hanyuma yakafwa, yakazikwa mu citenjelo behi ne wasogwe, no muwili wakwe wukawolela mu citenjelo.
Ninga yulya mono u Mulungu yamuzukula kulawa muli wafu, siyawolela mu citenjelo.
Holeka zimanyice cagalanze kuli'nye wandugu zangu, vyono muli yuyu Yesu Kilisito, mo mukuganulilwa u Luganuzi lo wunenelwe wo wubi,
na vyono munhu wo wose mono yakumwihuwila Yesu, yakunenelwa zose zono si mosuma kunenelwa mu nzila yo Wulajilize wa Musa.
Holeka musuguce, zilece kumuzizenyi zono zalongwa ne wawizi,
‘Lanjenyi ta, anye mo wabedegazi, mwizine mwajilile! Hambi nha nghwituma mulimo mu vilo vyenyu, Mulimo wono si mokwihuwilila lukulu, hamba munhu yamulonjelenyi muno.’ ”
Wa Pawulo na Balanaba lono walawilaga mumo mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo, wawalya wanhu wakawalalika waze kanyhi, mwi'zuwa lye Sabato yono yikutyatya, ho wawalonjele kanyhi ze nghani yiyo.

Wihangulize wuwo waza malika, Iwayahudi wenji, hamonga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wono wali wayipitucila i dini ye Ciyahudi, wakawatyatya wa Pawulo na Balanaba. Nawo watumwa, wakaduwana nawo, wakawasikamya, wajendelele kwikala akuno wakulitumbila lihewa lyo Muwaha.
Na mwizuwa lye Sabato yono yikatyatya, behi ne wanhu wose wa mwi'kaya lilyo, wakaza kuhuliciza nghani yo Muwaha.
Ninga Wayahudi waza kuwuwona winji we wanhu, wakawona wivu, wakazibedula zinghani zono Pawulo yalongaga, kanyhi wakamutovula.

Ninga hamba nha vivyo, Pawulo na Balanaba, wakalonga muno akuno wasina woga, wakatya, “Vyo yali yinojeye Inghani yo Mulungu yamule yimuficilenyi nyenye. Ninga vyono muyikumhiye kutali, no kwiwona vyono wumi we cibitilila si wukumunojelenyi nyenye, ale, ceza kumulecenyi, no kuwabitila i wanhu wono si Wayahudi.
Hambi Muwaha nha yacilajiliza yakatya, ‘Nghukuwika gwegwe wuwe wuzelu we makungugo, Wuwe nzila ye mhonelo mu yinze yose.’ ”
Iwanhu wono si Wayahudi, waza kuyihulika nghani yiyo, wakasecelela, wakayikumya nghani yo Mulungu, na wose wono wali watemezezwe wumi we cibitilila, wakehuwila.
Inghani yo Muwaha yikatandala mu yisi yiyilya yose.

Ninga Wayahudi wakawasagahaza iwacekulu we lilumbo wono wali si Wayahudi, wono wali wehuwilwa muli Mulungu, hamonga ne walume watambule wa mwi'kaya lilyo. Wakawa kwamula kuwagaza wa Pawulo na Balanaba, wakawawinga wawuce mu yisi yawo.
Nawo watumwa, wakawakung'unhila manghundi ga mu magulu gawo, so wuhomelezi kuli wene, hanyuma wakawa kubita ku Ikoniyo.
Ninga iwejizwa wawo, wali wamemile nyemo, no Muhe Mono Yelile.

Kuko ku Ikoniyo, zinghani zikawa nha vyono zali ku Antiyokiya. Wa Pawulo na Balanaba wakenjila mu nhang'anilo yo wuhembelo ye Wayahudi, wakalonga wapetuce, sunga Wayahudi wenji hamonga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wakehuwila.
