Ninga ane cono natunilizaga mu wandice wangu nha coci, mulecele lukulu kuhanga na we ndugu Mukilisito, u musenyha, mubuguci, mono yakuhemba vihwani, musonjeza wayagwe, mugalo'jimbi, kanyhi mulambilambi. U munhu we liwala lilyo, hamba kulya du, mulece kulya hamonga nayo.
Wulenyi, hambi yo nghani yangu nene niwaling'anize wanhu wono wali kunze? Aa, ng'o, awo u Mulungu yo kowaling'aniza. Hamba alu ma, anye nyo weneco si munojeye muwaling'anize i Wakilisito wayenyu?
Ale mumuwinjilaje kutali muli'nye yuyo u munhu mubi!
Alu nhawule muyenyu wa muli nyenye, yadahile kwijelela kumusitaka u mukilisito muyagwe, kuli mahakama ge wanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, hamba si yakusuma kumusitaka kuli wanhu wo Mulungu?

Hamba si mumanyile lo, vyono i wanhu wo Mulungu wo woloyiling'aniza i yinze? Alu hono kumbe yinze yololing'anizwa na nyenye, alu ku soko ci muwe si munojeye kwiyiling'aniza hamba muli izinghani zi ndodo ndodo?
Alo si mumanyile vyono colowaling'aniza wamalayika? Wulenyi, ho sicosuma kuziling'aniza zinghani ze mikalile ye nhondo zose!
Alu anye lono mwatuga mazozo nyenye wose, muli ze mikalile ye nhondo zose, hanyuma kanyhi mukuwacema i wahakimu, i wanhu wono si wakulikumya hamba likanisa wo wawe wahakimu wenyu?
Mbeka yo nghani ya cevu kuli'nye! Alu hongo wo wutya, hasina munhu hamba monga muli nyenye, mono kowa ne mahala go kusuma kuling'aniza muli wawo Wakilisito?
Alu du mbeka weza nha wuzowele wenyu kuli we ndugu, yakumutegula u nduguye kuli mahakama, kanyhi hamba nhavivyo, kuli wanhu wono si wehuwiye.

I mbeka du, wuwo u wisitace wenyu wono mukwisitaka nyenye wose, wukulajila vyono anye mwasumilwa lukulu! Alu wulenyi, si yali yiwe yili ciba kuli'nye hono mutendelwe yono si yili ling'ani? Kanyhi si yali yiwe viswanu muno kuli'nye, hono wamubocenyi i zisawo zenyu.
Alu kanyhi yo nyenye mono mukuwatendela vibi wandugu zenyu nyenye wose, kanyhi no kwihiziza nyenye wose munhu na munhu muyagwe!

Hamba si mumanyile lo, vyono i wanhu wabi, si wosuma kuwuhala u wutemi wo Mulungu? Ale, mulece kwikonga! Iwanhu wono wekalilaga mu mikalile yo wusenyha, na wono wahembaga vihwani, na wono wakusulumila i walume wayawo no kugona nawo, hamba wono wakwitendya,
hambe wahizi, hambe i wabuguci, hamba i wagalo'jimbi, na wono wendile kuwaheha i wayawo, ne walambilambi wose, wawo wose si wosuma kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.

Nanye wanji muli nyenye vyo mwali, ninga aluno mwahovugwa mu wubi, mukanozwa muwe mwelile, no kusiwanulwa so Mulungu, mukalamulwa no Mulungu, mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito na ko Muhe wo Mulungu wetu.

Lunji munhu kosuma kutya, “Kuli'ne vyose viswanu.” Heya, ninga si vyono vyose vyowa vikwiliye, aa ng'o. Ninga nghuvumila vyono kuli'ne hasina cinhu cinji co mwiko, ninga hamba yiwe yili nhavivyo, ane si nendile kutemwa na cinhu co cose.

Kosuma kutya, “Indigwa yili so yinda, nayo yinda yili so ndigwa.” Heya, ninga u Mulungu, kolovihodanga vyose vyono vyejete. Ninga u muwili wo munhu si wawumbwa ho witumamilwe mu wusenyha, aa ng'o, langa wawumbwa ho wumwitumamile u Muwaha, nayo u Muwaha so muwili.
Ale u Mulungu mono yamuzukula u Muwaha muli wafu, kocizukula na sese nhavivyo kwe vilungo vyakwe.

Hamba si mumanyile lu, vyono i miwili yenyu vyo vilunzwa vyo muwili wa Kilisito? Hamba mukwihwesa vyono nosuma kucisola i cilunzwa cimonga co muwili wa Kilisito, no kucinoza cilunze no muwili wo musenyha? Hamba hadodo bwete!
Hambi nha mumanyile vyono, mono vikwilunza no musenyha, yakuwa muwili monga nayo, nha vyono yandicigwe, “Nawo wawo wejete, wowa muwili monga.”
Ninga kuli mono vikwilunza no Muwaha yuyo vikuwa muhe monga nayo.
Holeka muwulecelaje lukulu u wusenyha. U wubi wunji wose wunozezwaga kunze yo muwili, ninga u musenyha, kawunozezaga u wubi wuwo mu muwili wakwe mweneco.
Wulenyi, si mumanyile vyono i miwili yenyu yo Nyumba yo Muhe Mono Yelile mono yali mugati mwenyu, mono mwamubocela kulawa kuli Mulungu? Holeka alu nanye, si muli wenyu mo weneco.
Mwagulwa ko wuguzi wukamu. Holeka ku soko yiyo, muyitumamilaje i miwili yenyu ko lukumyo lo Mulungu.
Ale, alu kuli azilya zono mwandika, Heya yili viswanu hono munhu yekale si yatolile,
ninga alu ku soko ye zimbali zo wusenyha, holeka yinojeye u mulume wo wose, yaweze no mugolece wakwe mweneco, no mucekulu wo wose yaweze no mulume wakwe mweneco.
Nayo u mulume yafisilize yono yimunojeye kuli mugolece wakwe, u mugolece nayo nhavivyo, yafisilize yono yimunojeye kuli mulume wakwe.
U mugolece si kowusuma u muwili wakwe yali wene du, langa u mulume wakwe yo kowusuma, nhavivyo nayo u mulume, si kowusuma u muwili wakwe yali wene, langa mugolece wakwe yo kowusuma.
Mulece kwiyima kuli yono munojeye, langa hono muwe mulagane kunoza nhavivyo kwa cidaha du, ho mwiwuyile kanyhi lwa kamonga, ho Setani yalece kumuletelenyi majelo ku soko yo wusocele wenyu.
Zono nghusaka kumulonjelenyi alu, zikuwa nha suguzi du, hamba si nghutemya yilajilizo yaye.
Ane nali nyende wanhu wose wawe nha vyono ninha nene, ninga alu munhu wo wose yena cipegwa cono cisimajiye no muyagwe kulawa kuli Mulungu, yunji yena cipegwa aci, na yunji acilya.
Alu, awalya wono wakali si natola, sunga na awalya wono wafwiliywe, ane nghuwalonjela vyono yali yiwe viswanu muno muno kuli wene, hono wali wasume kujendelela kwikala nha vyono ane ninha.
Ninga hamba nha vivyo, u munhu hono yawone si yakusuma kwiyimila, hodu yatole, hambi nha yili ciba muno kutola, si nho kwaka no wusulumizi.
Langa kuli awalya wono wetolile, nina yilajilizo kuli wene, kanyhi hamba si yilajilizo lyangu nene, langa lyo Muwaha. U mugolece yalece kwileka no mulume wakwe,
na hono vilece nayo, hodu yekalaje yalece kutolwa kanyhi, hamba hono si nha vivyo, ciba vilamule no mulume wakwe. No mulume nayo yalecele lukulu kumupela talaka u mugolece wakwe.

Kuli awalya i wanji, (nene no mweneco hamba si Muwaha) nghutya nhavi, u mulume Mukilisito, hono yawe yena mugolece mono siyanehuwila, ninga yuyo mugolece yawe kuvumila kujendelela du kwikalana nayo, ale hodu yalece kumupela talaka.
Na hono u mugolece wa cikilisito, nayo yawe yena u mulume mono si yehuwiye, no mulume yuyo yakuvumila kujendelela kwikalana nayo, hodu, yalece kumupela talaka u mulume wakwe.

Ku soko u mulume yuyo mono si yehuwiye, kosuma kubocelwa kuli Mulungu ku soko yo wilunze no mugolece, no mugolece yuyo nayo mono si yehuwiye kabocelwaga no Mulungu ku soko yo wilunze no mulume wakwe. Yali yiwe si nhavivyo, i wana wawo wali wawe si wo Mulungu, ninga aluno nawo wakuwa wana wo Mulungu.

Ninga hamba nhavivyo, ayulya mono si yehuwiye, hono yasace kumuleka ayulya u Mukilisito, hodu yadahile kumuleka du. Alu baho langa, yuyo u Mukilisito we cilume hamba yuyo we cicekulu yakuwa si muwopwe kanyhi. Hambi u Mulungu nha yamucemenyi anye, ho mwikale mu mikalile yo mulamu.

Alu nagwe go we ciyaya we Cikilisito, kosuma nhawule kumanya nha vyono si kosuma kumuponya u mulume wako? Hamba agwe nagwe go mulume Mukilisito, kosuma nhawule kumanya nha vyono si kosuma kumuponya u mugolece wako?
Munhu wo wose yimunojeye yekale mu mikalile nha vyono vinha vipegwa vyono u Muwaha yamugawila, na kanyhi nha vyono yacemwa no Mulungu. Na lili lye'lajilizo lyangu kuli makanisa gose.
Na hone munhu yacemwa lono yali yakondya kwalama ale, yalece kwinoza nha kotya munhu mono si yalame, na hono lono yacemelwa yali yakali si nalama, hodu yalece kwalama.
Hambi kwalama hamba wula kwalama nha si cinji yaye, cinhu ciwaha, kwibata i malajilizo go Mulungu du.
Holeka munhu wo wose, yekalaje nha vyono yali yenha mu cipango cono yacemelwa.
Wule, agwe wali wuli muwanda lono wacemelwa? Sawa! Wulece kwihwelela, ninga hono wutuje cilejeho co kuwopolwa, ale wucitumamilaje cilejeho cico.

Ku soko vyono yuyo mono yacemwa no Muwaha akuno ho muwanda, ayo yuyo kawezaga munhu mwelecele, wo Muwaha. Sunga yuyo nayo nha vivyo, mono yacemwa akuno ho mwelecele ayo kawezaga mwitumami wa Kilisito.
Anye wose mwagulwa ko wuguzi, holeka mulecele lukulu kuwa muli wawanda we wanhu kanyhi.
Nye nyo wandugu zangu, ale wose muli nyenye, munhu na lwakwe yekalaje no Mulungu nha vyono yali yenha mwi'pango lono yacemelwa.

Ale, kuli ze wahinza na kuli wono si wakusaka kutola hamba kutolwa, ane sina lilajilizo lyono likulawa kuli Muwaha, ninga nghulavya lihala lyangu du, ane mono so lusungu lo Muwaha, nghwiliye kuwa mwihuwilwa.
Ale, ku soko yo wugaye wono wuli baho lulu, ane nali kuwona vyono, yowa viswanu hono munhu yekale nha vyono ninha nene.
Alu agwe hono wutolile, wulece kusaka kwileka no mugolece wako kanyhi. Nagwe hono wuwe si wutolile, ale hodu wulece kusaka kutola kanyhi.

Ninga na hono wutole, si kowa wetuma wubi yaye, no muhinza nayo nhavivyo hono yatolwe, si kowa yetuma wubi yaye. Wawo langa wono wetolile, wotuga magaziko ga mono yinze yiyi, ninga ane ku lwangu, si nali nyende zizo zimwaganenyi anye.
Nye wandugu zangu, ane nghusaka kutya nhavi, i cipango cono cisigaye cidodo du. Holeka awalya wono watolile, wekalaje nha kotya wono si watolile,
nawo wono wakulila, waweze nha kotya wono wasina wukalale, nawo wono wakusangalala, wawe nha kotya wono si wasangalaye, nawo wono wakugula, wawe nha wono wasina cinji,
nawo wono wakipiganziza za mono'nze yiyi, ale wawe nha wono si wakwipiganziza muno zizo. Hambi nha vyono cimanyile, yinze yiyino nha yikupuluta.
Ninga ane nali nyende anye mulece kuwa na mahwele. U munhu mono yasina mugolece, yuyo kepiganzaga ne milimo yo Muwaha, mu nghango vyono kosuma kumwendeza u Muwaha.
Ninga u munhu mono yatolile, yuyo kepiganzaga ne zinghani za mononze, mu nghango nha vyono kosuma kumwendeza u mugolece wakwe,

nayo yakuwa yegawile hanhu hejete. Nayo u mucekulu mono siyatoligwe hamba muhinza, keyipiganzaga ne zinghani zo Muwaha du, ho yasume kwiyilavya nhumbula yakwe no muwili wakwe kuli Muwaha. Ninga u mucekulu mutolwa mwene yakuwa kwipiganza ku so za mononze yiyi munghango nha vyono kosuma kumwendeza u mulume wakwe.

Nane nghumulonjelenyi zizi ku so cambuzi cenyu mo weneco, na si vyono lunji ane nghumuwicilenyi vimizi, aa ng'o. Ane nghuhila ho muwe no wityatye wono wukwiliye, kanyhi ho musume kumwitumamila u Muwaha ko mutima wumonga no wuhile wumonga.

Na lono munhu yawone nha vyono si kosuma kumutendela viswanu u mucumba wakwe, hono yalece kumutola, na hono u wusulumizi wakwe wakumukwega, ciba yanoze nha vyono yakusaka, wetole du si vyono kowa yetuma wubi yaye.

Ninga hono yuyo we cilume yawe yalamula mu nhumbula yakwe yalece kutola, na hono yawe yasumile kwiyimila masulumizi gakwe, kanyhi hono yawe yamanya vyono kokwituma, hodu, yakunoza viswanu muno muno, hono yalece kumutola muhinza yuyo.
Ku lubavu lunji, yuyo mono yakulamula watozwe na yuyo u muhinza, ale, yakunoza viswanu, nayo mono yakulamula, yalece kumutola, yuyo yakunoza viswanu muno muno.

U mugolece yakuwa muwopwe no mulume wakwe i vilo vyose lono u mulume wakwe yakali mumi. Ninga u mulume lono yafwe, ale u mugolece yuyo yawopolwa, na hono yende mweneco, kosuma kutolwa no munhu wo wose, soko du yiwe mu nzila ye Cikilisito.
Ninga nane vyono nghuwona ti, yali yiwe yili ciba muno muno hono yali yasume kwikala nha vivyo du nha vyono yenha. Ane vyo nghuwona, nane nghwihwesa nha vyono nina u Muhe wo Mulungu nhavivilya.
Aluno kuli i zindigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani, cimanyile nha vyono ase wose cina uwutanje mu mahala, ninga kanyhi u wutanje wuwo, wuwapelaga wanhu wawo no widunhumuzi, ninga u wendo, wuzengaga.
Ale, holeka mono yakwihwesa nha yamanyile cinji, i mbeka, yuyo si yamanyile cinji co cose nha vyono yimunojeye kumanya.
Ninga u munhu mono yamwendile u Mulungu, yuyo langa yo yamanyice kuli mwene.
Holeka kuli i zindigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani, ase cimanyile, vyono vihwani si cinji mono yinze, ase cimanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yumonga du.
Hamba viwe ho vili vinhu vyono vicemwaga milungu, mu muno mono'nze, hamba ku wulanga, na hamba hawe hoyili milungu mu muno, ne wawaha wenji,

hamba nhavivyo, kuli'se koyuli Mulungu yumonga du, Baba, u Muwumbi we vinhu vyose, mono sunga na sese nase, cili baha ku soko yakwe. Na kanyhi, koyuli u Muwaha yumonga du, yo Yesu Kilisito, mono nayo mu nzila yakwe, vinhu vyose vikawumbwa, na mu nzila yakwe na sese nase mo cikuwumipila.

Ninga hamba nhavivyo, si wose wono wena u wumanye wuwuno. Hambi nha howali wanhu wanji wono wavizowela i vihwani, wanhu wono sunga nalu, lono wakulya zindigwa, wakuziwona kotya nha ndigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani. Na vyono viselinji vyawo visoceye, wakutipizwa mu viselinji vyawo.
Ninga ndigwa siyosuma kucitegula behi no Mulungu. Na hamba hono cilece kuyilya, si cocepucilwa na cinji, na hamba hono cilye, si cokonjelezezwa na cinji.
Ninga mwilanjililaje, u welecele wenyu wuwu, wulece kuwanoza wono wena u wihuwilo wono wusoceye, wagwile mu wubi.

Hambi u munhu mono i ciselinji cakwe cisoceye, hono yakuwone agwe mono wina wizuce wukulya zindigwa zizo mugati ye cikumbicilo ce vihwani, wule, si kowa wamupela vilungo vyo kulya zindigwa zono zikumbiciywe vihwani?
Na hobaho yuyo u nduguyo u musocele, mono Kilisito yafwa ku soko yakwe, kokwajilila ku soko yo wumanye wako.
Na hono muwasutizye wandugu zenyu nhavivyo, no kuvitajila makomele viselinji vyawo, vyono visoceye, mowa mwamusutizya Kilisito.
Holeka hono ndigwa yiwe yikuwa kumuletela ndugu yangu wugwe, hodu sinolila lukulu nyama, ho ndece kumugwisiza ndugu yangu mu wubi.
Alu ane si nili mwelecele? Hamba lunji si nili mutumwa? Hamba lunji si namuwona Yesu u Muwaha wetu? Alu anye nanye ma, si yo nyenye mono muli mana go mulimo wangu ku soko yo Muwaha?
Hamba niwe si nili mutumwa kuli wanhu wanji, ninga ane nili mutumwa kuli'nye. Anye nyenye, wo wuhomelezi wo wutumwa wangu, ku soko yo wilunze wenyu no Muwaha.
Ninga i nghani yangu kuli awalya wono wakumbeza nha yoyi,
Wulenyi, alu ase cisina i ling'ani yo kupegwa ndigwa ne malenga ku soko yo mulimo wetu wono cikwituma?
Hamba ase cisina ling'ani yo kujendana mu muhinzo, hamonga no munhu wo wose we cicekulu, nha vyono wanozaga i watumwa wanji ne wanduguze wo Muwaha sunga na Petelo?
Hamba yo nene du hamonga na Balanaba, mono yicinojeye camule citume milimo, ho cisume kwiyitujila visakwa vyetu lo?

Hamba alo musilikaleci mono kelipilaga mweneco so witume wakwe? Hamba nani mwene mono kalimaga u mugunda wakwe we mizabibu, kanyhi ho yalece kulya i mikalo yayo? Hamba yo nani mono kadimaga mitugo, kanyhi ho yalece kung'wa i mele gazo?
Wulenyi, anye mukwihwesa ane nghuzilonjela zizi mu nzila ye cimunhumunhu du? Hamba wulenyi, no Wulajilize nawo, si wukulonga nhavivyo?
Hambi mu Wulajilize wa Musa nha yikutya nhavi, “Wulece kuyiwopa ng'ombe ku mulomo wayo, mwipango lono yikukutaza kutwanga wuhemba mu cuga.” Alu baho wo wutya u Mulungu yakulonga 'mbi i zing'ombe?

Hamba yalongaga ku soko yetu, lono yalonjela nhavivyo? Na mbeka azi zandikwa ku soko yetu sese, ku soko vyono ayulya mono yakulima, na ayulya mono yakududula, wose vyono wejete, nha wanojeye ling'ani yo kuwa no witumbilo, vyono wotuga.
Alu hono ase cahadika mbeyu ye cimuhe muli nyenye, hambi yowa nghani ya wizine, hono cidudule muli nyenye cambuzi ca ze ciyinze-yinze?

Alu hono wawe wanji wena ling'ani yo kuzilanjilila zizo ku wulawa muli nyenye, wulenyi, ase ma, cisina ling'ani kuciza wene wawo? Ninga hamba nhavivyo, ase si cayitumamila ling'ani yiyo. Langa ase cakangalila du muli vyose, ho cilece kuluwicila cikobazo co cose cilya, u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito.

Alo si mumanyile vyono, wono wetumamaga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, watugaga ndigwa yawo mu wulawa mu Nyumba yo Mulungu, na vyono kanyhi, nawo wono walavizyaga vilavywa vyawo mu cikumbicilo watugaga nawo lifungu lye vilavywa vivyo?
Nayo u Muwaha yalajiliza nhavivyo du, vyono nawo i waganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, yiwanojeye watuje indigwa yawo ku wulawa mu Luganuzi Luswanu.

Ninga alu ane si netumamila hamba monga ya muli zizo. Hamba si nghwandika ho niyituje ling'ani hamba monga ya muli zizo, ninga kuli'ne, yali yiwe yili ciba hono nali nifwe, si nho kumunoza munhu wo wose yawone nha vyono nghwilumba bwete.
Na hono yiwe ane nghuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, ayo yo si nghani yo kwilumbila, langa wo mulimo wangu du, wono napegwa. Holeka, woyi he kuli ne, hono ndece kuluganula Luganuzi Luswanu!

Na hono nali niwe neyihagulila nene no mweneco u mulimo wuwu, haco nali niwe nanjiliye ho ndipwe musahala, ninga alu vyono nghuwituma u mulimo wuwu nha munhu mono nojeye niwitume, alu baho wo wutya, wo mulimo wangu du wono napegwa niwitume.

Alu u musahala wangu ma, co cici? U musahala wangu'ne, co cicino cilejeho cono napegwa co kuluganula bwete u Luganuzi Luswanu, hamba kudaya ling'ani yo yose yono yinojeye so kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu.
Holeka hamba ane niwe si nili muwanda wa munhu wo wose, ninga nenoza ho niwe muwanda wa wanhu wose, ho sume kumutujila Kilisito wanhu wenji nha vyono yosumika.

Ku Wayahudi, nghawa nha Muyahudi ho niwatuje i Wayahudi, hamba yiwe ane no mweneco si nili hasi yo Wulajilize, ninga nghawa nha munhu mono yali hasi yo Wulajilize kuli wene, ho niwatuje wene wono wali hasi yo Wulajilize.

Na kuli awalya nawo wono wali kunze yo Wulajilize, nako nane nghuwa nhe weneco, kunze yo Wulajilize, ho sume kuwatuga wawo nawo wono wali kunze yo Wulajilize. Ninga si vyono ane no mweneco si niwutyatyaga u Wulajilize wo Mulungu, hambi nha mbopigwe ne lilajilizo lya Kilisito.
Kuli awalya wono wasoceye, ane nane nghawa nha mono yasoceye, ho niwatuje wawo wene wono wasoceye. Nghuwega wanhu wose vyono wenha, ho sume kuwaponezya mu nzila yoyose wanji wa muli wene.
Nane nghuzinoza zizi zose ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu, ho sume kuhanga u wulugutwe wayo.
Alu si mumanyile vyono mu ciwanza ce midawalo, hamba wawe wawalya wono wakwisumaniza u lumangho, wose wakumangha, ninga hakuwezaga ho yuli yumonga du mono yakupegwa zawadi?

I wedawazi wose, wewikanizizaga mu nzila yo wizoweleze, hamonga ne cogopo cose, ninga hamba nhavivyo, wene wanozaga nhavivyo, ho watuje u mukumbo wono wuhodanjikaga! Ninga ase cikunoza nhavivyo, ho cituje u mukumbo wono wikalaga cibitilila.
Ale, nane nhavivyo vyo manghaga, akuno nina no wuhile wo wusume, holeka nane nihwanile nho mutowa zingumi, mono si katowaga zingumi mu mbeho caka du.
Nane nghuwuzowelezeza u muwili wangu mu nzila ye magayo, no kuwunoza ho wuwe wuceye, nene no mweneco ho nize ndece kulemwa, lono kumbe nakondya kuwaganulila wanji.
Nye mo wandugu zangu, ane nghusaka anye mumanye vyono walezi wose wali wali hasi ye livunde, na vyono kanyhi wose walowoka i lilenga lililya, wapolile.
Na wose wakabaputizizwa mu wumonga na Musa, mwi'vunde lililya ne lilenga lililya.
Na wose kanyhi, wakayilya ndigwa yiyilya ye cimuhe.
Na kanyhi wakang'wa ne cing'wegwa cicilya ce cimuhe, hambi nha wang'wa mu wulawa mwi'bwe lililya lye cimuhe lyono lyawatyatyaga, ne libwe lyeneco lilyo, lyali yo Kilisito mweneco.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wenji wa muli wene si wamwendeza u Mulungu, ne mivimba yawo yikeyagazwa caka mu nyika.
Alu i zinghani zizo zose, zali nha cihwanicizo du kuli'se, zikucisugula ase ho cilece kuwusulumila u wubi, nha vyono wakawusulumila wene.
Kanyhi mulece kuwa wahemba vihwani, nha vyono wali wenha wayawo wanji, nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “I wanhu wakekala ho walye no kung'wa, wakenuka wedawale.”
Hamba cilece kwiyinjiza mu wusenyha, nha vyono wayawo wanji wakasenyha, nawo wakagwa wanhu makumi mejete elufu mwizuwa limonga.
Kanyhi, cilece kumujela u Muwaha, nha vyono wanji wakamujela, nawo wakawulagwa ne zinzoka.
Hamba mulece kumung'ung'ulicila nha vyono wanji wamung'ung'ulicila, nawo wakawulagwa wose no Muwulaji!
Ale, zinghani zizo zono zawejelela wene, zaweza yifundo kuli wanji, nazo zandikwa ho zicisugule sese, mono cili behi ne vilo vya ku ndumo.
Holeka mono yakwiwona yemile yakamile, yalanjilile yalece kugwa.

I majelo gono gakondya kumuzizenyi, go majelo ge nhondo zose du kuli munhu. Ninga umwene Mulungu, yo mwihuwilwa, nayo si kosuma kumulecenyi ho mujelwe kuciza vyono mosuma, ninga hamonga ne majelo gago, u mwene komupelenyi ne vilungo vyo kugakangalilila, sunga ne nzila yono yomukozenyi mu majelo gago mupolile.
Holeka ku soko yiyo mo wendece wangu, mwilegaje mu wuhemba vihwani.
Ane nghulongana nanye nhe wanhu we mahala, holeka mwihagulilaje nyo weneco muli zizo zono nghulonga.
Na lono cikumulumba u Mulungu mu nzila yiyilya ye cikombe co wumoteswe, wulenyi si cikuwa kuhanga i sakami ya Kilisito? Na lono cikuwubegula u mukate ma, si cikuwa kuhanga u muwili wa Kilisito?
Nha vyono mukate wuwo wo monga, ale, ase nase hamba ciwe nha cili wenji, ninga cikunoza muwili monga, vyono ase wose cikuhanga u mukate wuwo du wumonga.
Ale, ta, cisole i cihwanicizo ce Wayahudi weneco, kuli wene, wono walizaga vyono vikumbiciligwe mu cikumbicilo, wakondya kwilunza na cico icikumbicilo.
Alu nghusaka nonje cici? Wo wutya ndigwa yono yikumbiciywe vihwani yikuwa yili cinhu cinji 'mbi, kuciza ndigwa? Hamba vivyo vihwani wule, vikuwa vinhu vye mbeka kuciza vihwani?
Hamba hadodo! Nane yono nghulonga yoyi, i makumbiko gono wakumbikaga wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, wakumbikaga masetani, hamba si Mulungu ng'o. Ninga si nendile anye muhangahanje ne masetani.
Si mosuma kung'wela i cikombe co Muwaha, hamonga ne cikombe ce masetani, hamba si mosuma kuhanga mu meza yo Muwaha hamonga ne meza ye masetani.
Hamba cikuhila kumunoza u Muwaha yawone wivu? Hongo mukwihwesa ase cili vilungo si nho mwene?
Kuli'ne ivinhu vyose visina mwiko, ninga hamba nhavivyo, si vyose vyono vikwiliye. Vinhu vyose visina mwiko ninga si vyose vyono vizengaga.
Ninga u munhu yalece kwilondolela cambuzi cakwe mweneco, langa i cambuzi co muyagwe.
Ale, mweze kulya cinhu co cose cono cikuguzwa mu sokoni, ninga mulece kuwuza wuza ku soko ye viselinji vyenyu nyo weneco,
hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Yinze sunga na vyose vyono vili mumo, yo sawo yo Muwaha Mulungu.”
Holeka umunhu mono si yehuwiye, hono yamucemelenyi, nanye hono muvumile kubita, ale, mulye du vyose vyono komutenjelenyi, ninga mulece kuwuza wuza ku soko ye viselinji vyenyu.

Langa hono munhu yunji yamulonjelenyi yatye, “I zindigwa zizino zikumbicilwa vihwani.” Ale hodu mulece kulya ku soko ya yuyo mono yazize kumulonjelenyi, hamonga na ku soko ye ciselinji, holeka mulece kulya.

Nghutya vyono “Kusoko ye ciselinji, si ciselinji cenyu nyenye, aa ng'o, langa ciselinji ca yuyo mono yazize kumulonjelenyi.” Lunji mowuza mutye, “Kusoko ci welecele wangu wuwe wuli muli ciselinji ca munhu yunji?
Alu hono ane nghuyilya i ndigwa yiyo na akuno nghumulumba u Mulungu, alu ku soko ci wanji wasume kuhosa ku soko ye ndigwa yono ane nghondizye kumulumbila u Mulungu?”
Holeka muli yo yose yono mukwituma, hono yiwe kulya zindigwa, hamba kung'wa, ale mwitumaje zose ku soko yo lukumyo lo Mulungu.
Mulece kuwa cikobazo kuli Wayahudi, hamba kuli wono si Wayahudi, hamba mwi'kanisa lyo Mulungu.
Ale, wose muweze nha vyono ninha nene, ane nghujela kuwendeza wanhu wose mu zinzila zose, hamba kulondola cambuzi cangu no mweneco, langa nghulondola cambuzi ce wanhu wose, ho waponywe.
Ale munyigaje nene nha vyono ane nane nghumwiga Kilisito.
Nghumulumbenyi muno muno vyono mukunghumbucila, na vyono kanyhi muzibate muno na zizilya zono nghamulajilizenyi.
Ninga nhavivilya, nendile mumanye vyono Kilisito yo Muwaha kuli mulume wo wose, na kanyhi vyono u mulume nayo yo muwaha kuli mugolece wakwe nayo Mulungu yo Muwaha kuli Kilisito.
Holeka u mulume wo wose mono yakuhemba, hamba yakuganula nghani yo Mulungu akuno yagubicize no mutwe wakwe, ale yuyo yakumubedegala Kilisito.

No mucekulu nayo hono yawe yakuhemba hamba yakuganula inghani yo Mulungu akuno si yagubicize mutwe wakwe, nayo yakumubedegala mulume wakwe, nayo mucekulu mono yakunoza nhavivyo, wali sawa du no mucekulu mono yanyonyoye u mutwe wakwe.

Nayo u mucekulu mono si yagubice u mutwe wakwe, ale yali yiwe yili ciba hono yali yazinyonyole zimvili zakwe. Ninga co cevu kuli mucekulu hono yanyonyolwe zimvili zakwe, hamba kucetwa, holeka yili ciba hono yawugubicize u mutwe wakwe.
Si viswanu kuli mulume hono yagubicize u mutwe wakwe, vyono u mwene yo hwani yo Mulungu, kanyhi co cilole co lukumyo lo Mulungu, ninga u mucekulu, co cilole no lukumyo lo mulume.
U mulume yo si yalawa mo mucekulu, langa u mucekulu yo yalawa muli mulume.
Kanyhi u mulume yo siyawumbwa ku soko yo mucekulu, langa u mucekulu yo yawumbwa ku soko yo mulume.
Yo yikuleka u mucekulu kagubicizaga u mutwe wakwe, ho ciwe co citanjilo cono cikulajila vyono u mwene yali hasi yo wulajilize wo mulume wakwe, na kanyhi ku so Wamalayika.
Hamba nhavivyo hali Muwaha, u mucekulu, si cinji yaye lono hasina mulume, nayo u mulume si cinji yaye lono hasina mucekulu.
Nha vyono u mucekulu yalawa muli mulume, yo nhavivyo kanyhi u mulume nayo kalelwaga no mucekulu, navyo vyose vilawaga kuli Mulungu.
Ale mulamule nyo weneco, wulenyi yimunojeye u mucekulu yamulombe Mulungu akuno ho siyavwalile cinji mu mutwe wakwe?
Hambe miwumbile yeneco du yilajilaga calinze vyono u mulume hono yawe yena mvwili nhali co cevu kuli mwene,
ninga kuli we cicekulu hono yawe yena mvwili nhali, lo lukumyo kuli mwene, vyono yapegwa zimvwili zakwe ziwe nhali ho ziwe nha vivwalo kuli mwene.
Na hono munhu wo wose yasace kuleta wiwanganile mu nghani yiyi, ale yamanye vyono ase cisina moto wunji, hamba sunga ne makanisa go Mulungu du nago gasina moto wunji.
Na lono nghali nghumupelenyi i malajilizo gaga, si nosuma hamba hadodo kumulumbizenyi ku soko vyono u wihangulize wenyu anye nyo Wakilisito, wukuleta wambuce du, si nha cambuzi.
Mwamulizo wa zose, ane nghuhulika vyono, lono mwehanguliza hamonga, gakwijela matemanuko muli nyenye. Nane kunji nghwihuwila hadodo,
hambi nha vyo yinojeye mahweso gono gesimajiye gawe gali muli nyenye ho wasume kwijela wono wakamile.
I mbeka, heya mukwihanguliza hamonga, ninga mukwihanguliza si so wulye we ndigwa yo Muwaha!
Ku soko lono mukulya, munhu wo wose muli nyenye yakwenda kulya i ndigwa yakwe du mweneco, sunga wanji muli nyenye wakuwa wadabuce du, na akuno wanji wagalile!

Alu mwene, si mukusuma kulya no kung'wa mu zikaya zenyu? Hamba, ma, mukulibedegala i likanisa lyo Mulungu, no kuwapela cevu wawo wono wasina cinji? Alu mukusaka nimulonjelenyi nitye wule? Nimukumyenyi ku soko ye nghani yiyi? Aa ng'o hamba hadodo!
Hambi ane nha nabocela kuli Muwaha i malajilizo gagalya gono nghamulecelenyi, vyono mu cilo ci cilya cono u Muwaha yalavizywa, yasola u mukate,
yakamulumbo Mulungu, yakawubegula yakatya, “Awu wo muwili wangu wono weza kulavywa ku soko yenyu mweze kunoza nhavivi, so wukumbucila nene.”

Nhavivyo kanyhi wali weza kukondya kulya, yakacisola i cikombe yakatya, “Aci co cikombe ce cilagane cipya, cono cikukangazizwa mu sakami yangu. Mweze noza nhavivi ho hose lono mukung'wa, so wukumbucila nene.”
Hambi nha ho hose lono mukuwulya u mukate wuwu no kucing'wa i cikombe cici, nha mukwanza ze lifwa lyo Muwaha, sunga kono kolo kuziza.
Holeka u munhu wo wose mono yakuwulya mukate wuwo, hamba kung'wa i cikombe co Muwaha, na akuno si yanojeye, u munhu yuyo kowa no wuhoswe wuwaha muno, ku soko yo muwili ne sakami yo Muwaha.
Holeka munhu wo wose, yamule yeyihenje mweneco, ho yalye u mukate wuwo no kung'wa i cikombe cico,
hambi mono yakulya no kung'wa, akuno si yatanjile nhunizo yo muwili wo Muwaha, yuyo yakwiletela u wuling'anizwe wakwe mweneco.
Holeka mowali wenji muli nyenye wono wasoceye, kanyhi watamwa sunga na wanji wenji wafwiye.
Holeka hono cali camule kwiyihenga co weneco viswanu, si cali cituje wulipicizwe wo Mulungu wono winha wuwu.
Ninga lono cikuling'anizwa no kulipicizwa no Muwaha, ho baho cikwijizwa ho ciwe ne cogopo, ho cilece kuling'anizwa hamonga ne yinze.
Holeka wandugu zangu, lono mukwihanguliza so wulye ndigwa yo Muwaha, yinojeye mweze kwiyilindila nyenye wose.
Na hone ho yuli yunji mono yadabuce, ale, yalye ku kaya yakwe, ho wihangulize wenyu, wulece kumuletelenyi wuling'anizwe. Ninga kuli ze zinghani zinji, nomutonjenyi viswanu kolo neza kuwa kuko kwenyu.
Nye wandugu zangu, kuli ze vipegwa vyo Muhe, ane nyendile hono muzimanye viswanu zinghani zizino,
nanye mumanyile vyono lono mwali si munapituka, mwali mutemigwe no kwajilizwa ne vihwani vye bwete.

Ninga alu mumanye vyono u munhu wo wose mono yakutongwa no Muhe wo Mulungu si kosuma kutya, “Yesu mulijitwe!” Na kanyhi nha vivyo, u munhu wo wose si kosuma kutya, “Yesu yo Muwaha,” hono yalece kutongwa no Muhe Mono Yelile.
Ne vipegwa vyo Muhe vili henji, ninga u Muhe mono yakuvilavya yumonga du.
No witumami nawo wuli henji, ninga u Muwaha munya kwitumamilwa yo yumonga du.
Kanyhi ko wuli no witumami nawo wuli henji, ninga u Mulungu yo monga du, mono yakulavya ivilungo vyo witume muli wose.
No munhu wo wose kapegwaga u wuzelu wo Muhe so cambuzi ca wose.
U Muhe kamupelaga yunji i nghani ye mahala, na yunji i nghani yo wusome, nha vyono yendile u Muhe yuyo du.
Kanyhi u Muhe yuyo alu, kamupelaga yunji wihuwilo, na yunji kamupelaga cipegwa co kuponya,

kamupelaga yunji cipegwa co kunoza mapoto, na yunji cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, na yunji cipegwa co wutanje we vipegwa vyono vikulawa mu Muhe na vyono si vyo Muhe, kamupelaga yunji cipegwa co kulonga milonjele ye cijenzi, na yunji kanyhi cipegwa co wulolose.
Zizo zose yo milimo yo Muhe yuyo du monga, mono kamupelaga munhu na cipegwa cakwe cono cisimajiye, nha vyono yendile mweneco.
Nha vyono winha u muwili monga, ninga wina wilunzwa vinji, ninga vikunoza muwili monga, ale nhavivyo vyo yinha kuli Kilisito.

Hambi ase hamba ciwe cili Wayahudi, hamba ciwe si cili Wayahudi, hamba ciwe cili wawanda, hamba ciwe si cili wawanda, wose cabaputizizwa mu Muhe monga du, mu muwili wuwo monga, kanyhi ase wose cikang'weswa yuyo Muhe monga.
U muwili si vyono wina cilunzwa cimonga du, langa wina vilunzwa vinji.
Hambi alu hono u mugulu wali wutye, “Vyono ane no mugulu, si nili muwoko, hodu ane si nili wo muwili,” wule, alu mbeka wali wuwe si cilunzwa co muwili? Hamba hadodo!
Na hono likutu nalyo lyali litye, “Vyono ane si nili liso, hodu ane si nili wo muwili yaye,” wule ku soko yo wulonje wuwo du, hodu likutu lyowa si cilunzwa co muwili? Aa ng'o!
Na hono lu u muwili wose wali wuwe liso, alu likutu lyali liwe hayi? Na hono u muwili wose wali wuwe likutu, alu u munhu yali yasume nhawule kuhemvya.
Ninga nha vyono yinha, u Mulungu yaviwika i vilunzwa vivyo mu muwili nha vyono yenda mweneco.
Na hono i vilunzwa vyose vyali viwe cilunzwa cimonga, alu u muwili ma ho wali wuwe hayi?
Hambi i mbeka nha yoyi, i vilunzwa vyo muwili vyo vinji, ninga muwili wo monga du.
Holeka liso si lyosuma kuwutya muwoko, “Agwe si nghukusaka,” hambo mutwe nawo si wosuma kugatya magulu, “Anye, si nghumusacenyi.”
Hamonga na zizo, yikwijela vyono vilunzwa vivilya vyo muwili vyono vijelaga nha visoceye, alu vivyo kumbe vyo vikusakwa muno muno.

Kanyhi ne vilunzwa vivilya vyono cikuvihwesa vyono vyo si vikusaka lilumbo, kumbe vyo cikuvikamisa ko wulanjilile wono wucizize muno, ne vilunzwa vyo muwili vyono vijelaga kotya nha si vikwendeza, alu vivyo vyo cikuvidima muno muno,
na hovili vilunzwa vinji vyono si vikusaka wulanjililwe. U Mulungu mweneco yawuwicila muwili wityatye wayo, no kucinoza cilunzwa cono cicepuciywe, ho ciwe ne lilumbo muno,
ho halece kuwa na matemanuko mu muwili, langa vilunzwa vyose ho visume kwiyitaza hamonga.
Na hono cilunzwa cimonga du, cituje wusungu, i vilunzwa vyose vikuwona wusungu hamonga du na hono cituje lilumbo, ne vilunzwa vinji vyose navyo vikusangalalana hamonga naco.
Holeka anye wose muli muwili wa Kilisito, nanye wose muli vilunzwa vyo muwili wuwo.

Nayo u Mulungu yawika mwi'kanisa, walongozi, watumwa, we kejete, wawizi, we kadatu, wejizi, hanyuma yayo, yakawa kuwawika walya wono wena vipegwa vyo kunoza mapoto, kuponya, kutaza, walongola, na wono wakulonga nonga njenzi.
Alu wose watumwa? Wose wawizi? Wose wejizi? Wose wena cipegwa co kunoza mapoto?
Hamba wose wena cipegwa co kuponya? Wose wena cipegwa co kulonga nonga njenzi? Hamba wose walolosa milonjele?
Holeka mweze kusaka kupegwa vipegwa viswanu muno. Alu nane nomulajilenyi i nzila swanu muno muno yono yicizize zinzila zizi zose.
Hamba nonje i milonjele ye wanhu hamba na ye Wamalayika, ninga hono niwe sina wendo, ane nowa nihwanile nhe lizozo du lye lidebe lyono lisina cinji, hamba lunji nha kotya cenjele.

Na kanyhi yisumice niwe ne cipegwa ciswanu co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, no kuzimanya ze cinyele zose, sunga no kusuma kuzimanya zose, kanyhi ndahile kuwa no wihuwilo wono wukwilaniciye, sunga sume kugahamya matunda, ninga hamba nha vivyo hono niwe sina wendo, ane si nili cinji yaye.
Na hono ndavye i sawo yangu yose no kuwapela waciwa, na hamba niwulavye muwili wangu wunyanywe mu moto, ninga hono niwe sina wendo, azo zose si zonghwila cinji yaye.
Wendo wukangalilaga, wutazaga wenji, wendo wusina wivu, hamba si wikumyaga yaye, hamba siwuwezaga no wiwoni.
Wendo wukuwa wina cogopo, kanyhi si wukuwa kwilondolela weneco cambuzi, kanyhi wendo si wukolwaga ne'kuwo mbela, hamba si wukumbucilaga zimbi, hamba si wuwalaga wubi wono wapuluta yaye,
kanyhi wendo si wukuwa kusecelela wubi ng'o, langa wusecelelaga i mbeka.
Wendo wihuwilaga zose, witumbilaga zose, kanyhi wukangalilaga zose.

Wendo si wudumaga hamba hadodo. Na hone hovili i vipegwa vyo kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, avyo langa mwizuwa linji vilawuka, na hone vipegwa vyo wulonga zinonga zinjenzi, avyo vyoloduma, na hone kowuli wusomi, nawo nha vivyo du wolopuluta.
Hambi nha vyono yinha u wumanye wetu si wukwilaniciye, sunga ne cipegwa cetu co wuganula nghani yo Mulungu naco si cikwilaniciye.
Ninga cilaza kuwa caza cono cikwilaniciye, vyose vyono si vikwilaniciye vyolowuka.

Ane lono nali nghali nili mwana mudodo nalongaga cidodododo, natangaga cidodododo, nehwesaga cidodododo. Ninga aluno vyono neza nili munhu mututu, hodu nakondya kuzileka i zinghani zose ze cidodododo.

Cono cikuciwona alu cinha futa du mwi'lole, ninga baho hanyuma langa, ho colowona viswanu ciwonelela. Aluno manyile hadodo vivi du, ninga baho hanyuma langa, ho nolomanyila zose lukulu, nha vyono u Mulungu nayo yamanyile ane.
Holeka zikusigala zizino zidatu, nha cinji, u Wihuwilo, u Witumbilo no wendo, ninga kanyhi yono yicizize muli zizino zose, wo wendo.
Ale muhidimbale kuwa no wendo. Muhidimbale kanyhi nhavivilya, ho muvituje vipegwa vinji vye cimuhe, ko muno cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu.
Nayo mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, yuyo si yakulonga ne wanhu, langa yakulonga no Mulungu, hambi nha hasina mono yakumuhulika. Mwene, kalongaga mu vilungo vyo Muhe, zinghani zono zihundicigwe.
Ninga ayulya mono yena cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, ayo langa kalongaga ne wanhu, ku soko yo kuwazenga, no kuwatuza mitima yawo, kanyhi no kuwasikamya.
Mono yakulonga mu nonga njenzi, ayo yakwiyizenga mweneco du. Ninga mono yena cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, yuyo yakulizenga likanisa.

Heya, ane nali nyende anye wose mulonje mu milonjele mijenzi, ninga hamba nhavivyo, nali nyende ko muno muweze ne cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, hambi u munhu mono yena cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, yuyo nha yo muswanu muno, kuciza ayulya mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, mba langa, sunga hawe ho yuli yunji mono kosuma kuzilolosa zizo zono yakuzilonga, i likanisa nalyo ho lizengwe.

Alu mwene anye wandugu zangu, hono nimuzizenyi no kulongana nanye mu milonjele mijenzi, alu ho mowa na cambuzici? Si yomupelenyi cambuzi co cose, langa mba, hono nimulolosezenyi zo wugubule wo Mulungu, hamba zo wizuce wunji wo wose, hamba za muli nghani yo Mulungu, hamba za muli mejizo go wutunga.

Nha vyo yinha nhavivyo na kuli i vinhu vyono visina wumi, vyono navyo vilavyaga mazi gavyo, nha vyono kotya, filimbi, hamba cinanda. Alu munhu kosuma nhawule kulumanya u lwimbo lono lukwimbwa, hono i vinhu vivyo, si vikusuma kulavya mazi gavyo mu milizo yayo lono vikutowa?
Hamba ne ndulele yono yilalikaga wanhu ho wabite ku wulugu, hono yilile ko mulilo wono si wukutanjika, alu nani 'mbi, mono kosuma kwiwikaniza ho yabite?
Holeka vyo yinha sunga na kuli nyenye, vyono hono u lulimi lwenyu si lukusuma kulonga cinhu cono cikutanjika, alu nani 'mbi mono kosuma kuzimanya zono mukulonga? Zinghani zenyu zokwajilila caka du.
Mono yinze, moyili milonjele minji muno muno, ninga hamba nhavivyo, hasina hamba nonga monga yono yisina nhunizo.
Alu ninga, ane hono niwe si nghuyimanya nhunizo ye nonga yono yunji yakuyilonga, kuli munhu yuyo, ane naweza mujenzi kuli mwene, sunga no mwene nayo nhavivyo yaweza mujenzi kulu bavu lwangu.
Holeka vyo yinha sunga na kuli'nye, holeka vyono mwina wuhile wo kuvituga vipegwa vyo Muhe, holeka muhidimbale ko muno, ho muvituje avilya vyono vyosuma kulizenga likanisa.
Holeka mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, yimunojeye yalombe, ho yasume kuyilolosa.
Ku soko hono niwe kulombela mu milonjele mijenzi, i nhumbula yangu du yo yikulomba, ninga i mahala gangu gakuwa gali bwete.
Alu ho noze nhawule lu? Ale, nolombela mu muhe wangu kanyhi nolombela na mu mahala gangu, nokwimbila mu muhe wangu, na kanyhi nokwimbila sunga na mu mahala gangu nha vivyo.

Na hono wumukumizye u Mulungu mu muhe wako du, alu u munhu mono si yayimanyile nonga yiyo baho mu wihangulize wenyu, ho kosuma nhawule kuvumiza u wulombe wako wo wulumbe, no kutya, “Heya” hono si yakucimanya cono wukulonga?
Na lunji u wulombe wako wo wulumbe, wudahile kuwa mbeka wuswanu, ninga yuyo yunji hamba si yomutaza cinji yaye.
Ane nghumulumba u Mulungu vyono nghusuma kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi kuciza nyenye wose.
Ninga mu wihangulize we Wakilisito, ane nyendile kulonga nawo mu nghani yihano zono zikutanjika ho niwejize na wanji, si nho kulonga makani elufu mu milonjele mijenzi.
Nye wandugu zangu, mulece kuwa nhe wana wadodo mu mahala genyu. Kuli zo wavu, muweze nhe wana wagalika, ninga mu wihwese wenyu, yinojeye muwe nhe wanhu wono wakangaye.

Hambi nha yandicigwe mu Wulajilize vyono, “U Muwaha yakutya nhavi, ‘Mu nzila ya mono yakulonga mu milonjele mijenzi na kwe milomo ye wajenzi, ane nolongana ne wanhu wawa, hamba nhavivyo, siwohuliciza yaye.’ ”

Ale, holeka, i cipegwa co kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, co citanjilo du, ninga si kuli wanhu wono wena u wihuwilo, langa so kuli awalya wono wakali nehuwila, ninga cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, cili so wanhu wono wakondya kwihuwila hamba si so kuli awalya wono wakali nehuwila.

Holeka i likanisa lyose kolo lyeza kuwa lyehanguliza hamonga, hanyuma ho wose wamule kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi, na kanyhi hono yenjile u munhu mono si yayimanyile nonga yiyo, hamba mono yakali si nehuwila, wulenyi, si womulonjenyi watye vyono anye mwina lukwale lu?

Ninga hono wose wawe wakuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, na hono yenjile u munhu mono si yayimanyile nonga yiyo, hamba mono yakali si nehuwila zose zono kozihulika, zomulajila u wubi wakwe mweneco, na zose zono kozihulika baho, mbeka zomuling'aniza.
Na ze cinyele zono zili mu nhumbula yakwe zogubulwa, nayo kufugama no kumuhemba u Mulungu, akuno yakutya, “Mbeka, u Mulungu yali hamonga nanye.”

Nye wandugu zangu, alu cilonje ciwe kutya nhawule? Ninga kolo mwehanguliza hamonga, yunji yembe lwimbo, na yunji yejize, na yunji yaweze no wugubulilwe wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu, yunji nayo yetumamilaje cipegwa co kulonga mu milonjele mijenzi na yunji yalolose zono zikulongwa. Na zose zitumwe ku soko yo kulizenga likanisa.

Hono wawe wali baho wanhu wono wena cipegwa co kulonga milonjele mijenzi, ale, wadahile kulonga, wejete hamba wadatu, ninga walece kuciziliza liwalo lilyo, hamba nhavivyo, yiwanojeye wawe kulonga wakwiwalila monga monga, na kanyhi heze hoyuli munhu mono kosuma kuzilolosa zono zikulongwa.

Ninga hono hawe hasina u munhu mono kosuma kuzilolosa, hodu du, na yuyo mono yo yali yalonje mu milonjele i mijenzi, hodu yanojeye yanyamale yalece kulonga cinji kanyhi mu wihangulize wenyu, langa yalonje ne nhumbula yakwe yali wene, hamonga no Mulungu.
Kuli za walya wono wakuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, nawo wadahile kulonga wejete hamba wadatu du, na wayawo wanji, wawe kuzipima zinghani zawo.
Ninga yunji lono yakali yali mu wulonje, hanyuma ho yejele yunji muli wono wakuhuliciza, nayo yawe yatuga u wugubulilwe kulawa kuli Mulugu, hodu ayulya mono yakulonga yanyamale.
Hambi wose nha mudahile kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu akuno mukwiwalila, ho wose musume kwiyijiza no kusikamywa.
I cipegwa co kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, cinojeye ciwe citemigwe na munhu yuyo mono yapejigwe kanyhi munya cipegwa cico.
Hambi u Mulungu wetu, nha si Mulungu we mazozo, langa yo Mulungu wo mulamu.

Nha vyono winho moto wa mu makanisa gose ge wanhu wo Mulungu, yiwanojeye wacekulu, weze kwikala wanyamaye lono wali mu wihangulize we Wakilisito. Si wakukombolwa kulonga yaye, langa weze wena cihuliko nha vyono wukutya Wulajilize.
Hono wawe wena zinji zo kuwuza, ale, wawawuzaje i walume zawo ku zikaya zawo, hambi nha nghani ya cevu kuli mucekulu kulonga mu wihangulize we wakilisito.
Alu mukwihwesa lo, inghani yo Mulungu yalawa kwenyu nyenye, hamba lunji yikamuzizenyi nyenye muli wene du?

Hono hawe hoyuli u munhu wo wose mono yakwiwona vyono mwene yo mutumwa wo Mulungu, hamba lunji yena cipegwa co Muhe, ale yamanye vyono, zizino zono ane nghumwandicilenyi anye, lye 'lajilizo lyo Muwaha.
Ninga hono yunji si yakuzimanya zizo, hodu, nanye mulece kumutyatilila u munhu yuyo.
Holeka anye wandugu zangu, yinojeye kuli'nye muwe no wuhile wo kuyiganula nghani yo Mulungu, ninga hamba nhavivyo, mulece kumulemeza yunji ku wulonje milonjele mijenzi.
Ninga du soko zose zitumilwe mu cogopo na mu wulunji.
Alu wandugu zangu ane nyendile nimukumbucizenyi du, za kuli u Luganuzi Luswanu lono namuganulilenyi, nanye mukalubocela, kanyhi mwimile mukamile muli lulo.
Na vyono na mu nzila ya lulo Luganuzi Luswanu, mo mukuponyezwa, hono muzibate zinghani zono namuganulilenyi, na kanyhi hono yiwe si mwehuwila bwete.
Nane nghamupelenyi anye zinghani zi mbaha muno muno, zono nazibocela nene no mweneco, nha vyono, Kilisito yafwa so wubi wetu, nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko Gono Gelile,
na vyono yakazikwa, na kanyhi na vyono yakazuka mwizuwa lye kadatu, nha vyono yandikwa,
na vyono kanyhi yejela kuli Kefa, na hanyuma yayo yakejela kuli awalya we likumi na wejete.
Na hanyuma yakejela lwa kamonga kuli awalya we zindugu wono wali wacizize liwalo lya wanhu magana mahano, ne wanji wenji wa muli wawo, wakali womi, ninga wanji wayawo wakondya kufwa.
Na hanyuma yayo yakejela kuli Yakobo, na hanyuma yakejela kuli watumwa wose.
Ne ndumilizo ya wose, ho yakejela sunga na kuli'ne, ane mono ninha u munhu mono yalelwa lono cipango co kulelelwa cali cikali.
Hambi ane nha nili mudodo muno muno muli watumwa wose, mono singhwiliye hamba kucemwa mutumwa, ku soko vyono naligaza muno i likanisa lyo Mulungu.

Ninga ku so lihewa lyakwe Mulungu, naweza nha vyono ninha lulu, ne lihewa lyakwe si lyali lya bwete. Nane netuma u mulimo si nha wose, kanyhi hamba si nene yaye, langa lihewa lyo Mulungu lyono likwitumana hamonga na nene.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo, hono yiwe weneco wo wakuganula, hamba nene mono nghuganula, si nghani yaye, hambi nha co cico cono ciganulaga, na co cico cono mwihuwiye.
Ninga nha vyono yikuganulwa, vyono Kilisito yazukulwa ku wulawa mu wafu, alu wanji wa muli nyenye, wosuma kutya nhawule vyono ati hasina wuzuce we wafu?
Holeka hono hawe hasina u wuzuce we wafu, ale, na Kilisito nayo si yazuka,
na hono Kilisito yawe si yazuka, hodu kumbe no wuganule wetu wa bwete, sunga no wihuwilo wenyu wa bwete.

Hamonga na zizo zose, ase cali ciwe cili wahomelezi wo wulambi hali Mulungu, hambi nha calonga cikatya vyono u Mulungu yamuzukula Kilisito muli wafu, kumbe mwene ho si yamuzukula yaye, hono yiwe i wafu mbeka si wazukulwaga.
Na hono yiwe yili mbeka i wafu si wazukulwaga, ale, na Kilisito nayo si yazuka yaye.
Na hono yiwe Kilisito si yazukulwa, ale, no wihuwilo wenyu weza nghani ya bwete, vyo mukali du mu wubi wenyu.
Hamonga na zizo na wawalya wono wafwa akuno ho vilunzize na Kilisito kumbe nawo wajilila.
Holeka u witumbilo wetu muli Kilisito, hono wuwe wuli so mikalile yiyi du ya lulu, ale baho, ase cowa cili wanhu mono cinojeye cikalalilwe muno si nhe wanji wose wa mono yinze yiyi.
Ninga i mbeka yoyi, vyono Kilisito yakondya kuzukulwa muli wafu, na yo yikulajila vyono, wawalya wono wagonile mu wufwe, wolozukulwa.
Nha vyono u wufwe waletwa mononze na munhu monga, ale, nhavivyo no wuzuce wa muli wafu, waletwa na munhu monga.
Nha vyono wanhu wose wafwizaga so wilunza na Adamu, yo nhavivyo kanyhi, wose wolozukulwa so wilunza na Kilisito.
Ninga munhu na hakwe mweneco nha vyono yawajigwe, na Kilisito, yo mulongozi muli wose, hanyuma ho awalya i wakwe Kilisito kolo yeza kuza.
Na hanyuma ya zizi, u mudumo ho wolokuza, mwidaha lono Kilisito komupelela u wutemi u Sogwe Mulungu, lono kowa yakondya kuwusiza lukulu, u wutemi wose, no wuwaha wose, sunga ne vilungo vyayo.
Hambi Kilisito nha si koleka kutema, sunga u Mulungu kolo yakondya kuwasuma i walugu wakwe, no kuwawika hasi ye magulu gakwe.
No mulugu we ndumilizo mono kolokongomezwa, lyo lifwa.

Hambi imandiko nha gakutya, “U Mulungu koviwika i vinhu vyose hasi ye magulu gakwe.” Ninga, Mandiko lono gakutya, “Vinhu vyose vyolowikwa hasi ye magulu gakwe ho yaviteme, yili calinze vyono u Mulungu si kosuma kwinjila mwipuga lilyo lye vinhu, vyono u mwene yo yakuviwika vinhu vivyo hasi ya Kilisito.”

Ninga i vinhu vyose, lono viwe vyakondya kuwikwa hasi yo wutemi wa Kilisito, baho nayo u Mwana, ho kosuma kwiwika hasi yo Mulungu, mono yaviwika vyose hasi yo wutemi wakwe, u Mulungu ho yateme muli vyose.
Alu hono hawe hasina wuzuce, i wanhu wawalya wono wabaputizwaga ku soko ye wafu, alu wetumbiye kutuga cici? Hono wafu wawe si wazukulwaga, so cici lu yunji yabaputizwe ku soko yawo.
Hamba nase ma, so cici lo cikwitajila mu mbali mu madaha gose?
Nye wandugu zangu, ane no muyenyu cidomile ne lifwa nhondo zose! U lukumyo lono nina nalo ku soko yo wilunza wenyu na Kilisito Yesu u Muwaha wetu, yiyo yo yikuleka nghuyanza nghani yiyi.

Na hono u wuhile wangu wali wuwe we cimunhu-munhu du, alu u wihome wangu wo kwihoma ne malimu makali baha ha Efeso, kwali kunghwile cici? Hono wafu siwazukaga, ale, “Cilye no kung'wa du, hambi i mitondo nha cofwa.”
Nye, mbeka mulece kukongwa bwete! U wiyendi wono si wuswanu, mbeka wuhodangaga i mikalile miswanu.

Ale, mwinukaje! Mwamulaje kanyhi kwikala mu mikalile miswanu, mulece kwituma wubi. Hambi wanji wa muli nyenye nha si wamumanyiye lukulu u Mulungu. Nane nghumulonjelenyi mbeka, vyono co cevu ciwaha kuli'nye!
Ninga u munhu kosuma kuwuza yatye, “Mwene i wafu wolozukulwa nhawule? Kanyhi wowa wena muwili we liwalaci walazakuwa wazuka kanyhi?”
Ago mawuzo ga wulele! Hono wuhadice mbeyu, nayo hono yilece kwamula kufwa, hamba si yocindika.
Ninga cono kuhadikaga 'gwe, si kuhadikaga u muwili wono wowa hanyuma, langa agwe kuhadikaga i mbeyu du, lunji ya wuhemba, hamba mbeyu ye liwala linji.
Ninga Mulungu kayipelaga yiyo yi mbeyu, u muwili wono yakwenda mweneco, ne mbeyu yo yose, yitugaga u muwili wayo yili wene wono wisimajiye ne mbeyu yinji.
Ne miwili ye viwumbwa vyose si yili sawa sawa yose. I miwili ye wanhu, yose yihwanile, nayo ye vilimu yisimile, na ye zindeje nayo yisimile, sunga ne miwili ye zisomba nayo nhavivilya yisimile.
Koyili i miwili ya ku wulanga, na kanyhi koyili ne miwili ya mono'nze, u wuswanu we miwili ya ku wulanga wisimajiye, no wuswanu we miwili ya mono'nze, nawo wisimajiye.
Howuli u wuswanu we lizuwa, na wo mwezi, na we zinyelezi, sunga ne zinyelezi nazo ziwezaga zisimajiye mu wuswanu wazo.
Ale no wuzuce we wafu vyo winha nhavivyo. Nha vyono yinha mbeyu, u muwili wukuwa kuzikwa mu kabuli, wukuzicilwa mu wuhodanjice, ninga wuzukulilwaga mu wusakalakale.
Wukuwa kuzicilwa mu wuwe we cevu, ninga wukuzukulilwa mu wuwe wo lukumyo, wuzicilwaga mu wuwe wo wusocele, ninga wukuwa kuzukulilwa mu wuwe we vilungo.
Nawo lono wukuzikwa, wuwezaga muwili wa mono'nze yiyi du, ninga lono wukuzukulwa wukuwa muwili we cimuhe. Kowuli muwili wa mono'nze, na kolowa no muwili we cimuhe.
Hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Umunhu mulongozi Adamu yali ciwumbwa cono cina nhumbula nyumi.” Ninga Adamu we ndumilizo, Muhe wono wuwumifyaga.
Ninga u muwili we cimuhe wo si wulongoleye kuwa, langa u muwili we yinze yiyi, wo wulongoleye, hanyuma yayo, ho muwili we cimuhe.
Nayo Adamu u mulongozi, nha yawumbwa ko muhangha, holeka u mwene wa muhangha, ninga u munhu we kejete, ayo yalawa ku wulanga.
Holeka i wanhu wose vyono walawa mu muhangha, ale, wehwanile nha vyono yenha yuyo mono yawumbwa ko muhangha, awalya wa ku wulanga nawo, wehwanile nha vyono yenha yulya mono yalawa ku wulanga.
Alu nase, nha vyono cihwanile na ayulya mono yawumbwa ko muhangha, ale vyo nhavivyo kanyhi, vyo cokwihwana na yuyo mono yalawa ku wulanga.
Holeka wandugu zangu, nghutya nhavi, acilya cono canozwa ko muwili ne sakami, si cosuma kwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu, naco cono cihodanjikaga, hamba si cosuma kuwa no wuwe wono si wuhodanjikaga.
Ale, muhulicize ta, nimulonjelenyi nghani ye cinyele, yili nhavi, ase hamba si cilafwa wose, langa wose colohunduswa,
kwa nhinicizo, lwa kamonga, mu cipango ce ndulele ye ndumilizo. Hambi yindulele nha yololila, ne wafu wolozukulilwa mu wuwe wono si wolofwa kanyhi, baho nase ho colohundusiswa.
Hambi nha yinojeye cono cihodanjikaga, civwale u wuwe wono si wuhodanjikaga, no muwili wuwuno wono wukusuma kufwa, wuvwale u wuwe wono si wufwizaga kanyhi.

Holeka u muwili wuwuno wono wuhodanjikaga, wula weza kuwa wavwala u wuwe wono si wuhodanjikaga, naco cono cifwizaga, cila ceza kuwa cavwala u wuwe wono si wufwizaga, ale baho nhondo, ho yoloficilila i nghani yono yandikwa, yono yikutya, “U wufwe wawusizwa lukulu, ne cisumisumi cakondya lu kukwilanicila!”
“Alu gwe go wufwe, i cisumisumi cako cili hayi? I vilungo vyako vyo wusungu, vili hayi?”
U wufwe wutugaga wusungu wayo ku wulawa mu wubi, nawo u wubi wutugaga i vilungo vyayo ku wulawa mu wulajilize.
Ninga yicinojeye cimulumbe Mulungu mono kacipelaga u wusume, mu nzila yo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.

Holeka wandugu zangu wendece, mwime mukamile. Kanyhi mujendelele kuwituma u mulimo wo Muwaha kwe vilungo, nhondo zose, akuno mukumanya, u mulimo wuwo wo kumwitumamila u Muwaha wono mukwituma, vyono si wolokwajilila bwete.
Alu, kuli zo wuhangulize we vinhu ku soko ye wanhu wo Mulungu, munoze nha vyono nawalajiliza we makanisa ga ku Galatiya.

Wose muli nyenye, mu vilo vyose vye jumapili, mweze kuwika siya zipesa, nha vyono yinha, munhu ha nghango ya vyono katugaga, ho halece kuwa na soko kanyhi yo kuwa no wuhangulize wunji wo wose kolo nghuza.
Nane kolo nghuza kwenyu, nowatuma wanji wa muli nyenye, wono mowahagula nyenye, ho wategule i baluwa, hamonga ne vipegwa vyenyu vye lihewa ku Yelusalemi.
Na hono nane yiwe yinojeye mbite, ale cobitana nawo.
Nolokuza u kwenyu kolo nakondya kukolela Makedoniya, hambi nha nina wuhile wo kukolela kuko Makedoniya.
Lunji nolokwikalakala kuko kwenyu hadodo, hamba lunji nosuma kwikalana nanye mwipango lyose lye cinyuli, ho musume kunhaza njendelele no muhinzo wangu ko kose kono nobita.
Sinyendile ho nghole kuko kwenyu musunho musunho du, lono nghujendelela no muhinzo wangu. Ninga nitumbiye kwikalana nanye kwa cidaha, hono u Muwaha yende.
Ninga nowa nili baha hono Efeso sunga mwizuwa lye Pentekote.
Hambi nha ndiguliywe mulango mugazi muno muno ku soko yo mulimo wangu muwaha wono wuli baha, hamba hawe howali na wenji wono wakumhinga mhinga.
Na kolo Timoteyo yakuza kwenyu, ale mulanjilile, yalece kuwa na woga woga wo wose mwipango lono yali hamonga nanye, hambi u mwene nha yakwituma u mulimo wo Muwaha nha nene.

Holeka munhu wo wose yalece kumubedegala, langa mumutazaje ho yawe no mulamu mu wujendelela no muhinzo wakwe, ho yasume kuza kwangu kanyhi, hambi ane no mweneco, nha nimulanjiliye muno muno, hamonga ne wandugu zetu.
Kuli ze ndugu yetu Apolo, ane nimunena muno muno ho yaze kwenyu, hamonga na we zindugu wanji, ninga mwene si yakuhila kuza kuko lulu, langa kolokuza du kolo yikusumika.
Ale, mwikalaje meso, kanyhi mwimaje mukamile mu wihuwilo, akuno musina woga, kanyhi mweze muli vilungo.
Na zo zose zono mowa kunoza, muzinozezaje mu wendo.

Nye wandugu zangu, si kotya muyimanyile i mhuga ya Sitefano vyono i wene, wo wanhu walongozi muno muno wo kuwubocela u wihuwilo we Cikilisito mu Akaya, na vyono welavizye ho wawetumamile i wanhu wo Mulungu. Nane nghumunenenyi anye nyo wandugu zangu,
muwegaje i wanhu wono wenha wawo mu wutonji wawo, kanyhi no wutonji wo munhu wo wose mono vikwitumana nawo.
Nane nghusangalala muno muno so wuze wa Sitefano, Fotunata na Akayiko ku soko wakondya kuhomela uwanjile wono cali cina nawo lono anye muli hasina.
Hambi nha wayisangalaza nhumbula yangu, nha vyono wazisangalaza zinhumbula zenyu. Holeka yinojeye muwalumbe wanhu wawa.
I makanisa gose ga ku Asiya gakumulamusenyi. Nayo Akula na Pilisika, hamonga ne wanhu wose wo Mulungu, wono wali mu kaya yawo, wakumulamusizenyi mu Cikilisito.
We zindugu wose wakumulamusenyi. Nanye wose mwilamusizaje mu wendo wo Mulungu.
Nane Pawulo nghumulamusenyi muno muno, no wandice wo muwoko wangu nene no mweneco.
U munhu wo wose mono siyamwendile Muwaha, yaweze mulijitwe. Go Muwaha wuze!
Ilihewa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, liwezane nanye.
No wendo wangu wuweze hamonga nanye, mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.

Kulawa kuli nene Pawulo, no mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu, so wuhile wo Mulungu, no ndugu yetu Timoteyo. Cikumwandicilenyi anye mono muli we likanisa lyo Mulungu, lyono lili kuko ku Kolinto, hamonga ne wanhu wose wo Mulungu we hanhu hose mu Akaya.
Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu, na kuli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, viweze muli nyenye.
Yalumbwe u Mulungu u Sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, Baba mono yena lusungu, kanyhi yo Mulungu mono kaletaga u wutuzwe wose.
Mwene yo kacitazaga ase mu wugazice wetu wose, nase ho cisume kuwatuza wanji mu wugazice wose, mu nzila yo wutuzwe wuwo wono cikulubocela kulawa kuli Mulungu.
Heya, mu nghango ye magayo ga Kilisito vyono gakucila muli'se, ale, mu nghango yiyo nase mo cikucilila kusindamikwa nayo.

Holeka hono ciwe cikutuga wugazice, cikugazika ku soko yo wusindamikwe ne mhonelo yenyu. Na kanyhi lono cikusindamikwa, cikusindamikwa ho nanye mutuje wusindamikwe, ne vilungo vyo wukangalila magazo gaga, gono sunga na sese cikagakangalila.
Holeka uwitumbilo wetu wa muli'nye, wusikame muno muno, kanyhi cimanyile vyono, hono muhanje nase i magazo getu, vyo mohanga no wusindamice wetu nhavivyo.
Nye nyo wandugu zetu, ase cikusaka kumumanyizenyi, ze magazo gono gacagana ku yisi ya Asiya, i magayo gago gali mawaha muno, sunga gakaciwusiza no witumbilo wose wo kwikala cili womi.
Heya, cikawa nha wanhu mono ciwiciywe kuwulagwa. Ninga zizi zose, zejela ho cisume kwiyijiza vyono yicinojeye cilece kwiyitumbila co weneco, langa cimwitumbile Mulungu, mono kawazukulaga i wafu.
U Mwene yaciponya mu mbali mbaha ye lifwa, kanyhi yakali yakujendelela kuciponya, nase cimuwiciye u witumbilo wetu du, nha vyono kajendelelaga kanyhi kuciponya,
nha vyono mukucitaza so wulombe wenyu. Holeka u wulombe wenyu wono mukucilombela muno, wopitulwa, no Mulungu kocilugutiza, na wanhu wenji wokwinula i mazi gawo, wawe kumulumbo Mulungu ku soko yetu.

Ase cikwilumbila cinhu cimonga du, vyono viselinji vyetu vikucihomelela vyono, mu wikale wetu wa mono yinze yiyino na ko muno muli'nye, cekala ko winenenyhezi wose hamonga no wele wa mu nhumbula, wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu, hamba si catongwa ne lihala lye cimunhu-munhu, langa catongwa ne lihewa lyo Mulungu.
Holeka cikumwandicilenyi nanye izinghani zono mosuma kuzisoma no kuzizuka.

Ninga hamba yiwe aluno mukucizuka hadodo du, nitumbiye vyono hanyuma mocizucila lukulu, Mwizuwa alilya lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu, ho muze musume kwilumbila muli sese, nha vyono nase colokwilumbila muli nyenye.
Holeka ku so witumbilo wuwo, nahilaga kwamula kuza kwenyu ho mutuje lihewa lye kejete.
Nahilaga ngholele kwenyu lono nghubita ku Makedoniya, na lono nghuwuya nhavivyo, ho nhuje u wutazi wenyu so muhinzo wangu wo kubita ku Wuyahudi.
Wulenyi! Mukwihwesa lono nahimaga zizo, nahimaga nha munhu mono yasina wusimyo? Mukwihwesa ane nghunozeza u wulamuzi wangu mu mahweso ge cimunhumunhu nha cinji nghutya “Heya” ne “Ng'o” ho baho hose?
Ninga u Mulungu yo we mbeka yose, holeka azilya zono camulonjelenyi anye, si zali nghani za “Heya” ne “Ng'o.”
Vyono Kilisito Yesu, u Mwana wo Mulungu, mono ane na Silivano na Timoteyo camuganulilenyi anye, si yali munhu wa “Heya” na “Ng'o,” langa u mwene yo “Heya” yo Mulungu nhondo zose.
Ku soko vyono muli mwene u wihuwizo wose wo Mulungu waweza “Heya.” Holeka ku soko yiyo, i “Heya” yetu yikuwa kulongwa mu nzila ya Kilisito, ku soko yo kumukumyo Mulungu.
U Mulungu mweneco yo kacisikamyaga ase hamonga na nyenye mu wilunza na Kilisito, kanyhi yo kacisiwanulaga,
kanyhi yo yaciwicila mutozo wo kuwela cili sawo yakwe mweneco, kanyhi yakacipela no Muhe Mono Yelile mu zinhumbula zetu, ho ciwe co cipingo ca zose zono yaciwiciye.
No Mulungu yo muhomelezi wangu, mwene yo yayimanyile i nhumbula yangu! Ane, sinawuyajila kanyhi kuza ku Kolinto, ku soko du yo kumuwonelenyi lusungu.
Ase si cikusaka cimutemenyi mu wihuwilo wenyu, anye mono mwakondya kuwa mukamile mu wihuwilo wenyu. Langa yicinojeye, ciwitume u mulimo hamonga nanye, ku soko ye nyemo yenyu.
Holeka ndumula nghani mu nhumbula yangu vyono, ndece kumuzizenyi kanyhi no kumukalazenyi.
Hambi hono nimukalazenyi anye, alu nani kanyhi mono konhuza? Hono si wawalya du wono nawakalaza!

Holeka namwandicilenyi vyono, si nasaka kumuzizenyi ho nghalazwe nanye, anye mono munojeye muwe yo nyemo yangu. Nane manyiye lukulu nha vyono, hono ane niwe nina nyemo, nanye wose mukuwa mwina nyemo nhavivilya.

Hambi ha lulongozi, nha namwandicilenyi hamonga no wukalale wuwaha ne mahozi, hamonga no wusungu mu nhumbula, ninga si namwandicilenyi ho nimukalazenyi, aa, ng'o, langa nasakaga ho nimulajilenyi nha vyono ane nimwendilenyi muno muno.
Holeka hono hawe hoyuli yunji mono yamukalaze muyagwe yunji, ale, si vyono kanghalaza nene, langa kamukalazenyi anye wose. Nane si nghusaka nijele niwe mukali muno muno muli mwene.
U wulipicizwe wono yakondya kuwutuga kulawa kuli wenji wa muli nyenye, hodu womukwila wuwo du.
Alu yono yisigaye ku lubavu lwenyu, yinojeye anye mumunenele munhu yuyo, kanyhi mumusindamice, ho yalece kucila muno kuwa no wukalale no kutukuwika mutima wakwe.
Holeka nghumunenenyi, anye mwilajilaje kuli mwene vyono mumwendile.
Na cono caleka nghandika baluwa yiyilya, nasakaga ho manye hono mweza muli cihuliko muli zose.
Hono mumunenele munhu cinji, ale, nane nghumunenela nhavivyo u munhu yuyo. Hambi ane hono nghulavya wunenezi, hono mbeka cili baho cinhu co kunenela, ale, nghunenela ku soko yenyu hali Kilisito,
ho cilece kumupela Setani cilejeho co kucikonjela, hambi u wuhile wakwe nha ciwumanyile vyono winha.
Lono nali neza kufika ku Tulowa kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito, nghagana u mulango wuli mwazi ku soko yo mulimo wo Muwaha.
Ninga si nasuma kutula mu mutima wangu, vyono si namwagana u ndugu yetu Tito. Na yo soko yono yikaleka nghamwilajenyi wose bahalya no kubita Makedoniya.
Ninga u Mulungu yalumbwe, mono yakucitonga nhondo zose mu wilunza na Kilisito. U mwene yakucipela wusume wo kutandaza i mbeka ya Kilisito, kotya nha mhunjile swanu muno hanhu hose.
Hambi ase nha cinha mhunjile swanu yono Kilisito yakumulavizyo Mulungu, i mhunjile swanu yono yikuwaficila wanhu wose wono wakupona, na wono wakwajilila.

Kuli'walya wono wakwajilila, i mhunjile yiyo yikuwa nha munungho mubi kuli wene, yikuleta 'fwa, ninga kuli'walya wono wakuponywa, i mhunjile yiyo, yikuwa mhunjile swanu kuli wene yono yikuleta wumi. Alu nani 'mbi mono kosuma kuwituma u mulimo we liwala lilyo?

Ase si cinha wanji wono wayinozezaga nghani yo Mulungu wusuluza. Ninga ase cikuyiganula inghani yo Mulungu kwe nhumbula nzelu hali Mulungu, mono cakondya kwilunza na Kilisito, kanyhi nhe wanhu wono watumigwe no Mulungu.
Alo yiyi yikulajila nha vyono cikwamula kanyhi kwiyilumba co weneco? Hamba cikusaka baluwa zo wulumbwe wetu zizo kwenyu hamba zilawe kwenyu, nhe wanji?
Ninga anye nyo weneco yo nyenye mono muli baluwa yetu, kanyhi yo baluwa yono nyandikwe mu zinhumbula zetu, ho munhu wo wose yasume kuyiwona no kuyisoma.

Kanyhi yili calinze, nha vyono anye muli baluwa ya Kilisito yono yaletwa ne miwoko yetu. Ne baluwa yeneco siyandikwe ko wino, aa ng'o, langa nyandikwe ko Muhe wo Mulungu mumi, hamba si nyandikwe mu cibanhi ce'bwe, langa nyandikwe mu zinhumbula ze wanhu.
Nase cikulonga zizino ku soko yo witumbilo wetu wono cina nawo kuli Mulungu mu nzila ya Kilisito.
Ninga si vyono ase cosuma kwitumila nghani yinji yo yose mu vilungo vyetu co weneco, langa u wusume wetu wose, wulawaga kuli Mulungu,

hambi nha yo mweneco du mono yacipela u wusume wo kuwela i wetumami we cilagane Cipya, cono si cilagane co wulajilize wono mwandikwe, langa Cilagane co Muhe. Hambi u wulajilize wono mwandikwe, nha wuletaga yifwa, ningo Muhe, wuwumifyaga.

U Wulajilize waziza mu mandiko gono gali mandice mu vibanhi vye mabwe. Hamba yiwe u mudumo wayo waweza yifwa, u lukumyo lo Mulungu lukawa lucilile muno muno, sunga ne wanhu wa Isilayeli hamba siwasuma kwidoma no kuwulanga wusu wa Musa ku soko yo wung'alale wayo. Na kumbe u wung'ale wuwo, wali wa cipango cidodo du. Holeka u witumami wa cico cono caleta lifwa, kumbe ciketumilwa mu lukumyo luwaha nhavivyo,
ale, uwitumami wo Muhe, wo wina ulukumyo lono lucilile muno muno.

Holeka hono hawe hali howuli lukumyo mu witumami wuwo wono waleta i ning'aniza, ale, yili calinze muno, vyono u witumami wulya wono wukuleta u wuvumilwe hali Mulungu, wowa no lukumyo lono lucilile muno muno.
Holeka alu, ulukumyo lono lucilile muno muno, lwakondya kusola cilejeho co lukumyo alulya lono lwaza baho ha lulongozi, wono wilumbi wayo luno, wakondya kupuluta.
Holeka hono ci cilya cono cali ca cipango cidodo du, cali cino lukumyo lwayo, acilya cono cikalaga cibitilila, cowa cina lulumyo lono lucilile muno muno.
Vyono wo wuwu wo witumbilo wetu, holeka ase cikulonga cisina woga hamba hadodo.
Kanyhi ase, si cikwituma nha kotya Musa mono yakawa yimunojeye yawufunicize ne citambala wusu wakwe, wanhu wa Isilayeli ho walece kuwuwona u wung'alale wuwulya wono wali weza kufwililicila.

Ninga i mahala gawo gakamufywa. Sunga na lulu, lono cikusomwa i citabu ce Cilagane Cigwana, i cicitizo cico nha cikali cili baho du. Ne cicitizo cico cosuma kuwuswa du, lono munhu yakondya kwilunza na Kilisito.
Heya, sunga ne zuwalili du baha, ho hose lono wukusomwa Wulajilize wa Musa, mahala gawo gawezaga magubice.
Ninga i cicitizo cico cosuma kuwuswa, nha vyono gakutya i mandiko kuli za Musa, “Yali yeza kumupitucila Muwaha, ne cicitizo cakwe cikawa kuwuswa.”
Na ahano hono yikutya “U Muwaha,” nha cinji wo wutya, “U Muhe,” na ho hose hono ho yuli u Muhe wo Muwaha, baho ho ho wuli no welecele.

Holeka ase wose mono si cifunicize wusu wetu, cikululajila lukumyo lo Muwaha kotya nha mwi'lole, no lukumyo lulo nalo lono lukulawa kuli Muwaha, mono wo Muhe, wucikawanizaga ho cihwane muno muno ne cihwani cakwe, ku so lukumyo lono lucilile.
Holeka, u Mulungu ku soko yo lusungu lwakwe luwaha, yacipela u mulimo wuwuno ho ciwitume, holeka nase si cikutukuwika mitima.

Nase cakondya kuzilecela lukulu i zinghani zose ze cevu, na ze cinyele. Hamba si cili mu mikalile kanyhi yo wukonji, hamba kuyipitulasa nghani yo Mulungu, langa cikuyilajila i mbeka mu witume mbeka, na mu nzila yiyo, mo cikwiwicilila mu wulamuzi we viselinji vye wanhu, hali Mulungu.
Hambi u Luganuzi Luswanu lono cikuluganula, hono luhundikwe, lowa luhundikwe kuli wono wakwajilila du.
Wawo si wehuwiye vyono mulungu we yinze yiyino yawatajila wutitu mahala gawo, ho walece kuwuwona calinze u wuzelu wo Luganuzi Luswanu lo lukumyo lwa Kilisito, mono yo cihwani ce mbeka co Mulungu.
Hambi ase, nha si cikwiyiganula sese co weneco, langa 'se cikumuganula Kilisito mono yo Muwaha, nase nha cili wetumami wenyu ku soko ya Yesu.

U Mulungu mono yatya, “Uwuzelu wubulile mu wutitu,” yo yuyo kanyhi mono yakuwa kuzibulilila ne zinhumbula zetu, kanyhi yo kacipelaga u wumanye wose wo lukumyo lo Mulungu, wono wukuwa kung'alala mu wusu wa Kilisito.
Hamba nhavivyo, ase mono cina cico i ciwutwa co Muhe, cihwanile i viya vye lilongo, ho yijele calinze vyono i vilungo vivyo viwaha, vikulawa kuli Mulungu hamba si muli sese co weneco.
Cikugazika nhondo zose, ninga hamba nhavivyo si cikukatala, kanyhi cikwihwelela, ninga si cikutukuwika mitima yaye,
cina walugu wenji, ninga wutazi wuli baho, hamba ciwe cikugwiswa ho hasi, ninga si cikongomezwa yaye.
Ase cikalaga cidinghuye mu miwili yetu nhondo zose i lifwa lya Yesu, uwumi wa Yesu nawo nhavivilya ho wanzalikwe mu miwili yetu.
Heya, vyono mu mikalile yetu yose, cili mu mbali ye lifwa ku soko ya Kilisito, u wumi wakwe Yesu ho wanzalikwe mu muwili wetu wuwu wono wukufwa.
Nha cinji wo wutya, i lifwa likwituma mugati mwetu, ninga nawo wumi wukwituma mugati mwenyu.
I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “Nehuwila, holeka nghalonga.” Nase nhavivyo ku soko yo wuwa ne nhumbula yiyo yo wihuwilo, cihuwiye, na holeka ku soko yiyo, nase cikulonga.
Nase cimanyile vyono, u Mulungu mono yamuzukula u Muwaha Yesu muli wafu, kocizukula nhavivilya na sese hamonga na Yesu, no kucinyasula hamonga nanye no kuciwika hali mwene.
Na zizi zose zili ku soko ye cambuzi cenyu nyenye, ho yiwe nha kotya, lihewa lyo Mulungu, likuwaficila wanhu wenji muno muno, nawo ho wasume kulavya lilumbo muno muno ko lukumyo lo Mulungu.
Holeka si cikutimba, u munhu wetu wa kunze hamba yakombipe, ninga mugati mwetu, cikunozwa wapya nhondo zose.
Hambi u wugaye wono cikuwutuga nha wudodo, kanyhi wa cidaha cidodo vivi du, ninga hamba nhavivyo, wosuma kucipela u lukumyo lono lucizize u wulanjilile wetu wose, u lukumyo lono lusina ndumo.
Holeka ase cikuvilanjilila muno muno vinhu vyono si vijelaga, hamba si vinhu vyono vijelaga. Ku soko vyono vijelaga, nha vya cidaha cidodo du, ninga avilya vyono si vijelaga, vyo vikalaga cibitilila.

Hambi nha cimanyile vyono, kaya yiyi ya kono'nze yono cikaye lulu, wo wutya u muwili wetu, kolo yeza yapambulwa, u Mulungu nha kocipela kaya yinji kuko ku wulanga, kaya yono yayinoza mweneco yo wikalo we cibitilila, yono si yizenjigwe ne miwoko.
Hambi mu wikala u kaya yiyi, nha citamikaga, cikuhila muno muno kuvwikwa mu wikalo wetu wono wuli ku wulanga.
Heya yicinojeye civwikwe nhavivyo, ho cize cilece kwima ha mwande yo Mulungu akuno cisina vivwalo.

Holeka lono cikali cili mu kaya yiyi ya kono'nze, cikulila vyono cikanyicizwe, ninga si vyono cikuhila kuwuvula u muwili wuwu wono wukufwa, aa ng'o, langa cikusulumila ho civwikwe awulya wono si wufwizaga, acilya cono cifwizaga, ho cimelelwe lukulu no wumi.
U Mulungu mweneco yaciwikaniziza u wukawanizwe wuwo, nayo yacipela u Muhe wakwe wuwe co cipingo ca vyose vyono yaciwiciye.
Holeka ase cina nhumbula yono yikamile nhondo zose. Kanyhi cimanyile vyono mu wikala mu muwili wuwu du, cikuwa cili kutali no Muwaha.
Hambi nha cikujendela wihuwilo, hamba si ko wuwone yaye.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo, cikamile du. Kanyhi cali cende cihame mu wikalo wuwuno wa mu muwili no kuhamila kuli Muwaha.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo, i mbaha yono yicizize muno, cikuhidimbala muno cimwendeze, lono cikali cili bahano mono yinze, hamba kuko.

Hambi ase wose nha yowa yicinojeye kwima he'goda lyo wuling'anizi lya Kilisito, u munhu wo wose, ho yabocele zono zimunojeye, nha vyono genha i metumo gakwe gono yetumaga, lono yali yakali yekaye mononze, hono maswanu, hamba mabi.

Ale, ase ciyimanyile soko yo kumogopela u Muwaha, holeka ku soko yiyi, cikwihinda kuwakwega wanhu. U Mulungu yacimanyiye lukulu, nane nitumbiye vyono na nyenye nhavivyo mucimanyiye lukulu mu viselinji vyenyu.

Si vyono cikusaka kwiyendeza kuli'nye, ng'o, langa cikusaka cimulajilenyi zisoko zetu, zono zikuleka cikwilumbila muli nyenye, ho mutuje soko yo kuwapitula awalya wono wakwiyilumbila vyono wenha, u wuwe wawo wa kunze, si nha vyono wenha mu nhumbula.
Hono ciwe cikwijela nha cina lukwale, ako ko ko Mulungu, na hono ciwe cina mahala gono gatulile, ayo cowa co cambuzi cenyu.
Hambi ase nha citemigwe no wendo wa Kilisito, mono cikwizuka nha vyono u munhu monga du, yafwa ku soko ya wose, nayo yiyo yikulajila nha vyono, wose wakuhangana i lifwa lyakwe.
Umwene yafwa ku soko ye wanhu wose, wawalya wono wakuwumipa, ho walece kwiwumipila weneco, langa wawe womi ku soko yo mwene mono yafwa, yakazukulwa ku soko yawo.
Holeka ku wulawa lulu, ase si comumanya munhu wo wose mu nzila ye cimunhumunhu. Hamba yiwe camumanyila Kilisito mu nzila ye cimunhumunhu, ninga alu si nhavivyo kanyhi.
No munhu wo wose hono vilunze na Kilisito, yakuwa ciwumbwa cipya, i ze katali zapuluta, alu zaweza mhya.
Na zizi zose wo mulimo wo Mulungu mweneco kucilamula ase no mweneco mu nzila ya Kilisito, yakawa kucipela nase u mulimo wo kuwanoza wanhu welamule nayo.
Wo wutya, u Mulungu yakuyilamula yinze no mwene mu nzila ya Kilisito, no kuleka kuwawalila wanhu u wubi wawo. Umwene yacipela nghani yo kuwalamula i wanhu no Mwene.
Holeka ase cili watumwa so Kilisito, nayo Mulungu mweneco yakucitumamila sese, cimunenenyi anye. Holeka cikumunenenyi ku so Kilisito, mwilamule no Mulungu.
Kilisito yali yasina wubi, ninga Mulungu yamunoza yawe wubi ku soko yetu, nase mu wilunza nayo, ho cisume kuhanga u wiling'ano wo Mulungu.
Holeka nase vyono cikwituma mulimo hamonga no Mulungu, cikumunenenyi mulece kuvumila i lihewa lyo Mulungu lyono mwabocela, lyajilile bwete.

Hambi u Mulungu nha yakutya nhavi; “Mwi'daha lyono lyali linojeye, lo nakuhulicila. Mwi'zuwa lyono lyali linojeye wuponywe, baho ho nakutaziza.” Lanje, aluno ho hanojeye muno muno, kanyhi izuwalili lyo lizuwa lye mhonelo!
Na kanyhi vyono si cikusaka ciwe ne lilema lyo lyose mu witumami wetu, holeka si cendile kumuwicila munhu wo wose cikobazo co cose.
Langa cikuhila kwilajila nha vyono ase mbeka cili wetumami wo Mulungu muli zose, ko wukangalizi wuwaha mwi'pango lyo wutamiswe, mu magayo na mu wusungu wuwaha.
Cikatowangwa, cikatajilwa mu jela, no kuhowelezwa cagalanze, cetuma mulimo kuciza sunga cikakatala, cikagona meso hamba kulya.
Cikwilajila nha vyono cili wetumami wo Mulungu mu nzila yo wele wa mu nhumbula, mu wumanye, mu wukangalile, mu wunhu wuswanu, ko Muhe Mono Yelile, na ko wendo we mbeka wono wusina hamba wukonji,
mu nghani ye mbeka, na kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu. No wiling'ano, co citwalo cetu co kwitaziza ku lubavu lo kulume no lubavu lo kucekulu.
Nhondo zose ciwikanize kutuga lukumyo, kupegwa lilumbo no kubedegalwa, kuhoswa no kukumywa. Cikwijela nha cili walambi, kumbe ase ho cikulonga mbeka,
cikwijela nha wanhu wono si wamanyice, kumbe ho cimanyice kuli wanhu wose, cikwijela nhe wanhu wono wafwiye, kumbe nha vyono mukuwona, ase ho cili womi du.

Hamba ciwe catuga wulipicizwe, ninga si cikawulagwa yaye, hamba ciwe cina wuzinguce, ninga cikusangalala nhondo zose, hamba ciwe ciciwape muno muno, ninga cikuwagolifya wanhu wenji, cijelaga nha cili wanhu mono cisina cinji co cose, ninga kumbe ho cina navyo i vinhu vyose.
Nye Wakolinto nyo wandugu zetu wendece, calongana nanye calinze, ne zinhumbula zetu zili calinze muno muno.
Na hono muwe mukuwona ko cili cikobazo co cose cilya, i cikobazo cico cili muli nyenye nyo weneco, ninga si cili kulubavu lwetu yaye.
Alu nghulongana nanye nha wanangu, nghutya, ale mudigule zinhumbula zenyu, nha vyono ase cikanoza.
Mulece kwihwana ne wanhu wono si wehuwiye. Alu 'mbi u wuswanu no wavu, vyosuma kwilumvya? Hamba u Wuzelu no wutitu, vyosuma kuwezana hamonga?
Alo Kilisito kosuma nhawule kwilumvya na Setani? Hamba mono yehuwiye, ho kosuma kulagana nhawule na mono si yehuwiye?

Hamba howuli wulaganeci we Nyumba yo Mulungu ne vihwani vyo wulambi? Hambi ase nha cili wuhembelo wo Mulungu mumi. Nha vyono Mulungu mweneco yalonga yakatya, “Nowunoza u wikalo wangu wuwe muli wene, na muli wene mo nowa jendela, nane nowa Mulungu wawo, nawo wowa wanhu wangu.”
Holeka u Muwaha kanyhi yakutya, “Ale muwuce muli wene, mweze musiwanuce mulece kupamiziza lukulu cinhu cavu nane ho nomubocelenyi.
Ane nowa Sogo yenyu, nanye mowa wanangu, we cilume na we cicekulu u Muwaha Mono u Mudaha Vyose, vyo yakutya.”

Holeka nyo wendece, vyono cakondya kupegwa i vilagane vivyo, yicinojeye nase ciyeze muli zose zono zosuma kucitipiza mu miwili, sunga na mu zinhumbula zetu, ho ciwe celile muno muno, no kwikala mu mikalile yono yimogopile Mulungu.
Ale cikulomba mu cipele cilejeho mu zinhumbula zenyu! Ase cikali namusutizya munhu wo wose, hamba ku muhodanga munhu wo wose, hamba kumukonga munhu wo wose.
Ane si nghulonga nhavivi ho nimuling'anize munhu wo wose, hambi nha nakondya kulonga vyono anye muli mugati mu zinhumbula zetu, sunga ku wufwizane, hamba ku wuwumipane hamonga.
Nina witumbilo wuwaha muno muno, lono nghulongana nanye, kanyhi nghwilumbila muli nyenye! Hamonga no wugaye wetu wose, alu nakondya kutuga wutuzwe no wusangalale wuwaha muno.
Hamba lono caficila Makedoniya, si casuma kuceha, hambi nha cali cipilimwe ne magayo mbavu zose, kudeha, milewo, kugati nako woga.
Ninga Mulungu mono yakuwapela vilungo wono wasoceye, yakacipela vilungo nase so wuze wa Tito.

Ninga si so wuze wakwe Tito du wono wacisangalaza, ku soko yo wusindamikwe wono mwamupela. Mwene yaciloloseza nha vyono mwendile muno kwiwona nane, kanyhi na vyono mwina wukalale, na vyono mukuhila kunhetela. Ne nghani yiyi yikusangalaza muno.
Holeka hamba niwe namukalazenyi so baluwa yangu, ninga ane no mweneco si nghuwona soko yo kukalala. Heya, manyile vyono baluwa yiyo yikamupelenyi wukalale, ninga wali wukalale wa cidaha cidodo du.

Ninga alu nina wusangalale, singhusangalala vyono namukalazenyi, langa vyono wukalale wenyu wamunozenyi mupitule wuhile wenyu no kunena. Wukalale wuwo wetumamilwa no Mulungu, holeka ku soko yiyi ase si camutendelenyi nghani yo yose'mbi.

Hambi u wukalale wono witumamilwaga no Mulungu, nha wuletaga wupituce wa mu nhumbula, u wupituce wono wuletaga mhonelo, holeka hasina soko yo kuwona nha wambuce. Ninga u wukalale we ciyinze-yinze, awo wuletaga 'fwa.

Alu mosuma kuwona vyono u Mulungu yawitumamila wuwo u wukalale wenyu. Lanje vyono mweza muli wahidimbazi, mu wilajile vyono musina malema go gose, mu makuwo, mu wutinuswe no woga, mu wuwa ne nyhilu yo wituma ziswanu, mu wogopo Mulungu, akuno mwiwikanize nhondo zose kwihoma ne zinghani zose zono si zinojeye. Mwakondya kwilajila nha vyono musina yilema lyo lyose mu nghani yiyi.

Holeka hamba niwe nghandika baluwa yiyilya, si nayandika ku soko yo munhu musutyi, hamba si nayandika ku soko yo munhu mono yasutizywe. Ane nayandika ho zijele calinze hali Mulungu vyono mwina no wuhidimbale ku soko yetu.

Holeka nase cikatuzwa muno muno. Hamba nhavivyo, si vyono catuzwa du, langa vyono na Tito nayo yakacisangalaza muno ne nyemo yono yali yena nayo, i nyemo yono yalawilila mu wusangalaze wenyu wono mwamusangalaza inhumbula yakwe.

Holeka nane nimukumizyenyi muno hali mwene, akuno manyiye lukulu, vyono si nghwikonga mu nghani yiyo. Hambi nha cikuwa kumulonjelenyi nghani za mbeka nhondo zose, holeka na lono cikumukumizyenyi ha mwande ya Tito, si nghani za wulambi yaye, langa za mbeka.
Holeka no wendo wa mu nhumbula yakwe kuli'nye, wokonjelezeka muno, ko muno lono yakukumbucila vyono anye wose muli cihuliko, na vyono mwamubocela mwene ne cogopo ciwaha hamonga no wucicime.
Nane nghusangalala muno muno vyono aluno nosuma kumwitumbilenyi muno muli zose.
Kanyhi nyo wandugu zetu, cendile cimumanyizenyi ze lihewa lyono u Mulungu yagapelile makanisa ga Makedoniya.
Wose wono wehuwiye wono wali kuko, vyono watuga majelo mawaha so wugaye, ninga hamba nhavivyo inyemo yawo yikonjelezeka muno, sunga wakawa wacemezi muno, hamba wawe wali waciwa muno muno.
Nosuma kuhomelela vyono wali wacemezi mu nghango ye vilungo vyawo no kuciziliza. Kanyhi ko wuhile wawo weneco du,
wakacinena muno wapegwe cilejeho co kuhanga nase mu witumami wuwu wo kuwataza wanhu wo Mulungu wono wali mu Wuyahudi.
Ayo yali yo nghani yono si cali ciyilanjiliye hamba hadodo! Hambi nha wamula kwiyilavya weneco kuli Muwaha, hanyuma ho wakawa kwiyilavya na kuli'se nhavivilya nha vyono winha uwuhile wo Muwaha.
Holeka cikamunena Tito mono yawamula u mulimo wuwu, yamutazilizenyi, ho musume kuwituma u witumami wuwuno wo wendo muli nyenye.
Vyono mukwizize vyose, mu wihuwilo, wulonje, wumanye, wupiligazi wo kwituma i ziswanu, sunga na mu wendo wenyu wa kuli'se. Holeka, cikuhila mucile muno mu witumami wuwuno wo wendo.
Si nghumupelenyi yilajilizo, langa nghuhila kulajila du nha vyono wanji wena wuhidimbazi wo wutazi, ho sume kuwumanya u wendo wenyu vyono wa mbeka.
Hambi anye nha mulimanyile lihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, nha vyono mwene hamba yawe yali yakwizize vyose, ninga yakenoza nha muciwa ku soko yenyu, anye ho mugolipile mu wuciwa wakwe.
Ku soko ye nghani yiyi, ane nghumutyenyi nhavi, yinojeye mwitume zizilya zono mwamula mwekazo. Vyono yo nyenye mwali walongozi kusola nghanzo yo kulamula kwituma nhavivyo.
Ale muwukondelezaje u mulimo wuwo, mu nghango ye nyhilu yono mwina nayo yo kulavyo 'tazi, mwitumaje nhavivyo ko wuhidimbazi, muwukondelezeze mu nghango nha vyono mosuma.
Hono munhu yawe yena mutima wo wutazi, u Mulungu nayo kabocelaga co cose cono u munhu yuyo kosuma kulavya, Mwene si kakanililaga yaye.
Ninga si munojeye monjelezwe wugaye wenyu, wanji ho wasume kucepulilwa umutegulo wawo wo kulavya wutazi, aa ng'o, ninga yicinojeye cilanje u muling'ano wa kose kose hamonga ne ling'ani.

Co cose cono mwina naco cono cicizize, yinojeye cico ciwataze awalya wono wena wanjile, nawo kolo watuga vyono vicizize, ho wamutazenyi nanye mu visakwa vyenyu, na mu nzila yiyo, ho mowa mweza muli muling'ano.
Nha vyono i Mandiko gakutya, “Mono yakonghola ko winji, hamba siyatuga kuciziliza, nayo mono yakonghola vicefu, hamba si yanjiza.”
Nghumulumbo Mulungu mono yamupela Tito i nhumbula yono yina nyhilu nhe yangu yo kumupelenyi wutazi.
Ninga si yalumba ku soko vyono camulomba yanoze nhavivyo, langa sunga no mweneco yali yena nyhilu muno yo wutazi, sunga yakasuma kulamula mweneco du, ho yaze kuko kwenyu.
Alu cikumutumiliza hamonga no ndugu yetu yunji mono u lukumyo lwakwe lutandaye mu makanisa gose ku soko yo wuganula u Luganuzi Luswanu.

Hamonga na zizo, mwene yehagwa ne makanisa gose, ho ciwe jendana nayo lono cikwitumama u witumami wetu wuwuno wo wendo, witumami wono cikwituma so lukumyo lo Muwaha no kulajila wuhile wetu wuswanu, wo kuhila kulavya wutazi.
Cikuhila kwilega yunji yalece kucihosa ku soko yo wulanjilizi we vipegwa vyono civilavizye sese.
Ninga wuhile wetu, cikusaka citume viswanu du hali Muwaha, sunga na hali wanhu nhavivyo.
Hamonga ne wandugu zetu wawo, cimutuma no ndugu yetu yunji, mono cakondya kumuwona kali kenji, vyono u mwene nayo yena wuhidimbazi wo wutazi, sunga na lulu yena witumbilo wuwaha na nyenye.
Tito yo muyangu, mono cikwituma hamonga u mulimo ku soko yenyu. Ninga kuli za awano wandugu zetu wanji wono vikuzana nawo, awo watumwa ne makanisa nu lukumyo lwa Kilisito.
Holeka muwalajilaje u wendo wenyu, i makanisa ho gasume kuwona vyono cina ling'ani yo kwilumba so nyenye.
Hambi nhe kataza lya bwete kumwandicilenyi kuli zo witumami wenyu wuwo, ku soko ye wanhu wo Mulungu wono wali ku Wuyahudi.

Manyile vyono mwina nhumbula yo wutazi, nane nghalumba ku soko yenyu so nghani yiyo kuli wanhu we Makedoniya. Nawalonjela nghatya, “Wandugu zetu wono wali ku Akaya, wali wewikanize kunoza wutazi ku wulawa mwekazo.” Holeka u wihinde wenyu, wakondya kuwaswaswaniza wanhu wenji muno.
Alu nghuwatuma wandugu zetu wawo, u wilumbe wetu wa muli'nye, ho wijele vyono si nghani ya bwete, na kanyhi vyono mwiwikanizize lukulu so wutazi wenyu nha vyono nalonga.

Yilece kuwa kanyhi i wanhu we Makedoniya kolo wakuza hamonga nane, cimwaganenyi mukali newikaniza, baho ase cowa cakozwa cevu, ne cevu naco cono mocituga nyenye nyo weneco, cowa si cakulonga, vyono ase cowa cakondya kumwitumbililenyi lukulu.

Holeka mbona viswanu vyono yinojeye niwanene wandugu zetu wawa, wanongolele kuza kwenyu, ho wasume kuviwikaniziza lukulu vipegwa vyenyu viwaha, navyo viwe vyawikanizwa kolo nghuza, vyono mwehuwiza. Ne vipegwa vivyo, vilajile mbeka, nha vyono vilavywa ko mutima muzelu, hamba si ko wudindimizwe yaye.
Ninga mweze kukumbucila vyono, “U munhu mono yakuhadika ko wucefu, nayo kolo dudula wucefu, nayo munhu mono yakuhadika ko winji, ale, kolodudula ko winji.”

Holeka munhu wo wose yalavye mu nghango nha vyono yalamuye, ninga yiweze ko mutima muzelu, hamba si ko wukalale, hamba kwe dindimiza, hambi u Mulungu, nha kamwendaga u munhu mono kalavyaga no wusangalale.
