U Mulungu kosuma kumupelenyi kuciza vyono mukuhila, ho muwe muvikwizize vyose mu visakwa vyenyu, ho mucile kuwa watazi mu milimo yose miswanu,
nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, gakutya, “Mwene kalavyaga ko wuswanu kawapelaga waciwa, no wuswanu wakwe wikalaga cibitilila.”

Nayo u Mulungu mono kamupelaga mbeyu mulimi, no kumupela i ndigwa yo kulya, komupelenyi nanye zimbeyu zono mukuhila, nayo kozicindisa no kuziwilusa, hamonga no kumupelenyi ndudula mbaha ku soko yo weza mutima wenyu.
Nayo komugolifyenyi nhondo zose muli vyose, wanhu ho wasume kumulumbo Mulungu, ku soko ye vipegwa vyenyu vyono wakuvibocelela mu miwoko yetu.
Hambi u mulimo wuwu wono welile wono mukuwituma, si vyono wowataza i wanhu wo Mulungu du, langa wowanoza wanhu wenji wamulumbe Mulungu.

Na ku soko ye citanjilo cono cikwijela so mulimo wetu wuwu, i wanhu womukumyo Mulungu ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito lono mukuluvumila, kanyhi na ku soko yo wuswanu wono mukuwatendela wene hamonga ne wanhu wose.
Holeka wojendelela kumulombelenyi ko mutima wose, ku soko ye lihewa lyono u Mulungu yamupelenyi.
U Mulungu yalumbwe so cipegwa cakwe cono ase si cosuma kucikumya nha vyono yicinojeye.
Ane yo nene no mweneco Pawulo, mono nghwijela nili mupolo lono nili hamonga nanye, ninga ho nili mukali lono nili kutali nanye, nghumunenenyi ko lusungu no wuswanu wa Kilisito.
Nghumunenenyi mulece kusagahiza ho niwe nili mukali kolo neza kuza, hambi nha manyiye lukulu, vyono nowakalipila wose wono wakwihwesa vyono, ase cikaye mu mikalile ye ciyinze yinze.
Heya mbeka cikaye mononze, ninga si cikwihoma ciyinze yinze.

Hambi i vitwalo vyono cikwitumamila mu wihomi wetu, nha si vitwalo vye ciyinze yinze, langa vyo vilungo vyo Mulungu vyono vigwisaga magomawakali gose. Nase cikusuma kuwugwiza u wusugu-sugu wose wo wulambi,
no kuvikumulanga vimizi vyose vyo wiwoni, vyono vikwimila u wumanyo Mulungu, cikugakwega i mahweso gose, no kuganoza gamuhulice Kilisito.
Mulawa mweza kuwa mwakwilanicila mu cihuliko, ale, ase ciwikanizize lukulu kuwulipiciza u wula cihuliko wose.

Anye waco mulangaga za kunze du. Wulenyi, ho yuli munhu wo wose mono yakwihwesa vyono mwene yo wa Kilisito? Ale viswanu! Ninga yehwesaje nhavivilya nha vyono nase cili wakwe Kilisito nha vyono mwene yuyo wa Kilisito.
Hamba niwe nghwijela nha naciziliza muno u wilumbi wangu so wulajilize wono u Mulungu yacipela, u wulajilize wo kumusikamyenyi nyenye, hamba si so kumugwisenyi yaye.
Si nyendile mwihwese nha vyono nghusaka kumogofyenyi so baluwa zangu.

Yunji yadahile kutya, “Baluwa za Pawulo nzito, kanyhi zina nghani zono zili vilungo, ninga mwene lono yali hamonga nase, yo munhu musocele, sunga lono yakuduwa du, koziwona i zinghani zakwe kotya si cinji ng'o.”
No munhu mono yakulonga nhavivyo, ciba yakumbucile vyono, hasina wisimajile na zono candikaga mu zibaluwa zetu lono cili kunji, na zono cokwituma lono cowa cili baho hamonga nanye.

Hamba nhavivyo, si cali cisume kwijelela kwiwika hamba kwiyihwananiza na awalya wanhu wono wakwiyikumya weneco. I wanhu wono wakwiyinoza weneco kuwa nha cipimo co kwiyipimila weneco, kanyhi wakwiyiling'aniza weneco wose, wawo wasina wizuce.
Ninga ase si cosuma kwiyilumba kuciza ha nghango, langa u wilumbe wuwo wowa wuli mu nghango yo mulimo wono u Mulungu yacipela, u mulimo wono cikuwituma sunga na kuko kwenyu.
Alu nanye vyono muli mu nghango yiyo, nase si casuma kuciza nghango yiyo lono cazizo kwenyu, kumuletelenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito.

Holeka nase si cikwilumbila mulimo wono wanji wetuma, si nhe nghango yono capegwa, langa citumbiye vyono u wihuwilo wenyu wocila kuwiluka, nase ho cituje mulimo muwaha muno muli nyenye mu nghango yi yilya du yono yaciwicila Mulungu.
Baho lu, ho cosuma kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu na mu zisi zinji zono zili kutali na kono kwenyu, na yowa si nghani yo kwilumbila mulimo wono wetuma wanhu wanji kunhu kunji.
Nha vyono i Mandiko gakulonga gakutya, “U munhu wo wose mono yakusaka kwilumba, yimunojeye yelumbile muli yono yetumo Muwaha.”
Nayo mono yakuvumilwa, si yulya mono yakwiyikumya mweneco ng'o, langa yo yulya muno Muwaha yakumukumya.
Mwali munghangalilile hadodo du, hamba niwe nha nili mulele ku lubavu lunji! Heya, ale munghangalilile ta hadodo.
Ane nha nghumuwonelenyi wivu, ninga wivu wa kuli Mulungu, hambi anye nha mwihwanile u muhinza musindile mono nimubanyiye u mulume monga du, nayo yo Kilisito.
Ninga nghogopa yilece kuwa nhe lizoka lyono ko wusugu walyo wo wulambi, likamukoca Hawa, i mahweso genyu gadahile kwajilizwa no kuwuleka u wihuwilwa wenyu we mbeka kuli Kilisito.

Hambi nye nha mukumukangalila u munhu wo wose mono kokuza no kumuganula Yesu mono yesimajiye na yulya mono camuganula, kanyhi mukubocela muhe no luganuzi vyono visimajiliye lukulu no Muhe no Luganuzi vyono mwavibocela kulawa kuli'se.
Si nghwihwesa vyono ane nili mudodo si nha wawo “I Watumwa wenyu wono wakumucile!”
Lunji nowa sina wunghula wo wulolosa milonjele, ninga u wumanye awo langa nina nawo, ne nghani yiyi cayilajila calinze kuli'nye hanhu ho hose, na mu vipango vyose.
Hamba si namudayenyi musahala wo wose, lono namuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, langa nenenenyheza ho sume kumwinulenyi anye. Alo nanoza vibi?
Lono netumaga mulimo muli'nye, i visakwa vyangu nha vyalawaga mu makanisa ganji. Nha cinji wo wutya nawasolela sawo yawo, ho sume kumwitumamilenyi anye.

Na lono nali nanye, hamba si namugaza munhu wo wose so wusaka pesa, langa i wandugu zetu wono wakalawa Makedoniya, wo wandetela vyose vyono nasakaga. Kanyhi nelanjilila muno muno ho ndece kuwa mutegulo kuli'nye, mu nzila yo yose yilya, na nojendelela du kunoza nhavivyo.
Nane nghwihuwiziza mu mbeka ya Kilisito yono yili muli'ne, nha vyono hasina cono cosuma kunyimila mu wilumbe wangu so nghani yiyi hanhu ho hose mu Akaya.
Alo nhawule nghulonga nhavivi? Vyono si nimwendilenyi nyenye? Ninga Mulungu yamanyile vyono nimwendilenyi nyenye muno!
Nojendelela kwituma du nha vyono nghwituma alu, ho ndece kuwapela cilejeho awalya wono wakusaka kutuga icilejeho co kwilumbila nha vyono ati wakwituma mulimo nha sese.
Hambi wawo nha wo watumwa wo wulambi, wetumami wo wukonji, wono wakwinoza nha watumwa wa Kilisito.
Kanyhi hamba si nghani ya wizine, hamba na Setani mweneco nha kenozaga kawa nha malayika wo wuzelu!
Holeka si nghani mbaha yaye, hono wawo i wetumami wakwe wenoze nha wetumami wo wiling'ano. Ninga mudumo wawo, wocituga cico cono ciwanojeye vyono genhe metumo gawo.
Kanyhi nghutya, Munhu yalece kumbona ane nha nili mulele. Ninga hono munyihweseze nhavivyo, ale munozaje nha nili mulele nhavivyo du, nane ho nicituje co kwilumbila hadodo vivi.
Naco cono nghucilonga aluno, si nghulonga cono yandajiliza Muwaha, hambi mu nghani yiyi yo wilumbe, ane nghuyilonga du nha nili mulele.
Alu vyono kowali wenji wono wakwilumbila za mononze, ale nane nhavivyo nokwilumba.
Anye muli we mahala, na holeka mukuwakangalila i walele!
Mukusuma kumukangalilila sunga no munhu mono yakumunozenyi muwe wawanda, u munhu mono kumusolelenyi vinhu vyenyu, mono yakumwiwonelenyi, mono yakumubedegalenyi no kumutowenyi ku wusu!

Nane nghuvumilila cevu, vyono ase cali cisoceye mu wituma zizi zose. Ale du kanyhi, na yiwe vyono yowa, ninga hono hawe hoyuli yunji wo wose mono yakwijelela kwilumbila muli cinji co cose, alu nghulonga nha munhu mulele, nane nokwijelela nhavivyo.
Wule, alo wene Wahebelaniya? Ale na nene nhavivyo. Hamba wene Waisilayeli lo? Nane nhavivyo. Wene wamu lulelo lwa Abulahamu? Hamba na nene.

Alo iwene wetumami wa Kilisito? Na nene ye, alu nhondo, neza kulonga cimangha-lukwale, ane nili mwitumami wa Kilisito kuciza wene. Ane netuma mulimo muzito muno muno, nadindilwa mu jela kali kenji muno, nghatowangwa kali kenji, sunga nghawa nili behi no kufwa kali kenji.
Kali kahano nghakunwa viboko vivilya makumi madatu ne cenda ne Wayahudi.

Nakunangwa ne viboko kadatu, nghabogolangwa ne mabwe kamonga, kanyhi nghabenecelwa ne nghalawa mwi'lenga kali kadatu, na kamonga nekala mumo mu malenga cilo cose sunga wukela, kanyhi nghaswa muno misi yose.

Kenji na kenji mu mihinzo yangu, netang'anilaga na mbali nyinji, zimbali zo wulapuce we malenga mu makolongo, zimbali ze malimu makali, zimbali ze wahizi, zimbali zono zalawaga kuli wanyawusi wayangu Wayahudi, na zono zalawaga kuli waono si Wayahudi, ne zimbali za mu makaya mawaha, zimbali za mu mbago, zimbali za mwi'lenga, ne zimbali zono zikulawa kuli wandugu wo wulambi!
Netuma mulimo hamonga ne magayo, nekala meso hamba kugona cilo cose kali kenji, nghadabuka no kuwona nyhilu. Nghaleka kulya, nghekala mu mbeho nghali, akuno sina myenda.
Ninga hamonga na zinji nyinji, kocili cono cikumvuna nhondo zose, nha cinji u mulimo we makanisa gose.
Hono hoyuli yunji musocele, ale nane nili musocele nhavivyo, na munhu wo wose hono yakwejelwe mu wubi, nane nghutuga wukalale muno.
Holeka hono yiwe yinojeye nilumbe, ale, nokwilumbila wusocele wangu.
U Mulungu Sogo yo Muwaha Yesu, ilitagwa lyakwe lilugutwe cibitilila! U Mwene yamanyile vyono si nghulonga wulambi.
Lono nali Damesiki, u muwaha we yisi, mono yali yali hasi yo mutemi Aleta, yalidimaga likaya lya Damesiki, ho yasume kunyibata.
Ninga nghatimizizwa mu nhoto mbaha, nghakozwa mwidilisha sunga ko kunze, holeka nghatiga mu miwoko yakwe.
Mulece nilumbe, hamba yiwe si yinojeye. Ninga nolonga luno kuli zo wulajilwe no wugubulilwe vyono yamhela Muwaha.

Nimumanyile munhu yunji Mukilisito, mono mu myaka i kumi na mine yono yipulute, u munhu yuyo, yakasolwa yakategulwa sunga ko ku wulanga we kadatu. (Ninga langa simanyile vyono, lono yali yali kuko, hono yali yali mu muwili, hamba mu muhe azo zo Mulungu yamanyile.)
Nghuwuyajiza kanyhi kutya, manyile du vyono u munhu yuyo, yasolwa sunga ko ku Paladiso. (Langa si manyile hono yali yali kuko mu muwili hamba mu muhe, u Mulungu yamanyile.)
Ninga kuko yazihulika zinghani ze cinyele, zono u munhu siyanojeye kuzilonga.
Holeka nokwilumbila munhu yuyo, ninga si nokwilumba nene no mweneco, langa mu wusocele wangu du.

Na hono nali nyende kwilumba, si nali niwe nili mulele hamba hadodo, hambi nha nali niwe nghulonga ze mbeka du. Ninga alu si nosuma kwilumba, hambi nha sinyendile munhu yunji yanyihweseze kuziza nha vyono yakumbona no kuhulika kulawa kuli'ne.
Ninga ho ndece kwilumba so zinghani zizi zimbaha zono nagubulilwa, napegwa wusungu mu muwili wangu kotya yimiya, u mwitumami wa Setani, mono yakunhowa, ho ndece kwilumba kuciza.
Nane nghamunena Muwaha kadatu so nghani yiyi, ho yimbucile.

Ninga Mwene yakanhya, “Ilihewa lyangu likukwiliye, hambi vilungo vyangu nha vikwilanicizwaga lono wuli mu wusocele.” Ninga ane nyendile muno kwilumbila wusocele wangu, ho vilungo vya Kilisito vikale muli'ne.
Holeka nyheye kanyhi nyendezwe du, hono mu wusocele, mu wubedegalwe, mu wugaye, mu wuwinjilizwe, na mu magazo ku soko ya Kilisito, hambi lono nili musocele, nha ho nghuwela nili vilungo.

Alu naweza nha nili mulele, ninga yo nyenye mono mundindimize ho niwe nhavivyo. Hambi anye, nha yo nyenye mono mwali munojeye munumbe. Vyono, hamba niwe si nili cinji yaye, ninga hamba nhavivyo, ane si nili mudodo kuciza wawo i “Watumwa wenyu wono wakumucile.”
I mapoto ne mezino vyono vikulajila calinze vyono nane nili mutumwa, nha vyonozezwa muli nyenye ko wukangalizi wose.

Hambi cinhuci cono mwafutigwa kuciza makanisa ganji, langa hono si nene du mono si nasaka nimugazenyi ho mumhele u wutazi wenyu? Ninga hamba nhavivyo nghumulombenyi munenele so wuleka kumupelenyi i cilejeho cico co kumhela wutazi wenyu!

Ninga aluno nakondya kwiwikaniziza lukulu ku wuza kwenyu lwe kadatu, ninga si nomutunyenyi mumhele co cose. Hambi ane nha si nghulondola sawo yenyu langa nghumulondolenyi nyenye nyo weneco. Hambi nha yiwanojeye walezi wo wawawicile viwutwa i wana wawo, si nhe wana kuwawicila viwutwa i walezi wawo.
Ane nyendezwe muno nitumile cono nina naco, sunga ko ku wilavizya lukulu nene no mweneco, ku soko ye cambuzi ce zinhumbula zenyu. Alu hongo monyenda hadodo, vyono ati'ne nimwendilenyi anye muno muno?
Ale du kanyhi, ninga ane no mweneco si namuvunenyi yaye. Na lunji yunji kosuma kutya, “Pawulo vyono musugu, alu yakondya kumwibatenyi ko wusugu wakwe.”
Wulenyi nakondya kumukalipilenyi mu nzila ya munhu wo wose mono namutuma kwenyu?

Ane namucema Tito, nghawa kumutumilenyi mwene hamonga no ndugu yetu yunji. Ninga wulenyi, Tito yakamukalipilenyi? Alu si mumanyile vyono Tito na nene cikutongwa no Muhe yuyo yumonga? Na vyono cikalaga mu mikalile yono yihwanile?

Lunji mukwihwesa vyono, sunga nalu cikali cikwitetela hali'nye! Ninga cikuzilonjela i zinghani zizi hali Mulungu akuno cilunzize na Kilisito. Ninga soko ye zinghani zizo zose, nye nyo wedece wangu, ho musume kuzengwa.

Nane nghogopa vyono na lunji kolo nghuza kwenyu, nomwaganenyi mu wuwe wono si wukunyendeza, nane baho lu, si noleka kuwa mu wuwe wono si mwendile nanye. Nane nghogopa yilece kuwa lunji ko wuli wugombane, wivu, makuwo, wubuguci, maheho, nzwaji ze caka caka, wusomenghanya, wiwoni, no wisagale muli nyenye.

Kanyhi nghogopa, na lunji kolo neza kuza mu muhinzo wuwo wono nokuza, u Mulungu wangu komhela u wula nyemo hali nyenye, nane nolila ku soko ya wenji wa muli nyenye wono wetuma wubi hamba kunena wuwo wavu wawo, ne masulumizi gawo mabi, hamonga ne mawubi gawo go wusenyha wawo, gono wali wakondya kwituma.
Alu lo lwe kadatu lo kuza kwenyu. “I makamu go gose, gahulicizwe hamwande ye wahomelezi wejete hamba wadatu.” I Mandiko vyo gakutya.

Nakondya kulonga nha vyono yali yinha mu muhinzo we kejete, nalu nghulonga kanyhi lono nili kutali nanye, vyono wawalya wose wono wetuma wubi hamba kunena yaye, sunga na wawalya wanji, kolo nghuza, ale woviwona.
Alu langa ho mokwiwonelela nyo weneco, vyono Kilisito yakulonjela muli nene. Mono kuli'nye, Kilisito si yasoceye yaye, langa i vilungo vyakwe vikwituma muli nyenye.

Hamba yiwe nha yatumbicilwa mu musalaba mu wusocele, ninga alu yakuwumipa kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu. Nase cisoceye nhavivyo so wilunza nayo, ninga ciwumipana hamonga nayo kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu ku soko yenyu.
Ale mwiyijele nyo weneco ho mumanye hono mbeka mwina wihuwilo. Mwiyihenje nyo weneco. Alo si mumanyile vyono Kilisito Yesu yali muli nyenye? Na hono yiwe si nhavivyo, anye waco mwalemwa.
Ninga nitumbiye nha vyono anye mumanyile vyono ase cikali nalemegwa.
Cikumulomba u Mulungu, ho mulece kwituma wubi wo wose, ninga si vyono ho cijele nha wanhu wono wakondya kusuma, langa ho musume kwituma ziswanu, hamba ase ciwe kwijela kotya nha cilemigwe.
Hambi nha si cosuma kwituma cinji kusutana ne mbeka, vyono u wusume wono cina nawo, nha cina wusume wo kuyijendeleza mbeka.
Ninga cikusangalala vyono cili wasocele, langa anye muli vilungo, holeka cikulomba muwuficile u wukwilanicile.

Ale holeka nghuyandika baluwa yiyi lono nili kunji, nilawa neza kufika kuko, ho ndece kuwa nili mukali kuli'nye no kuwitumamila u wulajilize wono napegwa no Muwaha, u wulajilize wo kumusikamyenyi hamba si wo kumugwisenyi yaye.

Na ye ndumilizo, wandugu zangu, nghutya, mwikalaje! Mweze mukamile, muwibataje muno muno u wijize wangu, mweze mulaganiye kumonga, mwikalaje mwilamuye. Nayo u Mulungu wo wendo no mulamu, kowa hamonga nanye.
Mwilamusizaje mu winonele wono welile. I wanhu wose wo Mulungu wono wali akuno, wose wakumulamusenyi muno.
Ilihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, no wendo wo Mulungu, no wuhanje wo Muhe Mono Yelile, viwezane nanye wose.

Ane Pawulo u mutumwa, hamonga na we zindugu wose, wono wali hamonga nane, cikwandika kuli makanisa gono gali ku Galatiya. Ane nacemwa kuwa mutumwa, ninga si so wulajilize we wanhu, hamba si mu vilungo vyo munhu,
langa mu vilungo vya Yesu Kilisito, na mu vilungo vyo Mulungu Baba, mono yamuzukula Yesu muli wafu.
Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu Baba, na kuli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, viwezane nanye.
Kilisito yelavya mweneco ku soko yo wubi wetu, ku soko yo wendo wo Mulungu wetu no Sogo yetu, ho yaciponye mu yinze yiyi yimbi ya lulu.
Kuli mwene lweze lukumyo sunga cibitilila ne cibitilila. Heya
Nghwizina vyono cidaha cidodo du cono capuluta, nanye mweza kuwuka kuli yulya mono yamucemenyi mwi'hewa lya Kilisito, na luno mweza kutyatya kanyhi u Luganuzi Luswanu lunji.
Ninga i mbeka, howali wanhu wanji wono wakumuhanza-hanzenyi, wo wanhu wono wakuhila kulwajiliza u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito.
Ninga hamba yawe yunji muli sese, hamba wawe Wamalayika wa ku wulanga, hono yamuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lunji lono si lwinha lono camuganulilenyi, yuyo yeze mulijitwe!
Nha vyono camula kulonga, nhavivyo vyo nghulonga kanyhi, yunji wo wose hono yamuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lunji lono si lwinha lono mwalubocela, yuyo yeze mulijitwe!
Alu'mbi kanyhi nghusaka wukombolwe wa nani, we wanhu hamba wo Mulungu? Hamba nghusaka kuwendeza wanhu lo? Na hono noze nhavivyo, kwaco, ane si nali niwe mwitumami wa Kilisito.
Nye nyo wandugu zangu, nghusaka mumanye vyono u Luganuzi Luswanu lululya lono naluganula, si yali nghani yono yikulawa kuli wanhu.
Hambi ane nha si nalubocela kulawa kuli wanhu, hamba si nejizwa na munhu, langa Yesu Kilisito mweneco yo yangubulila.

Hambi nha manyile vyono, mwazihulika i ze mikalile yangu ye katali yo wibata dini ye Ciyahudi, kanyhi na vyono naligazaga muno muno likanisa lyo Mulungu, sunga nghawa nili behi no kulihodanjila lukulu.
Heya, sunga nghawaciza wenji wanyawusi wayangu we lizika lyangu mu wibata yiyo dini ye Ciyahudi, nane kanyhi nghasimbilila muno muno mu wibate myoto ye walezi wetu.
Ninga u Mulungu, so lihewa lyakwe, yali yakondya kuhagula lono nali nghali hamba si nalelwa, nayo yakawa kunyhema ho nimwitumamile.
Nayo yaza yeza kulamula du kungubulila zo Mwanagwe, ho niluganule u Luganuzi lwakwe Luswanu kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, nane si nejelela kuwuza mahweso kuli wanhu wanji,
hamba si namula kubita ku Yelusalemi ho nghewone na awalya wono wanongolela kuwa watumwa, langa namula kubita ku Alabiya, na hanyuma nghawa kuwuya kanyhi ku Damesiki.
Na hanyuma yaza kupuluta myaka midatu, ho nghawa kubita ku Yelusalemi nghamumanye Kefa, nane cikekalana nayo vilo yikumi na vihano.
Nane hamba sicewona na watumwa wanji, langa cewona na Yakobo du u nduguye wo Muwaha.
Azi zono nghumwandicilenyi, no Mulungu yamanyile vyono si nghulonga wulambi.
Hanyuma yayo nghawa kubita ku mbavu za ku Suliya na Kilikiya.
Na mwi'daha lilyo, nene no mweneco nghawa nghali namanyika kuli mhuga ye Wakilisito wa kuko ku Yudiya.
I wene wali wacimanyile du cono wali wacihulice, vyono, “U munhu yuyulya mono yacigazaga baho ha lulongozi, alu yakuwuganula u wihuwilo wuwulya wono yajelaga kuwuhodanga.”
Nawo wakamukumya u Mulungu ku soko yangu.
Hanyuma yaza kupuluta myaka yikumi na mine, nghawuyajila kanyhi kubita ku Yelusalemi cina hamonga na Balanaba, nghamusola na Tito cikabitana nayo.

No wubite wangu walawilila mu wugubule wono yangubulila Mulungu. Na muwihangulize we cinyele, nghasuma kuwaloloseza wawo iwalongola ze nghani yo Luganuzi Luswanu lono naluganula kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi. Nanoza nhavivyo ho mulimo wangu wono nali nakondya kuwituma, sunga na wono nali nghali kuwituma, wulece kuwa nha nghani ya bwete.
Ninga sunga no muyangu Tito mono cali cina nayo mono yali Mugiliki, si yadindimizwa kwalama,

hamba yiwe hali howali wandugu wo wulambi wono wali wahijiliye Tito yalame. I wanhu wawa weyinjiza ko wusugu, wakawa kuwulondola u welecele wetu wono cina nawo muli Kilisito Yesu, ho wacinjize mu wuwanda.
Nase si celumbaniza nawo hamba hadodo, i mbeka yo Luganuzi Luswanu ho yikale muli nyenye nhondo zose.

Ninga i wanhu wawa wono wakutegwa wo walongola, hono mbeka vyo wali wenha, hamba yiwe si nhavivyo, kwangu si nghani yaye, hambi u Mulungu nha siyakuwa kuling'aniza so wulanga za kunze, ne wanhu wawa wali wasina cinji cono wali wadahile konjeleza mu Luganuzi lulu Luswanu nha vyono ane nghuluganula no mweneco.
Hamba nhavivyo, wali wamanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yanhuma kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, nha vyono Petelo yali yatumigwe kuwaganulila i Wayahudi.
Ku soko vyono yuyo mono yamupela Petelo i vilungo vyo kuwela mutumwa kuli Wayahudi, yo yuyo kanyhi mono yamhela nane i vilungo vyo kuwela mutumwa kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi.

Holeka wa Yakobo na Kefa hamonga na Yohana, wono wakwijela nha wo walongola wawaha, wali wamanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yamhela lihewa lilyo, holeka wakawa kucilamusa ane na Balanaba kwe miwoko yawo, wakulajila i citanjilo co wuhangane hamonga. Na yikawa yicinojeye ase ciketume u mulimo kuli wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wene nawo kuli Wayahudi.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo, wacilomba ase cinhu cimonga, nha cinji ciwakumbucile wanhu waciwa, na yo nghani yono nghuhidimbala muno kuyituma.
Ninga Kefa yaza kuza ku Antiyokiya, namwimila cagalanze hamwande ya wose, ku soko yali yasutizye.

Ku soko vyono ha mwamulizo, i wanhu wanji wono watumwa na Yakobo, lono wali wakali si nafika baho, Petelo vyalizanaga hamonga ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi. Ninga waza kufika wanhu wawo, hodu Petelo yakawa kulecela lukulu kulizana ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi, ku soko vyono yawogopa i wanhu wawo wono wahilaga i wanhu wono si Wayahudi walame.
Sunga ne wandugu wanji we Ciyahudi wakevumila hamonga na Petelo mwi'tumo lilyo lyo wukoci, sunga na Balanaba yakenjizwa nayo mu wukoci wawo.

Holeka nane naza kuwuwona u wuwe wawo wa mu mbeka yo Luganuzi Luswanu, vyono si wuli mu nzila yono yili mu mbeka, hobaho nghawa kumulonjela Kefa hali wose, nghamutya, “Hamba wuwe agwe wuli Muyahudi, ninga wukwikala mu mikalile nha vyono wekaye wanhu wono si Wayahudi, hamba si wikaye kotya Muyahudi! Alu kosuma nhawule kujela kuwadindimiza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi wekale mu mikalile ye Wayahudi?”
Heya mbeka, ase kulawa katali cili Wayahudi, hamba si cili wanhu we wono si Wayahudi, wawo i wahodanji!

Ninga cimanyiye lukulu vyono u munhu si kosuma kuvumilwa hali Mulungu ku soko yo kuwibata u Wulajilize, langa so kumwihuwila Yesu Kilisito du. Na sese cimwihuwiye Yesu Kilisito nhavivyo ho cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu mu nzila yo wihuwilo wetu kuli Kilisito, hamba si so wibate wo Wulajilize.

Alu hono yiwe mu wulondola wuvumilwe hali Mulungu muli Kilisito, cikwijela cili wabi nha vyono wenha i wanhu wono si Wayahudi, wule! Nghani yiyo yowa yina nhunizo yo wutya Kilisito yakutaza mu wituma wubi? Aa ng'o!
Langa hono niwe nghuzenga kanyhi cicilya cono nakondya kucikumula, baho langa nghwilajila vyono nili muhodanji.
Ku soko ane nakondya kufwa mu Wulajilize wuwo, u Wulajilize weneco wo wambulaga, ho niwe nili mumi muli Mulungu. Ane nawulagwa hamonga na Kilisito mu musalaba,

ninga nghuwumipa, ninga yo si nene kanyhi, langa Kilisito yo yakuwumipa muli nene. No wumi wuwu wono nina nawo lulu, nghuwumipila u wihuwilo, u wihuwilo wa muli Mwana wo Mulungu mono yanyenda sunga yakelavya wumi wakwe ku soko yangu.
Si nghwenda kulema lihewa lyo Mulungu. Hono yiwe munhu kanozwaga ling'ani hali Mulungu mu nzila yo Wulajilize, kumbe Kilisito yafwa bwete.
Anye mo Wagalatiya, mbeka mweza muli walele! Alo mono yamukulujenyi nani? Hamby inghani yo wutumbikwe wa Yesu Kilisito, nha mwanzalicilwa ha meso genyu.
Alu nghusaka kumanya nghani monga du kuli'nye. Alu mwamubocela u Muhe wo Mulungu ho musume kwituma i metumo go Wulajilize, hamba ku soko ho muluhulice no kulwihuwila u Luganuzi Luswanu?
Alo nha wule muli walele nhavivi? Mwamuliziza zose mu wutazi wo Muhe wo Mulungu, alu mukuhila kumaliliziza mu vilungo vyenyu mo weneco?
Alo wo wutya, i zinghani zose zilya zono zamutujenyi zawa za bwete? Si yosumika yaye!
Ma, u Mulungu, yakawa kumupelenyi u Muhe kanyhi no kwituma mapoto muli nyenye, vyono mukuzifisiliza za mu Wulajilize hongo, hamba vyono mukuluhulika u Luganuzi Luswanu no kulwihuwila?
Ta, cilanje za Abulahamu; u mwene yamwihuwila u Mulungu, nayo u Mulungu yakamuvumila no kumuwona yali ling'ani.
Holeka mumanye vyono i wanhu wono wakumwihuwila, wawo wo wana wa Abulahamu.

I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakulajila vyono, u Mulungu kowanoza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi ho wavumilwe hali mwene mu nzila yo wihuwilo. Holeka i Mandiko Gono Gelile galongola kumulonjela Abulahamu u Luganuzi Luswanu gakutya, “I wanhu wose wono si Wayahudi wolomotesezwa muli gwegwe.”
Holeka wawo wono wena u wihuwilo, wolugutizwa nha vyono Abulahamu yalugutizwa vyono yali yehuwiye.

Holeka wose wono wetumbiye kufisiliza za mu Wulajilize du, wali mu wulijitwe, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “Muli wose mono si yakwibata no kufisiliza zose zono zandikwe mu citabu co Wulajilize, mulijitwe.”
Nha yanzalikwe, vyono u Wulajilize si wosuma kumunoza munhu ho yavumilwe hali Mulungu, hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Mono yakuvumilwa hali Mulungu ku so wihuwilo, yuyo kowumipa.”
Hambi u Wulajilize no wihuwilo, siyo cinhu cimonga yaye, langa i Mandiko gakutya, “Mono kozifisiliza zose zono zikusakwa mu Wulajilize, yuyo kowumipa.”
Kilisito yacikomboza mu wulijitwe wo Wulajilize, hambi nha yawusola u wulijitwe wuwo ku soko yetu, vyono i Mandiko gakulonga, “Muli wose mono kotumbikwa mu musalaba, yuyo mulijitwe.”

Nghani yiyi yanozwa ho wulugutwe awulya wono yapegwa Abulahamu, wusume kuwaziza i wanhu wono si Wayahudi mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito, na mu nzila yo wihuwilo, cisume kuwubocela u Muhe yulya mono u Mulungu yacihuwiziza.

Wandugu zangu, nomulonjelenyi i cihwanicizo ca mu mikalile yetu ye nhondo zose. Mwihwesaje ta muli ze cilagane ca wanhu wejete. I cilagane cila kuwa cawikwa cakondya, hamonga no kutajilwa sayini, hasina munhu mono kacidelengulaga, hamba kuconjeleza cinji.

Ale Abulahamu nayo yapegwa cilagane mweneco hamonga no lulelo lwakwe. Ne Mandiko si gakutya, “Ne zindelo zakwe.” Nha kotya wenji, langa gakutya “No lulelo lwakwe” nha kotya yumonga du nayo yo Kilisito.

Na cono nghusaka kucilonga nha coci, u Mulungu yanoza i cilagane cakwe kanyhi yakacikangaza, holeka u Wulajilize wono waza lono yali yakondya kupuluta myaka magana mane na makumi madatu, si wosuma kucidelengula i cilagane hamba kucinoza ciwe nha nghani ya bwete.
Hambi i cipegwa co Mulungu hono ciwe cikwitumbila u Wulajilize, i cipegwa cico si cosuma kwitumbila kanyhi i cilagane co Mulungu. Ninga u Mulungu yamupela Abulahamu ku soko ye cilagane.
Alu u Wulajilize waci? Wonjelezwa ho wuwulajile u wuhodanji co cici, sunga kolo yakuza ayulya wo lulelo lwa Abulahamu mono yalaganizwa. U Wulajilize waletwa na malayika ko muwoko wo mulamuzi.
Yene yili mbeka vyono u mulamuzi si kasakwaga hono nghani yiwe kuli munhu monga, langa u Mulungu yo yumonga.

Alo u Wulajilize vikusutana ne vilagane vyo Mulungu? Ng'o si nhavivyo yaye! Hambi hono wali wulavywe Wulajilize wono wosuma kuwapela wanhu wumi, baho cali cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu mu nzila yo Wulajilize.
Ninga si nhavivyo, i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakondya kulonga nha vyono, i yinze yose yili mu vilungo vyo wubi, wono wehuwiye ho wapegwe i cilagane so wihuwilo muli Yesu Kilisito.
Na lono cali cikali si napegwa wuwo u wihuwilo, u Wulajilize wali wuciwopile, sunga wugubulwe u wihuwilo wuwo wono wazaga.
Holeka u Wulajilize wuwo wali nha mwijizi wetu sunga Kilisito yakaza, ho cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu mu nzila yo wihuwilo.
Ninga alu vyono u wihuwilo waza, hodu, u Wulajilize wawa si mwijizi wetu kanyhi.
Na mu nzila yo wihuwilo, anye wose mwawa wana wo Mulungu muli Kilisito.
Nanye wose mono mwabaputizwa, mukelunza na Kilisito, alu mwamuvwala Kilisito.
Holeka hasina kanyhi wisimajile wa muli Muyahudi na mono si Muyahudi, hamba muwanda no munhu mulelele, mucekulu hamba mulume. Hambi anye wose nha mwaweza cinhu cimonga muli Kilisito Yesu.
Holeka anye hono muwe muli wakwe Kilisito, ale muli lulelo lwa Abulahamu, kanyhi mozibocela zizo ze cilagane co Mulungu.
Ninga nghutya nhavi, u muhazi lono yakali mudodo, si visimajiye no mwitumami, hamba yiwe yo munya sawo yose.
Mwipango lilyo lyose yakuwa yali mu mawoko ge walanjilizi ne wanyamhala, sunga vize vifice i vilo vyono vyatemezezwa no sogwe.
Nhavivyo nase lono cali cikali wadodo, cali cili wafugwa we myuhe yono yitemile mononze.
Ninga i vilo vyali vyeza kufika, u Mulungu yamutuma u Mwanagwe mono yalelwa no mucekulu, yakekala mu Wulajilize,
ho yawakomboze awalya wono wali mu Wulajilize, ase ho cinozwe wana wo Mulungu.
Alu vyono muli wana, u Mulungu yamutuma u Muhe wo Mwanagwe mu zinhumbula zetu, u Muhe mono kacemaga, “Aba,” wo wutya “Baba.”
Holeka alu agwe si wuli muwanda kanyhi, langa wuli mwana. Na vyono wuli mwana, holeka kozibocela zose zono u Mulungu yawawiciye i wanagwe.
I katali vyono mwali si mumumanyile u Mulungu, holeka mwayitumamilaga milungu yono si milungu ye mbeka.
Ninga alu vyono mwakondya kumumanya u Mulungu, lunji citye vyono mwakondya kumanyika no Mulungu, alu nhawule kanyhi mukuwuya ne nyuma no kuyitumamila kanyhi myuhe ayilya miciwa kanyhi yisoceye?
Mukuvicelelela i vilo, ne myezi, ne madaha, ne myaka!
Ane nghogopa ku soko, yilece kuwa lunji u mulimo wono netuma muli nyenye, wuwe wusina cambuzi.
Wandugu zangu, nghumunenenyi mweze mwinha nene, nha vyono nane ninha nyenye. Si mwanozeza wubi wo wose.
Mumanyile nha vyono u wutamwa wangu wo wamhela cilejeho co kumuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu ha lulongozi.

Hamba nhavivyo mwidaha lilyo si mwambedegala hamba kusemuna ku soko yo wusocele wangu, hamba muwe mwajelwa ho munoze nhavivyo, ninga mwambocela nha malayika wo Mulungu, kotya nha nali nawa yo Kilisito Yesu mweneco.
Nha mwali musangalaye, alu kanyhi cejela cici? Nghulonga mbeka, vyono mwipango lilyo mwali musume kugawusa meso genyu mumhele nene.
Alu ma! Neza nili mulugu wenyu vyono nghumulonjelenyi i mbeka?
Wawo i wanhu wanji wakumuhilenyi, ninga wuhile wawo si wuswanu. Wakuhila kumutemanulenyi na ane, ho muwendeze weneco, nha vyono wene wakumwendezenyi nyenye.
Heya, yene mbeka yo nghani swanu nhondo zose, hono wuwe no wuhile kwa wanji so ziswanu, kanyhi si mu cipango du cono ane nghali nili hamonga nanye.
Mo wanangu, ane kanyhi nghumugazicilenyi muno nha vyono kagazikaga mucekulu mono yali magulu mazito mu cipango co kusawa, sunga Kilisito yalaza kuwa yalunzwa muli nyenye.
Yali yiwe yili ciba hono nali niwe hamonga nanye alu, ho nhuje wuwe wono wusikame muli nyenye. Hambi nha nina mahwele menji ku soko yenyu.
Munonjelaje ta, anye mono mukali kusaka kutemwa no Wulajilize, Wulenyi muwuhulice u Wulajilize vyono wukutya?
Yandicigwe mu Mandiko Gono Gelile, vyono Abulahamu yali yena wana wejete, yumonga yali mwana wo mucekulu u muwanda, na we kejete yali wo mucekulu mono yali si muwanda.
Ayulya wo mucekulu muwanda yalelwa nha vyono yizoweywe, langa ayulya wo mucekulu mono yali si muwanda, yalelwa so cilagane co Mulungu.

I zinghani zizo zikuwa nha hwani, i wacekulu wawo wejete yo hwani ye vilagane vyejete, i cilongozi co acilya cono canozezwa mwitunda lya Sinayi, ne hanhu hayo yo Hagali, ne wanagwe walelelwaga mu wuwanda.
Nayo Hagali yakuwa nha lyo litunda lya Sinayi lyono lili ku Alabiya, nayo yo hwani ya Yelusalemi ya lulu yono yili mu wuwanda hamonga ne wanagwe.
Ninga Yelusalemi ya ku wulanga, lye'kaya lilelele, nayo yo nyina yetu ase.

Hambi nha yandikwe: “Wusecelele go mugumba mono si kulelaga wuzoze, wulile so nyemo agwe mono wusina wusungu wo kulela hambi i wana wa ayulya mono yalecigwe nha wenji, wacizize wa ayulya mono yena mulume.”
Holeka alu wandugu zangu, anye muli wana wo Mulungu, so cilagane cakwe, nha vyono yali Isaka.
Ninga nha vyono yinha mu vilo vivilya u mwana yuyulya mono yalelwa nha vyono yizoweywe, yamuwingaga ayulya mono yalelwa kwe vilungo vyo Muhe wo Mulungu, vyo yinha nhavivyo na mu vilo vivi.

Ninga I Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya nhawule? Gakutya nhavi, “Wumuwingaje u mucekulu muwanda hamonga no mwanagwe, hambi u mwana wo muwanda nha si kosuma kuhala hamonga no mwana wo mucekulu mono si muwanda.”
Holeka wandugu zangu, ase si cili wana wo muwanda, langa wo mucekulu mono si muwanda.
Mu wulelele, Kilisito mo yaciwika, nayo yakasaka mo cikalaje mumo. Holeka mwime mukamile hamba mulece kuvumila kanyhi kuwa mu wuwanda.
Ta muhulicize! Yo nene Pawulo mono nghulongana nanye, nghutya, Hono muvumile walame, wo wutya, Kilisito si komukwilenyi co cose.
Nghumulonjelenyi kanyhi calinze, vyono, muli wose mono kosuma kuvumila kwalama yowa yimunojeye yawibate u Wulajilize wose.
Holeka hono mukulanjilila muvumililwe hali Mulungu mu nzila yo Wulajilize, hodu mwakondya kwiwagula muli Kilisito, mweza muli kunze ye lihewa lyo Mulungu.
Ninga ku lubavu lwetu ase, cikulindila ko witumbilo vyono, covumilwa hali Mulungu kwe vilungo vyo Muhe, mu nzila yo wihuwilo.
Hambi hono ciwe cakondya kuwa muli Kilisito Yesu, kwalama hamba wula kwalama, mose musina cambuzi, i nghani yono yina cambuzi, wo wihuwilo wono wukwitumila mulimo mu wendo.
I mijendele yenyu nha yali miswanu, alu mono yamwimilenyi ho mulece kuyihulika i mbeka, yo nani?
Mono yakuwuleta u wuwe wuwo, yo si Mulungu mono yamucemenyi.
“I cisase cidodo cikuwa kuswaza lizanga lyose lyo wusaje.”

Ku soko yo wilunze wetu no Muwaha, holeka nina witumbilo wuwaha vyono nanye si mowa kanyhi no wuwe wunji wono wisimajiye no wuwe wangu. Nayo yuyo mono yakumwivyajizenyi hamba yawe vyono yenha, u Mulungu komulipiciza.

Ane ku lubavu lwangu, anye mo wandugu zangu, hono niwe nghali kuganula vyono yinojeye kwalama, alu nhawule nghali kuwingwa-wingwa? Hamba nhavivyo u wuganule wangu muli zo musalaba wa Kilisito, si wali wulete cevu co cose.
Nali nyende wawo wono wakumwivyajizenyi, wetemanje.
Hambi anye mo wandugu zangu, nha mwacemelwa wulelele. Ninga u wulelele wuwo wulece kuwa cikojelo co kutemwa ne masulumizi ga mononze. Langa munojeye mweze kwiyitumamila mu wendo.
Hambi u Wulajilize wose nha wukuwa kufisilizwa mu nghani monga du, nayo yoyi, “Wumwendaje u muyago nha vyono wiyendile go mweneco.”
Ninga hono mukwiyiluma kanyhi mukwiyilya kotya malimu, ale mulanjilile, mulece kwiyimala nyenye wose.
Holeka ane nghutya nhavi, i mijendele yenyu yeze kulongozwa no Muhe, nanye ho si motyatizya lukulu i masulumizi ga mononze.

Hambi i masulumizi ga mono'nze, nha vipinganaga no wuhile wo Muhe, no wuhile wo Muhe nawo, vipinganaga no wuhile we masulumizi ga mono'nze. Ne zinghani zizo zi nyejete si zikuwa kubitana hamonga, ku soko yiyo holeka si mosuma kwituma zono mwali mwende nyenye nyo weneco.
Na hono mutongwe no Muhe, si mowa kanyhi mu Wulajilize.
Ale, ne metumo ge ciyinze yinze nha gali calinze; nago nha goga, wusenyha, wavu, yihede,
wukumbika vihwani, wuhawi, sili, wugombane, wivu, makuwo, wukowela, wiwanganile, ciyagalo,

simbili, wukolwe wo wujimbi, wubugu, na ganji gose gono genha gaga. Nghumulonjelenyi kanyhi nha vyono namula kumulonjelenyi, i wanhu wono wakwituma gono genha gago, si wokwinjila mu wutemi wo Mulungu.
Ninga zono zikwijela so wutongwa no Muhe, wo wendo, nyemo, mulamu, wukangalizi, wuswanu, wucemezi, wihuwilwa,
wupolo no wiyimile. Hasina u Wulajilize wono wukusuma kuzimila zizi.
I wakwe Kilisito, wakondya kuwuwulaga u wuwe wawo we ciyinze-yinze hamonga ne mahweso gayo i mabi ne masulumizi gayo.
Holeka hono cikale mu wutazi wo Muhe, ciwutyatyaje no wutonji wayo.
Cilece kuwa cili wedunhumuzi, cilece kwisagala, hamba kwiyiwonela wivu.

Wandugu zangu, hono mumuwone munhu yunji yasutizye, anye mono mukutongwa no Muhe, mumukagaje u munhu yuyo ho yenozeleze, ninga mumunozeze nhavivyo ko wupolo, akuno mukwilanjilila nyenye nyo weneco ho mulece kwinjila mu majelo.
Mwidinghuzaje zono zikumuvunenyi mu mikalile yenyu, na nhavivyo, ho mowufisiliza u Wulajilize wa Kilisito.
Munhu hono yewone kotya nha yali cinji, na kumbe ho si yali cinji, yuyo yakwikonga mweneco.
Ninga yinojeye munhu wo wose yeyipime viswanu i mikalile yakwe mweneco. Hono yiwe miswanu, ho kowa na co kwilumbila muli cono yetumile mweneco, hamba kowa yasina soko yo kwiling'aniza na munhu yunji.
Hambi u munhu wo wose nha yena u mutegulo wakwe mweneco wono yawudinghuye.
Ninga mono yakwijizwa i nghani yo Mulungu, vihanje no mwijizi wakwe mu ziswanu zose zono yena.
Mulece kukongwa, u Mulungu si wakunozeza nzwaji. Cono u munhu yakucihadika, co cico du co kolodudula kanyhi.
Mono yakuhadika ze masulumizi ge ciyinze-yinze, kolodudula mumo wuhodanjice, ninga hono yahadice zo Muhe, kolodudula mu Muhe u wumi we cibitilila.
Holeka cilece kukatala mu wituma ziswanu, ku soko hono cilece kukatala, codudula i nhwanga mu cipango cayo.
Holeka lono cikali cina cilejeho, yicinojeye ciwatendele wanhu wose i ziswanu, na ko muno i wandugu zetu wa mu wihuwilo wetu.
Lanjenyi ta, vyono nyandice na mandiko mawaha gono nimwandicilenyi nene no mweneco no muwoko wangu.

Wawo wono wakusaka kwilajila nha vyono waswanu so metumo go muwili, wo wawo wono wakuhila kumudindimizenyi nanye mwalame. Nawo wakunoza nhavivyo ku soko ya nghani monga du, nha cinji weneco ho walece kuwinjilizwa ku so musalaba wa Kilisito.
Hambi sunga na wawo du weneco wono walame, nha si wakuwibata u Wulajilize, alu wakuhila anye mwalame ho wawe ne citanjilo co kwilumbila mu miwili yenyu.
Ninga ane si nokwilumbila muli cinji co cose, hono si mu musalaba wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito langa, ku soko mu nzila yo musalaba wuwo, yiyo yinze yikawulagwa kuli nene, nane nghawulagwa kuli yinze.
Holeka kwalama hamba wuleka kwalama si cinji yaye, langa u wuwumbwe wupya co cinhu ciwaha.
Na wose wono wakuwutyatya u wotonji wuwu, u mulamu no lusungu vyeze muli wene, kanyhi u mulamu no lusungu vyeze kuli Waisilayeli i wahagulwa wo Mulungu.
Vyono nghulawa lulu, yunji yalece kungaza kanyhi, hambi ane nha ndinghuye mu muwili wangu mitozo ya Yesu.
Ilihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito liwezane nanye wandugu zangu. Heya.
Yo nene Pawulo u mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu so wuhile wo Mulungu, nghumwandicilenyi nyenye mo wanhu wo Mulungu mono muli ku [Efeso,] mo wehuwilwa mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
Nghumulombelenyi lihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu na kuli Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
Alenyi cimulumbe u Mulungu u Sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito! Hambi mu wilunza na Kilisito, mumo mo yacimotezye ko kucipela ivipegwa vyose vye cimuhe kulawa ku wulanga.
U Mulungu yacihagula lono yinze yali yikali si nawumbwa, ho ciwe cili wakwe mu wilunza na Kilisito, ho ciwe celile mono cisina hamba yilema hali mwene, ku soko yo wendo wakwe.
U Mulungu yali yehwesize ku wulawa mwa mulizo vyono yacilete kwakwe ho ciwe wakwe mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito. Vyo yali yendile na vyo yali yehwesize.
Ninga cimukumyaje u Mulungu ku soko ye lihewa lyakwe lyo lukumyo muli Mwanagwe mwendece.
Hambi nha cikukombozezwa mu sakami ya Kilisito, nha cinji u wubi wetu wukuwuswa, nhavivyo vyo winha u wuwaha we lihewa lyakwe,
lyono yacipela lisina cipimo! Kwe mahala no wumanye wakwe wose.
U Mulungu yacifisiliza cicilya cono yali yatemizye, yakacimanyiza zo wuhile wakwe wono wali wihundice, wono yali yewikanize kuwufisiliza mu nzila ya Kilisito.
U wuhile wuwo wono yali yawufisilize mwi'daha lyayo, wo wukongholeza hamonga iviwumbwa vyose, ho yavitowelele vyose viwe muli Kilisito, vya ku wulanga na vya kono'nze.

Ivinhu vyose vinozezwaga mu wuhile no wulamuzi wo Mulungu, nayo u Mulungu yakacihagula ase, ho ciwe wanhu wakwe mu wendo wakwe, so wilunze wetu na Kilisito, ku soko yo wutemye wakwe wo wulawa mwamulizo.
Holeka ase mono calongola kumwitumbila Kilisito, yicinojeye cilukumyaje u lukumyo lo Mulungu!

Nanye nyo wanhu we makungugo ganji, mwayihulika inghani ye Mbeka, wo wutya u Luganuzi Luswanu lono lwamuletelenyi u wukombozwe, mukamwihuwila Kilisito, nayo u Mulungu yakamuwicilenyi citanjilo so kumupelenyi u Muhe Mono Yelile mono yacihuwiziza, ho yalajile vyono ase cili wakwe.
Yuyo Muhe co cipingo co kuzibocelela zose zono u Mulungu yawehuwiziza iwanhu wakwe, ne nghani yiyi yo yikucimanyiza vyono u Mulungu kowakombozeza lukulu wose iwakwe. Cilukumyaje u lukumyo lwakwe!
Ku soko yiyi, nane naza kuhulika muli zo wihuwilo wenyu kuli u Muwaha Yesu, no wendo wenyu kuli wanhu wo Mulungu,
nghali si ninaleka kumulumba u Mulungu ku soko yenyu. Kanyhi nghumukumbucilenyi mu wulombe wangu,
ho u Mulungu wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito u sogo wo lukumyo, yamupelenyi u Muhe wakwe mono komupelenyi wizuce, no kumugubulilenyi ho mumumanye u Mulungu.
Nghumulomba u Mulungu yazidigule izinhumbula zenyu ho zisume kuwuwona u wuzelu wakwe, ho musume kuwutanga u witumbilo wono yamucemelenyi, no lukumyo luwaha lwe vipegwa vyono yawawicila iwanhu wakwe,
ho muvimanye ivilungo vyakwe vyono viwaha muno muno ku soko yetu sese mono cihuwiye. I vilungo vivyo vyono vikwituma mulimo muli sese, viling'aniye ne vilungo avilya iviwaha muno,
vyono vyamuzukulila Kilisito muli wafu, yakamwikaza u kulume kwakwe ku wulanga.
Na kuko Kilisito yatemile muli walongola wose, no wuwaha, ne vilungo, ne cisumisumi cose, nayo yatemile mu wutambule wo wose wono wudahile kuwa mono yinze yiyino, sunga na mu yinze yono yikuza.
U Mulungu yakaviwika vyose ha magulu gakwe hasi, yakamuwika mwi Kanisa ho yawe muwaha muli vyose.
Ilikanisa wo muwili wa Kilisito, no wukwilanicile nha wakwe mweneco mono yakuvikwilaniciza ivinhu vyose, hanhu hose.
Nanye mwali mufwiye ku soko ye masutya no wubi wenyu.

Na mwipango lilyo mwekalilaga mu mikalile mibi ya mononze yiyi, nanye mukawa mukumuhulika u muwaha wo muhe mubi we vilungo wa mu mwanya, wo muhe wono wuwatemile alu, iwanhu wono si wakumuhulika u Mulungu.

Hamba na sese cali cinha cinya wawo, cawutyatyaga u wusulumizi wetu we ciyinze yinze, no kwituma zinghani zizilya zono zayendezaga imiwili yetu ne mahala getu, kuciyinze yinze, vyono wenha wene nhavivyo na sese, ilikuwo lyo Mulungu lyali licinojeye licagane.
Ninga u Mulungu yo munya u lusungu lwinji. Yacenda ko wendo wuwaha,
hamba yiwe cali cifwiye ku cimuhe ku soko yo wubi wetu, yaciwumifya hamonga na Kilisito. Na ku so ilihewa lyo Mulungu, nanye mwaponywa.
Ku soko yo wilunza na Kilisito, Yesu, u Mulungu yacizukula hamonga nayo, ho cikateme hamonga nayo ku wulanga.
Nhavivyo vyo yenda kuwulajila kuli wanhu wa ku myaka yono yokuza, u wuwaha we lihewa lyakwe wono yacipela bwete so wilunze wetu na Kilisito Yesu.
Hambi nha mwakombozwa ku so lihewa lyo Mulungu mu nzila yo wihuwilo. Ne nghani yiyi si yili mu wuhidimbale wetu, langa cipegwa co Mulungu du.
Hamba si so metumo getu co weneco, ho munhu yalece kwilumba mu nghani yo yose.
Ase cili viwumbwa vyo Mulungu, na mu wilunze hamonga na Kilisito Yesu, yaciwumba ho cikale mu mikalile yo kwituma ziswanu, zono yaciwikaniziza cizitume.

Nanye mono ku cihuma cenyu, muli wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi, mono mukucemwa, “Wono si mwalame” ne Wayahudi wono wakiyitya “Walame” u walame wono wanozwa ne miwoko mu miwili yawo, ninga mukumbucile nanye vyono mwali katali.
Nanye lululya mwali mu musina Kilisito, mwali musiwanuce muli Waisilayeli, kanyhi mwali wejenzi, kanyhi mwali musina lifungu lyo lyose muli cilagane cicilya mu wihuwizo wuwulya.
Ninga alu vyono mwelunza na Kilisito Yesu, anye mono mwali kutali ha mwamulizo, mwasejelezezwa mu nzila ye sakami ya Kilisito.

Hambi Kilisito mweneco nha yo yaciletela u mulamu ko kuwanoza i Wayahudi ne wanhu wono si Wayahudi wawe nha ndugu monga. Yakalipambula ko muwili wakwe, i libupa lyono lyali liwatemanuye, no kuwaletela wulugu munhu na muyagwe.
Yakawuwusa u Wulajilize wuwulya we Wayahudi hamonga ne malajilizo gayo hamonga ne myoto yayo, na muli wawo iwejete yawawumbilize hamonga wawe munhu yumonga mupya mu wumonga na Yesu, no kunoza mulamu.
Kilisito yakawusiza lukulu u wulugu wawo, ko muwili wakwe, na ko musalaba wakwe yakawalunza wose vyono wejete wakawa ndugu monga, yakawalamula no Mulungu.
Hambi Kilisito nha yaza, yakaganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo mulamu kuli nyenye mo wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi mono mwali muli kutali no Mulungu, sunga na kuli Wayahudi wono wali wali behi no Mulungu.
Holeka mu nzila yakwe ase wose, Wayahudi na wono si Wayahudi, cosuma kumubitila Baba mu Muhe monga.
Holeka alu anye si muli wajenzi kanyhi, hamba si muli wanhu wakola nzila kanyhi, langa muli Wanyawusi hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu, kanyhi muli wanhu we Nyumba yo Mulungu.
Kanyhi muzenjigwe mu musinji wono wawikwa ne watumwa ne wawizi, nayo Yesu Kilisito mweneco lyo libwe lyo musinji.
U mwene yo yalibatilize ilizengo lyose no kuliwilusa sunga liwe Nyumba yo Mulungu yono yelile mu nzila yo Muwaha.
Nanye nhavivyo mu wilunza nayo, mukuzengwa hamonga ne wanhu wanji, ho muwe wikalo wo Mulungu mu nzila yo Muhe wakwe.
Ku soko yiyo holeka ane no Pawulo no muwopwa wa Kilisito Yesu ku soko ya nyenye mono si muli Wayahudi, nghumulomba u Mulungu.
Nitumbiye mwakondya kuhulika vyono u Mulungu, so lihewa lyakwe, yamhela u mulimo wuwu, niwitume so cambuzi cenyu.
Ane namanyizwa zizi mu nzila yo wugubulilwe wo wuhile wakwe wono wali wuhundicigwe. Nizandice kwa cifupi, izinghani zizi,
nanye kolo mukuzisoma izinghani zangu, mosuma kuwutanga u wumanye wangu wa muli zono zihundicigwe za muli Kilisito.
Zono katali wanhu si wamanyizwa, ninga alu u Mulungu yakondya kuwamanyiza iwatumwa, ne wawizi wakwe wono welile mu nzila yo Muhe.

Ne nghani yiyo yono yihundicigwe nha yoyi, vyono mu nzila yo Luganuzi Luswanu, iwanhu wono si Wayahudi mo wakutujila ilifungu lyawo hamonga ne Wayahudi muli zo wulugutwe wo Mulungu, wene nawo nha wali vilunzwa vyo muwili wuwulya, kanyhi wahanji wo wihuwizo wuwulya wono u Mulungu yawunoza mu nzila ya Kilisito Yesu.
Ane nanozwa ho niwe mwitumami wo Luganuzi Luswanu, ha nghango ye cipegwa ce lihewa lilya lyo Mulungu, lyono napegwa ha nghango yo witume we vilungo vyakwe.
Ane nili mudodo si nhe wanhu wo Mulungu wose, ninga napegwa ilihewa lyakwe, ho niwaganulile iwanhu wono si Wayahudi u wugoli wa Kilisito, wono wusina cipimo,
kanyhi ho niwalajile iwanhu wose wawone vyono wukufisilizwa u wuhile wo Mulungu wono wali wuhundicigwe. U Mulungu mono yaviwumba vinhu vyose, yayihundika inghani yakwe yiyo kulawa katali,
alu i wawaha ne vilungo vya ku wulanga ho vimanyizizwe mu nzila ye Likanisa, ho wasume kugamanya i mahala go Mulungu gono gena mihilimo minji.
U Mulungu yayituma inghani yiyo nha vyono wali winha u wutemye wakwe we cibitilila, wono yawunozeza muli Kilisito u Muwaha wetu.
Holeka mu wilunza na Kilisito, na mu nzila yo wihuwilo muli Kilisito, ase cikwijelela kumusejelela u Mulungu cisina woga.
Holeka nghumunenenyi, mulece kuyitukuwika i mitima yenyu, ku soko ye magayo gono nghugatuga ku soko yenyu, hambi gago nha gali ku soko yo lukumyo lwenyu.
Ku soko yiyo, holeka nane nghumufugamila u Sogo yo Munhu,
mono wo mwamulizo wa vyose vyono vili mono'nze na vya ku wulanga.
Nghumulomba u Mulungu, mu nghango yo wugoli wo lukumyo lwakwe, yamupelenyi u wusume wo Muhe wakwe, i vilungo vyo kuwa musikame mu wunhu wa mugati,
nayo Kilisito yekalaje mu zinhumbula zenyu ko wihuwilo. Nghumulomba muwe mukamile mu musinji wo wendo,
ho musume kumanya hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu wose, nha vyono winha u wendo wa Kilisito, vyono wutandalaga mu wugazi no wutali, no wima na hasi yayo.
Kanyhi muwumanye no wendo wa Kilisito, wono wucizize wumanye wose, ho mumemywe u wukwilanicile wose wo Mulungu.
Ale kuli yuyo mono kwe vilungo vyakwe vyono vikwituma mugati yetu, yasumile kwituma zimbaha zono zicizize kuli zono cidahile kulomba hamba kwihwesa,
kuli yuyo lweze lukumyo mu Kanisa na muli Kilisito Yesu, mu mapango gose sunga ku myaka ne cibitilila. Heya.
Holeka ane mono nili muwopwa ku soko vyono nghumwitumamila u Muwaha, nghumunenenyi mwikalilaje mu mikalile yono yiwunojeye u lucemo lwenyu lono mwacemelwa.
Mweze muli wenenenyhezi nhondo zose, muli wapolo, mwina ngola, mwiyikangalilaje nyenye wose mu wendo.
Muhidimbale kuwibata wumonga wono wukuletwa no Muhe so wukamisa u mulamu wono wuli muli nyenye.
Ko wuli muwili wumonga no Muhe monga nha vyono winha u witumbilo wumonga wono mwacemelwa no Mulungu.
Koyuli Muwaha monga, wihuwilo wumonga no wubaputizo monga,
ko yuli u Mulungu yumonga yo Baba wa wose, mono yali kucanyha ya wose, nayo yakwituma mulimo muli vyose, kanyhi yali muli vyose.
Ninga capegwa wose yihewa munhu na lwakwe, mu nghango ye cipimo cono yapegwa na Kilisito.
Nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko: “Lono yabitila ku wulanga yakasola mateka yakawagawila iwanhu vipegwa.”
Alu lono yikulongwa yabita kucanyha wo wutya nhawule? Nhunizo yayo yili nhavi, halulongozi yatima sunga hono hasi mono yinze.
Alu yuyo mono yatima baha hono yinze, yo yuyo mono yabita sunga kucanyha muno yo wulanga wose, ho yasume kuyimemya yinze.
Kanyhi yo mwene mono yawagawila iwanhu vipegwa. Wanji yakawawika wawe watumwa, wanji wawe wawizi, na wanji wawe waganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, na wanji wawe wadimi na wejizi.
Yanoza nhavivyo ho yawawikanize i wanhu wose wo Mulungu, ku soko yo mulimo wo kumwitumamila Kilisito ho muwili wa Kilisito wuzengwe.
Sunga cize ciwuficile u wumonga wo wihuwilo no kumumanya u Mwana wo Mulungu; ho ciwe wanhu wono cikangaye no kuwuficila u wukwilanicile wa Kilisito mweneco.
Ho cilece kuwa kanyhi nha wana, wono cowa kugumilwa no kupemheluswa ako na ako mu mbeho ye mejizo gono gakutulwa ne wanhu wakonji, ho wawajilize wanji ko wusugu.
Ninga hono ciyikamise i mbeka na nhumbula yo wendo, cocila kwihwana na Kilisito muli vyose, mono yo Muwaha,

na mu wutonji wakwe mo vikulunzizwa hamonga i vilunzwa vyose vyo muwili, no muwili wose wukwitumbila u wutazi we vilunzwa vyakwe. Holeka icilunzwa hono citume u mulimo waco nha vyono yinojeye, ale u muwili wose wukuwiluka no kwizenga weneco mu wendo.
Ale, nghumusugulenyi mwitagwa lyo Muwaha, mulece kujendelela kwikala kanyhi mu mikalile nha ye wanhu wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu, wono i mahweso gawo gaweza wulele,
ne mahala gawo gali mu wutitu. Wali kutali no wumi wo Mulungu, ku soko yo wulele wono wuli muli wene so cibede cawo.
Wajiliye kanyhi wasina cevu, welavizye kwi'hede, wetumamilaga ividaha vyawo vyose mu wituma imakani ga cevu.
Ninga anye alu vyo simweyijiza nhavivyo muli za Kilisito.
Ninga yimanyice vyono mwahulika zinghani zakwe, na vyono muli watyatyi wakwe, mukejizwa vyono yi mbeka yili muli Yesu.
Holeka mulecele lukulu i mikalile yenyu ye katali, u munhu muhuma mono yakuhodanjika so masulumizi go wukoci.
Mwinozaje wupya mu zinhumbula na mu mahala genyu.
Muwuvwalaje u wupya wo wunhu wono wawumbwa ku hwani yo Mulungu, wono wilajilaga mu mikalile ye mbeka, no wiling'ano no wele.
Holeka muwulekaje u wulambi, yinojeye mweze kulongana ze mbeka munhu na muyagwe, vyono ase wose cili vilunzwa vyo muwili wa Kilisito.
Na hono muwe mukoligwe ne likuwo, mulece kulumba ilikuwo lyenyu limutegulenyi ku wituma wubi, kanyhi mulece kwikala ne likuwo lyenyu sunga lizuwa liswa.
Mulece kumupela Setani cilejeho.
Mono yali muhizi, yalece kuhiza kanyhi, langa yanze kwituma i milimo miswanu kwe miwoko yakwe, ho yatuje cinhu co kumutuziza u muciwa.
Ne makani mabi galece kuhulikwa muli nyenye hamba hadodo, izinghani zenyu ziweze zono zina cambuzi nhondo zose, zono zikuwazenga no kuwataza wanji, ho ziwapele lihewa wono wakumuhulicizenyi.

Mulece kumukalaza u Muhe Mono Yelile wo Mulungu, hambi yuyo u Muhe nha yo citanjilo co Mulungu kuli nyenye, vyono anye muli wanhu wakwe, kanyhi co cihomelezi vyono ilizuwa lyokuza lono u Mulungu kolomukombozenyi.
Holeka mugalecelaje lukulu matemanuko, simbili, makuwo, mazozo, maligo, no wavu wose, viwucile lukulu muli nyenye.
Mweze na nhumbula swanu, mukwiwonela lusungu nyenye wose, mweze kwiyinenela nyenye wose nha vyono nayo u Mulungu yamunenelenyi nyenye mu nzila ya Kilisito.
Alu vyono muli wana wendece wo Mulungu, yimunojelenyi muwe nha vyono yenha Mwene.
Imikalile yenyu yeze kulongozwa no wendo, nha vyono Kilisito yacenda, yakelavya ku soko yetu cilavywa ce mhunjile swanu ne likumbiko lyono limwendezaga u Mulungu.
Ninga wusenyha, no wavu wose, hamba wusulumizi, vilece kutambulilwa lukulu muli nyenye, hambi nha vyo yinojeye kuli anye mo wana wo Mulungu.
Kanyhi i zinghani ze cevu, na zo wulele, na zo wiwanganile, zose zizo si nghani swanu kuli nyenye, langa yili ciba mweze kumulumba u Mulungu.

Kanyhi yinojeye mumanye vyono, musenyha, hamba mwavu, hamba u musulumizi (hambi u wusulumizi nha wo wukumbika vihwani,) hamba munhu wo wose mono yenha nhavivyo, si kosuma kutuga co cose mu wutemi wa Kilisito na wo Mulungu.
Mulece kumuvumila yunji yamukonjenyi na nghani zono zisina cambuzi, hambi nha ku soko ye zinghani zizo, ilikuwo lyo Mulungu likuwa kuwaziza iwana wono si wakumuhulika.
Holeka mulece kuhanga nawo.
Hambi ikatali nha mwali mu wutitu, ninga alu mweza muli mu wuzelu so wilunze wenyu no Muwaha. Holeka mwikalaje nhe wana wo wuzelu,
hambi imana go wuzelu nha gali mu wuswanu wose no wiling'ano ne mbeka.
Mujele kuzimanya za hayi zono zikumwendeza u Muwaha,
kanyhi mulece kuhanga mu metumo ge citi gono si ganojeye, ninga mugawikaje mu wuzelu.
Hambi izinghani zono zitumwaga cinyele, nha cevu hamba kuzilonga.
Ninga izinghani zose zono zitumilwaga mu wuzelu, imbeka yayo yiwezaga yili cagalanze.
Na co cose cono cikwanzalikwa cikuwa wuzelu. Na co cikuleka i Mandiko gakutya, “Wusinhuce agwe mono wugonile: Kanyhi wuzuce muli wafu nayo Kilisito kokubulilila.”
Ale mwilanjililaje mu mikalile yenyu. Mulece kwikala nhe walele, langa nha we mahala.
Mucitumamilaje viswanu i cilejeho cono mwina naco, ku soko alu i vilo avi vyaweza vibi.
Holeka mulece kuwa walele, ninga mujele kuzimanya zono zikumwendeza u Muwaha.
Mulece kugala wujimbi, hambi wuwo nha wuletaga i mikalile ye caka caka, langa mweze mumemile u Muhe Mono Yelile.
Mweze kwiduwanila nyenye wose mu zinghani za mu Zabuli, na nyimbo no wimbe we cinya Muhe, mumwimbile u Muwaha zinyimbo na Zabuli, mukumulumba mu zinhumbula zenyu.
Mumulumbaje u Mulungu Baba nhondo zose ku soko ya zose, mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Mweze kwiyihulika nyenye wose ku soko yo kumogopa Kilisito.
Iwacekulu wawahulikaje iwalume zawo nha kotya kumuhulika Muwaha.
Hambi u mulume nha yo yena uwulajilize kuli mugolece wakwe, nha vyono nayo Kilisito yena wulajilize mwi Kanisa, nayo Kilisito mweneco yo kayikombozaga Kanisa nha cinji u muwili wakwe.
Alu nha vyono Likanisa likumuhulika Kilisito, ale nhavivyo ne wacekulu wawahulikaje walume zawo muli zose.
Nanye mo walume muwendaje iwagolece zenyu nha vyono Kilisito yalyenda Likanisa, yakelavya mweneco cilavywa ku soko ye Likanisa.
Yanoza nhavivyo ho yalyezeze mu nghani yakwe, yaliwice siya kuli Mulungu, lono yakondya kulyeza ko kulihovuga kwe malenga,
ho yetujile Likanisa lyono lyelile, na lyono yiswanu, Likanisa lyono lisina manamha manamha hamba cilema, hamba ganji go gose gono genha gaga.
Holeka yiwanojeye i walume wawende iwagolece zawo nha vyono wayendile imiwili yawo weneco. Mono yamwendile u mugolece wakwe, ye yendile mweneco.
Hambi nha kusina munhu mono yawusulile u muwili wakwe mweneco, langa yakuwulisa kanyhi yakuwuvwika. Nhavivyo na Kilisito nayo vyo yakulidima Likanisa,
hambi ase nha cili vilunzwa vyo muwili wakwe.
Nha vyono gakulonga i Mandiko Gono Gelile, “Ku soko yiyo u mulume kowaleka u Sogwe no nyina, vilunze no mugolece wakwe, nawo vyono wejete wowa muwili monga.”
Mu zinghani zizi moyili i mbeka yono yihundikwe mumo, nane nghuwona vyono yidomile kuli Kilisito ne Likanisa lyakwe.
Ninga zikumupamizenyi na nyenye nhavivyo, vyono yimunojeye mulume wo wose yamwende mugolece wakwe nha vyono ye yendile mweneco, nayo u mucekulu, yimunojeye yamogope u mulume wakwe.
Mo wana, muwahulice walezi wenyu mu Cikilisito, hambi yiyi nha yo nghani swanu.
“Wuwogopaje u sogo no nyina yako,” ali lye 'lajilizo lilongozi lyono lyonjelezwe no wihuwizo, nha cinji,
“Ho wumote no kwikala myaka minji mononze.”
Nanye mo wasogo za munhu, mulece kuwasagala iwana wenyu mu nzila yo kuwakoza makuwo, langa muwalelelaje mu cogopo na mu mafundo ge Cikilisito.
Nanye mo wawanda, muwahulice iwawaha wenyu wa baha mononze kwa cogopo no wucicime, mweze kunoza nhavivyo na mitima mizelu kotya nha mukumwitumamila Kilisito.
Mulece kwituma nhavivyo lono wakumulanjenyi ho mwiyendeze kuli wene, langa mwitumaje kwe mitima yenyu nha vyono yendile u Mulungu, vyono anye muli wetumami wa Kilisito.
Mulece kwituma ku soko ye wanhu, langa mweze mwiwikanize kwituma ku soko yo Muwaha.
Mweze kukumbucila vyono munhu wo wose mono yakwituma ziswanu, kolobocela ziswanu kulawa kuli Muwaha, hamba yawe muwanda, hamba yawe munhu mono si muwanda,

Nanye mono mukwitumamilwa, muwatendelaje nhavivyo wawanda wenyu, mulece kuwogofya. Mweze kukumbucila vyono anye na wene nhavivyo, wose mwina u Muwaha yuyulya yumonga wa ku wulanga, mono lilumbo lyo munhu si cinji kuli mwene.
Ze ndumilizo, nghumusacenyi mweze muli vilungo muli Muwaha na ko wutazi we vilungo vyakwe viwaha.
Muvwale i vitwalo vyono u Mulungu yakumupelenyi, ho musume kuwimila u wusugu wose wa Setani.
Hambi u wulugu wetu nha si cikwihoma ne wanhu, langa cikwihoma ne litewa lyavu lya mu yinze ye cimuhe, cikwihoma ne watemi, ne wawaha na wono wena i vilungo, wono wayitemile i yinze yiyi ye citi.
Ku soko yiyo holeka muvwale vitwalo vyo Mulungu, ilizuwa lilyo kolo lyeza kufika, ho musume kuwimila u wihomi wo mulugu, na lono muwe mwehoma sunga ko ku mudumo, mwijele mukali mukamile.
Ale mwimaje mukamile! Ne mbeka yeze nha musipi mu viwino vyenyu, no wiling'ano weze nha civwalo co kumwimilenyi mu zimhambaga zenyu.
No wusaka kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu lo mulamu, wuweze nha malatu mu migulu yenyu.
Ninga ko muno, u wihuwilo, wuweze nha ngula mu miwoko yenyu nhondo zose, ho yimutazenyi kuzizimya i zisonga zo moto za ayulya u mubi.
Muyibocelaje mhonelo ho yiwe nha kofiya yenyu ya cuma, ne nghani yo Mulungu yiwe nha mumaje wono mukupegwa no Muhe Mono Yelile.
Mweze kulomba nhondo zose, mukulomba u wutazi wo Mulungu. Mweze kulomba madaha gose mu vilungo vyo Muhe. Mwikalaje meso, mulece kukatala, mukuwalombela i wanhu wose wo Mulungu.
Munombelaje na nene nha vivyo, lono nghuduwa, ho Mulungu yamhele cono nolonga, ho sume kuwamanyiza i wanhu sina woga, inghani yono yihundikwe yo Luganuzi Luswanu.
Ane nili mutumwa ku soko ya lulo Luganuzi Luswanu hamba niwe alu nili mu jela. Ale lombenyi ho sume kuwa sina woga mu wuganule nha vyono yinojeye.
U ndugu yetu mwendece Tukiko no mwitumami mwihuwilwa muli Muwaha, komulonjelenyi zangu zose, ho musume kumanya cono nghwituma.
Alu nghumutuma yaze kuko kwenyu, ho yamulolosezenyi za kono kwetu, nanye ho musindamikwe mu zinhumbula zenyu.
Nghulomba mulamu wuwe muli nyenye we zindugu wose, hamonga no wendo, no wihuwilo wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu Baba na kuli u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
Nghulomba, ilihewa lyo Mulungu liweze muli wose wono wamwendile u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito ko wendo wono wusina ndumilizo.
Yo nene Pawulo na Timoteyo, i wetumami wa Yesu Kilisito, cikumwandicilenyi anye nyo wanhu wo Mulungu kuko ku Filipi, mono mwalunzwa na Kilisito Yesu, hamonga nanye mo walongola ne watazi mu Kanisa.
Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu Sogo yetu, no kulawa kuli Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
Nghumulumba u Mulungu wangu kolo nghumukumbucilenyi ho hose,
na kolo nghumulombelenyi wose, nghulomba nina nyemo,
ku soko nha vyono mwanhaza mu mulimo wo Luganuzi Luswanu ku wulawilila mwi'zuwa alilya lilongozi sunga izuwali.
Holeka nitumbiye vyono, u Mulungu mono yawanza u mulimo wuwu muswanu muli nyenye, kowujendeleza sunga ko ku wukondelecele mwi'zuwa lilya lya Kilisito Yesu.

Na vyo yinojeye nimwihwesezenyi, hambi nha nghumukumbucilenyi nhondo zose mu nhumbula yangu. Hambi na nyenye wose, nha muhanjile na nene, mwi'hewa lyono yamhela u Mulungu ho nilutetele no kulukangaza u Luganuzi Luswanu, mwi'daha lili lono nili mu jela, na kanyhi sunga na bahalya ha lulongozi lono nali nghali nawopwa mu jela.
U Mulungu yamanyile vyono nghulonga mbeka, lono nghukangaza vyono, so wendo wuwulya du wa Yesu Kilisito, nghuhila muno kumuwonenyi.
U wulombe wangu wowu, nghulomba u wendo wenyu wucile konjelezeka muno muno, hamonga no wumanye we mbeka, hamonga no wutanje wose,
ho musume kuhagula zinghani ziswanu. Baho ho mowa mwina nhumbula nzelu, kanyhi musina yilema sunga ko Kwi'zuwa lya Kilisito.
I mikalile yenyu yomemywa zose zono zili mbeka na swanu, zono Yesu Kilisito mweneco kosuma kumupelenyi, ku soko yo lukumyo ne lilumbo lyo Mulungu.
Ale wandugu zangu, nghuhila mumanye vyono, zose zono zanyagana, zanhaza muno mu wujendeleza u Luganuzi Luswanu.
Hambi nha ku soko ya zizo, i walindilizi wose we likulu, hamonga na wanji wose wa baha, wamanyile vyono nili mu jela, ku soko vyono ane nghumwitumamila Kilisito.
Na wuwu wuwopwe wangu wawanoza we zindugu wenji wawe no wihuwilo muli Muwaha, sunga wakucila kuwa ne vilungo mu wuganula i nghani yo Mulungu wasina woga.
Yili mbeka, ho wali wayawo wanji wono wakumuganula Kilisito ku soko vyono wena wivu, kanyhi wo wanhu wono wendile wugombane, ninga wanji wakumuganula Kilisito kwa mutima muzelu.
Awa wakwituma nhavivyo ko wendo, hambi nha wamanyile vyono u Mulungu yo yamhelile u mulimo wuwu wo kulutetela u Luganuzi Luswanu.
Ninga wawo wanji wakumuganula Kilisito ko wisumanize hamba si kwa nhumbula nzelu, wakuganiciza nha vyono wonyonjelezeza i magayo mu wuwopwe wangu.

Ale du kanyhi, si nghani yaye, ninga ane nghusangalala vyono ceza cili wanhu mono cikumuganula Kilisito mu zinzila zose, hono yiwe mu mutima muswanu, hamba mu mutima mubi. Kanyhi nojendelela kusangalala.
Hambi nha manyile vyono, so wulombe wenyu na ku so wutazi wo Muhe wa Yesu Kilisito ane nokombozwa.

U wuhile wangu no witumbilo wangu, ho ndece kulemwa mu wufisiliza u mulimo wangu, langa nojendelela kuwa na nhumbula yono yikamile mu mapango gose na ko muno mwipango lili, ho mu mikalile yangu yose, hono niwe nghali mumi hamba hono niwe nafwa, nimutujile Kilisito lilumbo.
Hambi wumi co cici? Ane ku lubavu lwangu, ku wikala mumi nha Kilisito, na ku wufwe kukuleta cambuzi ciwaha.
Ninga hono mu wikala mumi nosuma kwituma u mulimo wono wina cambuzi ciwaha, baho nhondo cono nokwihaga co si manyile!
Ninga ha mwande yangu ho zili nghani nyejete. Nghusulumila kuwuka mu wumi wuwu, ho nghekale hamonga na Kilisito, hambi nha yo nghani swanu muno,
ninga hono njendelele kwikala mumi, yo nghani yono yina cambuzi muno kuli nyenye.
Kanyhi nina witumbilo so nghani yiyi, manyile vyono nojendelela kwikala mumi hamonga na nyenye wose, ho sume kuwonjeleza u wujendelele wenyu ne nyemo mu wihuwilo.
Ale nilaza kuwa hamonga nanye kanyhi, ho mowa mwina soko yo kwilumbila muli nene mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.

Ninga nghani mbaha yoyi, i mikalile yenyu yiweze yilunojeye u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito, nane hono sume kuza kwenyu, hamba ndece kusuma kuza, hulice vyono mwimile mukamile mwina nhumbula monga, na vyono mukwihoma no wulugu muli hamonga, kanyhi mwina no mutima wumoga ku soko yo wihuwilo wo Luganuzi Luswanu.
Mulece kuwogopa walugu wenyu, langa mweze muli vilungo nhondo zose, na yiyo yo yomukangazizenyi vyono wene wosumwa, anye mosuma, hambi u Mulungu mweneco nha yo yakumupelenyi u wusume.
Hambi anye nha mwapegwa cipegwa co kumwitumamila Kilisito, si so kumwihuwila du, langa na so kugazwa ku soko yakwe nhavivilya.
Alu mudahile kuwa hamonga nane mu wihomi wo wulugu. U wulugu wuwuno, wo wulugu wuwulya wono mwawuwona cikwihoma nawo bahalya ha mwamulizo, na nghali kwihoma nawo sunga na lulu nha vyono mukuhulika.

Alu wulenyi mikalile yenyu ya muli Kilisito, yikumupelenyi vilungo? Hamba wendo wakwe wukumusindamicenyi? Aluno ma, mwina wumonga no Muhe Mono Yelile, kanyhi mukwiwonela lusungu no kwikalalila nyenye wose?
Ale muyifisilizizaje i nyemo yangu mu wuwa na mutima monga, wendo monga, nhumbula monga no wuhile wumonga.
Mulece kwitumila nghani yo yose mu mutima wo wivu, hamba mu widunhumuzi wa bwete, mweze mwina winenenyhezi nyenye wose, na munhu wo wose yamuwonaje muyagwe yo yamucizize lilumbo sinha mweneco.
Halece kuwa na yunji mono yakulondola cambuzi cakwe mweneco du, langa cambuzi co muyagwe.
Muweze no wuwe wuwulya wono yali yena nawo Kilisito Yesu.
U Mwene ku cihuma, nhondo zose yali Mulungu ninga si yehwesa vyono u wuwa sawa no Mulungu ceze nha cinhu cono cidahile kudindimilwa kwa vilungo.
Ninga yakenda kuzileka zizo zose mweneco, yakasola u wuwe wo mwitumami, yakawa yenha wanhu yakehwana kotya wanhu.
Yakenenenyheza, yakawa na cihuliko sunga ko ku wufwe, heya, wufwe wa mu musalaba.
Holeka u Mulungu yakamukumya muno yakamupela i litagwa lyono licizize i matagwa gose.
Ku so lilumbo lye litagwa lya Yesu ho vinhu vyose vya ku wulanga, na vya kono'nze na vya kusi ye yinze, vifugame hamwande yakwe,
Na munhu wo wose yavumile vyono Yesu Kilisito yo Muwaha, mu lukumyo lo Mulungu Baba.

Ale anye wendece wangu, lono nali nili hamonga nanye, mwahulikaga nhondo zose, sunga na lulu hambe nili kutali nanye, anye mujendelele ne cihuliko. Mweze kwituma milimo akuno mwina ne cogopo no wucicime ku soko ye mhonelo yenyu,
hambi u Mulungu nha yo ketumaga u mulimo muli nyenye nhondo zose, no kumupelenyi u wusume wo kusaka no kufisiliza zose zono zili mu wulunji wo wuhile wakwe mweneco.
Mwitumaje zose akuno musina wung'ung'ulice hamba wiwanganile,

ho muwe wanhu waswanu, wono wasina yilema, kanyhi mweze watelevu nha wana wo Mulungu wono wekaye mu yinze yiyi yo wubi yono yajiliye. Mobulila muli wene, kotya i zinyelezi vyono zikuwa kuwumulika u wulanga,

hono muyibate mukamile i nghani yo wumi. Nane baho ho notujila i nghani yo kwilumbila mwizuwa lilya lya Kilisito, hambi nha ho yolokwijelela vyono u wuhidimbazi wangu hamonga no mulimo wangu si vyajilila bwete.
Ninga hamba ndavywe hamonga no wihuwilo wenyu wono lye kumbiko kuli Mulungu, hodu nosecelela muno kanyhi nosangalalana na nyenye wose mu nyemo yiyo.
Holeka na nyenye nhavivyo, yiwanojeye musecelele no kusangalalana nane mu nyemo yenyu.
Mu wilunze no Muwaha, nina witumbilo vyono nosuma kumutuma Timoteyo kuko kwenyu vilo vivi, ho sinyhimale nane kolo nghumanya zenyu.
Hambi nha sina munhu yunji mono yenha yuyo, mono kozilanjilila zenyu nha yuyu.
Hambi wanji wose nha wakulondola i zawo weneco, si nho kulondola za Yesu Kilisito.
Nyenye weneco mumanyile vyono Timoteyo yakamile, u mwene na nene, cihwanile vyono yenha u mwana no sogwe, cali kwitumama hamonga ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu.
Holeka nitumbiye vyono nomutuma yaze kuko kwenyu nila neza kuwona vyono zowa zinha.
Nane nitumbiye muli Muwaha vyono si noleka kuza kuko kwenyu vilo vivi.
Ninga nawona cinojele nimutumilenyi ndugu yetu Epafulodito, u mwitumami muyangu no mulewani muyangu, mono mwanhumila, nayo yakanhaza mu visakwa vyangu.
Yena wuhile wuwaha wo kumuwonenyi nyenye wose, nayo yakukalala muno nha vyono mwahulika yali yatamigwe.
Heya nha yali yatamigwe behi no kufwa. Ninga u Mulungu yamuwonela lusungu, kanyhi si mwene du, langa na nene, ho ndece kuwa mu wukalale wono wucizize.
Holeka nghuhila muno nimutumilenyi, nanye kolo mukumuwona kanyhi, ho musecelele, nane u wuzinguce wangu wucepuce.
Ale mumubocelaje na nyemo kotya ndugu muli Muwaha. Kanyhi yiwanojeye muwapelaje lilumbo wanhu wono wenha mwene,
vyono yali yeza kufwa so mulimo wa Kilisito, ho yasume kumhela u wutazi, wono anye si mwasuma kumhela.
Ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, musecelelele muli Muwaha! Si nghukatala kwandika kanyhi zizilya zono nali nakondya kumwandicilenyi bahalya ha lulongozi, hambi nha zomonjelezenyi u wuswanu.
Mwilegaje na wawo wono wetumaga wavu, wawo wono wenha mabwa, wanhu wono wakukangaza u witemanje mu muwili.

Ne wanhu wono mbeka walame, yo sese, si wawo wene, hambi ase nha cikumuhemba u Mulungu mu nzila yo Muhe wakwe, kanyhi cikuwuwona u lukumyo mu wilunze na Kilisito Yesu. Nase si citumbiye zinghani za munze du.
Nane nhavivyo nali ndahile kwitumbila i zinghani za munze, na hono hawe hoyuli munhu mono yakwihwesa vyono yadahile kwitumbila zinghani za munze, ane nina i soko mbaha muno yo kwihwesa nhavivyo;

ane nalama lizuwa lyo munana mu wulawa mwi'zuwa lyono nalelelwa, ane nili we nghungugo ya Isilayeli, wo mulango wa Benyamini, nili Muhebelaniya mweneco. Na kuli zo wibata u wulajilize, ane nali nili Mufalisayo,
nane nali nili mupiligazi muno, ninga naligazaga likanisa. Na ku so wiling'ano wono wukutujilwa mu wuhulika u wulajilize, ane nghawa sina yilema lyo lyose.
Ninga muli zizo zose zono nali kwihwesa vyono zo ze cambuzi, nghaziwona vyono kumbe wambuce du, ku soko ya Kilisito.

Heya, hamba si nhavivyo du, ninga nghawona vyono vyose wo wambuce wa bwete, ku so wuswanu wo wumumanya Kilisito Yesu u Mutwa wangu. Hambi nha ku so mwene, ane navumila kugaleka gose, nane nghagawona gago gose nha takataka, ho nimutuje Kilisito,

no kwilunziza nayo lukulu. Alu ane si nghuwusacila lukulu kanyhi u wiling'ano wa mu wuhulika u wulajilize, hambi alu nha nawutuga u wiling'ano wono wukwijelela mu nzila yo kumwihuwila Kilisito, u wiling'ano wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu, wono wukuziza mu wihuwilo.
Nane cono nghuhila, ho nimumanye u mwene Kilisito, kanyhi nivimanye ne vilungo vyo wuzuce wakwe, no kuhanga i magayo gakwe, no kwihwana nayo,
nghwitumbila vyono nane nhavivyo nolozukulwa muli wafu.
Si nghwiwona vyono kotya nakondya kusuma, hamba vyono nakondya kuwa nghwilaniciye, langa nghujendelela kusimbilila ho nicituje i cipegwa cono nebatilwa na Kilisito Yesu.
Mbeka wandugu zangu, si nghwiwona nha vyono nakondya kucituga i cipegwa cico, ninga nghwituma nghani monga du, nghuzisemwa zono zakondya kupuluta, nghuhidimbalila za kumwande.
Holeka nili mu lumangho nanjile ku wulunji wangu ho nicituje i cipegwa cicilya cono lo lucemo lo Mulungu so mikalile ya kucanyha mu nzila ya Kilisito Yesu.
Ale, ase wose mono cikwilaniciye mu mikalile ye Ci kilisito, yicinojeye ciweze no wuwe wuwuno. Ninga hono wawe wanji muli nyenye wakwihwesa visimajiye, ale u Mulungu komugubulilenyi nghani yiyo.
Ninga yicinojeye cijendelele ku mwande mu nghango yo wulajilize wono cali cina nawo sunga nalu.
Wandugu zangu, mujendelele wose kunyiga nene. Camupelenyi wijizwe wuswanu wa muli sese, holeka muwahulikaje wawo wono wakuwutyatya u wijizwe wuwo.
Nakondya kumulonjelenyi nghani yiyi kali kenji, nalu kanyhi nghuwuyajila kumulonjelenyi kwa mahozi, vyono, howali wanhu wenji wono walugu wo Musalaba wa Kilisito.
Ninga u mudumo wawo wowa ku moto, vyono zinda zawo nha yo mulungu wawo, wakuwona nha lukumyo muli zinghani zono ziwanojeye waziwonele cevu, wehwesaga za kononze du.
Ninga ase cili wanya ku wulanga, nase cikumulindiliza cikaluce muno, u Mukombozi yaze ku wulawa ku wulanga, u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
Mwene koloyihundusa i miwili yetu yono yifwizaga, ho yiwe yihwanile no muwili wakwe wo lukumyo, so vilungo vyono yadahile kuviwicila vinhu vyose hasi yo wutemi wakwe.

Holeka wandugu zangu wendece, nina nyhilu muno yo kumuwonenyi, hambi anye nha yo nyenye nyemo yangu, no mukumbo wo lukumyo lo wusume wangu. Holeka nyo wendece wangu, vyo yinojeye kuli anye, mweze mukamile muli Muwaha.
Anye Ewudiya na Suntike, nghumulombenyi dedede mujele kuwa mwilumbanizize kumonga kotya munhu no mwanakwawe, muli Muwaha.

Nagwe go mwitumami muyangu mwihuwilwa, nghukunena wuwatazaje wadala wawo, hambi nha wetuma wahidimbaye u mulimo wo kuluganula u Luganuzi Luswanu, hamonga nane na Kelementi, hamonga ne wetumami wayangu wanji wose, wono i matagwa gawo, gandicigwe mu citabu co wumi.
Holeka musecelelele nhondo zose, muli Muwaha! Kanyhi nghutya, Musecelele!
Muweze wapolo kuli wanhu wose. U Muwaha yali behi.
Mulece kwihwelela muli cinji co cose, langa mu wulombe wenyu, mumulombaje u Mulungu i visakwa vyenyu, mumulombaje akuno mukumulumba mu zinhumbula zenyu.
No mulamu wo Mulungu wono wucizize u wumanye wose we wanhu, womukamisenyi zinhumbula ne mahala genyu mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
Ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, mugamemyaje mahweso genyu ne zinghani ziswanu zono zili mbeka, swanu, na ze ling'ani, zono zilenguce, zono zikwendeza na ze cogopo.
Mwitumaje zono mweyijiza, na zono mwabocela kulawa kwangu, i zinghani zangu, ne metumo gangu. Nayo u Mulungu wo mulamu, kowezana nanye.

Mu wilunze wangu no Muwaha, yikawa nyemo mbaha kuli'ne, kanyhi mukatuga ne cilejeho co kulajila vyono mukali mukunghumbucila. Na hono cilonje i mbeka, munghumbucilaga vilo vyose, ninga du, si mwatuga cilejeho co kuyilajila nghani yiyo.
Si nghulonga nhavivi yiwe nha kotya nghusaka cinji, hambi nha neyijiza kuwa nyheye ne vinhu vyono nina navyo,
hono viwe vinji hamba vicefu. Nizoweleze kuwa nyheye no wuwe wo wose, ne hanhu hono nili hoyuli; u wuwe wo kuca no wuwe we nzala, no wuwe wo kuwa na vinji kuciza no wuwe wo wucepucilwe.
Nosuma kuwa mu wuwe wo wose, hambi Kilisito nha yo kamhelaga i vilungo.
Ninga anye mwanoza viswanu so wuhanga nane mu magayo gangu.

Nanye nyo Wafilipi mumanyile vyono yo nyenye muli wene mono mwanhaza ha mwamulizo wo wuganule wangu wo Luganuzi Luswanu, lono nawukaga kuwulawa ku Makedoniya, yo nyenye du muli wene mono mwali hamonga nane mu cambuzi na mu wambuce wangu.
Na lono nali kuko ku Tesalonike akuno nghuhila wutazi, anye mukandetela, kanyhi hamba si kamonga.
Mulece kwihwesa nha vyono nyendile kubocela vipegwa du, langa nghusaka i cambuzi conjelezwe mu viwutwa vyenyu.

Ale, nakondya kuvibocela vinhu vyose vyono mukamhela, kanyhi vicizize kuciza na vyono navihilaga. Alu nina navyo vyose ku soko Epafulodito yakondya kundetela i vipegwa vyenyu. Vipegwa vivino vikuwa nha vilavywa vye mhunjile swanu, likumbiko lyono likuvumilwa no kumwendeza u Mulungu.
Holeka u Mulungu wangu ku soko yo wugoli wakwe wuwaha mu nzila ya Kilisito, komupelenyi i visakwa vyenyu vyose.
Ale u lukumyo lweze kuli Mulungu wetu no Sogo yetu, cibitilila ne cibitilila. Heya.
Nghumulamusenyi anye mo wanhu wose wo Mulungu mono muli wa Kilisito Yesu. We zindugu wono wali hamonga nane wakumulamusenyi.
I wanhu wose wo Mulungu wono wali baha, na ko muno wono wali Mwikulu lyo Mutemi, wose wakumulamusenyi.
Ilihewa lyo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito liwezane nanye wose.
Yo nene Pawulo u mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu ko wuhile wo Mulungu, na ndugu yetu Timoteyo,
cikumwandicilenyi anye mo wanhu wo Mulungu mono muli ku Kolosayi, mo wandugu zetu wehuwilwa muli Kilisito. Ilihewa no mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu viwezane nanye.
Cikumulumba u Mulungu u sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, nhondo zose, mwi'daha lyono cikumulombelenyi.
Hambi nha cahulika zo wihuwilo wenyu muli Kilisito Yesu na muli zo wendo wenyu kuli wanhu wose wo Mulungu.

Hambi nha mwazihulika zo witumbilo, wono wukwijela muli mwene baho ha lulongozi du, lono mwayihulicila inghani ye mbeka yo Luganuzi Luswanu. Holeka aluno u wihuwilo wenyu, no wendo wenyu, vili mu nghani yiyilya yono mwayitumbila yono muwiciywe viswanu ku wulanga.

No Luganuzi Luswanu, lukucila kulela mikalo, no kutandala mono yinze mose, nha vyono lwaza kwenyu nyenye, ku wulawa mwi'zuwa lililya lyono mwahulicila ze lihewa lyo Mulungu no kumanya vyono yili mbeka.
Mweyijiza ze lihewa lyo Mulungu kulawa kuli Epafula u mwitumami muyetu, u mwitumami mwihuwilwa wa Kilisito ku soko yetu.
U mwene yo yacilonjela zo wendo wenyu wono mwapegwa no Muhe.

Ku soko yiyo nase kanyhi, vyono calawa lizuwa lyono cahulicila i zenyu, si cidilaga kumulombelenyi. Cikumulomba u Mulungu yamumemyenyi u wumanye wose wo wuhile wakwe, yamumemyenyi mahala gose no wutanje wono wukuletwa no Muhe wakwe.

Baho langa ho mosuma kwikala nha vyono yikumunojeza u Muwaha, no kwituma nhondo zose zo wuhile wakwe. Ne mikalile yenyu yowa yina mana gose ge metumo maswanu, nanye mocila muno kuwiluka mu wu mumanya u Mulungu.
U Mulungu yamupelenyi vilungo no wusume wakwe wo lukumyo, ho muwe na ngola muli vyose kanyhi hamonga no wukangalile.
Akuno mukumulumba kwa nyemo u Sogo yo munhu mono yamupelenyi u wusume ho muwe ne 'fungu lyenyu mu zinghani zo Mulungu zono yawawicila i wanhu wakwe mu wutemi wo wuzelu.
U Mwene yacikomboza mu wulawa mu vilungo vye citi, yakacileta cipolile mu wutemi wo Mwanagwe u mwendece,
muli yuyo mo cikukombozezwa, nha cinji u wubi wetu wukunenelwa.
Kilisito yo hwani yeneco yono yikwijela yo Mulungu mono si kejelaga. U mwene yo Mwana u mulongozi kulelwa, kanyhi yo muwaha yacizize viwumbwa vyose.

Hambi nha muli mwene mo Mulungu yaviwumbila vinhu vyose vyono vili mono yinze na vyono vili ku wulanga, vinhu vyono vijelaga ne vinhu vyono si vijelaga, we magoda matambule, ne Watemi, i Wawaha na wose wono wena u wulajilize. Vivi vyose u Mulungu yaviwumbila muli mweneco, na ku soko yakwe.
Kilisito yali yali baho na lono viwumbwa vyose vikali si nawa, na vyose vikamisizwe muli mwene, navyo vyose vikalaga nha vyono vyawikwa.

U Mwene Kilisito wo mutwe wo muwili wakwe, nha cinji likanisa, u Mwene wo mwamulizo wo wumi wa wuwo umuwili. U Mwene yo Mwana mulongozi kulelwa mono yazukulwa muli wafu, u Mwene ho yawe mulongola du kutali muli vinhu vyose.
Hambi u Mulungu nha yawona vyono u Mwana nayo yena u wukwilanicile wose wo wulungu muli mwene.

Holeka u Mulungu yadumula nghani kuyilamula yinze no mweneco. U Mulungu yakanoza mulamu mu nzila ye sakami ya Kilisito mu musalaba, holeka yakawa yakondya kuvilamula vinhu vyose no mwene, ivinhu vya mono'nze na vya ku wulanga.
Na nyenye katali mwali mutemanuywe no Mulungu, kanyhi mwali walugu wakwe ku soko ye mahweso genyu ne metumo i mabi.
Ninga alu so wufwe wo Mwanagwe mono yekala baha mono'nze, u Mulungu yakondya kwilamula nanye, ho yamuletenyi hali mwene mwelile, musina yilema.

Ninga munojeye mujendelele kuwa wehuwilwa mu wusimyo wono wukamile, hamba kutezwa mu witumbilo wo Luganuzi Luswanu lono mwaluhulika. Ane Pawulo nili mwitumami wa lulo u Luganuzi Luswanu lono lwakondya kuganulwa kuli wanhu wose wa mono'nze.
Alu nghusecelela mu matamiso gangu so nyenye, hambi nha ku soko ye magayo gangu ga baha hono yinze, nghumemeleza cono cali cicepuce mu magayo ga Kilisito ku soko yo muwili wakwe, likanisa.
Nane nanozwa ho niwe mwitumami we likanisa, nha vyono winha u mulimo wo Mulungu wono yamhela so cambuzi cenyu, wuwikanize wo kuyiganula inghani yakwe ko wukwilanicile,
yo nghani yono yali hundikwe kuli wanhu wose kulawa katali na katali, ninga aluno yakondya kuwamanyiza wanhu wakwe.

Ninga u wuhile wo Mulungu, yakusaka yawamanyize i wanhu wakwe ze nghani mbaha yiyi na zo lukumyo, vyono vili so wanhu wose. Ne nghani yeneco nha yoyi: Kilisito yali muli nyenye, ne nghani yiyo yo yikumanyiza vyono anye mohanga u lukumyo lo Mulungu.

Na ku soko yiyo, holeka cikumuganula Kilisito kuli wanhu wose, cikuwasugula wose kanyhi cikuwafunda wose mu mahala gose, ho cisume kuwaleta wose hali Mulungu akuno wakondizye kuwa wakangaye muli Kilisito.
Holeka ku soko yiyo, ane nghwituma mulimo akuno hidimbaye mu vilungo vya Kilisito vyono vikwituma muli nene.
Hambi nha nghusaka mumanye vyono netuma mulimo ko wuhidimbazi ku soko yenyu, ku soko ya wanya Lawodikeya, na ku soko ya wose wono wakali si nambona wusu wangu.

Nghunoza nhavivi, i zinhumbula zawo ho zitule, no kulunzizwa hamonga mu wendo, ho wamemywe mbeka yono yikuletwa no wumanye we mbeka. Na mu nzila yiyo, ho woyimanyila ne nghani yo Mulungu yono yihundikwe, hambi nha yo Kilisito mweneco.
Muli mwene mo wuhundikwe u winji wose we mahala no wumanye.
Holeka nghumulonjelenyi vyono, munhu wo wose yalece kumukonjenyi na nghani za wulambi, hamba ziwe nha swanu muno.
Hambi ane hamba niwe nili kutali nanye ku muwili, ninga ku cimuhe nili hamonga nanye, kanyhi nghusangalala kuwona u wusikame wenyu wono mwimiye hamonga, mu wihuwilo wenyu muli Kilisito.
Alu vyono anye mwakondya kumuvumila Kilisito Yesu yawe Muwaha, ale mwikalilaje lukulu muli mwene.
Kanyhi munojeye muhomele milela muli mwene no kwizenga muli mwene kanyhi musikame mu wihuwilo wenyu nha vyono mwejizwa. Muweze ne lilumbo iwaha.
Mulanjilile, munhu yunji yalece kumwajilizenyi ko wusugu no wukoci we wanhu wono wusina cambuzi, wono wukulawilila mu mejizo ge zisimo ze wanhu, na mu myuhe yono yitemile, hamba si Kilisito mweneco!
Ku soko muli mwene Kilisito mu hwani yo munhu, mo mowuli wukwilanicile wose wo Mulungu.
Nanye mwapegwa wumi wono wukwilaniciye mu wilunza hamonga nayo. U Mwene yo Muwaha kuli myuhe yose yono yitemile sunga na kuli wawaha wose.
Na mu wilunza hamonga na Kilisito, anye mwakondya kwalama, ninga si walame wono wukunozwa ne wanhu, langa u walame wono wukunozwa na Kilisito mweneco, u walame wa mu wukombozwe mu wuwe wo wubi.
Hambi lono mwabaputizizwa, nha mwazikanwa hamonga na Kilisito, na kanyhi mumo mu wubaputizo nha mwazukulanwa hamonga nayo mu nzila yo wihuwilo wenyu mu vilungo vyo Mulungu mono yamuzukula muli wafu.

Mu mapango ganji, anye mwali mufwiye ku soko ye masutya genyu, na ku soko vyono mwali muli wanhu mono si muli Wayahudi. Ninga u Mulungu yamupelenyi anye wumi hamonga na Kilisito. U Mulungu yakondya kucinenela u wubi wetu wose,
yakapatila lukulu u lwandiko lono lwacizijilaga lono lwali lucidomile, hamonga no wulajilize wayo, yakaluwusiza lukulu, yakalukomanhila mu musalaba.

Kuko Kilisito, ko yavisumila i vilungo vyose vya yiyo i myuhe yono yitemile, hamonga ne vilungo vye wawaha, yakawanoza kuwa cinhu ca cevu, cagalanze, ko kuwakwejenha kotya ngaluzi mu wujendelele wo wusume wakwe.
Holeka mulece kuvumila munhu wo wose yamuwicilenyi wulajilize wo wose muli vyono mukulya hamba kung'wa, hamba mu wuwala i mazuwa mawaha, hamba zi sikukuu zo mwezi mupya, hamba Sabato.
