I zinghani zizo nha muzizi du wa zono zolowa, ninga i mbeka yeneco, yo Kilisito.

Kanyhi mulece kuvumila kuling'anizwa na munhu yunji, mono yakwinoza nha munhu we lilumbo ku soko yo wuwona wugubulilwe wakwe, no kwisacila u winenenyhezi wo wulambi, no wuhembi wo kuhemba wamalayika. U munhu mono yenha nhavivyo yalelepeye mu mahala go wulele ge ciyinze yinze.
Kanyhi yetemanuye na Kilisito mono wo mutwe wo muwili wuwo. Muli Kilisito, u muwili wose wukuliswa no kulunzwa hamonga i vilunzwa ne zinghwali zayo, nawo wuwilukaga nha vyono u Mulungu yendile.
Anye mwafwizana hamonga na Kilisito no kukombozwa mu vilungo vye myuhe yono yitemile ya mononze. Alu nhawule kanyhi mwikaye mu mikalile ya kotya muli we yinze yiyi? Na so cici muwicilwe wulajilize,
“Mulece kwibata aci! Mulece kujeza acilya, hamba Mulece kupamiza acilya!”
I zinghani zizo zose zili mu vinhu avilya vyono vihodanjikaga kamonga du lono vikwitumamilwa, ago nha malajilizo ne mafundo ge ci munhu munhu du.

I mbeka, malajilizo gago gakwijela galawiliye mu mahala ga mu wuhembi wo kwisacila weneco, no winenenyhezi wo wulambi, no kuwugaza u muwili, ninga mbeka si gakwiliye hamba nhavi ku wimila u wusulumizi wo muwili.
Holeka hono muwe mwazukulanwa hamonga na Kilisito, muhidimbale kulondola za kucanyha, kono ko yuli Kilisito, yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu.
Mwibataje mukamise zinghani za ku wulanga, ninga si zono zili mono'nze.
Hambi anye nha mwafwa, no wumi wenyu wuhundikanwe hamonga na Kilisito muli Mulungu.
Na Kilisito wo wumi wenyu we mbeka, yalaza kwijela, ale, anye nanye baho ho molokwijela hamonga nayo mu lukumyo.
Holeka muwuwulajilaje lukulu u wusulumizi wa mono'nze wono wukali wuli muli nyenye, nha kotya, wusenyha, wavu, wumala-nyinji, wuhile wubi, wusulumizi, wo wuhemba vihwani.
Na ku soko ye makani gago, holeka i likuwo lyo Mulungu likuwa kuwaziza wose wono wasina cihuliko kuli mwene.
Mu mapango ganji, nanye mwekalaga mu mikalile ya muli gago lono mwali mukali mutemigwe nago.
Ninga alu yiwanojeye mugalecele lukulu gago gose, likuwo, wusungu, simbili, maligo, hamba i zinghani zono si zinojeye ze cevu, zilece kulonjelwa lukulu mu milomo yenyu.
Mulece kwiyilambila nyenye wose, vyono anye mwakondya kuwuvula u wunhu wuhuma hamonga ne metumo gayo gose,
no kuwuvwala u wunhu wupya. Wono wukujendelela kunozelezwa no Mulungu mono yawuwumba, nha vyono yinhe hwani yakwe, ho mumumanye u Mulungu mu wukwilanicile wose.

Na mu wuwe wuwo, musina kanyhi wisimajile kuli mono si Muyahudi no Muyahudi, kuli mono yalame na mono si yalame, u musomi na mono si yasomile, u muwanda no munhu mwelecele. Langa vyose vili muli Kilisito du, nayo Kilisito yali muli vyose.
Anye muli wanhu wo Mulungu, u mwene yamwendenyi anye kanyhi yakamuhagulenyi. Holeka nanye muvwale i nhumbula yo lusungu, wuswanu, winenenyhezi, wupolo, no wukangalizi.
Mwikangalilaje no kwinenela nyenye wose hono yunji yawe yena nghani kuli muyagwe, yiwanojeye mweze kwiyinenela nyenye wose nha vyono u Muwaha yamunenelenyi anye, nanye vyo mweze kunoza.
Ne mbaha yono yicizize zose, mwikalanaje mu wiyendi nyenye wose. Hambi u wendo nha wo wukuwa kuvilunziza i vinhu vyose mu wumonga wono wukwilaniciye.
No mulamu wa Kilisito wuteme mu zinhumbula zenyu, hambi ku soko yiyo, nanye nha mwacemwa ho muwe muwili wuwo wumonga. Kanyhi muwe mwina lilumbo!

I nghani ya Kilisito yikalaje muli nyenye, hamonga no wugoli wayo wose. Mwiyijizaje nyenye wose munhu na muyagwe, akuno mukwiyilanjiziza mu mahala gose. Mwimbaje Zabuli, na nyimbo, no wimbe we cinya Muhe, mumwimbilaje u Mulungu mu zinhumbula zenyu kwe lilumbo.
Na zose zono mukwituma, mu wulonje, hamba mu witume, mwitumilaje zose mwitagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu, akuno mukumulumbila u Mulungu Baba muli mwene.
Anye mo wagolece, muwahulice walume zenyu, hambi nha vyo yendile u Muwaha.
Nanye mo walume, muwendaje wagolece zenyu, kanyhi mulece kuwa wakali kuli wene.
Nanye mo wana muwahulice walezi wenyu nhondo zose, hambi nha vyo yinojeye muli Muwaha.
Anye nanye mo walezi, mulece kuwakalaza i wana wenyu ho walece kuyitukuwika i mitima yawo.
Nanye mo wetumami, muwahulikaje i wawaha wenyu wa mononze muli zose, si mwipango lono muli hamwande yawo du ho mwiyendeze kuli wene, langa mwitumaje kwe mitima yenyu yose, akuno mukumogopa u Muwaha.
Na zose zono mowa kwituma, muzitumaje kwe mitima yenyu yose, ku soko yo Muwaha hamba si ku soko ya munhu.
Akuno mukumanya vyono u Mulungu kolomupelenyi i mafungu go wuhazi gono yawawiciye i wanhu wakwe. Mumwitumamilaje Kilisito u Muwaha!
Mono yakwituma i zimbi, nha kololipwa nha vyono genha i metumo gakwe i mabi. Hambi u Mulungu nha yasina wuhijila mbejele.
Nanye mo wawaha, muwatendelaje kwe ling'ani ne mbeka i wetumami wenyu, akuno mukukumbucila vyono nanye nha vivyo mwina u Muwaha wenyu ku wulanga.
Mweze kulomba nhondo zose, kanyhi mweze kulanjilila lono mukulomba, akuno mukumulumba u Mulungu.
Mucilombelaje na sese nhavivyo, u Mulungu ho yacipele i cilejeho co kuyiganulila i nghani yakwe Kilisito yono hundikwe. Alu ane nili mu jela ku soko ya yiyo.
Holeka munombelaje ho sume kulonga nha vyono yinojeye, mu nghango yono yosuma kuyanzalika i nghani yiyo.
Mwikalaje nawo kwa mahala wono si wehuwiye, kanyhi mwitumamilaje viswanu i cilejeho cono mwina naco.
No wulonje wenyu nhondo zose weze wuswanu, wono wukwendeza, kanyhi mumanye vyono yimunojelenyi kuwapitula viswanu i wanhu wose.
U ndugu yetu mwendece, Tukiko, u mwitumami mwihuwilwa, no mwitumami muyetu mu mulimo wo Muwaha, yo komulonjelenyi zose.
Yo yilecile nghumutuma, ho yamusindamicenyi zinhumbula zenyu kolo mwahulika i zetu.
Nayo yakuza yena na Onesimo u ndugu yetu mwendece kanyhi mwihuwilwa, u munyawusi muyenyu. Nawo womulonjelenyi zose zono zikwitumwa baha.
Na Alisitaliko mono yali mu jela hamonga na nene, yakumulamusenyi, sunga na Maluko u mwihwawe wa Balanaba, nayo nha vivyo, (Mono mwalajizizwa, vyono hono yaze kwenyu mumubocelaje.)

Nhavivilya na Yoshuwa mono kacemwaga Yusito, nayo yakumulamusenyi. Na muli wanji Wayahudi wono wabocela u wihuwilo, wo wawa du wali wene wono cikwitumana nane mulimo ku soko yo wutemi wo Mulungu, na kanyhi wo wakunhaza muno muno.

Na Epafala nayo u munyawusi muyenyu, kanyhi u mwitumami wa Kilisito Yesu, nayo yakumulamusenyi. Kanyhi yakumulombelenyi nyenye nhondo zose ko wupiligazi, ho mwime mukamile, mukangale, mulece kusinjisika muli zose zono yakuzisaka u Mulungu.
Ndahile kumuhomelela vyono yakwituma yahidimbaye ku soko yenyu na ku soko ye wanhu wanya Lawodikeya, na wanya Hiyelapoli.
Luka, u muganga wetu mwendece, hamonga na Dema, wose wakumulamusenyi.
Muwalamusaje i wandugu zetu wose wa kuko ku Lawodikeya, mumulamusaje no lumbu lyetu Nimufa, hamonga na wono wehuwiye wose wono wetang'anililaga mu nyumba yakwe.
Kolo mwakondya kuyisoma i baluwa yiyi, nhondo yisomwe ne Wakilisito wa ku Lawodikeya, nanye nhondo muyisomaje i baluwa yono wayituga wene.
Mumulonjelaje na Alikipo yawitumaje viswanu u mulimo wono yapegwa no Muwaha.
Nghwandika zizino ko muwoko wangu nene no mweneco, u Mulamu wono wukulawa kwangu nene Pawulo. Mweze kukumbucila vyono ane mbopigwe ne manyolo. Ilihewa lyo Mulungu lyeze na nyenye.

Ane Pawulo, hamonga na Silivano na Timoteyo, cikumwandicilenyi anye mo mhuga ye likanisa lya ku Tesalonike, mo wanhu wo Mulungu Baba, no Muwaha Yesu Kilisito. Lihewa lyeze muli nyenye hamonga no Mulamu.
Cikumulumba u Mulungu, ku soko yenyu nyenye wose nhondo zose, no kumukumbucilenyi nhondo zose mu wulombe wetu.

Nase cikumukumbucilenyi hali Mulungu Baba, vyono mukulajila u wihuwilo wenyu mu witume, na vyono u wendo wenyu wo wukumupelenyi u witume wo wupiligazi, kanyhi na vyono u witumbilo wenyu wukamile muli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Mo wandugu zangu, hambi nha cimanyile vyono, u Mulungu yamwendilenyi, kanyhi na vyono yamuhagulenyi muwe wanhu wakwe,

vyono lono camuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu, si wali mu wulonje du, langa na mu vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, akuno cimanyiye lukulu, vyono, i nghani yiyo yali ya mbeka. Mumanyile vyono cekalanaga hamonga nanye, cekalaga ku soko ye cambuzi cenyu.
Nanye mukega u wuwe wetu, hamonga no kumwiga u Muwaha. Hamba muwe mwatuga wugaye, ninga mwayibocela nghani mu nyemo yono yikulawa mu Muhe Mono Yelile.
Holeka anye mweza muli musambo muswanu kuli wose wono wehuwiye we Makedoniya na ku Akaya.

Hambi nha ku soko yo wuhidimbazi wenyu, i nghani yo Muwaha yakondya kuhulikwa, hamba si kuko ku Makedoniya na ku Akaya du, langa sunga no wihuwilo wenyu wa kuli Mulungu, nha wakondya kuhulikwa hanhu hose. Kanyhi cisina za kulonga.
Hambi i wanhu wawo weneco nha wakuciganulila nha vyono caza kwenyu, ne nghango ya vyono mwacibocela, na vyono mukaleka vihwani, no kumupitucila u Mulungu mumi na we mbeka,
na luno mumulindilize u Mwanagwe yatime kulawa ku wulanga, mono u Mulungu yamuzukula muli wafu, yo Yesu, mono yakuciponya ne likuwo lyo Mulungu lyono likuza.
Hambi nha mumanyile nyo weneco wandugu zetu, u wuze wetu wa kuko kwenyu vyono si wali wa bwete.

Mumanyile vyono catamiswa, no kutovulwa akulya ku Filipi, lono cali cikali si nafika u kwenyu ku Tesalonike. Hamba kuwe kwali kowuli wiwanganile winji, ninga u Mulungu wetu, yakacipela wuluwuce wo kumuganulilenyi u Luganuzi lwakwe Luswanu.
Ne nghani yono cikumusinjenyi, si nghani ya wulambi, hamba lunji yono yina wuhile wubi, hamba si cendile ho cimukonje munhu wo wose.

Ase cilongaga nhondo zose nha vyono yendile u Mulungu, hambi nha yo mweneco mono yaciwona ase cikwiliye, yakawa kucipela u mulimo wuwu wo Luganuzi Luswanu. Wo si wuhile wetu hamba hadodo ho ciwendeze wanhu, langa cikuhila kumwendeza u Mulungu, mono yazimanyile zinhumbula zetu sunga mo mugati.
Nanye mumanyile vyono lono caziza kwenyu, si caza ne zinghani zo wutelemezi, hamba si cetumamila u wulonji wo wusugu wo kwihundika cinji muli sese, u Mulungu yo muhomelezi!
Hamba si calondola lilumbo muli wanhu hamba muli nyenye, hamba kulawa kuli munhu wo wose,
ninga ase nha vyono cili wetumami wa Kilisito, cali cisume kusaka cinji kwenyu. Ninga ase cikawa wapolo lono cali cili hamonga nanye, nha vyono yenha u nyina yo munhu muli wanagwe.
Ale nhavivyo, vyono cikamwendenyi anye muno muno, cikawa ciwikanize kumugawilenyi si u Luganuzi Luswanu du lo Mulungu, langa sunga no wumi wetu. Nhavivyo nanye vyo mwali mo wendece wetu!

Nye wandugu zangu, mukumbuciye vyono cetuma u mulimo hamonga ne magaziko. Lono camuletelenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, hambi nha cetumaga mulimo ku misi na ku cilo, ho cilece kuwa mutegulo kuli munhu wo wose muli nyenye.
Nanye nyo weneco muli wahomelezi, no Mulungu nayo muhomelezi nha vivyo, vyono i mikalile yetu hali nyenye mono mwihuwiye, vyono yali miswanu kanyhi ye ling'ani yono yisina yilema.
Kanyhi mumanyile nyo weneco vyono ase camutendelenyi nyenye yumonga yumonga, nha vyono u sogo yo munhu kawatendelega wanagwe mweneco.
Cikamulanjizenyi, kanyhi cikamusindamicenyi, no kumuswaswanizenyi, ho mwikale mu mikalile yono yikumwendeza u Mulungu mono yamucemenyi ho muhanje u Wutemi no lukumyo lwakwe mweneco.

Kanyhi cina ne soko yinji yo kumulumbila u Mulungu; lono camuletelenyi i nghani yo Mulungu, anye mwayihulika kanyhi mukayibocela si nha vyono yinha nghani yono yikulawa kuli wanhu, langa mwayibocela nha nghani yo Mulungu, nayo mbeka vyo yinha. Hambi u Mulungu nha yakwituma muli nyenye mono mwihuwiye.

Nye wandugu zangu, nanye nha zamwaganenyi zono zagagana i Makanisa go Mulungu ga ku Yudiya, zinghani zono zawagana i wanhu wa Kilisito Yesu. Nanye mwatamiswa ne wanyawusi wayenyu, nha vyono iwene nawo wagazwa ne Wayahudi wayawo,
wono wamuwulaga u Muwaha Yesu ne wawizi, wakacigaza sunga na sese nhavivyo. Iwanhu wono si wakumwendeza u Mulungu, kanyhi wali sili ne wanhu wose.

Kanyhi wakajela kucimila cilece kuwaganulila wanhu wono si Wayahudi i nghani yono yosuma kuwapela mhonelo. Na mumo mo wakumemelezeza i liwalo lyo wubi wawo wono wetumaga nhondo zose. Ninga alu i likuwo lyo Mulungu liwagwiliye.

Nye wandugu zangu, u witemanuce wetu na nyenye, wali wa cipango du, kanyhi no witemanuce wuwu wali wa mu muwili du hamba si wa mu nhumbula. Ninga hanyuma ye cipango cifupi, cikamwisukwenyi muno no kuhila kumuwonenyi kanyhi!
Holeka cikawona viswanu ho cize kuko kwenyu kanyhi. Nane no Pawulo najela ho nize kuko kwenyu nghanghulo monga hamba ne kejete, ninga Setani yakacimila.
Wulenyi cilaza kwima hali Muwaha Yesu yalaza kuza, u lukumyo lo wusume wetu wolowa cici? Wolowa nyenye nyo weneco, vyono anye yo nyenye, wo witumbilo wetu ne nyemo yetu.
Heya, hambi nha yo nyenye lukumyo lwetu ne nyemo yetu!
Holeka vyono si casuma kukangalila kanyhi, cikawona vyowa viswanu cilekwe cili wene ku Atene,
cikamutumilenyi ndugu yetu Timoteyo, kanyhi mwitumami muyetu muli Mulungu mu wuganule u Luganuzi Luswanu lwa Kilisito. Cikamutumilenyi ho yaze yamusikamyenyi no kumusindamicenyi,
ho wihuwilo wa yunji muli nyenye wulece kucepuka ku soko ye magazo gago. Ninga anye mumanyile nha vyono yicinojeye cinjile mu magazo.
Hambi mbeka lono cali kwenyu, nha camula kumulonjelenyi vyono cowa kutamiswa, na vyono mumanyile, na mbeka vyo yikawa.

Ku soko yiyo holeka nane nghamutumilenyi Timoteyo. Vyono si nasuma kulindila kanyhi, holeka nghamutumilenyi ho hulice muli zo wihuwilo wenyu. Yilece kuwa na lunji u mukonji yamujelenyi, no mulimo wose wono cawituma muli nyenye wuwe wa bwete!

Ninga alu Timoteyo yakondya kuwuya kono kwetu, yakulawa u kwenyu, nayo kacilonjela nghani za nyemo kuli zo wihuwilo wenyu no wendo wenyu. Kacilonjela kanyhi vyono mukucikumbucila nhondo zose na vyono mwina wuhile wo kuciwona ase, nha vyono na sese cina wuhile wo kumuwonenyi nyenye.
Nase cisindamikwa muno mu wugaye ne matamiso getu gose, ku soko yo wihuwilo wenyu.
Hambi alu nha cili womi mbeka, hono mwime mukamile muli Muwaha.
Alu cosuma kumulumba u Mulungu wetu ku soko yenyu. Cikumulumba so nyemo yono cina nayo hali mwene ku soko yenyu.
Cikumulomba u Mulungu cihidimbaye kwe mitima yetu yose cilo na misi, ho yacipele i cilejeho co kumuwonenyi wusu na wusu, ho cisume kuzinozeleza zono zikali zicepuce mu wihuwilo wenyu.
Nase cikumulomba u Mulungu u Sogo yetu mweneco, no Muwaha wetu Yesu, yaciwikanizize nzila yo kuza u kwenyu.
U Muwaha yamupelenyi wiyendi nyenye wose, no kucila muno kuwenda i wanhu wose, nha vyono ase cimwendilenyi nyenye.
Holeka nayo komukamyenyi zinhumbula zenyu, nanye mowa mukwilaniciye mu wele hali Mulungu no Sogo yetu, mwipango lono kolokuziza u Muwaha wetu Yesu hamonga ne wakwe wose.

Ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, nha vyono mweyijiza kuli sese vyono munojeye mwikale ho mumwendeze u Mulungu. Nayo yili mbeka vyo mwikalaga. Alu cikumulombenyi kanyhi cikumunenenyi mwitagwa lyo Muwaha Yesu, vyono alu ho mucile muno kuwituma viswanu.
Hambi nha mumanyile i malajilizo gono camupelelenyi mu wulajilize wo Muwaha Yesu.
U Mulungu yakumusacenyi anye mweze mwelile kanyhi mwilejele lukulu mu mikalile yo wusenyha.
Anye nyo walume, yinojeye munhu na lwakwe yeyijize nha vyono yimunojeye kwikala no mugolece wakwe mu wele ne lilumbo,
ninga si mu masulumizi mabi nhe wanhu we makungugo ganji wono si wamumanyile u Mulungu.

Holeka munhu wo wose yalece kumusutizya hamba kumukapa u muyagwe mu nghani yiyi. Hambi nha cakondya kumulonjelenyi muli zizo kanyhi cikamusugulenyi vyono u Muwaha kowalipiciza wono wakwituma zono zinha zizo.
U Mulungu si yacicema ho cikale mu mikalile yo wusenyha, langa ho cikale mu wele.
Holeka mono yakugabedegala i mejizo gago, si yakumubedegala munhu, langa yakumubedegala u Mulungu mweneco mono yakumupelenyi u Muhe wakwe Mono Yelile.
Hasina soko yo kumwandicilenyi vyono munojeye kuwenda i wandugu zenyu wono wehuwiye. Hambi nha mwijizwe no Mulungu vyono munojeye kwiyenda nyenye wose.
Hambi nha vyo mukunoza nhavivyo kuli wandugu zenyu wose mu Makedoniya mose. Holeka wandugu zangu cikumulombelenyi ho mucile muno.
Kanyhi mweze no wuhile wo kwikala mu mikalile yo wutuvu, munhu wo wose yepiganzizaje i zakwe mweneco, kanyhi yetume i milimo ne miwoko yakwe mweneco nha vyono camulonjelenyi bahalya ha lulongozi.
Na muli zizo mo mokwitujila lilumbo yiswanu kuli awalya wono wakali si wanawa Wakilisito, kanyhi mowa musina soko yo kuwetumbila wanji ku soko ye visakwa vyenyu.
Nyo wandugu zangu, cikuhila muyimanye i mbeka ya kuli walya wono wakondya kufwa, ho mulece kuwa na wukalale nhe wanhu wono wasina u witumbilo.
Ase cihuwiye vyono Yesu yafwa, yakazuka, na ku soko yiyo, holeka nase cihuwiye vyono u Mulungu kowaleta hamonga na Yesu wawalya wose wono wawuka mononze akuno wamwihuwiye u mwene.
Na yiyi yono cikumulonjelenyi go mejizo go Muwaha, ase mono cili womi, mono cowa cikali cisigaye, mwidaha lyono yakuziza u Muwaha, si colowalongolela awalya wono wakondya kuwuka mononze.

Hambi nha wololavywa u wulajilize, lizi lya malayika muwaha, ne lizi lye ndulele yo Mulungu, nayo u Muwaha mweneco kolotima kulawa ku wulanga. Hobaho awalya wono wawuka kononze akuno wamwihuwiye Kilisito, wololongola kuzukulwa.
Hanyuma nase nhondo mono cili womi mwidaha lilyo, colonyasulanwa nawo mu mavunde no kumuhinjiliza u Muwaha, ale nhavivyo colowezana no Muwaha cibitilila.
Ale mwisindamicilaje mu zinghani zizi.
Nye wandugu zangu, hasina soko yo kumwandicilenyi muli ze madaha ne vipango vya muli zizo zono zokuza.
Hambi nha mumanyile nyo weneco vyono, i lizuwa lyo Muwaha lyolokuza nha muhizi vyono kazaga ku cilo.

I wanhu kolo wakutya, “Mulamu kanyhi kupolile.” Hobaho ho wukuziza u wuhodanji wono wukuwaziza nhinicizo! Nazo zizo zowaziza nhinicizo nho wusungu wo kulela vyono wukuwa kumuziza u mucekulu lono yakusawa, ne wanhu hamba si wosuma kwilega.
Ninga anye nyo wandugu zangu si muli mu citi yaye, holeka ne lizuwa lilyo si linojeye limuzizenyi nhinicizo nho muhizi.
Anye wose muli wanhu wono mwikaye mu wuzelu, muli wanhu wa mu misi. Ase si cili wanhu wa ku cilo hamba wa mu wutitu.
Holeka cilece kugona zinhongo nha vyono wanji, langa yicinojeye cikale meso kanyhi ciweze no wiyimile.
Wono wagonaga, wagonaga ku cilo, na wono wagalaga, wakuwa kugala ku cilo.

Ninga ase cili wanhu wa mu misi, holeka yicinojeye ciwe no wiyimile. Yicinojeye civwale u wihuwilo no wendo viwe nha civwalo cono cosuma kucicitiza mu mhambaga, kanyhi no witumbilo wetu we mhonelo, yiwe nha kofiya ya cuma.
Hambi u Mulungu nha si yacihagula ho citamiswe mwi'kuwo lyakwe, langa ho ciyituje i mhonelo mu nzila yo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito,
mono yafwa ku soko yetu, ho cikalane hamonga nayo, hamba ciwe cili womi, hamba hono ciwe cakondya kufwa.
Holeka mwisindamikaje no kwitaza munhu na muyagwe nha vyono mukunoza lulu.
Ninga cikumunenenyi wandugu zangu, muwapelaje cogopo awalya wono wakwituma muli nyenye, wawo wono wakumutonjenyi no kumwijizenyi muli ze mikalile ye Cikilisito.
Muwalumbizaje muno no kuwenda ku soko yo mulimo wono wakwituma. Kanyhi mweze mwilamuye nyenye wose.
Kanyhi cikumunenenyi wandugu zangu, muwafundaje i wanhu wadoba, muwasinyhimikaje we zinhumbula zinyoga, muwebatilizaje wono wasoceye, kanyhi mweze na ngola kuli wose.
Mulanjilile, munhu wo wose yalece kumugomolezeza u muyagwe wubi na wubi, langa wuhile wenyu, weze wo kwitendela ziswanu nhondo zose munhu na muyagwe, no kuwatendela ziswanu wanhu wose.
Mweze museceleye nhondo zose,
akuno mukulomba musina wudile,
mweze mwina ne lilumbo muli zose. Hambi wuwo nha wo wuhile wo Mulungu kuli nyenye mu wilunze wenyu na Kilisito Yesu.
Mulece kumwimila u Muhe Mono Yelile;
mulece kuwubedegala wuwizi.
Ninga mweze kuvijela vinhu vyose; mukamise muno muno ziswanu,
kanyhi mwilegaje mu mawala gose ge zimbi.
No Mulungu mono kacipelaga mulamu, yamunozenyi muwe mwelile muli zose, yamukamisenyi nyenye, u muhe, no wumi ne miwili yenyu, ho mulece kuwa na yilema lyo lyose ha wuze wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Nayo mono yamucemenyi nyenye, nha konoza nhavivyo, hambi Mwene nha mwihuwilwa.
Nye wandugu zangu, mucilombelaje na sese nhavivyo.
Muwalamusizaje wandugu zetu wose mu citanjilo co wendo.
Nghumukong'onhezenyi mwitagwa lyo Muwaha, vyono muwasomelaje we zindugu wose i baluwa yiyi.
Ilihewa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, liwezane na nyenye wose.
Ane Pawulo na Silivano hamonga na Timoteyo, cikumwandicilenyi anye nyo we likanisa lya kuko ku Tesalonike, mono muli wanhu wo Mulungu Baba na wo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
Ilihewa no Mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu Baba na ko Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, weze muli nyenye.

Nye wandugu zangu, yicinojeye ceze kumulumbo Mulungu nhondo zose ku soko yenyu. Kanyhi yicinojeye cinoze nhavivyo, vyono u wihuwilo wenyu wukucila muno muno, sunga no wiyendi wenyu wukucila konjelezeka muno muno.
Holeka nase cikwilumbila muli nyenye mu makanisa go Mulungu, cikuwona lukumyo luwaha, vyono mukujendelela mu wihuwilo hamonga no wukangalizi wenyu wa mu wuwingwe, hamonga ne magazo gono mukugatuga.
Na zizo zose, zikucimanyiza vyono u wuling'anizi wo Mulungu wo we ling'ani, ne ndumilizo yayo ho mowa muwunojeye u Wutemi wakwe wono wukuleka anye mukugazwa.
No Mulungu kokwituma ling'ani; kowalipa u wugaye, wawo wono wukumugazenyi anye,
nayo komupelenyi wuceho anye mono mukugazika, na sese nhavivyo. Nayo kokwituma i nghani yiyo mwidaha lyono u Muwaha kolokwijelela kulawa ku wulanga, hamonga ne wamalayika wakwe wawaha,
hamonga ne malambi go moto, ho yawalipicize wawalya wose wono wakumulema u Mulungu, na wawalya wono si wakuluhulika u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Muwaha wetu Yesu.
No wulipicizwe wawo, wolowa wajilile we cibitilila, no kutemanulilwa lukulu no lukumyo lwakwe luwaha,
kolo yakuza mwizuwa lilyo no kulubocela u lukumyo ne lilumbo kulawa kuli wanhu wose wono wamwihuwiye. Nanye nhavivyo, molowa wayagwe na wawo, hambi nha mwayibocela i nghani yono camuletelenyi.

Na ku soko yiyo, holeka si cidilaga kumulombelenyi. Cikumulomba u Mulungu wetu yamupelenyi vilungo vyo kusumila kukangalila kwikala mikalile yono yamucemelenyi. Cikumulomba, kwe vilungo vyakwe, yawukwizilize u wuhile wenyu wo wituma i ziswanu, hamonga no kuwufisiliza u mulimo wenyu wo wihuwilo.
Na muli zizo, i litagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu mo lyotujila lukumyo muli nyenye, nanye mowutuga lukumyo muli mwene ku soko ye lihewa lyo Mulungu wetu na lyo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito.
Alu zo wuze wo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, na zo wukongholwa hamonga wetu, ho cikale nayo. Cikumunenenyi muno muno wandugu zetu,

vyono mulece kuwa na mahwele ge mbela mbela mu zinhumbula zenyu, hamba mulece kogopa so wulonje wo wutya, “I lizuwa lyo Muwaha lyakondya kuza.” Lunji yikwihweswa vyono i nghani yiyi yikulawilila mu wuwile wunji wunji, hamba mu wuganule, hamba mu baluwa yono yikutegwa vyono yilawiliye kono kwetu.

Mulece kukongwa na munhu wo wose mu nzila yo yose yilya. Hambi i lizuwa lilyo nha silyosuma kuza, sunga awulya u Wubezi Wuwaha wamule kuza, ayulya u Munhu mubi yamule kwijela mono u mudumo wakwe wo wajilile wo lukulu.
U Mwene kovibeza vyose vyono i wanhu wakuviwona nha Mulungu, hamba cono wakucihemba. Heya, yadahile kwinjila no kwikala sunga mu Nyumba yo Mulungu no kwiyitya mweneco yo Mulungu.
Alo si mukukumbucila vyono namulonjelenyi zizi zose lono nali nili hamonga nanye?
Ninga alu hocili cinhu cono cikumwimila, sunga na nyenye mucimanyile i cinhu cico. Holeka, yuyo u Mubi kolokwijelela mwi'daha lyakwe lyono limunojeye yejele.
Hamba nhavivyo, yuyo u Mubi mono si yakwijela luno, yakwituma i milimo yakwe lulu, ninga si kosuma kwijela sunga ayulya mono yakumwimila yawuswe.
Ale baho ho yuyo nayo u Mubi ho kolokwijelela, ninga u Muwaha Yesu kolo yakuza, kolomuwulaga ko muhe wo mulomo wakwe, no kumwajiliziza lukulu ko wung'alale wo wuze wakwe.
Nayo yuyo u Mubi, kolokuziza mu vilungo vya Setani, no kunoza vitanjilo vye mawala gose ne mezino go wulambi,
nayo kokwitumamila u wulambi we mawala gose kuli awalya wono wali mu wajilile. Wawo nawo wolokwajilila ku soko vyono si wawubocela hamba si wayenda yiyilya i mbeka ho wapone.
Holeka nayo u Mulungu yakawawika hasi ye vilungo vyo wajilile, ho wawihuwile u wulambi.
Ne ndumilizo yayo ho yiwe, wose wono si wakuyihuwila i mbeka, langa wakwiyendeza no wubi woling'anizwa.

Yicinojeye cimulumbe u Mulungu nhondo zose ku soko yenyu anye i wandugu zetu, anye mono mwendigwe no Muwaha, hambi u Mulungu nha yamuhagulenyi ku wulawa ku mwamulizo ho muponywe kwe vilungo vyo Muhe, ho munozwe muwe wanhu wakwe wono mwelile mu nzila yo wihuwilo wenyu mu mbeka.
Nayo u Mulungu yamucemelenyi mu nzila yo Luganuzi Luswanu lono camuganulilenyi; nayo yamucemenyi ho mubocele i lifungu lyenyu mu lukumyo lo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Holeka wandugu zangu, mwibatilaje lukulu i mejizo gagalya gono camwijizizenyi mu wuganule wetu, na mu zibaluwa zetu.
Nase cikumulomba u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito mweneco, hamonga no Mulungu Baba mono yacenda, na so lihewa lyakwe yakacipela u wutuzwe we cibitilila hamonga no witumbilo wuswanu,
yazituzaje zinhumbula zenyu kanyhi yamusikamyenyi ho musume kwituma no kulonga ziswanu nhondo zose.
Ale, ze ndumilizo wandugu zangu, mucilombelaje, nghani yo Muwaha ho yicile kutandala mbela mbela, kanyhi ho yibocelwe kwe lilumbo nha vyono yinha muli nyenye.
Lombenyi, kanyhi ho Mulungu yaciponye mu mawoko ge wanhu wono wajiliye kanyhi wabi, hambi nha si wose wono wayihuwiye nghani yiyi.
Ninga u Muwaha yo mwihuwilwa. U Mwene komusikamyenyi kanyhi komudimenyi viswanu kuli ayulya mubi.
Nayo u Muwaha yakucipela u witumbilo wuwaha ku soko yenyu, nase citumbiye du vyono mokwituma, kanyhi vyono mojendelela kwituma zizilya zono camulonjelenyi.
U Muwaha yamutonjenyi zinhumbula zenyu mu wendo wo Mulungu, kanyhi na mu wukangalizi wono Kilisito yakucipela.
Nye wandugu zangu, cikumulajilizizenyi mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, mwilegaje na we zindugu wose wadoba na wono kanyhi si wakugatyatya malajilizo gono cawapela.
Nanye nyo weneco mumanyile nha vyono munojeye mutyatye luzu lwetu. Vyono ase lono cali cili hamonga nanye, si cali wadoba.
Hamba si calya ndigwa ya munhu wo wose bwete si cimulipile. Cetumaga milimo cihidimbaye hamonga no wugazice ku misi na ku cilo, ho cilece kuwa mutegulo kuli munhu wo wose muli nyenye.
Canoza nhavivyo, si vyono kotya si yali yicinojeye citazwe nanye, langa vyono cikusaka kumupelenyi luzu.
Lono cali cili hamonga nanye, cali kumulonjelenyi cikutya, “U munhu wo wose mono yakulema kwituma i milimo, nayo yalece kupegwa zindigwa yalye.”
Cikuzilonga zizo vyono cihulika vyono muli nyenye mo wali wanji wayenyu wadoba kanyhi wono si wendile kwituma mulimo wo wose, langa wene wendile kwiyinjiza du mu zinghani za wanhu wanji.
Mwitagwa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, cikuwalajiliza kanyhi cikuwasugula wanhu we liwala lilyo vyono yiwanojeye wawe no wunhu wuswanu, kanyhi wetume milimo ho wetujile vyawo weneco.
Ninga anye nyo wandugu zangu, mulece kukatala mu wituma ziswanu.

Yidahile kuwa kuko koyuli munhu yunji mono si yakuyihulika nghani yiyi yono cikumuletelenyi mu baluwa yiyi. Na hono yiwe nhavivyo, ale yinojeye anye mumwanzalice u munhu yuyo, kanyhi mulece hamba kuhanga nayo mu nghani yo yose, nayo ho yawone cevu.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo, mulece kumunoza u munhu yuyo nha mulugu, langa mumufundaje nha kotya ndugu yenyu.
U Muwaha mweneco, yo mwamulizo wo mulamu, yamupelenyi mulamu nhondo zose muli zose. U Muwaha yawezane na nyenye wose.
Ko muwoko wangu nene no mweneco nghwandika nhavi: U mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Pawulo! Navyo nhavivi vyo nghuwa kutajila sayini mu zi baluwa zose, na vyo nghuwa kwandika.
Ilihewa lyo Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito liwezane na nyenye wose.
Nene Pawulo mutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito ku soko ye lilajilizo lyo Mulungu u Mukombozi wetu na Yesu Kilisito u witumbilo wetu,
nghukwandicila gwegwe Timoteyo umwanangu tuti mu wihuwilo. Ilihewa liweze kuli'gwe, hamonga no lusungu no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu u Sogo yetu na kuli Kilisito Yesu Mutwa wetu.
Nyendile 'gwe wikale kuko ku Efeso, nha vyono nakunena lono nabitaga ku Makedoniya. Iwanhu wanji wali kuko wono wakwijiza imejizo go wulambi. Wuwagomezaje wanhu wawo wapelele lukulu.

Kanyhi wuwalonjelaje walecele lukulu zisimo zizilya zono zisina nhunizo yo yose hamba hadodo, hamonga ne zinghomo zinhali ze zindelwa ze walezi wetu, zono ziletaga wiwanganile wa bwete, hamba siziwazengaga wanhu mu wuhile wo Mulungu wono wumanyice mu nzila yo wihuwilo.
Ale u wulunji we lilajilizo lili, nha wukukong'onheza uwendo wono wukulawa mu nhumbula nzelu, no mutima muswanu, na mu wihuwilo we mbeka.
Hambi iwanhu wanji nha wajilila no kupitucila ku wulonga zinghani zo wulele zono zisina cambuzi co cose.
Wendile kuwa wejizi wo Wulajilize, ninga akuno ho si wakuzizuka ne zinghani zawo weneco, hamba kuzimanya bwete na zizo zono wakuzikong'onheza muno muno.
Cimanyile vyono u wulajilize wuswanu, hono witumamilwe vyono yinojeye.

Ninga yicinojeye cikumbucile vyono u wulajilize si wukuwa kuwikwa so wanhu waswanu, langa wuwikwaga ku soko ye wahodanji na wono wasina cihuliko, wono siwamogopile u Mulungu ne wanyo wubi, iwanhu wono wasina dini, kanyhi we ciyinze yinze. Kanyhi wuwikwaga ku soko ye wanhu wono wawulagaga i wasogo zawo ne wanyina zawo, wawulaga wanhu,
kanyhi wulajilize nha wuwicigwe ku soko ye wanhu wasenyha, i wamelopezi, i wahiza wanhu, walambi, na wono welahaga ko wulambi, hamba na wono wetumaga zono zili suta ne mejizo ge mbeka.
Hambi imejizo gaga nha gali mu Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu wo lukumyo kanyhi u mulugutwe.
Nghumulumba u Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito mono yamhela i vilungo ku soko yo mulimo wangu. Kanyhi nghumulumba vyono yambona ane nili mwihuwilwa, yakahagula nimwitumamile,
hambe bahalya halulongozi nene no mweneco nghamuliga no kumugaza no kumugalila. Ninga mwene Mulungu yakambonela lusungu, ku soko nali nghali sina wihuwilo, na holeka si nali manyile cono netumaga.
Ninga u Mutwa wetu yakamhela i lihewa lyakwe ko winji, kanyhi yakamhela wihuwilo no wendo mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
No wulonje wuwu nha wa mbeka, na kanyhi wunojeye wuvumilwe muno muno, vyono Kilisito Yesu yaza kononze kuwaponya wanyo wubi. Nane nha nili mubi kuciza wawo wose.
Ninga mwene Mulungu yakambonela lusungu, ho Kilisito yawulajile wukangalizi wakwe wose kuli'ne, wuwe nha musambo kuli awalya wono hanyuma yayo wolomwihuwila no kubocela wumi we cibitilila.
Ale, kuli mwene Mutemi we cibitilila na we sakalakale, mono sikawonagwa, umwene Mulungu we ciwene, lyeze lilumbo no lukumyo cibitilila na cibitilila! Heya.

Go mwanangu Timoteyo, nghukupela lilajilizo lili, nha vyono zinha i zinghani zo wuwizi, zono zawilwa katali muli gwegwe. Ale wuzitumamilaje i zinghani zizo ziwe nha citwalo cako, ho wusume kulewa milewo miswanu,
kanyhi wuwukamisaje u wihuwilo wako ne ciselinji ciswanu. Hambi iwanhu wanji vyono si wasaka kuvihuliciza i viselinji vyawo, holeka wakawuhodanga u wihuwilo wawo.
Na muli wawo, wo wa Himenayo na Alekizanda, wono nawakombola kuli Setani, ho wejizwe wapele kumutovula u Mulungu.
Ale, yinongozi muli zose, nghukong'onheza vyono wilombela ziswanu, wolombe, wulombezi, no wulumbe, vilavywe kuli Mulungu so wanhu wose,
so watemi na kuli wose wono wena u wulajilize, ho cikale mu mikalile yo wutuvu no mulamu, hamonga no wogopo Mulungu ne mijendele miswanu.
Ne nghani yiyi nha swanu kanyhi yikumwendezo Mulungu u Mukombozi wetu,
mono yakuhila i wanhu wose waponywe, kanyhi wafice ku wumanye mbeka.
Hambi nha hoyuli Mulungu yumonga du, na kanyhi hoyuli yumonga mono kawalamulaga iwanhu no Mulungu, yo munhu, Kilisito Yesu,
mono yelavya mweneco ho yawakomboze iwanhu wose. Wuwo wali wo wuhomelezi we cipango cono u Mulungu yakuhila kuwaponya wanhu wose.
Na ku soko yiyo, ane nghatumwa niwe mutumwa na mwijizi we wanhu wono si Wayuda, ho niyiganule i nghani yo wihuwilo ne mbeka. Nghulonga mbeka, hamba singhulonga wulambi yaye!

Ale, ho hose mu kanisa, kolo mukwitang'anila mu wuhembi, nghusaka iwalume weze kulomba akuno welavizye lukulu kuli Mulungu, na kanyhi wono wosuma kunyasula imiwoko yawo, kuno wakulomba wasina likuwo hamba wuwanji.

Nhavivyo, nghusaka iwacekulu nawo, weze wali cisindo, no kuvwala myenda yono yikuleta lilumbo liswanu muli wene, wavwale viswanu, ninga si ko wihambo wo wutawa zimvili, no wihambo we zizahabu, zilulu, hamba ku wuvwala ivivwalo vyo wuguzi wukamu muno muno,
langa wehambaje kwe metumo maswanu nha vyono yiwanojeye i wacekulu wono wamogopilo Mulungu.
Hambi iwacekulu nha yiwanojeye weyijize watulile, kanyhi wawe wenenenyhezi.
Ninga singhuwakombola iwacekulu wejize hamba kuwatema i walume, langa yiwanojeye weze wekaye watulile du.
Hambi Adamu nha yo yalongola kuwumbwa, na hanyuma yayo, ho Hawa.
Na kanyhi, Adamu yo si yakongwa ng'o, langa u mucekulu yo yakongwa, no kuwubena u Wulajilize wo Mulungu.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo umucekulu koloponywa so wulela wana, hono yekale mu wihuwilo, wendo, wele, no winenenyhezi.
Uwulonje awu, nha wo we mbeka: vyono kolo munhu yakusaka kuwa mulongola mwi kanisa, yuyo yakwilowa mulimo muswanu.

Ninga u mulongola we likanisa, yimunojeye yeze munhu mono yasina yilema, na kanyhi yimunojeye yeze mono yena mugolece yumonga du, kanyhi yeze mwiyimizi, mulula, we cisindo, kanyhi yimunojeye yeze mucemezi na mono yasumile kwijiza,
yalece kuwa mukolwa, hamba munhu we ciwuma wuma, langa yeze mupolo, mono yendile mulamu, kanyhi yalece kuwa munhu mwenda pesa,
kanyhi yimunojeye yeze munhu mono yasumile kuyitonga viswanu mhuga yakwe, no kuwanoza i wanagwe wawe ne cihuliko ne cogopo cose.
Hambi hono munhu yawe si yakusuma kuyitonga viswanu i mhuga yakwe mweneco, ho kosuma wule kulidima likanisa lyo Mulungu?
Kanyhi u munhu mono yakali nakangala mu wihuwilo, yalece kunozwa kuwa mulongola mwi kanisa, ho yalece kumema wiwoni, no kuling'anizwa nha vyono Setani yakaling'anizwa.
Yimunojeye yawe munhu mono yena lilumbo yiswanu muli wanhu wono wali kunze ye likanisa, ho yalece kuhoswa no kugwila mu mutego wa Setani
Ne wetumami nawo mwi kanisa yiwanojeye wawe wanhu wono wena mikalile miswanu, kanyhi walonga mbeka, walece kuwa wang'wela muno we divayi, hamba kuwa ne masulumizi ga pesa,
hambi nha yiwanojeye kwibata ko mutima muswanu imbeka ya mugati yo wihuwilo.
Ku soko yiyo, yiwanojeye wamule wajelwe, na kolo wakwijela vyono wosuma, ho wawe wetumami mu witumami wawo.
Ne wagolece zawo nawo, yiwanojeye wawe ne mikalile miswanu, si waheha wanhu, wono si wakolwa, kanyhi wehuwilwa muli zose.
Nayo mwitumami mwi kanisa yimunojeye yeze no mugolece yumonga du, kanyhi yeze mono kasumaga kutonga viswanu iwanagwe ne mhuga yakwe.
Hambi i wetumami wono wetumaga mulimo wawo viswanu, nha wetujilaga musambo muswanu, no kusuma kulonga kuno wasina woga zo wihuwilo wawo wono wuli muli Kilisito Yesu.
Nghukwandicila baluwa yiyi, akuno ninga nitumbiye vyono nokuza kwako mu vilo vivi baha.
Ninga hono nyhezwe muno, baluwa yiyi yokumanyiza imikalile yono yicinojeye ciwe nayo mu mhuga yo Mulungu, lyono lyo likanisa lyo Mulungu mumi, lyono lye 'sumbili no musinji we mbeka.

Hambi nha hasina mahwele go gose kuli zo wuwaha wa ze cinyele ze dini yetu, vyono: Yejela mu hwani yo munhu yahomelelwa no Muhe vyono yali ling'ani, yawonwa ne wamalayika. Yaganulwa mu zinghungugo, yehuwilwa kononze kose, yakabocelwa kucanyha ku wulanga mu lukumyo.
Ningo Muhe yakulonga ciwonelela vyono mu vilo vyono vikuza, iwanhu wanji wolowulecela lukulu u wihuwilo, nawo woloyihulicila i myuhe yo wukoci, no kwibata mafundo ge masetani.
Imafundo ge liwala lilyo, gatandazwaga ne wanhu walambi kanyhi wakonji, wono i viselinji vyawo vinha kotya nha vinyanywe ne cuma cono cili moto.

Iwanhu we liwala lilyo, wejizaga wakutya, gowa masutya kwitola, sunga no kulya zindigwa zinji zinji. Ninga u Mulungu nha yaziwumba i zindigwa zizo, ho wawalya wono wehuwiye na wono watuga kuyimanya imbeka, wazitumamile kwe lilumbo.
Hambi vyose vyono yaviwumba Mulungu nha viswanu, hamba hasina cono cinojeye kusemunwa, langa yinojeye vyose vibocelwe kwe malombo no wulumbe,
ku soko inghani yo Mulungu hamonga no wulombe, vicinozaga i cinhu cico ciwa celile hali Mulungu.
Hono wuwapele i wandugu wose imalajilizo gaga, kowa mwitumami muswanu wa Yesu Kilisito, akuno wukwijendeleza mu cimuhe mu zinghani zo wihuwilo ne mejizo ge mbeka, gono go mweneco kugatyatyaga.
Ninga wulecele lukulu zisimo zono zisina dini na zono zisina nhunizo yo yose. Wizowelezaje kwikala mu mikalile yo wogopa Mulungu.
Hambi wizoweleze wo muwili nha wina cambuzi cayo, ninga wizoweleze we cimuhe, wina cambuzi ce mawala gose, hambi nha wukucihuwiza zo wumi we vilo vivi na wuwo kanyhi we vilo vyono vikuza.
Hambi wulonje awu nha wa mbeka, kanyhi wunojeye wubocelwe kanyhi wihuwilwe.
Ase cikupiligala no kwituma cihidimbaye, hambi nha cimuwiciye witumbilo wetu u Mulungu mumi, mono yo Mukombozi wetu co wanhu wose, na ko muno wa walya wono wehuwiye.
Ale wuwapelaje malajilizo gaga ne mejizo gaga.

Wulecele lukulu kulumba munhu wo wose ho yakubedegale ku soko yo wudodo wako, langa weze wuli musambo kuli wono wehuwiye: mu wulonje wako, mu mijendele yako, mu wendo, wihuwilo, na mu mikalile miswanu.
Witumamilaje madaha gako hamonga ne vilungo vyako, mu wusoma calinze Imandiko Gono Gelile, mu wuganule na mu wijize, sunga kolo nghuza.
Wulece kuleka kucitumamila i cipegwa cicilya ca Kilisito cono cili muli'gwe, cono wapelelwa mu zinghani ze wawizi, na mu wuwicilwe miwoko ne wanyamhala.
Wuzihwesaje zizo zose muno muno, hamonga no kuzitumama, u wujendelele wako ho wusume kwijela hali wose.
Wiyikamisaje muno muno go mweneco hamonga ne mejizo gako. Wuhidimbale muno muno mu wituma zizo, hambi nha kokwiponya go mweneco, hamonga na wawo wono wakukuhuliciza.
Wulece kumutacila u munhu muwaha, langa wumunenaje kotya nha Sogo mono yakulelile. Wuwatendele Iwadodo we cilume nawo, kotya nha wanduguzo,
nawo iwacekulu wadala, kotya nha wanyina zako, ne wahinza nawo, wuwatendelaje nha kotya walumbuzo, mu wele wose.
Wuwapelaje cogopo iwacekulu wafwile wono mbeka wafwile.

Ninga u mufwile mono yena wana hamba wezukulu, awo wawo yiwanojeye wamule weyijize kuwanozeza viswanu we mhuga zawo weneco, na mu nzila yiyo, ho wosuma kuwanemya i walezi wawo hamonga ne wakuku zawo nhavivyo, hambi yiyo nha yo nghani yono yimwendezago Mulungu.
Ale, umucekulu mono mufwile mbeka, mono yasina munhu wo kumutaza, yakondya kumuwicilo Mulungu witumbilo wakwe, kanyhi yakujendelela kumulomba Mulungu no kuneneleza u wutazi wakwe cilo ne misi.
Ninga mucekulu mono yakwikala mu mikalile yo wiyendezi mweneco, yuyo yakondya kufwa akuno ho yakali mumi.
Wuwapelaje malajilizo gaga, ho walece kuwa na yilema.
Ninga munhu mono si kawalulaga wanhu we mhuga yakwe, ko muno wawalya wa mu kaya yakwe, umunhu yuyo yakondya kuwukana wihuwilo, kanyhi mubi kuciza no munhu mono siyehuwiye.
Ale, wulece kumwandika mu wityatye we matagwa ge wafwile, u mufwile wo wose mono yakali sinafisa myaka makumi mutandatu. Nayo kanyhi yeze mono yakatolwa kali kamonga du,

yeze mono yena lilumbo yiswanu, umucekulu mono yawawiluse wanagwe viswanu, mono yawabocela wajenzi mukaya yakwe, mono yawazuguza magulu iwanhu wo Mulungu, yawataza wanhu mu wugaye wawo, kanyhi yelavya ku wituma metumo maswanu.
Ninga wulece kuwandika i wafwile we lizika lidodo, hambi nha kolo i masulumizi gawo ge mumbwa yawo gakucila kuwa ne vilungo muno, si nho wilavye wawo wa kuli Kilisito, baho nha wosaka kutolwa kanyhi,
holeka wokwijela wasutyi, vyono weza si wehuwilwa mu cilagane cawo i cilongozi.

Ne wafwile wono wenha wawo wajilizaga i vilejeho vyawo ko wupilima-pilima mu kaya na kaya. Ne nghani 'mbi muno muno, wendaga maheho muno mu wupilime wawo, wenjizaga wuhesi kuli wayawo wanji, kanyhi no kwitajila mu zinghani ze wanhu wanji, akuno kanyhi wakulonga sunga ne zinghani zono siziwanojeye kulonga.
Holeka nali nyende wawo i wafwile we lizika lidodo watolwe, walele wana no kuzikamisa zikaya zawo, iwalugu wetu ho walece kutuga cilejeho co kucitovulila.
Hambi iwafwile wanji nha wakondya kwajilila no kumutyatya Setani.

Ninga hono mucekulu Mukilisito yawe yena wafwile mu mhuga yakwe, umwene yimunojeye yawataze, ninga yalece kulilecela likanisa u mutegulo wuwo, i likanisa ho lisume kuwataza iwafwile wawalya wono wasigaye wali wene du.
Iwanyamhala wono watongaga wanhu viswanu yiwanojeye watuje musahala kali kejete, ko muno wawalya wono wahidimbalaga mu wuganule na mu wijize.
Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gatezaga: “Wulece kuyidinda mulomo i ng'ombe yono wukuyitumamila kutowa wuhemba mu cuga,” na kanyhi, “Umwitumami yimunojeye yatuje musahala wakwe.”
Wulece kuvumila wusonjezwe kuli munyamhala, lono i nghani yiyo yisina wuhomelezi wa wanhu wejete hamba wadatu.
Awalya nawo wono wakwituma wubi, wuwatacilaje calinze, ho iwanji nawo wogope.

Nghukukong'onheza hali Mulungu, na hali Kilisito Yesu, na hali wamalayika wono welile, wukamise imalajilizo gaga wulece kuleka hamba limonga, kanyhi, pogola, wulece kumwendeza munhu wo wose muli zose zono kokwituma.
Kanyhi wulece kumuwicila miwoko munhu wo wose musunho, ku soko yo kumwitumamila Muwaha. Wulece kuhanga u wubi we wanji, langa wikamisaje welile mu nhumbula yako.
Wulece kuwa kung'wa malenga gali wene du, langa 'ng'weze ne divayi ndodo so'nda yako, hambi nha kutamwaga kali kenji na kenji.
Uwubi we wanhu wanji wijelaga calinze, nawo wukuwa kuwalongolela ku wuling'anizwe, ninga wubi we wanji, wijelaga du lwa hanyuma yayo.
Nhavivyo, ne metumo maswanu gejelaga calinze, hamba na gagalya gono si gali calinze, sigosuma kuhundikwa.
Iwawanda wose yiwanojeye wawapele lilumbo iwatwa zawo ho wanhu wawe wasina soko yinji yo kulitovulila i litagwa lyo Mulungu ne mafundo getu.

Ne wawanda wono wena watwa zawo Wakilisito, walece kuwabedegala, hambi nha wandugu zawo. Langa yiwanojeye wawetumamile mu wuswanu muno wose, hambi wawo wono watugaga cambuzi mu mulimo wawo, nha wo wawo wono wehuwiye kanyhi wendece kuli Mulungu. Yikunojeye kwijiza no kuziganula izinghani azi:
U munhu wo wose mono yakwijiza suta ne zinghani zizi, kanyhi mono si yakuzivumila i zinghani ze mbeka zo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito ne mafundo ge dini yetu,

yuyo yamemile widunhumuzi, kanyhi hamba siyamanyile cinji co cose. Yo munhu mono yendile wiwanganile no wisonji we zinghani ze bwete, ne zinghani ze liwala lilyo, ziletaga wivu, wisonji, maligo, maganicizo mabi,
no wiwanganile wono wusina ndumo, wono wukulawa kuli wanhu we mahala gono gavizice, kanyhi wono wayisina imbeka. Wono wehwesaga vyono dini, mba yo nzila yo kutujila wugoli.
Yene mbeka dini, yimunozaga munhu kawa mugoli muno, u munhu yuyo hono yawe yaceye ne vinhu vyono yena navyo.
Hambi nha sicaleteleza cinji co cose kononze, kanyhi hamba sicolosoleleza cinji co cose.
Ale holeka, hono ciwe cina ndigwa ne vivwalo, yicinojeye cituzwe mutima navyo.
Ninga wawalya wono wasakaga wagolipe, wagwilaga mu wujelwe, no kugwila mu mutego we masulumizi menji mabi go wulele, gono gawakwegaga sunga ko ku wuhodanjice.

Hambi u wenda muno we zipesa nha wo mwamulizo wo wubi wose. Iwanhu wanji wasulumilaga muno kutuga mapesa, sunga wawuleka no wihuwilo wawo, no kudumanjila dumanjila ako na ako, kutali no wihuwilo wawo no kutukuwika i mitima yawo ko wusungu wuwaha muno.
Ninga 'gwe, go munhu wo Mulungu, wilegaje mu zinghani zizo. Wukamise wiling'ano, no wogopo Mulungu, no wihuwilo, no wendo, ne ngola, no winenenyhezi.
Wumanyhe kwe vilungo vyako vyose wicize lumangho lo wihuwilo, ho witujile cihumbilizwa co wumi we cibitilila, wono wacemelwa lono wawuvumilila u wihuwilo wako hali wahomelezi wenji.
Hali Mulungu mono kavipelaga i vinhu vyose wumi, na hali Yesu Kilisito mono yayihomelela no kuyivumila imbeka hali Pontiyo Pilato,
nghukulajiliza, wugebataje muno i Malajilizo gako no kugakamisa muno muno, sunga lizuwa lililya kolo yakwijela Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
No wijele wakwe, wolokuziza mwipango lyono linojeye lyono lyawikwa no Mulungu umulugutwe kanyhi mono yo Mutemi yali wene, u Mutemi we watemi no Muwaha we wawaha.

Umwene yali wene du yo kekalaga mumi cibitilila, kanyhi kekalaga mu wuzelu wono hasina munhu wo wose mono yadahile kuwusejelela. Hasina munhu mono yasuma kumuwona, hamba mono kosuma kumuwona. Kuli mwene lyeze yilumbo ne vilungo vye cibitilila! Heya.

Wuwalonjelaje iwanhu wagoli we vinhu vye mikalile ya lulu, walece kwidunhumula, hamba kuwika u witumbilo wawo mu sawo yono siyidahile kwitumbilwa, langa wamwitumbilaje Mulungu, mono ko wuswanu wakwe, kacipela i vinhu vyose civisangalalile.
Wuwalonjelaje wetume viswanu, wawe wagoli mu metumo maswanu, kanyhi wawe wacemezi, wono wewikanize mu wuhanga ne wanji zisawo zawo.
Na mu wunoza nhavivyo wakwiyiwutila ciwutwa cono cowa kuli wene musinji wono wukamile kuli cipango cono cikuza. Ho wasume kwiyitujila u wumi wono wo wumi we mbeka.
Gwe, Timoteyo wukamise viswanu zose zono wakozwa. Wilegaje mu miduwo ye ciyinze-yinze, hamonga no wiwanganile wo wulele, muli cico cono wanhu wanji wacemaga: “Wumanye” ninga vyo si vinha.
Hambi wanji nha watezaga vyono wene wakondya kuwa no “Wumanye” wuwo, na ku soko yiyo holeka wakondya kuyajiliza i nzila yo wihuwilo. Lihewa lyo Mulungu, liweze muli nyenye wose!
Ane yo nene Pawulo, mono u Mulungu yakasaka ho niwe mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu,
nane nghukwandicila agwe Timoteyo, go mwanangu u mwendece. Lihewa, no lusungu no mulamu, vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu Baba na kuli Kilisito Yesu u Muwaha wetu, vyeze hamonga nagwe.
Nghumulumbo Mulungu mono nghumwitumamila ne ciselinji ciswanu, nha vyono wanoza i wasogo zangu, nghumulumbo Mulungu nhondo zose lono nghukukumbucila mu wulombe wangu misi ne cilo.
Kanyhi nghugakumbucila i mahozi gako, nane nghusulumila muno muno ciwone nagwe, i nyemo yangu ho yimeme.
Nane nghuwukumbucila wihuwilo wako we mbeka, no wihuwilo wono yali yena nawo mamayo Loyisi, hamonga no nyina yako Ewunike. Nane nitumbiye vyono na gwegwe vyo winha.
Co cikuleka nghukukumbuciza, wucifwanghanizaje i cipegwa cono wapegwa no Mulungu, lono nakuwicilila i miwoko yangu.
Hambi u Muhe mono capegwa no Mulungu, si Muhe mono kocinoza ciwe woga, a, a, ng'o, langa yo Muhe mono kocipela wendo no wiyidime.

Ale, holeka wulece kuwona cevu kumuhomelela u Muwaha wetu Yesu, hamba wulece kuwona cevu ku soko yangu nene no mufungwa, mono funjigwe ku soko yakwe, Yesu. Ninga wuhanje magazo ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu, mu nghango ye vilungo vyono Mulungu yakukupela.

Mwene yacikomboza, kanyhi yakacicema ciwe wanhu wakwe mweneco, si ku soko vyono cinojeye so metumo getu, aa, ng'o, ninga ku so wuhile wakwe mweneco, na so lihewa lyakwe. Nayo yakacipela i lihewa lilyo ku soko ya Kilisito Yesu, lono vilo vyali vikali si vinawa.

Ninga alu cakondya kugubulilwa so wuze wo Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito, u mwene yakondya kuvidumizya lukulu i vilungo vye lifwa, nayo yakawanzalika u wumi wono wusina lifwa, mu nzila yo Luganuzi Luswanu.
Nayo u Mulungu yahagula nene, ho niwe mutumwa, kanyhi niwe mwijizi ku soko yo kuluganula Luganuzi Luswanu,

na ku soko yiyo, holeka nghutamiswa nhavivi. Holeka nghali nina witumbilo wuwaha, hambi nha nimumanyile mono namwihuwila, kanyhi manyiye lukulu vyono mwene kocikamisa cicilya cono yanghoza, sunga Mwizuwa lilya.
Holeka wugakamisizaje lukulu i mafundo gagalya ge mbeka gono nakwijiza, kanyhi wikalaje du mu wihuwilo na mu wendo wetu wuwo, mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
Inghani yiyilya swanu yono wakozwa, wuyikamisizaje mu nzila ye vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, mono kekalaga muli sese.
Kanyhi nha vyono wumanyile, i wanhu wose wono wali mu yisi ya Asiya, wakondya kundeka, na muli wawo, moyuli Fugelo na Helimogene.
U Muwaha yayiwonelaje lusungu mhuga ya Onesifolo, vyono yasangalazaga kali kenji mu nhumbula yangu, hamba si yawona cevu vyono ane nali funjigwe mu jela,
langa yali yeza kufika du ku Lumi, hobaho yakamula kunondola yasimbiliye muno, sunga yakambona.
U Muwaha yamuwonele lusungu Mwi'zuwa lilya! Kanyhi na gwegwe nhavivyo, wuzimanyile viswanu zi nyinji zono yanyitumamila kuko ku Efeso.
Holeka agwe mwanangu Timoteyo, weze ne vilungo mwihewa lyono cikulituga so wilunza na Kilisito Yesu.
Ale, wugasolaje i mafundo gono wagahulika nghuganula ha mwande ye wahomelezi wenji, nagwe wuwakoze wanhu wehuwilwa, wono nawo wosuma kuwejiza wanji nhavivyo.
Wuhanje mu magazo nha musilikale mwihuwilwa wa Kilisito Yesu.
U musilikale lono yali ku wulugu, keyimilaga zose ze mikalile ye nhondo zose, ho yasume kumwendeza u muwaha wakwe mono yamwandika wusilikale.
Nayo u munhu wo wose mono kesumanizaga mu midawalo, si kosuma kwisumaniza viswanu no kusuma, sunga yabocele ne cipegwa co wusume wakwe, hono yalece kutyatya u wityatye wono wukusakwa mu midawalo.
Nayo u mulimi mono yakondya kwituma mulimo muzito, yuyo yanojeye yabocele i lifungu lilongozi lye nhwanga.
Ale, Timoteyo, wuzihwesaje muno zizo zono nghulonga, hambi u Muwaha nha kokupela wusume wo kuzizuka zose.
Wumukumbucilaje Yesu Kilisito mono yazukulwa muli wafu, mono yali wa mululelo lwa Dawudi, nha vyono lukulonga u Luganuzi Luswanu lono niluganulaga.
Na ku soko yiyo yo kuluganula Luganuzi Luswanu, holeka ane nghugazika, na kanyhi holeka mbopigwe ne manyolo nha nili musutyi. Ninga inghani yo Mulungu siyosuma kuwopwa ne manyolo,
holeka nghukangalila muli vyose ku soko ye wahagulwa wo Mulungu, nawo nhavivyo ho watuje u Wukombozi wono wukuziza mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito, kanyhi wono wuletaga lukumyo lwe cibitilila.
No wulonji wuwu wo we mbeka, wono wukutya, “Hono ciwe cafwizana nayo, ale, cowumipana nayo nhavivyo.
Na hono cijendelele no wukangalile, ale, colotemana nayo nhavivyo. Ninga hono cimukane, ale, kolocikana nayo nhavivyo.
Na hono cilece kuwa wehuwilwa, ninga mwene kekalaga mwihuwilwa cibitilila. Hambi mwene nha sikosuma kwiyikana mweneco.”

Ale, wuwakumbucizaje wanhu wako izinghani zizino, kanyhi wuwalonjelaje hali Mulungu, vyono walecele lukulu wiwanganile wa mu zinghani. Hambi wiwanganile wuwo, nha si wukwiliye cinji hamba hadodo, langa wuletaga wuhodanjice wuwaha kuli awalya wono wakuwuhulika.
Wupiligale muno kwiwika mu mikalile ye lilumbo hali Mulungu nha mwitumami mono si yakuwuwonela cevu u mulimo wakwe, kanyhi mono yakwijiziza mu wulunji inghani ye mbeka.
Kanyhi wilegaje mu wiwanganile we ciyinze-yinze na wo wulele, hambi zizo nha zicilaga kuwatemanula wanhu, no kuwawika kutali no Mulungu.
I mafundo ge liwala lilyo, genha lilonda lyono lilizaga muwili. Ne wanhu wono wejiza imejizo gago, muli wawo wo wa Humenayo na Fileto.
Awo wajilila, kanyhi wali kutali ne mbeka, kanyhi wakuwatajila wanji mu wukangamyanje mu wihuwilo wawo, vyono ti, u wuzuce wetu wakondya kupuluta.

Ninga musinji wono wukamile, wono wawikwa no Mulungu si wusinjisikaga yaye, na mucanyha yo musinji wuwo, zandikwe zinghani azi, “U Muwaha yawamanyile i wakwe,” na kanyhi, “Na muli wose mono yakwiyitya, mwene yo wo Muwaha, yimunojeye yeleje no wavu.”

Mu makaya mawaha, mozili bakuli ne viya vye mawala gose, viya vinji vya fweza, vinji vya zahabu, vinji vya mbawo, na vinji vya wulongo, na vinji viwicigwe viwe vitumamilwa vye siya, na vinji kanyhi viwe vitumamilwa vye nhondo zose.

Holeka hono munhu yeyeze ko kwilega ne makani gago gose go wavu, yuyo yo kowa co ciya ce vitumamilwa vye siya, vyono yakondya kuwikwa siya, nayo yuyo yakumunojezo Muwaha wakwe, nayo kanyhi yakuwa yewikanizize lukulu so mulimo wo wose muswanu.
Ale, kanyhi wilegaje no wusulumizi we cizelelo zelelo, wutyatye wiling'ano, wihuwilo, wendo, mulamu, hamonga ne wanhu wose wono wakumulomba Muwaha kwe nhumbula swanu.
Kanyhi wilegaje no wuwanji wo wulele, na we ciwula mahala, wumanyile vyono zizo ziletaga wugombane.
Yimunojeye mwitumami wo Muwaha yalece kugombana ne wanhu. Langa yimunojeye yawe mupolo kuli wanhu wose, yeze mwijizi muswanu, kanyhi mono yena no wukangalizi,
mono mupolo, lono yakuwalanjiza walugu wakwe, lunji u Mulungu kowapela cilejeho co kunena, nawo ho wayimanye i mbeka.
Nawo u wizuce wawo, ho wowawuyila kanyhi, nawo ho wawuce mu mutego wa Setani mono yali yakondya kuwebata no kuwanoza wamuhulice muli zose zono yakuzisaka mwene.
Weze kukumbucila vyono, mu vilo vya ku ndumo, vyolokuza vipango vyo wugaye.
Iwanhu wolowa weyenda weneco, wono wena masulumizi ge mapesa, wewoni, wenyanyaguzi, waligo Mulungu, wolowa wasina cihuliko kuli walezi wawo, wono wasine 'lumbo, kanyhi wabi,
wolokuza wanhu wono wolowa wasina wendo mu zinhumbula zawo, wono wasina lusungu, wasonjezi, wabuguci, kanyhi wakali, nawo wocisula cinhu co cose i ciswanu,
wolowa wagaluci, we lizeze, kanyhi wamemile widunhumuzi, nawo wokwenda zo wiyendeza weneco, si nho kumwendo Mulungu.
Kunze yawo wokwijela nha wanhu wono wamogopilo Mulungu, ninga akuno ho wakuvilema ivilungo vyakwe. Holeka wilejelaje lukulu ne wanhu we liwala lilyo.
Na wanji muli wene, wo wabitaga mu zinyumba ze wanhu, no kuwateka wacekulu wasocele, wono wavunice ne mitegulo yo wubi, na wono wakutongwa no wusulumizi we mawala gose,
wacekulu wono wajelaga kwiyijiza nhondo zose, ninga siwasumaga hamba hadodo kuyimanya i mbeka.
Ne wanhu we liwala lilyo wawanganaga ne mbeka nha vyono Yane na Yambule, wawangana na Musa.
Ninga hamba si wosuma kujendelela muno, hambi u wulele wawo nha wokwijela calinze hali wose. Na vyo yali kuli Yane na Yambule.
Ninga agwe Timoteyo, wagebata i mejizo gangu, ne mikalile yangu, no wuhile wangu mu mikalile yangu, u wendo wangu, ne ngola yangu,

wuwinjilizwe no wugazwe wangu. Kanyhi wuzimanyile zose zono zikanyagana ku Antiyokiya, na ku Ikoniyo, na ku Lusitela. Nane nakangalila wuwinjilizwe wuwaha muno! Ninga Muwaha yakamhonya muli zose zizo.
Na muli wose mono yakuhila kwikala mu mikalile yono yikumwendeza Mulungu, mu wilunza na Kilisito Yesu, yimunojeye sunga yawinjilizwe du.
Ninga i wanhu wabi ne wakonji, awo wojendelela kuwa wabi du, wakuwakonga wayawo, kanyhi sunga na weneco wakukongwa.
Ninga agwe go mweneco, wikalaje mu mbeka yiyilya yono wejizwa kanyhi wukayivumila muno muno. Na wono wakwijiza wuwamanyile,
kanyhi wukumbuciye vyono wulawa wudodo wako wagamanya i Mandiko Gono Gelile gono gosuma kukupela lihala lyono lyokuletela mhonelo mu nzila yo wihuwilo wono wuli muli Kilisito Yesu.
I Mandiko gose Gono Gelile, gandikwa mu nzila yo wutonji wo Mulungu, nago gakwiliye mu mikalile yo wiling'ano,
u munhu mono yakumwitumamilo Mulungu ho yawe yakwilaniciye, kanyhi yakondelezezwe lukulu ku wituma i milimo miswanu yose.
Nane nghukukong'onheza hali Mulungu na hali Kilisito Yesu, mono kowaling'aniza wanhu i womi ne wafu, na ku soko vyono yakuza kutema nha Mutemi,

holeka wuyiganulaje nghani yiyo, wiyohaje du kuyiganula (mu cipango cono cinojeye, hamba yiwe mu cipango cono si cinojeye), kalipile no kulanjiza, kanyhi wuwaswaswanizaje wanhu wose, akuno wukuwejiza ko wukangalizi wose.

I lipango lyokuza lyono wanhu si wolokwenda kugahuliciza i mejizo ge mbeka, langa wene wokwenda kutyatya masulumizi gawo weneco, no kwilundila wejizi wenji wono wowalonjela zinghani zizo du zono i makutu gawo gowa gewikanize kuwuhulicize.
Hamba si wokwendela lukulu kuyihulika imbeka, langa wokwenda kuzihulicila zisimo zo wulambi.
Agwe, ninga wikalaje meso muli zose, wukangalile magazo, witumaje u mulimo wo muganula Luganuzi Luswanu, wuwufisilizizaje lukulu u witumami wako.
Ninga ane ku lubavu lwangu, niwikanize du, ku wulavywa niwe yikumbiko, ne lidaha lyo wufwe wangu nha lyasejelela.
Hidimbala muno mu wisumanize, muhinzo niwumala viswanu, sunga no wihuwilo nawo niwukamisa.

Alu yisigaye yo wubocela i cipegwa co wisumanize wangu, ku soko ye mikalile yo wiling'ano, i cipegwa cono Muwaha Muling'anizi we ling'ani, kolomhela Mwizuwa lilya, kanyhi hamba si nene du nili wene, langa na wose wono wakulanjilila ko wendo i mazizo gakwe.
Wuhidimbale kuza kuli'ne mbela.
Hambi Dema nha yandeka, mwene yenda ze yinze ya lulu, yakabita ku Tesalonike. Kileseke nayo yabita ku Galatiya, na Tito yabita ku Dalumatiya.
Alu yo Luka yali wene du mono yali hamonga nane bahano. Wumusolaje Maluko muzane nayo, hambi nha kosuma kumhelo'tazi mu mulimo wangu.
Tukiko nayo, namutuma akulya ku Efeso.
Nagwe kolo wukuza, wundetelezezaje ne likoti lyangu lyono nalileka kwa Kalupo ku Tulowa, wundetelaje ne vitabu vivilya, ko muno avilya vyono vinozezwe nyhingo.
Ayulya u mutyani we vyuma vidunghu, mono kacemwaga Alekizanda, yanhendela vibi muno muno, ningo Muwaha komulipa nha vyono genhe metumo gakwe.
Ale, wilanjililaje kuli mwene, hambi nha yayibezaga inghani yetu ko wukali muno.
Ha witetele wangu wulongozi, hasina hamba munhu monga mono yema ku lubavu lwangu, langa wose wandeka. Ninga Mulungu yalece kuwawalila wubi wawo!
Ningo Muwaha yali yali hamonga nane, yamhela vilungo, sunga nghasuma kuyiganula inghani nha vyono yinha, i wanhu wono si Wayahudi ho wayihulice, kanyhi nghaponywa mu waling'anizwe wo kuwulagwa.
Holeka u Muwaha si koleka kumhonya muli makani gose i mabi, kanyhi konghamisa sunga ko ku wutemi wakwe wa ku wulanga. Ale, kuli Mwene, lweze lukumyo cibitilila ne cibitilila! Heya.
Ale, wuwalamusaje wa Pilisika na Akila, hamonga ne mhuga ya Onesifolo.
Elasito yasigala ku Kolinto, nayo Tulofimo namuleka ku Mileto, vyono yali yatamigwe.
Ale, wusimbilile kuzo kwangu lono lipango lye cinyuli likali sinafika. Ewubulo, Pude, Lino, na Kilawudiya wose wakukulamusa, sunga na we zindugu wanji, wose wakukulamusa.
Ale, du, u Muwaha yawezane nagwe mu nhumbula yako. Ne lihewa liwezane nanye wose.
Ane yo nene Pawulo, u mwitumami wo Mulungu, kanyhi mutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito nghwandika. Ane haguywe ho niwuzenje u wihuwilo we wahagulwa wo Mulungu no kuwatonga ho wayimanye i mbeka yo wuhembi wetu,
wono u musinji wayo wo wowitumbilo wo kuwutujila u wumi we cibitilila. U Mulungu mono si kalongaga wulambi, yacihuwiziza u wumi wuwo mu myaka ye katali lono yali yikali si nawa,
ne lidaha lyono likwiliye lyali lyeza kufika, yakalyanzalicila mu nghani yakwe. Ane napegwa i nghani yiyo, ho niyanzize mu wulajilize wo Mulungu, u Mukombozi wetu.
Nghukwandicila agwe Tito go mwanangu we mbeka mu wihuwilo wono cihanjile sese wose. Ilihewa no mulamu wono wukulawa kuli Mulungu Baba, na kuli Kilisito Yesu, u Mukombozi wetu.
Ane nakuleka ku Kilete ho wunozeleze zono zasigala zono zali zikali nakamilicila, kanyhi ho wuwahagule wanyamhala wa Kanisa no kuwawika mu makaya gose. Ninga weze kukumbucila zono nakulajiliza,
vyono yimunojeye u munyamhala wa Kanisa yawe munhu mono yena mugolece yumonga du, kanyhi yinojeye ne wanagwe weze wehuwiye, wono si wali nyono hamba si wali cibede.

Nayo Asikofu vyono yo mulanjilizi wo mulimo wo Mulungu, holeka yimunojeye yawe munhu mono yasina yilema. Yalece kuwa mwidunhumuzi, hamba kuwa mukolwa ne likuwo mbela, hamba mukolwa ku wujimbi, hamba mufyuzi, hamba si musulumila cambuzi cono si ce ling'ani.
Langa yimunojeye yawe mucemezi, kanyhi mono yakwenda iziswanu. Kanyhi yimunojeye yawe munhu mutuvu, we ling'ani.
Yimunojeye kanyhi, yebatile lukulu i nghani huwilwa nha vyono wukwijizwa. Holeka kosuma kuwataza wanji so mafundo ge mbeka no kusuma kuwalajila i masutya gawo wono wakuwanga kuli ze mafundo gago.
Hambi nha ko wali wenji wono wasina cihuliko, ko muno wa walya wono wapituka wakulawa mu dini ye Ciyahudi na wo wawo wono wasina cihuliko, wono wakuwajiliziza na wanji mu wulele wawo.
Yiwanojeye i milomo yawo yidindwe, hambi nha weza kuwahodanga i wanhu wose so mejizo gawo gono si gawanojeye wejize, nawo wakwituma zizo ko wuhile wubi wo kusaka ho watuje mapesa.
Sunga muyawo monga; muyagwe ne wawizi wawo yalonga mbeka lono yatela, “Wakilete walambi nhondo zose, wenha malimu, wabugu na kanyhi wadoba!”
Holeka ku soko yiyo yikunojeye wuwakalipile muno muno, ho wawe no wihuwilo wono wukwilaniciye.
Walece kujendelela ne zisimo ze bwete ze Ciyahudi, hamba i malajilizo ge wanhu gono gakwibuka muli wanhu wono wayilema i mbeka.
Zose zelile kuli wono welile, ninga kuli we makomaza na wono si wehuwiye, kusina cono celile, hambi i mahala gawo sunga ne viselinji vyawo nha vitipizwe.
I wanhu wono wenha wawo, watezaga ati wamumanyile u Mulungu, ninga kumbe mu metumo gawo ho wamukanaga. Wo wanhu we makomaza, kanyhi wali cibede, hamba si wakwiliye kanyhi mu nghani yo yose i swanu.
Ninga agwe yikunojeye wuganule ze mafundo ge telele.
Wuwalonjelaje i wakombi vyono yiwanojeye waweze ne cisindo, wawe watuvu, weyimizi, kanyhi waweze no wihuwilo we telele, wawe no wendo hamonga no wukangalizi.
Wuwalonjelaje sunga ne wadala nawo nhavivyo yiwanojeye wawe ne mikalile yo wumogopa u Mulungu, walece kuwa wasonjezi hamba kuwa wawanda wo wujimbi. Yiwanojeye wawe kwijiza i ziswanu,
ho wawazoweleze i wahinza kuwenda i walume zawo hamonga ne wana wawo,
kanyhi weze weyimizi akuno wali cisindo, wawe kuzilanjilila viswanu i zinghani za mu zinyumba zawo, kanyhi waweze ne cihuliko kuli walume zawo, ho nghani yo Mulungu yilece kubedegalwa.
Ne wazelelo nawo nha vivyo, wuwafundaje wawe no wiyimizi.
Yikunojeye gwegwe go mweneco weze wina musambo we metumo maswanu. Weze wuli mutuvu, ne mafundo gako geze gena wuzito.
Ne zinghani zako zilece kuwa na wuhoswe wo wose, i walugu wako ho wapuwe, walaza kuwa wasina cibi cinji co cose cono wocilonga muli'se.
Yiwanojeye nawo i wetumami wawahulice iwawaha wawo, no kuwendeza muli zose. Walece kuwangana nawo,

hamba kuwahiziza i vinhu vyawo. Ninga yiwanojeye walajile vyono wene waswanu, kanyhi wehuwilwa nhondo zose, ho wasume kugatujila lilumbo yiswanu i mafundo go Mulungu u Mukombozi wetu ku soko ye metumo gawo gose.
Hambi ilihewa lyo Mulungu nha lyanzalikwe ku soko yo wukombozwe we wanhu wose.
Ne lihewa lilyo likucijiza ciwulekaje wavu wose no wusulumizi wose wa mononze, ciweze no wiyimizi, ho cikale mu mikalile ye ling'ani yo kumogopa u Mulungu mono yinze yiyi ya lulu,
akuno cikulilindila lizuwa alilya i liswanu lyono cilitumbiye, mu cipango cono lokwijelela u lukumyo lo Mulungu Muwaha no Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Mono yelavya mweneco ho yacikomboze mu wavu wetu wose, ho yacinoze ciwe cisina yilema ase co wanhu wakwe mweneco, wanhu wono wena wuhile wo kwituma metumo maswanu.
Ale, wuwafundaje zizo, kanyhi wuwitumamilaje u wulajilize wako wose, akuno wukuwaswaswaniza no kuwasugula wono wakukuhuliciza. Munhu wo wose yalece kukubedegala.
Wuwakumbucizaje wanhu wawogope i walongola, na wono wena u wulajilize, wawahulice, kanyhi weze wewikanizize lukulu ku wituma zose ziswanu.
Wuwalonjelaje vyono walece kumuliga munhu wo wose, langa wekalaje welamuye akuno wakwiyihulika, kanyhi weze wapolo kuli wanhu wose.

Hambi mu vipango vinji, nase nha cali walele, kanyhi cili cibede, cali cajiliye. Cali cili wawanda we masulumizi ne makani ga mononze. Cekalilaga mu mikalile yo wavu no wivu, wanhu wakacisula, nase cikawasula.
Ninga caza kugubulwa i cidaha co wuswanu no wendo wo Mulungu, Mukombozi wetu,

yakacikomboza. Si yacikomboza ku soko ye nghani yo yose swanu yono cetuma sese, langa yacikomboza ku soko yo lusungu lwakwe, mu nzila yo Muhe Mono Yelile mono yakucipela ho cilelwe wupya, no kuwa ne mikalile mipya ko kucikwema kwe malenga.
U Mulungu yakacijidila yasina cipimo zo Muhe Mono Yelile muli Yesu Kilisito, Mukombozi wetu,
na ku so lihewa lyakwe ho cisume kuvumilwa hali Mulungu no kuwubocela u Wumi we cibitilila wono ciwitumbiye.

Ne nghani yiyi ya mbeka. Nghukulomba wuzilongaje wusimbiliye zinghani zi zino, ho wawalya wono wamwihuwiye u Mulungu wawe no wuhile wo kucitumamila cilejeho cawo mu wituma ziswanu, zono swanu na zono zina cambuzi kuli wanhu.
Ninga wilegaje mu wuwanji wo wulele, hamba mu wiwanganile wo wuwale we zindelo ze wakoko, no wugomvi, no wiwanganile muli zo Wulajilize. I zinghani zizo zisina hamba cambuzi kanyhi za bwete du.
U munhu mono yakuleta matemanuko, wumukagaje kamonga ne kejete, ninga hanyuma wumulekaje nha vyono yenha.
Nagwe wumanyile vyono munhu we liwala lilyo yakondya kwajililila lukulu, no wubi wakwe wukumuhomelela nha vyono musutyi.
Nilawa kuwa namutuma u kwako Alitema hamba Tukiko, wuhidimbale wuze kono Nikapoli wumbone, hambi nha nalamula vyono nowa kuko mwipango lye cinyuli.
Wuhidimbale kumutaza u mwana Zena u mukamisa uwulajilize hamonga na Apolo, ho wasume kwanza ze mihinzo yawo, kanyhi wulanjilile walece kwanjila cinji co cose cono wakusaka.
Yiwanojeye wanhu wetu weyijize vyono yiwanojeye kuvitumila vidaha vyawo mu wituma ziswanu, ho wawataze wono wena wanjile we mbeka, ne mikalile yawo nayo yeze mikalile yono yinojeye.
Wose wono nili hamonga nawo, wakukulamusa. Wuwalamusaje wose wono wacendile mu wihuwilo. Ilihewa lyo Mulungu liwezane na nyenye wose.
Ane yo nene Pawulo mono mbopigwe mu jela ku soko ya Kilisito Yesu, na Timoteyo ndugu yetu, cikukwandicila agwe Filemoni u mwendece wetu no mwitumami muyetu,
hamonga ne likanisa lyono likuwa kwitang'anilila mu nyumba yako, na kuli Afiya u lumbu lyetu, na kuli Alicipo u musilikale muyetu.
Ilihewa no mulamu vyono vikulawa kuli Mulungu na kuli u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito, viwezane nanye.
Nghuwa kukukumbucila nhondo zose mu wulombe wangu agwe Filemoni, kanyhi nghumulumba u Mulungu,
nha vyono nghuzihulika zo wihuwilo wono wina nawo kuli Muwaha wetu Yesu, na zo wendo wako kuli wanhu wo Mulungu wose.
Nghulomba u wihuwilo wono wina nawo kotya sese, wukupele u wusume wo kumanyila lukulu i ziswanu zose zono cikuzituga so wilunze wetu na Kilisito.
Gwe mwendece, u wendo wako wamhela nyemo mbaha muno muno, no kumhela vilungo mu nhumbula yangu! Ne zinhumbula ze wanhu wo Mulungu zikasangalala muno muno ku soko yako.
Na ku soko yiyo, hamba niwe nali sume kukulonjela witume cono wunojeye kwituma, nha nili nduguyo muli Yesu.
Ninga ku soko yo wendo, mbona yili ciba hono nghulombe. Nghunoza nha vivi, hamba yiwe ane Pawulo nili mutumwa wa Kilisito Yesu, nalu kanyhi nili mufungwa mu jela ku soko yakwe.
Alu nina nghani monga du yono nghukulomba ku soko yo mwanangu Onesimo, u mwanangu muli Kilisito, hambi nha neza nili sogwe mono nimuleleye lono nili mu cifungo.
Yo Onesimo yuyulya mono mwidaha linji si yakutazaga cinji, ninga alu yakunhaza ane sunga na gwegwe.
Alu nghumugomola u kwako, nayo yenha i nhumbula yangu nene no mweneco.
Nali nyende Onesimo yajendelele kwikalana nane bahano, ho yanhaze njele yo gwegwe Filemoni, ku soko yo Luganuzi Luswanu, lono ane nghali nili mu cifungo.

Ninga si nosuma kwituma nghani yinji lono nghali nakombolwa na gwegwe. Si nyendile nghudindimize ho wunhaze, vyono u wuswanu wako wunojeye wulawilile mu wuhile wako gwegwe go mweneco, hamba si mu wudindimizwe.
Lunji Onesimo yawuka kwako so cidaha cidodo du, ho wusume kuwezana nayo kanyhi mu myaka yose.

Naluno mwene, si yenha muwanda du kanyhi, langa yawa muswanu kuciza muno si nho muwanda, u mwene yaweza ndugu yetu mwendece. Kanyhi yaweza munhu wa cambuzi ciwaha u kwangu, sunga no kwako nhavivyo, si koleka kuwa munhu wa cambuzi ciwaha kotya muwanda na kanyhi kotya ndugu yetu muli Muwaha.
Ale, holeka hono wuwe wukumbona ane nili muyago, ale, wumubocelaje kanyhi nha vyono wali wumbocele nene no mweneco.
Na hono yawe yali yakusutizye cinji, hamba lunji yena mugawa kuli 'gwe, ale, wundayaje nene.
Nghuyandika i nghani yiyi no muwoko wangu nene no mweneco. Nene Pawulo nolipa! (Hamba sina soko yo kulonga vyono nagwe wina mugawa kwangu gwegwe go mweneco.)
Ale du kanyhi ndugu yangu, wunozezaje i nghani yiyo ku soko ye litagwa lyo Muwaha, wusangalazizaje i nhumbula yangu muli Kilisito.
Nghwandika, akuno nina no witumbilo, vyono si koleka kuvumila u wulombe wangu. Akuno manyile, vyono kokwituma kuciza ya zizi zono nghukulomba witume.
Hamonga na zizo, wumbikanizizaje ha wugono, hambi nha nitumbiye vyono so wulombe wenyu, u Mulungu nha komhela cilejeho, ho nize nimulamusenyi
Epafala u mufungwa muyangu mu jela muli Kilisito Yesu, yakukulamusa.
Nawo wa Maluko na Alisitaliko na Dema na Luka, i wetumami wayangu, wose wakukulamusa.
Ilihewa lyo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito liwezane na nyenye wose.
I katali u Mulungu yalonga ne wasetu kali kenji, na mu nzila nyinji, mu nzila ye wawizi,
ninga mu vilo avi vyo mudumo, kalongana nase mu nzila yo Mwanagwe. Na muli mwene, u Mulungu mo yayiwumbila yinze, kanyhi yakamuwika ho yaviteme vinhu vyose.

U mwene wo wubulile wo lukumyo lo Mulungu, kanyhi yo hwani ye mbeka yo Mulungu mweneco, nayo yakuyisikamizya yinze mu nghani yakwe ye vilungo. Lono yali yakondya kuwanenela wanhu u wubi wawo, yakekala ku wulanga ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye.
U Mwana yo muwaha yacizize wa malayika, nha vyono i litagwa lyono yapegwa no Mulungu, yiwaha muno si nhe litagwa lyawo.
Hambi u Mulungu nha si yamulonjela hamba hadodo malayika wakwe yunji yatye, “Agwe wuli Mwanangu, Ane neza nili sogo zuwali?”
Ninga u Mulungu lono yamutumila kononze u Mwanagwe mulelwa mulongozi, yatya nhavi, “Ne wamalayika wose wo Mulungu, yiwanojeye wamuhembe.”
Na kuli ze wamalayika, u Mulungu yakutya, “U Mulungu yakuwanoza wamalayika wakwe kuwa myuhe, ne wetumami wakwe kuwa lilambi lyo moto.”
Ninga kuli zo Mwana, u Mulungu yakutya, “U wutemi wako agwe go Mulungu, wikalaga cibitilila ne cibitilila. Nagwe kuwadimaga i wanhu wako kwe ling'ani.
Agwe wendile u wiling'ano, wukazisula i zimbi. Na ku soko yiyo holeka u Mulungu, u Mulungu wako yakuhagula, kanyhi yakakupela nyemo mbaha muno muno kuciza i wayago.”
Kanyhi yakutya, “Muwaha, agwe yo gwegwe mono wayiwumba yinze baho ha mwamulizo, no wulanga wo mulimo wo muwoko wako,
Azo zomalika, ninga agwe kokwikala cibitilila, na zose zosakala kotya mwenda,
Nagwe kozipetya nha civwalo nazo zokawanizwa nha mwenda, ninga agwe, yo gwegwe du cibitilila, ne myaka yako si yiladuma yaye.”
Kanyhi u Mulungu si yamulonjela hamba hadodo yunji wa muli wamalayika wakwe yatye, “Wikalaje ku muwoko wangu wo kulume sunga kolo nakondya kuwanoza i walugu wako wawe nha wukanyago we magulu gako.”
I Wamalayika, yo myuhe du yono yikumwitumamila u Mulungu, nayo u Mulungu kawatumaga ho wawataze wawalya wono wowubocela u wukombozwe.
Holeka yicinojeye cicile kuzikamisa muno zose zono cazihulika, ho cilece kwajilizwa.
Inghani yi yilya yono wapegwa i walezi wetu na malayika, yikejela vyono yali nghani ya mbeka, sunga muli wose mono si yasuma kuyityatya hamba kuyihulika, yalipicizwa nha vyono yali yimunojeye.
Alu ase ma! Ho coponela hayi hono ciyileceleze mhonelo mbaha nha yiyi? Yono yamula kulongwa no Muwaha mweneco, na wono wahulika, wakacihomelela vyono yili mbeka.
Nayo u Mulungu yakonjeleza u wuhomelezi wakwe nhavivyo, lono yanozeza vitanjilo ne mezino ge mawala menji, na lono yawagawila wanhu i vipegwa vyo Muhe Mono Yelile nha vyono mweneco yali yendile.
U Mulungu si yawawika Wamalayika ho wawe watemi mu yinze yilya yono cikuyilonga.
Kanyhi hanji mu Mandiko hakutya nhavi: “Hambi u munhu co cici, agwe go Mulungu sunga wumukumbucile, hamba u mwana wo munhu co cici sunga wumulanjilile?
Wamunoza mudodo si nhe wamalayika kwa cipango cidodo. Wamuvwika mukumbo wo lukumyo ne lilumbo.

Nagwe wukaviwika vyose ha magulu gakwe ho yaviteme.” Nha vyono yikulongwa vyono, u Mulungu yamuwika u munhu ho yawe mutemi muli vinhu vyose, hamba si yasigaza cinji hamba cimonga. Ninga hamba nhavivyo, cikali si cikumuwona munhu mono yatemile i vinhu vyose kwa lulu.

Langa cikumuwona Yesu mono yanozwa mudodo kwa cipango cidodo si nhe wamalayika, na so i lihewa lyo Mulungu, yafwe ku soko ye wanhu wose. Sunga nalu cikumuwona yakondya kutemywa ko lukumyo ne lilumbo, ku soko yo wutamiswe we lifwa.

Nayo yali yili ling'ani, vyono u Mulungu mono kaviwumbaga i vinhu vyose no kuvibatiliza, yo yamunoza Yesu yawe yakwilaniciye mu nzila yo wugazwe wakwe, ho yasume kuwaleta wana wenji ku lukumyo lwakwe. Hambi Yesu nha yo yakuwatonga ku mhonelo.
Hambi u mwene nha yo yakuweza wanhu u wubi wawo, hanyuma mwene hamonga na wose wono wakondya kwezwa, wose wakuwa na Baba yumonga. Holeka nayo Yesu si yakuwona soni kuwatya wawo wanduguze,
nha vyono yakutya, “Gwe go Mulungu, nowalonjela i wandugu zangu ze metumo gako. Nane nokukumizya mu ciligati yo wihangulize wawo.”
Kanyhi yakutya, “Nowuwika u witumbilo wangu muli Mulungu.” Na kanyhi, “Ane nili baha hamonga ne wana wono wamhela agwe go Mulungu.”

Alu nha vyono yinha, i wana wawo nha vyono mwene yakuwacema, wo wanhu wono wena muwili ne sakami, nayo Yesu mweneco, yakawa nha vyono wenha wene, nayo yakasola i hwani yawo yakawa munhu. Yanoza nhavivyo, ho yiwe so wufwe wakwe, yamusumile lukulu Setani, mono yena i vilungo vye lifwa,
na mu nzila yiyo ho yawakomboze wose wono mu mikalile yawo yose wali mu wuwanda wo woga we lifwa.
Hambi nha yili calinze, vyono u mwene si yaza ho yawataze wamalayika, langa nha vyono i Mandiko gakutya, “Yakuwataza wo lulelo lwa Abulahamu.”
Holeka yali yimunojeye yehwane wanduguze muli zose, ho yawe Mukohani wawo Muwaha, mono yali lusungu kanyhi mwihuwilwa muli zose zono zibitile kuli Mulungu, ho wubi we wanhu wunenelwe.
Nayo alu kosuma kuwataza wono wakujelwa, hambi nayo mweneco nha yajelwa kanyhi yakatamiswa.
Ale, anye wandugu zangu, mo wanhu wo Mulungu, mono mwacemwa no Mulungu, mwihwesaje za Yesu mono u Mulungu yamutuma yawe Mukohani Muwaha wo wihuwilo wetu.
U mwene yali mwihuwilwa kuli Mulungu mono yamuhagula ho yetume u mulimo wakwe, nha vyono Musa nayo yali mwihuwilwa mu nyumba yose yo Mulungu.
Nha vyono u muzenji we kaya yo katugaga i lilumbo muno si nhe kaya yeneco. Nayo Yesu nhavivyo yo yanojeye yatuje lilumbo yiwaha si nha Musa.
Hambi i zikaya zose, nha zina u muzenji wayo, ninga u Mulungu yo muzenji we vinhu vyose.
Musa yali mwihuwilwa mu nyumba yose yo Muwaha nho mwitumami, nayo yakazilonga i zinghani zono u Mulungu yali yazilonje hanyuma.
Langa Kilisito yo mwihuwilwa nho mwana mono yena wulajilize mu nyumba yo Mulungu. Ne nyumba yakwe yo sese, hono cibatilile lukulu zo wuluwuce wetu wa muli cono citumbiye.
Holeka nha vyono yakulonga u Muhe Mono Yelile, yakutya: “Holeka i zuwali hono muhulice lizi lyo Mulungu,
Mulece kuzikamufya zinhumbula zenyu, nha vyono wali i wasogo zenyu, lono wamubezeza u Mulungu, nha vyono wanoza ku nyika mwizuwa lililya, lono wamujelela u Mulungu.
Kuko i wasogo zenyu wasagala, wakanjela yakutya u Muwaha, hamba wawe wali waziwona zono nali nakondya kwituma mu myaka makumi mane.”
Ku soko yiyo nane nghawakolelwa likuwo i wanhu wawa, nghawa kutya, “I mahweso ge wanhu wawa gajiliye, wakali si nazimanya zinzila zangu.”
Holeka nghakolwa ne likuwo, nghawa kwilahiza nghutya, “Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.”
Holeka wandugu zangu, mwilanjililaje, halece kuwa na yunji muli nyenye, mono yena i nhumbula yimbi nhavivyo, mono si yehuwiye no kumuleka u Mulungu mumi.
Ninga mweze kwiyilanjiza nhondo zose, lono hakali kutegwa, “I zuwali,” muyenyu yunji yalece kukamufywa no wukoci wo wubi no kuwa ne cibede.
Hambi ase nha ceza cili hamonga na Kilisito, soko ciwe ciwukamise muno muno u witumbilo wetu wono cali cina nawo hamwamulizo.
I Mandiko gakutya nhavi: “I zuwali hono muhulice lizi lyo Mulungu mulece kuzikamufya zinhumbula zenyu nha vyono wanoza wasogo zenyu lono wamubezeza u Mulungu.”
Hambi wa nani wono walihulika lizi lyo Mulungu ninga wakamubeza? Wo wawo wose wono watongwa na Musa ku wulawa ku Misili.
Kanyhi wa nani wono u Mulungu yawakolelwa likuwo mu myaka makumi mane kuko ku nyika?
U Mulungu lono yelahiza yakutya, “Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.” Yawalongaga wa nani? Yalongaga muli za wawo i wabezi.
Holeka cikuwona vyono si wasuma kwinjila kuko, vyono wali si wehuwiye.
U Mulungu yacihuwiza vyono cosuma kuwutuga u wuceho wuwo wono yawulonga. Holeka ceze kogopa, yilece kuwa na lunji, muyenyu yunji yanjile ku winjila mu wuceho wuwo.
Hambi nha caganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu nha vyono lwaganulwa kuli wawo wanhu we katali. Ninga i nghani yiyo si yawakwila cinji, hamba wawe wayihulika, ninga si wasuma kuyibocela ko wihuwilo.

Ninga ase mono cihuwiye, cikwinjila mu wuceho wuwo wono u Mulungu yawihuwiza. Nha vyono yatya, “Nghakolwa ne likuwo, nghelahiza, nghatya, ‘Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.’ ” U Mulungu yazilonga zizo, hamba yiwe u mulimo wakwe wali wakondya kumalika ku wulawilila lono yayiwumbila yinze.
Hambi i Mandiko nha gakulonga hanji ze lizuwa lyo mupunghati. “U Mulungu yakaceha mwizuwa lyo mupunghati, yakayileka milimo yakwe yose.”
Ne nghani yiyi yikulongwa kanyhi, “Si wokwinjila mu wuceho wono nali niwawiciye.”
Wawo wono walongola kuganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu si wasuma kwinjila mu wuceho wuwo so wuwula kwihuwila kwawo. Ninga ho wali wanji wono wapejigwe kwinjila mumo.

Ne nghani yiyi yili calinze, hambi u Mulungu nha yaliwika lizuwa linji lyono likucemwa “I zuwali.” U Mulungu yalilonjela lizuwa lilyo muli Dawudi mu myaka minji yono yali yakondya kupuluta, nha vyono i Mandiko gono gatambuywe. “Hono muhulice lizi lyo Mulungu zuwali mulece kuzikamufya zinhumbula zenyu.”
Hono Yoshuwa yali yawapele u wuceho wuwo wanhu wawo, Mulungu si yali yalonje kanyhi ze lizuwa linji.
Holeka u wuceho wuli baho kuli wanhu wo Mulungu, nha vyono u mwene Mulungu yaceha mwizuwa lyo mupunghati.
Hambi muli wose mono kowutuga u wuceho wono u Mulungu yehuwiza, nha koceha mu milimo yakwe, nha vyono u Mulungu yaceha mu mulimo wakwe.
Holeka cihidimbale, ciwutuje u wuceho wuwo, ho halece kuwa yunji muli nyenye yanjile kuwinjila mu wuceho wuwo, nha vyono wanoza wawo, ku soko yo wuleka kwihuwila kwawo.

Hambi nghani yo Mulungu nha nyumi kanyhi nyitumi, kanyhi nghali yicizize u mumaje mukali kose kose, kanyhi yicinyaga sunga ku wutemanula i nhumbula no Muhe, sunga hono vihanjiye i vilunzwa vyo muwili no musopo. Ne nghani yiyo yisalangulaga u wuhile ne mahweso ga mu zinhumbula ze wanhu.
Kanyhi hasina hamba ciwumbwa co cose cono cihundice hali Mulungu, ninga vyose vili calinze ha meso gakwe. Na ase wose cololonga hali mwene ze metumo getu munhu na lwakwe.
Hambi nha yicinojeye ciwibatilile lukulu u wihuwilo wetu. Hambi nha cina u Mukohani Muwaha, Yesu u Mwana wo Mulungu, mono yenjila mweneco sunga kuli Mulungu.
Nayo yuyu u Mukohani wetu Muwaha si yenha mono si kosuma kuhanga nase mu wusocele wetu, langa u mwene yo Mukohani Muwaha mono yajelwa nha sese muli zose, ninga si yetuma wubi.
Holeka cisejelele kwi'goda lye lihewa lyo Mulungu, cisina woga, ho ciwonelwe lusungu, kanyhi cilituje ne lihewa lyono lyosuma kucitaza mwidaha lono cikusaka u wutazi.
U Mukohani wo wose Muwaha, kahagulwaga kulawa muli wanhu ho yamwitumamile u Mulungu so wanhu, ho yalavye i vilavya ne makumbiko ku soko yo wubi wawo.
Na vyono u mwene nayo yali mu wusocele, holeka kosuma kuwawonela u lusungu wono si wamanyile cinji ne wasutyi.
Vyono na mweneco nayo musocele, holeka yimunojeye yalavye likumbiko, si ku soko ye wanhu du, langa na ku soko yo wubi wakwe mweneco.
Hasina munhu mono kosuma kwisolela mweneco lilumbo lyo kuwa Mukohani Muwaha. Langa munhu wo wose yakuwa kuhagulwa no Mulungu yawe Mukohani Muwaha nha vyono Haluni.
Nha vivyo na Kilisito nayo, si yesolela mweneco i lilumbo lyo kuwa Mukohani Muwaha, langa u Mulungu yo yamutya: “Agwe wuli Mwanangu ane neza nili Sogo zuwali.”
Nha vyono yalonga kanyhi hanji: “Agwe wuli Mukohani cibitilila mu wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.”

Nayo Yesu lono yekalaga baha mono yinze, yakalila muno muno ne mahozi, lono yamuhembaga no kumulomba u Mulungu, mono yali yena vilungo vyo kumuponezya mwifwa, nayo yahulicizwa ku soko yali yamogopile u Mulungu.
Ninga u mweneco hambe yali Mwana wo Mulungu, yeyijiziza i cihuliko mu nzila yo wutamiswe wono wamwagana.
Nayo yaza kukwilanicizwa, yakawa wo mwamulizo wo wukombozi we cibitilila kuli wose wono wakumuhulika,
nayo u Mulungu yakamuhagula ho yawe Mukohani Muwaha mu wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.
Cina nyinji zo kulonga mu nghani yiyi, ninga kukamu kumulolosezenyi, ku soko anye si muli wapelu ku wizuce.

Ninga alu yali yimunojelenyi muwe mweza muli wejizi, ninga kumbe mukali mukusaka munhu yunji wo kumwijizenyi i mejizo malongozi ge nghani yo Mulungu, holeka mwaweza nha mukusaka mele, hamba si ndigwa nghavu yaye.
Na muli wose mono yimunojeye yang'we mele, yuyo yakali mugalika, yakali nawumanya u wiling'ano co cici.
Ninga i ndigwa i nghavu, yiwanojeye i wanhu wono wakangaye, wono wakusuma kuzitanga no kuzihagula i ziswanu ne zimbi.

Holeka cijendelele kumwande kuli zono zikangaye, kanyhi cilece kwikala mu mejizo ge myamulizo ge Cikilisito. Si yicinojeye ciwice u musinji mu wuwuyajila kanyhi mu mafundo gagalya go mwamulizo, nha vyono kotya i metumo mafu, kumwihuwila u Mulungu,
i mafundo go wubaputizo, no wuwicilwe we miwoko, wuzuce we wafu, no wuling'anizwe we cibitilila.
Ase cijendelele kumwande! Na yiyo yo conoza, hono u Mulungu yendile.

Hambi alu kuli wanhu wono wakondya kuwubeza u wihuwilo wawo, yosumika nhawule kuwagomola ho wanene kanyhi? Ku soko i wanhu wawo wali wakondya kuwa mu wuzelu wo Mulungu, wali wakondya kucijeza ne cipegwa ciswanu ca ku wulanga, kanyhi no kuhanjizwa mu Muhe Mono Yelile,
wali wakondya kuwujeza no wuswanu we nghani yo Mulungu, ne vilungo vya mu yinze yono yikuza,
hanyuma kanyhi wakawa kuwubena u wihuwilo wawo! Si yosumika kuwagomola ho wanene kanyhi, vyono wakumutumbika kanyhi u Mwana wo Mulungu kejete, kanyhi wakumupela cevu ca cagalanze.
U Mulungu kawulugutizaga u muhangha wono wuyibocelaga i mvula yono yikuwutonyela kenji na kenji, no kucindya i zimbeyu zono zina cambuzi kuli wono walimilwa.
