Ninga hono u muhangha wuwo wucindye mabici ge mamiya, na ganji caka, wukuwa wusina cambuzi, wukuwa wuli behi no wulijitwa no Mulungu, no mudumo wayo wukuwa wutakamizwe mu moto.
Ninga hamba ciwe cikulonga nhavivi, mo wendece wetu, cina witumbilo wuwaha muli zo wuwe wenyu, cimanyile vyono mwabocela u wulugutizwe muli azilya i ziswanu ze mhonelo yenyu.

Hambi u Mulungu nha si kawezaga yasina ling'ani, u mwene si kowusemwa mulimo wenyu wono mwetuma, hamba u wendo wono mwawulajila ku soko ye litagwa lyakwe, mu witumami wenyu wono mwawetumamila, na vyono sunga na lulu mukali mukuwetumamila i wanhu wakwe.
Hambi u wuhile wetu kuli nyenye nha wowu, cikumusacenyi wose muli nyenye, munhu yalajile u wuhijilile wuwo du, sunga ko ku mudumo wo wumemelecele wo witumbilo wenyu.
Mulece kuwa wadoba, langa muweze nha awalya wono wehuwiye, na wono wena u wukangalizi, ho wazibocele zono u Mulungu yazihuwiza.
U Mulungu lono yamupelela Abulahamu u wihuwizo, yelahiziza mwitagwa lyakwe mweneco, hambi nha hasina yunji muwaha mono yamucizize u Mulungu, mono u Mulungu yali yelahize.
U Mulungu yatya, “Mbeka nghukwihuwiza vyono nokumotya, kanyhi no lulelo lwako lokonjelezeka.”
Abulahamu yalindiliza ko wukangalizi, holeka yakacibocela cono u Mulungu yamwihuwiziza.
I wanhu lono wakwilahiza, welahizizaga kuli muwaha mono yawacizize, no wilahize wuwo wumalaga u wuwanji wose.
Nayo u Mulungu, yawukangaziza u wihuwizo wakwe mu wilahize, na muli zizo, yakawalajila calinze, wawo wono yawehuwiziza, vyono si kowupitula kanyhi u wuhile wakwe wuwo.

Holeka ho vili vinhu vi vyejete, u wihuwizo no wilahize, vyono si vyosuma kukawanika, na hamba muli zizo, u Mulungu si kosuma kulonga wulambi. Holeka ase mono camanyhilila ku wukamiswe wakwe, cikupegwa mu mitima yo wukamisa muno u witumbilo wono wuli ha mwande yetu.

No witumbilo wuwo wukuwa nha cimizo mu mikalile yetu. No witumbilo wuwo wukamile kanyhi wa mbeka mbeka, kanyhi wukwinjila sunga ko kwi'bupa lye Nyumba yo Mulungu ya ku wulanga, sunga ko kugati ya hono helile hayo.
Nayo Yesu yo yalongola kwinjila mumo ku soko yetu, nayo yawa Mukohani Muwaha cibitilila, mu wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.

Melicizedeki yali mutemi wa Salemi, kanyhi yali Mukohani wo Mulungu Mono Yalawiliciye Muli Vyose. Nayo Abulahamu lono yalawaga ku wulugu kono yawawulaga i watemi, Melicizedeki viketang'anila nayo, yakamuluguta,

nayo Abulahamu yakamugawila i lipinga lye likumi lya muli vyose vyono yali yena navyo. (Ne nhunizo nongozi ye litagwa lili lya Melicizedeki, wo wutya, “U mutemi wo wiling'ano,” na vyono u mwene yali mutemi wa Salemi, ilitagwa lilyo nalyo lina nhunizo yo wutya, “U mutemi wo Mulamu.”)

U sogwe no nyina si wakutambulwa, sunga ne ndelwa yakwe si yitambuywe, si yikulongwa hamba nili lono yalelelwa, hamba nili lono yafwila. Langa yanozwa yenha Mwana wo Mulungu, kekalaga Mukohani cibitilila.
Holeka mudahile kuwona vyono u munhu yuyu yali munhu we lilumbo muno. Baba Abulahamu yamupela i lipinga limonga lye likumi lya mu vinhu vyose vyono yavigalula ku wulugu.

Kanyhi cimanyile nhavivilya nha vyono winha u wulajilize, i wana wa Lawi wono wo Wakohani, wena ling'ani yo kusola lipinga lye likumi kuli wanhu, wo wutya kuli wandugu zawo, hamba wawe nawo wo wana wa Abulahamu.
Ninga yuyo Melicizedeki si yali we ndelwa ya Lawi, ninga hamba yiwe nhavivyo, yabocela lipinga lye likumi kuli Abulahamu, kanyhi yakamuluguta u mwene mono yali yapegwa u wihuwizo wo Mulungu.
Ninga mbeka si za kuwanga hamba hadodo, vyono mono kalugutaga yo muwaha yacizize ayulya mono yakulugutwa.
Kanyhi na wawo i wakohani wono wakubocela lilyo lipinga lye likumi, nha wanhu wono wafwizaga, ninga ahano mono yakubocela lye likumi, nha cinji Melicizedeki, yikulongwa vyono si kafwizaga.
Holeka cidahile kutya vyono, Abulahamu lono yalavyaga lipinga lye likumi, Lawi, (mono wanagwe wabocelaga lipinga limonga lye likumi) nayo yalavya, lipinga lye likumi nhavivilya.
Hambi Lawi nha yali yakali si nalelwa, langa kotya nha yali yakali mu muwili wo sogwe Abulahamu, mu cipango lono Abulahamu wetang'anilila na Melicizedeki.

No wulawilila mu wukohani wa Lawi, i wanhu wa Isilayeli wapegwa u Wulajilize. Holeka mhali u witumami we Walawi wali wuwe wukwilaniciye, mhali hawe hasina soko yo kuza u wukohani wunji wono wisimajiye, u wukohani wono wukutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki, hamba si awulya wa Haluni.
Holeka hono u wukohani wukawanice, hobaho yinojeye no Wulajilize nawo wukawanice.
Nayo u Muwaha wetu mono zizi zose zikulongwa muli mwene, yali wa mbeyu yinji, na hasina hamba yumonga wa mu mbeyu yakwe mono yetuma mulimo nha mukohani ha wukumbicilo.
Langa yimanyice calinze vyono u mwene yalelelwa mu mulango wa Yuda yono Musa si yawutambula lono yalongaga muli ze wakohani.
Kanyhi ne nghani yiyi yili calinze muno, vyono mukohani yunji mono yehwanile na Melicizedeki yakondya kuza.
U mwene si yanozwa yawe mukohani mu nzila yo wulajilize ne malajilizo ge cimunhumunhu, langa mu vilungo vyo wumi wono wusina mudumo.
Hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya: “Agwe wuli mukohani cibitilila ku wutyatya u wityatye wo wukohani wa Melicizedeki.”
Holeka i lilajilizo lililya lilongozi likapatwa, ku soko vyono lyali lisina vilungo, kanyhi lyali si likwiliye cinji.
Vyono i lilajilizo lya Musa si lyasuma kukwilaniciza cinji. Ninga aluno i hanhu hayo, hakondya kuwicilwa u witumbilo u wuswanu wucizize, wono so wuwo, ase cosuma kumusejelela u Mulungu.
Hamonga na zizo, ahano ho wuli no wilahize wo Mulungu. Ninga mu cipango lono wanji walya wanozwaga kuwa wakohani, u wilahize hali hasina.
Ninga Yesu yanozwa kuwa mukohani mu nzila yo wilahize, lono u Mulungu yamulonjela yakutya, “U Muwaha yelahiza hamba si kowukawaniza kanyhi u wuhile wakwe. Agwe wuli mukohani cibitilila.”
Holeka ku wulawa mu wisimajile wuwuno, Yesu yaweza wukangaze we cilagane ciswanu cicizize.
Kanyhi kowuli wisimajile wunji nhavivyo, wawo i wakohani wanji, wali wenji, ku soko vyono wafwizaga, na holeka si wasumaga kujendelela no mulimo wawo.
Ninga Yesu si yehwanile na wawo, vyono u mwene kekalaga cibitilila, no wukohani wakwe si wuladuma yaye.
Holeka u mwene, yadahile nhondo zose kuwaponezya lukulu wose wono wakumubitila u Mulungu muli mwene, hambi u mwene nha kekalaga cibitilila yakuwalombela hali Mulungu.

Holeka Yesu yo Mukohani Muwaha mono kocikwila muno muno mu visakwa vyetu. U mwene Yelile, yasina hamba yilema, hamba wubi muli mwene musina, yali musina mwipuga lya wanyo wubi, nayo yenuywe sunga ko ku wulanga.

Mwene si yenha awalya i wakohani wanji, yasina soko yo kukumbika nhondo zose, yinongozi ku soko yo wubi wakwe mweneco, na hanyuma ku soko yo wubi we wanhu. Mwene nha yanozeza lukulu kamonga du, mwipango lono yelavizya mweneco, nayo yakwiliye vilo vyose.

U Wulajilize wa Musa, wawahagulaga wanhu wono wali wena wusocele, wo wawe wakohani wawaha, ninga u wihuwizo wo Mulungu, wono yawunoza mu nzila yo wilahize, wono waza hanyuma yo Wulajilize, wakondya kumuhagula u Mwana mono yanozwa yakwilaniciye cibitilila.
Ale ne nghani mbaha yono cikuyilonga nha yoyi: Ase cina u Mukohani Muwaha we nhavivi, mono yali ku wulanga mono yekaye ku muwoko wo kulume we ligoda lyo wuwaha lyo Mulungu u Mudaha vyose.

Mwene ketumaga u mulimo wo Wukohani Muwaha i Hanhu Hono Helile muno, nha cinji, mugati ye lihema lililya lye mbeka lyono lyazengwa no Muwaha, hamba si na munhu yaye. |78A.tif|span|||U mukohani muwaha (8:1-2) |
Hambi u Mukohani Muwaha wo wose, nha yakuwikwa ho yamulavizye u Mulungu vilavya ne makumbiko, holeka no Mukohani wetu Muwaha yimunojeye nayo yawe ne cinhu co kulavya.
Holeka u Mwene mhali yawe munya baha hono'nze, si yali yasume kuwa mukohani hamba hadodo, hambi nha kowali wakohani wanji, wono wakulavya vilavywa mu nzila yo Wulajilize.

No witumami wawo wuwo wo wukohani, co cihwani du no muzizi wa azilya zono zili ku wulanga. Na vyo yali na kuli Musa. Lono yali yeza behi no kunoza i lihema lililya, u Mulungu yamulonjela yakatya, “Wunoze zose ziwe nhe hwani yono walajilwa kwi'tunda.”

Alu ninga Yesu, yakondya kupegwa u witumami we cikohani, wuswanu wucizize si nha wawo, nha vyono yacikangaza i cilagane ciswanu cicizize muli wanhu no Mulungu, hambi u musinji wayo nha wuli mu wihuwizo mu zinghani ziswanu zicizize muno.
Hambi i cilagane cicilya i cilongozi mhali ciwe cisina yilema, nha mhali kuwe kusina soko ye cilagane ce kejete.
Ninga u Mulungu yawahosa wanhu wakwe lono yalonjela yakutya: “Langa ta, i vilo vyolokuza yakutya u Muwaha, lono nolonozeza i cilagane cipya ne wanhu wa Isilayeli, hamonga na womulango wa Yuda.
Ne cilagane cico si cowa cihwanile ne cilagane acilya lono nawebatila muwoko niwahamye mu yisi ya Misili. Hambi nha si wekalaga mu cilagane cangu. Holeka nane sinawalanga, yakutya u Muwaha.

Ne cilagane cono nonoza ne wanhu wa Isilayeli mu vilo vyono vikuza nha cocino, nologenjiza i malajilizo gangu mu mahala gawo, kanyhi nologandika mu zinhumbula zawo. Nane nolowa Mulungu wawo nawo wolowa wanhu wangu.
Hasina kanyhi munhu mono kolomwijiza u muyagwe. Hamba mono kolomutya u nduguye yatye, ‘Wumumanyaje u Muwaha.’ Hambi wanhu wose i wadodo ne wawaha nha wolomanya nene.
Nane nolowanenela u wubi wawo hamba si nowukumbucila kanyhi yaye.”
Na muwulonje wa muli ze cilagane cipya, u Mulungu yakondya kucisakaza acilya i cilongozi, na muli co cose cono cikusakala no kuhumapa, cokwajilila mbela.
I cilagane cilongozi cali cina u wityatye wayo wo wuhembi ne hanhu hono helile ha wuhembelo, hono hali hazenjigwe ne wanhu.
Hali holili lihema linozwe, lyono hanze yayo lyali lina hanhu hono hacemwaga i “Hanhu Hono Helile.” Na baho ho hali no wuwiko we tala, ne meza ne mikate yono yali cilavywa kuli Mulungu.
Na hanyuma ye libupa lye kejete, hali ne lihema lyono lyacemwaga i “Hanhu Hono Helile muno.”

Mumo mo mwali cifusizo ca zahabu so kufusiza wuvumba ne lisanduku lye cilagane, nalyo lyali yihiliwe zahabu mbavu zose, na mugati yalyo, mwali na ciya ca zahabu cono cali cina mana, ne nghome ya Haluni yono yali yitulile mahamha, hamonga na azilya i zimbawo zi nyejete zono zali zandicigwe i cilagane.

Na mucanyha ya lilyo lisanduku, mwali na viwumbwa vyono vyalajilaga vyono u Mulungu yali baho, ne mabawa gavyo gali gacitile mubeho hanhu hono u wubi wukuwusizwa. Ninga alu si cosuma kulonga monga monga muli zinghani zizo.
I mipango yiyo yikafisilizwa, nawo wukawa wo moto kuli wakohani, wo kwinjila nhondo zose mwihema lilongozi lya kunze wakwituma u witumami wawo.

Ninga mwihema lye kejete, u Mukohani Muwaha du, yo yenjilaga yali wene, nayo yanozaga nhavivyo kwa mwaka kamonga du. Na lono yakwinjila mugati, yategulizaga ne sakami ho yamulavizye u Mulungu ku soko yakwe mweneco na ku soko yo wubi wono wanhu wetumiye mu wuwula kumanya weneco.

Na ku wulawa mu wityatye wuwo, u Muhe Mono Yelile yakwijiza calinze vyono, mu cipango cico lono lihema lilongozi lya kudeha likali limile, ne nzila yo kwinjilila i Hanhu Hono Helile nayo yikali si yinadigulwa.
Ne nghani yiyi yo hwani ye vidaha vya lulu. Yikulajila vyono vilavywa ne makumbiko, vyono vikulavywa kuli Mulungu, si vyosuma kuzinoza zinhumbula za wono wakuhemba, ziwe zikwilaniciye,

hambi zizi zose zono zili mu zindigwa, no wung'we na mu wityatye wunji wunji wo wihovuji. Vyose vivyo go malajilizo ga munze du; ne vilungo vyayo vyoficila ku mudumo wayo, kolo u Mulungu yakuvinoza wupya i vinhu vyose.

Ninga Kilisito lono yaza, u Mukohani Muwaha we ziswanu zose zono aluno zakondya kuza. U Mwene yakwituma u mulimo wakwe mwihema liswanu, na lyono likwilaniciye muno, lyono si yinozwe ne miwoko ye wanhu, nha cinji lyono si lya mononze yiyi yono yawumbwa.
U Mwene yenjila i Hanhu Hono Helile kamonga du, kanyhi hamba si yasoleleza ne sakami ye mhene, hamba ya ng'ombe, langa yenjila so sakami yakwe mweneco, yakaciletela u wukombozi we cibitilila.
I wanhu wono wali wetipiza ku ci dini wasumaga kwezwa no kuwa welile, lono wamizizwa i sakami ye mhene na ye ng'ombe, hamonga ne mavu ge ndama.

Ninga mu sakami ya Kilisito zitumwaga nghani mbaha kuciza! Vyono mu vilungo vyo Muhe we cibitilila, Kilisito yelavya mweneco ho yawe likumbiko lyono likwilaniciye kuli Mulungu. I sakami yakwe yocikwema i viselinji vyetu mu metumo gono gakuleta u wufwe, ho cimwitumamile u Mulungu u mumi.

Holeka Kilisito yo munoza i cilagane cipya mono wa walya wono wacemwa no Mulungu, ho wawubocele wihuwizo wono wehuwizwa wo wuhazi we cibitilila. Vyono i lifwa lyakwe likuwakomboza wanhu mu wulawa mu masutya ga galya gono wasutya mwidaha li lilya lye cilagane cilongozi.
Hambi nha vyo yinha, i zinghani ze ndumilizo zono kalajilizaga munhu, nha zikuwa kuvumilwa du lono u wufwe wo munhu yuyo mono yawulavivye u wulajilize wuwo wakondya kukangazwa.
U wulajilize si wosuma kufisilizwa, sunga langa i lifwa liwe lyakondya kwijela, vyono u wulajilize wusina nhunizo, hono mono yawulavizye yakali mumi.
Si holeka sunga ne cilagane cicilya i cilongozi, si casuma kuwikwa hono hasina sakami.

U lulongozi, Musa yawanziza wanhu wose ze malajilizo gose nha vyono yali mu Wulajilize, hanyuma yakasola i sakami ye ndama hamonga ne malenga, yaketumamila mahamha go mubici wono wukucemwa hisopo, hamonga no wuhamba wudunghu, yakacimiziza i citabu cicilya co Wulajilize hamonga ne wanhu wose.
Musa yakatya, “Ayi yo sakami yono yikukangaza i cilagane cono yamulajilizenyi u Mulungu, holeka mucihulikaje.”
Musa yakalimiziza sakami lililya lihema nhavivilya hamonga ne viya vyo witumami.
Holeka nha vyono winha u Wulajilize, i vinhu vyose vyosuma kwezwa ne sakami, holeka no wubi nawo wukuwuswa du lono sakami yetika.
Ale, i vinhu vivi vyono yo hwani du ya vye mbeka vya ku wulanga, vikawa vinojeye navyo vyezwe mu nzila yiyo. Ninga alu vya ku wulanga vikusaka likumbiko liswanu lyono licizize.

Hambi Kilisito nha si yenjila i hanhu Hono Helile hono hazenjigwe ne miwoko ye wanhu, hono henha hwani du ya acilya ce mbeka. Langa u Mwene yenjila ku wulanga du kweneco kono aluno yemile hali u Mulungu ku soko yetu.
U Mukohani Muwaha we Wayahudi kenjilaga i Hanhu Hono Helile mwaka na mwaka akuno yadinghuye ne sakami ye zi mitugo; ninga Kilisito si yenjila mumo ko kwilavya mweneco kali kenji,

hambi nha hono yali yiwe nhavivyo, nha yali yimunojele Kilisito yagazwe kali kenji ku wulawa mu mwamulizo wo wuwumbwe we yinze. Ninga alu vipango avi lono vikusejelela ku mudumo wayo, u mwene yejela kamonga du, ho yawuwuse u wubi mu wilavya mweneco kuwa yikumbiko.
Ale nha vyono wanhu wose wafwizaga kamonga du, na lono wakondya kufwa wakwima ha mwande yo wuling'anizwe wo Mulungu,
nhavivyo nayo Kilisito, yelavya likumbiko lwa kamonga du ho yawuwuse u wubi wa wenji. Nayo yalaza kuza lwe kejete, ho yalece kuziza so wihoma no wubi, langa so kuwakomboza wawo wono wakumulindila.

U wulajilize we Wayahudi yo si hwani yono yikwilaniciye ya ze mbeka, langa muzizi du we ziswanu zono zikuza. I makumbiko gago gakuwa kulavywa nhondo zose mu mwaka na mwaka. Alu u Wulajilize wosuma nhawule kuwanoza awalya wono wakuhemba mu nzila ye makumbiko gago, ho wawe wakwilaniciye.
Mhali wawo i wanhu wo Mulungu wakondizye kwezwa u wubi wawo, si wali wewone kanyhi vyono wena wubi, ne makumbiko gago gose gali gadume.
Hamba nhavivyo, makumbiko gago ganozwaga mwaka na mwaka so kuwakumbuciza wanhu u wubi wawo.
Nha vyono i sakami ye zinzeku ne zimhene nha si yosumila lukulu kuwuwusa u wubi.
Holeka nayo Kilisito lono yazaga kononze, yamulonjela u Mulungu yakatya: “Si wasaka likumbiko hamba cilavywa, ninga wanozelezezo muwili.
Si wukwendezwa ne vilavywa vyo kunyanywa vili muvilima vyono si vitemasetemase, hamba vyo kuwusa wubi.”
Baho nane nghatya, “Ane nili baha 'gwe go Mulungu niwikanize kuwituma u wuhile wako, nha vyono nandicilwa mu citabu co Wulajilize.”

Ha lulongozi yakatya, “Si wukusaka, hamba si wukwendezwa ne likumbiko ne cilavywa, hamba i vilavywa vyo kunyanywa vili muvilima so wubi.” Yalonga nhavivyo, hamba yiwe i vilavywa vivi vyose vikuwa kulavizywa mu wityatye wo Wulajilize.
Kanyhi yakatya, “Ane nili baha 'gwe go Mulungu, ho nitume zo wuhile wako.” Baho u Mulungu ho yagawusiza i makumbiko ge katali, ne hanhu hayo yakawika i likumbiko linji limonga.
Holeka vyono Yesu Kilisito yafisiliza u wuhile wo Mulungu, ase mo cikwezezwa u wubi wetu mu nzila ye likumbiko lyo muwili wakwe lyono yalilavya, lyono lyakondya kamonga du.
U Mukohani wo wose we Ciyahudi, ketumaga u witumami wakwe mu wuhembi nhondo zose, akuno yakulavya makumbiko ga galya du kali kenji, i makumbiko gono si gasumaga kuwuwusa wubi.
Ninga Kilisito yalavya ilikumbiko limonga du ku soko yo wubi, i likumbiko lyono likondizye cibitilila, hanyuma yakekala ku lubavu lo muwoko wo kulume wo Mulungu.
Na kuko yalindiye sunga kolo i walugu wakwe wakuwikwa hasi ye migulu yakwe.
Na ku so cilavywa cakwe cimonga, yawanoza no kuwa wakwilaniciye cibitilila, wawo wono wakwezwa u wubi wawo.
Nayo u Muhe Mono Yelile yakucilonjela uwuhomelezi wakwe, Lulongozi yakutya,
“Aci co cilagane cono nolagana nawo mu vilo vyono vikuza, yakutyo Muwaha: Nolowika i malajilizo gangu mu zinhumbula zawo, no kugandika mu mahala gawo.”
Kanyhi yakutya, “Si nolowukumbucila kanyhi u wubi wawo, hamba ne metumo gawo go wuhodanji.
Holeka u wubi lono wakondya kuwuswa, howa hasina kanyhi soko yo kulavizya i cilavywa co kuwusizo wubi.”
Ale wandugu zangu, mu sakami ya Yesu, mo capelelwa i nhumbula yono yisina woga yo kwinjilila i Hanhu Hono Helile.
Mwene yo yacitulila i nzila mhya, nzila yo wumi, yono yikoleye mwibupa, nha cinji mu nzila yo muwili wakwe mweneco.
Holeka cina u Mukohani Muwaha mono yena u wulajilize mu nyumba yo Mulungu.
Holeka cimusejelelaje u Mulungu ne nhumbula yo winenenyhezi no wihuwilo wono wumemeleceye, mu nhumbula yono yezigwe mu ciselinji cibi, na mu miwili yono yihovugwe ne malenga mazelu.
Ciwukamisaje u witumbilo wetu wono cikuwuvumila, hambi u Mulungu mono yawunoza u wihuwizo wakwe nha mwihuwilwa.
Kanyhi cihindaje mu wikombaniza sese wose munhu na muyagwe, akuno cikwiyoha kwiyikwejenhela ku wendo no wituma ziswanu.
Cilece kuwuleka u wityatye wuwulya wo witang'anila hamonga, nha vyono wanozaga wanji. Kanyhi yicinojeye kwiyitaza sese wose, nha vyono mukuwona, i lizuwa lilya lyo Muwaha lyeza lili behi.
Hambi hono cijendelele kwituma wubi ne nyono, na lono cakondya kuyimanya i mbeka, hasina kanyhi likumbiko lyono lyosuma kulavywa so wuwusizwe wo wubi.
Langa yono yisigaye yowa yo wulanjilila ko woga, u wuling'anizwe wo Mulungu no moto mukali wono wolowamala wose wono wakumulema u Mulungu.
U munhu wo wose mono yabezaga u wulajilize wa Musa yawulagwaga hamba kuwonelwa lusungu, hamwande yo wuhomelezi we wanhu wejete hamba wadatu.

Wulenyi, u munhu mono yakumubedula u Mwana wo Mulungu, no kuyibedegala i sakami ye cilagane co Mulungu cono ca mweza, u munhu yuyo mono yakumutovula u Muhe wo Mulungu, yimunojeye yapegwe wulipicizwe wuwaha nha cici?
Hambi nha cimumanyile ayulya mono yatya, “U wulipicize wina nene, ane nolipiciza.” Na kanyhi mono yatya, “U Muwaha kolowaling'aniza i wanhu wakwe.”
Ku wugwila mu miwoko yo Mulungu mumi yo nghani ya kogofya muno muno.
Ninga muzikumbucilaje zono zejela mu vilo vivilya i vilongozi lono mwali mwenzeluswa no wuzelu wo Mulungu. Ku soko hamba yiwe mwatuga wugazwe winji mu vilo vivyo, ninga mwakangalila.
Hanji mukawa kutovulwa no kukozwa cevu cagalanze, na hanji mwali mwendezwe kwilunza na walya wono wagazwaga nhavivyo.
Mwahangana u wugazwe ne wafungwa, na lono mwabokwaga zisawo zenyu, mwakangalila na nyemo, hambi nha mwali mumanyile vyono mwina sawo yono swanu muno muno kanyhi yono yikalaga cibitilila.
Holeka mulece kuwutaga u wuluwuce wenyu, hambi nha womuletelenyi wuhumbilizwe wuwaha.
Ninga mukusaka muwe no wukangalile, ho musume kwituma zono yakuzisaka Mulungu, ho mucibocele cono yehuwiza.
Nha vyono gakutya i Mandiko: “Hambi nha cikali cidaha cidodo du, nayo mono yakuza, ho kokuza, hamba si kotinya yaye,
Ninga u munhu wangu we ling'ani kokwihuwila no kuwumipa, ninga hono yawuye kanyhi ku nyuma, ane sinokwendezwa nayo.”
Ninga ase si cili wayagwe na walya wono wakuwuya ne nyuma, no kwajilila, langa ase cihuwiye no kuponywa i zinhumbula zetu.
Wuwa no wihuwilo, wo wutya wo wumanyile lukulu we vinhu vyono citumbiye, kwitumbilila lukulu muli vyono siciviwonaga kwe meso.
Hambi i wanhu we katali, nha watujila u wuvumilwe no Mulungu ku soko yo wihuwilo wawo.
Na so wihuwilo, ase cimanyile nha vyono yinze yawumbilwa mu Nghani yo Mulungu; i vinhu vyono vijelaga ku wulawa mu vinhu vyono si vijelaga.

So wihuwilo, Habeli yamulavizya u Mulungu likumbiko lyono lyali yiswanu muno licizize lya Kayini. Na so wihuwilo wakwe yavumilwa no Mulungu nha munhu we ling'ani; u Mulungu mweneco yavivumila i vilavywa vyakwe. Na so wihuwilo wakwe, hamba yawe yakondya kufwa, ninga yakali yakulonga.

So wihuwilo, Enoci yanyasulwa no Mulungu, hamba si yafwa. Hamba si yejela kanyhi, hambi u Mulungu nha yali yamunyasula. Ne Mandiko gakutya, vyono yamwendezaga u Mulungu lono yali yakali si nanyasulwa no Mulungu.

Holeka si yosumika kumwendeza u Mulungu hono hasina wihuwilo. Vyono u munhu wo wose mono yakusaka kumwendeza u Mulungu, yimunojeye yehuwile vyono u Mulungu yali baho, na kanyhi vyono u Mwene kawakamisaga wose wono wakumulondola.

So wihuwilo, Noha yasugulwa no Mulungu kuli za kumwande zono yali yakali si yanasuma kuziwona yaye. Yamuhuliko Mulungu, yakanoza ligalawa lyono yaponela u mweneco hamonga na we mhuga yakwe wose. Na mu wulawilila muli zizo, i yinze yikaling'anizwa, nayo Noha yakatuga u wiling'ano wono wukulawilila mu wihuwilo.
So wihuwilo, Abulahamu yamuhuliko Mulungu lono yacemelwa yabite ku yisi yono u Mulungu yali yamupele yiwe yakwe. Hamba yiwe si yali yamanyile kono yabitaga, ninga yakahama.
So wihuwilo, yakekala nha mujenzi mu yisi yono u Mulungu yamwihuwiziza. Yakekala kuko mwihema nha vyono wekalaga wa Isaka na Yakobo, wono nawo wahanga u wihuwizo wuwo.
Hambi Abulahamu nha yalindilaga likaya lyono lina u musinji wono wukamile, i likaya lyono u Mulungu mweneco yo munghula mono yalihwesa no kulizenga.
So wihuwilo, sunga Sala yehuwila vyono u Mulungu kawufisilizaga u wihuwizo wakwe, holeka yakapegwa vilungo vyo kutuga 'nda, hamba yawe yali yakondya kupuluta i vilo vyo kutujila i mida so wukombi.
Holeka mu wulawa mo munhu yuyo yumonga, Abulahamu hamba yawe yali yeza nha yafwiza, walelwa i wanhu wono si wakuwala, wenha i zinyelezi za ku wulanga no musawawa wa mwi'lenga.

Ne wanhu wawa wose wafwa wena no wihuwilo. Nawo wafwa lono wakali si nabocela u wihuwilo wono u Mulungu yali yehuwize, ninga waziwonela kutali, wakasecelela, no kuvumila calinze vyono wene wali wajenzi kanyhi wajendi kono'nze.
Ne wanhu wono wakulonga nha zizo, wakulajila calinze vyono wakuyilondola yisi yawo weneco.
Na hono wali wawe wakuyikumbucila yisi kono walawilila katali, wali watuje i cilejeho co kuwuyila kuko kanyhi.
Ninga alu wakusaka i yisi ya ku wulanga. Holeka u Mulungu nayo si yakuwona soni hono wamutye Mwene Mulungu wawo, ku soko vyono Mwene yakondya kuwawikaniziza i kaya.

So wihuwilo, Abulahamu yamulavya u mwanagwe Isaka ho yawe likumbiko, lono u Mulungu yamujelaga. Na yuyo Abulahamu yali yabocela u wihuwizo wo Mulungu, ninga, hamba nhavivyo, yavumila kumulavya yikumbiko u mwanagwe we ciwene,
hamba yiwe u Mulungu yali yakondya kumulonjela. “U lulelo lwako lolawa muli Isaka.”
Abulahamu yehuwila vyono u Mulungu kosuma kuwazukula i wafu: na ku lubavu lunji, mbeka Abulahamu yamutuga kanyhi u mwanagwe kulawa kuli wafu.
So wihuwilo, Isaka yawaluguta wa Yakobo na Esawu, ho watuje u wumoteswe wono wolokuza hanyuma.
So wihuwilo, Yakobo lono yali yeza behi no kufwa, yawaluguta wana wose wa Yusufu, yakamuhembo Mulungu akuno yayegamiye ne nghome yakwe.
So wihuwilo, Yusufu lono yali yeza behi no kufwa, yazilonga zo luhamo lwe Waisilayeli ku wulawa ku yisi ya Misili, yakawalecela ne malajilizo kuli ze mafupa gakwe.
Sowihuwilo, i walezi wa Musa wamuhundika yuyo mwana mu myezi midatu, lono yali yalelwa. Wamuwona vyono yali mwana muswanu, hamba si wawogopa u wulajilize wo mutemi.
So wihuwilo, Musa lono yali yeza munhu mututu, yalema kucemwa mwana wo muhinza wa Falawo.
Yakawona vyono yili ciba yagazanwe hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu, si nho kwiyendeza no wuswanu wo wubi kwa cidaha cidodo.
Yakamanya vyono, ku wutuga magazo ku soko ya Kilisito, ko cili cambuzi ciwaha muno muno, si nho u wugoli wose wa mu Misili, hambi nha yali yalanjiliye u wuhumbilizwe wa hanyuma.

So wihuwilo, Musa yahama ku wulawa ku yisi ya Misili, hamba kogopa i likuwo lyo mutemi, na hamba si yawuya ku nyuma, hambi nha yali nha munhu mono yakondya kumuwona u Mulungu yu yulya mono si kejelaga.
Na so wihuwilo, yanoza Pasaka, yakalajiliza i sakami yimizwe mu milango, ho yu yulya malayika u muwulaji yalece kuwawulaga wana walelwa i walongozi wa Isilayeli.
So wihuwilo, i wanhu wa Isilayeli walowoka lilenga lya Shamu, kotya nha yali yisi nghavu; ninga Wamisili wali weza kujela nawo kunoza nhavivyo, wakafwila wose mu malenga.
So wihuwilo, i majinji ge likaya lya Yeliko gakagwa, lono wanhu wa Isilayeli wali wakondya kugapilima mu vilo mupunghati.
Na so wihuwilo, Lahabu mono yali musenyha, si yajililana hamonga na awalya wono wamubeza Mulungu, ku soko vyono yawacemela ko mulamu awalya i watandizi.
Alu nolonga cici kanyhi, hambi cilejeho nha si conghondya ho nonje za Gidiyoni, Balaki, Samusoni, Yefuta, na Dawudi, na Samwili na ze wawizi.
So wihuwilo, wawa wose wehoma ne watemi, wakasuma. Wetuma zo wiling'ano, nawo wakabocela zono yehuwiza u Mulungu. Wadinda i milomo ye masimba,
wayizimya myoto mikali, wakapona mu wuwulagwe no mumaje. Wali wasocele, ninga wakatuga vilungo. Wali wena inhumbula yono yisina woga mu wulugu, wakagasuma i malugu ge wajenzi.

Ne wacekulu wono wali wehuwiye, wakagomolelwa i wafu wawo wakondya kuzukulwa. Wanji muli wene wakalema kuwopolelwa, wakatamiswa vibi sunga wakafwa, ho watuje u wuzuce no kwinjila mu mikalile imiswanu yono yicizize muno.
Wanji wakazwajizwa no kukunangwa ne viboko, na wanji kanyhi wakawopwa ne manyolo no kutajilwa mu jela.
Watowangwa ne mabwe, wakademulangwa, wakawulagwa no mumaje. Wakawa kupilima-pilima wavwalile nyhingo ze zingholo ne zimhene, wakawa waciwa, wono wagazwa no kutendelwa vibi.
Hamba ne yinze si yali yinojeye kuwa ne wanhu wawo. Wakawa kudumanjila mu nyika na mu matunda; wekalaga mu mapango na mu makolongo ge yisi.
Ne wanhu wawa wose wejela vyono wali wali vilungo so wihuwilo wawo. Hamba nha vivyo, si wabocela zono u Mulungu yawehuwiziza,
hambi u Mulungu nha yali yehwesize i nghani swanu muno kuciza ku soko yetu; wo wutya wene ho waze wawutuje u wukwilanicizwe hamonga na sese.

Ase cina yipuga yiwaha lye wahomelezi wono wali ha mwande yetu. Holeka ku soko yiyo ciyilegaje muli vimizi vyose vyono vikucimila, hamonga no wubi wono wucinamatiye muno muno. Kanyhi cimanyhe ko wukangalizi mu witije wono wuli ha mwande yetu.

Akuno cikumulanga Yesu mono wo mwamulizo wo wihuwilo wetu, no kuwukwiza. Mono, ku soko ye nyemo yono yali yawiciywe u mwene, yakangalila u wufwe wa mu musalaba, hamba kulanga ze cevu cakwe, alu yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lwe ligoda lyo lukumyo lyo Mulungu.
Ale, mwihwesaje ta, kuli zono zamwagana Yesu, nha vyono yakangalila u wiwanganile wuwaha nha wuwu kuli wanhu wanyo wubi. Holeka mulece kutukuwika mitima yenyu hamba kukatala.
Hambi nha mukali si nehoma mukwisumaniza no wubi, sunga muficile ku wita sakami yenyu.
Wulenyi, alu mwazisemwa i zinghani zono u Mulungu yakulonga nanye nha wanagwe? “Mwanangu, wulece kubedegala i mafundo go Muwaha, hamba wulece kutukuwika u mutima wako kolo yakukukalipila.
Hambi u Muwaha nha kamufundaga wo wose mono yamwendile kanyhi kawatowaga iwana wose wono yakuwabocela.”
Holeka muwukangalililaje u wutowe, hambi nha wo wufundwe; u Mulungu yakumutendelenyi anye nha wanagwe. Hambi yo mwanaci mono si kafundwaga no sogwe?
Ninga hono mulece kufundwa nhe wana wanji, ale kumbe si muli wanagwe, langa muli wana watumulwa.
Ninga hamba nhavivyo, ase ciwogopile walezi wetu wono wacilela, hamba na hono wakucifunda. Holeka yicinojeye cimuhulice muno muno u Sogo yetu we cimuhe ho ciwumipe.
I walezi wetu wa baha hono yinze, wacifunda kwa cipango du, nha vyono wawonaga viswanu weneco, ninga u Mulungu yakucifunda ku so cambuzi cetu sese co weneco, ho cihanje u wele wakwe.

No wufundwe wo wose, si cinhu ca nyemo, langa co cinhu ca kukalaza. Ninga awalya wono wafundwa no kuwa no wunhu wuswanu, i ndumilizo nha wodudula wuhumbilizwe wo mulamu wono wukulawa mu mikalile yo wiling'ano!
Holeka muyinulaje i miwoko yenyu yono yidejepe, no kugasikamya mafugamilo genyu gono gatimbile.
Mujendelele kujendela mu nzila yono yigoloce, u mugulu wono wulemaye ho wulece kutamiswa, langa wuponywe.
Muweze no wuhile wo kuwa na mulamu ne wanhu wose. Mwikalaje mu mikalile yono yelile, ku soko vyono, hasina u munhu mono kosuma kumuwona u Muwaha Mulungu, hono yawe yayisina mikalile yono yinha yiyo.
Muhidimbale muno muno, ho yunji yalece kulyajiliza i lihewa lyo Mulungu. Mwilanjililaje, lisina lyo wusungu lilece kutula muli nyenye, no kuwawulaga wanhu wenji ko wusungu walyo.

Muhidimbale, ho halece kuwa muli nyenye na munhu yunji, musenyha hamba munhu mono si yakumogopo Mulungu nha vyono Esawu, mono yawuguza u wiling'ano wakwe wo kuwa u mulelwa u mulongozi ku soko yo wulye wa kamonga.

Nanye mumanyile nha vyono, sunga na lono yasakaga kuwutuga kanyhi wuwulya u wulugutwe wono wali wakwe, yakalemwa, hambi nha si yacituga kanyhi cilejeho co kunena, hamba yiwe yacilondola muno akuno ne mahozi.
Hambi nha simuficile kwi'tunda lya Sinayi, lyono lyosuma kwibatika nha vyono wanoza wanhu wa Isilayeli, kanyhi mukali nafika kono kowuli moto wono wakaga, ha wutitu, ne citi, na ha mukukunzo,
no mulizo we ndulele ne lizi lye zinghani. Wawo wono walihulika lizi lilyo, wakanena walece kuyihulika kanyhi nghani yinji,
hambi nha si wasuma kulikangalilila lilajilizo lyono walajilizwa. “Mono kolipamiza litunda lili hamba wuwe mutugo, kopondangwa ne mabwe sunga yafwe.”
Na zizi zose zikejela nha nghani za kogofya muno, sunga na Musa yakatya, “Ane nghogopa muno no kucicima.”
Ninga anye muficile mwi'tunda lya Sayuni, ku kaya yo Mulungu mumi. Muficile Yelusalemi, ilikaya lya ku wulanga, kono wekonghoye wa malayika maelufu menji si wakuwala.

Mwaficila ku wutang'ano wuwaha we walelwa iwalongozi wo Mulungu, wono matagwa gawo gandicigwe ku wulanga. Mwimile hali Mulungu u muling'anizi wa wose, na hamwande ye myuhe ye wanhu we ling'ani wono wanozwa wakwilaniciye.
Muficile kuli Yesu u munoza i Cilagane, Cipya mono i sakami yakwe yamwajika yikulonga ziswanu muno si nha ya Habeli.

Holeka mulanjilile, mulece kulema kumuhuliciza mono yakulongana nanye. Nha vyono awalya wono walema kumuhuliciza ayulya mono yawasugula hono yinze, si wapona yaye. Alu ase cosuma kupona wule hono cileme kumuhuliciza ayulya mono yakucisugula, mono yalawa ku wulanga?
Mwi'pango lilyo lizi lyayisinjisa yinze, ninga alu yehuwiza yakutya, “Noyisinjisa yinze, kanyhi hamba si yinze du langa sunga no wulanga nhavivyo.”
I nghani yiyi kanyhi, yikucilajila vyono i vinhu vyose vyono vyawumbwa vyosinjiswa no kuwuswa, ho visigale avilya vyono si vikusinjiswa.
Holeka ase, yicinojeye cilumbe muno, vyono cikuwubocela u wutemi wono si wukusinjisika. Ciweze ne lilumbo no kumuhemba u Mulungu mu nzila yono yikumwendeza, hamonga no winenenyhezi ne cogopo;
hambi u Mulungu wetu mbeka nha moto mukali wono wukutakamiza.
Mujendelele mu wendo we cindugu.
Mulece kusemwa kuwacemela wajenzi; hambi mu wituma nhavivyo, wanji nha wawacemela i wamalayika wula kumanya.
Mweze kuwakumbucila i wawopwa nanye muwe nha kotya muwopanwe nawo. Kanyhi mweze kotya mukugazika nha weneco.
U wutole wuweze ne cogopo kuli wanhu wose, i walume ne wacekulu yiwanojeye weze wehuwilwa kuli munhu na muyagwe. Hambi u Mulungu nha kowaling'aniza i wanhu we mikalile mibi ne wasenyha.
Mulece kuwa muli wasulumizi ku zipesa, langa mweze muceye ne vinhu vyono mwina navyo. Hambi u Mulungu mweneco nha yatya, “Si nokulecela lukulu, hamba si nokutaga.”
Holeka cikulonga cisina woga: “U Muwaha yo mutazi wangu, si nokogopa. Hambi u munhu konoza cici?”
Mweze kuwakumbucila i walongola wenyu wono wamulonjelenyi i nghani yo Mulungu. Mwihwesaje ze njenda yawo, muwegaje u wihuwilo wawo.
Yesu Kilisito yo yuyo du igolo ne zuwali, na ku cibitilila.

Mulece kutyatya ze mafundo ganji ganji ge cijenzi. I lihewa lyo Mulungu lyo likucisikamya i zinhumbula zetu, hamba si myoto ya mu wulye; hambi i malajilizo nha si gamutaza hamba hadodo u munhu wo wose mono yagatyatya.
Ase cina cikumbicilo cono awalya wono wakwituma mwihema lye Wayahudi, wasina wukombolwe wo kulya vinhu vyayo.
U Mukohani Muwaha we Ciyahudi, kaletaga i sakami ye mitugo, i Hanhu Hono Helile, no kulavya makumbiko ku soko yo wubi ninga i zinyama ze mitugo zizo nha zikuwa kuticimizizwa kunze ye nghambi.
Yo soko, nayo Yesu, yagazizwa kunze ye likaya, sunga yakafwa, ho yaweze i wanhu so sakami yakwe mweneco.
Ale nase cimubitile kuko kunze ye nghambi, akuno cidinghuye u wumondwe wakwe.
Hambi akuno kono yinze nha cisina likaya lyono likalaga; langa cikulilondola lyono likuza.
Ale nhondo, mu nzila ya Yesu, cimulavizyaje u Mulungu, likumbiko lyo lukumyo nhondo zose, wo wutya, u lukumyo lono lukuletwa ne wanhu wono wakulivumila litagwa lyakwe.
Mulece kusemwa kwituma i ziswanu no kwitaza nyenye wose, hambi zizo nha lye kumbiko lyono likumwendeza u Mulungu.

Muwahulikaje i walongola wenyu, no kwibata zono wakulonga; hambi nha wakuzidima i zinhumbula zenyu mu cilo na mu misi, kanyhi si woleka kulolosa zo witumami wawo hali Mulungu. Na hono muwahulice, nawo ho wokwituma i milimo yawo kwa nyemo, ninga hono yilece kuwa nhavivyo, wokwituma no wukalale, na si yo wana cambuzi kuli nyenye.
Mucilombelaje na sese. Cimanyiye lukulu vyono cina ciselinji ciswanu, hambi nha cendile kwituma yono yili ling'ani nhondo zose.
Nghumunenenyi muno muno, munombelaje, ho Mulungu yangomole u kwenyu mbela mbela, nha vyono yosumika.
U Mulungu yamuzukula u Muwaha wetu Yesu Kilisito mono yo Mudimi wetu Muwaha we zingholo, ku soko yo wumwaje we sakami yakwe yono yakangaza i cilagane ce cibitilila.

U Mulungu wo mulamu, yamukwilanicizenyi mu ziswanu zose, ho mwitume wuhile wakwe; nayo yetume muli sese, zono zikumwendeza mweneco mu nzila ya Kilisito. Kuli mwene, weze lukumyo cibitilila ne cibitilila. Heya.
Holeka nghumunenenyi wandugu zangu, muyihulicizaje mutulile i nghani yiyi yo wulanjizwe. Hambi ayi nha baluwa fupi du yono nimwandicilenyi.
Nyendile kumumanyizenyi nha vyono u ndugu yetu Timoteyo yakondya kudigulilwa kulawa mu jela. Na hono yeyandile kuza akuno, nolokuzana nayo kolo nghuza u kwenyu.
Ale, muwalamusaje i walongola wenyu wose, hamonga ne wanhu wo Mulungu! I wandugu zetu wanya akuno ku Italiya, wakumulamusenyi.
Lihewa lyo Mulungu liwezane nanye wose.
Nene Yakobo, umwitumami wo Mulungu, na wo Muwaha Yesu Kilisito, nghumwandicilenyi nyenye, nyo we milango yikumi na myejete, mono mwiyagaye kono'nze kose. Lamucenyi!
Wandugu zangu, muweze na nyemo kolo mukuzizwa ne majelo ganji ganji,
hambi nha mumanyile vyono, kolo wihuwilo wenyu wukusuma kulewana ne majelo, womupelenyi ngola.
Kanyhi mweze mumanyile vyono, ingola yenyu yomutazenyi sunga ku ndumo, ho muwe mukamile kanyhi mukwilaniciye, ho mulece kucepucilwa na cinji co cose.
Na hono muyenyu yunji yawe yanjiye mahala, ale, yimunojeye yamulombe Mulungu mono komupela, hambi Mulungu nha kawapelaga wose ko winji, na kwe nhumbula swanu.
Ninga yimunojeye yalombe yehuwiye akuno yasina mahwele, go gose. Hambi u munhu mono yena mahwele nha yehwanile mawingo ge lilenga, gono gapemheluswaga no kugumilwa ako na ako ne mbeho.
Umunhu mono yenha nhavivyo, mono yena mahweso gono gali hejete,
nha kekalaga yakukangamyanga mu mikalile yakwe yose, holeka yalece kutya kopegwa co cose kulawa kuli Muwaha.
Ninga u Mukilisito muciwa, yimunojeye yawe na nyemo lono Mulungu yakumwinula,
nayo mugoli, yimunojeye yawe na nyemo lono yakugwiswa no Mulungu. Hambi umugoli nha kokwajilila nhe liluwa lya mu mbago.
Hambi lizuwa nha lidulaga, na kolo likukalipa linyazaga mahanze, ne maluwa gayo gakung'unhikaga, no wuswanu wayo wose wuhodanjikaga. Ale nhavivyo, no mugoli nayo, kolo kongomezezwa mu metumo gakwe.
Mumoti munhu mono yakukangalila wujelwe, hambi kolo yeza yasuma, nha kopegwa i cihumbilizwa co wumi cono Mulungu yawatemezezya wawalya wono wamwendile.
Na lono munhu yakujelwa, yalece kutya, “Nghujelwa no Mulungu.” Hambi u Mulungu nha sikosuma kujelwa no wubi, hamba mweneco, sikamujelaga munhu wo wose.
Ninga u munhu kajelwaga lono yakukwegwa no kusumwa ne masulumizi gakwe mweneco.
Na lono wusulumizi wenjipa wulelaga wubi, nawo wubi kolo wakangala, wulelaga lifwa.
Nye wandugu zangu wendece, mulece kukongwa.

Ivipegwa vyose viswanu ne vilavywa vyose vyono vikwilaniciye vilawaga ku wulanga, vilawaga kuli Sogo yo munhu, u Muwumbi we mazelu ga ku wulanga, mono yasina cipitupitu hamba yasina cinji co cose cono cosuma kumuletela wupituce.
So wendo wakwe mweneco, yacilela mu nghani yakwe ye mbeka, ho ciwe nha cili mikalo milongozi wa muli viwumbwa vyakwe.
Wandugu zangu wendece, kumbucilenyi nghani yiyi! Umunhu wo wose yeze mupelu kuhulika, ninga yalece kuwa mupelu kulonga, hamba yalece kuwa mupelu kusimba.
Hambi u munhu mono yena likuwo, nha sikosuma kwituma zo wuhile wo Mulungu wono wuli ling'ani.

Holeka, muyilecelaje lukulu i mikalile yenyu mibi, ne mijendele yose yo wavu, mwiwice mu miwoko yo Mulungu, no kuyibocela nghani yiyilya yono hadikwe mu zinhumbula zenyu, yono yosuma kuziponya zinhumbula zenyu.
Mulece kwiyikonga nyo weneco, mu wuhuliciza i nghani yakwe du, langa mweze wetuma i nghani yakwe.
Wo wose mono kahulikaga nghani yiyo, hamba kuyituma, yuyo yehwanile u munhu mono yakwilanga futa yakwe mwi'lole.
Hambi nha kelangaga mweneco, hanyuma yayo kabita, na lulo lulo baho du kawa kwiyisemwa nha vyono yali yenha.

Langa umunhu mono yakuwulanjisa muno muno wulajilize wono wukwilaniciye, wono wupelaga wanhu welecele, no munhu mono yakujendelela kuwibata, hamba sikuwuhulika du, no kuwusemwa hanyuma yayo, langa yakuwitumama, umunhu yuyo kowa mumoti muli vyose vyono yakwitumama.

Na hono munhu yewone mweneco nha munhu mono yebate dini muno muno, ninga kuno siyakusuma kulwimila lulimi lwakwe, dini yakwe u munhu yuyo yikuwa yisina hamba cambuzi co cose, langa yakwikonga mweneco du.

Hambi dini yono yelile, na yono yisina manamha manamha ha mwande yo Mulungu u Sogo yo munhu, nha yoyi: Kuwataza wana wono wasina walezi wawo, ne wacekulu wafwile mu wugaye wawo, no kwiyilanjilila go mweneco ho wulece kutipizwa ne yinze yiyi.
Wandugu zangu, hono muwe mumwihuwiye u Muwaha Yesu Kilisito, u Muwaha wo lukumyo, mulecele lukulu kuwawagula wanhu.
Lunji cilonje citye, munhu yunji mono yavwalile nyamwidole ye zahabu, ne vivwalo vitambule, hono yenjile mu mukung'ano wenyu, na baho kanyhi yenjile no munhu muciwa mono yavwalile vivwalo vitipiye.

Hono mumupele lilumbo lyono licizize hawaha, yuyulya mono yavwalile vivwalo vyono vikung'alala, no kumutya, “Agwe wikale ahano haswanu,” no kumutya yuyulya muciwa, “Agwe nagwe wime ahalya,” hamba “Wikale ahano hasi hono magulu gangu,”
wulenyi ma, wuwo wuwaguzi muli nyenye? Ma, na wuwo wulamuzi wenyu si wukulawilila mu mahweso mabi?
Wandugu zangu, wendece, hulicizenyi ta! U Mulungu yakondya kuwahagula iwanhu waciwa wa mu yinze yiyi, ho wawe wagoli wo wihuwilo, kanyhi wawubocele wutemi wono yawatemezeza wa walya wono wamwendile.
Ninga nye mukuwabedegala wanhu waciwa! Ninga iwagoli wo wawo wono wakumugazenyi no kumutegulenyi kuli Mahakama?
Wulenyi, si wo wawo wono walitovulaga litagwa lyenyu liswanu lyono mucemeywe?

Na hono muwe mukuwufisiliza u wulajilize wulya wo Wutemi, nha vyono yandicigwe mu Mandiko Gono Gelile: “Wumwendaje munhu muyago nha vyono wiyendile gwegwe go mweneco,” ale mowa mukunoza viswanu muno muno.
Ninga hono muwawagule wanhu, mukwituma wubi, nawo Wulajilize nha wukumuhosenyi nyenye vyono mwina wusutye.
Na mono yakubena lilajilizo limonga du lya mu Wulajilize, kowa wuhoswe wo kuwuhodanga Wulajilize wose.
Hambi yu yulya mono yakatya, “Wulece kusenyha,” nha yo yatya kanyhi “Wulece kuwulaga.” Holeka hamba wuwe siwukuwa kusenyha, ninga wukuwulaga, agwe wakondya kuwubena wulajilize.
Ale, holeka mweze kulonga no kwituma nhe wanhu wono wololing'anizwa no Wulajilize wono wuletaga welecele.
Hambi, u Mulungu nha kolowa yasina lusungu kolo yakumuling'aniza munhu mono yasina lusungu. Ninga lusungu lucizize wuling'anizi.
Nye wandugu zangu, alu kocili cambuzici, hono munhu yatye yena wihuwilo, ninga kuno ho siyakulajila imetumo gayo? Alu wuwo wihuwilo wosuma kumuponya wule?
Citye lunji, ndugu we cilume hamba we cicekulu yawe yasina mwenda hamba ndigwa.
Cowa cambuzici kuli'nye co kuwatya wawo, “Bitenyi mupolile mukote moto, mwigute,” hamba simukuwapela visakwa vyawo vyono wakuhila mu mikalile yawo?
Ale nhavivyo no wihuwilo weneco du wuli wene wono wusina metumo, wufwiye.
Ninga munhu yadahile kutya, “Agwe wina wihuwilo, ane nina metumo!” Ale! Wundajile ta vyono munhu kowa yena wihuwilo wono wusina metumo, nane nokulajila wihuwilo wangu mu metumo gangu.
Ma, agwe wukwihuwila vyono Mulungu yo yumonga? Viswanu! Ninga hamba ne macisi nago gehuwiye nhavivyo, na kuno gakucicima so woga.
Go mulele 'gwe, ma, wukusaka kulajilwa vyono u wihuwilo wono wusina metumo wufwiye?
Ma, usetu Abulahamu yanoza wule sunga yakavumilwa no Mulungu? Yavumililwa mu metumo gakwe, lono yamulavizya mwanagwe Isaka mu cikumbicilo.
Ale, wona ta, vyono wihuwilo wakwe, wetumana ne metumo gakwe, u wihuwilo wakwe wukakwilanicizwa mu metumo gakwe.

Holeka gakafisilizwa gagalya i Mandiko Gono Gelile gono gatezaga: “Abulahamu yakamwihuwilo Mulungu, na mu wihuwilo wakwe, yakavumilwa yawe munhu we ling'ani, holeka Abulahamu yakacemwa mwendece wo Mulungu.”
Ale, mukuwona ta, vyono munhu kavumilwaga no Mulungu mu metumo gakwe hamba si mu wihuwilo wuli wene du.
Na vyo yali yinha na kuli Lahabu u musenyha, nayo yavumilwa yawe we ling'ani ku soko vyono yawabocela wa walya i watandizi, no kuwatonga wakole nzila yinji.
Ale, nha vyono umuwili wezaga wufwiye hono wusina muhe, nhavivyo no wihuwilo nawo, wezaga wufwiye hono wusina metumo.
Wandugu zangu, wenji wa muli nyenye, mulece kuwa wejizi. Hambi nha vyono mumanyile, sese co wejizi colotuga wuling'anizwe wuwaha muno muno kuciza wanji.
Hambi na sese wose nha cisutyaga kali kenji. Ninga hone munhu sikasutyaga mu wulonje wakwe, munhu yuyo kowa yakwilaniciye, kanyhi kosuma kuwimila muwili wakwe wose.

Ase ciziwicilaga zifwalasi lijamu mu milomo yazo ho zicihulice, na muwunoza nhavivyo mo cisumilaga kuzitegula ko kose kono cendile co weneco. |4B.tif|span|||I zifwalasi zono ziwopigwe no lubano (3:3) |
Ne zingalawa nazo kanyhi, hamba ziwe mbaha muno, nha zipitulwaga ne mabeho mawaha, ninga zipitulwaga ne cisukani cidodo vivi, ko kose kono mutonji yendile.
Ale nhavivyo no lulimi nalo, hamba luwe nha cilunzwa cidodo vivi co muwili, cikuwa kwiyikumya makani mawaha muno muno. Ne cinyesela cidodo vivi co moto naco citakamizaga mbago mbaha.

Ale nhavivyo no lulimi nalo, lwinha moto. Hambi nha lumemile wubi winji muno, nalo lwina cilejeho mu miwili yetu, kanyhi lutajilaga wubi mu miwili yetu yose. Wutakamizaga u wumi wetu wose nho moto wono wulawaga ku Gehena yeneco.
No munhu nayo, nha kasumaga kugafuga malimu, kanyhi yakondya kusuma kuvifuga i viwumbwa vyose vye malimu ga mu mbago, ne zindeje, ne mazoka, ne malimu ga mwilenga.
Ninga hasina munhu mono yasuma kulufuga lulimi. Lulimi co cinhu cibi, cono sicimilwaga, kanyhi lumemile sumu mbulaji.
Ko lulimi, cimulumbaga Muwaha no Sogo yetu. Na ko lulimi lulo kanyhi, ciwalijitaga wanhu, wanhu wono wawumbigwe mu hwani yo Mulungu.
Izinghani ze malijito na zo wulumbe, zose zilawaga mu mulomo monga. Nyo wandugu zangu, izinghani zizi sizinojeye ziwe nhavivi.
Ma, cisima cimonga co muvwilo monga cisumaga 'mbi kuvwiza malenga mapolo ne malenga makali hamonga?
Wandugu zangu, libici lyo mukuyu ma, lisumaga kulela zeyituni? Hamba muzabibu wusumaga kulela nghuyu? Hamba ne cisima co muvwilo we malenga ge cimwino mwino, sicisumaga kuvwiza malenga mapolo.
Ma, nani mono yena mahala no wizuce muli nyenye? Ale, yayilajilaje ta inghani yiyi, mu mikalile yakwe miswanu, na mu metumo gakwe maswanu, gono ganozwaga mu winenenyhezi ne mahala.
Ninga hono zinhumbula zenyu ziwe zimemile wivu, simbili no wiyendezi, ale, mulece kwikumya no kuyilambiza i mbeka, ku soko yo wikumizya i mahala genyu.
Mahala gono genha nhavivi, sigalawaga kucanyha ku wulanga, langa imahala gago ga kononze, kanyhi ga ciyinze yinze, na kanyhi ga cisetani.
Hambi nha ho hose hono howuli wivu no wiyendezi, baho ho howuli no wuma ne mabi mabi gose.
Ninga imahala gono galawaga kucanyha ku wulanga, gene gelile, gendile mulamu no wupolo, kanyhi galulaga wanhu, gamemile lusungu kanyhi galelaga mikalo ye metumo maswanu, gasina wuwaguzi hamba wukoci.
No wiling'ano, yo mikalo ye zimbeyu za wono wendile mulamu wahadicilaga mu mulamu.
U wulugu no wisonji wose muli nyenye vilawaga hayi? Vilawaga mu masulumizi genyu mabi, gono galewanaga nhondo zose muli nyenye.

Musulumilaga vinhu, na kolo mweza simukuvituga, hobaho mukwiwikaniza kuwulaga, mukusulumila muno kuvituga vinhu, ninga simukuvituga, holeka mwisongaga no kwitowa. Hambi nha simutugaga cico cono musakaga vyono simucilombaga kuli Mulungu.
Kanyhi kolo mukulomba simupegwaga, vyono mulombaga ko wuhile wubi, hambi nha mulombaga ho mwigutye imasulumizi genyu.

Anye muli wanhu mono si muli wehuwilwa, mwihwanile wasenyha. Simumanyile vyono munhu hono yawe kuyenda yinze, yawa mulugu wo Mulungu? Wo wose mono yakusaka yawe kuyenda yinze, yakwinoza yawe mulugu wo Mulungu.
Mulece kwihwesa mba vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile galongaga zinghani za bwete, lono gatezaga, “Umuhe wono Mulungu yawika muli sese, wina wivu wuwaha.”
Ninga, lihewa lyono cikupegwa no Mulungu lili vilungo muno muno, nha vyono gatezaga i Mandiko, “Mulungu kawemilaga iwedunhumuzi, langa kawapelaga lihewa iwenenenyhezi.”
Holeka mwiwikaje mu wukamiswe wo Mulungu, mumwimile Setani, nayo komutizenyi.
Mumusejelelaje Mulungu, nayo komusejelelenyi. Kwemenyi miwoko yenyu nyo wahodanji! Mweze zinhumbula zenyu nyo wakoci!
Muzinguce, mugaye no kulila, uluseko lwenyu luweze cililo, ne nyemo yenyu yiweze wuzinguce wuwaha.
Mwinenenyheze hali Mulungu, nayo komwinulenyi.

Wandugu zangu, mulece kwihosa nyenye wose. Mono yakumuhosa nduguye no kumuling'aniza, yuyo, yakuwuhosa kanyhi yakuwuling'aniza Wulajilize. Na hono wuwuhose Wulajilize, agwe siwukuwibata Wulajilize, langa wukuwuhosa.
Hambi nha Mulungu yali wene du yo kawikaga wulajilize no kuling'aniza. Yo mweneco yali wene du mono yasumile kuponya no kongomeza. Alu, wuli nani gwegwe mono wukumuling'aniza u munhu muyago?
Ale, hulicizenyi ta, anye mono mutezaga, “Izuwali hamba mitondo, cobita kwikaya lyo wutunga, no kwikala kuko mwaka wose cikusuluza no kutuga cambuzi.”
Hamba simumanyile vyono wumi wenyu wowa wule ku mitondo! Hambi anye nha mwihwanile linghungulyosi lyono lijelaga cipango cidodo vivi du no kwajilila kanyhi.
Langa yali yinojeye mutye, “U Muwaha hono yacitaze cokwikala womi no kunoza aci hamba acilya.”
Ninga lu, mukwidunhumula no kwisaja, no widunhumuzi wono winha wuwu wo wubi.
Ale, no munhu mono siketumaga ziswanu zono yazimanyile, vyono zo zimunojeye yetume, ale yuyo yakwituma wubi.
Nalu ta hulicizenyi anye nyo wagoli! Mulile no le kwikunguza so wugaye wenyu wono womuzizenyi.
Isawo yenyu nha yawola, ne vivwalo vyenyu nha vyaligwa ne makuni.
Zizahabu zenyu ne mapesa genyu, gatuga nghangaga, ne nghangaga yiyo yowa wuhomelezi kuli'nye, nayo yomulyenyi miwili yenyu nho moto. Anye mwiwutila isawo mu vilo vivi vye ndumo!
Simwawalipa misahala i wetumami wono wetumo mulimo mu migunda yenyu. Lanjenyi ta vyono wakukalala? Icililo ca wawo wono wakududula mu migunda yenyu, cafika mu makutu go Muwaha Mulungu u Mudaha vyose.
Hambi nha mwekala kono'nze ne mikalile ye cinyemo-nyemo na yo kwiyendeza nyo weneco. Mwakondya kuzijinya zinhumbula zenyu nyo weneco so lizuwa lyo wuwulagwe.
Mwaling'anizwa no kumuwulaga munhu mono yasina wusutye, nayo hamba siyamugomolezezenyi nghani yo yose yono'mbi.

Ale, wandugu zangu, mweze no wukangalile sunga Muwaha kolo kokuziza. Lanjenyi ta u mulimi vyono kalindilaga ko wukangalile i ndudula yakwe yilete ndigwa swanu. Umwene kalindilaga ko wukangalile i mvula ye lifuku ne ye lihwela.
Na nyenye nhavivyo yimunojelenyi muwe na ngola, musikamye zinhumbula zenyu, hambi lizuwa lyo wuze wakwe Muwaha nha lyasejelela.
Wandugu zangu, mulece kwing'ung'ulicila nyenye wose, ho mulece kuling'anizwa no Mulungu. Hambi u Muling'anizi nha yeza behi no kwinjila ha mulango.
Wandugu zangu, hono muwe mukusaka kuwona musambo we ngola no wukangalile muli magazo, mwihwesaje ze wawizi wono waganulaga mwitagwa lyo Muwaha.

Holeka ciwacemaga wawo wo wamoti ku soko vyono wakangalila. Mwakondya kuhulika zo wukangalile wa Jobu, kanyhi mumanyile vyono u Muwaha yamutendela ha ndumilizo. Hambi Muwaha nha yamemile nheto no lusungu.

Ninga ko muno, wandugu zangu mulece kwilaha. Mulece kwilahiza ku wulanga, hamba mono'nze, hamba ku cilaha cinji co cose. Langa mutye “Heya” hono nhunizo yenyu yo heya, na “Ng'o” hono nhunizo yenyu yo ng'o, ho simoling'anizwa no Mulungu.
Ma, hoyuli munhu wo wose muli nyenye mono yena wugaye? Yimunojeye yalombe. Ma, hoyuli yunji musangalafu? Yimunojeye yembe zinyimbo zo wulumbe.
Ma, hoyuli yunji mono yatamigwe muli nyenye? Yimunojeye yawaceme iwanyamhala we Likanisa, nawo womulombela no kumubacila mafuta mwi'tagwa lyo Muwaha.
Na hono walombe wehuwiye yuyo mutamwa koponywa, u Muwaha komupela ciba, no wubi wono yali yetuma wonenelwa.
Ale, mweze kwiyivumilila mabi genyu, mwilombelaje, ho muponywe. Uwulombe wo munhu we ling'ani wina vilungo vyo kwituma nyinji.
Eliya yali munhu yenha sese. Yakalomba muno imvula yilece kutonya, nayo siyatonya mu'si myaka midatu na myezi mutandatu.
Ale, yakalomba kanyhi, ne mvula yikatonya kulawa ku wulanga, ne'si yikacindya zindigwa zayo.
Wandugu zangu, muyenyu yunji hono yajilile mu mbeka, na muyenyu yunji yamupitule,
manyenyi vyono, yuyo mono yakumupitula munyo wubi, ku wulawa mu nzila yakwe yo wajilile, koyiponya i nhumbula yakwe mwi'fwa, no wubi winji wonenelwa.

Nene Petelo, umutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito. Nghumwandicilenyi nyenye nyo wahagulwa wo Mulungu Sogo yo munhu, mono mwiyagaye no kwikala kuko ku Pontiyo, Galatiya, Kapadokiya, Asiya na Bituniya kotya muli watizizi.
Nayo Mulungu u Sogo yo munhu yakamuhagulenyi nyenye ko wuhile wakwe, no kwezwa no Muhe Mono Yelile, ho mumuhulice Yesu Kilisito no kukwemwa ne sakami yakwe. Lihewa no mulamu vyonjelecele kuli'nye.
Yalumbwe Mulungu, u Sogo yo Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito! Ko lusungu lwakwe luwaha, yacinoza cilelwe wupya, ko kumuzukula Yesu muli wafu. Yakondya kucipela u witumbilo wo wumi,
holeka cilindiye kuwutuga wumoti awulya wono Mulungu yawawiciye wanhu wakwe. No Mulungu yakondya kumuwicilenyi wumoti wuwo ku wulanga, kono siwuwolaga, hamba kuhodanjika, hamba kufwifwiza.
Zizo zolowa zenyu nyenye mono ko wihuwilo, mukudimwa viswanu telele, kwe vilungo vyo Mulungu, so mhonelo yono yikondizye kugubulwa ku ndumo ye vilo.
Ale, musangalale, so nghani yiyo, hambe yiwe alu mu cidaha cidodo vivi, simoleka kukalazwa so majelo ganji ganji gono mukugazika ngo.

Ne nhunizo yayo, anye ho musume kukangazwa mu wihuwilo wenyu. Hambe zizahabu zeneco, zono zihodanjikaga, zijelwaga no moto, nhavivyo sunga no wihuwilo wenyu, wono yo sawo kuciza zizahabu, siwoleka kujelwa ho wuwe wuli vilungo. Hanyuma ho mubocele lilumbo no lukumyo no wutogoze, lizuwa lilyo kolo Yesu Kilisito yakugubulwa.
Anye mumwendile, hamba muwe simunamuwona, na kanyhi mumwihuwiye hamba muwe simukumuwona lulu. Holeka, mukusecelela muno ne nyemo yo lukumyo siyakulonga.
So wubocela uwukombozwe we zinhumbula zenyu, wono wo wulunji wo wihuwilo wenyu.
Iwawizi walondola londola muno, no kutikula zo wukombozwe wuwo, wakawila ze lihewa lilyo, lyono anye mwali mupegwe.

Wakajela kumanya ivilo ne ndawililo ye litumo lilyo, nha cinji vilo vyono yalonga u Muhe wa Kilisito mono yali yali muli wene, lono yawilaga ze magazo gono gomuziza Kilisito, no lukumyo lono lotyatya.

Nayo Mulungu yakawagubulila mu vilo vyono walongaga ze zinghani zizo, zono anye, alu mwakondya kuzihulika, kulawa kuli wawalya watumwa wono wakamuganulilenyi u Luganuzi Luswanu, lwe vilungo vyo Muhe Mono Yelile, mono yatumwa ku wulawa ku wulanga, vyono wuwo mulimo wawo, si wali so cambuzi cawo weneco, langa ku soko yenyu. Zizo zo nghani zono hamba wamalayika wali wende kuzimanya.
Ale, holeka mwiwikanizizaje lukulu ko wuhile no kwikala meso. Wicenyi witumbilo wenyu wose mu wumoti wulya wono molopegwa mwi'daha lono Yesu Kilisito yakwijela!
Kanyhi nha vyono yinha nhe wana wo Mulungu we cihuliko, holeka mulece kugatyatya kanyhi imasulumizi mabi, gono mwali mwina nago lono mwali mukali walele.
Langa munojeye mweze mwelile mu mikalile yenyu yose, nha vyono yelile yu yulya mono yamucemenyi
Hambi i Mandiko nha gakutya, “Mweze mwelile, nha vyono ane nyelile.”

Lono mukumutambula u Mulungu, anye Mumucemaga mukutya Baba. Ale, manyenyi vyono mwene kowaling'aniza i wanhu wose mu metumo gawo yasina wuhijila-mbejele. Holeka muvitumamilaje ivilo vyenyu vyono visigaye mu mikalile yenyu, mu wogopo Mulungu.
Hambi nha mumanyile vyono, anye mwakombozwa mu mikalile yenyu mibi, yono mwalecezwa kulawa ku wasenyu, si ne vinhu vyono vihodanjikaga, zipesa ne zizahabu,
langa mwakombozwa kwe sakami yo lukumyo ya Kilisito, mono yali yenha nyana ye ngholo yono yisine'lema hamba ma namha.
Umwene yali yahaguywe no Mulungu lono yinze yali yikali nawumbwa, yakagubulwa mu vilo vivi vye ndumo ku soko ya nyenye.
Na mu nzila yakwe, anye mukumwihuwilo Mulungu mono yamuzukula muli wafu no kumupela lukumyo, holeka uwihuwilo no witumbilo wenyu wuli kuli Mulungu.
Alu vyono mu wuhulika mbeka, anye mwakondya kweza i zinhumbula zenyu, no kuwenda iwayenyu musina wukoci, ale, mwiyendaje yendi yendi kwe nhumbula yose.

Hambi nha mu nzila ye nghani nyumi yo Mulungu, inghani ye cibitilila, anye mwalelwa wupya, si mwinha i wana wo sogo ya munhu mono yadahile kufwa, langa usogo yo munhu mono siyadahile kufwa cibitilila.
Nha vyono i Mandiko gatezaga: “U munhu wo wose nha yenha mahanze no lukumyo lwakwe lose nha lwinha maluwa ga mu mbago. Imahanze ganyalaga ne maluwa gakung'unhikaga.
Ninga inghani yo Muwaha yikalaga cibitilila.” Inghani yiyo, yo nghani yo Luganuzi Luswanu lono lwaganulwa kuli'nye.
Holeka, lecenyi wubi wose: no wulambi, no wukoci, ne zinghani zose ze nhovu, vivyo vyose viwucile lukulu muli nyenye.
Nha vyono iwana wadodo wasulumilaga mele, na nyenye nhavivyo munojeye muwe no wusulumizi we mele geneco ge cimuhe, na mu vilungo vyago, ho musume kuwiluka no kukombozwa.
Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile, nha gakutya, “Mwezuka vyono Muwaha yali lusungu.”
Ale, mubitilenyi Muwaha! Umwene lyo libwe lyumi lyono lyalemwa ne wanhu, ninga hali Mulungu, lyo libwe lyono lihaguywe, lyono lina wuguzi wukamu.

Ale mubitilenyi mwene nha mabwe momi, mukazenjece, no kuwa nyumba ye cimuhe, mono mosuma kwitumama nhe wakohani wono welile, ku wulavya i makumbiko ge cimuhe gono gakumwendeza Mulungu mu nzila ya Yesu Kilisito.

Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “Langa ta! Nghuwika kuko ku Sayuni libwe liwaha lyo musinji. Ilibwe lyo wuguzi wukamu, lyono nilihaguye. Umunhu mono komwihuwila umwene mono yo lilyo libwe, sikolokozwa soni ng'o.”
Ale kuli'nye mono mwihuwiye, ilibwe lilyo lyo lyo wuguzi wukamu, ninga kuli walya wono siwehuwiye, “I libwe lyono walilema iwazenji, ninga alu lyo lyeza libwe liwaha lyo musinji.”
Kanyhi i Mandiko gakutya, “Libwe lilyo lyo libwe lyo wikobale, litalawe lyo kuwagwisa wanhu.” Ne wanhu wekobalaga vyono siwehuwila inghani yiyilya. Ku soko vyo watemezezwa ku wulawa mwamulizo.

Ninga anye muli ndelwa hagulwa, iwakohani wo Mutemi, inghungugo yono yelile, i wanhu wo Mulungu mweneco, mono muhaguywe ho mwanze ze metumo mawaha go Mulungu mono yamucemenyi kulawa ku wutitu, yakamwinjizenyi mu wuzelu wakwe wo kwizina.
Mu mapango ganji, anye mwali si muli wanhu wo Mulungu, ninga'lu anye mweza muli wanhu wakwe, kanyhi mwali si muwoneywe lusungu lo Mulungu, alu ninga mwawonelwa lusungu.
Nye nyo wendece wangu, nghumunenenyi nyenye nha wajenzi kanyhi wakola nzila mononze! Mwiyilegaje mu masulumizi go muwili gono vikulewana ne nhumbula.

I mijendele yenyu muli wanhu wono siwamumanyile Mulungu, yinojeye yiwe miswanu muno muno, na kolo wakumuvilenyi nha muli wetuma vibi, wasume kugawona i metumo genyu maswanu, ho wamulumbile Mulungu mwizuwa lyo wuze wakwe.
Ale, mweze muli cihuliko kuli zose zono zikutemywa ne wanhu ku soko yo Muwaha. Cihuliko kuli mutemi u munya wutemi,
cihuliko kuli wawaha we'zisi wono wahaguywe nayo, ho wawalipicize i wahodanji no kuwalumba i wetuma viswanu.
Hambi u Mulungu nha vyo yakuhila, ho musume kuzinyamaziza i zinghani zo wulele, ze wanhu wono wasina mahala mu metumo genyu maswanu gono mukwituma.
Mwikalaje nhe wanhu welecele, ninga mulece kuwitumamila u welecele wenyu wuwe nha cigubicizo co wubi, langa i mikalile yenyu yeze nhe wetumami wo Mulungu.
Mweze na cogopo kuli wanhu wose, mu wendaje i wandugu zenyu wono wehuwiye, mumogopaje Mulungu, mumupelaje lilumbo mutemi.
Nye nyo wetumami wa mu zikaya, mweze na cihuliko kuli wawaha wenyu hamonga ne cogopo cose, kuli i waswanu ne wapolo, hamba na kuli wono wali caka.
Hambi hono muwe mukukangalila mawine ge magazo gono simuganojeye gamutujenyi, akuno mumanyile vyono u Mulungu yakusaka muwe nha vivyo, ale Mulungu kumutazenyi.

Hambi, motuga cambuzici kolo mukukangalila so wutowe wono mukutowa ku soko ye masutya genyu? Ninga hono muwe mukukangalila i magazo, hamba muwe nha mwetuma ziswanu, ale, nayo Mulungu komulugutenyi ku soko yiyo.
Na zizo zo mwacemelwa, hambi Kilisito mweneco nha yagazwa ku soko yenyu, yakamulecelenyi musambo, ho muyityatye i mikalile yakwe.
Umwene siyetuma wubi, hamba nghani yo wulambi, siyahulikwa mu mulomo wakwe.
Na lono wamuligaga, mwene siyawapitula ne'ligo, lono yagazizwa, mwene siyawapinjicila langa yamuwicila u Mulungu u witumbilo wakwe wose, u muling'anizi we ling'ani.
U mwene yawudinghulila u wubi wetu mu muwili wakwe mu musalaba, ho cisume kufwa ku lubavu lo wubi, no kuwumipila ku wiling'ano. Na muzinghomele zakwe, anye mo mwaponyezwa.
Nanye mwali mwinha zingholo zono zali zajiliye, ninga lu mumuwuyila Mudimi no mulanjilizi we zinhumbula zenyu.

Nanye nyo wacekulu, mweze ne cihuliko kuli walume zenyu, ho yiwe, hono hawe howali i walume wono si wayihuwiye i nghani yo Mulungu, ho wasume nawo kwihuwila, kolo wakuyiwona i mikalile yenyu. Hambi nha kowa kusina soko yo kulonga kuli'nye, nghani yo yose,
hambi nha woyiwona weneco i mikalile yenyu vyono yelile, yono yimogopile Mulungu.
Na mu wihambe wenyu, mulece kucelelela muno izinghani za munze du, nha zo wutawa zimvili, nazo wuvwala i vinhu vye zizahabu, ne myenda ye cimalidadi.
Langa wuswanu wenyu wunojeye wulawe mu wuwe wa mugati wo wunhu we mbeka, wono siwusakalaga, wo wuswanu no watuvu we nhumbula, wono wina wuguzi wukamu hali Mulungu.
Nhavivyo i katali, vyo wehambaga iwacekulu we ling'ani, wono wali wamwitumbiye Mulungu, wakawa wali cihuliko kuli walume zawo.
Nha vyono Sala nayo, yamuhulikaga Abulahamu, sunga yamutezaga mutwawe. Nalu nanye mweza wanagwe we cicekulu, hono mwitume viswanu hamba kugofywa na cinhu cinji co cose.

Nhavivyo nanye nyo walume, mu wikalana ne wacekulu zenyu, munojeye mumanye vyono, wene wasocele, holeka munojeye muwatendele kwe cogopo, no kuwanemya, hambi nawo nha wolohalana hamonga nanye i lihewa lyo wumi, wono yakumupelenyi Mulungu. U wulombe wenyu, ho wulece kwimilwa.
Ale, ze ndumilizo nghutya nhavi: yiwanojeye muwe na nhumbula monga, ne 'hweso limonga, yiwanojeye kwiyenda nha ndugu, mweze wapolo kanyhi muli wenenenyhezi nyenye wose.
Mulece kuwagomolezeza wanhu wubi na wubi, hamba yiligo ne 'ligo, langa muwalombele wumoteswe, hambi anye nha mwacemwa no Mulungu ho muwubocele wumoti.
Hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gatezaga, “Mono yakusaka yawumipe no wusangalale, sunga yawone ne cambuzi ce vilo vyakwe, yimunojeye yalece kulonga zimbi, kanyhi yalece kulonga wulambi.
Kanyhi yeleje ne zimbi, yetume ziswanu, yawulondole mulamu no kuwukamisa,
Hambi Muwaha nha kawalangaga viswanu i wanhu we ling'ani no kuwuhuliciza u wulombe wawo. Ninga Mulungu kawatumbilaga mugongo iwetuma zimbi.”
Nani 'mbi mono komutendelenyi anye vibi, hono muzikamise zo wituma ziswanu?
Ninga, hamba yiwe yimunojelenyi kugazika ku soko yo wituma ziswanu, ale, mowa wamoti. Kanyhi mulece kumogopa munhu wo wose, hamba mulece kuvumila kwinjizwa mu mahwele.
Langa mumukumyaje Kilisito nho Muwaha mu zinhumbula zenyu. Kanyhi mweze mwiwikanize nhondo zose kumupitula yunji wo wose mono komuwuzenyi zo witumbilo wono wuli muli nyenye,
ninga nozenyi nhavivyo ko wupolo ne cogopo. Mweze ne ciselinji ciswanu, hono mukuligwa ho wakozwe soni wa walya wono wakuyilonga vibi i mikalile yenyu miswanu ye Cikilisito.
Hambi nha viswanu kugazika ku soko yo wituma ziswanu, hono Mulungu yende. Si nha kugazika ku soko yo wituma zimbi.

Hambi Kilisito mweneco nha yafwa ku soko yo wubi wetu, yafwa kamonga du yikakwila, u munhu we ling'ani ku soko ye wabi, ho yamutegulenyi anye kuli Mulungu. Yawulagwa mu muwili ninga yakanozwa mumi mu Muhe,
na mu mikalile yakwe ye cimuhe yakabita kuwaganulila yiyilya myuhe yono yali mu cifungo.

Wawo wo wa walya wono wakalema kumuhulika Mulungu, lono yawalindilila ne ngola mu cipango lono Noha yawikanizaga yiyilya safina. Na mugati ye ciya cico wanhu wacefu du, wo wanhu munana du, wono wakaponywa mwilenga.

I lilenga lyono lyali yo hwani yo wubaputizo wono wukumuponyenyi nyenye'lu. Wubaputizo si nghani yo wuwusa makwe mu muwili, langa co cilagane kuli Mulungu cono cinozezwaga mu ciselinji ciswanu. Cikumuponyenyi mu nzila yo wuzuce wa Yesu Kilisito,
mono yabita ku wulanga, nalu yekaye ku lubavu lo kulume lo Mulungu, yawatemile wamalayika, ne wawaha, na wono walawiliciye.
Ku soko lu vyono Kilisito yagazicila mu muwili, holeka nanye yimunojelenyi mwisikamizizye mu wuhile wakwe wuwo, hambi mono yakugazicila mu muwili, nha vyakondya kwileka no wubi.
Holeka ku wulawa lulu, imikalile yenyu yono yisigaye kwikala kukuno kono'nze, yinojeye muwe kutongwa no wuhile wo Mulungu, hamba si ne masulumizi ge cimunhu-munhu.

Hambi i vilo vyono vyakondya kupuluta, nha mwali mwina cilejeho ciwaha, co kwituma zono wanozaga wanhu wono siwamumanyile Mulungu. Mukekala mu mikalile yo wiyendeza nyo weneco, yo wiwoni, yo wukolwa, yo wisonji, wung'wela, na yo wuhemba vihwani.
Ninga'lu, iwanhu wawo wono siwamumanyile u Mulungu, wakwizina kolo wakuwona vyono simukuwezana kanyhi na wene mu mikalile mibi, na holeka wakumulijenyi.
Ninga siwololeka kwibombola ze nghani yiyi hali Mulungu mono yewikanize kuwaling'aniza i womi ne wafu!

Ku soko yiyo, wawo wono wafwa wono wali wakondya kuling'anizwa muli ze mikalile yawo ye cimunhu-munhu nha vyono waling'anizwaga wanhu wose, waganulilwa u Luganuzi Luswanu, ho wasume kwikala mu mikalile yawo ye cimuhe, nha vyono kekalaga Mulungu.
Ale, u mudumo we vinhu vyose wasejelela. Holeka munojeye muwe no wiyimile no kwikala meso, ho musume kulomba.
Ne nghani mbaha muno muno, mwiyendaje yendi-yendi kwe nhumbula yose, hambi uwendo nha wuhiliwizaga wubi winji.
Mwiyicemelaje viswanu nyenye wose akuno musina wung'ung'ulice.
Kanyhi anye wose munojeye mwitumamile cipegwa cono mwapegwa no Mulungu so cambuzi ca wanji, nha vyono u mukozwa muswanu we vipegwa hayo hayo vyo Mulungu.

Na mono yakulonga nghani yo yose, u wulonje wakwe, weze nho wulonje we zinghani zo Mulungu, na mono yakuwetumamila wanji, yimunojeye yawetumamile ne vilungo nha vyono yakupegwa no Mulungu. U Mulungu ho yakumizwe muli vyose, mwitagwa lya Yesu Kilisito, mono ulukumyo ne vilungo nha vyakwe cibitilila na cibitilila! Heya.
Nye wandugu zangu wendece, mulece kwizina ze majelo mawaha gono gakumuzizenyi yiwe nha mukuzizwa na cinhu cijenzi.
Langa musangalale vyono mukuhanga imagazo ga Kilisito, ho musume kuwa na nyemo mbaha muno muno mwidaha lono ulukumyo lwakwe lukugubulwa.
Hambi nha muli wamoti, hono muli'gwe ku soko ye litagwa lya Kilisito, ne nghani yiyo, yikulajila vyono Muhe Mono Yelile, yuyo Muhe wo Mulungu kekalaga muli'nye.
Ninga halece kuwa na munhu wo wose muli nyenye mono kogazwa so wuwulaji, hamba so wuhizi, hamba so wuhodanji, hamba so wituma zimbi.
Ninga hono munhu yagazwe vyono mwene Mukilisito, ale, yalece kuwona soni, langa yamukumyaje Mulungu vyono mwene yakucemwa mwitagwa lya Kilisito.

I cidaha co wuling'anizwe nha cakondya kuza, no wuling'anizwe wuwo, wukwamulila kuli wanhu wo Mulungu mweneco. Na hono wulinga'nizwe wuwo wamulile kuli sese, co weneco, alu ma, i ndumo ya wawalya wono siwehuwilaga u Luganuzi Luswanu lo Mulungu, ho yolowa wule?
Nha vyono i Mandiko Gono Gelile gakutya, “Hono vikamu kuli wanhu we ling'ani kuponywa, yolowa wule lu, kuli wanhu wono siwamogopaga Mulungu ne Wanyo wubi?”
Holeka, wawo wono wakugazika ku so wuhile wo Mulungu, yiwanojeye, wamukoze u Muwumbi mwihuwilwa nhumbula zawo, mu wituma ziswanu.

Nyo wanyamhala! Ane no munyamhala muyenyu, nghumulombenyi nghani yi monga du, nyo wanyamhala wayangu. Hambi nene no mweneco nha newonelela ne meso gangu, imagazo ga Kilisito kanyhi nitumbiye kuhanga lululya u lukumyo lono lologubulwa. Ale, ane nghumunenenyi,

muyidimaje yiyilya imhuga yo Mulungu yono mwapegwa, muyilanjilile, si ne dindimiza langa kwe nhumbula, nha vyono kasakaga Mulungu. Muwitumaje u mulimo wuwo si kwe masulumizi ge zipesa, langa kwe nhumbula zenyu zose.
Mulece kuwatema kwe vilungo wawo wono wawicigwe mu wulanjilizi wenyu, langa mweze nha musambo kuli mhuga yiyo.
Na mu cidaha kolo u Mudimi Muwaha yakwijela, nanye molobocela u mukumbo wo lukumyo wono siwunyalaga.

Nanye nhavivyo mo wadodo, munojeye mwiwice mu wulajilize we wanyamhala. Nanye wose munojeye muwe no winenenyhezi ho musume kwiyitumila nyenye wose, hambi i Mandiko Gono Gelile nha gakutya, “U Mulungu sikawasakaga wono wena widunhumuzi, langa kawapelaga lihewa iwenenenyhezi.”
Holeka mwinenenyheze mu muwoko wo Mulungu wono wuli vilungo, ho yamunyasulenyi mu cidaha cono cinojeye.
Mumulecelaje u Mulungu zose zono zikumugazenyi mu zinhumbula zenyu. Hambi mwene nha yo yakumudimenyi.
Mwikalaje meso, kanyhi mweze musujile. Hambi umulugu wenyu Setani, yakupilima pilima nha simba yikukoloma, yikulondola yunji yimuhawanje.
Holeka mumwimilaje, kanyhi mweze mukamile mu wihuwilo wenyu, kuno mumanyile vyono i wandugu zenyu wono wali kono'nze, nawo wakugatuga i magazo gono genha gaga.

Ninga kolo mukugazika cidaha cidodo vivi, Mulungu mono yo ndawililo ye lihewa lyose na mono yakumucemenyi muwuhanje ulukumyo lwakwe we cibitilila muwilunza na Kilisito, umweneco komukwilanicizenyi no kumukangazenyi, kanyhi komupelenyi vilungo no musinji wono wukamile.
Kuli mwene wuwe wuwaha cibitilila! Heya.

Nimwandicilenyi i baluwa yiyi fupi, ko wutazi wa Silivano u ndugu yetu mono nimumanyile kanyhi mono nimwitumbiye. Nghusaka kumusikamyenyi no kuhomelela vyono ali lye'hewa lyo Mulungu lye mbeka. Holeka mwikalaje mukamile mwihewa lilyo.
Ne mhuga ye wayenyu i wahagulwa wo Mulungu wono wali mwi'kanisa lya ku Babiloni wakumulamusenyi. No mwanangu Maluko nhavivyo nayo yakumulamusenyi.
Mwiyilamusaje mu citanjilo co wendo wa Kilisito. U mulamu kuli'nye wose mono muli wakwe Kilisito.

Ane yo nene Simoni Petelo, u mwitumami no mutumwa wa Yesu Kilisito. Nghumwandicilenyi nyenye mono so wuswanu wo Mulungu wetu, hamonga no Mukombozi Yesu Kilisito, mwapegwa u wihuwilo wuwulya wo wuguzi wukamu wono capegwa na sese.
Ilihewa no Mulamu vyeze kuli'nye mu wumumanyo Mulungu, na Yesu Kilisito Mutwa wetu.

Mu vilungo vyakwe vyo wulungu, u Mulungu yacipela vyose vyono cisakaga, ho cisume kwikala mu mikalile yo kumogopo Mulungu, no kumumanya mwene mono yacicema ho ciwuhanje ulukumyo no wuswanu wakwe mweneco.
Hambi muli zizo nha yakondya kucipela vipegwa viwaha vyo wuguzi wukamu vyono yacihuwiziza, na ku so vipegwa vivyo, ho musume kuhanga u wuwe wakwe wo wulungu.
Holeka mupiligale muno konjeleza wuswanu wo wihuwilo wenyu, kanyhi monjeleze no wizuce mu wuswanu wenyu,
mu wizuce namo, monjeleze wiyimile, na mu wiyimile namo, monjeleze ngola, mu ngola namo, monjeleze wogopo Mulungu.
Mu wogopo Mulungu namo, monjeleze wenda ndugu, na mu wenda ndugu namo, monjeleze wendo.
Na kolo mukuwa no winji wa zizi zose, zomunozenyi muwe muli wetumi, no kutuga cambuzi mu wumumanya Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Ninga munhu mono yazisina zizi zose, yaweza mubofu, hambi nha si yakusuma kuwona, kanyhi yasemwa vyono yakondya kukwemwa u wubi wakwe we katali.

Ale, holeka, wandugu zangu, piligalenyi muno muno kulunoza lulo ulucemo lwenyu lono mwacemelwa no Mulungu, luwe nghani ye cibitilila mu mikalile yenyu, na hono mwikale nhavivyo, simosuma kuwulecela lukulu uwihuwilo wenyu.
Na yiyo yo yoleka mosuma kupegwa wiling'ano wono wukwilaniciye, wo kwinjilila mu wutemi wo Mutwa wetu no Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Holeka nane nojendelela kumukumbucizenyi nhondo zose zinghani zizi, hamba muwe mwakondya kuzimanya, kanyhi mukamile mu mbeka yono mwayibocela.
Nghwihwesa yowa nghani swanu kuli'ne, mu mapango gose gono nowa nghali nili mumi kononze, njendelele kumusikamyenyi no kumukumbucizenyi ze zinghani zizi.
Hambi nha manyile vyono naza behi kuwuwika mu citenjelo umuwili wangu wuwu wono wufwizaga, nha vyono u Muwaha yanonjela calinze.
Holeka nopiligala kumupelenyi nzila yo kuzikumbucilila zinghani zizi nhondo zose, hamba lono niwe nakondya kufwa.
Mu vilo vyono cawejizenyi ze nyiza yakwe mbaha u Mutwa wetu Yesu Kilisito, sicatyatya zisimo ze cibwete bwete zono zisina nhunizo yo yose. Ase cikawuwona ulukumyo lwakwe ne meso getu co weneco.

Ase cali baho mu cipango lono yapelelwa lilumbo, no kukumywa no Mulungu Sogo yo munhu, lono lizi likamuziza kulawa kuli mwene, mono yo Lukumyo Luwaha, likutya, “Ayu yo Mwanangu mwendece mono nyendezwe nayo.”
Kanyhi, sese co weneco cikalihulika lizi lilyo kulawa ku wulanga lono cali cili hamonga nayo kucanyha ye litunda lililya lyono lyelile.

Kanyhi sunga ne zinghani ze wawizi zikuyihomelela nghani yiyi, nanye mukunoza viswanu hono mukuyibata, hambi nha yinha tala yono yikumulika hanhu hatitu, sunga lizuwa lililya kolo likusomoza, no wuzelu we nyelezi yimwacinghunghu, kolo wukubulila mu zinhumbula zenyu.
Ninga hamonga na zizo, mukumbucile vyono, hasina munhu wo wose, mono kosuma kulolosa mweneco zo wuwizi wono wuli mu Mandiko Gono Gelile.
Hambi nha hasina nghani yo wuwile yono yina ndawililo ye cimunhumunhu, langa iwanhu wayilonga inghani yo Mulungu nha vyono watongwaga no Muhe Mono Yelile.

Wakalawila wawizi wo wulambi muli wanhu, nhavivyo kanyhi, iwejizi wo wulambi wololawila sunga na muli nyenye. Ne wanhu we liwala lilyo, wololeta i mafundo go wiwajize no kumukana Muwaha mono yakawakomboza, na mu nzila, yiyo wokwiletela musunho u wongomezwe wawo weneco.
Kanyhi ne wanhu wenji wolozityatya zizo zinzila zawo zimbi, sunga na wanji woloyibedegala Inzila ye mbeka ku soko yawo.

Na ku soko ye masulumizi gawo mabi, wolokwisavizya muli nyenye, kolo wakumulonjelenyi zinghani zo wulambi-lambi. No wulipicizwe wawo wakondya kuwikanizwa kulawa katali, siwocela yaye. Nayo mono kowongomeza, yali meso!
Na lono wamalayika wetumila u wubi, u Mulungu si yawawonela lusungu yaye, langa yakawataga mu moto we Gehena, nawo wafunjigwe mumo walindiye Lizuwa lililya lyo wuling'anizwe.

Kanyhi u Mulungu hamba siyayitetela yinze ye katali, yaleta lihwazi lye malenga mu'si yiyilya ye wanhu wono si wamogopago Mulungu, ninga Noha mono yaganulaga u wiling'ano, u Mulungu yakamuponya hamonga ne wanhu wanji mupunghati.
Kanyhi Mulungu yakagalipiciza makaya ga Sodoma na Gomola, yakagaticimiza no moto tici-tici, yakaganoza gawe nha suguzi kuli wanhu wono siwamogopaga Mulungu.
Yakamuponya Loti munhu muswanu, ne mikalile mibi ye muswanu, wanhu wawo wafyuzi.
Hambi Loti nha yakekalana ne wanhu wawo, na mu vilo vinji, inhumbula yakwe yali yina mahwele mawaha, yeza kuhulika ze metumo gawo mabi.
Ale, holeka, Muwaha yamanyile kuwaponya mu wulipicizwe sunga Mwizuwa lililya lyo wuling'anizwe.

Na ko muno wa walya wono watyatyaga imasulumizi mabi go muwili na wono wakubedegala no kulema kutemwa no Mulungu. Iwanhu we liwala lilyo, wasina cihuliko kanyhi wedunhumuzi, hambi nha watovulaga, kanyhi wasina cogopo kuli viwumbwa vyono vyelile vya kucanyha.
Ninga wamalayika wono wena u wulajilize ne vilungo kuciza wawo iwejizi wo wulambi, siwawasitakaga no kuwaliganga wene wawo hamwande yo Muwaha.

Iwanhu wawo wono waligaga co cose cilya cono siwacimanyile, wenha i malimu gono gasina mahala, gono gakuwa kulelwa, na hanyuma yayo gebatagwa no kuwulagwa. Wokongomezwa ku soko yo wuhodanji wawo weneco.

Kanyhi wolipwa magazo ku soko ye magazo gono wesaciye weneco. Ne nyemo yawo yili mu wunoza, co cose cono cikwigutya imasulumizi gawo go muwili, kanyhi wakuzinoza zizo mu misi du mugati. Iwanhu we nhavivyo wakuleta cevu hamonga na soni mbaha, kolo mwekonghola hamonga nawo, mu wulye we zindigwa zenyu ze zisikukuu, akuno wakuzisecelela i zinzila zawo zo wukoci.

Ne meso gawo gamemile wusenyha wose, sunga ne masulumizi gawo go kwituma wubi, si gamalikaga hamba hadodo. Wawo wo wakuwa kuwakonga-konga wanhu wono wasoceye sunga wawagwiziza mu mitego. Ne mitima yawo yizoweleze mu wusulumizi we zisawo. Iwanhu wawo wali mu wulijitwe wo Mulungu!
Hambi nha wayileka inzila yono yigolocile, wajilila no kuyityatya nzila yono yayityatya Balamu, mwana wa Beyoli, mono yenda yatuje cambuzi mu wituma zo wulambi-lambi,
yakatacilwa ku soko yo wubi wakwe. Ne ndogowe yono siyilongaga, yikalonga ne lizi lye wanhu, ndogowe yikawupezezya lukulu ulukwale lwa yuyo muwizi.
Iwanhu wawo wenha mivwilo yono yinyalile, kanyhi wenha mavunde gono gapemheluswaga ne mbeho mbaha, no wikalo wawo wono wawiciywe, nha hanhu hono howuli wutitu wuwaha.
Hambi nha walongaga zinghani zo wiwoni zono zisina nhunizo, kanyhi wegetumamilaga imasulumizi gawo mabi go muwili ho wawagwise awalya wono wakondya kwilega mu wanhu wono wekalaga mu wajilile.
Wawehuwizaga wanhu wanji, wakutya, ati wowa welecele, akuno kumbe weneco ho wawanda wo wuhodanjice. Hambi u munhu nha yakuwa muwanda wa cinhu co cose cilya, cono cikondizye kumusumiza.

Ne wanhu wono wali wakondya kupona mu muwuhodanjice we yinze, mu nzila yo kumumanya Muwaha no Mukombozi wetu Yesu Kilisito, kanyhi hanyuma yayo, wakeyendela weneco kugwizwa no kutemwa kanyhi no wuhodanjice wuwo, i mikalile yawo yowa mibi muno kuciza ya halulongozi.

Hambi nha yanda yiwe ciba kuli wene hono wali walece kuyimanya hamba hadodo, inzila yiyo yo wiling'ano, sinha kuyimanya, na hanyuma yayo, kuyileka no kulitaga lilajilizo lyono lyelile lyono walibocela.

Hambi nha howuli mulongo wono wutezaga, Libwa ligawuyilaga kanyhi imadeko galyo lyeneco. “No mulongo wunji wutezaga, Ligubi lyono lihovugwe, libiducizaga kanyhi mu madabaga!” Nhavivyo vyo yimile lu kuli wene.

Nyo wendece wangu, ayi yo baluwa yangu ye kejete yono nghumwandicilenyi. Na mu zibaluwa zizo zinyejete, nali kujela kumuswaswanizenyi i mahweso maswanu ga mu mahala genyu, ko kumukumbucizenyi zinghani zizi.
Nyendile mumanye, kanyhi mukumbicile zinghani zono zalongwa ne wawizi wono welile, na lililya lilajilizo lyo Muwaha no Mukombozi, lyono mwapegwa ne watumwa wenyu.
Mukwamula kumanya vyono mu vilo vya ku ndumo wolokuza wanhu wono mikalile yawo yitemigwe ne masulumizi gawo mabi. Wolomuzwajizenyi nyenye,

no kutya, “Yehuwiza vyono kolokuza! Ninga lu yali hayi? Hambi nha zinghani zo zizo du vyo yinha, ku wulawa lono wafwila wa kuku zetu ne nyikala ye vinhu vyo yiyilya du, nha vyono yali kulawo mwamulizo we yinze!”
Iwanhu wawo, wasemwaga na vyono Mulungu yalonga, u wulanga ne yinze vikawa kuwumbwa. Ne yinze yikawumbwa ku wulawa mu malenga, na kwe malenga,
na kwe malenga gago nha cinji i malenga gagalya ge lihwazi liwaha, yinze ya lululya yikongomezwa.
Ninga wulanga ne yinze za lulu mbikwe ne nghani yo Mulungu, ziwiciywe moto. Ziwicigwe ku soko ye lizuwa lililya lono wanhu wono siwamogopile Mulungu wololing'anizwa no kongomezwa.
Ninga nyo wendece wangu, mulece kusemwa cinhu cimonga! Hamwande yo Muwaha, hasina wisimajile we lizuwa limonga, ne myaka elufu, kuli mwene vyose co cimonga du.

Hambi Muwaha nha sikacelaga kuzifisiliza zizilya zono yehuwiza, nha vyono wanhu wanji wehwesaga vyono kocela. Umwene yena ngola ku soko yenyu, hambi nha siyendile hamba hadodo muyenyu yunji yajilile, langa yakuwasaka wose wafice ku wunene.

Lizuwa lyo Muwaha lyolokuza nha muhizi. Mwizuwa lilyo, wulanga wolokwajilila ne cihumbi ciwaha, ne vinhu vyayo vyo kulawa katali vyolokongomezwa no moto, nayo yinze yolokwajilila, hamonga ne vinhu vyose vyono vili mumo.
Ale, hono vinhu vyose vyohodangwa nha vivi, ma, anye munojeye muwe wanhu we nha wule? Munojeye muwe ne nyikala yono yelile no kumogopo Mulungu,
akuno mulilindiye lizuwa lilya lyo Mulungu, no kulisunhaniza lize mbela mbela, i lizuwa lyono wulanga wolokongomezwa no moto no kuhodangwa, ne vinhu vyayo vye katali, vyolokwenjedulwa.
Ninga'se, ku so wihuwizo wakwe, cilindiye wulanga wupya ne'nze mhya, mono wumemile wiling'ano.
Holeka nyo wendece wangu, vyono mulilindiye lizuwa lilyo, mupiligale kwiyeza muno muno, muwe musina manamha-manamha hali Mulungu, ho mowa no mulamu nayo.

Munojeye muwuwone u wukangalizi wo Muwaha, vyono co cilejeho cono yakumupelenyi, ho muponywe, nha vyono Pawulo ndugu yetu mwendece yakamwandicilenyi, kuno yakwitumamila i mahala gono yapegwa no Mulungu.

Zizo zo kalongaga mu zibaluwa zakwe zose, lono yakuduwila ze nghani yiyo. Hozili nghani nyhefu mu zibaluwa zakwe zono nghamu kuwizuce, zo nghani zono i wanhu walele, wono wasina musinji wazipitulanyaga nha vyono wazipitulaga zinji ze Mandiko Gono Gelile. Wakwiyiletela uwongomezwe wawo weneco.
Ninga'nye, nyo wendece wangu, mwakondya kuyimanya nghani yiyi, holeka mweze musujile, ho mulece kwajilizwa ne masutya ge wahodanji, no kugwa ku wulawa mu wusikame wenyu wono wukamile.
Ninga mujendelele kuwilucila mwihewa no mu wumanyo Mutwa wetu no Mukombozi Yesu Kilisito. U lukumyo lweze kuli mwene, kulawa lulu na ku cibitilila Heya.
Cikukwandicila zizi so i nghani yo wumi yono yali yili baho ku wulawa mwamulizo. Ase cayihulika no kuyiwona ne meso getu sese co weneco, cayiwona no kuyibata kwe miwoko yetu sese co weneco.
No wumi wuwo wali weza kwanzalikwa, ase cawuwona, nalu cikulonga, kanyhi cikumulonjelenyi zo wumi wuwo we cibitilila, wono wali ko Sogo yo munhu, hanyuma wukanzalikwa kuli'se.
Cico cono cawona, na cono cahulika, co cikumwanzizenyi nanye, nanye ho muhanje nase mu wumonga wono cina nawo no Sogo yo munhu no Mwanagwe Yesu Kilisito.
Cikumwandicilenyi nanye zizi, i nyemo yenyu ho yimemelecele.
I nghani yono cayihulika kuli Yesu, yono cikumulonjelenyi, nha yoyi, u Mulungu wo wuzelu, na muli mwene, musina hamba citi.
Holeka hono ciwe kutya cili wumonga nayo, na kuno ho cikwikala mu wutitu, cowa calonga wulambi mu wulonje na mu metumo.
Langa hono cikale mu wuzelu, nha vyono u mwene yali mu wuzelu, baho langa cowa no wumonga sese kwa sese, ne sakami yakwe Yesu Kilisito u Mwanagwe, yocikwema mu wubi wose.
Na hono ciwe kutya cisina wubi, cikwikonga co weneco, ne mbeka muli sese musina.
Langa hono ciwuvumile u wubi wetu, u mwene u Mulungu yo mwihuwilwa, kanyhi yali ling'ani, nayo kocinenela u wubi wetu wose, no kucikwema ne masutya getu gose.
Na hono ciwe kutya cikali sinetuma wubi, cowa camunoza u Mulungu nha mulambi, ne nghani yakwe yili musina muli sese.
Mo wanangu nghumwandicilenyi zizi, ho mulece kwituma wubi. Ninga yisolaga munhu ketuma wubi, cina nayo yumonga mono kacilombelaga kuli Baba, yo Yesu Kilisito, mono yali ling'ani.
Kilisito lye kumbiko lyono likuwuwusa u wubi wetu, hamba si wubi wetu sese du, langa u wubi we yinze yose.
Hono cigakamise i malajilizo go Mulungu, ale ho cosuma kumanyila lukulu vyono cimumanyile.
Na munhu hono yatye yamumanyile Mulungu, ninga kuno ho siyakugakamisa i malajilizo gakwe, u munhu yuyo mulambi, hamba ne mbeka yose yili musina muli mwene.
Ninga u munhu wo wose mono yakuyibate i nghani yo Mulungu, yuyo langa yo yena u wendo wo Mulungu muli mwene. Na mu nzila yiyo mo cikusuma kumanyila lukulu vyono cili muli mwene,
u munhu wo wose mono yakutya yali muli Mulungu, yimunojeye yawe yena i mikalile, nhe mikalile ya Yesu Kilisito.

Nyo wendece wangu, i lilajilizo lili lyono nghumwandicilenyi, si yilajilizo yipya yaye, langa lye lajilizo lililya lye katali du, lyono mwali mwina nalyo ku wulawa mwamulizo. Ne lilajilizo lilyo lye katali, yo nghani yi yilya yono mwayihulika.
